40001001	Abraham suan David tapa Jesu Khrist khang ciamtehna:
40001002	Isaac pa Abraham, Jacob pa Isaac, Judah le a sanggam pasalte pa Jacob,
40001003	A zi Tamar tawh a neih a tapa Perez le Zerah pa Judah, Hezron pa Perez, Ram pa Hezron,
40001004	Amminadab pa Ram Nahshon pa Amminadab, Salmon pa Nahshon,
40001005	A zi Rahab tawh a neih a tapa Boaz pa Salmon, A zi Ruth tawh a neih a tapa Obed pa Boaz, Jesse pa Obed,
40001006	Kumpi David pa Jesse, Uriah zi a hi ngei tawh a neih a tapa Solomon pa David,
40001007	Rehoboam pa Solomon, Abijah pa Rehoboam, Asa pa Abijah,
40001008	Jehoshaphat pa Asa, Joram pa Jehoshaphat, Uzziah pa Joram,
40001009	Jotham pa Uzziah, Ahaz pa Jotham, Hezekiah pa Ahaz,
40001010	Manasseh pa Hezekiah, Amon pa Manasseh, Josiah pa Amon,
40001011	Babylon khua pi-a a saltan lai-ua a neih Jeconiaha le a sanggam pasal teng pa Josiah
40001012	Babylon a, a saltan khit uh ciang in: Shealtiel pa Jeconiah, Zerubbabel pa Shealtiel,
40001013	Abiud pa Zerubbabel, Eliakim pa Abiud, Azor pa Eliakim,
40001014	Zadok pa Azor, Akim pa Zadok, Eliud pa Akim,
40001015	Eleazar pa Eliud, Matthan pa Eleazar, Jacob pa Matthan,
40001016	Joseph pa Jacob hi-a, Joseph zi Mary sung panin Khrist kici Jesu a suak hi.
40001017	Hih bangin Abraham pan David dong khang sawm le li, David pan Babylon a saltan dong khang sawm le li hi-a, saltan khit pan Khrist dong khang sawm le li ahi hi.
40001018	Jesu Khrist suahzia hih bang ahi hi. A nu Mary, Joseph tawh kiteng dinga kidongsa ahi hi. Amau gel a kigawm ma-un Khasiangtho in Mary a gaiisak hi.
40001019	A pasal Joseph, mi lungsim dik hi-a, mi lakah daisak nuam loin maksim ding a sawm hi.
40001020	Ahi hangin tua banga a ngaihsut laitakin Topa vansawltak khat a mang sungah kilanga, “David tapa Joseph aw, Mary paii nau pen Khasiangtho pan ahi manin amah na tenpih ding lauthawng kei in.
40001021	Tapa khat a nei ding hi; tua tapa in ama mite a mawhna uh panin honkhia ding ahi manin a min Jesu na phuak in,” a ci hi.
40001022	Kamsangpa tungtawna Topa gensa a tangtun nadingin hihte khempeuh a piang ahi hi.
40001023	"Tua nungak bit gaii-in tapa khat nei dinga, ama min Immanuel kici ding hi” d a khiatna in, “Eite tawh Pasian om khawm” cihna ahi hi.
40001024	Joseph a khanlawh ciangin Topa vansawltak thupiak bangin manga, Mary a tenpih hi.
40001025	Ahi hangin tapa a suah matengin a luppih kei hi. A suah ciangin a min Jesu a phuak hi.
40002001	Kumpi Herod uk hun laitakin Judea gam-a Bethlehem ah Jesu a suah khit ciangin nisuahna lam pan Jerusalem ah Mipiltea a tung uh hi.
40002002	Amaute in, “A suakkhinsab Jew-te kumpipa koi-ah om hiam? Nisuahna lamah ama aksi ka mu zo uh a, a bia dingin kong pai uh hi,” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40002003	Kumpi Herod in hih thu a zak ciangin a lungzing hi. Jerusalem a mi khempeuh in zong a lungzinpih uh hi.
40002004	Mipite’ siampi makaite khempeuh le thukham siate a kaihkhop khit ciangin, “Khristc suah nading koi lai ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
40002005	Amaute in, “Judea gam-a Bethlehem ah suak ding hi. Ahang in, kamsangpa in hih bangin na gelh khin hi:
40002006	"Judah gam-a om Bethlehem aw, ka mi Israel-te a cing dingin nang sung pan ukpa khat piang ding ahi manind Judah gam-ukte sungah nang a neupen na hi kei hi.” ci hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
40002007	Tua ciangin Herod in Mipilte samsim a, aksi kilat hun lian amaute tung pan a theikhia hi.
40002008	Amaute Bethlehem ah sawlin, “Pai unla, tua naupang va limzon un. Kei zong pai-in amah ka biak theih nadingin na muh phetun hong ko pah un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
40002009	Amaute in kumpipa vaikhakna a zak khit uh ciangin a paikhia leuleu uh hi. Nisuahnae lama a muhsa uh aksi, naupang omna tung santakah a khawl mateng amau mai-ah a na paipai hi.
40002010	Amaute in aksi a muh uh ciangin a lungdam mahmah uh hi.
40002011	Tua inn a tun uh ciangin naungek le a nu Mary mu uh a, kunin a bia uh hi. A goute uh suahkhia-in letsong in kham, gimnamtui le paknamtui kha a pia uh hi.
40002012	Herod kiangah amaute a pai kik loh nadingun mang sunga kivauhilhsa bangin lamtuam tawnin a gamuah a ciah uh hi.
40002013	Amaute a ciah khit uh ciangin Joseph mang sungah Topa vansawltak khat a kilang hi. Amah in, “Tho inla naungek le a nu Egypt ah taipih in. Herod in naungek thah dingin zong ding ahi manin, kong hilh kik mateng tua lai-ah va om un,” a ci hi.
40002014	Tua ciangin amah tho-a azan azanin naungek le a nu paipih in Egypt ah a tai uh hi.
40002015	Herod sih khit dong tua gamah va om uh hi. Kamsangpa tungtawna Topa genna: “Egypt gam pan ka tapa ka samkhia hi.”f cih thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
40002016	Mipilte in amah a khem lam a theih ciangin Herod lungham a, Mipilte tung pana a theihsa hun tawh kituakin seh a, Bethlehem le akim apam khuate-a pasalno kum nih le a nuaisiah khempeuh thah dingin thu a pia hi.
40002017	Tua ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah genkholhna:
40002018	"Ramah gamah nakpi-a dahna le, kahna awging kiza hi. Rachel in a tate a kahkah hangin khat beek om nawn lo a hi manin kihehnem zo lo hi,”g cih thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
40002019	Herod a sih khit ciangin Joseph mang sungah Topa vansawltak khat kilanga,
40002020	"Tho in, naupang thah sawmte si khin ta ahi manin naupang le a nu paipih inla Israel gamah pai ta un,” a ci hi.
40002021	Tua ciangin amah tho-a, naupang le a nu tawh Israel gamah a ciah uh hi.
40002022	Ahi hangin Archelaus in a pa Herod za luah in Judea gam uk hi, cih thu a zak ciangin tua gamah a pai ngam kei hi. A manga kivauhilhsa bangin Galilee gamah kihem a,
40002023	Nazareth kici khua-ah a va teng hi. Tua bangin: “Amah Nazareth mi kici ding hi,” ci-a kamsangpa tungtawna kigensa thu a tangtung hi.
40003001	Tua hun lai-in Baptize-pa John va pai- a,
40003002	"Kisik un. Vantung gam hong nai ta hi,” ci-in Judea gama Gamlakah thu a hilh hi.
40003003	Kamsangpa Isaiah tungtawna kigen: “Gamlak a kikopa aw in, ‘Topa ading lampi na sialkhol un, ama lampite na tangsak un,’”a a cih in hih pa ahi hi.
40003004	John in kala-oh mul kigan puan silhin savun kawnggakin a kawng a gak hi. Kauphe le gamlak khuaizu anin a nei hi.
40003005	Jerusalem, Judea gam sung khempeuh le Jordan kual bup pana mite ama kiangah a pai uh hi.
40003006	Amaute in a mawhnate uh pulak uh a, amah in Jordan Gun ah a baptise hi.
40003007	A baptisena phual-ah Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te tampi a pai John in a muh ciangin, “No mualtan suante! Hong tung ding Pasian thangpaihna pana taikhia dingin kua in hong vauhilh ahi hiam?
40003008	Kisikna tawh kilawm gah na gah un.
40003009	‘Abraham ka pa uh hi’ a ci thei dingin kingaihsun kei un. Pasian in hih suangte Abraham tate suaksak thei hi, cih kong hilh hi.
40003010	Sing phungah hei om khin ta hi. Gah hoih a gah lo kung peuhmah kiphukin meikhuk ah kikhul ding hi.
40003011	"Na kisikna hangun tui-inb kong baptize hi. Ahi hangin kei nunga hong pai ding pa, kei sangin a vanglianzaw hi; ama khedap tawi ding nangawnin ka kilawm kei hi. Amah in note Khasiangtho le mei-in hong baptize ding hi.
40003012	Amah in buhhah-ciangka tawi-in, ama buh phual hahsiang dinga, atak teng a sal sungah koihin, asi teng a mit ngei lo mei sungah a khul ding hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.
40003013	Tua hunin John kibaptisesak dingin Galilee pan Jordan ah Jesu va pai hi.
40003014	Ahi hangin John in, “Nang kei nong baptise ding hizaw napi, nang hong kibaptisesak dingin kei hong zuan zawsop na hi hiam?” ci-in a kho hi.
40003015	Jesu in, “Ahi ding bang hisak in; thumaan khempeuh i tangtunsak ding kilawm hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin John in a mang hi.
40003016	Jesu a kibaptise phetin tuilak pan a paito hi. Tua hun lianin van kihong a, vakhu bangin Pasian Kha kum sukin, ama tunga khawl a mu hi.
40003017	Tua laitakin, “Hih in ka it ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama tungah ka lung a kim mahmah hi,” ci-in vantung pan aw khat a ging hi.
40004001	Tua ciangin dawimangpa zia-etna thuak dingin Kha in Jesu gamlakah a pi hi.
40004002	Sun sawmli le zan sawmli an a tan khit ciangin a gil kial hi.
40004003	Tua zia-etpa a kiangah va pai-a, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hileh hih suangte anlum suaksak in,” a ci hi.
40004004	Jesu in, “Mite anlum bek tawh nungta hi loin Pasian kam sung pana pusuak thu khempeuh tawh a nungta hizaw hi,’a ci-in kigelhhi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40004005	Tua ciangin dawimangpa in amah khuapi siangtho ah paipih-a, biakinnpi khum a sang penna ah a dingsak hi.
40004006	Dawimangpa in, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hileh tuaksuk dih in. Ahang in: ‘Amah in nang hangin ama vansawltakte thu pia dinga, na khepekte suang tawh a kisukkhak loh nadingin a khut uh tawh hong domto ding uh hi,’b ci-in kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
40004007	Jesu in, “‘Na Topa Pasian na zia-et kei in,’c ci-in zong kigelh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40004008	Tua khit ciangin dawimangpa in amah mual sangpi dawnah paipih leuleu a, leitunga om kumpi-gam khempeuh le a thupinate a lak hi.
40004009	Amah in, “Kunin kei nong biak leh hihte khempeuh nang kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
40004010	Jesu in, “Satan, paikhiamang in! ‘Na Topa Pasian bia inla, ama na bek sem in,’d ci-in kigelh hi,” a cih san hi.
40004011	Tua ciangin dawimangpa in amah paisan a, vansawltakte hong pai-in Jesu a don uh hi.
40004012	Jesu in John thongkiatna thu a zak ciangin Galilee ah a ciah kik hi.
40004013	Nazareth nusia in Zebulun le Naphtali gamhuam tuilipi gei khata om Capernaum ah pai-in a teng hi.
40004014	Hih in kamsang pa Isaiah tungtawna kigenkholsa:
40004015	"Zebulun gam le Naphtali gam, Jordan gun dunga tuipi zuatna lampi, Gentile-te tenna Galilee ah,
40004016	khuamial sunga teng mite in, khuavak lianpi a mu zo uh hi; sihna liim gam sunga teng mite tungah khuavak tang khin ta hi.”e cih thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
40004017	Tua huna kipanin Jesu in, “Vantung gam hong nai zo ahi manin kisik un,” ci-in thuhilh a kipan hi.
40004018	Galilee Tuipi gei-a Jesu a pai laitakin Peter kici Simon le a nau Andrew-te unau a mu hi. Amaute nga bengte ahi manun tuilipi sungah len a khuh laitak uh ahi hi.
40004019	Jesu in, “Hong pai unla kei hong zui un. Mihing mante kong suaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
40004020	Amau zong a lente uh nusia in amah a zuipah uh hi.
40004021	Tua pan a paikhiat ciangin unau dang nih, Zebedee tapa, James le a sang gampa John-te a mu hi. Amaute in a pa uh Zebedee tawh len puahin gunkuang sungah a om uh hi. Jesu in amaute a sam hi.
40004022	Amaute in zong gunkuang le a pa uh nusia pah uh a amah a zui uh hi.
40004023	Galilee gam sung tengah Jesu pai kawikawi a, synagogue-te ah thu hilhin, vantung gam lungdamna thuthak hilh-a, cina luna khempeuh a damsak hi.
40004024	Syria gam sung tengah ama thu a kizel hi. Natna tuamtuam a veite, a na valvalte, dawilutte, sibup natna veite le pumzawte khempeuh Jesu kiangah paipih uh a, amah in a damsak hi.
40004025	Galilee gam, Decapolisf, Jerusalem, Judea le Jordan gungal gama mihonte in amah a zui uh hi.
40005001	Jesu in mihonte a muh ciangin mualpangah paito-in a tu hi. Nungzuite ama kiangah va pai uh a,
40005002	amaute thu hilh ding kipanin:
40005003	"Kha-a gentheite thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, vangtung gam amau aa ahi hi.
40005004	A dahte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute a kihehnem ding hi.
40005005	Lungnemte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute in leitung a luah ding uh hi.
40005006	Thumaanna hanga gilkial dangtakte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute kitaiisak ding hi.
40005007	Mi lainat siamte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute lainatna kingahsak ding hi.
40005008	Lungsim siangthote thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute in Pasian a mu ding uh hi.
40005009	Kilemna a bawlte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, amaute Pasian tate kici ding hi.
40005010	Thumaanna hanga kibawlsiate thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in, vantung kumpi-gam amau aa ahi hi."
40005011	"Keima hangin engkona, bawlsiatna le zuauthu tawh gitlohna nam khempeuh a hong kingawh ciangin thupha ngah na hi uh hi.
40005012	Note ma-a kamsangte zong tua mah bangin bawlsia uh ahi manin lungdamin kipak un, bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ah no ading pahtakman a lian hi.
40005013	"Note leitung ci na hi uh hi. Ahi hangin ci a alna mang leh bangci ki-alkiksak thei ding ahi hiam? Buakhia a mite tuatcil ding longal a hoihna om lo hi:
40005014	"Note leitung khuavak na hi uh hi. Mualtunga om khuapi a kiliah thei kei hi.
40005015	Mite in meivak a vak uh ciangin kuang a khuh kei uh hi. A khuh sangsikin inn sunga omte khempeuh in khua a muh theih nadingin meivak tunna tungah kikoih zaw hi.
40005016	Tua mah bangin mite in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantunga om na Pa uh a phat nadingun na khuavak uh mite mai-ah na tangsak un.
40005017	"Thukham ahi zongin, Kamsangte thu ahi zongin a beisak dinga hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un; tuate a beisak dinga hong pai hi loin, a tang tungsak dinga hong pai ka hizaw hi.
40005018	Thutak kong geninah, van le lei a manthan masiah Thukham khempeuh a tangtun kim khit mateng, laimal neupen ahi-a sutvom ciau khat ahi zongin a mangthang kei ding hi.
40005019	Hih thupiakte lak pan a neu pen palsatin, tua banga palsat ding midangte a hilh peuhpeuh vantung gamah a neu pen kici ding hi. Ahi hangin hih thupiakte zui-a, midangte a hilh peuhpeuh vantung gamah alian kici ding hi.
40005020	Ken kong geninah, note thumaanna in Pharisee-te le thukham siate aa a khup zawh kei leh vantung gamah na lut peuhmah kei ding uh hi.
40005021	"Tanglai mite kiangah, ‘Tual that kei in;a tual that peuhmah in thukhenna a thuak ding hi,’ a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
40005022	Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, a sanggamb tunga a hehte peuhmah in thukhenna a thuak ding hi. Tua banah a sanggamte tunga, ‘Raca,c ’ a ci peuhmah in Sanhedrin-te thusitna a thuak ding hi. Ahi hangin, ‘Nang mihai!’ a ci peuhmah in hell meipi a thuak ding lauhuai hi.
40005023	"Tua ahi ciangin biaknatau ah biakna na piak laitakin na sanggam pa in na tungah lungkimlohna nei hi, ci-a na phawk leh,
40005024	biaknatau mai-ah na piak nate nusia phot in. Pai inla na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in; tua khit ciangin pai-in na biakna pia pan in.
40005025	"Thukhenna mun hong tun na lawmpa tawh kilem mengmeng in. Na paikhawm laitak un kilem zawh nading hanciam in. Tua hi kei leh thukhenpa tungah hong pia dinga, thukhenpa in bupa khut sungah hong pia-in thong sung hong kidenna kha ding hi.
40005026	Thutak kong geninah, na liausumd na piak khit kiuhkeuh mateng na suakta kei ding hi.
40005027	"‘Ang kawm kei in,’e a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
40005028	Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, mi khatpeuh in lunggulhluatna tawh numei khatpeuh a et leh ama lungtang sungah amah tawh angkawm khin ahi hi.
40005029	Na taklam mittang in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia inla paimang in. Na pumpi kimin hell sunga hong kipaih sangin na pumpi na khat a hem ding nang adingin hoihzaw hi.
40005030	Na taklam khut in hong khialhsak leh sattan inla paimang in. Na pumpi kimin hell sungah na lut angin na pumpi hiang khat a hem ding, nang adingin hoihzaw hi.
40005031	"‘Zi ma peuhmah in makna lai pia ta hen,’f a kici thu a omsa ahi hi.
40005032	Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, ang kikawmsanna hang longal, a zi a ma peuhmah in a zi angkawmsak a suak hi. A kimasa numei a tenpih peuhmah angkawm a suak hi. Lk 16:18
40005033	"Tua ciang leuleu-in tanglai mite kiangah, ‘Ciampel kei in; Topa tawh na kiciamnate tangtun in,’ a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
40005034	Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, tomlo peuhmah kei un: vantung, Pasian tokhom ahi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un;
40005035	leitung, Pasian khengakna ahi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un; Jerusalem, Kumpi Lianpa khuapi a hi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un.
40005036	Na samzang khat nangawn vomsak, kangsak thei lo na hi manin na lutang zong tomlawhna-in zang kei un.
40005037	A hite, ‘Himah,’ a hilote, ‘Hikei,’ ci lel un. Tua bansiah peuhmah gilopa kiang pana hong pai ahi hi.
40005038	"‘Mittang tangin mittang, ha tangin ha,’g a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
40005039	Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, migilopa na nang kei un. Na pang taklam hong bet leh alang lam zong na dawh in.
40005040	Na puan-ak hong deihgawh mana thusia hong zongte, na puantualpi zong na piakbeh in.
40005041	Zawhthawh thu-a tai khat hong paipihte, tai nih dong na zui in.
40005042	Hong ngente na pia inla, hong leitawite nungngat san kei in.
40005043	"‘Na vengteh it inla, na galte mudah in,’ a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
40005044	Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, na galtei na it un; hong bawlsiate ading thu na ngetsak un.
40005045	Tua hileh vantunga na Pa uh tate na suak thei ding uh hi. Amah in miphate le misiate tungah ni tangsak a, thumaante le thumaan lote tungah guah a zusak hi.
40005046	Hong itte bek na it uh leh bang pahtakman ngah ding na hi uh hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in tua bangin hih uh hi lo ahi hiam?
40005047	Na sanggamte bek uh na muak uh leh midangte sangin a hoihzaw na bawl uh bang om ding ahi hiam? Lawkite nangawn in tua bangin hih uh hi lo ahi hiam?
40005048	Tua ahi ciangin vantunga om na Pa uh a hoihkim bangin note zong na hoihkim un.
40006001	“Note in thumaanna nasepte na sep uh ciangin mihing muh ding utna tawh mite mai-ah sem kei un. Tua bangin na sep uh leh vantunga om na Pa uh tung pan pahtakman na ngah kei ding uh hi.
40006002	"Tua ahi ciangin a tasamte na piak uh ciangin kineihsiamte in mite pahtawi ding a ut manun synagogue-te sung le lamdungah pengkul mutin, a tangko uh bangin na hih kei un. Thutak kong geninah, amaute in pahtakman a cingin a ngah zo uh hi.
40006003	Ahi hangin note in a kitasamte na piak uh ciangin na taklam khut hihna, na veilam khut theisak kei un.
40006004	Tua ciangin a sima kihihte a mu na Pa un note pahtakman hong pia ding hi.
40006005	"Note in thu na nget uh ciangin kineihsiamte bangin na hih kei un. Amaute in mite muh theihtheih dingin synagogue-te sung le lamkabom khawngah dinsa in a ngen nuam se uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, amaute in pahtakman a cingin a ngah zo uh hi.
40006006	Note in thu na nget uh ciangin na inndei sunguah pai unla, kong khakin a kimu thei lo na Pa uh kiangah na ngen un. Tua ciangin a sima kihihte a mu na Pa un note pahtakman hong pia ding hi.
40006007	Note in thu na nget uh ciangin kammal tampi kizang leh kingah diak ding ci-a a ngaihsun lawkite bangin na guitam kei un.
40006008	Na Pa un na nget ma un na kisapnate uh thei ahi manin, amaute bangin na hi kei un.
40006009	Note in hih bangin thu na ngen un: “‘Vantunga om kote Pa aw, nangma min kisiangthosak ta hen;
40006010	na gam hong tung ta hen, vantungah na deihna a kihih bangin, leitung ah zong kihih ta hen.
40006011	Ka nisim an uh tu ni-in ko hong pia in.
40006012	Ko tunga hong bate ka maisak uh bangin, kote leibate hong maisak ta in.
40006013	Zia-etna sungah hong pi kenla, gilopa panin hong hukhia in.’a ci un.
40006014	Ahang in, no tunga hong mawhte na maisak uh leh vantunga om na Pa un no zong hong maisak ding hi.
40006015	Ahi hangin mite mawhna na maisak kei uh leh note mawhnate na Pa un hong maisak lo ding hi.
40006016	"Note in an na tan uh ciangin, an a tan lam uh mite a lah nop manun a maitang uh a kilamdangsak kineihsiamte bangin na mai uh mualsak kei un. Thutak kong geninah, amaute in pahtakman a cingin ngah zo uh hi.
40006017	Ahi hangin note in an na tan uh ciangin na sam uh sathau nilh unla na mai uh phiat un.
40006018	Tua hileh an na tan lam uh mi mai-ah kilang lo dinga, a kimu lo na Pa uh maitang bekah kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin a sima kihihte a mu na Pa un note pahtakman hong pia ding hi.
40006019	"Nget le kekseu in a siatsak theihna le gutate in luh a, a guk theihna mun hih leitungah na goute uh khol kei un.
40006020	Nget le kekseu in a siatsak theih lohna le gutate in luh a, a guk theih lohna mun vantungah na goute uh khol un.
40006021	Ahang in, na goute uh omna munah na lungsim uh zong om ding hi.
40006022	"Mittang in pumpi meivak ahi hi. Na mit a hoih leh na pumpi tung khempeuh a vak ding hi.
40006023	Ahi hangin na mit a siat leh na pumpi tung khempeuh a mial ding hi. No sunga om khuavak, khuamial ahileh bangzah in a mial tazen tam!
40006024	"Kuamah in tonih na semkhawm thei lo hi. Khat itin khat a mudah hiam, khat belin a khat a simmawh hiam, khat zawsang hi ding hi. Note in Pasian nasep le sum nasep na thuahkhawm thei kei ding uh hi.
40006025	"Hong hilh tektek ka hi, na nuntak nading, na nek na dawn ding ahi zongin na pumpi uh ading, na silh na ten ding uh bangmah lunghimawh kei un. An sangin nuntakna thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam? Puansilh sangin pumpi thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam?
40006026	Huih laka leng vasate en dih un; tuate in vawh lah vawh lo, at lah at lo, ansal ah zong khol lo napi vantunga om na Pa un tuate a vak hi. Vasate sangin note manphazaw tham hi lo na hi uh hiam?
40006027	A lunghimawh manin a nuntak hun nai khat sung bek a sotto thei note lakah kua om ahi hiam?b
40006028	"Bang hangin na silh na ten ding uh lunghimawh na hi uh hiam? Gamlak a unok kungte ngaihsun dih un. Na sem loin khau lah a khek kei uh hi.
40006029	Ahi hangin Solomon nangawn a thupina na khempeuh tawh a kizep laitakin hih unok pak khat zahin zong a kizem zo kei hi, cih kong gen hi.
40006030	Upna neu mite aw, tu ni-in hih lai-ah om a, zing ciangin mei-a kikhul ding gamlak lopa kung khat Pasian in tua zahin zem ahileh note, puan hong silhsak zawtham lo ding ahi hiam?
40006031	Tua ahi ciangin, ‘Bang i ne tam? Bang i dawn tam? Bang i silh tam?’ ci-in lunghimawh kei un.
40006032	Lawkite in hih nate khempeuh nakpi in a zong uh hi. Hih nate na kisap lam uh vantunga om na Pa un a thei hi.
40006033	Ahi hangin Pasian kumpigam le ama thumaanna zong masa un. Tua hileh hih nate khempeuh hong piathuah ding hi.
40006034	Tua ahi manin zingciang ading lung himawh kei un; zingciang, amah le amah kilunghimawh na ding hi. Ni khat in ama buaina khop nei ciat hi.
40007001	“Midangte tungah thu khen kei un. Na khen uh leh no tungah zong thu hong kikhen ding hi.
40007002	Midangte tunga na khen bangun no tungah zong hong kikhen dinga, no zat tehna mah tawh no aa zong hong kitehsak ding hi.
40007003	"Nang mittanga singpek ngaihsun loin bang hanga na sanggampa mita singatvui them en na hi hiam?
40007004	Nang mittang ah singpek om napi na sanggampa kiangah, ‘Na mit-a ninthem hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ bangci cih thei na hi hiam?
40007005	Kineihsiampa aw, nang mit-a singpek lakhia masa in, tua hileh na sanggampa mit-a na lakkhiat ding ninthem na telmuh pan ding hi.
40007006	"A siangtho nate ui pia kei un. Vok mai-ah na kep manphate uh pai kei un. Tua banga na hih uh leh a tuatcil gawp khit uh ciangin kihei-in note hong balnen ding uh hi.
40007007	"Ngen un hong kipia ding hi; zong un na mu ding uh hi; kiu un kongkhak hong kihon ding hi.
40007008	Ahang in, a ngen khempeuh in a ngah uh hi; a zongte in a mu hi; a kiute ading kongkhak kihon ding hi.
40007009	Note lakah a tapa in anlum a nget ciangin suang a pia ding kua om ahi hiam?
40007010	Ahikeh ngasa a nget ciangin gul a pia ding kua om ahi hiam?
40007011	Tua ahileh note migilo hi napi, na tate uh na hoih piak ding thei na hi uh leh vantunga om na Pa un a ngente na hoih pia nuam zawtham lo ding ahi hiam!
40007012	Na khempeuh ah no tunga hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah bawl un. Hih in Thukham le kamsangte thu khempeuh huam khin hi.
40007013	"Kong kawcik ah lut un. Ahang in, siatna a tun kongpi tanzau-in lampi zai-a mi tampi a lut hi.
40007014	Ahi hangin nuntakna a tun kongpi neu a, lampi kawcik in mi tawmcik bek a lut hi.
40007015	"Kamsang zuaute hangin na kigalging un. Amaute tuuvun silhin note kiangah hong pai uh hi; ahi hangin amaute sunglam, ngia hangsan ahi hi.
40007016	Amaute a gah un na khentel thei ding uh hi. Lingkung panin lenggah kilo ngei ahi hiam? Thangling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?
40007017	Tua mah bangin kung hoih in gah hoih gah a, kung hoih lo in gah hoih lo a gah hi.
40007018	A kung hoih in gah hoih lo gah thei lo a, tua mah bangin a kung hoih lo in gah hoih gah thei lo hi.
40007019	Gah hoih a gah lo singkung peuhmah kiphukin meikhukah kikhul hi.
40007020	Tua bangin amaute a gah panun na khentel thei ding uh hi.
40007021	‘Topa, Topa’ hong ci khempeuh vantung gamah a lut kim kei ding hi. Ahi hangin vantunga om ka Pa deihna banga gamtate bek a lut ding hi.
40007022	Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in ka kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa, nangma minin thu hilh hi lo ka hi uh hiam; nangma minin dawite hawlkhia in, nalamdang tampi bawl hi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
40007023	Tua ciangin, ‘Note kong thei ngei kei hi. Gitlohna a bawlte aw, kei kiang pan taikhia un!’ teltakin ka ci ding hi.
40007024	"Tua hi-a hih ka thute za-a, a zuipahte peuhmah suangpi tunga inn lam mipilpa tawh kibang hi.
40007025	Guah zu in tui khang a, huih nungin tua inn a nawk hi. Ahi zongin suangpi tunga bulkip nei ahi manin tua inn a puk kei hi.
40007026	Ka thute za napi, a zuipah lote sehnel tunga inn lam mihaipa tawh kibang hi.
40007027	Guah zu-a tui khangin, huih nunga tua inn a nawk ciangin pukgawp hi,” a ci hi.
40007028	Hih thu teng a gen khit ciangin mihonte in Jesu thuhilhnate lamdang a sa uh hi.
40007029	Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thukham siate bang hi loin thuneipa khat bangin a hilh hi.
40008001	Mualpang pan Jesu a paisuk ciangin mihon tampi in amah zui uh hi.
40008002	Miphaka khat va pai-a a mai-ah khukdinin, “Topa aw, ut peuh lecin nong siangsak thei hi,” a ci hi.
40008003	Jesu in a khut zanin tuapa lawnga, “Ka ut hi. Siang ta in!” a ci hi. Thakhatin a phak natna a damb pah hi.
40008004	Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Kuama kiangah gen kei in. Ahi hangin pai-in siampipa kiangah va kilak inla amaute tunga teci panna-in Moses thupiak bangin biakna na pia in,” a ci hi.
40008005	Capernaum ah Jesu a lut ciangin ama kiangah zakhat-uk bupa va pai-in huhna a ngen hi.
40008006	"Topa aw, ka nasempa pumzawtin lumcip-a, a gim mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
40008007	Jesu in, “Hong pai-in ka damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
40008008	Zakhat-ukpa in, “Topa aw, ka inn sungah nang kong lutsak ding kilawm lo hi. Kammal khat gen ziau lecin ka nasempa dam ding hi.
40008009	Kei mahmah zong thuneihna nuai-a om mi ka hi-a, keima nuai-ah galkapte a om hi. Khat kiangah, ‘Pai in,’ ka cihleh pai-a, adang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ka cihleh hong pai hi. Ka nasempa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ka cih ciangin a sem hi,” a ci hi.
40008010	Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin lamdang sa a, amah a zuite kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, Israel-te lakah hih zah-a lian upna a nei khat beek ka mu nai kei hi.
40008011	Ken kong cihinah, ni suahna le nitumna pan mi tampi hong pai-in vantung gam pawipi-ah Abraham, Isaac le Jacob-te tawh a tukhawm ding uh hi.
40008012	Ahi hangin kumpi-gam mite ahi uh leh kahna le hagawina a omna mun khuamial lakah kipaii ding hi,” a ci hi.
40008013	Tua ciangin Jesu in zakhat-ukpa kiangah, “Pai in. A piang dinga na up bangin piang ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun lianin a nasempa a dam hi.
40008014	Peter inn sungah Jesu a lut ciangin Peter sungnu nattuna lupna-a lum a mu hi.
40008015	Jesu in a khut lawnsaka, nattun a dam hi. Amah tho in zin a do hi.
40008016	Nitak lam ciangin dawilut mi tampite ama kiangah paipih uh a, kammal khat tawh dawite hawlkhia in cina khempeuh a damsak hi.
40008017	Hih in kamsangpa Isaiah tunga genkholhna: “I zawngkhalnate amah in la-a, i natnate a pua hi,”c cih thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
40008018	Jesu in a kima mihonpite a muh ciangin tuili galkhat lama pai dingin thu a pia hi.
40008019	Tua laitakin thukham siapa khat va pai-a, “Sia aw, na paina peuhpeuh ah kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi.
40008020	Jesu in, “Ngiate in kua nei a, huihlak vasate in bu nei uh hi. Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in a lutang ngak nading mun a nei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40008021	Nungzui dang khat in, “Topa aw, va ciahin ka pa va vui masa phot leng,” a ci hi.
40008022	Ahi hangin Jesu in, “Ka nung hong zui in, misite in amau misite na vui uh hen,” ci-in a gen hi.
40008023	Tua ciangin amah gunkuang sungah tuanga, a nungzuite in a zui uh hi.
40008024	Theih kholh lohin tui tungah huihpi nasiatakin kinuai a, tuihualte in gunkuang a zialnelh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu a ihmu lai hi.
40008025	Nungzuite pai-in, “Topa, hong honkhia in! Tui ka kia petmah uh hi!” ci-in a phong uh hi.
40008026	Amah in, “No upna neute aw, bang dinga tua zah a lau lawmlawm na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin amah tho a huih le tuihualte a tai ciangin a daipah dikdek hi.
40008027	Tua mite in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih pa bangci mi hiam? Huih le tuihual nangawn in a thu a mang tazen a!” a kici uh hi.
40008028	A galkhat lam Gadarenesd kualah Jesu a tun ciangin hanlak, panin dawilut mi nih paikhia-in na dawntuah uh hi. Amaute ngongtat lua uh ahi manin tua lai tawn ngam kuamah a om kei hi.
40008029	Amaute in, “Pasian Tapa aw, ko bang cih hong sawm na hi hiam? A kisehsa hun a tun ma-in kote bawlsia dinga hih lai-a hong pai na hi hiam?” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
40008030	Tua pan a gamla simah vok honpi khat a gamta hi.
40008031	Dawite in Jesu kiangah, “Ko nong hawlkhiat leh vokte sungah hong lutsak tapeuh in,” ci-in a ngen uh hi.
40008032	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Pai un!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute pusuak in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Vok honte kensang pan tuili sungah tuaksukin a si khin uh hi.
40008033	Vok cingte khuapi sungah tai uh a, dawilutte gel tunga thupiang le hih thu teng a ko uh hi.
40008034	Tua ciangin Jesu dawn dingin khuazangpi in a kuankhia uh hi. Amah a muh uh ciangin amaute in tua kual a nusiat nadingin a thum uh hi.
40009001	Gunkuang tungah Jesu tuanga galkahin ama khua a tung hi.
40009002	Mi pawlkhat in pumzaw khat zawngin ama kiangah va paipih uh a, phek tungah a sial uh hi. Jesu in amau upna a muh ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Ka tapa aw, lungkhauh in; na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi. 4:13; Jn 16:33
40009003	Hih thu ah, thukham siate pawlkhat in, “Hih pa in Pasian a gendai hi,” a ci uh hi.
40009004	Jesu in amau ngaihsutna thei ahi ciangin, “Bang hangin na lungsim uhah thusia ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
40009005	‘Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding baihzaw ahi hiam? ‘Tho inla pai in,’ cih ding baihzaw ahi hiam?
40009006	Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in hih leitungah mawhnate maisak theihna thu nei hi, cih na theih nadingun....” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Tho in, na phek la inla ciah in,” a ci hi.
40009007	Tua ciangin cinapa thoin a innah a ciah hi.
40009008	Mihonpite in hih thu a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh a, hih bang thuneihna mihingte tunga a pia Pasian a phat uh hi.
40009009	Tua lai pan Jesu pai lai-a siahdonna bukno-a tu Matthew kici mi khat a mu hi. Ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a cih ciangin Matthew dingto in a zui hi.
40009010	Matthew innah Jesu in nitak-an a nek laitakin siahdongte tampitak le mawhneite tampi va pai uh a, Jesu le nungzuite tawh ankuang a um khawm uh hi.
40009011	Pharisee-te in hih a muh ciangin, “Na siapa un bang hangin siahdongte le mawhneite tawh ankuang umkhawm ahi hiam?” ci-in a nungzuite a dong uh hi.
40009012	Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin, “Siavuan kisam cidamte hi loin cinate hizaw hi.
40009013	Pai unla,a Kei lunggulh biakpiakna hi loin lainatna hizaw hi,’ a kici bang gennopna hiam, va sin un. Ahang in, mi thumaante sam dinga hong pai hi loin mawhneite sam dinga hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
40009014	Tua ciangin John nungzuite va pai uh a, “Ko le Pharisee-te in an ka tang uh hi, bang hangin na nungzuite in tang lo uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40009015	Jesu in, “Zineipa tawh a omkhawm kimlai bangci in mopawi simte dah thei ding uh ahi hiam? Zineipa amau kiang pan a kilakkhiat hun hong tung ding hi. Tua ciangin amaute in an a tang ding uh hi.
40009016	"Kuamah in puanthakin puanlui a thuap ngei kei hi. Puanthakin puanlui kithuap leh puanlui kaikekin a kek beh zaw ding hi.
40009017	Kuamah in savun-um lui sungah lenggahzu thak thun ngei lo hi. Tua bangin kithun leh savun-um kitamin lenggahzu bua dinga savun-um a kisia ding hi. Savun-um thak sungah lenggahzu thak a kithun ciangin a nihin sia lo a, kikembit thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40009018	Hih thu a gen laitakin ukpa khat va pai-a amai-ah khukdinin, “Ka tanu tu mahmah in si hi. Ahi hangin hong pai-in ama tungah na khut nga lecin hing ding hi,” a ci hi.
40009019	Jesu dingto-in amah a zui hi. A nungzuite in zong a zui uh hi.
40009020	Tua laitakin kum sawm le nih hul siluang natna a vei numei khat Jesu nunglamah pai-a, a puantualpi mongtep a lawng hi.
40009021	Amah in, “A puantualpi lawngkha peuh leng ka dam ding hi,” a kici hi.
40009022	Jesu kihei-in tuanu a mu hi. Jesu in, “Ka tanu aw, lungkhauh in. Na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun lianin tua numei a dampah hi.
40009023	Ukpa innah Jesu a tun ciangin tamngai mutte le mipi gamlum a mu hi.
40009024	Amaute kiangah, “Na kihemkhia dih un. Numeino a si hi lo hi; a ihmu ahi hi,” a ci hi. Ahi hangin amaute in amah a nuihsan uh hi.
40009025	Mihonpite a kipusuahsak khit ciangin Jesu tuma numeino khut a let leh numeino a thoto hi.
40009026	Hih thu tua kual tengah a kizel hi.
40009027	Tua panin Jesu a paikhiat ciangin mittaw nih in ama nung zui a, “David Tapa aw, kote hong lainat in!” ci-in a galsap uh hi.
40009028	Amah inn sungah a lut khit ciangin tua mittawte gel a kiangah va pai uh hi. Amah in, “Hih bang hih thei dingin nong um uh hiam?” ci-in amaute a dong hi. Amaute in, “Kong um uh hi, Topa aw,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
40009029	Tua ciangin amaute mit lawnsak a, “Na up uh bangin note tungah kihih ta hen,” a ci hi.
40009030	Tua ciangin khua a mu thei uh hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Hih thu kuamah theisak kei un,” ci-in khauhtakin a kham hi.
40009031	Ahi hangin tua kual bupah amaute paikhia in hih thu a thehzak uh hi.
40009032	Amaute a paikhiat laitakun, dawilut-a, a pau thei lo mi khat Jesu kiangah a paipih uh hi.
40009033	Dawi a kihawlkhiat khit ciangin tua a pau thei lo pa a pau thei hi. Mihonpite in lamdang sa uh a, “Israel gamah hih bang thu a kimu ngei nai kei hi,” a ci uh hi.
40009034	Ahi hangin Pharisee-te in, “Dawite kumpitapa suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” a ci uh hi.
40009035	Khuapi le khuaneu khempeuh ah Jesu pai kawikawi a, amaute synagogue-te ah vantung gam tawh kisai lungdamna thu hilhin natna satna namkim a damsak hi.
40009036	Amah in mihonpite a muh ciangin a cing om lo tuute bangin cimawh le lungnuam loin om uh ahi manin amaute a khuatuah hi.
40009037	Tua ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “An lak ding tampi om a, ahi hangin nasem ding mi tawm hi.
40009038	Tua ahi ciangin lo sungah an la ding mi tampi hong sawl nadingin an la Topa kiangah ngen un,” a ci hi.
40010001	Amah in a nungzui sawm le nihte samin kha gilotea a hawlkhiat theih nading uh le natna satna namkim a damsak theih nadingun thuneihna a pia hi.
40010002	Hihte, sawltakpi sawm-le-nihte min ahi hi: Amasa penin Simon (Peter kici) le a sanggampa Andrew; Zebedee tapa James le a saggampa John;
40010003	Philip le Bartholomew; Thomas le siah dong Matthew; Alphaeus tapa James le Thaddaeus;
40010004	Zealot pawl-a Simon le Jesu lehhekpa Judas Iscariot-te ahi hi.
40010005	Jesu in sawm-le-nihte thu hilhin hih bangin a sawlkhia hi: “Gentile-te lakah pai kei unla Samaria-te khua ah zong lut kei un.
40010006	Israel tuu mangthangte lak bekah pai un.
40010007	Na pai kawmun, ‘Vantung gam hong nai ta hi,’ cih thupuak va hilh un.
40010008	Cinate damsak unla misite thosak un. Miphakteb siangsak unla, dawite hawlkhia un. Man nei lo-a na ngah bangun man nei loin na pia un.
40010009	Na kawnggak sung uhah kham, ngun le sumsante khat beek vom kei un.
40010010	Na khualzinna uhah thung-ip ahi zongin puantungsilh val ahi zongin khedap le ciangkhutte keng kei un. Ahang in, nasemte in a nekkhop ding uh ngah na ding uh hi.
40010011	Khuapi ahikeh khuaneu khat peuh peuhah na lut uh ciangin zintun nadinga kilawm mi zong unla, na ciah mateng uh tuapa innah om un.
40010012	Tua innah na lut uh ciangin hopih masa un.
40010013	Tua innah nopna a tung dinga kilawm ahileh na piak uh nopna om ta hen; a kilawm lo ahileh na piak uh nopna no tungah hong kileh kik ta hen.
40010014	Note hong sang lo, na thu uh a ngai nuam lo khua le innte na nusiat uh ciangin na khepek-ua leivuite na singkhia un.
40010015	Thutak kong geninah, thukhen ni ciangin tua khua thuak nading sangin Sodom le Gomorrah thuakna a zangzaw ding hi.
40010016	"Ngiate lakah tuute bangin note kong sawlkhia hi. Tua ahi ciangin gul bangin na pilvang unla, vakhu bangin na cinghkam un.
40010017	Ahi hangin mite lakah na kigalging un; amaute in tualsung vaihawmte khutah note hong puak ding uh a, amaute synagogue-te sungah note hong sat ding uh hi.
40010018	Keima hangin gam-ukte le kumpite mai-ah hong puak ding uh a, tuate tung le Gentile-te tungah ka teci na hi ding uh hi.
40010019	Ahi hangin note hong mat uh ciangin bang ka gen ding hiam, bang ka ci gen ding hiam, ci-in lunghimawh kei un. Tua hun ciangin na gen ding uh hong kihilh ding hi.
40010020	Ahang in, no a gen hi loin no tungtawnin na Pa uh’ Kha in a gen ding hi.
40010021	"Sungkhat suak unau khat le khat ahi zongin, pata ahi zongin, sih nading dongin a kilehhek ding uh hi. Nu le pa-te langah tate pang ding uh a, thatsak ding uh hi.
40010022	Keima hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. Ahi hangin a tawp donga kipte kihonkhia ding hi.
40010023	Mun khatah bawlsiatna na thuak uh leh a mundang khatah na tai un. Thutak kong geninah, Mihing Tapa hong pai ma-in Israel gam khuapite na sikkim man kei ding uh hi.
40010024	"Sang naupangte a siate sangin siamzaw lo-a, nasemte a pu sangin a lianzaw kei hi.
40010025	Sang naupangte a siapa a bata nasemte a pu a bat nak leh phazo hi. Inn sunga pa pen Beelzebubc a kicih leh a innkuanpihte kinak cih ngel ve!
40010026	"Tua ahi ciangin amaute na kihta kei un. A kilakkhia lo dinga kiselcip bangmah a om kei hi; a kitheikhia lo dinga ki-imcip zong bangmah a om kei hi.
40010027	Khuamial sunga note kong hilhte khuavak sungah gen un. Na bil-ua hong kihuausimte innkhum pan na tangko un.
40010028	Pumpi a thah hangin kha a that thei lote kihta kei un. Kha le pumpi meili sunga a siasak thei pa na kihta zaw un.
40010029	Kawlgit nih in dangkasand khat man lel hi lo ahi hiam? Ahi zongin na Pa uh deihna ahikeh tuate khat nangawn zong lei-ah a mawk kiat kei ding hi.
40010030	Na lu ua samzang khempeuh zong kisim khin hi.
40010031	Tua ahi ciangin lau kei un; Kawlgit tampi sangin na manphazaw uh hi.
40010032	"Mite mai-a kei hong gumte peuh mah vantunga om ka Pa mai-ah kei zong ka gum ding hi.
40010033	Mite mai-a hong kitheihmawhbawlte peuhmah vantunga om ka Pa mai-ah ka kitheihmawhbawl ding hi.
40010034	"Leitungah kilemna puak dingin hong pai hi, ci-in na vawh kha kei un. Kilemna puak dinga hong pai ka hi kei-a namsau khah dinga hong pai ka hizaw hi.
40010035	" ‘A pa langah tapa pangsak ding, a nu langah tanu pangsak ding, a teknu langah monu pangsak ding –
40010036	mi khat gal ama innkuanpihte mah a hisak dinga’e hong pai ka hi hi.
40010037	"Kei sangin a nu a pa a itzawte peuhmah kei adingin a cin kei hi. Kei sangin a tanu, a tapate a itzawte peuhmah kei adingin a cin kei hi.
40010038	Ama singlamteh kisuana ka nung hong zui lote peuhmah kei adingin a cin kei hi.
40010039	Ama nuntakna a hu nuamte peuhmah in taan dinga keima hanga a nuntakna a taan peuhmah in a nuntakna a hu ding hi.
40010040	"No hong sangte, kei hong sang hi-a, kei hong sangte, kei hong sawlpa a sang ahi hi.
40010041	Kamsangpa, kamsang ahi mana a sang peuhmah in kamsangpa pahtakman a ngah ding hi. Thumaan mipa, mi thumaan ahi mana a sang peuhmah in thumaan mipa pahtakman a ngah ding hi.
40010042	Thutak kong geninah, hih naupangnote lakah khat peuhpeuh keima nungzui ahi mana tuisik hai khat a suah peuhmah in ama pahtakman a taan peuhmah kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
40011001	Jesu in a nungzui sawm le nihte a thuhilh khit ciangin tua lai pan Galileea gama khuapite ah thugen ding le thuhilh dingin a paisuak lai hi.
40011002	John in thong sung pan Khrist nasepna a zak ciangin a nungzuite sawl a,
40011003	"Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam. Midang khatpeuh ka na lamen lai ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dongsak hi.
40011004	Jesu in, “Note ciah kik unla na zaksa uh le na muhsa uh thu teng John kiangah va ko un:
40011005	Mittawte in khua mu a, khebaite lam pai-in, miphakteb damsiang uh a, bilngongte in khua za hi; misite kithosakin, mizawngte kiangah lung damna thu kigen hi.
40011006	Kei hanga a pukmang lo mi thupha ngah ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40011007	John nungzuite a dinkhiat laitakun Jesu in mihonpite kiangah John thu hih bangin a gen hi: “Bang en dingin gamlakah pai na hi uh hiam? Huih muta huang pumpeng en ding na hi uh hiam?
40011008	Ahikeh bang en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam? Puan hoih silhte en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam? Hi lo hi. Puan hoih silhte kumpite inn sungah om uh hi.
40011009	Tua ahileh bang en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam? Kamsangpa en dingin maw? Hi mah hi, ken kong geninah, kamsangpa sangin a lianzaw hi.
40011010	‘Ka thu puapa na mai-ah ka sawl dinga, amah in nangma mai-ah na lampi ding a sialkhol ding hi,’c ci-a kigelhpa hih pa ahi hi.
40011011	Thutak kong geninah, numei sung pana suakte lakah Baptize-pa John sanga lianzaw kuamah a khangkhia nai kei hi. Ahi zongin vantung gam ah a neupen nangawn amah sangin lianzaw hi.
40011012	Baptize-pa John hun-a kipan tu dong thahat thu-in vantung gam in ma kek a, mihatte in a lenkip hi.
40011013	Ahang in, Kamsangte khempeuh le Thukham in, John hun dong thu na gen khol zo hi.
40011014	Na san nop uh leh amah, hong pai ding pa Elijah ahi hi.
40011015	Bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
40011016	"Hih khang mite bang tawh ka genteh ding hiam? Sumzuakna munah tu a:
40011017	"‘Tamngai kong mutsak uh hangin na lam kei uh hi; dahla ka sak uh hangin lah, na kap kei uh hi,’ ci-a kigal to naupangte tawh kibang uh hi.
40011018	Ahang in, ne lo dawn loin John hong pai-a, ‘Dawi lawmnei pa hi,’ a ci uh hi.
40011019	Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin ne-in dawna, ‘An hai zu hai pa, siahdongte le “Mawhneite” lawmpa hi,’ a ci zel uh hi. Ahi hangin pilna ahileh a sepnate in amaan ahina a lak hi.
40011020	Tua ciangin nalamdang a tam pen a bawlna khuapite kisik lo uh ahi manin Jesu in mawhpaih a,
40011021	"Korazin aw, gimna nak thuak na nicia! Bethsaida aw, gimna nak thuak na nicia! No sunga kibawl nalamdangte Tyre le Sidon khuate ah kibawl hileh amaute in sawtpi in, ippi puan silhin, vut kibuakin a kisik zo ta ding uh hi.
40011022	Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, thukhen ni ciangin no thuak ding sangin Tyre le Sidon-te thuakna zangzaw ding hi.
40011023	Nang Capernaum aw, vanlai dongin hong kilaamto ding ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo hi, a thuk pennad mun dongin na kiasuk ding hi. Nang sunga kibawl nalamdangte Sodom ah kibawl kha hileh tuni dong tua khuapi kip lai ding hi.
40011024	Ahi hangin thukhen ni cianga nang thuak ding sangin Sodom thuakna zangzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
40011025	Tua hun laitakin Jesu in, “Leitung le vantung Topa, Pa aw, mipilte le misiamte tungah hih thute na im a, naupangnote tungah lakkhia na hi manin nang kong phat hi.
40011026	Hihi Pa aw, hih in nangma deihna ahi hi.
40011027	"Ka Pa in na khempeuh kei hong ap zo hi. Pa longal kuamah in Tapa a thei kei hi. Tapa le Tapa in amah a lah theih nadinga a teel mite longal in Pa a thei kei uh hi.
40011028	"Vangik pua a gim mite khempeuh aw, ka kiangah hong pai ta un; tawldamna kong pia ding hi.
40011029	Keima hakkol kisuan unla kei kiangah kisin ta un. Ahang in, keimah lungsim nem le lungsim ki niamkhiat mi ka hi hi, na hinna un tawldamna a ngah ding hi.
40011030	Ahang in, ka hakkol nuam in ka van zong a zang hi.
40012001	Tua hun lai Sabbath ni khat buhlei tawnin Jesu a pai hi. A nungzuite a gil uh kial a, buhvui zutin a ne uh hi.
40012002	Pharisee-te in a muh uh ciangin ama kiangah, “En dih in! Na nungzuite Sabbath ni-in thukham tawh kituak loin a gamta uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40012003	Jesu in, “David le a pawlte in a gilkial laitakun bang hih uh cih sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
40012004	Pasian inn sungah lutin amau ading ahi lo, siampite ading beka kisiangsaksa anlumte a ne uh hi.
40012005	Ahikeh siampite in biakinnpi sungah Sabbath ni a tan loh uh hangin mawhpeng hi veve uh hi, cih Thukham sungah sim kha ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
40012006	Biakinnpi sanga lianzaw khata hih lai-ah a om hi, cih kong gen hi.
40012007	‘Kei lunggulh in biakpiakna hi loin lainatna hizaw hi.’b cih thu a khiatna thei khin hi le uh cin a mawhpengte na mawhpaih kei ding uh hi.
40012008	Mihing Tapa, Sabbath ni Topa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40012009	Tua mun pan paikhia-a amaute synagogue sungah a lut hi.
40012010	Tua lai-ah a khut langkhat a tem mi khat a om hi. Amaute in Jesu mawhna a zon nop manun, “Sabbath ni-in cina damsak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40012011	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note lakah khatpeuh in tuu khat nei in, tua tuu Sabbath ni-in kawhawm ah kia zenzen leh, lakhia lo ding na hi uh hiam?
40012012	Tuu sangin mihing bangzahin manphazaw ahi hiam! Tua ahi ciangin Sabbath ni-in a hoih bawl ding thukham tawh kituak hi,” a ci hi.
40012013	Tua khit ciangin amah in khuttempa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Amah in a khut a zan leh a langkhat mah bangin a sa dim a, a damsiang kiuhkeuh hi.
40012014	Ahi hangin Pharisee-te paikhia uh a, Jesu thah theih nading zia a geelsim uh hi.
40012015	Jesu in hih thu thei-a tua mun pan a kihemkhia hi. Mi tampi in a mah zui uh a, cinate khempeuh damsak in,
40012016	amah kua hiam cih a gen loh nadingun a kham hi.
40012017	Hih in kamsangpa Isaiah tungtawna kigen:
40012018	"Ka it ka lung hong kimsak, ka teel ka nasempa hih lai-ah om hi; ama tungah ka Kha ka koih dinga, minamte tungah thutang a tangko ding hi.
40012019	Amah in kuamah tawng lo, kiko lo dinga, kongzing lakah kuamah in ama aw a za kei ding hi.
40012020	Thutang a gualzawhsak mateng, satliamsa pumpeng kuaitan lo dinga, mei kuang liakliak a sumit kei ding hi.
40012021	Minamte in a lametna uh ama minah a nga ding uh hi,”c cih thu a tangtun nading ahi hi.
40012022	Tua ciangin amaute in mittaw-a pauthei lo, dawilut mi khat ama kiangah va puak uh a, tuapa in khua mu thei a, a pau theih nading in Jesu in a na damsak hi.
40012023	Mite khempeuh in lamdang sa uh a, “Hih pa David Tapa ahi kha thei tam?” a ci uh hi.
40012024	Ahi hangin hih thu Pharisee-te in a zak uh ciangin, “Hih pa in dawite kumpitapa Beelzebubd bek suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” a ci uh hi.
40012025	Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei-a, amaute kiangah, “Amah le amah ki langpanga kikhenthang gam a sia ding hi;amah le amah kilangpanga ki khenthang khuapi ahi a, innkuan ahi zongin a kip kei ding hi.
40012026	Satan in Satan hawlkhia leh amah le amah a kilem lo ahi hi. Tua hileh ama gam bangci kip thei ding ahi hiam?
40012027	Ken Beelzebub suangin dawite hawlkhia ka hileh na mite un kua suangin tuate hawlkhia ahi uh hiam? Tua ahi ciangin amaute no tungah thukhente a suak ding uh hi.
40012028	Ahi hangin Pasian Kha suanga hawlkhia ka hileh note tungah Pasian gam hong tung zo hi.
40012029	"Tua tham loin mi khatpeuh in mihatpa hencip masa loin tuapa inn sungah lutin a neihsa bangci puak khiatsak thei ding ahi hiam? A hencip khit ciangin a inn luh thei pan ding hi.
40012030	"Kei hong koppih lote kei langa pang ahi hi. Kei hong kaihkhoppih lote a thehthang ahi hi.
40012031	Tua ahi ciangin ken kong geninah, mawhna le Pasian gen daina khempeuh kimaisak zo dinga, ahi hangin langpanga Kha gendaina a kimaisak zo kei ding hi.
40012032	Mihing Tapa a langgente peuhmah kimaisak dinga, ahi hangin Khasiangtho a langgen peuhmah tu khang ahi zongin, hong tung ding khang ahi zongin a kimaisak kei ding hi.
40012033	"Singkung a gah in kikhentel thei ahi manin a kung na hoihsak un, tua hileh gah hoih a gah ding hi; a kung na hoihsak kei un, tua hileh gah hoih lo a gah ding hi.
40012034	No mualtan suante aw, migilo note in bangci in thu hoih gen thei ding na hi uh hiam? Ahang in, lungsim a dimlet ciangin kamah pusuak pan hi.
40012035	Mi hoih in a sunga a kholsa na hoihte pusuah a, migilo in a sunga a kholsa na hoih lote a pusuah hi.
40012036	Ahi hangin mite in amau motpaunasate uh tawh kisai-in thukhen ni ciangin a telin a gen ding uh hi.
40012037	Ahang in, nomau kammalte tawh kizui-in note na mawhpeng ding uh a, nomau kam malte tawh kizui-in note hong kimawhpaih ding hi,” a ci hi.
40012038	Tua ciangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate kimkhat in ama kiangah, “Sia aw, nang khut panin lim lamdang khat ka mu nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
40012039	Jesu in, “A tatsia le angkawm hat no tu khang mite in lah lim lamdang nong ngen tazen ua! Kamsangpa Jonah lim longal lim dang hong kilak kei ding hi.
40012040	Ahang in, ngapi gil sungah Jonah sun thum le zan thum a om mah bangin Mihing Tapa zong lei sungah sun thum le zan thum a om ding hi.
40012041	Thukhen ni ciangin hih khang mite langah Nineveh a mite ding ding uh a, a mawhpaih ding uh hi. A hang in, Jonah thuhilhna hangin amaute a kisik uh hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah Jonah sanga lianzaw mi khate a om hi.
40012042	Thukhen ni ciangin hih khang mite langah Leitaw-lam Kumpinu dingin a mawhpaih ding hi. Ahang in, tua Kumpinu, Solomon pilna ngai dingin leimong panin a pai hi. Tu-in Solomon sanga lianzaw hih lai-ah a om hi.
40012043	"Mi khat sung pan kha gilof khat pusuak-a, a khawl nading a keuna mun zongin a vak kawikawi hangin a mu kei hi.
40012044	Tua ciangin, ‘Ka nusiatsa innah ciah kik ning,’ ci hi. A tun kik ciangin tua inn awng a, kiphiat siangin a kipuah sinsen a mu hi.
40012045	Tua ciangin amah pai-a amah sanga tatsiazaw adang kha sagihte zawnin, tua lai-ah a va teng uh hi. Tua mipa omdan nunung in a masa sangin a siazaw hi. Hih a tatsia khang mite zong tua mah bang ahi ding uh hi.
40012046	Jesu in mihonpite kiangah thu a hilh laitakin amah hopih nuamin a nu le a sanggamte inn pua-ah ding uh hi.
40012047	Mi khat in, “Na nu le na sanggamte nang hong hopih nuamin inn pua-ah ding uh hi,”g ci-in a gen hi.
40012048	Amah in, “Ka nu kua hi-a, ka sang gamte kua ahi hiam?” a cih khit ciangin
40012049	a nungzuite kawka, “Ka nute ka saggamte hih lai-ate ahi hi.
40012050	Ahang in, vantung a om ka Pa deihna a hih peuhpeuh ka sanggam-nu, ka saggampa le ka nu ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40013001	Tua ni mah in tua inn pan Jesu paikhia a, tuilipi gei-ah a tu hi.
40013002	A kimkotah mi tam lua ahi manin amah gunkuang sungah pai-in a tu hi. Mihonte a hileh tuigei ah a ding uh hi.
40013003	Amah in gentehnate-in na tampi gena: “Lokhopa khat ama khaici vawh dingin a kuankhia hi.
40013004	Khaici a theh ciangin pawlkhat lam-dungah tu-a vasate pai-in a nemang uh hi.
40013005	Pawlkhatte leitak tam lohna mun suang lakah a tu hi. Leitak dai ahi manin popah sam hi.
40013006	Ahi hangin ni a san ciangin ankungte kangdulh a, zung kha lo ahi manin a vulpah hi.
40013007	Pawlkhat ling lakah tu-a a po tei hangin lingkung in a depgawp hi.
40013008	A dang pawlkhat pen lei hoihna ah tu-in, a kivawh zah za khat, azah sawmguk, azah sawmthum a gahkhia hi.
40013009	Bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” a ci hi.
40013010	Ama kiangah nungzuite va pai uh a, “Bang hangin gentehnate tawh mite hilh na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40013011	Amah in, “Vantung gam thusimte theih theihna no tungah hong kipiak hangin amaute tungah a kipia kei hi.
40013012	A nei peuhpeuh kipiakbeh ding a, tampitak a nei ding hi. A nei lo peuhmah tung panin a neihsa nangawn kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
40013013	Hih thu hangin amaute kiangah gentehnate ka gen hi: “Amaute in en napi a mutel thei kei uh hi; amaute in ngai napi zatel thei loin a theitel thei kei uh hi.
40013014	Amaute tungah kamsangpa Isaiah in: ‘“Note in na zak ngitnget uh hangin, na theitel ngei kei ding uh hi; na muh ngitnget uh hangin na mutel ngei kei ding uh hi.
40013015	Hih mite lungtang kheeng lua ahi manin; a bil uh tawh za mialmial in, a mit uh si uh hi. Tua hi kei leh a mit-un mu-in a bil uh tawh za-in a lungtang uh tawh theitel in kihei ding uh a, amaute ka damsak kha ding hi,’a ci-a a genkholhna tangtung hi.
40013016	"Note na hi uh leh na mitun mu thei na hi manun na mit uh thupha ngah hi-a; na bilun za thei na hi manun na bil uh thupha ngah ahi hi.
40013017	Thutak kong geninah, kamsangte le mi thumaan tampite in na muhte uh a muh nop uh hangin mu lo uh a, na zakte uh a zak nop uh hangin a za kei uh hi.
40013018	"Tua ahileh khaici vawhpa tawh gentehna bang cihnopna hiam, cih na ngai un:
40013019	Mi khatpeuh in vantung gam thu a zak hangin a theihtel kei leh, gilopa pai-in a lungtang sunga kivawhsate a sutkhia hi. Hih khaici pen lamdunga tute ahi hi.
40013020	Suang laka tute ahileh thu a zak ciangin lungdamin thakhatin a sangpahte ahi hi.
40013021	Ahi hangin zung kha lo ahi manin tawmvei sung bek a hing zo hi. Thu hangin lungmanna ahi zongin bawlsiatna ahi zongin a tun ciangin pukmang pah hi.
40013022	Ling laka tute ahileh thu za napi hih leitung nuntak nading lunghimawhna le hauhna’ khemna in depgawp a gah a gah lote ahi hi.
40013023	Ahi hangin lei hoihna-a tute ahileh thu a zak uh ciangin a theitel pah mipa ahi hi. Tuate a kivawh zah za khat, azah sawmguk, azah sawmthum a gahpa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40013024	Jesu in gentehna dang khat gen a: “Vantung gam pen ama lo sunga khaici hoih a vawh mi khat tawh kibang hi.
40013025	Ahi hangin mi ihmut kalin a galpa va pai-a buh kivawhna ah tahum a vawh khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
40013026	Buh poto in a vuih ciangin tahumte zong a kilang hi.
40013027	"Lo nei pa kiangah nasemte pai uh a, ‘Pu aw, na lo sungah khaici hoih vawh hi lo na hi hiam! Hih tahumte koi pana hong piang ahi hiam?’ ci uh hi.
40013028	"Amah in, ‘Hih in galpa hih ahi hi,’ ci-in dawng hi. “A nasemte in, ‘Pai-in va botkhia le ung na phal hiam?’ ci-in dong uh hi.
40013029	"‘Tahumte bot le uh cin buh tawh botkhawm kha ding na hi manun ka phal kei hi.
40013030	Anlak hun mateng pokhawm tadih hen. Tua hun ciangin anlate kiangah: Tahumte khawm masa unla khultum dingin a lomlomin hen un; tua ciangin buh teng kaikhawm unla, ka sal sungah na koih un,’ ka ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
40013031	Jesu in amaute tungah gentehna dang khat gena: “Vantung gam in mi khatin a lo sungah a cin ankam tang tawh kibang hi.
40013032	Tua ankam tang, khaici khempeuh lak pan a neu pen hangin a khan ciangin huan ankungte khempeuh lakah a lian pen ahi hi; kungpi a suah ciangin vana vasate pai-in a hiangte tungah a tuang uh hi,” a ci hi.
40013033	Jesu in gentehna dang khat genbeh lai-a: “Vantung gam in, numei khat in a mekman buhnel lompib khat a tawkkim zo-a kisawh silngo tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
40013034	Jesu in mihonpite kiangah hih thute khempeuh gentehna tawh a hilh hi. Gentehna zang loin amaute kiangah bangmah a gen kei hi.
40013035	Hih in kamsangpa tungtawna kigen: “Gentehnate zangin ka kamka dinga, leitung piansak cil-a kipan a ki-imcip thute ka genkhia ding hi,”c cih thu a tangtunna ahi hi.
40013036	Tua ciangin mihonpite nusia in inn sungah a lut hi. Nungzuite a kiangah va pai uh a, “Lo sunga tahumte tawh gentehna hong hilhcian dih in,” a ci uh hi.
40013037	Jesu in, “Khaici hoih a vawhpa, Mihing Tapa ahi hi.
40013038	Lo sung pen leitung hi-a khaici hoih in kumpi-gam tapate cihna ahi hi. Tahum ahileh gilopa tate cihna ahi hi.
40013039	Tua tahum tangte a vawh galpa in dawimangpa ahi hi. An lak hun in tu khang bei hun hi-a anlate in vansawltakte ahi hi.
40013040	"Tahumte kibotin mei-ah a kikhul mah bangin, tu khanghun a bei ciangin zong tua mah bang ahi ding hi.
40013041	Mihing Tapa in ama vansawltakte sawlkhia dinga, a gam sungah mawhna a piangsak na khempeuh le gitlohna a hihte khempeuh a botkhiasak ding hi.
40013042	Tua vansawltakte in amaute a sa mahmah mei-am khukpi sungah a khul ding uh hi. Tua munah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.
40013043	A thumaante ahileh tua hun ciangin amau Pa gam sungah ni bangin a tang ding uh hi. Bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
40013044	"Vantung gam in lo lai-a kisel gou tawh kibang hi. Mi khat in tua gou a muh ciangin sel-a, lungdamin ciaha, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua lo a lei hi.
40013045	"Khat leuleu ah vantung gam in kepmanpha hoih a zong sumbukpa tawh kibang hi.
40013046	Tam a man mahmah kep manpha khat a muh ciangin ciah kika, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua kepmanpha a lei hi.
40013047	"Khatvei leuleu, vantung gam in, tui sunga a kikhuh ciangin ngasa namkim a awk len tawh kibang hi.
40013048	Len dima ngasa a awk khit ciangin ngasa bengte in tui gei-ah a kaikhia uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute tu uh a, ngasa hoih teng khawmin bawm sungah koih uh a, a hoih lo teng a pai uh hi.
40013049	Tu khanghun a bei ciangin hih bang ahi ding hi: Vansawltakte hong pai-in mi thumaante lak pan a tatsia mite khenkhia ding uh a,
40013050	a sa mahmah mei-am khukpi sungah a khul ding uh hi. Tua mun ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi” a ci hi.
40013051	Jesu in, “Hih thu teng na theitel uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Theitel mah ung,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
40013052	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tua ahi ciangin vantung gam thu tawh kisai-a lam a kilaksa thukham siate khempeuh, ama sumkholna pana a gou a lui le a thak a pusuahkhia inn neipa tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
40013053	Jesu in hih gentehna teng a gen khit ciangin tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
40013054	Ama khua a tun ciangin synagogue sungah mite thuhilh kipana, amaute in lamdang a sa uh hi. Amaute in, “Hih pilna le hih bang nalamdang bawl theihna vangte hih pa in koi pana a ngah ahi hiam?
40013055	Khutsiampa tapa hi lo ahi hiam? Anu min Mary hi-a James, Joseph, Simon le Judas-te ama sanggam hilo ahi hiam?
40013056	A sanggam numeite ei tawh tengkhawm hilo ahi hiam? Tua ahileh hih pa in, hihte khempeuh koi pana a ngah hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
40013057	Tua ciangin amaute in amah a phunsan uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Kamsangpa in ama khua sung le ama inn sung bekah pahtawina a ngah kei hi,” a ci hi.
40013058	Tua hi-a amaute uplahna hangin Jesu in tua lai-ah nalamdang tampi a bawl kei hi.
40014001	Tua hun laitakin gam-ukpa Herod in Jesu thu a kigenna a za hi.
40014002	Tua ciangin a sawltakte kiangah, “Hih pa, Baptize-pa John ahi hi. A sisa hong tho kik hi ngel ding hi! Tua hanga amah in nalamdang bawl theihna vang nei hi,” a ci hi.
40014003	Herod in a naupa Philip zi Herodia hangin John mana a hen khit ciangin thong sungah a khum hi.
40014004	Tua pen John in Herod kiangah, “Tuanu na tenpih ding thukham tawh kituak peuhmah lo hi,” a cih hang ahi hi.
40014005	Herod in amah a thah nop hangin mipite in amah kamsangin ngaihsun uh ahi manin mipite a kihta hi.
40014006	Herod suah ni pawi-in amau et dingin Herodia tanu a lam hi. Herod a lungkim lua ahi manin,
40014007	kiciam a tuanu nget peuhpeuh piak dingin a kamciam hi.
40014008	A nu hilhtawm bangin, “Baptize-pa John lutang kuangdai khatin hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen hi.
40014009	Kumpipa lungdong a, ahi hangin a kiciamnasa le a lenglate hangin tuanu ngetna banga piak ding le
40014010	thong sunga John ngawng tan dingin thu a pia hi.
40014011	Ama lutang kuangin hong kitawi-a numeino kipia hi; amah in a nu a piasawn hi.
40014012	John nungzuite pai uh a. a luang la in a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin pai uh a Jesu a ko uh hi.
40014013	Jesu in tua thupiang teng a zak ciangin gunkuangin tuanga gamdaih na mun lamah a kihemkhia hi. Hih thu a zak uh ciangin khuapite panin mihonte khe-in va pai uh a, a nung a zui uh hi.
40014014	Jesu a kumkhiat ciangin mihonte mu a, amaute khuatuah in a cinate uh a damsak hi.
40014015	Nitak lam neh ta ahi ciangin a nungzuite a kiangah va pai uh a, “Hih lai lah gamtawng hi-a ni lah niam lua ta hi. Khuate ah pai-in a an ding uh lei dingin mihonte ciahsak in,” a ci uh hi.
40014016	Jesu in, “Amaute paikhiat kul lo hi. A nek ding uh bang khatpeuh pia un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40014017	Amaute in, “Anlum nga le ngasa nih bek ka nei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
40014018	Amah in, “Tuate hiah hong la dih un,” a ci hi.
40014019	Tua ciangin mipite lopa tungah a tusak uh hi. Tua anlum nga le ngasate gel la-a vantung lam ento in, lungdam a koh khit ciangin anlumte a balkham hi. Tua ciangin nungzuite pia a, nungzuite in mipite lakah a hawm uh hi.
40014020	Amaute khempeuh in ne uh a, a kham pikpek uh hi. Nungzuite in a khamvalte uh a neng a themin a top uh leh bawmta sawm-le-nih tak a pha hi.
40014021	Tua an nete numei le naupang simloh pasal tulnga bang a pha hi.
40014022	Jesu in a nungzuite thakhatin gun kuangah tuangsak a, ama maiah galkah sakin mihonpite a ciahsak hi.
40014023	Mihonpite a ciahsak khit ciangin a mah kia thungen dingin mualtung ah a paito hi. Nitak ciangin amah kia tua lai ah a om hi.
40014024	Ahi hangin gunkuang pen tuigei panin gamlaa simna tung ta a, huih in lehmut ahi manin tuihualte in a satsat hi.
40014025	Zingsang vil lina sungin Jesu a mau lam zuanin tui tungah a pai hi.
40014026	Nungzuite in amah tui tungah a pai a muh uh ciangin a lau mahmah uh hi. Amaute in, “Hua lai-ah sikha,” ci-in lau lua in nakpi in a awng uh hi.
40014027	Ahi hangin amaute kiangah Jesu in, “Lau kei un! Keimah ka hi hi. Hong kihta kei un,” a cipah hi.
40014028	Peter in, “Topa nang na hileh, kei zong na kiang zuanin tui tungah kong pai nading thu hong pia in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40014029	Jesu in, “Hong pai ou,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin gunkuang panin Peter tuakkhia a, Jesu lam zuanin tui tungah a pai hi.
40014030	Ahi hangin huihpi a muh ciangin lau-in tumsuk dektak a, “Topa hong hon ou,” ci-in a awng khia zal hi.
40014031	Jesu in a khutin manphei pah a, “Upna neupa aw, bang hangin lunghei nei se na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
40014032	Gunkuang sung a tun uh ciangin huih nung a dai kiuhkeuh hi.
40014033	Gunkuang sunga om teng in, “Pasian Tapa na hi takpi hi,” ci-in Jesu a bia uh hi.
40014034	Amaute galkah uh a Gennesaret a tung uh hi.
40014035	Tua lai-a mite in Jesu a hilam a theihtel uh ciangin a kima khua khempeuhah thu a zasak uh hi. Mite in amau cinate paipih uh a,
40014036	a puantualpi mong a lawnsak nadingin a thum uh hi. Amah a lawng khempeuh a damsiang hi.
40015001	Tua ciangin Jerusalem panin Pharisee-te le thukham siate pawl khat va pai uh a Jesu kiangah,
40015002	"Bang hangin na nungzuite in upate tangngeina palsat uh ahi hiam? An a nek ma-un a khut uh a sil kei uh hi!” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40015003	Jesu in, “No zong tangngeina na zuih nop manun bang hangin Pasian thupiak palsat na hi uh hiam?
40015004	Ahang in, Pasian in, ‘Na nu le na pa pahtawi in,a a nu le a pa a hamsiatte kithat pelmawh ding hi,’b ci hi.
40015005	Ahi hangin note in, mi khatpeuh in a nu le a pa-te kiangah, ‘Kei tung pana na ngah ding uh huhna peuhmah, Pasian tungah letsong a kipia ahi hi. A cihleh
40015006	a pa a pahtawi kul lo hi,’c na ci uh hi. Tua bang tangngeina na kiplet manun Pasian thu na phiat mang uh hi.
40015007	No kineih siamte! Isaiah in note tawh kisai-a a genkholhna:
40015008	‘Hih mite in a muk uh tawh kei hong pahtawi uh a, ahi hangin a lungtang uh kei panin gamla hi.
40015009	Amaute in a mawkna-in kei hong bia uh a, a thuhilhnate uh mihing bawltawm ngeina ahi hi,’d a cih a man mahmah hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40015010	Jesu in mihonpite a kiangah sam a, “Ngai unla theitel un.
40015011	Mite kam sunga a tumsukte in mi a ‘ninsak’ kei hi. Kam sung pana pusuakte in mi a ‘ninsak’ hi,” a ci hi.
40015012	Tua ciangin nungzuite in ama kiangah va nai uh a, “Pharisee-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungkim loh lam uh na thei hiam?” ci-in amah a dong uh hi.
40015013	Amah in, “Vantunga ka Pa in a suan loh kung peuhmah a zungin kibotkhia ding hi.
40015014	Amaute thudon dah lel un; amaute, mittaw lamhilhtee ahi uh hi. Mittaw khat in mittaw dang khat makaih leh a nih un kawhawm sungah kiakhawm ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40015015	Peter in, “Tua gentehna kote hong hilhcian dih in,” a ci hi.
40015016	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Tua zahin lungmawl lai zawzen na hi uh hiam?
40015017	Kam sunga tumte, gilpi sungah tumsuk a, tua ciangin pumpi pualamah a pu suakkhia hi, cih thei lo na hi uh hiam?
40015018	Kam sung pana pusuakkhiate ahileh lungtang pana piang hi-a tuate in mi a ‘ninsak hi.
40015019	Lungtang pana piangte: ngaihsut khel, tualthahna, angkawmna, numei le pasal paktatna, guktakna, zuau teci panna le gensiatna-te ahi hi.
40015020	Hihte in mi a ‘ninsak’ hi, ahi hangin khut sil lo-a an nek in amah a ‘ninsak’ kei hi,” a ci hi.
40015021	Jesu in tua mun nusia in, Tyre le Sidon kual lamah a kihem to hi.
40015022	Tua kimnai panin Canaan numei khat va pai a, “Topa David Tapa aw, kei hong lainat in! Ka tanu sungah dawi luta, a gim lua mahmah hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
40015023	Jesu in kam khat zong a dawng kei hi. Tua ciangin nungzuite a kiangah pai uh a, “Tuanu in i nungah hong zui-in hong gal sapsap ahi manin hawlkhia in,” ci-in Jesu a kun uh hi.
40015024	Amah in, “Kei, Israel tuu mangte kiang bekah hong kisawl ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40015025	Tua numei pai-in a mai ah khukdina, “Topa aw, hong huh tapeuh in!” a ci hi.
40015026	Amah in, “Tate nek anlum laksakin a uite uh piak ding kilawm lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40015027	Tua numei in, “Himah hi, Topa aw, ahi hangin uite in zong a topa sabuai pana kia annengte a ne uh hi,” a ci hi.
40015028	Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Numei aw, upna lian na nei hi! Nong nget bangin kong pia hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua hun lianin a tanu a dampah hi.
40015029	Tua mun nusia in Galilee Tuipi dungah Jesu a pai hi. Tua ciangin mualpang ah kahto in a tu hi.
40015030	Mihon tampi ama kiangah pai-in mittawte, khebaite, a poite, a pautheilote le cina dang tampi va paipih uh a, a khe phungah a nga uh hi. Jesu in amaute a damsiangsak hi.
40015031	Tua mite in, a pautheilote pau thei a, a poite dam kikin, khebaite lam pai thei a, mittawte in khua a muh theih a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel-te Pasian a phat uh hi.
40015032	Jesu in nungzuite a kiangah sam a, “Hih mite ka khuatuah hi. Ka kiangah a om zawh uh ni thumtak pha ta a, a nek ding uh bangmah a nei kei uh hi. Gilkial pi in ka ciahsak nuam kei hi; tua bangin ciah le uh phukhong vei in pukgawp ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40015033	A nungzuite in, “Hih bang gamtawngah mihon hih zahta vak nading an koi pan kingah thei ding hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
40015034	Jesu in, “Anlum bangzah na nei uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Lum sagih le ngasa tawmkha om lai hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
40015035	Amah in mihonpite leitual ah a tusak hi.
40015036	Tua ciangin tua anlum sagih le ngasate la a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin balkhamin a nungzuite a pia hi. Nungzuite in mipite a piasawn uh hi.
40015037	Mipite in ne uh a, a kham pikpek uh hi. Nungzuite in khamval teng athem anengin a top uh leh bawm sagihtak a pha hi.
40015038	Tua an nete numei naupang sim loh tulli a pha hi.
40015039	Jesu in mihonpite a ciahkhiatsak khit ciangin gunkuang ah tuangin Magadan kim nai lam zuanin a pai hi.
40016001	Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te Jesu kiangah pai uh a, vantung pan lim khat ngetna tawh amah a zia-et uh hi.
40016002	Amah in,a “Nitakin, ‘Meiisan a suah ciangin khuapha ding hi,’ na ci uh a,
40016003	zingsangin, ‘Meiisan suak a khua a nim ciangin huihpi nungin guahpi zu ding hi,’ na ci uh hi. Van maitang pianzia na khiat theih uh hangin hun lahna limte na thei thei kei uh hi.
40016004	A tatkhel le angkawmhat hih khang mite in lim lamdang a zon uh hangin Jonah lim longal adang khat beek a kilak kei ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute nusia in a paikhia hi.
40016005	Tuilipi a kantan laitakun nungzuite in an a pua mangngilh uh hi.
40016006	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Pilvang unla, Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te silngo panin kikem un,” a ci hi.
40016007	Amaute in, “Anlum khat beek i puak loh hang hi,” ci-in a kikum uh hi.
40016008	Jesu in amaute kikupna a theih ciangin, “Upna neute aw, bang hangin anlum om loh thu kikum tazen na hi uh hiam!
40016009	Theitel nai lo lailai na hi uh hiam? Mi tul nga ading anlum nga le a val bawm bangzah na kaikhawm uh cih phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
40016010	Ahikeh mi tulli adingin lum sagih le a val bawm bangzah na kaikhawm uh cih phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
40016011	Bangci-a an thu gen ka hi loh lam theitel lo na hi uh hiam? Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te silngo panin na kikem un,” a ci hi.
40016012	Tua ciangin anlum bawl cianga kizang silngo gen hi loin Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te hilhna pana kikep ding gen ahilam a theitel pan uh hi.
40016013	Caesarea Philipi kuala Jesu a pai ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite in Mihing Tapa kua hi, a ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
40016014	Amaute in, “Mi pawlkhat in, ‘Baptize-pa John hi; pawlkhatte in Elijah hi; pawlkhat leuleu in, Jerimiah hiam, kamsang khatpeuh hiam, hi ding hi,’ hong ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
40016015	"Tua ahileh no e leh? Kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
40016016	Simon Peter in, “Nang, a nungta Pasian Tapa, Khristb na hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40016017	Jesu in, “Jonah tapa Simon aw, thupha ngah na hi hi; ahang in, hih in mihing hong laak hi loin vantung a om ka Pa hong laak ahi hi.
40016018	Tua hi a, nang Peterc na hi hi. Hih suangpi tungah ka pawlpi ka phut dinga Gawtmund kongpite in a zo zo kei ding uh hi.e
40016019	Vantung gam tawhtangte nang kong pia ding hi. Leitung a na hen peuhpeuh vantungah kihen dingaf, leitung a na phel peuhpeuh vantungah kiphel dingg hi,” a ci kik hi.
40016020	Tua ciangin Jesu in amah Khrist ahilam kuamah a hilh loh nadingun a nungzuite a vauhilh hi.
40016021	Jerusalem ah Jesu pai-in upate, siampi makaite le thukham siate khutah tampi thuak pelmawh dinga, pel loin amah kithatin, a ni thum ni ciangin kihingkiksak ding hi, cih thute tua hun pana kipan a nungzuite a hilhcian hi.
40016022	Peter in amah tang paikhiatpih in tai a, “Topa, hi ngei mahmah lo e! Hih thu nang tungah tung ngei peuhmah lo ding hi!” a ci hi.
40016023	Jesu kihei a Peter kiangah, “Satan ka nunglamah kihem in! Kei adingin kimuk-tukna na hi hi. Pasian thute ngaihsun loin mihing thute na ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
40016024	Tua ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in ka nung hong zuih ding leh amah le amah kinialin, ama singlamteh kisuanin hong zuih pelmawh kul hi.
40016025	Ahang in, ama nuntaknah a honkhia nuamte in taan dinga, ahi hangin kei hanga ama nuntakna a taante in, nuntakna a ngah ding hi.
40016026	Mi khatpeuh in leitung buppi a neih hangin a hinna tanlawh leh ama adingin bang phatuam ding ahi hiam? Ahikeh mi khatpeuh in ama kha bang tawh khek thei ding ahi hiam?
40016027	Ahang in, Mihing Tapa ama vansawl takte tawh a Pa minthanna kengin hong pai ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in amau sepna tawh kizui-in pahtakman a sang ciat ding uh hi.
40016028	Thutak kong geninah, hih lai-a ding mi pawlkhat in, Mihing Tapa ama kumpi-gam tawh hong pai, a muh matengun sihna a ciamkha kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
40017001	Niguk khit ciangin Jesu in Peter, James le James sanggampa John-te zawnin mualsang tungah a kahtohpih hi.
40017002	Tua lai-ah amaute mitmuhin a pum piandan a kikhel hi. Amai ni bangin tanga, a puante khuavak bangin a leng hi.
40017003	Tua khit phetin amaute mai-ah Moses le Elijah kilang a, Jesu tawh a kiho uh hi.
40017004	Peter in Jesu kiangah, “Topa, hih lai-ah i om nuam mahmah hi. Nong awi leh, buk thum—nang ading khat, Moses ading khat, Elijah ading khat, hong lamsak ning,” a ci hi.
40017005	Tua banga a pau laitakin meiingo khat in amaute tuama, tua meii lak panin, “Hih in, ka it ka Tapa ahi hi, ama tungah ka lung a kim mahmah hi; ama thu na ngai ta un!” ci-in aw khat a ging hi.
40017006	Nungzuite in hih awging a zak uh ciangin lau uh a, lei ah a khupbawh uh hi.
40017007	Ahi hangin Jesu pai-in amaute lawnga, “Tho un, lau kei un,” a ci hi.
40017008	Amaute a khuadak uh leh Jesu longal kuamah a mu kei uh hi.
40017009	Amaute mualtung pan a paisuk kawmkawmun Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa misi pan a thawh mateng, na muhsate uh kuama kiangah gen peuhmah kei un,” a ci hi.
40017010	Nungzuite in, “Tua ahileh thukham siate in, ‘Elijah hong pai masa pelmawh ding hi,’ ci-in bang hangin hilh uh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40017011	Jesu in dawnga, “A taktakin, Elijah hong pai-a na khempeuh a bawlpha ding hi.
40017012	Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, Elijah hong pai khin zo napi amaute in amah a thei kei uh hi. Ama tungah amau ut bangin a bawl uh hi. Tua mah bangin Mihing Tapa in amaute khutlum a thuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
40017013	Tua ciangin Jesu in Baptize-pa John tawh kisai-in a gen ahilam nungzuite in a theitel pan uh hi.
40017014	Mihonpite lakah amaute a pai laitakun mi khat in Jesu va naih a, a mai ah a khukdin hi.
40017015	Amah in, “Topa aw, ka tapa lainat in. Amah sibupbupin, gim mahmah hi. Mei sung khawng tui sung khawngah puk zelzel hi.
40017016	Na nungzuite kiangah ka paipih hangin a damsak thei kei uh hi.” a ci hi.
40017017	Jesu in, “Thu um lo-a a lehtat khang mite aw, note tawh bang tan vei om khawmin bang tan vei hong dawhdawh zo ding ka hi hiam? Tua naupang ka kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
40017018	Jesu in tua dawi a tai ciangin naupang sung panin paikhia-a, tua hun lianin naupang a damsiang pah hi.
40017019	Tua ciangin Jesu kiangah nungzuite va paituam uh a, “Bang hanga ko hawlkhia thei lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40017020	Amah in, “Na upna uh a neu luat hang ahi hi. Thutak kong geninah, upna ankam tang cia-a neu khat na neih uh leh hih mualpi kiangah, ‘Hih mun pan hua lai-ah kisuankhia in,’ ci le uh cin kisuankhia ding hi. No adingin a hi thei lo bangmah a om kei ding hi.
40017021	Ahi hangin thungetna le antanna longal in hih bangte a hisak thei kei hi,”a a ci hi.
40017022	Amaute Galilee a tunkuan uh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Mite khutah Mihing Tapa kilehhek ding hi.
40017023	Amaute in amah that ding uh a, a ni thum ni ciangin kihingkiksak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin nungzuite a dah lua mahmah uh hi.
40017024	Jesu le a nungzuite Capernaum a tun khit uh ciangin siah drachma nih dongte Peter kiangah va pai uh a, “Na siapa un biakinnpi siah pia lo hiam?”b ci-in a dong uh hi.
40017025	Amah in, “Pia mah hi,” a ci hi. Inn sungah Peter a lut ciangin Jesu in na hopih masa a, “Simon aw, nang bang na ci ngaihsut hiam? Leitung kumpite in mangmu le siah kua tungah dong uh ahi hiam? Amau tate tung hiam? Midangte tung ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
40017026	Peter in, “Midangte tungah a dong hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “Tua bang ahileh tate a peng hi.
40017027	Ahi hangin amaute i lungkimsak nadingin tuilipi ah va pai inla, ngathang va siah in. Na mat masakpen a kam phen lecin drachma tang li man sumtang khat na mu ding hi. Hong tawi inla, kei le nang siah dingin amaute pia in,” a ci hi.
40018001	Tua hun laitakin Jesu kiangah nungzuite va pai uh a, “Vantung gamah kua lian pen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40018002	Amah in naupang neu khat samin amaute lakah a dingsak hi.
40018003	Tua ciangin amah in, “Thutak kong geninah, note kikhela naupangno na bat kei uh leh vantung gam sungah na lut ngei kei ding uh hi.
40018004	Tua ahi ciangin hih naupangno banga a ki niamkhiat peuhpeuh vantung gam ah a lianpen ahi hi.
40018005	Tua ciangin keima min hangin hih bang naupangno khat a sangte peuhmah, kei hong sang ahi hi.
40018006	"Ahi hangin kei hong um hih naupangnote khat peuhpeuh mawhna a bawlsak a om leh a ngawngah angawina suang lianpi khihin tuipi thuk sungah tuakin tummang leh ama adingin a hoihzaw ding hi.
40018007	Mite mawhna a bawlsakte hangin hih leitung in gimna nak thuak na zen in cia! Tua bang a piang pelmawh ding ahi hi; ahi hangin mawhna bawl nadinga kizang mite in gimna nak thuak na zen in cia!
40018008	Na khut a hi a na khe ahi zongin mawhna hong bawlsak penpen sattan inla paimang in. Khut kim khe kimin tawntung meikhuk ah hong kikhul sangin, khutbui khebui-in nuntakna ah na lut ding hoihzaw hi.
40018009	Na mittang in mawhna hong bawlsak leh khelkhia inla paimang in. Mittang kimin meili sungah hong kikhul sangin mit lang khat bek tawh nuntakna ah na lut ding hoihzaw hi.
40018010	"Hih naupangnote khat beek na simmawh kha kei in. Ahang in, vantunga om amau vansawltakte in, vantunga ka Pa maitang a mu ngitnget uh hi.a
40018011	Mihing Tapa, a mangb te hon dinga hong pai ahi hi.
40018012	"Bang na ci ngaihsut uh hiam? Mi khat in tuu za khat nei henla, tuate lakah khat gammang leh, a om lai sawm kua le kuate mual tungah nusia-in, tua a gammang tuu pen zong lo ding ahi hiam?
40018013	Thutak kong geninah, tua a gammang tuu a muh kik ciangin a gammang lo tuu sawm kua le kuate sangin, tua tuu khat hangin a lungdam zaw ding hi.
40018014	Tua mah bangin hih naupangte khat nangawn a manthan ding vantunga om na Pa un a phal kei hi.
40018015	"Nangc tungah na sanggampa hong mawh leh pai-in nogel bek omkhawmin ama khialhna na lak in. Na thu hong man leh nang lamah na sanggampa na zo hi.
40018016	Ahi hangin na thu hong man nop kei leh ‘teci nih hiam thum hiam a om ciangin thu khempeuh thukip suak’d ahi manin midang khat hiam nih hiam zawnin na pai kik in.
40018017	Amaute thu a man nop kei lai leh pawlpi na ko in; pawlpite thu a man nop kei lailai leh, lawkipa ahikeh siah dongpa bang lelin na koih in.
40018018	"Thutak kong geninah, leitungah na hen peuhpeuh vantungah kihen dingae, lei tungah na phel peuhpeuh vantungah kiphel dingf hi.
40018019	"Kong genbeh lai-inah, leitungah note nih kithukima na nget peuhpeuh uh vantunga om ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
40018020	Ahang in, keima minin nih le thum a kikhop leh amaute tawh tua munah ka om hi,” a ci hi.
40018021	Tua ciangin Jesu kiangah Peter va pai a, “Topa aw, ka sanggam khat ka tungah hong mawh leh bangzah vei ciang ka maisak ding hiam? Sagih vei ciang dong hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
40018022	Jesu in, “Sagih vei ciang bek hi lo, sawm sagih mun sagihg vei ciang dong maisak in, kong ci hi.
40018023	"Tua hi-a vantung gam in ama na semte sum ciamtehna a sittel nuam kumpipa tawh kibang hi.
40018024	Tua sum ciamtehna a sittel ciangin talenth tulsawm a bapa ama kiangah a paipih uh hi.
40018025	A sum bat pia zo lo ahi manin a leiba loh nadingin a zi a tate le a neihsa khempeuh zuak dingin a pu in thu a pia hi.
40018026	"Tua nasempa a pu mai-ah khukdin in, ‘Hong thuak keikai lai in. A vekpi-in kong loh ding hi,’ ci-in a thum hi.
40018027	Tua ciangin a pu in amah hehpih a, a leiba khempeuh maisak in a khah hi.
40018028	"Ahi hangin tua nasempa a paikhiat ciangin ama tunga denariii zakhat a ba a naseppihte khat a mu hi. Amah pumbawh in a gawl meka, ‘Nong sum bat hong loh meng in,’ ci-in a siik hi.
40018029	"A lawmpa zong khukdin a, ‘Hong thuak keikai lai in; kong loh na ding hi,’ ci-in a thum hi.
40018030	"Ahi hangin a ut kei hi. A ut sangsikin paikhia-a a leiba teng a loh khit matengin tuapa thong sungah a khum hi.
40018031	Nasem dangte in tua thu teng a muh uh ciangin lungdong mahmah uh a, pai-in thu piang teng khempeuh a pu uh a ko uh hi.
40018032	"Tua ciang a pu in inn sungah tua nasempa sama, ‘Nasem tatsiapa aw, nong thum manin na leiba teng kong maisak hi.
40018033	Nang kong lainat bang tektekin na naseppihpa tungah na hih ding hi lo hiam?’ ci hi.
40018034	A pu heh lua ahi manin a bat khempeuh a loh khit matengin tua nasempa a kigawt dingin thong ukte khut sungah a pia hi.
40018035	"No zong na lungsim takpi uh tawh na sanggamte uh mawhna na maisak kei uh leh vantunga om ka Pa in hih bangin note tung ciatah hong hih ding hi,” a ci hi.
40019001	Jesu in hih thu teng a gen khit ciangin Galilee gam nusia in Jordan gal khat lam Judea kualah a pai hi.
40019002	Mihon tampi in amah zui uh a, tua munah amaute a damsak hi.
40019003	Amah zia-et dingin Pharisee-te pawlkhat va pai uh a, “Thu khat peuhpeuh hangin pasal in a zi a mak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40019004	Jesu in, “‘A kipatcilin Piangsakpa in numei le pasal a bawl hi,’a cih thu leh
40019005	‘Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu a pa nusia in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, amau gel sa khat a suak ding uh hi,’b cih thute sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
40019006	Tua hi-a amaute nih hi loin khat ahi hi, tua ahi ciangin Pasian in a gawmsate mihing in khen kei ta hen,” a ci hi.
40019007	Amaute in, “Tua ahileh, ‘Mikhat in a zi a makna lai pia henla, a zi nawkiksak ta hen,’ ci-in bang hangin Moses in thu pia ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
40019008	Jesu in, “Note na lungtang uh khauh lua ahi manin, zi na mak theih nadingun Moses in phalna hong pia hi. Ahi hangin a cila kipan hih bang a hi kei hi.
40019009	Ken kong geninah, ang kikawmsanna hang longal a zi ma a numei dang a tenpih peuhmah, angkawm a suak hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
40019010	Nungzuite in ama kiangah, “Nupa kal thu hih bang ding ahileh kuamah kitenpih loh ding hoihzaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
40019011	Jesu in, “Amau tunga kipiasate simloh kuamah in hih thuhilhna a sang thei kei ding uh hi.
40019012	Ahang in, mi pawlkhatte gehsa in a suak uh hi; pawlkhatte ahileh mite geh ahi hi; adang pawlkhatte in vantung gam hangin kuamah a tenpihc kei uh hi. Hih thu a sang thei peuh in san ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
40019013	Tua ciangin amaute tungah khut ngasak ding le amau ading thu a ngensak dingin Jesu kiangah naupangnote a kipaipih hi. Ahi hangin nungzuite in tua a paipihte a tai uh hi.
