41006007	Sawm-le-nihte ama kiangah sama, kha giloteb tungah thuneihna pia-in nihta nihta-in a sawlkhia hi.
41006008	Amah in amaute a lamlahna hih bang ahi hi: “Na khualzinna ua na zat dingun ciangkhut longal an ahi zongin, thung-ip ahi zongin, kawnggak sungah sum ahi zongin bangmah pua kei un.
41006009	Khedap bulh unla ahi hangin puantuangsilh keng thuah kei un.
41006010	Inn khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua inn ah tam suak un.
41006011	Note hong ngai lo, na thu uh a ngai nuam lo munte na nusiat uh ciangin amaute langa teci panna-in na khepek ua leivuite singkhia un,” a ci hi.
41006012	Amaute paikhia uh a, mite a kisik nadingin thu a hilh uh hi.
41006013	Amaute in dawi tampi hawlkhia uh a, cina tampite sathau nilhin a damsak uh hi.
41006014	Jesu min kithei khawk khin ta ahi manin Kumpi Herod in zong hih thu a za hi. Mi pawlkhatin,c “Baptize-pa John misisa tho kika, tua hangin amah in nalamdang bawl theihna vangliatna nei ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
41006015	Adangte in, “Amah Elijah hi,” a ci uh hi. Pawlkhatte leuleu in, “Tang lai-a kamsangte banga kamsangpa khat ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
41006016	Ahi hangin Herod in hih thu a zak ciangin, “A ngawng ka tanpa John misisa tho kik hi!” a ci hi.
41006017	Ahang in, John mat dingin Herod mahmah in thu pia-in hensak-a thong sungah a khumsak hi. A nau pa Philip zi a suh nu Herodia hangin hih banga a hih ahi hi.
41006018	John in Herod kiangah, “Na sanggampa zi na suh thukham tawh kituak het lo hi,” a cici khin zo hi.
41006019	Tua ahi ciangin Herodia in John hua-in a that nuam hi. Ahi hangin tuanu in amah a that thei kei hi.
41006020	Bang hang hiam cih leh John mi thumaan le misiangtho khat ahilam Herod in thei ahi manin amah kihta in a hu hi. Herod in John thu a zak ciangin amkham mahmahd napi ama thugen a ngai nuam hi.
41006021	A nunungna-ah a hun hoih khat a om hi. Herod in a suah ni-in ama uliante le galkapmangte le Galilee makaite an a vak hi.
41006022	Herodia’ tanu sungtumin lama, tuanu in Herod le a nitak-an nekpih lenglate a lungkimsak hi. Kumpipa in numeino kiangah, “Na deih peuhpeuh hong ngen in, kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
41006023	Amah kiciama, “Ka kumpi gam phel khat dong nong nget peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” ci-in a kamciam hi.
41006024	Tuanu paikhia-in a nu kiangah, “Bang ngen ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Baptize-pa John’ lutang,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41006025	Kumpipa kiangah numeino manlangin paipah a, “Tu mahmah in kuangdai-in Baptize-pa John lutang nong piak ding ka deih hi,” ci-in a ngen hi.
41006026	Kumpipa lungdong lua mahmah a, ahi hangin ama kamciamsa le a nitak-an nekpih a lenglate hangin tuanu a nial nuam kei hi.
41006027	Tua ciangin amah in John lutang a paipih nading thupiakna tawh mithatpa khat a sawlpah hi. Tua mipa pai-in thong sunga om John ngawng tana,
41006028	ama lutang kuangdai-in a puak kik hi. Amah in numeino pia-a tuanu in a nu a pia hi.
41006029	John nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin pai uh a, a luang la-in han sung khatah a sial uh hi.
41006030	Jesu kimkotah sawltakpite va ki khawm uh a, amau hihsa le a hilhsate uh a ko uh hi.
41006031	Tua ciangin mipite a ciah le a kuan a tam luat manin an nek hun ding nangawn nei lo uh a, amaute kiangah, “Gamdaihna mun khatah no kia bek in hong zui unla, tawlnga un,” a ci hi.
41006032	Tua ciangin amau guak gamtawng khatah gunkuang khatin a pai uh hi.
41006033	Ahi hangin amaute paikhiat a mute in thei uh a, khua khempeuh panin khe-in tai uh a, amaute tun ma-in a na tung uh hi.
41006034	Jesu lei-ah a tun ciangin mihonpi tampi a mu hi. Amah in amaute khuatuah hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a cingpa om lo tuuhon tawh kibang uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute thu tampi a hilh hi.
41006035	Tua hunlaitak nitak lam ahi hi. Tua ciangin a nungzuite a kiangah va pai uh a amaute in, “Hih tak gamtawng hi-a khuanung lua mahmah ta hi.
41006036	Hih kima khuata khuaneute ah pai-in a nek ding uh an a lei theih nadingun mipite ciahsak ta in,” a ci uh hi.
41006037	Ahi hangin amah in, “Note in a nek ding uh khatpeuh pia un,” a ci hi. Amaute in ama kiangah, “Tuabang hileh pasal khat, kha giat thamane tak bei ding hi! Kote pai-in tua zah tawh an va lei-in amaute nek ding, pia ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
41006038	Amah in, “Anlum bangzah na nei uh hiam? Pai-in va en dih un,”a ci hi. Amaute in a et khit uh ciangin, “Lum nga le ngasa nih om hi,” a ci uh hi.
41006039	Tua ciangin Jesu in mipite lopa hing tungah a pawlpawlin a tusak hi.
41006040	Tua ahi ciangin amaute a zaza, a sawm nganga-in a tu ciptep uh hi.
41006041	Tua anlum nga le ngasate gel la-a, vantung lam ento-in lungdam a koh khit ciangin anlumte a balkham hi. Tua ciangin mipite a lui dingun a nungzuite a pia hi. Amaute khempeuh lakah ngasate gel zong a hawm hi.
41006042	Amaute in ne uh a, a kham pikpek uh hi.
41006043	Nungzuite in anlum le ngasa athem aneng bawmta sawm-le- nih a tawm uh hi.
41006044	Tua an nete pasal cingteng tul nga a pha hi.
41006045	Tua khit phetin Jesu in nungzuite gunkuang sungah tuangsaka, ama mai Bethsaida ah paisakin mihonpite a ciahsak hi.
41006046	Amaute paisan-a, amah thungen dingin mual tungah a pai hi.
41006047	Nitak ciangin tuilipi laizangah gun kuang om a, amah ahileh lei lakah a om hi.
41006048	Huih in gunkuang lehmut ahi manin nungzuite in gunkuang nakpi-a a hot uh a mu hi. Zan vil lina pawlin amaute lam zuanin tuilipi tungah Jesu a pai hi. Amaute kheng dektak a,
41006049	ahi hangin amah tuilipi tunga pai a muh uh ciangin sikha sa in a kikokhia uh hi.
41006050	Bang hang hiam cih leh a vekun amah mu uh a, a lau mahmah uh hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei un! Keimah ka hi hi. Hong kihta kei un,” a cipah hi.
41006051	Tua ciangin amaute tawh gunkuang tungah kahto a, huih nung a dai kiuhkeuh hi.
41006052	Amaute in anlum ngate thu theitel lo uh ahi manin lamdang lua mahmah a sa uh hi, amaute lungtang kikhauhsak hi.
41006053	Amaute galkah uh a, Gennesaret a tun uh ciangin tua lai-ah a gunkuang uh a khih uh hi.
41006054	Gunkuang pan a pusuah phetun, mipite in Jesu mel a theitel uh hi.
41006055	Mipite tua kual khempeuhah tai kawi kawi uh a, cinate phek tawh zawngin, amah om hi ci-a a zakna peuhpeuhuah a paipih uh hi.
41006056	Khuapite khuaneute le gamsung khuate ahi zongin ama paina peuhpeuhah cinate paipih uh a, sum zuakna munte ah a na koih uh hi. Ama puantualpi mongtep ciang beek a lawnsak theih nadingin thum uh a, amah a lawngte khempeuh a dam uh hi.
41007001	Jerusalem panin Pharisee-te le thukham siate pawlkhat Jesu kiang ah va kikhawm uh a,
41007002	a nungzuite pawlkhat in ngeina banga “siang lo”—tua pen biakna ngeina a silsiang loh khut tawh an a nek laitak uh a mu uh hi.
41007003	(Pharisee-te le Jew-te khempeuh in upate tang ngeinate a kipletna un a ngeina bangin khut sil masa loin an a ne kei uh hi.
41007004	Sum zuakna mun pan a ciah uh ciangin kisil masa loin an a ne kei uh hi. Tua ciangin haite, tuivotbeelte le niangbeelte sawpsiangna-a kipan tang ngeina adang tampi a tang uh hi.a)
41007005	Tua ahi ciangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate in, “Bang hangin na nungzuite in khut sianglo tawh an a nek uh sangin upate tang ngeina bangin gamta zaw lo uh ahi hiam?” ci-in Jesu a dong uh hi.
41007006	Amah in, “No kineihsiamte tawh kisai-a Isaiah in a genkholh hih banga kigelhsa: “‘Hih mite in a muk uh tawh kei hong pahtawi uh a, ahi hangin a lungtang uh kei tawh kigamla hi.
41007007	A mawkna in kei hong bia uh a, a thuhilhte uh mihing bawltawm ngeina ahi hi,’b a cih man mahmah hi.
41007008	"Note in Pasian thupiakte na paikhia uh a, mihingte tang ngeinate na len tentan uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41007009	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Na tang ngeinate uh na tanc theih nadingun Pasian thupiakte nawlkhin dan na siam uh hi!
41007010	Moses in, ‘Na nu na pa pahtawi in.d A nu a pa a hamsiat mi peuhmah thah ding ahi hi,’e ci hi.
41007011	Ahi hangin note in, mi khatpeuh in a nu a pa-te khatpeuh kiangah, ‘Kei tung pana na ngah ding uh huhnate Corban (Pasian a ki-apsa letsong) hi ta hi,’ na ci uh a,
41007012	tua ciangin a nute a pate ading bangmah na hihsak nawn kei uh hi.
41007013	Tua bangin note na kipiaksawn uh na tang ngeinate uh zangin Pasian thu bangmah lo na suaksak uh hi. Tua banah tua bangin na tampi na hih uh hi,” a ci hi.
41007014	Jesu in mihonpite sam leuleu a, “Na vekpi un ngai unla hih thu theitel un.
41007015	A pualam pana mihing sunga tumsuk, bangmah in amah a ‘nin’ suaksak thei lo hi. Mihing sung pana pusuakte in amah a ‘nin’f suaksak zaw hi.
41007016	Zak nading bil nei peuh in za ta hen,”g a ci hi.
41007017	Mihonpite nusia in inn sungah a lut ciangin a nungzuite in hih gentehna thu ama kiangah a dong uh hi.
41007018	Amah in, “Tua zahin lungmawl zawzen na hi uh hiam? Pua lam panin mihing sunga tumsuk khatpeuh in amah a ‘nin’ suaksak thei lo ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
41007019	Ahang in, a lungtang sungah tumsuk loin gilpi sungah tumsuk a, tua ciangin pumpi pualamah a pusuak khia hi,” a ci hi. (Jesu in hih banga a gen ciangin ante khempeuh ‘siang’ hi ci-a a pulakkhia ahi hi.)
41007020	A thugen zom lai-a: “Mihing sung pana pusuak in amah a ‘nin’ suaksak hi.
41007021	Ahang in, a sunglam mihing lungtang panin ngaihsutna khel, numei pasal paktatna, guktakna, tualthahna, angkawmna,
41007022	huaihamna, etsatna, zuau tatna, thangtatna enna, gensiatna, kiphatsakna le hainate a pusuakkhia hi.
41007023	Hih gitlohnate khempeuh a sung lam pana pusuakkhia hi-a, mihing a ‘nin’ suaksak hi,” a ci hi.
41007024	Jesu in tua mun nusia a, Tyreh kimnai-ah a pai hi. Amah inn khatah luta, ama omsim lam kuama theih ding deih lo napi a ki-im zo kei hi.
41007025	A taktakin, a tanu sunga kha giloi a lut nupi khat in ama thu a zak khit phetin va pai-a, a khe phungah a bok hi.
41007026	Tuanu, Syria gam Phoenicia a suak Greek mi ahi hi. Tuanu in a tanu sunga dawi a hawlkhiatsak nadingin Jesu kiangah a thum hi.
41007027	Amah in tuanu kiangah. “Tate an nek kim lai laksakin uite piak ding kilawm lo ahi manin, tate in a duh zahzah uh ne masa phot uh hen,” a ci hi.
41007028	Tuanu in, “Himah hi, Topa aw, ahi hangin sabuai nuai-a uite in zong naupangte annengte a ne uh hi,” a ci hi.
41007029	Tua ciangin amah in tuanu kiangah, “Tuaci banga nong dawn manin na ciah thei hi; dawi in na tanu a nusia zo hi,” a ci hi.
41007030	Tuanu ciaha, a sung pana dawi a paikhia khin, lupna tunga lum a tanuno a mu hi.
41007031	Tua ciangin Jesu in Tyre kimnai teng nusia-a, Sidon kantanin Galilee tuipi ah pai-a tua ciangin Decapolisj kualah a paisuk hi.
41007032	Tua lai-ah mi pawlkhat in bilngong-a pau-awk pasal khat va paipih uh a, tuapa tungah a khut a ngak nadingin ama kiangah a thum hi.
41007033	Jesu in tuapa mihonpite lak panin a tang paikhiatpih khit ciangin a khutmete tuapa bil sungah a khum suk hi. Tua ciangin a cil phih a tuapa leii a lawng hi.
41007034	Vantung lam ento a nakpi-in khuisa-a tuapa kiangah, “Ephatha!” (“Kihong ta hen!” cihna) a ci hi.
41007035	Tua laitakin tua mipa bilte kihonga, a leiigui kikolin siangtakin a pau thei sensen hi.
41007036	Kuama tungah a gen loh nadingun Jesu in amaute thu a pia hi. Ahi hangin tua banga thu a piak semsem ciangin amaute in tua thu a gen semsem uh hi.
41007037	Mipite in lamdang sa lua mahmah uh a, “Amah in na khempeuh a hoihin bawl khin zo hi. Amah in bilngongte khua zasakin, a pau thei lote nangawn a pausak hi,” a ci uh hi.
41008001	Tua hunlaitakin mihonpi dang khat va kikhawm uh hi. Amaute in nek ding bangmah nei lo uh ahi ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite sama,
41008002	"Hih mite ka khuatuah hi. Kei kianga hong om zawh uh ni thum tak pha khin ta-a, a nek ding uh bangmah a nei kei uh hi.
41008003	Gil kialpi in innah ciahsak leng pawlkhatte gamlapi pana hong pai uh ahi manin lamkalah phuk-hong vei-in puk ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41008004	A nungzuite in, “Ahi ta zongin gamsung hi bangah mihon hizah ta vak nading an koi pan kingah thei ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
41008005	Jesu in, “Anlum bangzah na nei uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Sagih,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
41008006	Amah in mihonpite leitual ah a tusak hi. Tua anlum sagihte la-a, lungdam a koh khit ciangin balkhama mipite a lui dingun a nungzuite pia-a, amaute in mipite a lui uh hi.
41008007	Amaute in ngasa neu tawmkha zong a nei uh hi; amah in tuate hangin zong lungdam a koh khit ciangin a hawmkhia dingin nungzuite a sawl hi.
41008008	Mipite in ne uh a, a kham pikpek uh hi. An khamval teng nungzuite in a neng a themin a top uh leh bawm sagih dimtak a pha hi.
41008009	Tua lai-ah pasal tulli bang a om hi. Jesu in amaute a ciahkhiatsak khit ciangin
41008010	a nungzuite tawh gunkuangah tuangin Dalmanutha kual lam a zuan hi.
41008011	Pharisee-te va pai-in Jesu kiangah thu a dong uh hi. Amah a zia-etna un, amaute in vantung panin lim khat a ngen uh hi.
41008012	Amah nakpi in khuisa-a, “Bang hangin hih khang mite in lim lamdang ngen uh ahi hiam? Thutak kong geninah, amaute tungah lim bangmah a kilak kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
41008013	Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute nusia in gunkuangah tuang kika, a galkhat lamah a galkah hi.
41008014	Nungzuite in gunkuang sunga a neihsa uh anlum khat longal an puak ding a mangngilh uh hi.
41008015	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Pilvang un, Pharisee-te le Herod silngo panin na kidawm un,” ci-in a vauhilh hi.
41008016	"An i neih loh hang hi,” ci-in amaute khat le khat a kikum uh hi.
41008017	Jesu in amaute kikupna a theih ciangin, “Bang hangin note, na an neih loh uh kikum tazen na hi uh hiam? Tu dongin mu nai lo, theitel nailo lailai na hi uh hiam? Na lungtang uh kikhauhsak lai ahi hiam?
41008018	Mit nei napi in mu lo a, bil nei napi in za lo na hi uh hiam? Hih thu phawk lo lailai na hi uh hiam?
41008019	Mi tulnga adingin anlum nga ka balkhap lai-in athem aneng na topte uh bawm dim bangzah pha ahi hiam, na phawk lai uh hiam?” a ci hi. “Sawm-le-nih,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
41008020	"Mi tulli ading anlum sagih ka balkhap lai-in athem aneng na topte uh, bawm dim bangzah pha ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, amaute in, “Sagih,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
41008021	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Theitel nai lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41008022	Amaute Bethsaida a tun uh ciangin mi pawlkhat in mittaw khat va paipih uh a, Jesu in a lawn nadingin a thum uh hi.
41008023	Amah in mittawpa a khutin kai-a, khuanawl ah a paikhiatpih hi. Jesu in tuapa mitte a cil phih-a a tungah a khutte a ngak khit ciangin, “Na khatpeuh na mu thei hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41008024	Amah khuadak a, “Mite ka mu hi; amaute singkung lampai bang uh hi,” a ci hi.
41008025	Jesu in a khutte tuapa mitte ah a nga kik hi. Tua ciangin a mit kihongin khua mu thei-in na khempeuh siang sinsenin a mu hi.
41008026	Jesu in, “Khua sungah lut kei in,” a ci-in amah a ciahsak hi.
41008027	Jesu le a nungzuite, Caesarea le Philipi kima khuaneute a tun dong uh a pai uh hi. Lam a pai laitakun amaute kiangah, “Mite in kei kua hi, hong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41008028	Amaute in, “Kimkhat in Baptize-pa John hi; adangte in Elijah hi; pawlkhatte leuleu in kamsangte lakah khat hi, hong ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
41008029	"No e leh, kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong kik hi. Peter in, “Nang tua Khrist na hi hi,”b ci-in a dawng hi.
41008030	Jesu in ama thu kuamah a hilh loh nadingun amaute a vauhilh hi.
41008031	Tua ciangin Mihing Tapa in tampi thuak pelmawh dinga, upate, siampi makaite le thukham siate in amah nolh ding uh a, pel loin amah kithatin ni thum khit ciangin a tho kik ding hi, cih thu amaute hilh a kipan hi.
41008032	Amah in hih thu teltakin gena, tua ciangin Peter in amah tang paikhiatpih in a tai hi.
41008033	Ahi hangin Jesu kihei-a, a nungzuite enin Peter tai a, “Satan aw, ka nungah kihem in! Pasian thute ngaihsun loin mihing thute na ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
41008034	Tua ciangin a nungzuite le mihonpite ama kiangah sama, “Mi khatpeuh in ka nung hong zuih nop leh pel loin amah le mah kinialin, ama singlamteh kisuanin hong zui ding hi.
41008035	Ahang in, a nuntaknac a honkhia nuam peuh in taan dinga, ahi hangin kei hang le lungdamna-thu hangin ama nuntakna a taan peuhmah in a nuntakna a honkhia ding hi.
41008036	Mi khatin leitung buppi a neih hangin a hinna taan leh bang phatuam ding ahi hiam?
41008037	Ahi kei leh mi khatin ama hinna bang tawh khek thei ding ahi hiam?
41008038	Hih angkawm le mawhdim khang mite hunah keimah le ka thu a zumpihte, Mihing Tapa in a Pa minthanna-in ama vansawltak siang thote tawh hong pai ciangin amaute a zumpih ding hi,” a ci hi.
41009001	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, vangliatna tawh Pasian gam hong tung, hih lai-a ding mi kimkhat in a muh matengun sihna a ciam kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41009002	Niguk khit ciangin Jesu in Peter, James le John tonpih in mualsang tungah kahpih to a, tua lai-ah amauteng bek a om uh hi. Tua lai-ah amauteng bek mitmuhin a mel a kikhel hi.
41009003	Ama puansilhte leitunga, a kipaksak thei penpen sangin pak zaw-a a leng daldal hi.
41009004	Tua laitakin amaute mai-ah Elijah le Moses kilanga, Jesu tawh a kiho uh hi.
41009005	Peter in Jesu kiangah, “Rabbi, hih lai-a i om nuam mahmah hi. Nang ading khat, Moses ading khat, Elijah ading khat, buk thum lam ni,” a ci hi.
41009006	(Amah in a gen ding thei lo hi, amaute a lau mahmah uh hi.)
41009007	Tua ciangin meii lompi khat kai-in amaute tuama, tua meii lak panin aw khat in, “Hih in, ka it ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama thu na ngai un,” a ci hi.
41009008	Tua khit phetin a kimkot uh a et uh leh Jesu longal kuamah dang a mu nawn kei uh hi.
41009009	Amaute mualtung pan a kumsuk kawmkawmun Mihing Tapa misi pan a thawh kik mateng a muhte uh kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun Jesu in amaute thu a pia hi.
41009010	Amaute in hih thu amauteng theih in koih uh a “misi pan tho kik” cih bang cihnopna hiam cih a kikum uh hi.
41009011	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Bang hangin thukham siate in, Elijah hong pai masa pelmawh ding hi, ci-in gen uh ahi hiam?” ci-in amah a dong uh hi.
41009012	Jesu in, “A taktakin Elijah hong pai masa takpi mah a na khempeuh bawlpha mah hi. Tua ahileh Mihing Tapa in nak thuak mahmah dinga a kinolh ding hi, cih thu bang hangin kigelh ahi hiam?
41009013	Ahi hangin ken kong cihinah, Elijah hong pai khin zo a, ama thu a kigelhsa bangin amau ut bangin ama tungah bawl khin zo uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41009014	Nungzui dangte kiangah amaute a tun uh ciangin amaute kimah mihon tampi na oma, thukham siate tawh thu a kinialnial uh a mu uh hi.
41009015	Tua lai-a om mite khempeuh in Jesu a muh phetun lamdang sa lua uh a, amah dawntuah dingin a tai uh hi.
41009016	Amah in, “Amaute tawh bang thu kinialnial na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41009017	Mihonpite lakah khat in, “Sia aw, ka tapa sungah kha khat lutin pausak thei lo-a na kiangah kong paipih hi.
41009018	A dawi in a mat peuhpeuh ciangin leilak a denna hi. A kam panin cilphuan bua-a, a ha gawi-in gawcip hi. Na nungzuite kiangah tua kha a hawlkhiat nadingun ka nget hangin a hawlkhia thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41009019	Jesu in, “Thu um lo khangmite aw, no tawh bang tan om khawm lai ding ka hi hiam? Bang tanvei hong thuak zo ding ka hi hiam? Tua pasalno ka kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
41009020	Tua ciangin amaute in amah a paipih uh hi. Tua kha in Jesu a muh phetin tua naupang a kisatgawpsak hi. Amah lei lakah pukin kipum khuka, a cilphuan a bua hi.
41009021	Jesu in, “A hicih zawh bang tanvei sawt khin hiam?” ci-in tua pasalno’ pa a dong hi. Amah in, “A neu tunga kipan ahi hi.
41009022	Tua kha in amah that nuamin mei sung khawng, tui sung khawng ah sawnpai zel hi. Ahi zongin nang na hih theih leh hong hehpih inla, hong huh in,” a ci hi.
41009023	Jesu in, “‘Na hih theih leh e’? A um mi adingin na khempeuh hi thei hi,” a ci hi.
41009024	Tua pasalno’ pa in zong, “Ka um hi; ka uplahna ka zawh nadingin hong huh in!” a cikhia pah hi.
41009025	Tua munah mihonpite hong tai uh Jesu in a muh ciangin tua kha giloa a tai hi. Amah in, “Nang a bilngong, a pauthei lo kha aw, ama sung pan paikhia inla, lut kik nawn peuhmah kei in, ci-in thu kong pia hi,” a ci hi.
41009026	Tua kha ku zelzal a, tua pasalno kisatsak vanvanin tua khit ciangin a paikhia hi. Tua pasalno misisa tawh kibang lua ahi manin mi tampi in, “Si ta ei!” a ci uh hi.
41009027	Ahi hangin Jesu in tuapa khut lenin a phottoh leh amah a ding to hi.
41009028	Inn sungah Jesu a tum khit ciangin a nungzuite in, “Bang hangin kote in hawlkhia thei lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong sim uh hi.
41009029	Amah in, “Hih bangte pawl, thungetnab bek tawh paikhia thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41009030	Amaute in tua mun nusia in Galilee a kantan uh hi. Jesu in amau omna kuama theih ding a deih kei hi.
41009031	Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Mihing Tapa, mite khut sungah kilehhek ding hi. Amaute in amah that ding uh a, ni thum khit ciangin amah tho ding hi,” ci-in a nungzuite a hilh hi.
41009032	Ahi hangin amaute in ama cihnopna theitel lo uh a, tua thu tawh kisai lah a dong ngam kei uh hi.
41009033	Amaute Capernaum a tung uh hi. Inn sungah a om laitakun, “Lampi-a na kisel uh bang ahi hiam?” ci-in amaute a dong hi.
41009034	Ahi hangin lampi-a a kisel uh kua lianpen hiam, cih thu tawh kisai ahi manin a dai uh hi.
41009035	Jesu tusuk in Sawm-le-nihte sam a, “Mi khatpeuh a masakpen nop leh a nunung penpen le adang teng’ nasem ahi pelmawh kul hi,” a ci hi.
41009036	Amah in naupangno khat kai-a amaute lakah a dingsak hi. Amah in tua naupangno tawi-in amaute kiangah,
41009037	"Keima min hangin hih bang naupangno khat a sang peuhmah kei hong sang ahi hi. Kei hong sang peuhmah, keimah hong sang hi loin kei hong sawlpa a sang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41009038	John in, “Sia aw, mi khatin nang minin dawite a hawlkhiat ka mu uh a, ei mi hi lo ahi manin a hih nawn loh nadingin ka kho uh hi,” a ci hi.
41009039	Jesu in, “Tuapa kho kei un, kuamah in keima minin nalamdang a bawl khit phetin kei hong siatgen pah thei lo ding hi.
41009040	Ahang in, ei hong langpang lo peuh ei aa ahi hi.
41009041	Thutak kong geninah, Khrist pawl na hi manun kei min hanga tuisik hai khat hong suah peuhpeuh pahtakman ngah loin a om peuhmah kei ding hi.
41009042	Kei hong um hih naupang no khatpeuh mawhna a bawlsak a om leh a ngawngah angawina suang lianpi khihin tuipi sungah kipai leh ama adingin hoihzaw ding hi.
41009043	Na khut in mawhna hong bawlsak leh sattan in.
41009044	Khut kimin, amaute than a sihlohna, mei a mit lohna muna meilipi khukah hong kikhul sangin khut buisa-in nuntakna ah lut lecin nang adingin a hoihzaw hi.c
41009045	Na khe in mawhna hong bawlsak leh sattan in
41009046	Khe kimin, amaute than a sihlohna mei a mit lohna mund meilipi khukah hong kipaih sangin khe buisa-in nuntakna ah lut lecin nang ading a hoihzaw hi.
41009047	Na mittang hangin mawhna na bawl leh khelkhia in. Mittang kimin meilipi khukah hong kipaih sangin mit langkhat bek tawh Pasian gamah lut lecin nang adingin a hoihzaw hi.
41009048	Tua meilipi khukah “ ‘amaute than nangawn si lo-a, mei zong a mit ngei kei hi,’e
41009049	Mi khempeuh cisawh bangin mei tawh kisawh ding hi.
41009050	"Ci a lim hangin a alna mang leh bangci alkiksak thei ding na hi hiam? Note zong ci alin al unla, khat le khat na kilem un,” a ci hi.
41010001	Tua ciangin Jesu tua mun nusia in Jordan gal khat lam Judea kualah a pai hi. Ama kiangah mihonte va pai leuleu uh a, a hih ngei bangin amaute thu a hilh hi.
41010002	Pharisee-te pawlkhat va pai uh a, a zia-etna un, “Mikhat in zi a mak ding thukham tawh a kituak hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
41010003	Amah in, “Moses in note bang thu hong pia ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
41010004	Amaute in, “Mi khatin a zi a makna lai pia-a, a zi a nawkiksak theih nading Moses in a phal hi,” a ci uh hi.
41010005	Jesu in, “Na lungtang uh khauh lua ahi manin Moses in hih thukham note adingin a gelh ahi hi.
41010006	Ahi hangin Pasian in na khempeuh a piansak cilin amaute ‘numei le pasal-in a bawl hi.’a
41010007	‘Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm dinga,b
41010008	amaute gel sakhat a suak ding uh hi.’c Tua ahi ciangin amaute nih hi nawn loin khat ahi hi.
41010009	Tua ahi manin Pasian gawmsate mihing in khen kei ta hen,” a ci hi.
41010010	Amaute inn sungah a om kik uh ciangin, nungzuite in hih thu Jesu a dong uh hi.
41010011	Amah in, “Ama zi ma-a, numei dang khat a tenpih peuhmah a zi angkawmsan ahi hi.
41010012	Tua ciangin numei khat in a pasal ma-a pasal dang khat a tenpih leh tua numei angkawm a suak hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41010013	Jesu lawn dingin mipite in nau pangnote ama kiangah a paipih uh leh, nungzuite in amaute a na tai uh hi.
41010014	Jesu in a muh ciangin a lungkim kei hi. Amah in amaute kiangah, “Naupangnote ka kiangah hong paisak un, amaute dal kei un. Ahang in, Pasian gam i cih hih bangte aa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41010015	Thutak kong geninah, naupangno banga Pasian gam a sang lo peuhmah, tua sungah a lut ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
41010016	Tua ciangin amah in naupangnote a khutin tawi-a, a tunguah a khutte nga in amaute thupha a pia hi.
41010017	Jesu a paikhiat laitakin ama kiangah mi khat va tai-a, a mai ah khukdinin, “A hoih siapa aw, nuntak tawntungna ka luah nadingin bang ka hih ding kul hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41010018	Jesu in, “Bang hangin kei hoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian bek longal mi hoih khat beek a om kei hi.
41010019	‘Tual that kei in, ang kawm kei in, gu kei in, zuau teci pang kei in, khem kei in, na nu na pa pahtawi in,’d kici thupiakte na theihsa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41010020	Tuapa in, “Sia aw, tuate khempeuh ka neu tunga kipan ka zuihsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41010021	Jesu in amah enin it a, “Na khat na kisam lai hi. Pai-in, na neihsa khempeuh zuak inla mizawngte pia in. Tua hileh vantungah gou na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai inla kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
41010022	Hih thu hangin tuapa a mai a mual hi. Amah hau mahmah ahi manin lungsi dedu in a paikhia hi.
41010023	Jesu in a kim teng en kawikawi a, a nungzuite kiangah, “A haute Pasian gam a lut nading haksa na zen e!” a ci hi.
41010024	Nungzuite in Jesu thugente lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in, “Tate aw, Pasian gam lut nading haksa mahmah si!e
41010025	Mihau khat Pasian gam a lut ding sangin phim bilvang ah kala-oh thawl ding a baihzaw hi,” a ci hi.
41010026	Nungzuite in lamdang sa semsem uh a, “Tua hileh kua kihonkhia thei peuhmah ding hiam?” ci-in khat le khat a kikum uh hi.
41010027	Jesu in amaute en a, “Mihing adingin ahi thei lo mah ahi hi; ahi hangin Pasian adingin tua bang hi lo hi. Pasian adingin na khempeuh hi thei hi,” a ci hi.
41010028	Peter in ama kiangah, “Kote in na khempeuh nusia in nang kong zui uh hi,” a ci hi.
41010029	Jesu in “Thutak kong geninah, keima hang le lungdamna-thu hangin a inn, a sanggampate, a sanggamnute, a nu, a pa, a tate le a lote a nusia peuhmah in,
41010030	tu khanghunin a zah zakhat (innte, sanggampate, sanggamnute, nute, tate le lote—tuate tawh bawlsiatnate) le hong tung ding khanghunin nuntak tawntungna a ngah ding a kipelh kei ding hi.
41010031	Ahi hangin a masate tampi nunung ding uh a, a nunungte a masa ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41010032	Jesu mapi in amaute Jerusalem manawhin a pai laitakun nungzuite in lamdang vat sa uh a, amau zuite ahileh a lau uh hi. Amah in Sawm-le-nihte paipih tuamin ama tunga piang dingte a hilh hi.
41010033	Amah in, “Jerusalem dong i pai dinga, siampi makaite le thukham siate tungah Mihing Tapa a kilehhek ding hi. Amaute in amah thah dingin mawhpaih ding uh a, Gentile-te khut ah amah piakhia ding uh hi.
41010034	Amaute in amah zahko-in, cilphih in, satin, a that ding uh hi. Tua zawh ni thum ciangin amah a tho kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
41010035	Tua ciangin Zebedee tapate James le John a kiangah va pai uh hi. Amaute in, “Sia aw, kong nget peuhpeuh uh hong hihsak dingin kong deih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
41010036	Amah in, “Bang hong hihsak leng na deih uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41010037	Amaute in, “Na minthanna na ngah ciangin kote gel na taklam khat na veilam khat hong tusak in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41010038	Jesu in, “Nong nget uh na thei kei uh hi. Ka dawn ding hai dawn thei ding na hi uh hiam? Ahikeh kei kibaptise nading baptisena ah na kibaptise thei ding uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41010039	Amaute in, “Ka hih thei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Ka dawn ding hai na dawn takpi ding uh a, kei kibaptisena tua kibaptisena ah na kibaptise takpi ding uh hi.
41010040	Ahi hangin ka taklam ahikeh ka veilam a tu ding kei hong piak theih hi lo hi. Tua munte ah a tu dinga a kiseh kholsa mite bek tu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41010041	Nungzui sawmte in hih thu a zak uh ciangin James le John tungah a lungkim kei uh hi.
41010042	Jesu in amaute samkhawm a, “Gentile-te tungah gam-uka ki ngaih sunte, amau tungah kiliansak uh a, a uliante uh amau tungah kithuneisak uh hi, cih na thei uh hi.
41010043	Note tua bang na hi kei uh hi. Tua bang na hi sangsik-un note lakah a lian nuam peuhmah na nasem uh suakin,
41010044	a masa pen ahi nuam peuh, mi khempeuh sila ahi pelmawh kul hi.
41010045	Ahang in, Mihing Tapa nangawn ama na midangte a semsak ding hi loin, midangte na a sem ding le mi tampi tat nadingin ama nuntakna pia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41010046	Tua ciangin amaute Jericho a tung uh hi. Jesu le a nungzuite in mihon tampi tawh tua khuapi a nusiat laitakun mittaw khat Bartimaeus (tua pen, Timaeus Tapa) khut dawh-a ngenin lam gei ah a na tu hi.
41010047	Amah in Nazareth mi Jesu ahi lam a zak ciangin, “David Tapa Jesu aw, kei hong lainat in,” ci-in a kiko hi.
41010048	Mi tampi in amah tai uh a, daitaka a om nadingin a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin tuapa in, “David Tapa aw, kei hong lainat in!” ci-in a kiko semsem hi.
41010049	Jesu khawl a, “Amah sam un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in mittawpa kiangah, “Lung nuam in! Ding in! Amah in nang hong sam hi,” ci-in a galsap uh hi.
41010050	Amah in a puantualpi paikhia pahin dingto-a Jesu kiangah a pai hi.
41010051	Jesu in, “Bang kong hihsak ding deih na hi hiam?” ci-in amah a dong hi. Tua mittawpa in, “Rabbi aw, khua ka mu thei nuam hi,” a ci hi.
41010052	Jesu in, “Pai ta in, na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua khit phetin amah in khua mu thei pah lian a, lampi ah Jesu a zui hi.
41011001	Amaute Jerusalem zuana a pai laitak, Olive Vum panga om Bethphage le Bethany a tun uh ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite nih a mapaisak hi.
41011002	Amah in amaute kiangah “Na mai-ua khua ah pai le uh cin na lut phetun kuama tuan ngei nai lohna laano khat a kikhih na mu ding uh hi. Sut unla hong paipih un.
41011003	Mi khatpeuh in, ‘Bang hangin hih banga hih na hi uh hiam?’ ci-a hong dot leh, ‘Topa in a deihna om hi; hong puak kik pah ding hi,’ ci un,” ci-in a sawl hi.
41011004	Amaute pai uh a inntual kong pualam kongzinga kikhih laano khat a mu uh hi. Amaute in a sut laitakun
41011005	tua lai-a ding mi pawlkhat in, “Bang dinga tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
41011006	Amau gel in Jesu hilhsa bangin a dawn uh ciangin tua mite in amaute a paisak uh hi.
41011007	Tua laano Jesu kiang a tunpih uh ciangin a tungah a puantualpite uh phah uh a, amah a tungah a tu hi.
41011008	Mi tampi in a puantualpite uh lampi ah a phah uh hi. Pawlkhat in gamlak singhiangte khiakin lampi ah a phah uh hi.
41011009	A nung le a mai-a pai mihonpite in, “Hosanna!”a “Topa min-a hong pai pa in thupha a ngah hi!”b
41011010	"Hong tung ding i pa David kumpi gam in thupha a ngah hi!” “A sangpenna munah Hosanna!” ci-in a awng uh hi.
41011011	Jerusalem ah Jesu lutin biakinnpi ah a pai hi. Amah in na khempeuh en kawikawi a, ahi hangin khuanung lua ta ahi manin Sawm-le-nihte tawh Bethany ah a pai uh hi.
41011012	A zing ciangin Bethany nusia-a a pai laitakin Jesu a gil kial hi.
41011013	Theikung a teh pha khat a galmuh ciangin, a gah kha hiam cih en dingin a va pai hi. Thei gah hun hi lo ahi manin thei phung a tun ciangin a teh simloh bangmah a om kei hi.
41011014	Tua ciangin amah in theikung kiangah, “Kuamah in na gah ne ngei nawn kei ta hen,” a ci hi. A nungzuite in tua a cih a za uh hi.
41011015	Jerusalem a tun uh ciangin biakinnpi huangah Jesu lut-a, tua lai-a sum lei sum zuakte a hawlkhia hi. Sum khengte sabuaite le vakhu zuakte tutphahsaute sawnthalsak gawpin,
41011016	biakinntualte ah sumbuk van paipih ding kuamah a phal kei hi.
41011017	Amah in amaute hilh a, “ ‘Ka inn, minamte khempeuh thungetna inn kici ding hi,’c ci-in kigelh hi lo ahi hiam? Ahi hang-in note in ‘misuamte kua’d na suaksak tazen uh hi,” a ci hi.
41011018	Siampi makaite le thukham siate in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Jesu a thah theih nading uh lampi a zong uh hi. Ahang in, mihonpite khempeuh in ama thuhilhna lamdang sa mahmah uh ahi manin amaute in amah a kihta uh hi.
41011019	Nitak lam ciangin amautee khuapi pualamah a paikhia uh hi.
41011020	A zingsang ciangin amaute a pai laitakun tua theikung a zunga kipan a dinggaw-a om a mu uh hi.
41011021	Peter in phawka Jesu kiangah, “Rabbi aw, en in! Na hamsiat theikung dinggaw hi!” a ci hi.
41011022	Jesu in, “Pasian muangf un.
41011023	Thutak kong geninah, mi khatpeuh in hih mualpi kiangah, ‘Pai inla tuipi sungah kipai in,’ ci-in lunghei loin a cih bang piang ding hi, ci-a a up leh ama cih bang tektekin a piang ding hi.
41011024	Tua ahi manin ken kong geninah, na nget peuhpeuh uh ka ngah khin hi, ci-a na up uh leh na ngah ding uh hi.
41011025	Thungena na din laitakin mi khatpeuh tungah lungkimlohna na neih leh vantunga om na Pa in na mawhnateg hong maisak theih nadingin tuapa na maisak in.
41011026	Ahi zongin na maisak kei uh leh vantunga om na Pa un no mawhnate hong maisak lo ding hi,”h ci-in a dawng hi.
41011027	Amaute Jerusalem tung kik uh a, biakinnpi tualte ah Jesu a vak kawikawi laitakin siampi makaite, thukham siate le upate ama kiangah a pai uh hi.
41011028	Amaute in, “Bang thuneihna tawh hihte hih na hiam? Hihte hih nading thuneihna kua in hong pia hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
41011029	Jesu in, “Kei zong khat kong dong ding hi. Hong dawng un; tua ciangin ken zong bang thu neihna tawh hihte hih ka hi hiam, cih kong gen ding hi.
41011030	John baptisena koi pana hong pai ahi hiam? Vantung pan hiam, mihing tung pan hiam? Hong gen dih un!” ci-in a dawng hi.e
41011031	Amaute kikum uh a, “Vantung pan hi,’ ci leng, ‘Tua ahileh bang hangin amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
41011032	Ahi hangin ‘Mihing tung pan hi,’ ci leng lah..., (John pen mi khempeuh in kamsang taktakin sang uh ahi manin amaute in mipite a kihta uh hi.)” a ci uh hi..
41011033	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci-in Jesu a dawng uh hi. Jesu in, “Kei zong bang thuneihna tawh hihte ka hih cih kong gen kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
41012001	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah gentehnate zangin thu gen a: “Lenggui a ciing mi khat a om hi. A kimkotah dai kai-a, lengtui sukna khat toin, tausang khat a dawh hi. Tua khit ciangin a lenggui lo lokho pawlkhat khawhlawhsakin khual a zinsan hi.
41012002	A lak hun a tun ciangin lenggah khawm dingin lo-khawhlawhte kiangah a nasemte khat a sawl hi.
41012003	Ahi hangin amaute in tuapa na man uh a, satgawpin a guak ciahsak uh hi.
41012004	Tua ciangin amah in tuate kiangah nasem dang khat a sawl kik hi. Amaute in hih pa lu sat sakin a zahlaksak ngi-ingei uh hi.
41012005	Amah in zong nasem dang khat sawl kik leuleu a, amaute in tuapa a that uh hi. Nasem adang tampi a sawl hangin amaute in pawlkhat satin, adangte a that uh hi.
41012006	"Amah in a sawl theih ding a it a tapa khat a nei lai hi. A tawpkhakna ah, ‘Ka tapa zahtak buang ding uh hi,’ ci-in a tapa a paisak hi.
41012007	"Ahi hangin lo-khawhlawhte in, ‘Hih pa a gouluahpa ahi hi; hong pai un amah that ni, a luah ding teng ei aa suakpah ding hi,’ kici uh hi.
41012008	Tua ciangin amah manin that uh a, daipua lamah a paikhia uh hi.
41012009	"Tua bangin hileh lenggui lo neipa in bang a cih ding hiam? Amah hong pai-in lo-khawhlawhte thatin ama lo midangte a pia ding hi.
41012010	Hih Laisiangtho thu: “‘Inn lamte nilkhiat suang inntungkhuma suang a suak hi;
41012011	hih thu Topa hih hi a, eite mitmuh in piandang hi,’b cih sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
41012012	Hih gentehna amaute a langgenna ahilam thei uh ahi manin amah mat nading lampi a zong uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute in mihonpite kihta uh a, tua ciangin amah nusia-in a paimang uh hi.
41012013	Tua nung ciangin amaute in ama thugenin amah a mat theih nadingun Pharisee-te le Herod pawlte Jesu kiangah a paisak uh hi.
41012014	Amaute va pai-in ama kiangah, “Sia aw, nang mi thutak khat na hi lam ka thei uh hi. Kuamah maivil nei lo na hi manin, kuama thu-in na gamta kei a, Pasian thutak tawh kizui-in na hilh hi. Tua hi-a Caesar tungah siah piak tuak hiam, piak tuak lo hiam?
41012015	Pia ding ka hi uh hiam, pia lo ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in amaute a kineih a hina thei-a, “Bang hangin kei hong thangsiah na hi uh hiam? Denarius khat hong la unla hong veelsak dih un,” a ci hi.
41012016	Amaute in tua sumtang a paipih uh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Hih kua lim hi-a hih kua min ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Caesar aa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
41012017	Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Caesar aa te Caesar na pia unla, Pasian aa te Pasian na pia un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
41012018	Tua khit ciangin thawhkikna om lo hi, a ci Sadducee-te thu dong dingin Jesu kiangah a pai uh hi.
41012019	Amaute in, “Sia aw, Moses in, ‘Ta nei man loin a zi a sihsan pasal khatpeuh a om leh a sanggampa in tua meigongnu tenpihin a sanggampa ading tate neihsak hen,’ ci-in ko adingin na gelh hi.
41012020	Tu-in unau pasal sagih a om hi. A u pen in zi nei a, ta nei man loin a si hi. A nihna pa in
41012021	tua meigongnu tenpih a, ahi hangin amah zong ta nei man lo mah in a si hi. A thumna pa zong tua mah bang ahi hi.
41012022	A taktak in tua unau sagihte khat beek in ta a nei man kei uh hi. A tawpkhakna ah tua numei zong a si hi.
41012023	Tua ahileh tua numei in unau pasal sagih teng tenpih kim ahi ciangin thawhkikc ciangin amah kua pen zi hi ding hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
41012024	Jesu in, “Note in Laisiangtho ahi zongin, Pasian vang ahi zongin thei lo na hi manun khial hi lo na hi uh hiam?
41012025	Misite a thawh kik ciangin mopina le mokhakna a om kei ding hi. Amaute vana vansawltakte a bang ding uh hi.
41012026	Misite thawhkikna tawh kisai-in Pasian in, Moses kiangah, ‘Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian le Jacob’ Pasian ka hi hi,’d ci-a sawlbawk laka a genna thu Moses laibu sungah sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
41012027	Amah a site Pasian hi loin a nungtate Pasian ahi hi. Note nakpi takin na khial uh hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
41012028	Tua laitakin thukham siate lakah khat va pai-a amaute kam kinialna a za hi. Jesu in amaute hoihtakin a dawn theih lam tuapa in a theih ciangin, “Thupiakte khempeuh lakah koi a thupi pen ahi hiam?” ci-in amah a dong hi.
41012029	Jesu in, “A thupi penpen hih ahi hi: ‘Israel aw, ngai dih in i Topa eite Pasian in Topa khat ahi hi.e
41012030	Na Topa Pasian, na lungtang khempeuh, na hinna khempeuh, na lungsim khempeuh le na thahatna khempeuh tawh it in.’f
41012031	A nihna hih ahi hi: ‘Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in.’g Hihte gel sanga lianzaw thupiak khat beek a om kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41012032	Tuapa in, “Sia aw, na gente ahi takpi ahi hi. Pasian khat bek hi-a, amah longal Pasian dang a om kei hi, na cih a man hi.
41012033	Na lungtang khempeuh, na theihna khempeuh le na thahatna khempeuh tawh amah it ding le nang le nang na ki-it banga na vengte na it ding pen meihal biakna buppi le biakpiaknate sangin thupizaw mah hi,” ci-in a dawng kik hi.
41012034	Jesu in tuapa in pilna tawh dawng cih a theih ciangin ama kiangah, “Nang Pasian gam tawh na kigamla kei hi,” a ci hi. Tua-a kipan kuamah in thu dang a dong ngam nawn kei uh hi.
41012035	Biakinntualte ah Jesu in thu a hilh laitakin, “Khrist h pen David Tapa hi, ci-in bangci a thukham siate in gen thei uh ahi hiam?
41012036	David mahmah in: “Topa in ka Topa kiangah: ‘Na galte khempeuh na khe nuai-ah ka koih matengin ka taklamah na tu in’” ci-in Khasiangtho in na pulakkhia khin hi.i
41012037	“Amah pen David mahmah in ‘Topa’ ci ahileh bangci in ama tapa hi thei ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Mihon tampite in lungkimtakin ama thugen a ngai uh hi.
41012038	Tua bang a hilh kawmin Jesu in, “Thukham siate panin na kikem un. Amaute puantual deldal silhin vak kawikawi nuam uh a, vanzuakna munte ah pibawl ding a ut uh hi.
41012039	Synagogue-te sunga tutna thupi pente ah tu nuam diakin, pawite ah pahtawina munte ah a tu nuam uh hi.
41012040	Amaute in meigongte inn netum uh a, kineih khemin sauvei pipi thu a ngen uh hi. Tua bang mite a nasia penin kigawt ding hi,” a ci hi.
41012041	Sumpi khiatna mun mai-ah Jesu tu-in mihonpite in biakinnpi sumkholna sunga amau sumpi a khiat uh a vil hi. Sumhau tampi in sum tampipi a khia uh hi.
41012042	Ahi hangin azawng meigongnu khat va pai-a sumj tawmkha bek a man sumsank tangneu nih a khia hi.
41012043	Jesu in a nungzuite ama kiangah sama, “Thutak kong geninah, hih a zawng meigongnu in midang teng khempeuh sangin sumkholna ah tam a khia zaw hi.
41012044	Amaute in a hauhna lak panun a pia uh hi; tuanu in ahileh a zawnsa pipi-in ama kivak nadinga a neih khempeuh a khia hi,” a ci hi.
41013001	Biakinnpi pan Jesu a paikhiat laitakin a nungzuite khat in ama kiangah, “Siapa en dih ve! Hih suangtumte gol thei tabuang a! Hih innte thupi thei ngemngam mahmah hi!” a ci hi.
41013002	Jesu in, “Hih inn liante khempeuh na mu hiam? Suang khat tungah suang dang khat beek a kiciangsa-in a kinusia kei ding hi; a vekpi in a kicimmang ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41013003	Biakinnpi tawh a kigalsai Olive Vum tungah Jesu a tut laitakin Peter, James, John le Andrew-te in,
41013004	"Hihte cik cianga piang ding ahi hiam? Tua teng a tangtun kim nading bang lim hong hi ding hiam hong hilh in,” ci-in a dong sim uh hi.
41013005	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note kuamah in hong khem zawh loh nadingin kikem un.
41013006	Keima minin mi tampi hong pai ding uh a, ‘Keimah in amah ka hi hi’ ci teltalin mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
41013007	Galthu le galthuthang na zak uh ciangin na patau nai kei un. Tua bangte a piang pelmawh ding mah ahi hi. Ahi hangin hun beina hi nai lo hi.
41013008	Mi nam khat le nam khat kido dinga, gam khat le gam khat a kido ding uh hi. Mun tuamtuam ah zin lingin kialpi a tung ding hi. Hihte khempeuh nausuahnat kipatna ahi hi.
41013009	Note kigingsa in om pelmawh un. Tualsung vaihawmte khutah note hong ap ding uh a, synagogue-te sungah hong sat ding uh hi. Keima hangin gam-ukte le kumpite mai-ah teci in na ding ding uh hi.
41013010	Minamte khempeuh tungah lungdamna-thu kihilh masa pelmawh ding hi.
41013011	Note hong kimanin thu hong kisit peuhpeuh ciangin, bang ka gen ding hiam, ci-in ama-in lunghimawh khol kei un. A gen ding no hi loin Khasiangtho hizaw ding ahi manin tua huna hong kipia peuhpeuh na gen lel un.
41013012	"Unau khat le khat ahi zongin, pa in a ta ahi zongin, sih nading dongin a kilehhek ding uh hi. A nu a pa-te langah tate pang ding uh a, a thatsak ding uh hi.
41013013	Keima hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi. Ahi zongin a bei dongin a kipte kihonkhia ding hi.
41013014	"Note in ‘a hawmmangsak kihhuaina’a ab kisai loh na munah a ding na muh uh ciangin—a simte in theitel ta hen—Judea gama omte mual tungah tai uh hen.
41013015	A innkhuma omte kuamah kumsuk kei hen. Ahikeh inn sunga na khatpeuh la dingin lut kei hen.
41013016	Lo-a om kuamah a puantual-pi la dingin ciah kei hen.
41013017	Nau paiite le naungek nei numeite adingin tua nite a mulkimhuai lua ding hi!
41013018	Hih hun phalbi sunga a tun loh nadingin thu na ngen un.
41013019	Ahang in, Pasian in leitung a piansak cil-a kipan tu hun dong tua zah a om ngei lo le a om ngei nawn lo ding lungdonna nite ahi ding hi.
41013020	Topa in tua nite tomsak lo hileh kuamah a suakta zo kei ding hi. Ahi hangin amah in a teelsa teltuamte hangin tua nite a tomsak khin zo hi.
41013021	Tua hun ciangin mi khatpeuh in note kiangah, ‘En un, hih lai-ah Khristc om hi!’ ahikeh, ‘Hua lai-ah om hi!’ hong cih leh um kei un.
41013022	Ahang in, Khrist zuaute le kamsang zuaute hong kilang ding uh a, hi thei hi leh teelsate nangawn a khem nadingun limte le nalamdangte a bawl ding uh hi.
41013023	Tua ahi ciangin kigingsa in om un; na khempeuh a pian ma-in kong genkhol hi.
41013024	"Ahi hangin tua lungdon nite khit ciangin, “ ‘ni kimialsak dinga, kha a tang nawn kei ding hi;
41013025	van panin aksite kiasuk dinga, van-a om nate kilingsak ding hi.’d
41013026	"Tua hunin mite in Mihing Tapa a vanglianpi le a minthanna tawh meii lakah a paisuk a mu ding uh hi.
41013027	Tua ciangin amah in ama vansawltakte sawl dinga, lei kiu lite pan, leimongte panin van mongte dongin a teelsa mite a kaikhawm ding hi.
41013028	"Tu-in hih thute theikung panin na sin un: A hiang menga a teh a sel phetin khuakhal hong nai ta hi, cih na thei uh hi.
41013029	Tua mah bangin hih nate a piang na muh ciangun kongbiang mahmah dong hong nai ta hi, cih na thei un.
41013030	Thutak kong genin-ah, hih thute khempeuh a tun khit mateng hih khange mite a bei kei ding uh hi.
41013031	Van le lei a mangthang ding hi; ahi zongin ka thu a mangthang ngei kei ding hi.
41013032	"A ni ahi zongin a hun ahi zongin kuamah in a thei kei hi; vantunga vansawltakte nangawn in a thei kei uh hi; Tapa in zong thei lo a, ahi zongin Pa khat bek in a thei hi.
41013033	Kigingsa-in om un! Kigalging un!f Tua hun cik ciangin hong tung ding cih na thei kei uh hi.
41013034	Tua in khual zinkhia mi khat tawh kibang hi. Amah in a nasemte khutah a inn ap a, amau sep ding ciat sehsakin, kongcingpa kiangah a vil gige ding a vaikhak hi.
41013035	"Tua ahi ciangin inn neipa a tun kik ding hun—nitak hi ding hiam, zankim laitak hi ding hiam, akkhuan hi ding hiam, phalvak ciang hi ding hiam, cih thei lo na hi manun na vil gige un.
41013036	Amah thakhatin hong tung vat leh ihmusa a na om laitak uh kituaksak kei un.
41013037	Note kianga kong cih bangin a kuamahpeuh kiangah: ‘Vil un!’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
41014001	Tu-in Paisan-pawi le Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi ding ni nih bekin a sap laitakin, siampi makaite le thukham siate in, Jesu mansima thahlup theih nading lampi a zong uh hi.
41014002	Amaute in, “Mipite hong so kha ding ahi ciangin Pawi sungin hih kei ni,” a ci uh hi.
41014003	Bethany a Miphak Simon kici pa inn-a sabuai tungah Jesu kingama a om laitakin a manpha mahmah nard kia kibawl sathau namtui suangngo thawl khat tawi-in numei khat ama kiangah a pai hi. Tuanu in a thawl sukham a Jesu lutang tungah sathau namtui a buak hi.
41014004	Tua lai-a om mi kimkhat lungkim lo uh a, “Sathau namtui pammaih lel hi lo hiam?
41014005	Kizuak leh kumkhat thamana sanga tamzaw kikhawng ding hi, tua sum mizawngte piakhuai zaw hi,” a kici uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tuanu a taigawp uh hi.
41014006	Jesu in, “Hih nu bangmah cih dah un. Bang hang buaisak na hi uh hiam? Amah in kei tungah a kilawm na khat a sem khin hi.
41014007	Note tawh mizawngte a om khawm den ding uh a, na ut hunhunun amaute na huh thei uh hi. Ahi hangin kei note tawh ka omkhawm den kei ding hi.
41014008	Hih nu in ama hih theih bang a hih zo hi. Ka pumpi sathau namtui hong buah ciangin kei kivui nading bawlkhol ahi hi.
41014009	Thutak kong geninah, lungdamna-thu a kihilhna leitung mun khempeuhah tuanu a kiphawkna in ama hihsa thu zong a kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
41014010	Tua ciangin Jesu lehek dingin Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat, Judas Iscariot, siampi makaite kiangah a va pai hi.
41014011	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungkim mahmah uh a, ama tungah sum piak dingin a kamciam pah uh hi. Tua hi-a amah in amaute khutah Jesu a piak thei nading hun hoih a ngak gige hi.
41014012	Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi ni masa pen ni Paisan tuuno-a biakna a kipiak ngei hunin Jesu nungzuite in ama kiangah, “Paisan-pawi bawl nading koi lai-ah pai-in na bawlkhol le ung na deih hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
41014013	Tua ahi ciangin amah in a nungzuite nih sawla, amaute kiangah, “Khuapi sungah pai le uh cin tuibel khat a pua pasal khat tawh na kituak ding uh hi. Tuapa na zui un.
41014014	Ama lutna inntekpa kiangah, ‘Siapa in: Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan-pawi ka bawl nading, ka zintunna inndei koi lai ahi hiam, ci-in hong dongsak hi,’ va ci un.
41014015	Amah in van zat ding a kima om, a kipuahsa inndei tungnung a zaipi khat note hong lak ding hi. Tua lai-ah ei adingin na kisakhol un,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
41014016	Tua nungzuite gel paikhia uh a, khuapi sungah a lut uh ciangin Jesu gensa bang tektek in a mu uh hi. Tua hi-a amaute in Paisan-pawi bawl nading a na kisakhol uh hi.
41014017	A nitak ciangin Sawm-le-nihte tawh Jesu a tung hi.
41014018	Amaute sabuai ah kingamin an a nek laitakun amah in, “Thutak kong geninah, an ka nek khawmpih note lakah khat in kei hong lehhek ding hi,”a ci hi.
41014019	Amaute lungsi dedu uh a, ama kiangah, “Kei hi buang kei ning maw?” ci-in khat khatin a dong uh hi.
41014020	Amah in, “Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat ahi hi; tuapa kei tawh kuangkum-a anlum a diahkhawm pa ahi hi.
41014021	Ama’ thu a kigelhsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai ding hi. Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa a lehhek pa in gimna nak thuak nazen incia! Amah a piang vet lo hileh ama adingin hoihzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
41014022	Amaute in an a nek laitakun Jesu in anlum la-a, lungdam ko-in balkhama, a nungzuite pia in, “Hih, ka pumpi ahi hi, la unla ne un,” a ci hi.
41014023	Tua khit ciangin hai la-in lungdam ko-a amaute pia-in amaute in tua hai panin a dawn ciat uh hi.
41014024	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Hih in mi tampi adingb kibuakhia thukhunna ka sisana ahi hi.
41014025	Thutak kong geninah, Pasian gam sungah a thaka ka dawn ni mateng tu-a kipan lenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
41014026	Amaute in biakna la a sak khit uh ciangin Olive Vum manawhin a paikhia uh hi.
41014027	Tua khit ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “ ‘Tuucingpa ka sat dinga, tuuhonte kithehthang ding hi,’c ci-a kigelhsa bangin note na vekpi un na pukmang ding uh hi.
41014028	Ahi hangin ka thawh kik khit ciangin note mai Galilee ah ka na pai ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
41014029	Peter in, “Adang teng khempeuh a pukmang zongin kei ka puk kei ding hi,” ci-in a pulakkhia hi.
41014030	Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, tu ni, tu zan mahmah ak nihveid a khuan ma-in nang tektek in thumvei nong kitheih mawhbawl ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41014031	Ahi hangin Peter in, “Nang tawh sihkhawm ding ahi zongin nang kong kitheihmawhbawl ngei kei ding hi,” a ci teitei hi. Adangte khempeuh in zong tua mah a ci ciat uh hi.
41014032	Amaute Gethsemane kici mun ah pai uh a, Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Thungen-a ka pai kalin hih lai-ah na tu un,” a ci hi.
41014033	Amah in Peter, James le John-te tonpih a lungdong ngeungau-in a lungkham mahmah hi.
41014034	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Dahluatna in sih nading zah in hong zen hi. Hih lai-ah na om unla, na kigalging un,” a ci hi.
41014035	Tawmkha pailai-in lei-ah bok a, ahi theih leh tua hun tawh a kipelh nadingin thu a ngen hi.
41014036	"Abbae, Pa aw, nang adingin na khempeuh hi thei hi. Hih hai kei kiang panin hong lakkhiatsak in. Ahi zongin kei deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw hen,” a ci hi.
41014037	Tua khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah a pai kik leh amaute ihmu sa a om a mu hi. Amah in Peter kiangah, “Simon aw, ihmu na hi hiam? Nai khat sung beek kigalging zo lo na hi hiam?
41014038	Zia-etna na thuak loh nadingun kigalgingin thu na ngen un. Kha a ut hangin pumpi a thanem hi,” a ci hi.
41014039	Khatvei paikhia leuleu-a, a ngetsa mah bangin a ngen hi.
41014040	Amah a pai kik ciangin amaute ihmut suak lua uh ahi manin a ihmut laitak uh a tuak leuleu hi. Amaute in ama kiangah a gen ding uh a thei kei uh hi.
41014041	A thumveina va pai kika, amaute kiangah, “Note ihmu lailai-in tawlnga lailai na hi uh hiam? Pha zo ta! A hun hong tung ta hi. En un, mawhneite khut sungah Mihing Tapa a kilehhek hun hong tung petmah hi.
41014042	Tho un! Pai ta ni! Kei hong lehhekpa hih lai-ah hong pai ta hi!” a ci hi.
41014043	Tua banga a paupau laitak, Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat Judas a kilang hi. Siampi makaite, thukham siate le upate sawl namsau le khetbuk tawi mihon amah tawh a tonkhawm uh hi.
41014044	Tua a lehhekpa in, “Ka nappa pen amah hi ding hi; tuapa man pah unla, cingin paikhiatpih un,” ci-in amaute tawh lim a kilakkhol khin hi.
41014045	Jesu kiangah Juda paipah a, “Rabbi aw!” ci-in Jesu a nam hi.
41014046	Tua mite in Jesu lencipin a man uh hi.
41014047	Tua laitakin a gei-a dingte khat in a namsau dokin tulpipa nasempa a sat leh a bil langkhat a satkhia hi.
41014048	Jesu in, “Kei man dinga namsau le khetbuk tawh nong kuan zawzen uh, kumpi langpangte makai ka hi hiam?
41014049	Nisimin biakinnpi tualte ah thu ka hilh laitakin nong man kei uh hi. Ahi hangin Laisiangtho a tangtung pelmawh ding mah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
41014050	Tua ciangin mi khempeuh amah nusia-in a taimang uh hi.
41014051	Saihadial puanza khat longal puan dang a silh lo tangval khat in zong Jesu a zui hi. Amaute in amah a mat uh ciangin,
41014052	amah in a puanza nusia in a guaktang in a tai hi.
41014053	Amaute in tulpipa kiangah Jesu paipih uh a siampi makaite, upate le thukham siate khempeuh a kikhawm uh hi.
41014054	Peter in tulpipa inntual ciang tektek a kihal simsimin Jesu a zui hi. Tua laitakah amah a cingte tawh mei awi-in a va tukhawm hi.
41014055	Siampi makaite le Sanhedrin buppi in Jesu a thah theih nadingun langpangin paulap a zon uh hangin khat beek a mu kei uh hi.
41014056	Ama langah mi tampi dingin zuau teci a pan uh hangin a thugente uh a kituak kei hi.
41014057	Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat dingin ama langah hih zuau teci pang uh a,
41014058	"Amah in, ‘Mihing khuta kibawl hih biakinnpi ka susia dinga, mihing khuta kibawl lo adang khat nithum sungin ka lam kik zo ding hi,’ a cih ka za uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
41014059	Tua bang hi napi amaute teci panna a kituak kei lailai hi.
41014060	Tua ciangin amaute mai-ah tulpipa dingin Jesu kiangah, “Dawng lo ding na hi hiam? Na langkhata hihte tecipanna bang hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41014061	Ahi hangin Jesu in dawng loin a dai dide hi. Tua ciangin tulpipa in ama kiangah, “Nang Thupha Ngahpa’ Tapa Khristf na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong kik hi.
41014062	Jesu in, “Ka hi hi. Note in Thahat Pa taklama tu meiipi tunga hong paisuk Mihing Tapa na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41014063	Tulpipa in a puansilh balkek a, “Teci dang kul nawn ding ahi hiam?
41014064	Pasian a gendaina na za zo uh hi. Bang na ci ngaihsut uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in amah sihsak thamin a mawhpaih uh hi.
41014065	Tua ciangin pawlkhat in amah cilphih uh a, a mai tuamin a khuttum uh tawh tumin, “Hong gen in!” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin a cingte in amah tonpih in a sat uh hi.
41014066	A nuai innpi tualah Peter a om laitakin tulpipa nasem numeite khat a kiangah va pai hi.
41014067	Tuanu in Peter mei-awi a muh ciangin amah a va nai et mahmah hi. “Nang zong tua Nazareth mi Jesu tawh na kipawl hi,” a va ci hi.
41014068	Ahi hangin aman a nial hi. Amah in, “Na thugen ka thei kei-a, a pianzia zong ka thei beek kei hi,” ci-in kong pua ah a kihemkhia hi,g
41014069	Tua numei mah in tua lai-a om a muh ciangin a kima dingte kiangah, “Hih pa amaute lakah khat ahi hi,” a ci kik hi.
41014070	Amah in a nial leuleu hi. Tawlkhat khit ciangin a gei-a dingte in Peter kiangah, “Amau pawlte lakah khat na hi taktak hi. Galilee mi na hi ngel ve leh,” a ci uh hi.
41014071	Tua ciangin amah le amah kihamsiat in, “Na gen uh hih mipa ka thei peuhmah kei hi,” ci-in a tomlo hi.
41014072	Tua khit phetin a nih veinah ak a khuang hi. Tua ciangin Peter in Jesu in a ma tunga, “Ak nih veii a khuan ma-in thum vei nong kitheihmawhbawl ding hi,” ci-a a gensa a phawk hi. Tua ciangin amah ki-ip zo nawn loin a kapkhia hi.
41015001	Zingsang phalvak tungin siampi makaite in upate, thukham siate le Sanhedrin buppi tawh thukhensatna a bawl uh hi. Amaute in Jesu henin paikhiatpih uh a, Pilate khutah a tun uh hi.
41015002	Pilate in, “Nang Jew-te kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Ka hi hi, na cih bang ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
41015003	Siampi makaite in amah thu tampi tawh a mawhmat uh hi.
41015004	Tua ahi ciangin Pilate in, “Amaute in nang thu tampi tawh hong mawhmat uh na thei hi. Dawng lo ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41015005	Ahi hangin Jesu in dawng tuan lo lailai ahi ciangin Pilate in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
41015006	Tua hun lai-in pawi hun ciangin mipite nget thongkia khatpeuh a khahkhiat ding ngeina ahi hi.
41015007	Kumpi langdo-a, tualthatte tawh thong kiakhawm Barabbas kici mi khat a om hi.
41015008	Pilate kiangah mihonpite va pai uh a, a hih ngei banga a hih nadingin a ngen uh hi.
41015009	Pilate in, “Jew-te kumpipa no kiangah hong khah leng na deih uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41015010	Tua pen siampi makaite in Jesu a hazat manun ama khutah a tut uh ahilam a theih man ahi hi.
41015011	Ahi hangin Pilate in Barabbas a khahsak zawk nadingin siampi makaite in mihonpite a tawsawn uh hi.
41015012	Pilate in, “Tua ahileh Jew-te kumpipa na cih pa uh bang ka cih ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
41015013	Amaute in, “Kilhlum in,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
41015014	Pilate in, “Bang hangin maw? Amah in bang tatkhialhna nei ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Ahi hangin amaute in, “Amah kilhlum in!” ci-in a kinak ko semsem uh hi.
41015015	Pilate in mihonpite a lungkimsak nop manin amaute kiangah Barabbas a khah hi. Amah in Jesu a satsak khit ciangin kilhlup dingin amaute khutah a ap hi.
41015016	Galkapte in Jesu kumpi inn (tua pen gam-ukpa Innpi) ah paipih uh a, tua ciangin galkap company bup khat a sam uh hi.
41015017	Tua ciangin amaute in kumpi puan dupsan khat silhsak uh a, ling tawh kumpi lukhu khat phanin amah a khusak uh hi.
41015018	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Jew-te kumpipa aw, na khan sawt ta hen!” ci-in a otkhai uh hi.
41015019	Amaute in ciangkhutin a lu satsat uh a, cil a phihphih uh hi. Amaute khuk dinin amah a bia uh hi.
41015020	Amah a zahko khit uh ciangin kumpi puan dupsan suahkhiatsak uh a, ama puan a silhsak kik uh hi. Tua khit ciangin kilhlup dingin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
41015021	Alexander le Rufus-te pa, Cyrene pana Simon kici mi khat in gamsung panin tua lai a va tawn hi. Amaute in zawhthawh thu-in amah singlamteh a puasak uh hi.
41015022	Amaute in Golgotha (Luguh Mun cihna) kici munah Jesu a paipih uh hi.
41015023	Tua ciangin amaute in amah, paknamtui kha tawh kihel lenggahzu a pia uh hi. Ahi hangin a dawn kei hi.
41015024	Amaute in singlamteh tungah amah a kilh uh hi. Amaute in a puan hawm uh a, kua in koi tang ding cihna-in ai a lawn uh hi.
41015025	Amaute in amah a kilh laitakun nai thumna a sat hi.
41015026	Amah kimawhmatna-in JEW-TE KUMPIPA, ci-in theihsakna lai kigelh hi.
41015027	Amaute in amah tawh, misuamte nih a taklam khat, a veilam khat kilh uh a,
41015028	tua ciangin Laisiangtho gen: “Thukham palsatte tawh amah kisimkhawm hi” cih thu a tangtung hi.a
41015029	Tua lai a tawnte in amah engko in lupeisan uh a, “Petmah aw! Nang, biakinnpi susia a ni thum sunga lam kik ding pa,
41015030	singlamteh tung pan hong kumsuk inla, nang le nang hong kihon khia dih ve!” a ci uh hi.
41015031	Tua mah bangin siampi makaite le thukham siate in amaute lakah amah a zahko uh hi. Amaute in, “Amah in midangte honkhia zo a, amah le amah kihonkhia zo lo pi!
41015032	I mitin mu a i up theih nadingin hih Israel-te kumpipa, hih Khristb singlamteh tung pan hong kumsuk ta hen,” a ci uh hi. Tua mah bangin amah tawh a kikilh khawmte in zong a engko uh hi.
41015033	Tua gam bupah nai gukna-a kipan nai kuana dong khim a zing hi.
41015034	Nai kuana laitakin Jesu in, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabacthani?” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko hi. A khiatna in, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, bang hangin kei hong taisan na hi hiam?”c cihna ahi hi.
41015035	Tua lai-a ding mi kimkhat in a zak uh ciangin, “Ngai dih un, amah’n Elijah sam hi,” a ci uh hi.
41015036	Mi khat va tai-a, lenggahzu thuk sungah tuihup a diah khit ciangin ciang dawnah koihin Jesu dawn dingin a pia hi. Amah in, “Bangmah cih dah dih un. Amah lakhiasuk dingin Elijah hong pai hiam, en phot dih ni,” a ci hi.
41015037	Jesu nakpi-in kiko-a tua ciangin a hutawpna a sang hi.
41015038	Biakinnpi puanzak a lu pan a taw dong kikekin phel nih a suak hi.
41015039	Jesu mai-a ding zakhat-ukpa in ama kikona led a sihzia a muh ciang- in, “Hih pa Pasian Tapae hi takpi ei!” a ci hi.
41015040	A gamla sim pan numei pawlkhat in a galvil uh hi. Amaute lakah Mary Magdalene, James nauzaw pen le Joses nu Mary, le Salome-te a om uh hi.
41015041	Hih numeite in Galilee ah amah zui uh a, a kisapnate a sepsak uh hi. Jerusalem dong amah tawh a ton numei dang tampi zong tua lai-ah a om uh hi.
41015042	Tua ni, kiginkholh Ni, Sabbath tunma ni ahi hi. Tua hi-a ni niam kuan ciangin,
41015043	Pasian gam a ngak gige Vaihawmte lakah mi thupi khat, Arimathea mi Joseph Pilate kiangah hangtakin pai-a Jesu luang a va ngen hi.
41015044	Pilate in amah si zo cih a zak ciangin lamdang a sa hi. Amah in zakhat-ukpa samin, Jesu si khin takpi hiam, cih a dong hi.
41015045	Si khin zo takpi, cih zakhat-ukpa kam pan a zak ciangin a luang Joseph a pia hi.
41015046	Tua ciangin Joseph in saihadial puan pawlkhat lei-in siluang lakhia suka, saihadial puanin a tun khit ciangin suangpi a khuak han sungah a sial hi. Tua ciangin tua han kong vang suangtum khatin a khak hi.
41015047	Mary Magdalene le Joses nu Mary-te in ama kisialna mun a mu uh hi.
41016001	Sabbath ni a bei khit ciangin Mary Magdalene, James nu Mary le Salome-te in Jesu luang a zut nading uh gimnamtui a keng uh hi.
41016002	Nipikal ni masa ni zingsang tung ni suah khit phetin amaute hanah hawh uh a,
41016003	"Han kongvang khakna suangtum kuan hong likkhiatsak ding hiam?” ci-in khat le khat a kikum uh hi.
41016004	Ahi hangin a daktoh uh ciangin a lian mahmah tua suangtumpi a tukkhia khin zo a mu uh hi.
41016005	Amaute han sungah a lut uh leh, puantualpi pak silh tangval khat, a taklam-a tu mu uh a, amaute a patau uh hi.
41016006	Amah in, “Patau kei un, a kikilhlum Nazareth mi Jesu a zong na hi uh hi. Amah tho kik zo hi! Amah hih lai-ah om lo hi. A kisialna mun en un.
41016007	Ahi hangin pai unla nungzuite le Peter kiangah, “Note mai Galilee ah amah na pai ding hi. Ama hong gensa bang tektekin, tua lai-ah amah na mu ding uh hi,’ ci-in va gen un,”a ci hi.
41016008	Tua numeite lungmang le ling kawmsa-in han pan paikhia-in a tai uh hi. Amaute lau uh ahi manin kuama kiangah bangmah a gen kei uh hi.
41016009	Nipikal ni masa ni, zingsang tung, Jesu a thawh kik khit ciangin a sung pana dawi sagih a hawlkhiatna nu Mary Magdalene kiangah a kilang masa pen hi.
41016010	Tuanu pai-in amah tawh a omkhawm ngei, adah a kap laite kiangah thu a gen hi.
41016011	Jesu nungta-a amah in mu khin zo cih thu amaute in a zak uh ciangin a um kei uh hi.
41016012	Tua khit ciangin tuate lakah nih gamsung lam zuanin a pai laitakun amaute kiangah meltuamin Jesu a kilang hi.
41016013	Hihte gel kileh kik uh a, adangte kiangah a va koh uh hangin amau zong a um tuan kei uh hi.
41016014	Tua nung ciangin nungzui Sawm le khatte in an a nek laitakun amaute kiangah a kilang hi. Amah a thawh kik khit ciangin amah a mute genna a up loh teltalna hang uh le amaute uplahna hangin amaute a tai hi.
41016015	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Leitung mun khempeuh ah pai unla, a piansaksa khempeuh tungah lungdamna thu na hilh un.
41016016	Um-a a kibaptise-te peuhmah kihonkhia dinga, ahi hangin a um lo peuhmah a kimawhpaih ding hi.
41016017	Tua ciangin a umte ahileh hih limte in a zui ding hi: Keima minin dawite a hawlkhia ding uh hi; amaute pauthakte in a pau ding uh hi.
41016018	A khutun gul a man ding uh hi; sihtheihna gu a dawn uh hangin bangmah a ci peuhmah kei ding uh hi. Amaute in cinate tungah a khut uh nga ding uh a, amaute a dam ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
41016019	Topa Jesu in amaute a vaikhak khit ciangin amah vantungah kilato a, Pasian taklamah a tu hi.
41016020	Tua ciangin nungzuite paikhia uh a mun khempeuh ah thu a hilh uh hi. Topa in amaute seppih a, amaute a zui limte in ama thugen a kipsak hi.
42001001	Eite laka a tangtungsaa nate thu mitampi in na gelh khin zo uh hi.
42001002	A tunga kipan mit-a a mute le thu’ nasemte in eite kianga hong hilhsawm bang tektek uh ahi hi.
42001003	Tua ahi manin zahtakpipen Theophilus aw, kei mahmah in zong tuate khempeuh atunga kipan limtaka ka kantel sinsen khit ciangin a thu kizom diudeu-in nang adinga kong gelh ding pha ka sa hi.
42001004	Tua pen nang hong kihilhte a taktak a hina na theih nading ahi hi.
42001005	Judea gamah Herod kumpi ahi laitakin Abijah uk siampi pawl lakah Zechariah min nei siampi khat a om hi. Ama zi Elizabeth zong Aaron suan ahi hi.
42001006	Amau nupa Pasian muhna-ah mi thutang hi uh a, Topa thupiakte le zuih ding ngeinate khempeuh kawkbaanna om loin a zui uh hi.
42001007	Ahi hangin Elizabeth tasel ahi manin ta a nei kei uh hi; a nih un zong a kum uh tam lua ta hi.
42001008	Khatvei Zechariah uk pawl in na a sep hun, amah in Pasian mai-ah siampi na a sep sungin,
42001009	siampi ngeina tawh kizui-in Topa biakinnpi sungah pai-a gimnamtui hal ding ai a san uh leh amah in a ngah hi.
42001010	Gimnamtui hal hun a tun ciangin Pasian bia-a kikhawmte khempeuh in a pualam ah thu a ngen uh hi.
42001011	Tua laitakin Topa vansawltak khat ama kiangah kilanga, gimnam-tui halna biakna-tau taklam pangah a ding hi.
42001012	Zechariah in amah a muh ciangin kigaih a lau-in a koncip hi.
42001013	Ahi hangin vansawltakin a kiangah, “Zechariah aw, lau kei in na thungetna hong kiza zo hi. Na zi Elizabeth in tapa khat nei dinga, a min John na phuak ding hi.
42001014	Amah na lungnopna, na lungkimna hi dinga, ama suahna hangin mi tampi a kipak ding hi.
42001015	Ahang in, Topa muhna ah amah alian ding hi. Amah in leng gahzu ahi zongin a kibilh zu nam tuamtaumte ahi zongin dawn lo dinga, a suahb a kipan Khasiangtho tawh kidim ding hi.
42001016	Israel mite tampitak, Topa amau Pasian kiang a tunpih kik ding hi.
42001017	Tua hi-a amah in pate lungtang tate lamah kiheisak dinga, thumang lote, thumaan pilna lamah kiheisak ding, Topa adingin mite a baihsa-a, a koihkhol dingin Elijah kha le vangliatna tawh Topa mai-ah a pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
42001018	Zechariah in tua vansawltak kiangah, “Kei lah tek ta inga, ka zi lah kum tam lua ta hi. Hih thu bangci muan ngam ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42001019	Tua vansawltak in, Gabriel ka hi hi. Pasian kianga ding ka hi-a hih lungdamna thu nang tunga gen ding le nang hong hopih dingin kei hong kisawl hi.
42001020	A hun a cin cianga a tung takpi ding ka thugente um lo na hi manin hih thu a tun mateng pau thei loin na daicip ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42001021	Tua kikal sungin mipite in Zechariah na ngak uh a, biakinnpi sungah tua tanvei a om lamdang a sa uh hi.
42001022	A paikhiat ciangin amaute a hopih thei kei hi. Amah pau thei lo a, amaute lim bek tawh a khutin a hopih ciangin biakinnpi sungah amah mangmu ahilam a theikhia pan uh hi.
42001023	A nasep hun sung a cin khit ciangin innah a ciah hi.
42001024	Hih thu teng khit ciangin a zi Elizabeth gai-a kha nga sung a tang om hi.
42001025	Amah in, “Topa in kei adingin hih hong hihsak ahi hi. Ka mite lakah tu hun laitaka ka maimawlna hong lakkhiat sakin kei hong angvan hi,” a ci hi.
42001026	A kha gukna ciangin, Pasian in Galilee gam khuapi khat ahi Nazareth ah,
42001027	David suan, Joseph min nei pasal khat tawh kiteng dinga a kidongsa nungak bit khat kiangah vansawltak Gabriel a sawl hi. Nungak bit min Mary ahi hi.
42001028	Ama kiangah vansawltak pai-in, “Nang hong ki-angvan mahmah nu aw kong hopih hi! Topa in nang hong ompih hi,” a ci hi.
42001029	Ama thugente hangin Mary lungmang mahmah a, bangci bang hopihna hiam, ci-in lamdang a sa hi.
42001030	Ahi hangin vansawltak in ama kiangah, “Mary aw, lau kei in Pasian in nang hong angvan zo hi.
42001031	Nau na paii dinga tapa khat na nei ding hi; a min Jesu na phuak ding hi.
42001032	Amah lian dinga Sang Penpa Tapa kici ding hi. Topa Pasian in a pa David tokhom pia dinga,
42001033	amah in Jacob suante uk denin ama gam a bei ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42001034	Mary in vansawltak kiangah, “Kei nungak bit ka hi hi, hih thu bangci pian theih ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42001035	Vansawltak in, “Nang tungah Khasiangtho hong tung dinga Sang Penpa vang in nang hong sung ding hi. Tua ahi ciangin a suak ding misiangthopa, Pasian Tapa kicic ding hi.
42001036	Na tanaunu Elizabeth nangawn in a tek nungin ta khat nei dekta hi. Amah tasel a kici nangawn a gai kha guk pha zo hi.
42001037	Ahang in, Pasian in hih theih loh a nei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42001038	Mary in, “Kei, Topa nasemnu ka hi hi. Na cih bangin kei tungah piang ta hen,” a ci kik hi. Tua khit ciangin vansawltak in amah a nusia hi.
42001039	Tua hunin Mary kithawi-a Judah gam sung mualtung khuapi khat zuanin pai mengmeng a,
42001040	Zechariah innah lutin Elizabeth a hopih hi.
42001041	Mary hopihna Elizabeth in a zak ciangin ama sunga naungeek dianga Elizabeth Khasiangtho tawh a kidim hi.
42001042	Amah in: “Numeite lakah thupha ngah nu na hi-a, nang sung pana suakkhia ding naungek, thupha ngah ahi hi!
42001043	Ahi zongin bang hanga ka Topa nu kei kianga hawh ding zah dongin kei hong ki-angvan ahi hiam?
42001044	Nong hopihna ka zak phetin ka sunga nau ngeek lungdamin a diang hi.
42001045	Topa in ama tunga a gensate a tung takpi ding hi, ci-a a um numei in thupha ngah ahi hi,” ci-in ngaihtakin a awngkhia hi.
42001046	Tua ciangin Mary in: “Ka hinna in Topa phat a
42001047	ka Honpa Pasian ah ka kha a kipak hi.
42001048	ahang in a nasemnu tualniamna hong thudon hi. Tu-a kipan khang sawnsawnte’n thupha ngah nu hong ci ding hi;
42001049	hang in, Thahat Pa in kei ading na lianpipi bawl zo a – ama min siangtho hi.
42001050	Amah a kihtate tungah akhang akhangin ama lainatna zaam suksuk hi.
42001051	Amah in a khut tawh a thahatna lak hi; a lungsim tawnga kisatheite a thehthang zo hi.
42001052	Gam-ukte amau tokhom panin khiasuk a, ahi hangin a tualniamte lamto khin zo hi.
42001053	A gilkialte na hoihin taisak a, ahi hangin a haute a hawm ciahsak zo hi.
42001054	Amah in ama nasem Israel huh a,
42001055	i pu i pate tungah a gensa bangin Abraham le a suan a khaktea hehpih denden ding, a phawk gige hi,”a ci hi.
42001056	Elizabeth kiangah Mary kha thum bang a tam khit ciangin innah a ciah hi.
42001057	Elizabeth suah hun tunga tapa khat a nei hi.
42001058	Topa in ama tungah lainatna lianpi a lah lam a vengte le a tanaute in za-in a lungdampih uh hi.
42001059	A nigiatna ni-in tua naupang vun-at dingin amaute khempeuh va pai uh a, a min, a pa Zechariah tamsak dingin a kisa uh hi.
42001060	Ahi hangin a nu in, “Hi kei! John phuah ding ahi hi,” ci-in a genkhia hi.
42001061	Amaute in ama kiangah, “Na tanaute lakah tua min nei om lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
42001062	Tua ciangin a pa in naupang min ding bang phuak nuam hiam, cih amaute in khut tawh lim lakin a dong uh hi.
42001063	Amah in suangpek khat ngen in, “Ama min John ahi hi,” ci-a a gelh ciangin tua muna omte khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
42001064	Tua khit phetin a kam kihonga, a leigui kolin paukhia-a Pasian a phat hi.
42001065	A vengte khempeuh in piandang a sa mahmah uh hi. Judea gam mualtung tenga mite in zong hih thute khempeuh a gengen uh hi.
42001066	Hih thu a za peuhpeuh in lamdang sa uh a, “Tua ahileh hih naupang bangci mi hong hi tam?” ci-in a kidong ciat uh hi. Ahang in, Topa khutin amah a ompih gige hi.
42001067	A pa Zechariah, Khasiangtho tawh kidim a thu genin:
42001068	“Topa, Israel-te Pasian kiphat ta hen, bang hang hiam cih leh amah hong pai-in ama mite tankhia zo hi.
42001069	Ama nasem David suan sung panin eite ading, hotkhiatna kid khat hong potosak a,
42001070	(tanglai ama kamsang siangthote tungtawna a gensa mah bangin),
42001071	i galte le ei hong mudahte khut sung panin hotkhiatna ahi zongin,
42001072	i pu i pate tunga lainatna lak ding le ama thukhun siangtho phawk gige nading ahi zongin,
42001073	i pa Abraham tunga a ciamsa tua kiciamna:
42001074	i galte khut sung panin hong kihonkhia ding, lau lo-a ama na sem thei ding,
42001075	i nun sung teng ama mai-ah siang thona le thumaanna tawh ama na a sem ding i hi hi.
42001076	Tua ciangin nang, ka ta aw, Sang Pen-pa’ kamsangpa hong kici ding hi; a lampi sial dingin Topa mai-ah na pai dinga,
42001077	amaute mawhna maisakna tungtawna ama mite hotkhiat theihna piak nading ahi hi;
42001078	bang hang hiam cih leh i Pasian’ lainatna nem ngi-ingei hangin van pan sun nisuak i tungah hong tang dinga,
42001079	khuamial sung le sihna liim le khuamial sunga tengte tungah tangin, i khete lemna lampi a tawnsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42001080	Tua ciangin naupang khangto a, a lungsim a pumpi a hat hi; Israel mipite lakah a kilaak mateng gamlakah a teng hi.
42002001	Tua hun laitakin Rome khuapi uk bupah mi a kisim nading Caesar Augustus in thukip a pia hi.
42002002	(Hih in Syria gama Quirinius gam-ukpa ahi zawh kisimna a khatveina ahi hi)
42002003	Tua hi-a mi khempeuh amau khuapi ciat ah minkhum dingin a pai uh hi.
42002004	Tua ciangin Joseph zong Galilee gam Nazareth khuapi panin Judea gamah pai-a David gui le suan ahi manin David khuapi Bethlehem ah a pai hi.
42002005	Kiteng dingin a dotsa nausuak kuan Mary tawh min khum dingin tua khua ah a paikhawm uh hi.
42002006	Tua lai-ah a om laitakun nausuah hun tunga,
42002007	amah a tacil suakin tapa ahi hi. Amah in puanza bekin tuna, zintun innah amau ading inndei awng lo ahi manin tua naungek gan ankuang sungah a sial hi.
42002008	Tua nai-a lopaangte ah zan laitaka a tuute uh a vil tuucingte a om uh hi.
42002009	Amaute kiangah Topa vansawltak khat kilanga, amaute kimkotah Topa minthanna tangin a lau mahmah uh hi.
42002010	Ahi hangin vansawltak in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei un, mi khempeuh ading a lian mahmah lungdamna thu note kong puak hi.
42002011	Tuni-in David khuapi ah note ading Honpa khat suak khin zo hi; amah Khrista Topa ahi hi.
42002012	Note tungah hih lim ahi ding hi. Note in naungek khat puanzabek tawh kituna, gan ankuang sunga kisial na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42002013	Thakhatin tua vansawltak tawh, vantung galkap hon tampitak kilang zuah uh a,
42002014	"A sang penna-a Pasian minthang henla, leitunga ama angvan mite tungah lemna om ta hen.”ci-in Pasian a phat uh hi.
42002015	Vansawltakte in amaute nusia in vantungah a ciahsan uh ciangin tuucingte in, “Bethlehem ah pai-in Topa hong gensa hih thupiang va en dih ni,” ci-in khat le khat a kiho uh hi.
42002016	Tua ciangin amaute paikhia mengmeng uh a, Mary Joseph le gan ankuang sunga kisial naungek a mu uh hi.
42002017	Amaute in amah a muh khit uh ciangin hih naungek tawh kisai amaute kianga kigen thu a kizelsak kawikawi uh hi.
42002018	Tua hi-a tuucingte thugen a zate khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
42002019	Ahi hangin Mary in hih thute kemcing gige-in a lungtangah a ngaihsunsun hi.
42002020	Tuucingte ciah kik uh a, amaute tunga kigensa bang tektekin a zak uh le a muhte uh hangin Pasian phatin a minthangsak uh hi.
42002021	A nigiatna ni, ama vun-at hun ciangin, amah a kipaii ma-a vansawltak phuahsa bangin a min Jesu a phuak uh hi.
42002022	Moses thukham tawh kizui-in amaute a kisiansuah ding hun a cin ciangin Joseph le Mary in Topa tunga ap dingin amah Jerusalem ah paipih uh a,
42002023	(“Tapasal masa peuhmah Topa tungah ap ding ah hi”b ci-a Topa Thukham sunga kigelh bangin)
42002024	Topa Thukham sunga kigen tawh kizui-in “Vakhu kop khat ahikeh kawl vakhuno nih”c tawh biakpiakna a pia ding uh hi.
42002025	Tua hunlaitakin Jerusalem ah Simeon kici biakna hahkat mi thumaan khat a om hi. Amah, Israel-te kihehnemna ngakin a om hi-a ama tungah Khasiangtho a om hi.
42002026	Amah in Topa Khrist a muh matengin a si kei ding hi, cih Khasiangtho in ama tungah a laaksa ahi hi.
42002027	Kha sawlna tawh amah biakinnpi tualah a pai hi. Thukham ngeina in a kalh banga a bawl dingin a nu le a pa-te in naupang Jesu a paipih uh ciangin,
42002028	Simeon in amah la-in tawi-a Pasian phatin:
42002029	"Thuneipipen Topa aw, na kamciamsa bangin na nasempa tu-in lungnuamtakin khahkhiad ta in.
42002030	Ahang in, ka mitte inna hotkhiatna a mu zo hi,
42002031	tua pen mi khempeuh mitmuh ah na bawlkholhsa hi-a,
42002032	Gentile-te tunga kilaak nading khuavak le na mi Israel-te minthan nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42002033	Naupang nu le pa-te in amah tawh kisai-a thu kigente piandang a sa uh hi.
42002034	Tua ciangin Simeon in amaute thupha pia-a, a nu Mary kiangah, “Hih naungek in Israel gam sunga mi tampi a puk nading, a thawh nading le a kilanggenna lim dinga laitansa ahi hi.
42002035	Tua hi-a mi tampite lungtang ngaihsutna a pholak nading ahi hi. Tuateh nang hinna zong namsau in a sunlet ding hi,” a ci hi.
42002036	Tua lai-in Asher beh pana Phanuel tanu Anna kici kamsang numei khat a om hi. Amah tek mahmah ta hi. A pasal tawh a kiten zawh kum sagih bek nungta khawm uh a,
42002037	amah kum sawm giat le li a phak dong a meigong hi.e Amah in biakinnpi nusia ngei lo-a, sun le zan-in Pasian bia a, antangin thu a ngen hi.
42002038	Tua hun lianin amaute kiangah tuanu pai-in Pasian tungah lungdam thu puakin Jerusalem kitatkhiat ding a lam ente khempeuh tungah hih naupang thu a gen hi.
42002039	Joseph le Mary in Topa Thukham kalh khempeuh a bawl khit uh ciangin Galilee gam amau khua Nazareth khuapi ah a ciah kik uh hi.
42002040	Tua ciangin naupang khangto-a, a tha a hat hi; amah pilna tawh kidim a Pasian hehpihna a tungah a om hi.
42002041	Kum simin a nu a pa-te Paisan Pawi sim dingin Jerusalem ah a pai uh hi.
42002042	Amah kum sawm-le-nih a phak ciangin a ngeina omsa tawh kizui-in Pawi sim dingin a pai uh hi.
42002043	Pawi ven khit a nu a pa-te a ciah kik laitakun Jerusalem ah naupang Jesu a tam lai hi. Ahi hangin amaute in tua thu a phawk kei uh hi.
42002044	Amah tawh a tonkhawmin kingaihsun uh ahi manin ni khat lam a pai khin ta uh hi. Tua ciangin a tanaute le a lawmte lakah amah a zong pan uh hi.
42002045	Amah a muh loh uh ciangin a zong dingin Jerusalem ah a kileh kik uh hi.
42002046	Ni thum khit ciangin amah biakinnpi tualte-a siate lakah tu-in amaute thugen ngai-a thu dongin a om laitak a tuak uh hi.
42002047	Ama teltheihna le a dawnnate a za mi khempeuh in lamdang mahmah a sa ciat uh hi.
42002048	A nu a pa-te in amah a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi. A nu in ama kiangah, “Ka ta aw, bang hangin hih banga hong bawl na hi hiam? Na pa tawh lunghimawh in nang kong zongzong uh hi,” a ci hi.
42002049	Amah in, “Bang hangin kei hong zong na hi uh hiam? Ka Pa inn-a a om ding mah ka hilam thei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
42002050	Ahi hangin amaute in amau tunga a cihna thu a theitel zo kei uh hi.
42002051	Tua ciangin amaute tawh Nazareth ah paisuka, a thu uh a mang hi. Ahi hangin a nu in hih thute khempeuh a lungsim sungah a kemcing gige hi.
42002052	Jesu a pilna le a pumpi khanpha-in khanga Pasian le mite pahtakna a ngah hi.
42003001	Pontius Pilate, Judea gam ukpipa hi-a, Herod, Galilee gam ukpa hi-in, a sanggampa Philip, Iturea le Traconitis gam ukpa hi-a, Lysanias, Abilene gam ukpa ahi laitak– Tiberius Caesar in a uk zawh a kum sawm le ngana ahi hi.
42003002	Tua hunin Anna le Caiaphas tulpi sem hi uh a, tua hunlaitakin gamlaka om Zechariah tapa John tungah Pasian thu a tung hi.
42003003	Amah Jordan kimkot-a gamsung khua khempeuh ah pai-a, mawhnate maisak nading kisikna tawh kisai baptisena thu a hilh hi.
42003004	Kamsangpa Isaiah thute laibu sungah: “Gamlak-a kikopa aw in, ‘Topa ading lampi na sialkhol un, ama ading lampi na tangsak un.
42003005	Mualkuam khempeuh kivuk dim dinga, muallian le mualneu khempeuh kiniamsak ding hi. Lamkawi khempeuh kitangsak dinga, lamphok khempeuh kimaihtam ding hi.
42003006	Tua ciangin mi vannuai in Pasian hotkhiatna a mu ding uh hi.’ ci hi”a ci-a kigelh bang ahi hi.
42003007	Amah kibaptisesak dinga pai mihonte John in a muh ciangin, “No mualtan suante! Hong tung ding thangpaihna pana taikhia dingin kua in hong vauhilh ahi hiam?
42003008	Kisikna tawh kilawm gah na gah un. No le no in, ‘Abraham ka pa uh hi,’ kici kei un. Ahang in, Pasian in hih suangte Abraham tate a suaksak thei hi, cih kong hilh hi.
42003009	Sing phungte ah hei a om khin zo hi; gah hoih a gah lo kungte kiphukin mei sungah kikhul ding hi,” a ci hi.
42003010	Mihonpite in, “Tua ahileh bang ka hih ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
42003011	John in, “Puantungsilh nih a neithuah pa in, a nei lo pa khen ding a, tua mah bangin an nei pa in zong a hih ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42003012	Siahdongte zong a kibaptise dingin va pai uh a, “Sia aw, bang hih ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
42003013	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Na don ding zah val uh na dong kei un,” ci-in a gen hi.
