42003014	Tua ciangin galkap pawlkhat va pai uh a, “Ko zong bang ka hih ding uh hiam?” ci-in amah a dong uh hi. Amah in, “Mi sum na gumsuh kei unla, zuauthu tawh mi na mawk ngawh kei un. Na khasum uh tawh lungkim lel un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42003015	Mite in John hoh Khristb a hi kha tam ci-a a lungtang sunguah ngaihsun kakkakin, a ngak laitak uh ahi hi.
42003016	John in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Keimah in note tui inc kong baptize hi. Ahi hangin kei sanga a vanglian zaw khat hong pai ding hi; ama khedap khaute sut ding nangawnin ka cin zo kei hi. Amah in note Khasiangtho le mei-in hong baptize ding hi.
42003017	Amah in a buhlak ciangka tawi-in buhphual a hahsiang ding hi. Atak teng a sal sungah koih dinga, a sii teng ahileh a mit thei lo mei sungah a khul ding hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.
42003018	John in mipite thudang tampi tawh hanthawna, amaute kiangah lungdamna thu a hilh hi.
42003019	Ahi hangin John in, gam-ukpa Herod tatsiatna khempeuh le a sanggampa zi Herodias hangin amah a tai ciangin,
42003020	Herod in ama tatsiatnasa teng a behlapna in thong sungah John a khum hi.
42003021	Mi khempeuh a kibaptise uh ciangin Jesu zong a kibaptise hi. Tua ci-a thu a nget laitakin van kihong a,
42003022	vakhu bangin Khasiangtho pumpi nei in ama tungah a kumsuk hi. Tua ciangin vantung pan aw khat in, “Nang ka it ka Tapa na hi hi; nang tungah ka lungkim mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
42003023	Jesu thuhilh nasep a kipatin kum sawmthum bang a pha hi. A kingaihsutna ah amah Joseph tapa hi-a, Heli tapa Joseph,
42003024	Matthat tapa Heli, Levi tapa Matthat, Melki tapa Levi, Jannai tapa Melki, Joseph tapa Jannai
42003025	Mattathias tapa Joseph, Amos tapa Mattathias, Nahum tapa Amos, Esli tapa Nahum, Naggai tapa Esli,
42003026	Maath tapa Nagai, Mattathias tapa Maath, Semein Tapa Matathia, Josech tapa Semein, Joda tapa Josech,
42003027	Joanan tapa Joda, Rhesa tapa Joanan, Zerubbabel tapa Rhesa, Shealtiel Tapa Zerubabel, Neri tapa Shealtiel,
42003028	Melki tapa Neri, Addi tapa Melki, Cosam tapa Adi, Elmadam tapa Cosam, Er tapa Elmadam,
42003029	Joshua tapa Er, Eliezer tapa Joshua, Jorim tapa Eliezer,Matthat tapa Jorim, Levi tapa Matthat,
42003030	Simeon tapa Levi, Judah tapa Simeon, Joseph tapa Judah, Jotham tapa Joseph, Eliakim tapa Jonam,
42003031	Melea tapa Eliakim, Menna tapa Melea, Mattatha tapa Menna, Nathan tapa Mattatha, David tapa Nathan,
42003032	Jesse tapa David, Obed tapa Jesse, Boaz tapa Obed, Salmond tapa Boaz, Nahshon tapa Salmon,
42003033	Amminadab tapa Nahshon, Rame tapa Aminadab, Hezron tapa Ram, Perez tapa Hezron, Judah tapa Perez,
42003034	Jacob tapa Judah, Isaac tapa Jacob,Abraham tapa Isaac, Terah tapa Abraham, Nahor tapa Terah,
42003035	Serug tapa Nahor, Reu tapa Serug, Peleg tapa Reu, Eber tapa Peleg, Shelah tapa Eber,
42003036	Cainan tapa Shelah, Arphaxad tapa Kainan, Shem tapa Arphaxad, Noah tapa Shem, Lamech tapa Noah,
42003037	Methuselah tapa Lamech, Enoch tapa Methuselah, Jared tapa Enoch, Mahalalel tapa Jared, Cainan tapa Mahalalel,
42003038	Enosh tapa Cainan, Seth tapa Enos, Adam tapa Seth. Pasian tapa Adam.
42004001	Jesu Khasiangtho tawh kidimin, Jordan panin ciah kika Kha in amah gamlakah a pi hi.
42004002	Tua lai-ah dawimangpa in ni sawmli sung a zia-et hi. Tua hun sungin amah in bangmah ne lo a, tua nite a bei khit ciangin a gil kial hi.
42004003	Dawimangpa in ama kiangah, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hileh hih suang, anlum suaksak in,” a ci hi.
42004004	Jesu in, “‘Mihingte anlum bekin nungta lo hi,’a ci-in kigelh hi.” ci-in a dawng hi.
42004005	Dawimangpa in munsang khatah amah paipih a, leitunga om kumpi gamte khempeuh thakhatin a lak hi.
42004006	Ama kiangah, “Thuneihna le a thupina teng khempeuh kei hong kipia zo hi. Ka piak nop peuh pia thei ka hi manin nang kong pia ding hi.
42004007	Tua ahi ciangin kei hong bia peuh lecin a vekin nang aa hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
42004008	Jesu in, “‘Na Topa Pasian bia inla ama na bek sem in,’b ci-in kigelh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42004009	Dawimangpa in amah Jerusalem ah paipih a biakinnpi khum dawnah a dingsak hi. Amah in, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hileh hih lai panin tuaksuk in.
42004010	Bang hang hiam cih leh: “ ‘Nang tawh kisai-in limtaka nang hong cing dingin amah in a vansawltakte thu pia ding hi:
42004011	na khepek suang tawh na tahkhak loh nadingin, amaute in a khut uh tawh nang hong domto ding uh hi,’c ci-in kigelh hi,” a ci hi.
42004012	Jesu in, “‘Na Topa Pasian na zia-et kei in,’d ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42004013	Dawimangpa in hih zia-etna teng khempeuh a man khit ciangin hun hoih a om kik mateng amah a nusia hi.
42004014	Jesu, Kha vangliatna tawh Galilee ah ciah kika, ama thu gamsung khua khempeuh ah a kizel hi.
42004015	Amaute synagogue-te sungah thu hilh a, mikim in amah a phat uh hi.
42004016	Amah a khanna khua Nazareth ah pai-a, ama ngeina bangin Sabbath ni-in synagogue ah a pai hi. Amah laisim dingin a dingto hi.
42004017	Kamsangpa Isaiah laizial amah kipia hi. Amah in tua laizial a phel leh:
42004018	"Mizawngte tunga lungdamna thu hilh dingin keimah sathau hong nilh khin zo ahi manin, Topa Kha ka tungah a om hi. Amah in thongkiate suaktasak ding, mittawte khua musak ding, a kinengcipte khahkhia ding,
42004019	Topa angvanna kum a tangko dingin, kei hong sawl zo hi,”e ci-a kigelhna mun a mu hi.
42004020	A sim khit ciangin laizial zialin sawltakpa pia-in a tu hi. Jew-te synagogue sunga om mi khempeuh in amah mitkhah loin a en uh hi.
42004021	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Tuni-in hih Laisiangtho note zakin a tangtung hi,” a ci hi.
42004022	Mi khempeuh in amah phatgen in a kam pana kamngaihte lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih pa Joseph tapa hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
42004023	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “‘Zato mangpa aw, nang le nang kidamsak in! Na khankhiatna Capernaum a na hih ka zakte uh hih lai-ah zong hong hih dih in,’ ci-in hih paunak tawh nong bulh tektek ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42004024	Amah in, “Thutak kong geninah, ama khua-a kisang kamsang khat beek a om kei hi.
42004025	Elijah hun lai-in kum thum le kum lang sung van kikhak-a, gamsung khempeuh ah a nasia mahmah kialpi a tun laitakin Israel gamah meigong tampi om hi, cih mantakin kong gen hi.
42004026	Tua hi napi Sidon kual Zarephath a meigongnu kiang longal adangte kiangah Elijah a kisawl kei hi.
42004027	Kamsangpa Elisha hun lai-in zong Israel gamah phakf natna a vei tampi a om hi. Tua hi napi Syria mi Naaman bek longal adang khat beek a kisiangsak kei hi,” ci-in a gen a zom lai hi.
42004028	Synagogue sunga om mite khempeuh in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lungham uh hi.
42004029	Amaute dingkhia in, khuapi pua-ah amah hawlkhia uh a, kenah khiatsuk dingin tua khuapi kiphuhna mualdawn kil ah amah a paipih uh hi.
42004030	Ahi hangin amah mihonpite kawmlak tawnin a gelkhia hi.
42004031	Tua ciangin Galilee gam khuapi khat, Capernaum ah paisukin Sabbath ni-in mite kiangah thu a hilh hi.
42004032	Ama thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a thuhilhna in thuneihna a nei hi.
42004033	Synagogue sungah kha gilog lut mi khat a om hi. Tuapa in a aw neihzah in,
42004034	“Ehei! Nazareth mi Jesu aw, kote bang hong cih nuam na hi hiam? Kote susia dingin hong pai na hi hiam? Nang kua na hi hiam, cih kong thei hi – Pasian’ Mi Siangtho na hi hi!” ci-in a kiko hi.
42004035	Jesu in khauhtakin, “Pau kei in! Ama sung pan paikhia in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Tua ciangin dawi in amaute khempeuh mai-ah tuapa a puksak khit ciangin amah liamsak loin a paikhia hi.
42004036	Mi khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, “Hih thuhilhna bang ahi hiam? Thuneihna le vang tawh kha gilote thu a piak ciangin paikhia mawk uh hi!” khat le khat a kici uh hi.
42004037	Tua ciangin tua kuam kimkot tengah ama thu a kizel hi.
42004038	Synagogue inn panin Jesu paikhia a, Simon innah a hawh hi. Tua laitakin Simon sungnu nattun gim mahmah a, Jesu in amah a huh nading amaute in a ngen uh hi.
42004039	Tua ahi ciangin tuanu tungah kun a, nattun natna a tai leh a natna in amah nusiapah hi. Amah tho in amaute a zindo hi.
42004040	Nitum ciangin mipite in, natna tuamtuam a neite Jesu kiangah va paipih uh a, amah in amaute tungah khut nga kimin a damsak hi.
42004041	Tua tham loin mi tampite sung pan dawite paikhai a, “Nang Pasian Tapa na hi hi!” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Ahi hangin amah in amaute a tai hi. Tua dawite in amah Khristh hi, cih thei uh ahi manin amaute pau ding Jesu in a phal kei hi.
42004042	Khuavak ciangin Jesu gamdaihna munah a pai hi. Mite in amah zong uh a, ama omna munah a tun uh ciangin amaute nusia lo dingin a kho uh hi.
42004043	Ahi hangin amah in, “Pasian gam lungdamna thu hilh dingin kei hong kisawl ahi manin khua dangte ah zong ka hilh pelmawh ding hi,” a ci hi.
42004044	Tua hi-a, amah in Judeai gam synagogue-te sungah thu a hilhhilh hi.
42005001	Ni khat Gennesareta tuilipi gei-ah Jesu a din laitakin a kimah mihonpi va kikhawmin Pasian thu a ngai uh hi.
42005002	Tua laitakin a lente uh a sawp ngabengte in tuili monga a nusiat uh gunkuang nih amah in a mu hi.
42005003	Simon’ gunkuang tungah amah kahto in sehtak pan tawm a khinphei dingun a gen hi. Tua ciangin amah tu-a, gunkuang panin thu a hilh hi.
42005004	A thu hilh a man khit ciangin Simon kiangah, “Tui thuk lamah hot phei inla na lente khiasukb in,” a ci hi.
42005005	Simon in, “Topa aw, zan thapai-in khuhkhuh napi bangmah ka man kei uh hi. Ahi zongin nang cih ahi manin ka khiasuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
42005006	Amaute in tua banga a hih uh ciangin ngasa tam awk lua ahi manin a lente uh a kikek dektak hi.
42005007	Tua ciangin gunkuang khat pen-a om a lawmte uh pai-in amau huh dingun a khutvan uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute pai uh a gunkuangte gel sungah a koih uh ciangin dim lua ahi manin a tum dektak hi.
42005008	Simon Peter in hih a muh ciangin Jesu mai takah bokin, “Topa aw, kei kiang pan paikhia in; mawhdim mi ka hi hi!” a ci hi.
42005009	Ahang in, ngasa tua zahta a mat uh amah le a pawlte khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
42005010	Zebedee tate James le John-te, Simon lawmte in zong lamdang a sa uh hi. Tua ciangin Jesu in Simon kiangah, “Lau kei in; tu-a kipan mihing na man ding hi,” a ci hi.
42005011	Tua ciangin amaute in a gunkuangte uh tuigei-ah kaito uh a, na khempeuh nusia in amah a zui uh hi.
42005012	Khuapite khatah Jesu a om laitakin phakc natna in a pumtuam mi khat va pai hi. Tuapa in Jesu a muh ciangin leitualah khupbawh in, “Topa aw, ut peuh lecin nong siang-sak thei hi,” ci-in a thum hi.
42005013	Jesu in a khut zanin tuapa lawng a, “Ka ut hi, siang ta in!” a ci hi. Tua khit phetin phak natna in amah a nusia pah hi.
42005014	Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Kuama kiangah gen kei in, ahi hangin pai-in siampipa kiangah va kilak inla, amaute tungah teci panna in Moses in na sian nadinga hong thupiak na biakpiakna va pia in,” ci-in thu a pia hi.
42005015	Tua hi napi ama thu kizel semsem a, ama thugen ngai ding le a natnate uh a damsak ding deihin mihonpite a va pai uh hi.
42005016	Ahi hangin Jesu in gamdaihna munte ah kihemkhia zelin thu a ngen hi.
42005017	Ni khat Jesu in thu a hilh laitakin Galilee gam khuaneu khempeuh pan, Judea le Jerusalem pana pai Pharisee-te le thukham siate tua lai-ah a tu uh hi. Cinate a damsak nading Topa vangliatna ama adingin a om hi.
42005018	Mi pawlkhat in pumzaw khat phek tawh zawngin va paipih uh a, inn sungah tumpih in Jesu mai-a ngak ding a hanciam uh hi.
42005019	Mihonpite hangin Jesu kiang a tut theih nading uh lampi a muh theih loh uh ciangin innkhumah kahto in leisekpekte phelkhia uh a, mihonpite laizang, Jesu mai santakah a phekin a khai suk uh hi.
42005020	Jesu in amaute upna a muh ciangin, “Lawm aw, na mawhna kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
42005021	Pharisee-te le thukham siate in, “Pasian a gendai hih mipa kua ahi hiam? Pasian longal kua in mawhna maisak thei ahi hiam?” ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi.
42005022	Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei a, “Note in bang hangin na lungsim uhah hih thute ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
42005023	‘Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,’ cih ding le ‘Tho inla pai in,’ cih ding koi baihzaw hiam?
42005024	Ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in hih leitungah mawh maisak theih nading thu nei hi, cih na theih nadingun...,” a cih khit ciangin pumzawpa kiangah, “Tho-in, na phek la inla, innah ciah in, kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
42005025	Tua khit phetin amah amaute mai-ah dingto pah a, ama kizawnna a lak khit ciangin innah ciah a Pasian a phat hi.
42005026	Mi khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uh a Pasian a phat uh hi. Amaute in piandang sa lua mahmah uh a, “Tuni-in a ciamtehtak thute i mu zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
42005027	Tua khit ciangin Jesu a paikhiat leh siahdonna bukno-a tu Levi min nei siahdongpa khat a mu hi. Jesu in ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a cih ciangin
42005028	Levi dingto a na khempeuh nusia in amah a zui hi.
42005029	Tua ciangin Levi in a innah Jesu ading anvakna pawi khat a bawl hi. Siahdongte hon tampi le midang tampi in amaute tawh an a nekhawm uh hi.
42005030	Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le amau pawlmi thukham siate in a nungzuite kiangah, “Bang hangin note in siahdongte le ‘mawhneite’ tawh nekhawm dawnkhawm na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a phunsan uh hi.
42005031	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Cinate siavuan kisam uh a, cidamte kisam lo uh hi.
42005032	Thumaante sam dinga hong pai hi loin, mawhneite kisiksak dinga hong pai ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
42005033	Amaute in ama kiangah, “John nungzuite le Pharisee-te nungzuite in an a tan zelzel uh hangin nang nungzuite in a nene a dawndawn uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
42005034	Jesu in, “Zineipa tawh a omkhawm kimlai a lenglate in bangci-in an tang thei ding uh ahi hiam?
42005035	Ahi hangin zineipa amaute kiang pan a kilakkhiat hun hong tung ding hi. Tua ni ciangin amaute in an tang ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42005036	Amah in amaute kiangah gentehna gen a: “Kuamah in puanthak eukhia in puanlui a thuap kei hi. Tua bangin kihih leh puan thak kimlai eukhia dinga tua puanthak bek le a lui a kituak kei ding hi.
42005037	Savun-um lui sungah lenggahzu thak kuamah in thun ngei lo hi. Tua bangin kithun leh savun-um kitamin lenggahzu bua dinga savun-um kisia ding hi.
42005038	Tua bang hizaw loin savun-um thak sungah lenggahzu thak kithun pelmawh zaw ding hi.
42005039	Tua ciangin lenggahzu kumlui a dawnsa peuhmah in ‘A kumlui mah geii zaw’ sa uh ahi manin lenggahzu thak a deih zaw kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
42006001	Sabbath ni khat Jesu buhlei tawnin a pai hi. Nungzuite in buhvui zutin a khut sunguah nuai-in a takte a ne uh hi.
42006002	Pharisee-te pawlkhat in, “Bang hangin Sabbath ni-in thukham tawh kituak lo hih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
42006003	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “David le a pawlte a gilkial laitakun bang hih uh cih sim ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
42006004	Pasian inn sungah lutin siampite bek nek dinga kiphal a ki-apsa anlum ne in, a pawlte zong a pia hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42006005	Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Mihing Tapa, Sabbath’ Topa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42006006	Sabbath ni dang khat synagogue sungah pai-a thu a hilh laitakin a khut taklam a teem mi khat a om hi.
42006007	Pharisee-te le thukham siate in Jesu a mawhmat nop manun Sabbath ni-in cina a damsak kha hiam, ci-in a vil gige uh hi.
42006008	Ahi hangin Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei ahi manin khutteempa kiangah, “Tho inla mi khempeuh mai ah ding dih in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Tua ciangin amah thoin tua lai-ah a ding hi.
42006009	Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Sabbath ni-in a sia hih ding le a pha hih ding, nuntakna hot khiat ding le nuntakna suksiat ding koi pen thukham tawh kituak zaw ahi hiam, cih kong dong hi,” a ci hi.
42006010	Amah in amaute khempeuh en kawikawi a, tua ciangin tuapa kiangah, “Na khut zan in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Amah in a khut a zan leh a khutsa a dim kik phitphet hi.
42006011	Ahi hangin amaute lungham uh a, Jesu bangci hih ding cih thu khat le khat a .kikum uh hi.
42006012	Tua hunlai ni khat, thungen dingin Jesu mualtungah kahto a, zan khuavakin Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.
42006013	Zingsang ciangin ama kiangah a nungzuite sama, sawm le nih telkhia-in sawltakpi, ci-in a min vawh hi.
42006014	Tuate in: Simon (Peter min a phuah) le a sanggampa Andrew, James, John, Philip, Bartholomew,
42006015	Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus tapa James, Zealot kici Simon,
42006016	James tapa Judas le lehhekpa Judas Iscariot te ahi uh hi.
42006017	Amaute tawh amah tonkhawm sukin munzang khatah a ding hi. Ama nungzui mihon tampi le Judea gam khempeuh pan ahi zongin, Jerusalem le Tyre le Sidon le tuipi dung pan ahi zongin mi tampitak,
42006018	ama thu a ngai ding le a cinate uh a damsak nading deihin tua lai-ah a na om uh hi. Kha giloa in a thuaksiatsakte kidamsakin,
42006019	ama tung panin vang paikhia a, cinate khempeuh dam siangsak ahi manin mi khempeuh in amah lawn a sawm uh hi.
42006020	Amah in a nungzuite en a: “A zawng note thupha ngah na hi uh hi, ahang in, Pasian gam nomau aa ahi hi
42006021	Tu laitaka gilkial note thupha ngah na hi uh hi, ahang in, hong kivak kham ding hi. Tu laitaka kap note thupha ngah na hi uh hi, ahang in, na nui ding uh hi.
42006022	Mite in note hong mudah uh a, Mihing Tapa hangin amaute in note hong puaseh in, hong engko in na min uh siasak a, hong nolh uh ciangin thupha ngah na hi uh hi.
42006023	"Vantungah no ading pahtakman lian ahi manin, tua ni-in kipakin lungdamin diang un. Ahang in, tua mah bangin a pu a pa-te un kamsangte na bawl zo uh hi.
42006024	"Ahi hangin a hau note, gimna na thuak ding uh hi, ahang in, na nuamsa khin zo uh hi.
42006025	Tu laitaka an kham note, gimna na thuak ding uh hi, ahang in, na gilkial ding uh hi. Tu laitaka nui note, gimna na thuak ding uh hi, ahang in, dah in na kap ding uh hi.
42006026	Mi khempeuh in note hong phatgen uh ciangin gimna na thuak ding uh hi, ahang in, na pu na pa-te un kamsangzuaute tua bangin a hih uh hi.
42006027	"Ahi hangin ka thugen a za mite tungah kong hilh hi: Na galte na it in, hong mudahte tungah a hoih na bawl in;
42006028	nang hong samsiate thupha na pia inla, hong bawlsiate ading thu na ngetsak in.
42006029	Mi khatpeuh in na pang hong bet leh a lang lam zong na dawh in. Mi khatpeuh in na puantualpi hong laksak leh na puantungsilh a lak ding kham kei in.
42006030	Hong ngente khempeuh na pia inla, na neihsa hong laksak peuhpeuh kiangah bangmah na ngen kik kei in.
42006031	Nang tunga hong kibawl ding na deih bangin midangte tungah na bawl in.
42006032	"No hong itte bek na it uh leh bang lawhtak ding na hi uh hiam? ‘Mawhneite’ nangawn in amau a itte it uh hi.
42006033	No tunga a hoih hong bawlte tung bekah a hoih na bawl uh leh bang lawhtak ding na hi uh hiam? ‘Mawhneite’ nangawn in tua bangin hih uh hi.
42006034	Hong loh kik dinga na lamette bek uh na leitawisak uh leh tua in nang bang hong lawhtaksak tuan ding ahi hiam? ‘Mawhneite’ nangawn in a cinga loh kik ding a lamet uh ‘mawhneite’ leitawisak uh hi.
42006035	Ahi hangin note na hi uh leh na galte uh itin, amaute tungah a hoih bawl unla ngah kik ding khat beek lamen loin na leitawisak un. Tua ciangin na pahtakman uh lian dinga, Sang Penpa tate na hi ding uh hi. Ahang in, amah nuamna mel a thei lote le a tatsiate tungah a migi hi.
42006036	Na Pa un a lainat theih bangin no zong na lainat thei un.
42006037	Thu na khen kei un, no tungah zong hong kikhen kei ding hi. Na mawhpaih kei un, no zong hong kimawhpaih lo ding hi. Na maisak un, no zong hong kimaisak ding hi.
42006038	Pia un, no zong hong kipia ding hi. No tehna dimvum tham lo kinengcipin kitattat-a, a dimletin na anguah hong kisung ding hi. Ahang in, note zat tehna tawh no ading hong kitehsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42006039	Amah in amaute kiangah hih gentehna gen a: “Mittaw khat in mittaw dang khat bangci lamhilh thei ding ahi hiam? A nih un leihawm ah kia lo ding uh ahi hiam?
42006040	A sin mi in a siapa sangin theizaw lo hi, ahi hangin cingtaaktaka a kisinsak peuhmah a siapa mah tawh kibang ding hi.
42006041	"Nang mittang-a singpek phawkkha loin na sanggampa mittang a singvui them bang dinga en na hi hiam?
42006042	Nang mahmah in na mittang a singpek mu thei lo napi na sanggampa kiangah, ‘Sanggam aw, na mit-a ninthem hong lakkhiatsak ning,’ bangci cih theih na hi hiam? Kineihsiampa aw, na mit-a singpek lakhia phot lecin tua ciangin na sanggampa mit-a lakkhiat ding singvui them na telmuh thei pan ding hi.
42006043	Singkung hoih, a gah hoih lo gah om lo a, singkung hoih lo a gah hoih gah a om kei hi.
42006044	Singkung khempeuh a gah in kikhentel thei ciat hi. Mite in thangling kung panin thei gah lo lo uh a, sialtalling kung panin lenggah a lo thei kei uh hi.
42006045	Mi hoih in a lungtanga a koihcing a hoihte panin na hoih pusuahkhia hi. Ahang in, lungtang sung a dimlet ciangin kamin kipaukhia hi.
42006046	"Bang hangin “Topa, Topa hong ci napi, ka gen bangin hih lo na hi uh hiam?
42006047	Ka kiangah hong pai-in ka thu za-a, a zuipahte bang tawh kibang hiam, cih kong lak ding hi,
42006048	Thukpi a tawh khit ciangin suangpi tungah bulkip a phut innlampa tawh kibang hi. Tui khanga, tua inn a nawk hangin kiptaka kilam ahi manin tua inn a lok zo kei hi.
42006049	Ahi hangin ka thute za napi a zui lote, bulpi a nei lo leituala inn lam pa tawh kibang hi. Tui khanga tua inn a nawk phetin puka, a kisia ngi-ingei hi,” a ci hi.
42007001	Jesu in hih thu khempeuh mipite zakin a gen khit ciangin Capernaum ah a lut hi.
42007002	Tua lai-ah zakhat ukpa khat in a pahtak mahmah nasempa cina-a, si dektakin a om hi.
42007003	Zakhat ukpa in Jesu thu za-a Jew upate pawlkhat ama kiangah sawlin, amah pai-a a nasempa a damsak nadingin thumsak hi.
42007004	Amaute Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin, “Hih mipa ading na hihsak ding kilawm hi.
42007005	Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in i minam it a, ei Jew-te synagogue hong lamsak ahi manin hong pai hamtang in,” ci-in a kun tangtang uh hi.
42007006	Tua ahi ciangin Jesu in amaute a zui hi. Amah tuapa inn a tun dektak ciangin zakhat-ukpa in a lawmte sawl a, “Topa aw, kibuaisak dah in. Kei inn sungah nang kong lutsak ding kei adingin kilawm lo hi.
42007007	Nang kianga hong pai dinga kilawm ka kisaklohna zong tua hang mah ahi hi. Ahi hangin kammal khat gen lel lecin ka nasempa dampah ding hi.
42007008	Kei mahmah zong thuneihna nuai-a om ka hi-a, keima nuai-ah galkapte a om hi. Khat kiangah, ‘Pai in,’ ka cih leh pai-a, adang khat kiangah, ‘Hong pai in,’ ka cih leh hong pai hi. Ka nasempa kiangah, ‘Hih sem in,’ ka cih ciangin a sem hi,” a ci hi.
42007009	Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin, tuapa lamdang sa mahmah a, amah a zui mihonpite lam nga-in, “Ken kong geninah, Israel-te lak nangawn ah hih zaha lian upna ka mu nai kei hi,” a ci hi.
42007010	Tua ciangin amah sama kisawlte tung uh a, tua nasempa a damsa in a mu uh hi.
42007011	A sawt loin Nain kici khua ah Jesu pai-a, a nungzuite le mihon tampi in amah zui uh hi.
42007012	Amah tua khuapi kongpi a tun kuan ciangin meigongnu khat tapa khat neihsun a sisa in a kizawngkhia hi. Tua khuapi panin mihonpi in tua meigongnu a zui uh hi.
42007013	Topa in tuanu a muh ciangin khasiat mahmah ahi manin, “Kap nawn kei in,” a ci hi.
42007014	Tua ciangin va naih a hankuang zawngte a dinkhawl uh hi. Amah in, “Tangvalpa aw, tho in kong ci hi!” a ci hi.
42007015	Misipa thoto in pau-a, Jesu in a nu kiangah a ap kik hi.
42007016	Amaute khempeuh in piandang sa in Pasian a phat uh hi. Amaute in, “Eite lakah kamsang lian khat hong kilang ta hi. Ama mite huh dingin Pasian hong pai ta hi,” a ci uh hi.
42007017	Hih Jesu tawh kisai thu Judeaa le a kimkot gamsung khua khempeuh ah a kizel hi.
42007018	John nungzuite in hih thupiang khempeuh John a hilh uh hi. Amaute lakah nih sama,
42007019	Topa kiangah, “Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam? Midang ka na lamen lai ding uh hiam?” cih a dong dingin a sawl hi.
42007020	Tua mite Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin, “‘Hong pai ding pa mah na hi hiam? Midang khatpeuh ka na lamen lai ding uh hiam?’ cih a dong dingin Baptize-pa John in na kiangah kote hong sawl hi,” a ci uh hi.
42007021	Tua hun laitak tektekin Jesu in natna satna le kha gilo a veite tampi damsakin, mittaw tampi khua a musak hi.
42007022	Tua ciangin amah in thupuate kiangah, “Note pai kik unla, na zaksa na muhsa uh thu teng John kiangah va hilh un: Mittawte in khua mu uh hi, khebaite lam pai thei uh hi; miphakteb damsiang uh hi; bilngongte in khua za uh hi; misite kihingkiksak hi; mizawngte kiangah lungdamna thu kihilh hi.
42007023	Keima hanga a puk lo mi thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42007024	John thupuate a ciah khit uh ciangin Jesu in mihonpite kiangah, John thu hih bangin gen a: “Bang en dinga gamlak ah pai na hi uh hiam? Huih mut-a huang pumpeng en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam?
42007025	Ahi kei leh bang en dinga paikhia na hi uh hiam? Puan hoih silhte en dinga pai na hi uh hiam? Hi lo hi. Puan hoih silhte le a noptatte kumpi-inn sungah a om uh hi.
42007026	Tua ahileh note bang en dingin paikhia na hi uh hiam? Kamsangpa en dingin maw? Hi mah hi. Ken kong geninah, kamsangpa sangin a lianzaw hi.
42007027	Tuapa thu hih bangin kigelh hi: “‘Ka thupuapa na mai-ah ka sawl dinga amah in na mai-ah na lampi ding a sialkhol ding hi,’c
42007028	Ken kong geninah, numei sung pana suakte lakah Baptisepa John sanga lianzaw kuamah a om kei hi; ahi zongin Pasian gamah a neupen nangawn amah sangin a lianzaw hi,” a ci hi.
42007029	(Mi khempeuh, siahdongte nangawn in Jesu thugen a zak uh ciangin Pasian lampi a maan hi, ci-in a sang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute John in baptise khin hi.
42007030	Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le thukham siamte John in baptise kha lo ahi manin amau ading Pasian ngimsak na a nolh uh hi.)
42007031	"Tua ahileh hih khang mite bang tawh ka teh ding hiam? Amaute bang tawh kibang uh hiam?
42007032	Suamzuakna munah tu a: “ ‘Tamngai kong mutsak uh hangin na laam kei uh hi; misi-la ka sak uh hangin lah na kap kei uh hi,’ ci-in a kigal to naupangte tawh kibang uh hi.
42007033	Ahang in, Baptize-pa John anne lo lenggahzu dawn loin hong pai-a, ‘Dawi lawm neipa hi,’ na ci uh hi.
42007034	Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin ne-in dawna, ‘An hai zu haipa, siahdongte le “mawhneite” lawmpa hi,’ na ci zel uh hi.
42007035	Ahi hangin pilna aman a hina a tate khempeuh in lakkhia hi,” a ci hi.
42007036	Pharisee-te khat in nitak-an nekpih dingin Jesu sama, tua Pharisee-pa innah pai-in sabuai-ah a kingam hi.
42007037	Jesu in tua Pharisee-pa inn-a an a nek lam mawhna a bawl ngitnget tua khua-a numei khat in a theih ciangin sathau namtui suangngo thawl khat tawi a,
42007038	Jesu nunglam a khe phungah kap kawmin dinga a khitui in Jesu khepekte a kawtsak hi. Tua khit ciangin a samin nul-a, namin a sathau namtui a buak hi.
42007039	Amah a sam Pharisee-pa in a muh ciangin, “Hih pa kamsang ahileh amah a lawng kua hi-a hih nu bangci numei hi-in, mawhnei khat ahilam a thei ding hi,” amah le amah a kici hi.
42007040	Jesu in ama kiangah, “Simon aw, kong gen nop khat a om hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Amah in, “Sia aw, hong gen in,” a ci hi.
42007041	Jesu in, “Sum pakhak pa khat tungah mi nih in sum ba uh hi. Khat in denariid zanga ba-in adang khat in sawmnga a ba hi.
42007042	Amaute in a leiba uh loh zo lo tuak uh ahi manin amah in a leibate a nihin maisak tuak hi. Tua ahileh tuate gel kua pen in amah nak itzaw ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42007043	Simon in, “Leiba a tamzaw a kimaisakpa hi-in ka um hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “A mantakin na khen zo hi,” a ci hi.
42007044	Tua ciangin amah tuanu lamah kihei-a Simon kiangah, “Hih nu na mu hiam? Na innah kong hawh a, ka khe sil nading tui nong pia kei hi. Ahi hangin amah in ka khepekte a khitui tawh kawtsakin a samin a nul hi.
42007045	Nang nong nam kei a, ahi hangin hih nu in innsung kong luta kipan tawlnga loin ka khepekte a nam hi.
42007046	Nang, ka lu sathau nong nilh kei a, amah in ahileh ka khepekte sathau namtui a buak hi.
42007047	Tua ahi manin ken kong geninah, ama mawhna tampite kimaisak zo ahi manin tampi-in a it hi. Ahi hangin tawmkha a kimaisakte in a tawm it uh hi,” a ci hi.
42007048	Tua ciangin Jesu in tuanu kiangah, “Na mawhnate kimaisak zo hi,” a ci hi.
42007049	Lengla dangte in, “Mawhnate nangawn a maisak hih mipa kua ahi hiam?” ci-in a kiho uh hi.
42007050	Jesu in numei kiangah, “Na upna in nang hong honkhia zo hi; lungnuamin ciah in,” a ci hi.
42008001	Tua khit ciangin Jesu khuapi le khuaneute ah zin kawikawi-a, Pasian gam tawh kisai lungdamna thu a tangko hi. Tua Sawm-le-nihte ama kiangah om uh a,
42008002	kha gilo le a natnate uh a damsak numei pawlkhat zong a om uh hi: A sung pana dawi sagih a paikhiatna nu Mary (Magdalene kici);
42008003	Herod inn sunga sungtapipa Chuza zi Joanna, Susanna, le adang tampi tawh a om uh hi. Hih numeite in amau neih bangbang tawh amaute a panpih uh hi.
42008004	Khuapite panin Jesu kiangah mipite pai uh a, mihon tampi a kihonkhop laitakin amah in hih gentehna na gen a,
42008005	"Lokhopa khat ama khaici vawh dingin kuankhia hi. Khaici a theh ciangin pawlkhat lamdungah tu-a kituancilin vana vasate in nemang uh hi.
42008006	Pawlkhatte suang tungah tu-a a po khiat ciangin a nom om lo ahi manin ankungte a keugaw hi.
42008007	Adang pawlkhatte linglakah tu-a, lingkung tawh khangkhawmin lingkung in depgawp hi.
42008008	Adang pawlkhatte leuleu lei hoihna ah a tu hi. Tuate poto in a kivawh sangin azah zakhat-a tamzaw gah a gah hi,” a ci hi. Hih thu a gen khit ciangin, “Zak nading bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” ci-in a kiko hi.
42008009	A nungzuite in hih gentehna a khiatna a dong uh hi.
42008010	Amah in, Pasian-gam thusimte theih theihna note hong kipiak hangin, “amaute in mumu napi a muhtel theih loh, zaza napi in a theihtel theih loh,’a nadingin midangte tungah gentehnate zangin ka gen hi.
42008011	"Hih gentehna a khiatna: Khaici pen Pasian thu ahi hi.
42008012	Lam dunga tute, thu za-a, ahi hangin uma hotkhiatna a ngah loh nadingin dawimangpa va pai-in amau lungsim panin Pasian thu a lakkhiatte ahi hi.
42008013	Suang tunga tute, Pasian thu a zak uh ciangin lungdamin a san uh hangin zungkha lote ahi uh hi. Amaute in tomkha sung um uh a zia-etna a thuak uh ciangin a pukmangte ahi hi.
42008014	Ling laka tu khaicite, Pasian thu a zak uh hangin a nuntakna uhah nuntak nading lunghimawhnate, hauhnate le nopsaknate in depgawp-a, a picing lote cihna ahi hi.
42008015	Ahi hangin lei hoihna-a tu khaicite ahileh lungsim picing le lungsim hoih nei in Pasian thu za-in kem dena, thuak keikai-in gah a gahkhiate cihna ahi hi.
42008016	"Kuamah in mei a vak khit ciangin bel sung ahi zongin lupna nuai ahi zongin a sel kei hi. Tua sangsikin inn sunga om khempeuh in khua a muh theih nadingin meivak tunna tungah tungzaw hi.
42008017	Ahang in, a kigenkhia lo ding a ki-imcip khat beek om lo-a, a kitheikhawk lo ding le a langtanga kipholak lo ding a kiselcip khat beek a om kei hi.
42008018	Tua ahi manin thu bangci ngaih na hi uh hiam, limtakin ngaihsun un. A nei peuhmah kipia beh ding hi; a nei lo peuhmah ama neihsa-a a ngaihsutte nangawn kilaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42008019	Tua laitakin amah tawh kimu nuamin Jesu nu le a sanggamte a pai uh hi; ahi hangin mihonpite hangin ama kiangah a pai thei kei uh hi.
42008020	Mi khat in, “Na nu le na sanggamte, nang hong mu nuamin innpua ah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42008021	Amah in, “Pasian thu za a, a zuite ka nu le ka sanggamte ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42008022	Ni khat Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Tuilipi galkhat lamah galkah ni,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute gunkuang ah tuangin a dingkhia uh hi.
42008023	A pai laitakun amah a ihmu hi. Tuilipi tungah huih le guah kinuai-a gunkuang tuum dektak ahi manin amaute adingin a lauhuai mahmah hi.
42008024	Nungzuite pai-in, “Topa, Topa, tui a kia petmah ding hi ta ung!” ci-in a phong uh hi. Amah tho-in huih le tuihual kinuai a tai ciangin huihpi daipah in a sippah dide hi.
42008025	Amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Na upna uh koi-ah om hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in lau kawm lamdang sa mahmah kawmin, “Hih pa kua hiam? Thu a piak ciangin huih le tui nangawn in ama thu mang uh hi,” a kici uh hi.
42008026	Amaute Galilee tuilipi galkhat lam Gerasenesb kualah gunkuangin a pai uh hi.
42008027	Tui gei-ah Jesu a kumkhiat ciangin khuapi panin dawilut mi khatin a na dawntuah hi. Hih mipa in sawt veipi puan silh lo, inn ah teng loin hante lakah a teng hi.
42008028	Amah in Jesu a muh ciangin kiko-a ama khe phungah bokin, “Sang Pen Pasian Tapa Jesu aw, kei bang hong cih nuam na hi hiam? Kei hong bawlsia kei in ci-in kong thum hi!” ci-in a aw neih zahin a kiko hi.
42008029	Ahang in, Jesu in tuapa sung pan tua kha giloc a paikhiat nadingin thu a pia hi. Tua kha gilo in tuapa tam veipi a man hi. A khut a khete sikkhainiang tawh khihin a cin uh hangin a sikkhainiangte peksatin tua dawi in amah gamdaih na munte ah a hawl hi.
42008030	Jesu in ama kiangah, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in a sungah dawi tampi om ahi ciangin, “Legion hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42008031	Tua ciangin amaute Kawhawmpi sungah a paisak loh nadingin ama kiangah a thumthum uh hi.
42008032	Mual pangah vok hon tampi a gamta hi. Dawite in tuate sungah a lutsak nadingin Jesu kiangah a nget uh ciangin amah in a phal hi.
42008033	Tua mipa sung pan dawite a paikhiat ciangin vokte sungah lut uh a vok honte kensang pan tuili sungah tuaksukin tui kia khin uh hi.
42008034	Vok cingte in tua thupiangsa a muh uh ciangin tai uh a, khuapi le khuaneute ah a koh uh ciangin,
42008035	bang thu piang hiam cih en dingin mipite a paikhia uh hi. Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin dawite in a paikhiatsan pa Jesu khe phungah tu-in, puan silh-a, a lungsim pil kik-a om a muh uh ciangin a lau uh hi.
42008036	Tua thu a musate in dawilut pa a kidamsak zia mite kiangah a gen uh hi.
42008037	Tua ciangin amaute lau mahmah uh ahi manin, Gerasenes kuala mi khempeuh in amaute kiang pan Jesu a paikhiat ding a ngen uh hi. Tua ciangin amah gunkuang sungah kahin a paikhia hi.
42008038	Dawite a paikhiatna pa in amah a tonpih nadingin a thum hangin Jesu in,
42008039	"Na inn ah ciah inla Pasian in nang tungah bangzah hong bawlsak cih thu na gen in,” ci-in amah a sawlkhia hi. Tua ahi ciangin tuapa paikhia a, Jesu in ama tungah bangzah bawlsak cih khuapi sung khempeuh ah a gen hi.
42008040	Mi honpite khempeuh in Jesu a kileh kik ding lamen uh ahi manin, amah a ciah kik ciangin a na muak uh hi.
42008041	Tua laitakin Jairus min nei synagogue ukpa va pai-a, Jesu khephungah bokin ama inn ah a pai nading a ngen hi.
42008042	Bang hang hiam cih leh kum sawm-le-nih bang a pha pan a tanu neihsun a si dektak hi. Jesu lampi ah a pai laitakin mihon pite in a nehkham dektak uh hi.
42008043	Tua lai-ah kum sawm le nih sungd siluang natna a vei, kuama damsak zawh loh numei khat a om hi.
42008044	Tua-nu, Jesu nunglamah pai-in a puantualpi mongtep a lawn leh a siluang a kangpah hi.
42008045	Jesu in, “Kei hong lawng kua hiam?” ci-in a kan hi. Amaute khempeuh in a nial uh ciangin Peter in, “Topa aw, mipite in nang hong neh in hong phukhakha uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42008046	Ahi hangin Jesu in, “Hong lawng khat om hi; ka tung panin vang a paikhiat lam ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
42008047	Tua ciangin tuanu in amah kitheikhia veve ding cih a theih ciangin lingsa in va pai-a, Jesu khe phungah a bok hi. Mi khempeuh zakin, amah in bang hangin Jesu lawnga, bangci dampah lian cih thu a gen hi.
42008048	Tua ciangin amah in tuanu kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, na upna in nang hong damsak hi. Lungnuamin ciah in,” a ci hi.
42008049	Jesu a paupau laitakin synagogue ukpa Jairus inn panin mi khat hong pai hi. Tuapa in, “Na tanu si ta hi. Siapa buaisak nawn dah in,” a ci hi.
42008050	Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin Jairus kiangah, “Lau kei in; um lel in, tua hileh amah dam ding hi,” a ci hi.
42008051	Amah Jairus inn a tun ciangin Peter, John le James le tua naupang nu le pa longal adang kuamah inn sungah a tumpih kei hi.
42008052	Tua kawmkalin mi khempeuh amah kahin a taamlo uh hi. Jesu in, “Tawp dih un, amah a si hi loin a ihmu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42008053	Amaute in tua numeino a si ahilam thei uh ahi manin amah a nuihsan uh hi.
42008054	Ahi hangin amah in tuanu a khutin len a, “Ka ta aw, tho in!” a ci hi.
42008055	Tuanu a kha kileh kik a thakhatin a ding to hi. Tua ciangin Jesu in ama nek ding bang khatpeuh a piak dingun a sawl hi.
42008056	A nu a pate in lamdang a sa uh hi. Ahi hangin amah in hih thupiang kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun thu a pia hi.
42009001	Jesu in Sawm-le-nihte a sapkhawm khit ciangin, dawite khempeuh a hawlkhiat nading uh le natnate a damsak nading uh vang le thuneihna a pia hi.
42009002	Tua ciangin amah in Pasian gam thu hilh ding le cinate damsak dingin amaute a sawl khia hi.
42009003	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Na khualzinna-ua na zat dingun ciangkhut, thung-ip, anlum le sum keng loin puantungsilh keng thuah kei un.
42009004	Inn khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin tua khua na nusiat mateng uh tua inn ah taam suak un.
42009005	Mite in note hong ngaih kei uh leh amau langa teci ahi dingin tua khua na nusiat uh ciangin na khepek-ua leivuite singkhia un,” a ci hi.
42009006	Tua ahi ciangin amaute kuankhia uh a, khuaneute ah pai kawikawi-in mun khempeuh ah lungdamna-thu hilhin, mite a damsak uh hi.
42009007	Tua laitakin gam-ukpa Herod in thupiang teng na za-a a amkham mahmah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mi pawlkhat in misi pan John thokik zo hi, ci uh a,
42009008	adang pawlkhat in Elijah hong kilang hi, ci-in pawlkhat leuleu in tanglai-a kamsangte khat hong hing kik hi ci uh hi.
42009009	Ahi hangin Herod in, “John ngawng ka tansa ahi hi. Tua ahileh a thu ka zak pa kua ahi hiam?” ci-in donga, amah a muh nadingin a hanciam hi.
42009010	Sawltakpite kileh kik uh a, a nasepsate uh Jesu a zasak uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute paipih a Bethsaida kici khuapi khat lamah a kihemkhia uh hi.
42009011	Ahi hangin mihonpite in thei veve uh a, amah a zui uh hi. Amah in amaute na muak a, Pasian-gam thu genpihin damsak ding a kisamte a damsak hi.
42009012	Nitak lam ni niam ciangin Sawm-le-nihte ama kiangah va pai uh a, “Hih lai gamsungpi ahi manin hih kima khuaneu khuatate ah pai-in a nek ding uh le a zintun nading uh a zon theih nadingun mipite sawlkhia in,” a ci uh hi.
42009013	Amah in, “A nek ding uh bang khatpeuh pia un,” ci-in a dawng hi. Amaute in, “Hih mihonpite khempeuh ading an lei dinga pai ding ka hi kei ngal uh leh, anlum nga le ngasa nih bek ka nei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
42009014	(Tua lai-ah pasal tul nga bang a om hi.) Ahi hangin amah in a nungzuite kiangah, “Sawmnga ta khawngin a pawlpawlin khen unla tusak dih un,” a ci hi.
42009015	Nungzuite in tua banga a khen khit uh ciangin mi khempeuh a tu uh hi.
42009016	Amah in, tua anlum nga le ngasa gel la-a, vantung lam ento in, lungdam a koh khit ciangin tuate a balkham hi. Tua khit ciangin mipite a lui dingun nungzuite a pia hi.
42009017	Amaute khempeuh in ne uh a, a kham pikpek khit uh ciangin a khamvalte uh a nungzuite in a top uh leh bawmta sawm le nih tak a pha hi.
42009018	Khatvei Jesu in amah kia-a thu a nget laitakin a nungzuite zong om a, amah in amaute kiangah, “Mihonpite in kei kua hi, hong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42009019	Amaute in, “Mi pawlkhat in Baptize-pa John hi; pawlkhatte in Elijah hi; pawlkhat leuleu in tanglai kamsangte khat hong hing kik hi; hong ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
42009020	Amah in, “Tua ahileh no, kei kua hi nong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Peter in, “Pasian’ Khrista na hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42009021	Jesu in hih thu kuamah a hilh loh nadingun khauhtakin a vauhilh hi.
42009022	Tua ciangin amah in, “Mihing Tapa in tampi thuak pelmawh dinga, upate, siampi makaite le thukham siate in amah nolhin, pel loin amah kithat dinga a ni thumna ni-in kihingkiksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42009023	Tua ciangin amah in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Mi khatpeuh in ka nung hong zuih nop leh amah leh amah kinial pelmawh dinga nisimin ama singlamteh kisuanin hong zuih kul hi.
42009024	Ahang in, ama nuntakna a honkhia nuamte in taan ding uh a, ahi hangin kei hanga a nuntakna a mangsakte in a honkhia ding hi.
42009025	Mi khatin leitung buppi a neih hangin amahmah kimansuah ahikeh kitaan leh bang phatuam ding ahi hiam?
42009026	Mi khatpeuh in keimah le ka thute a zumpih leh vantung misiangthote le Pasian minthanna le ama minthanna tawh Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin ama hangin a maizum ding hi.
42009027	Thutak kong geninah hih lai-a ding mi kimkhat in Pasian gam a muh ma-un sihna a ciam kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42009028	Jesu in hih thu a gen zawh ni giat bang a phak ciangin Peter, John le James-te zawnin mualtung ah thungen dingin a kahto uh hi.
42009029	Thu a nget laitakin, a mel kikhela, a puante khuaphia bangin a tang hi.
42009030	Mi nih – Moses leh Elijah,
42009031	minthanna thupi tawh kilang uh a, Jesu tawh a kiho uh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem a, a tangtunsak ding, ama paikhiat nading thu a gen uh hi.
42009032	Peter le a pawlte a ihmut uh suak mahmah a, ahi hangin a tei sinsen uh ciangin ama minthanna le amah tawh a dingkhawm mi nih a mu uh hi.
42009033	Tua mite Jesu kiang pan a paikhiat laitakun Peter in, “Topa, hih lai-a i om nuam mahmah hi. Nang ading khat, Moses ading khat, Elijah ading khat, buk thum hong lamsak nung,” a ci hi. (Ama gen bang hiam cih a thei kei hi.)
42009034	Tua banga a pau laitakin meii khat kai-in amaute tuama, meii lakah a tum uh ciangin a lau uh hi.
42009035	Meii lak panin aw khat in, “Hih in ka teelsa ka Tapa ahi hi; ama thu na ngai un,” a ci hi.
42009036	Tua aw in a gen khit ciangin amaute in, Jesu amah kia-a om a mu uh hi. Nungzuite in hih thu amaute lungsimah kem gige uh a, amau muhsa thute tua hunin kuama kiangah a gen kei uh hi.
42009037	A zing ciang, mualtung pan a kumsuk uh ciangin mihon tampi in amah a na dawntuah uh hi.
42009038	Mihonpite lakah khat in, “Sia aw, ka tapa hong etsak dih in; amah bek ta-a ka neih ahi hi.
42009039	Amah kha khat in mana, thakhat khatin a kiko zakzak hi. Tua kha in amah kisatsak gawp a, a kam panin cilphuan a bua hi. Tua kha in amah nusiat hun nei lo phiala, a susia gawp ding hi ta hi.
42009040	Na nungzuite kiangah tua kha a hawlkhiat nadingun ka nget hangin a hawlkhia thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
42009041	Jesu in, “Thu um lo-a a lehtat khang mite aw, note tawh bang tan vei om khawma, bang tan vei hong dawhdawh zo ding ka hi hiam? Na tapa hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
42009042	Tua naupang a paipih laitak nangawnin dawi in leitualah tuksak-a a kisatsak gawp hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in tua kha gilob tai-a tua naupang a damsak khit ciangin a pa a pia kik hi.
42009043	Tua ciangin amaute in Pasian liatna lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi. Mi khempeuh in Jesu hihna piandang a sak laitakun amah in a nungzuite kiangah,
42009044	"Thu khat kong gen ding hi. Limtakin na ngai un: Mihing Tapa mite khutah a kilehhek ding hi,” a ci hi.
42009045	Ahi hangin amaute in bang a cih nopna hiam, cih a thei kei uh hi. Amaute theih loh dingin hih thu ki-im lai ahi manin amaute in a khiatna tel thei lo uh a, amah lah a dong ngam kei uh hi.
42009046	Nungzuite in amau lakah kua lianpen ding cih a kisel ngeingai uh hi.
42009047	Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei a, naupangno khat kai-in, a kiangah a dingsak hi.
42009048	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Keima min hangin hih naupnangno a sang peuhpeuh, kei hong sang ahi hi; kei hong sang peuhpeuh kei hong sawlpa a sang ahi hi. Ahang in, note khempeuh laka a neupen in a lianpen ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42009049	John in, “Sia aw, mi khatin nang minin dawite a hawlkhiat ka mu uh a, ei mi hi lo ahi manin a hih nawn loh nadingin ka kho uh hi,” a ci hi.
42009050	Jesu in, “No hong langpang lo peuhmah no pawl ahi hi, tuapa kho kei un,” a ci hi.
42009051	Jesu vantungah a kilak toh ding hun a tun kuan ciangin Jerusalem lam manawhin kuankhia ngiatngiat a,
42009052	ama mai-ah thupuate a sawl hi. Ama ading nate a baihsa-a koihkhol dingin Samaria khua neu khatah amaute a lut uh hi.
42009053	Ahi hangin amah Jerusalem manawh ahi manin tua khuate in amah a na muak kei uh hi.
42009054	Nungzui James le John-te in hih thu a muh uh ciangin, “Topa aw, amaute suksiat nadinginc vantung panin meikuang sam le ung nong awi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
42009055	Ahi hangin Jesu kihei-in amaute tai-a,
42009056	tua ciangin amaute khua dang khatah a pai uh hi.d
42009057	Amaute lampi-a a pai laitakun mi khat in ama kiangah, “Na paina peuhpeuh ah kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi.
42009058	Jesu in, “Ngiate in kua nei uh a, van-a vasate in bu a nei uh hi; ahi hangin Mihing Tapa in a lutang ngak nading mun a nei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42009059	Amah in adang khat pa kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi. Ahi hangin tuapa in, “Topa aw, va ciah photin, ka pa va vui masa ning,” a ci hi.
42009060	Jesu in ama kiangah, “Misite in amau misite na vui uh hen. Ahi hangin nang pai inla Pasian-gam thu na tangko in,” a ci hi.
42009061	Adang khat leuleu in, “Topa nang hong zui ning, ahi hangin va ciah kik masa photin ka innkuanpihte mangpha va khak phot ning,” a ci hi.
42009062	Jesu in, “Lokaihna tu lenkawma a nunglam en peuhmah Pasian-gam sunga nasem dingin cing zo lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42010001	Tua khit ciangin Topa in adang sawmsagih le nihtea sehkhia-in ama pai nading mun le khua lian khempeuhah, ama mai-ah nihta in a sawlkhia hi.
42010002	Amah in amaute kiangah, “An lak ding tampi a om hangin nasem ding mi tawm hi. Tua ahi ciangin ama lo lai-a nasem dingin an nei Topa kiangah ngen ta un.
42010003	Pai un, keivomte lakah tuunote bangin note kong sawlkhia hi.
42010004	Sumbawmte, thung-ipte, khedapte keng kei un; lamkalah kuamah hopih kei un.
42010005	"Inn khatpeuh ah na lut uh ciangin, ‘Hih innah lemna om ta hen.’ ci masa un.
42010006	Tua lai-ah lemna deih mi a om leh na piak uh lemna ama tungah tung dinga, a deih kei leh no tungah hong kileh kik ding hi.
42010007	Nasempa in thaman ngah ding kilawm ahi manin tua innah na tam unla, nek ding dawn dinga hong piak peuhpeuh na ne un. Inn khat pan inn khatah zin na khel kawikawi kei un.
42010008	"Khua khatpeuh ah na lut uh a hong ngaih uh leh na mai-ua hong lui peuhpeuh ne un.
42010009	Tua khua-a cinate damsak unla amaute kiangah, ‘Note kiangah Pasian-gam hong nai ta hi,’ ci-in gen un.
42010010	Ahi hangin khua khatpeuh na lut uh a hong ngaih kei uh leh kongzingte ah pai-in,
42010011	‘Ka khepek-ua bang na khua-ua leivuite nangawn no langa pang dingin ka phiatkhia uh hi. Ahi ta zongin Pasian-gam hong nai ta hi, cih na tel un,’ ci un.
42010012	Kong gen tektek hi, tua ni ciangin tua khua thuak ding sangin Sodom khuapi thuakna a thuak nopzaw ding hi.
42010013	"Korazin aw, gimna nak thuak na nicia! Bethsaida aw, gimna nak thuak na nicia! No sunga kibawl nalamdangte Tyre le Sidon khuate ah kibawl leh amaute in ippipuan silhin vut kibuakin sawt veipi-in kisik zo ding uh hi.
42010014	Ahi hangin thukhenna ah no thuak ding sangin Tyre le Sidon khuate thuakna a zangzaw ding hi.
42010015	Nang Capernaum aw, vanlai dongin hong kilamto ding ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo ding hi; a thuk penna munb dongin na kiasuk ding hi.
42010016	"No thu hong ngaite, kei thu ngai ahi hi; no hong nolhte, kei hong nolh ahi hi; ahi hangin kei hong nolhte, kei hong sawlpa nolh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42010017	Sawmsagih le nihte lungnuamin ciah kik uh a, “Topa aw, nang min hangin dawite nangawn ka thuthu un om tazen hi,” a ci uh hi.
42010018	Amah in, “Vantung panin khuaphelep bangin Satan hong kumsuk ka mu zo hi.
42010019	Gulte le aikamte na tuatcil theih nading uh le galpa vang khempeuh na zawh theih nadingun thuneihna kong pia zo hi. Note bangmah in hong siasak zo lo ding hi.
42010020	Ahi zongin khate in na thu uh a manna hangin lungnuam kei unla vantungah na min uh a kigelhna hangin na lungnuam zaw un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42010021	Tua hun laitakin Khasiangtho tungtawnin Jesu lungnuam mahmah a, “Vantung le leitung’ Topa, ka Pa aw, hih thute mipilte le theihna sangte tungah na im-a, naupangte tungah pholak na hi manin nangmah kong phat hi. Hi mah hi, Pa aw, hih in nangma deihna ahi hi.
42010022	"Ka Pa in na khempeuh kei hong ap zo hi. Tapa kua hiam, cih Pa longal kumah in thei lo-a, Pa kua hiam, cih Tapa le Tapa in a theihsak dinga a teelte longal kuamah in a thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
42010023	Tua ciangin a nungzuite lamah amah kihei a, “Tu-a na muhte uh a mu mitte thupha ngah ahi hi.
42010024	Ahang in, kamsangte le kumpi tampitakin na muhte uh a muh nop uh hangin mu kha lo uh a, na zakte uh a zak nop uh hangin a za kha kei uh hi, cih kong gen hi” ci-in a tuam genpih hi.
42010025	Khat vei Jesu zia-et dingin thukham siam khat dingto a, “Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka luah theih nadingin ka hih pelmawh ding bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42010026	Jesu in, “Thukham ah bang kigelh ahi hiam? Nang bang na ci ngaihsut hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42010027	Tuapa in, “‘Na Topa Pasian na lungtang khempeuh, na hinna khempeuh, na thahatna khempeuh le na lungsim khempeuh tawh na it in,’c cih le ‘Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in,’d ci-in kigelh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42010028	Jesu in, “Mantakin nong dawng hi. Tua bangin zui lecin na nungta ding hi,” a ci hi.
42010029	Ahi hangin tuapa amah le amah kidiktangsak nuam ahi manin Jesu kiangah, “Tua ahileh ka vengte kua ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42010030	Tua dawnna-in Jesu in, “Mikhat, Jerusalem pan Jericho lam manawha a paisuk laitakin misuamte a tuak hi. Tuate in a puan hawkkhiatsak uh a, sat gawpin a sisa phialin nusia-in a paisan uh hi.
42010031	Tua lampi mah tawnin siampi khat paisuk a, tuapa a muh ciangin a pamlamah pelin a paisan hi.
42010032	Tua mah bangin Levi-te khat va pai-a tua mun a tun ciangin tuapa mu-a, a langkhatah pelin a paisan hi.
42010033	Ahi hangin Samaria mi khualzin khat tua mun ah tunga tuapa a muh ciangin a hehpih hi.
42010034	Amah tua mipa omna-ah pai-a, a liammate sathau le lenggahzu nuhin a tuamsak hi. Tua ciangin tuapa ama laa tungah tuangsaka, zintun innah paipihin a khoi hi.
42010035	A zing ciangin nguntange nih lakhia a zin-inn ngakpa a pia hi. Amah in, ‘Amah na khoi in; nang aa na zatbeh a om leh kong kileh kik ciangin kong din ding hi,’ ci hi.
42010036	"Hih mi thumte lakah misuamte khut thuakpa adingin kua pen a vengte hi, ci-in na ngaihsun hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42010037	Thukham siampa in; “Amah a lainatpa pen ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “Pai inla tua mah bangin na hih in,” a ci hi.
42010038	Jesu le a nungzuite a pai laitakun khua khatah amah lut-a, Martha min nei numei khat in amah a inn a na hon hi.
42010039	Amah in Mary kici sanggam numei khat a nei hi. Tuanu a thugente ngai-in Topa khephungah a tu hi.
42010040	Ahi hangin Martha pen a innsung nasep teng semin a buai mahmah hi. Amah Jesu kiangah pai-a, “Topa aw, ka sanggamnu in nasep khempeuh kei guak hong khiat phamawh sa lo na hi hiam? Kei hong huh dingin sawl dih in!” a ci hi.
42010041	Topa in, “Martha, Martha aw, na tampi lunghimawhin na lunggim hi.
42010042	Ahi hangin a kisam na khat bek a om hi.f Mary in a hoihzaw pen tel khin zo a, tua pen ama tung pan a kilakhia nawn kei ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42011001	Ni khat Jesu in mun khatah thu a ngen hi. A thunget a man khit ciangin a nungzuite khat in ama kiangah, “Topa aw, John in ama nungzuite thungetzia ding a hilh bangin kote zong hong hilh in,” a ci hi.
42011002	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Thu na nget uh ciangin, “‘Paa aw, nangma min kisiangthosak ta hen, na gam hong tung ta hen.b
42011003	Ka nisim an uh nisialin hong pia in.
42011004	Ko tunga hong mawh peuhpeuh maisak ka hi manun, kote mawhnate hong maisak in,c Zia-etna sungah hong pi kei in,’d na ci un,” a ci hi.
42011005	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Note lakah khat in lawm khat nei-a, tuapa zankim laitakin a lawmpa kiangah pai-in, ‘Lawm aw, anlum thum hong leitawisak dih in.
42011006	Khualzin ka lawmpa khat kei kiang hong tunga amah ka lui ding bangmah ka nei kei hi,’ ci hi.
42011007	"Tua ciangin inn sunga om pa in, ‘Hong buaisak kei in. Kong ka kalh zo-a ka tate ka luppih zo hi. Thoin bangmah kong pia thei kei ding hi,’ ci hi.
42011008	Ken kong geninah amah tho-in a lawmpa ahi mana a piak loh hangin, a lawmpa kuhkalnae hangin amah tho in a kisap zahzah a pia ding hi.
42011009	"Tua ahi ciangin note kianga kong cihinah: Ngen un, hong kipia ding hi; zong un, na mu ding uh hi; kiu un, kong hong kihon ding hi.
42011010	Ahang in, a ngen peuhpeuh in a ngah uh hi; a zongte in a mu uh hi; a kiute ading kong kihon ding hi.
42011011	"Na tapa un ngasaf hong ngen leh tua tangin gul a pia ding note lakah pa kua om na hi uh hiam?
42011012	Ahikeh aktui hong ngen leh aikam a pia ding kua om na hi uh hiam?
42011013	Note mi gilo hi napi, tua ci-in na tate uh na hoih mawkpiak ding thei na hi uh leh, vantunga om na Pa un ama kianga Khasiangtho a ngente pia nuam zawsem lo ding ahi hiam!” a ci hi.
42011014	Jesu in a pau thei lo dawi khat a hawlkhia hi. Tua dawi a paikhiat ciangin a pau thei lo pa pau thei a, mihonpite in lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
42011015	Ahi hangin amaute pawlkhat in, “Amah in dawite kumpitapa Beelzebubg suangin dawite a hawlkhia hi,” ci uh hi.
42011016	A dangte in amah a zia-et na-un van panin lim khat a ngen uh hi.
42011017	Jesu in amaute ngaihsutna thei-a amaute kiangah, “Amah le amah kilangpang gam kisia dinga, amah le amah kilangpanga kikhen innkuan puk ding hi.
42011018	Satan, amah le amah kilangpang leh ama gam bangci kip thei ding ahi hiam? Hih kong genna pen Beelzebub suangin dawite hawlkhia nong cih man uh ahi hi.
42011019	Tu-in ken Beelzebub suangin dawite hawlkhia ka hileh, na nungzuite un kua suangin dawite hawlkhia uh ahi hiam? Tua ahi ciangin amaute, no tungah thukhente a suak uh hi.
42011020	Ahi hangin Pasian khutme tawh dawite ka hawlkhiat leh Pasian gam note tungah hong tung zo hi.
42011021	"Mi thahat khat in ama inn, hiam tawh a cin ciangin a neihsate a bit hi.
42011022	Ahi hangin amah sanga hatzaw khatin amah busima, a thazawh khit ciangin ama muan a hiamte sutin a nate a hawmthang hi.
42011023	"Kei hong koppih lote ka langa pang hi-a kei hong kaihkhoppih lote a thehthang ahi hi.
42011024	"Mi khat sung panin kha giloh khat a paikhiat khit ciangin a khawl nading zongin a keuna munte ah a vak kawikawi hangin a mu kei hi. Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Ka nusiatsa inn ah ciah kik ning,’ ci hi.
42011025	A tun kik ciangin tua inn kiphiat siangin kipuah sinsena om a mu hi.
42011026	Tua ciangin amah pai-a, amah sanga tatsiazaw kha sagih zawnin tua lai-ah lutin va teng uh hi. Tua mipa nuntakzia a nunung in, a masa sangin a siazaw hi,” a ci hi.
42011027	Jesu in hih thute a gen laitakin mihonpite lak pan numei khat in, “Nang ta-a hong nei hong don nu, thupha ngah ahi hi,” a gal cih hi.
42011028	Amah in, “Pasian thu za-a a mangte, thupha ngah hizaw hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42011029	Mihonte a tam semsem ciangin Jesu in, “Hihte, a tatsia khangmite ahi hi. Amaute in lim lamdang hong nget uh hangin Jonah lim longal lim khat beek a kilak kei ding hi.
42011030	Ahang in, Nineveh-te adingin Jonah, lim a suah bangin Mihing Tapa zong hih khang mite adingin lim hi ding hi.
42011031	Solomon pilna ngai dingin leitaw lam Kumpinu lei mong panin va pai to ahi manin amah in thukhen ni ciangin hih khang mite tawh dingin amaute a mawhpaih ding hi.Tu-in hih lai-ah Solomon sanga lianzaw khati a om hi.
42011032	Thukhen ni ciangin Nineveh khua mite, hih khang mite tawh ding khawmin amaute a mawhpaih ding uh hi. Ahang in, Jonah thuhilhna hangin amaute kisik uh hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah Jonah sanga lianzaw khat a om hi.
42011033	"Kuamah in, meivak vakin a kimuh loh nading mun ahikeh kuangkum nuai-ah a koih kei hi. Tua sangsikin inn sunga a lut khempeuh in meivak tang a muh theih nadingin meivak tunna tungah kikoihzaw hi.
42011034	Na pumpi adingin na mittang meivak ahi hi. Na mittang a hoih laiteng na pumpi khempeuh khuavak tawh a kidim hi. Ahi hangin na mitte a mial ciangin na pumpi zong khuamial tawh a kidim hi.
42011035	Tua ahi ciangin note sunga om khuavak, khuamial ahi loh nadingin limtakin ngaihsun un.
42011036	Tua ahi manin na pumpi khempeuh uh khuavak tawh kidima, a mialna themkha zong a om kei leh khuavak in note hong tan mah bang in na pumpi uh a tang khin kiuhkeuh ding hi,” a ci hi.
42011037	Jesu a thu gen a man ciangin Pharisee-te khat in amah an nekpih dingin a sam hi. Tua ciangin amah pai-in sabuai ah a kingam hi.
42011038	Ahi hangin an a nek ma-in Jesu a kisil loh lam tua Pharisee-pa in a theih ciangin lamdang a sa hi.
42011039	Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Ahileh no Pharisee-te in hai le kuangte a pualam na silsiang uh hangin na sunglam uh huaihamna le tatsiatna tawh a kidim hi.
42011040	No mihai honte! A pualam a bawlpa in a sunglam zong bawl hi lo ahi hiam?
42011041	Ahi hangin kuangj sunglam-a omte mizawngte na pia un. Tua hileh note adingin na khempeuh a siang ding hi.
42011042	"No Pharisee-te aw, note in mint, rue le huan antehhing nam khempeuh sawmah khat na piak uh hangin Pasian’ itna le thutang thudon lo na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Hihte gel a masa pen hih lo tuan loin a nunung pen na hih ding uh ahi hi.
42011043	"No Pharisee-te aw, synagogue-te sunga tutna thupipente ah tu nuam diakin, van zuakna munte ah pibawl ding ut diak na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi.
42011044	"Mite in thei kha loin, atung a tot uh ciamtehna om lo hante tawh kibang na hi manun note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi” a ci hi.
42011045	Thukham siamte khatin, “Sia aw, hih thute na gen ciangin kote zong hong selpho na hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42011046	Jesu in, “No thukham siamte aw, mite tungah a puak zawh loh ding uh vante na suan uh a tua ciangin amaute na huh nading un na khutme nangawn uh khat beek tangsak lo na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi.
42011047	"Note in na pu na pate uh thah kamsangte han bawl na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi.
42011048	Tua ahi ciangin na pu na pa-te uh hihnate na thukimpihna uh teci a pang na suak uh hi. Amaute in kamsangte that uh a, amaute hante note in na bawl uh hi.
42011049	Hih thu hangin Pasian in ama pilna tawh, ‘Amaute kiangah kamsangte le sawltakpite ka paisak dinga, amaute in tuate pawlkhat thatin, pawlkhat a bawlsia ding uh hi,’ ci hi.
42011050	Tua ahi manin leitung piancila kipan kamsangte khempeuh sisan ahi zongin,
42011051	Abel sisan a kipan biakna-tau le mun-siangtho kikala kithat Zechariah sisan dong, a luangkhia khempeuh hih khang mite mawhna in kisim ding hi. Hi mah hi, ken kong geninah hihte khempeuh hih khang mite mawhna in a kisim ding hi.
42011052	"No thukham siamte aw, theihna tawhtang lakhia na hi manun gimna na thuak ding uh hi. No mahmah lah lut loin lut dinga kisate lah na dal uh hi,” a ci hi.
42011053	Tua lai panin Jesu a paikhiat ciangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate in amah nasiataka langpan ding sawmin ngak uh a,
42011054	ama kamin amah a mat theih nadingun thu a dong huan uh hi.
42012001	Tua hun laitak, khat le khat kisikkha zah dongin mi tul tampi a kihonkhop uh ciangin Jesu in a masa penin a nungzuite kiangah, “Kineihsiamna ahi Pharisee-te silngo lakah na kikem un.
42012002	A kipholak lo ding, a kiselcip bangmah om lo a; a kitheikhawk lo ding a ki-imcip bangmah a om kei hi.
42012003	Khuamial sunga na gente uh sun nitang sungah kiza dinga, inn sungtawnga na huausimte uh innkhum dawnah kitangko ding hi.
42012004	"Ken kong geninah lawmte aw, pumpi a thah khit ciangin aban bangmah a cih thei nawn lote na kihta kei un.
42012005	Ahi hangin na kihtak ding uh kua hiam cih kong lak ding hi: Pumpi a thah khit ciangin hell khuk sunga hong paii thei dinga vangliatna a neipa na kihta un. Hi hi, ken kong geninah amah na kihta un.
42012006	Kawlgit nga ciangin pennya nih in kizuak hi lo ahi hiam? Tua hi napi Pasian in kawlgit khat zong a mangngilh kei hi.
42012007	Na samzangte khempeuh uh kisim khin takpi hi. Lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sangin note na manphazaw uh hi.
42012008	"Ken kong geninah, mite mai-a kei hong sang peuhpeuh Mihing Tapa in Pasian vansawltakte mai-ah a sang ding hi.
42012009	Ahi hangin mite mai-ah kei hong kitheihmawhbawlte Pasian vansawltakte mai-ah ka kitheihmawh bawl ding hi.
42012010	Tua ahi ciangin Mihing Tapa a langgente peuhmah kimaisak dinga, ahi hangin Khasiangtho a gendai peuhpeuh a kimaisak kei ding hi.
42012011	"Synagogue-te mai ahi zongin gam-ukte le thuneite mai-ah ahi zongin note hong kipaipih ciangin bang kici hutin, bang gen ding cih lunghimawh kei un.
42012012	Tua hun ciangin na gen ding uh Khasiangtho in hong hilh na ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
42012013	Mihonpite lakah khat in, “Sia aw, ka sanggampa tawh ka gamh luah dingte ka hawm nadingun ama tungah hong gensak in,” a ci hi.
42012014	Jesu in, “Mihingpa, nogel kikal-a thukhen ding ahikeh lemgen dingin kua in kei za hong pia hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
42012015	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Kigalging un! Huaihamna nam khempeuh panin na kikem un; mihing nuntakna pen neih le lama bucinna tawh a kim kei hi,” a ci hi.
42012016	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah gentehna gen a, “Mi hau khat lo ah an tampi a piang hi.
42012017	Tuapa in, ‘Bang ci ding ka hi hiam? Ka ante ka khol nading mun ka nei kei hi,’ ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
42012018	"Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Hih ka hih ding hi. Ka salte phelkhia-in a lianzaw ka lam dinga, tua lai-ah ka ante khempeuh le ka vante ka koih ding hi.
42012019	Tua ciangin, ‘Kum tampi man ding na hoih tampi ka koih khin zo hi. Nuntakna nopzatin, nene-in dawndawnin gualnuam in, ka kici ding hi,’ ci hi.
42012020	"Ahi hangin Pasian in ama kiangah, ‘Nang mihaipa! Tu zan mahmah in na nuntakna nang tung pan hong kilaksak ding hi. Tua hileh nang adinga na koihkholhte kua in tang ding ahi hiam?’ ci hi.
42012021	"Pasian lamah hau lo a, ama adinga na a kholte peuhmah tua bang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
42012022	Tua caingin Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, ‘Tua ahi ciangin ken kong geninah na nuntak nading, na nek ding ahi zongin, na silh na ten ding ahi zongin na pumpi uh ading bangmah lunghimawh kei un.
42012023	An sangin nuntakna thupizaw a, puan sangin pumpi thupizaw hi.
42012024	Va-akte na ngaihsun dih un: Tuate in vawh lah vawh lo, at lah at lo, gawdam ahi zongin sal ah ahi zongin a khol kei uh hi. Tua hi napi Pasian in tuate a vak hi. Vasate sangin note na manpha zawtham pek uh hi!
42012025	A lunghimawh manin a nuntak hun nai khat bek nangawn a sottob thei note lakah kua om ahi hiam?
42012026	Hih bang thu neucik khat nangawn na hih theih loh khit nungsangun adangte bang lunghimawhna na hi uh hiam?
42012027	"Unokte khanzia na ngaihsun un. Na sem loin khau lah a khek kei uh hi. Tua hi napi Solomon nangawn a thupina khempeuh tawh a kizep laitakin, hihte zahin zong a kizem zo kei hi.
42012028	Upna neu mite aw, tuni-in hih lai-ah om a, zing ciangin mei-a kikhul ding lopa kung khat, Pasian in tua zahin zem ahileh amah in note puan hong guan zaw tham ding hi!
42012029	Tua ahi ciangin na nek na dawn ding uh ngaihsut penin nei kei un; tuate na lunghimawh kei un.
42012030	Hih nate khempeuh leitung lawkite in zon penin a nei uh hi. Hih nate na kisap lam uh na Pa un a thei hi.
42012031	Ahi zongin Pasian gam na zong un, tua hileh hih nate khempeuh hong piathuah ding hi.
42012032	"Tuu hon tawmkhate aw, na Pa un note gam hong piak ding lungkim khin ahi manin na lau kei un.
42012033	Na neihsate uh zuak unla mizawngte na pia un. A patvang thei lo sumbawm no le no na kiguan unla, a bei thei lo, gutate in a naih theih loh le nget nek theih lohna mun vantungah na gou uh khol un.
42012034	Ahang in, na gou omna munah na lungsim zong om ding hi.
42012035	"Na sem dinga kisa kholsa in om unla, meivak kuangsa-in om un;
42012036	mopi powi sima hong ciah kik, kong a kiuh pheta a honpah thei dinga a pu uh a ngakte bangin om un.
42012037	A pu uh a pai ciangin tua banga a ngak laitak a tuah nasemte hampha ding uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, an vak dingin amah kithawi-a, a nasemte sabuai ah kingamsakin amaute ankuang a lui ding hi.
42012038	Zan, vil nihna ahi zongin, vil thumna ahi zongin a pu a pai cianga, a pu in kigingsa-a om a tuah nasemte a hampha ding uh hi.
42012039	Ahi hangin note in hih thu na theitel un: Inn neipa in zanlai bang hunin gutate pai ding hiam cih theikhol leh a inn kiluhsak lo ding hi.
42012040	Na muanmawh loh hun laitakun Mihing Tapa hong pai ding ahi manin note zong pel loin kigingsa in om un,” a ci hi.
42012041	Peter in, “Topa aw, hih gentehna ko tung beka gen na hi hiam, ahikeh mikim tunga gen na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42012042	Topa in, “Tua ahileh ama inn sunga nasem dangte ukin, amaute a hunhuna an a pia dinga a pu in a koih, a muanhuai a pil sungtapipa kua ahi hiam?
42012043	A pu a ciah kik cianga tua banga a sep laitak a tuah nasempa hampha ding hi.
42012044	Thutak kong geninah, a pu in tuapa a neihsa khempeuh a uksak ding hi.
42012045	Ahi hangin tua nasempa in, ‘Ka pu sawtveipi hong tam na inteh,’ ci-in nasem-numei le nasem-pasalte satgawp henla, an ne in zu dawnin zu na kham leh,
42012046	a lamet loh ni le a khuadon loh hun laitakin a pu tung dinga, tua nasempa a pu in atnenin thu um lote tawh mun khatah a koihkhawm ding hi.
42012047	"A pu deihna thei napi-in, a pu deihna banga gamta lo-a, kigingkhol lo tua nasempa tam veipi a kisat ding hi.
42012048	Ahi hangin bangmah thei lo-a gawtna thuak nadinga kilawm nate a hihpa ahileh tawm vei kisat ding hi. Tampi a kipiate tung panin tampi kingen kik ding hi; tampi a ki-apte tung panin a tamzaw lai kingen kik ding hi.
42012049	"Leitungah mei puak dinga hong pai ka hi hi. Tua mei a kuang khin hileh ut sing!
42012050	Ahi hangin ka thuak ding baptisena khat oma, tua a kizawh siang mateng ka lungdong mahmah hi!
42012051	Leitung ah kilemna puak dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kha uh hiam? Hi lo hi, ken kong geninah kikhenna khah dinga hong pai ka hi hi.
42012052	Tu-a kipanin innkuan khat mi nga a phate, thum lang ah nih, nih langah thumin khat le khat kilangpang ciat ding uh hi.
42012053	A tapa langah a pa, a pa langah a tapa, a tanu langah a nu, a nu langah a tanu, monu langah teknu, teknu langah monu kilangpan ciatin amaute a kikhen ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42012054	Amah in mihonpite kiangah, “Nitumna-lam panin meii hong kai na muh uh ciangin, ‘Guah zu ding hi,’ na ci thei pah uh a, guah lah a zu takpi hi.
42012055	Leitaw-lam pana huih a nun ciangin, ‘Khua lum ding hi,’ na ci uh a, a lum takpi hi.
42012056	Kineihsiamte! Van le lei maitangte pianzia na khia thei uh hi. Bangci bangin tu lai hun khia thei lo na hi uh hiam?
42012057	"Bang hangin note in amaan le amaan lo khen thei lo na hi uh hiam?
42012058	Thukhenpa kiangah na langpa tawh na paikhawm laitak mah un lampi-ah na kilemkik zawh nading nakpi in hanciam in. Tua hi kei leh amah in thukhenpa kiangah nang hong kai dinga, thukhenpa in bupa tungah hong apin, tua bupa in nang thong sung hong denna ding hi.
42012059	Ken kong geninah, na liausum na piak khit siang matengin na suakta kei ding hi”c.
42013001	Tua laitakin tua lai-a om mi pawlkhat in, Pilate in Galilee-te sisan le a biakpiakna uh a helsakna Jesu kiangah a ko uh hi.
42013002	Jesu in, “Tua Galilee mite in hih banga a thuak manun a Galilee mipih dangte khempeuh sangin a mawhzaw hi dingin na ngaihsun uh hiam?
42013003	Ken kong geninah, a mawhzaw tuan kei uh hi! Ahi hangin note na kisik kei uh leh note zong na vekun na mangthang khin ding uh hi.
42013004	Ahikeh Siloam a tausang in a denlup mi sawm le giatte, Jerusalem a tengte khempeuh sangin a mawhzaw hi dingin na ngaihsun uh hiam?
42013005	Kong hilh tektek hi, a mawhzaw tuan kei uh hi! Ahi hangin note na kisik kei uh leh note zong na vekun na mangthang khin ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42013006	Tua ciangin amah in, hih gentehna gen a: “Mi khat in a lenggui lo sunga kisuan theikung khat a nei hi. Amah a gah en dingin a pai hangin a gah khat beek a mu kei hi.
42013007	Tua ciangin amah in a lenggui lo cingpa kiangah, ‘Kum thum sung tawntung thei a gah hiam, cih en dingin kong paipai hangin a gah khat beek ka mu kei hi. Phuk tan in! Lei hoih pengsak lel hi lo hiam?’ ci hi.
42013008	"Tuapa in, ‘Pu aw, kum khat khawi lai dih in, a kimkot toin leihoih na sung phot dih ning.
42013009	Ni kum ciang a gah le pha! A gah kei leh tua ciangin phuk in,’ ci-in dawng hi,” a ci hi.
42013010	Sabbath ni khat Jesu in synagogue-te khatah thu a hilh hi.
42013011	Tua lai-ah kha khat in, kum sawm-le-giat sungtak a poisak numei khat a om hi. Tuanu a nung kulin a dingtang thei peuhmah kei hi.
42013012	Jesu in amah a muh ciangin a mai lamah samkhia a, “Numei aw, na zawnkhalna panin hong kikhahkhia hi,” a ci hi.
42013013	Tua ciangin amah in tuanu tungah a khutte nga-a, tua khit phetin tuanu dingtang thei-a Pasian a phat hi.
42013014	Sabbath ni-in Jesu in cina damsak ahi manin synagogue ukpa lungkim lo a mipite kiangah, “Nasep hun ding ni guktak a om hi. Tua ahi ciangin a kidamsak dingin tua nite in hong pai unla, Sabbath ni-in hong pai kei zaw un,” a ci hi.
42013015	Topa in tuapa kiangah, “No kineihsiamte, Sabbath ni-in na bawngte na laate uh a buk pan sutin nomau ciat in tui pia dingin paipih hi lo na hi uh hiam?
42013016	Tua ahileh kum sawm le giat sungtak Satan in a hencip hih Abraham tanu a kihencipna pan Sabbath ni-in khahkhiat huaizaw lo ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
42013017	Amah in hih thu a gen ciangin amah a langpangte khempeuh zahlak uh a, ahi hangin mipite ahileh ama hih nalamdangte hangin a kipak uh hi.
42013018	Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Pasian gam bang tawh kibang ahi hiam? Bang tawh ka teh ding hiam?
42013019	Mi khat in huan sunga a cin ankam tang tawh kibang hi. Tua ankam khangto a, kungpi suakin a hiangte tungah huihlak vasate a tuang uh hi,” a ci hi.
42013020	Amah in, “Pasian gam bang tawh ka teh ding hiam?
42013021	Numei khat in a ki mekman buhnel lompia khat a khangsak zo-a, a sawh silngo tawh kibang hi,” a ci lai hi.
42013022	Tua ciangin Jerusalem lam manawhin a pai kawmin khuapi khuaneute ah lutin thu a hilh hi.
42013023	Mi khat in ama kiangah, “Topa, mi tawmkha bekin hotkhiatna ngah ding uh ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in amaute kiangah,
42013024	"Kong kawcik-a lut ding na hahkat un. Bang hang hiam cihleh, mi tampi in lut ding a hanciam ding uh a, ahi hangin a lut thei kei ding uh hi, cih kong gen hi.
42013025	Inn neipa khatvei thoin kong a khak khit nak leh note a pualamah dingin, ‘Topa aw, kote kong hong hon in,’ ci-in kongkhak kiu-in na ngen ding uh hi. “Ahi hangin amah in, ‘Note kong thei kei hi; koi pan hong pai cih zong kong thei kei hi,’ ci-in dawng ding hi.
42013026	"Tua ciangin note in, ‘Nang tawh i nekhawm i dawnkhawm a, ka kongzingte uah zong thu na hilh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi.
42013027	"Ahi hangin amah in, ‘Note kong thei kei hi; koi pan hong pai cih zong kong thei kei hi, no a tatkhelte aw paimang un!’ ci-in hong dawng ding hi.
42013028	"Abraham, Isaac, Jacob le kamsangte khempeuh, Pasian gam sungah om a, note pualamah hong kihawlkhia cih na muh uh ciangin tua lai-ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.
42013029	Nisuahna, nitumna, leilu, leitaw panin mite hong pai ding uh a, Pasian gam sunga pawipi-ah amau mun ciatah a tu ding uh hi.
42013030	A nunungte masa a, a masate nunung cih a om takpi hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
42013031	Tua hun laitakin Jesu kiangah Pharisee-te pawlkhat va pai uh a ama kiangah, “Hih lai nusia in mundang khatpeuh ah pai in. Herod in nang hong that nuam hi,” a ci uh hi.
42013032	Amah in, “Pai-in tua ngia kiangah, ‘Tuni le zingciang dawite hawlkhia-in mite ka damsak dinga, a ni thumna ni-in ka tupna ka tung ding hi, ci hi,’ ci-in va gen un.
42013033	Bangbang ahi zongin tuni, zingciang le thaiciang ka vakvak lai ding hi - ahang in, Jerusalem pualamah kamsang kuamah a si thei peuhmah kei ding hi!
42013034	"Jerusalem aw, Jerusalem, kamsangte that-a, nang kianga hong kisawlte suangin a deng nang, akpi in a note a kha nuai-ah a khop bangin na tate ka khop nop hangin nang na ut kei hi!
42013035	En in, na inn a hawmmangsa in kinusia ding hi. Ken kong geninah, ‘Topa minb hong paipa in thupha a ngah hi,’a na cih matengin nong mu kik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42014001	Sabbath ni khat, a kipi-et mahmah Pharisee khat innah Jesu an ne dingin a pai ciangin amah limtakin a encik uh hi.
42014002	Tua lai-ah, ama mai-ah tuipuak natna a vei mi khat a om hi.
42014003	Jesu in Pharisee-te le thukham siamte kiangah, “Sabbath ni-a cina damsak ding thukham tawh kituak hiam, kituak lo hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42014004	Ahi hangin amaute a dai khipkhep uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, tua mipa lenin damsaka, a ciahsak hi.
42014005	Tua khit ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note lakah khatpeuh in a tapaa ahikeh a bawngtal khat, Sabbath ni-in tuikhuk sungah kia leh a kaikhiapah lo ding kua om ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42014006	Amaute in gen ding a nei kei uh hi.
42014007	Lenglate in sabuai-a tutna thupite a tel uh amah in a theih ciangin amaute kiangah gentehna gena:
42014008	"Mi khatpeuh in mopi pawi-a hong sap ciangin no sanga lianzawte na kisam kha thei ding ahi manin, tutna thupite ah na tu kei un.
42014009	Tua hileh note gel hong samkhawm inntekpa hong pai-in na kiangah, ‘Na tutna tuapa na awn in,’ hong ci ding hi. Tua ciangin nang zahlakin a thupi lo penna munah na tut kul kha ding hi.
42014010	Ahi hangin nang hong kisap ciangin aniam penna munah na tut leh, inntekpa hong pai-in nang kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, a hoihzaw mun tutna ah na tuto in,’ hong ci ding hi. Tua ciangin na lenglapihte khempeuh lakah na angtang ding hi.
42014011	Ahang in, amah le amah a kitawisangte kiniamsak dinga, amah le amah a kiniamsakte kitawisang ding hi,” a ci hi.
42014012	Tua ciangin Jesu in a inntekpa kiangah, “Sun-an ahi zongin nitak-an ahi zongin na vak ciangin, na lawmte ahi zongin na sanggamte ahi zongin na tanaute ahi zongin sum hau na vengte ahi zongin sam kei in. Tua banga na sap leh amaute in nang hong samin hong thuk kik ding uh hi.
42014013	Anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, mipoite, khebaite le mittawte na sam zaw in,
42014014	tua hileh thupha na ngah ding hi. Amaute in nang hong thuk zawh loh hangin thumaante thawhkik ciangin nang hong kithukkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
42014015	Amah tawh sabuai-a tukhawmte khat in hih thu a zak ciangin Jesu kiangah, “Pasian gam sunga pawi-a an ne dingte, thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42014016	Jesu in, “Mi khat in pawi lianpi khat bawlin mi tampi a kho hi.
42014017	Tua anvak pawi hun ciangin a khohsate kiangah, ‘Hong pai ta un, na khempeuh a baihsa-in om zo hi,’ ci-a gen dingin a nasemte a sawl hi.
42014018	"Ahi hangin a khohsate in a kibangin paulap a nei ciat uh hi. A masa pa in, ‘Lo khat a lei khin phet ka hi a, pai-in tua lo ka et kul hi. Nong hehpihna-in hong pengsak in,’ ci hi.
42014019	"Adang khat in, ‘Bawng kap nga a lei khin phet ka hi-a tuate sin dingin a pai kimlai ka hi hi. Nong hehpihna-in kei hong pengsak in,’ ci hi.
42014020	"Adang khat leuleu in, ‘Zi nei khin phet ka hi hi, tua ahi ciangin kong pai thei kei ding hi,’ ci hi.
42014021	"Nasempa ciah kika, a pu kiangah hih thute a zasak hi. Tua ciangin inn neipa heha, a nasempa kiangah, ‘Khuapi kongzingte le kongzingneute ah pai mengmeng inla, mizawngte, mipoite, mittawte le khebaite hong lutsak in,’ ci-in thu pia hi.
42014022	"Nasempa in ‘Pu aw, nong thupiak bangin kihih khin zo hi, ahi hangin mun awng lai hi,’ ci hi.
42014023	"Tua ciangin a pu in nasempa kiangah, ‘Lamliante le lamneute ah va pai inla, ka inn a dim nadingin amaute hong lutsak in.
42014024	Ken kong geninah, a kikhosate khat beek in ka anvak a ciam kha kei ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
42014025	Mihon tampi tawh Jesu a paikhawm laitakin amaute lam nga in,
42014026	"Kei kianga hong pai mi khatpeuh in a nu, a pa, a zi a tate le a sanggampate, a sang gamnute tham lo ama nuntakna nangawn a muhdah kei leh amah, kei nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
42014027	Tua hi-a ama singlamteh pua-a ka nung hong zui lo peuhmah ka nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
42014028	"Gentehna-in note lakah tausang dawh nuam khat om leh a tua tausang a dawh zawh nading sum a kicing ding a nei hiam, cih thei dingin tu-in aman ding tuat masa lo ding ahi hiam?
42014029	Ahang in, amah in a bulpi pan khin napi, zosiang zo kei leh a mu khempeuh in nuihsan dinga,
42014030	‘Hih pa in tausang dawh kipan khin napi a zosiang kei hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
42014031	"Ahikeh gentehna in kumpipa khat in kumpi dang khat sim dingin kithawi leh mi tul sawmnih tawh a kuanpa, mi tul sawm tawh a nang zo ding hiam, cih tu photin, ngaihsun masa lo ding ahi hiam?
42014032	Amah a kingap kei leh, a galpa a gamlapi-a a om lai-in ama kiangah palai sawl dinga, kilem nadingin a thumsak ding hi.
42014033	Tua mah bangin note laka na khempeuh a nusia lo peuhmah ka nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
42014034	"Ci a lim hangin a alna mang leh bangci in ki-al kiksak thei ding hiam?
42014035	Leitak ading ahi zongin eklei dinga khol ding ahi zongin kimanna a nei kei hi; kibuakhia lel hi. “Zak nading bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” a ci hi.
42015001	Tua ciangin ama thu gen ngai dingin siahdongte le “mawhneite” ama kimah a kikhawm uh hi.
42015002	Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate in, “Hih mipa in mawhneite ngai-in amaute tawh an a nekhawm hi,” ci-in a phunsan uh hi.
42015003	Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah gentehna gen a,
42015004	"Note lakah khat in tuu zakhat nei a, tuate lakah khat mansuah leh sawmkua le kua-te pawn lakah nusia in a tuu mang a muh mateng zong lo ding ahi hiam?
42015005	A muh ciangin lungnuamtakin a liangko tungah pua-in,
42015006	innah a ciah hi. Tua ciangin amah in a lawmte le a vengte samkhawm a, ‘Kei hong nuampih un; ka tuu mang ka mu zo hi,’ ci hi.
42015007	Tua mah bangin kisik a kul lo a thumaan mi sawm kua le kua-te sangin mawh nei khat a kisik na hangin vantung ah nuamna a lianzaw ding hi, cih kong hilh hi.
42015008	"Ahikeh gentehna-in numei khat in nguntanga sawm nei in khat mansuah leh tuanu in mei vaka a inn phiatin a muh mateng limtakin zong lo ding ahi hiam?
42015009	A muh ciangin a lawmte le a vengte samkhawm in, ‘Kei hong nuampih un; ka sum mang ka mu zo hi,’ ci hi.
42015010	Tua mah bangin ken kong geninah, mawhnei mi khat a kisikna hangin Pasian vansawltakte omna ah nuamna a om hi,” a ci hi.
42015011	Jesu in a thugen zomlai a, “Tapa nih a nei mi khat a om hi.
42015012	A nauzawpa in a pa kiangah, ‘Pa aw, i goute sung pan kei tanh ding hong khenkhia in,’ ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a neihsate amau gel a hawmsak hi.
42015013	"Tua khit a sawt loin a nauzawpa in a neih khempeuh kaikhawmin, gamlapi ah pai-a noptatna-in a sum neih teng a zangbei hi.
42015014	A neih khempeuh a zat bei khit ciangin tua gambup ah kialpi tunga, amah a kitasam hi.
42015015	Tua ciangin amah tua gam mite khat kiangah sum thalawh dingin pai-a, tuapa in amah a lo ah vok-an pia dingin a sawl hi.
42015016	Amah in vokte nek begapte duhgawh mahmah a, ahi hangin kuamah in bangmah a pia kei hi.
42015017	"Amah le amah a kiphawkkhiat ciangin, ‘Ka pa inn a sum thalawhte tampi in an khamval nei ding uh a, kei lah hih lai-ah ka puksi dektak hi!
42015018	Kei dingkhia ning ka pa kiangah ciah kikin: Pa aw, vantung le nangma tungah ka mawh zo hi.
42015019	Nang ta cih dingin ka kilawm nawn kei hi; na sum thalawhte khat bangin hong koih in ka ci ding hi,’ ci hi.
42015020	Tua ahi ciangin amah tho-a, a pa kiangah a ciah hi. “Ahi hangin inn pan gamlapi-a a om laitakin a pa in na galmuh-a, amah khuatuah mahmah ahi manin, a tapa delha pumkawi-in a nam hi.
42015021	"A tapa in ama kiangah, ‘Pa aw vantung le nangma tungah ka mawh zo hi. Nang ta cih dingin ka kilawm nawn kei hi,’b ci hi.
42015022	"Ahi hangin a pa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘Manlang un! Puan a hoih pen hong la unla amah silhsak un. A khutme ah zungbuh bunsak unla khedap zong bulhsak un.
42015023	Bawngno vakthau pen hong paipih unla go un. Pawipi bawlin lawm ni.
42015024	Ahang in, hih a si khinsa ka tapa tu-in hing kik zo hi; a mangsa hi-a tu-in kimu kik hi,’ ci hi. Tua ahi ciangin amaute in a lawm uh hi.
42015025	"Tua hun laitakin a tapa uzaw pen lo-ah a om hi. Inn kiang a tun ciangin tumging le lamna a za hi.
42015026	Tua ahi ciangin amah in nasemte khat sama, ‘Bang kihih ahi hiam?’ ci-in dong hi.
42015027	Amah in, ‘Na sanggampa hong ciah ta a, cidam ludamtakin na pa kiang hong tung kik ahi manin na pa in amah bawngno vakthau pen gawh hi,’ ci hi.
42015028	"A u pa heh a inn sungah a lut nuam kei hi. Tua ahi ciangin a pa pusuakin amah va zol hi.
42015029	Ahi hangin amah in a pa kiangah, ‘Ngaihsun in! Kum hi tan vei nang adingin sila-na ka sema, nong thupiakte ka mang lo ngei peuhmah kei hi. Tua hi napi ka lawmte tawh ka lop nadingin keelno khat nangawn nong pia ngei kei hi.
42015030	Ahi hangin na neihsa teng numei kizuakte tawh a zatmang khit cianga inn hong zuan hih na tapa, bawngno vakthau pen na gawh tazen hi!’ ci hi.
42015031	"A pa in, ‘Ka ta aw, nang le kei i omkhawm dena, ka neih khempeuh nang aa ahi hi.
42015032	Ahi hangin na sanggampa a si khinsa tu-in hong hing kika, a mangsa tu-in kimu kik ahi manin nuamin i lop a kul hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
