42016001	Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Khatvei mihau khat om a, sungtapipa in a pu neihsa teng a zat beisak hi, ci-in kingawh hi.
42016002	Tua ahi ciangin a pu in amah sama, ‘Nang thu ka zak bang thu ahi hiam? Ka sungtapipa hi thei nawn lo ding na hi manin na sum ciamtehna hong lak dih in,’ ci hi.
42016003	"Sungtapipa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Tu-in bang cih ding ka hi hiam? Ka pu in ka nasepna pan hong tawpsak ding hi. Lei to dingin lah ka hat nawn kei a, khut dawha nget ding lah ka maizum hi.
42016004	Hih lai-a ka nasep ka tan ciangin mite in a innuah kei hong san theih nadingun ka hih ding ka thei ta hi,’ ci hi.
42016005	"Tua ahi ciangin amah in a pu tunga leibate a banbanin a sam hi. Amah in a masa pen kiangah, ‘Ka pu tungah bangzah na ba hiam?’ ci-in dong hi.
42016006	"Amah in, ‘Olive thau gallona za giat hi,’ ci hi. “Sungtapipa in ama kiangah, ‘Na leiba lai va la inla, tu mengmeng in zali in bawl in,’ ci hi.
42016007	"Tua ciangin a nihna pa kiangah, ‘Nang bang zah ba na hi hiam?’ ci-in dong hi. “Amah in, ‘Mangbuh seub tul khat hi,’ci-in dawng hi. “Amah in ama kiangah, ‘Na leiba lai va la inla, zagiat-in bawl in,’ ci-in gen hi.
42016008	"A pu in a simtat nasempa geelsiam mahmah ahi manin a phat hi. Ahang in, khuavak sunga om mite sangin hih leitung mite in amaute kibatpihte tawh kizop zia ah a geelsiam zaw uh hi.
42016009	Ken kong geninah, leitung hauhnate lawm ngah nadingin na zang un; tua hileh a bei ciangin tawntung tenna ah note hong kimuak ding hi.
42016010	"Tawmcik tunga muanhuaite tampi tungah kimuang thei dinga, tawmcik tunga muanhuai lote tampi tungah zong a muanhuai kei ding hi.
42016011	Tua ahi ciangin note leitung hauhna kem dingin na muanhuai kei uh leh hauhna taktak kem dingin kua in hong muang ding ahi hiam?
42016012	Midang khatpeuh neihsa tungah na muanhuai kei uh leh no neihsa ding kua in hong pia ding ahi hiam?
42016013	"Kuamah in to nih na a sem khawm thei kei hi. Khat itin khat a mudah hiam, khat beelin a khat a simmawh hiam, khat zawsang hi ding hi. Pasian na le Sum na, na sem khawm thei kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
42016014	Sum iplah Pharisee-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Jesu a zahpih uh hi.
42016015	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note, mite mitmuh ah dik na kitansak uh hangin Pasian in na lungtangte uh a thei hi. Mite in manpha a sak mahmah nate Pasian muhna-ah kihhuai hi.
42016016	"John hun masiah Thukham le Kamsangte a kitangko hi. Tua khita kipan, Pasian gam lungdamna thu kihilhin, tua sungah thahatthu-in mikim a lut gawp hi.
42016017	Thukham panin a mal themcik khat a mawk maiman sangin van le lei a mawk maiman ding a baihzaw ding hi.
42016018	"A zi ma a numei dang khat a tenpih peuhmah, angkawmpa suak a, a kimasa numei a tenpih peuhmah angkawmpa a suak hi.
42016019	"Khatvei sumhaupa khat a om hi; tuapa in puan dupsan le saihadial puan silh a, nisimin noptatin a om hi.
42016020	A kongpi gei-ah meima in a pumtuam Lazarus min nei khutdawh-a ngen khat kikoih hi.
42016021	Amah in sumhaupa sabuai pana kia an-nengte a lunggulh hi. Uite nangawn pai-in ama meimate a liahsak uh hi.
42016022	"Tua khutdawh-a ngenpa a sih ciangin vansawltakte in Abraham kiangah a puak uh hi. Sumhaupa zong si-a, a kivui hi.
42016023	Amah gentheipi-a a omna mun hellc khuk sung pan a khuadak leh agal pekpekah Abraham le a kianga om Lazarus a mu hi.
42016024	Tua ciangin amah sama, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Hih mei sungah gimna nakpi in ka thuak hi. Lazarus in a khutme dawn tui diahin ka leii hong votsak dingin hong sawl in,’ ci hi.
42016025	"Ahi hangin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, na nuntak hun sungin na hoihte na ngah a, tua laitakin Lazarus in na hoih lote a ngah hi, cih phawk in. Ahi hangin tu-in amah hih lai-ah nuamsa a, nang na hileh gimna na thuak hi.
42016026	Tua banah eite kikalah guam thukpi khat om a, tua kantanin hih lai pan tua lai-a pai nuamte a pai thei kei uh hi; tua lai pan hih lai ko kianga hong pai nuamte a pai thei kei uh hi,’ ci hi.
42016027	"Amah in, ‘Tua ahileh pa aw, ka pa inn ah Lazarus nong sawlsak ding kong thum hi.
42016028	Ahang in, sanggam pasal nga ka nei hi. Tua ka sanggamte hih gentheihna mun hong tun loh nadingun amah in amaute va vauhilhsak hen,’ ci-in dawng hi.
42016029	"Abraham in, ‘Amaute in Moses le Kamsangte a nei uh hi; tuate thu na ngai uh hen,’ ci-in dawng kik hi.
42016030	"Tuapa in, ‘Hi lo hi, pa Abraham aw, a sisate kiang panin amau kiangah khatpeuh va pai leh amaute kisik ding uh hi,’ ci hi.
42016031	"Amah in ama kiangah, ‘Amaute in Moses le Kamsangte thu a ngaih nop kei uh leh a sisa khatpeuh a thawh kik hangin a taksang tuan kei ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
42017001	Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, “Mite mawhna a bawlsak ding thute hong tung pelmawh ding hi. Ahi hangin tua mawhnate a bawlsak mipa in nakpitakin gimna thuak ta hen.
42017002	Hih naupangnote mawhna a bawlsak tua mipa, a ngawgah angawina suang kikhihin tuipi sungah kipai leh ama adingin hoihzaw ding hi.
42017003	Tua ahi ciangin note kigalging un. “Na sanggampa in mawhna a bawl leh tai inla, a kisik leh ama mawhna maisak in.
42017004	Nang tungah ni khatin mawhna sagih vei hong bawla, nang kiangah sagih vei mah hong pai-in, ‘Ka kisik hi,’ hong cihleh maisak in,” ci-in a gen hi.
42017005	Sawltakpite in Topa kiangah, “Ka upna uh hong khangsak in,” a ci uh hi.
42017006	Amah in, “Note in ankam tang cia-a neu upna na neih uh leh hih nailung ankung kiangah, ‘Kizunglot inla, tuipi sungah va po in,’ ci le uh cin na thu uh hong mang ding hi.
42017007	"Gentehna-in, note lakah khat in lokai ahikeh tuucing nasem khat nei hi. Tua nasempa lo pan a ciah ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Tu-in hong pai inla an ne dingin tukhawm ni,’ a ci ding hiam?
42017008	‘Ka nitak-an kuang hong lui inla a kigingsa-in om in; an ka nek ka dawn laitakin hong tuan-vai in; ka kham khit ciangin nang na ne na dawn thei pan ding hi,’ ci zaw ding hi lo ahi hiam?
42017009	Amah in a nasempa tunga sep dinga a hilh bangin sem ahi manin ama tungah a lungdam ding hiam?
42017010	Tua ahi ciangin note in zong no tunga hong kigen khempeuh na hih khit uh ciangin, ‘Eite, a kizen lo na semte i hi hi; i sep ding zah bek a sem i hi hi,’ na cih ding uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42017011	Jerusalem lam manawh-a a pai laitakin Jesu in Samaria le Galilee kikal gamgi dung a zui hi.
42017012	Amah khuaneu khatah a lut laitakin phak natnaa a vei mi sawm in amah a na dawntuah uh hi. A gamlat simna munah ding uh a,
42017013	"Jesu aw, Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in!” ci-in nakpi in a galsap uh hi.
42017014	Amah in tuate a muh ciangin, “Pai unla, siampite kiangah va kilak un,” a ci hi. Tua banga a pai kimlai mah amaute a siang uh hi.
42017015	Amaute lakah khat in a damsiang lam a kitheih ciangin va pai kika, aw ngaihtakin Pasian a phat hi.
42017016	Amah Jesu khephung kidenna-in a lungdamna a gen hi – amah Samaria mi ahi hi.
42017017	Jesu in, “A kisiangsak sawm pha hi lo ahi hiam? Adang kuate koi-ah om uh ahi hiam?
42017018	Hih mi namdang pa longal hong kileh kika Pasian phat ding khat beek om lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42017019	Tua ciangin amah in tuapa kiangah, “Tho inla pai in; na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
42017020	Khat vei Pharisee-te in Pasian gam hong tun ding hun a dot uh ciangin Jesu in, “Pasian-gam mit-a kimu thei-in hong tung lo ding hi.
42017021	Mite in, ‘Pasian gam hih lai-ah om hi, hua lai-ah om hi,’ zong a ci thei kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian gam note sungahb a om hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42017022	Tua ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Note in Mihing Tapa nite lakah khat na muh nop hun uh hong tung dinga, ahi hangin na mu kei ding uh hi.
42017023	Mite in note kiangah, ‘Amah hua lai-ah om hi!’ Ahikeh ‘Amah hih lai-ah om hi!’ hong ci ding uh hi. Amaute na nungdelh kei un.
42017024	Ahang in, Mihing Tapa, ama ni-inc khuaphelep in van mong khat pan mong khat dong phia in a tanzal tawh kibang ding hi.
42017025	Ahi hangin amah in na tampi thuak masa-in, hih khang mite in amah a nolh phot ding uh hi.
42017026	"Mihing Tapa hun in, Noah hun lai mah bang ding hi.
42017027	Noah gunkuangpi sungah a lut ni dongin mite in ne-in dawna, mo la mo kha-in a om uh hi. Tui khanga amaute khempeuh a tuum mang hi.
42017028	"Lot hunlai-in zong tua mah bang ahi hi. Mite in ne-in dawna, lei-in zuak-a suanin a lam uh hi.
42017029	Ahi hangin Lot in Sodom a nusiat ni-in vantung panin kaat le meikuang zusuk a, amaute khempeuh a kangtummang uh hi.
42017030	"Mihing Tapa hong kilaak ni ciangin tua bang tektek hi ding hi.
42017031	Tua ni-in innkhum tunga omte kuamah inn sunga vante la dingin kumsuk kei hen. Tua mah bangin lo-a omte, na khatpeuh la dingin ciah kik kei hen.
42017032	Lot’ zi phawk gige un!
42017033	A nuntakna a hu nuamte in mangsak dinga, a nuntakna a mangsakte in hu ding uh hi.
42017034	Ken kong geninah, tua zanin lupna khatah mi nih lumkhawm dinga; khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi.
42017035	Numei nih in an gawikhawm dinga; khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi.
42017036	Lo lai-ah mi nih om dinga; khat kila-in khat kinusia ding hi,”d a ci hi.
42017037	Amaute in, “Koi lai-ah maw, Topa?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Amah in, “Mi siluang omna peuhpeuh ah musanete a kikhawm ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42018001	Tua ciangin Jesu in a nungzuite, lungkia lo-a thu a nget tawntung nadingun gentehna khat a gen hi.
42018002	Amah in, “Khuapi khatah Pasian kihta lo, mite a awlmawh lo thukhenpa khat om hi.
42018003	Tua khuapi sunga meigongnu khat ama kiangah pai ngitnget a, ‘Ka langpa tungah mantakin thu hong khensak in,’ ci-in ngen hi.
42018004	"Amah in tawlkhat sung a nial hi. Ahi hangin a tawpkhakna ah, ‘Pasian nangawn kihta loin mite ka awlmawh loh hangin,
42018005	hih meigongnu in hong buaisak den ahi manin, amah hong paipai-a kei hong gimsak ngi-ingei nawn loh nadingin a thu tangtakin khensak ning!’ ci-in ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
42018006	Tua ciangin Topa in, “A thutang lo tua thukhenpa gente ngaihsun dih un.
42018007	Pasian in, sun le zana ama kianga kiko, a teelsate adingin thu khensak lo ding ahi hiam? Amaute ngaksaksak ding ahi hiam?
42018008	Ken kong geninah amaute thu manlangtakin a khensak ding hi. Ahi zongin Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin leitungah upna a mu ding hiam?” a ci hi.
42018009	Amaute thumaanna kimuanga midangte khempeuh a neumuh pawlkhatte tungah Jesu in gentehna gen a,
42018010	"Pharisee khat le siahdong khat mi nih thungen dingin biakinnpi ah a pai uh hi.
42018011	Pharisee-pa dingto a, ama thua amahmah in ngena, ‘Pasian aw, keimah midangte khempeuh - misuamte, a kheltatte, angkawmte tham lo hih siahdongpa bang hi lo ka hi manin na tungah ka lungdam hi.
42018012	Nipikal khatin nih vei an tangin ka ngah khempeuh sawm ah khat ka pia hi,’ ci hi.
42018013	"Siahdongpa ahileh a gamlapi-ah a ding hi. Amah in vantung lam nangawn ento loin a awm tum-a, ‘Pasian aw, mawhneipa keimah hong lainat in,’ ci hi.
42018014	"A khat pa sangin hih pa, Pasian mai-ah diktangsa in innah a ciah hi, cih kong gen hi. Ahang in, amah le amah a kitawisangte kiniamsak dinga amah le amah a kiniamsakte a kitawisang ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018015	"Naungekte, Jesu a lawngsak dingin mipite in ama kiangah a paipih uh hi. Nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin amaute a tai uh hi.
42018016	Ahi hangin Jesu in naupangnote ama kiangah sama, “Naupangnote ka kiangah hong paisak un. Amaute na dal kei un, Pasian gam in hih bangte aa ahi hi.
42018017	Thutak kong geninah, naupangno banga Pasian gam a sang lo peuhmah tua gam sungah a lut ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018018	Ukpa khat in ama kiangah, “A hoih siapa aw, nuntak tawntungna ka luah theih nadingin ka hih pelmawh ding bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42018019	Jesu in, “Bang hangin kei hoih hong ci na hi hiam? Pasian bek longal kuamah a hoih a om kei hi.
42018020	Angkawm kei in, tual that kei in, gu kei in, zuau teci pang kei in, na nu na pa pahtawi in,b cih thupiakte na theihsa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42018021	Tuapa in, “Tuate khempeuh ka neu-a kipan ka zuihsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42018022	Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin ama kiangah, “Na khat na samlai hi. Na neihsa khempeuh zuak inla, mizawngte pia in. Tua hileh vantungah gou na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin hong pai-in kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
42018023	Tuapa in hih thu a zak ciangin hau mahmah ahi manin a lungsi dedu hi.
42018024	Jesu in amah en a, “A haute Pasian gam a lut nading haksa mahmah hi!
42018025	Mihau khat Pasian-gam sungah a lut ding sangin kala-oh khat phimbil vangah a thawl ding a baihzaw takpi ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018026	Hih thu a zate in, “Tua hileh hotkhiatna kua in ngah zo peuhmah ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
42018027	Jesu in “Mihing hih theih lohte Pasian in hih thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42018028	Peter in ama kiangah, “Kote in ka neih khempeuh uh nusia in nang kong zui uh hi!” a ci hi.
42018029	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, Pasian gam hangin a inn, a zi, a sanggampate, a nu-le-pa le a tate a nusia peuhmah in,
42018030	hih khanghunah a zah tampi ngah in, hong tung ding khanghunah nuntak tawntungna a ngah ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018031	Jesu in Sawm le nihte paipih tuamin amaute kiangah, “Eite Jerusalem ah i paito dinga, Mihing Tapa thu kamsangte gelhsa khempeuh a tangtung ding hi.
42018032	Gentile-te khutah amah a piakhia ding uh hi. Tuate in amah zahko-in, engbawlin, cilphih-in, satin that ding uh hi.
42018033	A ni thumna ni-in a tho kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
42018034	Nungzuite in hih thute khat beek a theitel kei uh hi. Amaute tungah a khiatna ki-im lai-a, amah in bang thu gen hiam, cih a thei kei uh hi.
42018035	Jericho ah Jesu a tun kuan ciangin mittaw khat lamgei-ah tu-in khutdawhin a ngen hi.
42018036	Tuapa in mihonpi lam pai a zak ciangin, bang thu piang hiam, cih a dong hi.
42018037	Amaute in ama kiangah, “Nazareth mi Jesu in hong nawk laitak hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
42018038	Amah in, “David Tapa Jesu aw, kei hong lainat in!” ci-in a galsap hi.
42018039	A madawk mipite in amah tai uh a, daitaka a om nadingin a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin tuapa in, “David Tapa aw, kei hong lainat in,” ci-in a kinak ko semsem hi.
42018040	Jesu khawl-a ama kiangah tuapa a paipih nadingun thu a pia hi. Tuapa ama kiangah a tun ciangin Jesu in,
42018041	"Bang kong hihsak ding deih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Topa aw, khua ka mu nuam hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42018042	Jesu in, “Khua mu ta in; na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi,” a ci hi.
42018043	Tua khit phetin khua mu pah lian a, Jesu nungzui-in Pasian a phat hi. Mi khempeuh in zong tua thu a muh uh ciangin Pasian a phat uh hi.
42019001	Jericho ah Jesu luta kantanin a pai hi.
42019002	Tua lai-ah Zacchaeus min nei mi khat a om hi. Amah siah dong makai ahi manin a hau mahmah hi.
42019003	Amah in Jesu kua hiam, cih a mu nuam hi. Ahi hangin a tun tom mi hi-a mihonpite hangin a mu thei kei hi.
42019004	Tua ahi ciangin amah na matai a, Jesu in a tot nading lampi gei-a po theithek kung khatah a na kah hi.
42019005	Tua munah Jesu a tun ciangin ento a, ama kiangah, “Zacchaeus aw, hong kum mengmeng in. Tuni-in na innah kong taam kul hi,” a ci hi.
42019006	Tua ahi ciangin amah kumsuk pah a lungdam mahmah in a muak hi.
42019007	Mipite khempeuh in hih thu a muh uh ciangin, “Amah ‘mawhneipa’ inn ah zin tung dingin pai tazen hi,” ci-in a phun uh hi.
42019008	Ahi hangin Zacchaeus dingto a Topa kiangah, “Topa, en in! Hih lai-ah tu mahmah in ka neihsa alang mizawngte ka pia hi. Mi khatpeuh khemin ama neihsa ka laksak leh a zah li-in ka din kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
42019009	Jesu in ama kiangah, “Hih mipa zong Abraham tapa ahi manin tuni-in hih innsungah hotkhiatna a tung ta hi.
42019010	Ahang in, Mihing Tapa, a mangsate zong ding le honkhia dinga hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42019011	Amah in Jerusalem naih ta a, mipite in Pasian gam a kilangpah dingin ngaihsun uh ahi manin amaute in Jesu thugen a ngaih laitakun amah in amaute kiangah gentehna khat gena,
42019012	"Kumpi za kipiasakin tua khit cianga hong ciah kik dingin nampi mi khat gamlapi gamah a zinkhia hi.
42019013	Tua ahi ciangin amah in a nasemte sawm sama, amaute minaa sawm ciat pia in, ‘Kong ciah kik mateng hih sumte tawh summet na bawl un,’ ci hi.
42019014	"Ahi hangin gam mite in amah mudah uh a, ama kiangah, ‘Hih mipa ka kumpi dingun ka deih kei uh hi,’ ci-a gen dingin a nungah palaite a nungdelhsak uh hi.
42019015	"Ahi zongin amah kumpi suak veve a, tua khit ciangin innah a ciah kik hi. Tua ciangin sum a ap a nasemte in bangzah na metsak hiam, cih thei nuamin a nasemte a samsak hi.
42019016	"A khatna pa va pai a, ‘Pu aw, na mina khat in sawm a met hi,’ ci hi.
42019017	"A pu in, ‘A hoih ka nasempa aw, na hoih na sem hi! Thu neu mahmah khat tungah muanhuai na hi manin khuapi lian sawm na uk in,’ ci hi.
42019018	"A nihna pa va pai a, ‘Pu aw, na mina khat in nga a met hi,’ ci hi.
42019019	"A pu in, ‘Nang, khuapi lian nga na uk in,’ ci-in a dawng hi.
42019020	"Tua ciangin a nasem dang khat va pai-a, ‘Pu aw, hih lai-ah na mina a om hi; puanthem tawh tunin mun khatah ka koihcip hi.
42019021	Nang mi genhak na hi manin kong kihta hi. Na koih lohpi na lakhia a, na vawh lohpi na at hi,’ ci hi.
42019022	"A pu in, ‘Nang a tatsia nasempa aw, na thugente tawh kizui-in na tungah thu ka khen ding hi! Kei mi genhak hi-in, ka koih lohna ah lakhia in, ka vawh lohpi at ka hilam thei takpi na hi hiam?
42019023	Tua ahileh bang hangin kong ciah kik cianga ka sum a met tawh ka ngah kik theih nadingin ka sum, sumsinte na ap lo na hi hiam?’ ci hi.
42019024	"Tua ciangin amah in a gei-a dingte kiangah, ‘Tuapa tung pan ama mina lakhia unla, mina sawm a neipa na pia un,’ ci hi.
42019025	"Amaute in, ‘Pu aw, amah’n mina sawm nei khin hi!’ ci uh hi.
42019026	"A pu in, ‘A nei khempeuh kipiak beh dinga, ahi hangin a nei lote tung pan a neihsun nangawn kilakkhiatsak ding hi.
42019027	Ahi hangin amau kumpi dinga hong deih lo ka galte hih lai-ah hong paipih unla, keima mai-ah that un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
42019028	Jesu in hih thute a gen khit ciangin amah mapi-in Jerusalem zuanin a pai hi.
42019029	Olive Vum kici mual bul-a om Bethphage le Bethany a tun kuan uh ciangin a nungzuite nih a mapaisak hi. Amah in amaute kiangah,
42019030	"Na mai-ua khua ah pai le uh cin tua khua na lut uh ciangin kuama tuan ngei nai lohna laano khat a kikhih na mu ding uh hi. Sut unla hih lai-ah hong paipih un.
42019031	Mi khatpeuh in, ‘Bang hangin tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?’ ci-a hong dot leh, ‘Topa in deih hi,’ ci-un,” ci-in a sawl hi.
42019032	Tua a sawlte pai uh a, ama gensa bang tektekin a mu uh hi.
42019033	Amaute in tua laano a sut laitakun a neipa in amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin tua laano sut na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42019034	Amaute in, “Topa in deih hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
42019035	Amaute in Jesu kiangah paipih uh a, tua laano tungah a puantualpite uh phahin a tungah Jesu a tuangsak uh hi.
42019036	Tua banga a pai laitakin mipite in a puantualpite uh lampi-ah a phah uh hi.
42019037	Olive Vum zuatna lampi a tunsuk dektak uh ciangin a nunga zui mihon buppi in, amau muhsa nalamdangte hangin lungnuamtakin aw ngaihtak tawh Pasian phat uh a:
42019038	"Topa min-a hong pai kumpipa in thupha a ngah hi!b “Vantungah lemna om henla, a sang penna munah minthanna om ta hen!”ci-in a awng uh hi.
42019039	Mihonpite laka Pharisee-te pawlkhat in Jesu kiangah, “Sia aw, na nungzuite tai in!” a ci uh hi.
42019040	Amah in, “Ken kong geninah, amaute dai le uh suangte kiko ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Hab 2:11
42019041	Jerusalem a tun kuan uh tua khuapi a muh ciangin amah in kah a,
42019042	"Nang, bang in kilemna hong puak ding cih tuni-in thei tapeuh lecin maw—ahi hangin lah tu-in tua thu na muh loh dingin kisel ta hi.
42019043	Na galte in nang hong do nading kulh bawlin a kimkot panin nang umcih in hong bumek ding hun hong tung ding hi.
42019044	Amaute in nang le na tate na khuapi kulh sungah leilak hong denna ding uh hi. Pasian in note hong veh hun na theih loh manun amaute in suang khat tungah suang dang khat beek a kithuapsa in a hawi kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
42019045	Tua ciangin amah biakinnpi huang sungah lutin vanzuakte a hawlkhia hi.
42019046	Amah in amaute kiangah,” ‘Ka inn, thungetna inn kici ding hi,’c ci-in kigelh hi. Ahi hangin note in, ‘misuamte kuapi’ na suaksak tazen uh hi,”d a ci hi.
42019047	Amah in nisimin biakinnpi ah thu a hilh hi. Ahi hangin siampi makaite, thukham siate le mipite laka makaite in amah that dingin a hanciam uh hi.
42019048	Ahi zongin mipite in ama thugente pom uh ahi manin thah theih nading lampi a mu thei kei uh hi.
42020001	Ni khat biakinnpi tualah thu hilh-a lungdamna-thu a gen laitakin siampi makaite le thukham siate, upate tawh ama kiangah va pai uh hi.
42020002	Amaute in, “Nang, bang thuneihna tawh hihte hih na hi hiam? Hih thuneihna kua hong piak hiam, hong gen in?” a ci uh hi.
42020003	Jesu in, “Kei zong khat kong dong ding hi, hong gen un.
42020004	John baptise-na koi pana kipan hiam, vantung pan hiam, mihing tung pan hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
42020005	Amaute in, “‘Vantung pan hi,’ ci leeng, ‘Tua ahileh bang hangin amah um lo na hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding hi.
42020006	‘Mihing tung pan hi,’ ci leeng lah mipite khempeuh in eite suang tawh hong deng ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in John kamsangin a sang uh hi” ci-in a kikum uh hi.
42020007	Tua ahi ciangin amaute in, “Koi pan hiam, ka thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
42020008	Jesu in, “Ken zong bang thuneihna tawh hihte ka hih, cih kong gen kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42020009	Amah in mipite kiangah gentehna gena, “Lenggui lo a bawl mi khat a om hi; tuapa in a lenggui lo lo-khawhlawhte pawlkhat khawhlawhsak in sawt veipi a paikhiatsan hi.
42020010	A lak hun a tun ciangin lenggah khawm dingin lo-khawhlawhte kiangah nasem khat a sawl hi. Ahi hangin amaute in tuapa satgawp uh a, khut guakin a ciahsak uh hi.
42020011	Tua ciangin amah in tuate kiangah nasem dang khat sawl kik hi. Ahi hangin amaute in tuapa zong na satgawp uh a, a zahlaksak ngiingei khit uh ciangin a khut guakin a ciahsak uh hi.
42020012	Amah in a thumna pa sawl lai-a, amaute in tuapa liamsakin a hawlkhia uh hi.
42020013	"Tua ciangin lo neipa in, ‘Bang lawh ding ka hiam? Ka it ka tapa ka sawl ding hi; amah na zahtak buang ding uh hi,!’ ci hi.
42020014	"Ahi hangin lo-khawhlawhte in amah a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hih pa, a gouluah pa ahi hi; amah that leng a luah ding teng ei aa hi ding hi,’ ci-in thutanna a bawl uh hi.
42020015	Tua ahi ciangin amaute in amah daipua ah kaikhia uh a, a that uh hi. “Tua ahileh lo neipa in amaute bang a ci bawl ding hiam?

42020018	Tua suang tunga puk peuhmah kitamzan dinga, ahi hangin tua suang in a delhkhakte peuhmah a zanciim ding hi, ci-a kigelh a khiatna bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
42020019	Thukham siate le siampi makaite in hih gentehna amau a cihnopna ahilam thei uh ahi manin a matpah theih nadingun lampi a zong uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute in mipite a kihta uh hi.
42020020	Amaute in amah encik gige uh a, mi muanhuai a kineihkhem thusim kante ama kiangah a sawl uh hi. Thuneihna le vang a nei gam-ukpa tungah Jesu a piakkhiat theih nadingun ama kam tawh amah lehmat thei dingin a kilamen uh hi.

42020023	Amah in amaute kineihkhemna a muhtel ciangin,
42020024	"Denarius khat hong lak dih un. A tungah kua lim le kua min tuang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

42020026	Amah in tua banga mipite laka a gennate tawh amah a awksak zo kei uh hi. Ama dawnnate lamdang sa uh a, tua ciangin amaute a dai uh hi.

42021001	Jesu a khuadak toh leh, sum haute in biakinnpi sumkholna sungah amau sum a khiat uh a mu hi.
42021002	Amah in, a zawng meigongnu khat in a neu mahmah sumsan tanga nih a khiat zong a mu hi.
42021003	Amah in, “Thutak kong geninah, hih a zawng meigongnu in midang khempeuh sangin tam khiazaw hi.
42021004	Hih mite khempeuh in a hauhna uh panin khia uh hi; ahi hangin tuanu in a zawnsa pipi-in a ma kivak nading a neih khempeuh a khia hi,” a ci hi.
42021005	A nungzuite pawlkhat in suang melhoihte le Pasian tunga ki-ap letsongte tawh hoihtaka kizem biakinnpi thu a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in,
42021006	"Hih laitaka na muhte uh tawh kisai-in suang khat tungah suang dang khat beek kiciang lo a, a vekpi-in a kicipmang kiuhkeuh hun hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
42021007	Amaute in, “Sia aw, hih thute cik cianga piang ding ahi hiam? Hih thute a tun dektakna bang limin kithei ding hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
42021008	Amah in, “Note kuamah in hong khem zawh loh nadingin na kigalging un. Ahang in, keima minin mi tampi hong pai ding uh a, ‘Amah ka hi hi. Hun hong nai ta hi,’ hong ci tangtang ding uh hi. Amaute na zui kei un.
42021009	Gal thu le kumpi lumletna thu na zak uh ciangin na linglawng kei un. Hih thute a piang masa pelmawh ding mah hi-a ahi hangin a beina a tungpah nai kei ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42021010	Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Minam khat le minam khat kido dinga, gam khat le gam khat a kido ding uh hi.
42021011	Mun tuamtuam ah zin nakpi in ling dinga, kialpi le pul tungin vantung panin a kihtakhuai thupiangte le lim lianpite hong om ding hi.
42021012	"Ahi hangin hihte a pian ma-in amaute in note tungah a khut uh hong nga-in hong bawlsia ding uh hi. Keima min hangin amaute in note synagogue-te le thongte ah hong tun ding uh a, kumpite le gam-ukte mai-ah hong paipih ding uh hi.
42021013	Hih in amaute tunga teci pang na suah nading uh ahi hi.
42021014	Ahi hangin no le no na kihut zia ding uh ama in na lunghimawh loh nadingun lungsim khentatsa-in om un.
42021015	Ahang in, na langte un note hong nan zawh loh nadingun thute le pilna kong pia ding hi.
42021016	Na nu-le-pate, na sanggamte, na tanaute le na lawmte un note hong lehhek ding uh a, pawlkhat hong that ding uh hi.
42021017	Keima hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
42021018	Ahi hangin na samzang khat nangawn uh a mang thang kei ding hi.
42021019	Kiptaka dinna tawh nuntakna na ngah ding uh hi.
42021020	"Galkap honpi in Jerusalem a umcih na muh uh ciangin a hawmmang nading nai ta hi, cih na thei ding uh hi.
42021021	Tua ciangin Judea gama omte mual tungah tai uh hen; tua khuapi sunga omte taikhia uh henla, gamsunga omte tua khuapi ah lut kei uh hen.
42021022	Tua in, a kigelhsa khempeuh a tangtun nadingin gawtna hun ahi hi.
42021023	Tua nite, nau paiite le naungek nei nupite adingin mulkimhuai lua ding hi! Tua gam sung tengah lungdonna lianpi le hih mite tungah thangpaihna lianpi a tung ding hi.
42021024	Amaute namsau in puk ding uh a, minamte khempeuh thongkiate bangin a kai ding uh hi. Gentile-te hunte a tangtun kim khit matengin Gentile-te in Jerusalem a tuancil ngi-ingei ding uh hi.
42021025	"Ni, kha le aksite sungah limte hong om ding hi. Tuipi kilok le tuihual hawkte hangin leitunga minamte lunggimin a cimawh ding uh hi.
42021026	Van a nate khempeuh kiling dinga, leitunga piang dingte kihta kholin lau lua-in mite a sibup ding uh hi.
42021027	Tua laitakin vanglianpi le minthanna tawh meii laka hong paisuk Mihing Tapa amaute in a mu ding uh hi.
42021028	Hih nate tun a kipat ciangin note tatkhiatna nai ta ahi manin ding to unla khuadak khia un,” a ci hi.
42021029	Amah in amaute kiangah hih gentehna gena: “Theikung le singkung dangte khempeuh na en un.
42021030	A tehte a sel ciangin khuakhal hun nai ta hi, cih na thei uh hi.
42021031	Tua mah bangin hih nate a pian na muh uh ciangin Pasian gam hong nai ta hi, cih na thei un.
42021032	"Thutak kong geninah, hih thute khempeuh a tun khit mateng hih khang miteb a bei peuhmah kei ding hi.
42021033	Van le lei a mangthang ding hi; ahi hangin ka thute a mangthang ngei kei ding hi.
42021034	"Note pilvang un, tua hi keileh na lungsimte uh lalthangin zukhamna le nuntak nading lunghimawh nate in hong thazawhgawp dinga tua ciangin na upmawh loh laitak un tua ni, thang kisai bangin no tungah hong tung ding hi.
42021035	Leitung bupa tengte khempeuh tungah tua ni a tung ding ahi hi.
42021036	Note na kigalging gige un. Thupiang dingte khempeuh pana na suahtak nading uh le Mihing Tapa mai-a na din theih nadingun thu na ngen un,” a ci hi.
42021037	Jesu in biakinnpi ah nisimin thu hilh a, Olive Vum ah giak dingin nitak sialin a paikhia hi.
42021038	Ama thugen ngai dingin zingsang tungin mi khempeuh biakinnpi ah a pai uh hi.
42022001	Paisanpawi kici Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi hun kuan ciangin,
42022002	siampi makaite le thukham siate in mipite kihta uh ahi manin Jesu a hepkhiat theih nading uh lampi a zong uh hi.
42022003	Tua ciangin Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat, Iscariot kici Judas sungah Satan a lut hi.
42022004	Tua ciangin siampi makaite le biakinnpi cing makaite kiangah Judas pai-a Jesu a lehhek theih nading zia amaute tawh a kikum hi.
42022005	Amaute lungkim uh a, amah sum piak dingin a thukim uh hi.
42022006	Amah thukima, mihonpite om loh kala amaute khutah Jesu a piak theih nading hun hoih a ngak gige hi.
42022007	Tua ciangin Silngo sawhloh Anlum Pawi ni tunga, tua ni Paisan Tuuno-a biakpiak ni ding ahi hi.
42022008	Jesu in Peter le John kiangah, “Pai unla Paisan-pawi i nek theih nadingin na kisakhol un,” ci-in a sawl hi.

42022010	Amah in, “Khuapi sung na lut uh ciangin tuibeel khat a pua pasal khat tawh na kituak ding uh hi. Ama lutna inn dong amah zui unla,
42022011	a inntekpa kiangah, ‘Siapa in: Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan-pawi ka nek nading zintunna inndei koi lai ahi hiam, ci-in hong dongsak hi,’ va ci un.

42022013	Amaute a pai uh ciangin Jesu gensa bang tektekin nate a mu uh hi. Tua hi-a amaute in Paisan-pawi bawl nading a bawlkhol uh hi.
42022014	A hun a tun ciangin Jesu le sawltakpite sabuai ah a kingam uh hi.

42022017	Amah in hai a lak khit ciangin lungdam ko a, “Hih hai la unla note lakah hawm un.
42022018	Ahang in, ken kong cih inah Pasian gam hong tun mateng lenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
42022019	Amah in anlum la-a, lungdam ko-in balkhama, amaute pia-in, “Hih in note adinga kipia ka pumpi ahi hi; kei nong phawk tawntung nadingun na bawl un,” a ci hi.
42022020	Tua mah bangin nitak-an a nek khit uh ciangin hai la-a, “Hih hai, note adinga kibuakhia ka sisan-a thukhunna thak ahi hi.
42022021	Ahi hangin kei hong lehhek ding pa khut, keima khut tawh sabuai ah a om hi.
42022022	Thukip omsa bangin Mihing Tapa a pai ding hi. Ahi hangin amah a lehhek tua mipa in, gimna a thuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
42022023	Amaute lakah kua pen in hih a hih tam, ci-in a kidong ciat uh hi.
42022024	Amaute lakah alian pena kingaihsun kua hiam, cih thu kiselna zong a piang hi.
42022025	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Gentile-te ahi uh leh a kumpite uh amau tungah kiliansak uh a, amau tunga thuneihna a zangte, amau le amau Deihsakte a kici tawm uh hi.
42022026	Ahi hangin note tua bang na hi kei un. Tua sangsikin, note lakah a lianpen in a moipen bang hi dinga, a ukpen in nasempa bang hi ding hi.
42022027	Sabuai-a tupa le tuanvaipa kua lianzaw ahi hiam? Ahi hangin kei ka hileh note lakah nasempa bang ka hi hi.
42022028	Hong kizia-et lai-a hong dinpihte note na hi uh hi.
42022029	Ka Pa in kei tunga gam khat hong bilpiak bangin note tungah gam khat kong pia hi;
42022030	ka gam sunga sabuai ah kei tawh nekhawm dawnkhawma, kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in Israel beh sawm-le-nihte tungah thu na khen theih nading uh ahi hi.
42022031	"Simon, Simon aw buh haih bangin Satan in nanga haih hong sawm hi.
42022032	Ahi hangin Simon aw, na upna a lawhsap loh nadingin nang ading thu ka ngen zo hi. Na kihei kik ciangin na sanggamte na thahatsak in,” a ci hi.
42022033	Ahi hangin amah in, “Topa aw, nang tawh thong kiakhawm ding ahi zongin, sihkhawm ding ahi zongin a kigingsa ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42022034	Jesu in, “Peter aw, ken kong geninah, tuni ak a khuan ma-in kei nong theihna thumvei na nial ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42022035	Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Note sumbawm, thung-ip le khedapte hong kengsak lo a kong sawlkhiat lai-in kisapna na nei uh hiam,” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Bangmah ka kisam kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
42022036	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu-in ahileh sumbawm ahi zongin, thung-ip ahi zongin na neih uh leh keng un; namsau na neih kei uh leh na puantualpite uh zuak unla lei un.
42022037	‘Amah thukham palsatte tawh a kisimkhawm hi,’b ci-in kigelh hi. Tua hi a hih thu kei tungah hong tangtung pelmawh ding hi, cih kong gen hi. Himah hi. Kei thu a kigelhsate a tangtung ding hi ta hi,” a ci hi.
42022038	Nungzuite in, “Topa en dih in, hiah namsau nih om hi,” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Pha zo hi,” a ci hi.
42022039	Jesu a pai ngei bangin Olive Vum ah pai-a, a nungzuite in amah a zui uh hi.
42022040	Tua mun a tun ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Zia-etna sungah na puk loh nadingun thu na ngen un,” a ci hi.
42022041	Amaute khen suanglot khat tan bangah khukdinin thu ngen a,
42022042	"Pa aw, na ut leh hih hai tawh hong kipelhsak in; ahi zongin kei deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hizaw hen,” a ci hi.
42022043	Vantung panin vansawltak khat ama kiangah kilanga, amah a thakhauhsak hi.
42022044	Amah lunggimin thu limngetzaw-a, a khua-ul sisanmal bangin leitungah a takkhia hi.c
42022045	A thungetna pan dingkhia a, a nungzuite kiangah a pai kik ciangin amaute dah lua-in thazawm uh ahi manin a ihmut laitak uh a tuak hi.
42022046	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note bang hangin ihmu na hi uh hiam? Tho un. Zia-etna sunga na puk loh nadingun thu ngen un,” a ci hi.
42022047	Tua banga a paupau laitakin mihon khat va paito uh a, Sawm-le-nihte laka khat, Judas kici pa in amaute a makaih hi. Amah in Jesu nam dingin a va naih hi.
42022048	Ahi hangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Judas aw, nang Mihing Tapa khatvei napna tawh lehhek ding maw?” ci-in a dong hi.
42022049	Jesu a zuite in hih thu piang ding a muh uh ciangin, “Topa aw, ka namsaute uh tawh ka sat ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
42022050	Tua ciangin amaute lakah khat in, tulpipa nasempa a sat leh a taklam bil a satkhia hi.
42022051	Ahi hangin Jesu in, “Tu-a zah pha zo!” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua mipa bil lawngin a damsak hi.
42022052	Tua ciangin Jesu in amah man dinga a pai siampi makaite, biakinnpi cing makaite le upate kiangah, “Kei man dinga namsau le khetbuk tawh nong kuan zawzen uh kumpi langpang dinga makaih ka hi hiam?
42022053	Nisimin biakinnpi tualte ah note tawh ka om khawm laitakin khut khat zong nong nga kei uh hi. Ahi hangin tu laitak, note hun ahi, khuamial thuneih hun ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42022054	Tua ciangin amaute in amah manin paikhiatpih uh a, tulpipa innah a tun uh hi. Peter in a kigamla simsimah a zui hi.
42022055	Ahi hangin amaute in inntual laizangah mei cih in a tutkhawm uh ciangin amaute kiangah Peter zong a va tu hi.
42022056	Nasem numei khat in meitang ah tua lai-a a tut a mu hi. Tuanu in amah va tel-et a, “Hih pa amah tawh kipawl hi,” a ci hi.
42022057	Ahi hangin amah in nial a, “Numei aw, ken amah ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
42022058	Tawmvei khit ciangin midang khat in amah mu-a, “Nang zong amaute lakah khat na hi hi,” a ci hi. Peter in, “Mipa aw, ka hi peuhmah kei hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
42022059	Nai khat bang khit ciangin adang khat in, “Hih pa amah tawh kipawl pha mahmah, Galilee mi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
42022060	Peter in, “Mipa aw, na thu gen ka thei peuhmah kei hi!” ci-in a dawng kik hi. Tua banga a pau laitakin ak a khuang hi.
42022061	Topa kihei a tangtakin Peter a en hi. Tua ciangin Peter in Jesu in ama tunga, “Tuni ak khuan ma-in thumvei nong kitheihmawhbawl ding hi,” ci-a a gen a pawk hi.
42022062	Tua ciangin amah a pualam ah pusuak a kah cihtakin a kap hi.
42022063	Jesu a cingte in zahko in a sat uh hi.
42022064	Amaute in a mit tunsak uh a, “Nang kuan hong su hiam? Hong gen dih in!” a ci uh hi.
42022065	Amaute in engkona kam tampi ama tungah a zang uh hi.
42022066	Khuavak tungin tangpi upa vai hawmte, siampi makaite le thukham siate kikhawm uh a, amaute mai-ah Jesu a paipih uh hi.
42022067	Amaute in, “Nang Khristd na hileh, hong gen in,” a ci uh hi. Jesu in, “Kong gen hangin note in nong um nuam kei uh a,
42022068	kong dot hangin nong dawng nuam kei uh hi.
42022069	Ahi hangin tu-a kipan Mihing Tapa a thahat Pasian taklamah a tu ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42022070	Amaute khempeuh in, “Tua ahileh nang Pasian Tapa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong huan uh hi. Amah in, “Maan hi, nong cih bang uh ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42022071	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Teci dang kul nawn ding ahi hiam? Eite in ama kam panin i za zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
42023001	Tua ciangin tua lai-a kikhawmte khempeuh ding uh a, amah Pilate kiangah a paipih uh hi.
42023002	Amaute in, “Hih pa in ka minam uh a holhthawh ka thei uh hi. Caesar tunga siah piak ding dalin kumpi khat, Khrista in kigen lai hi,” ci-in amah a ngawh uh hi.
42023003	Tua ahi ciangin Pilate in Jesu kiangah, “Nang, Jew-te kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Ka hi hi, na cih bang ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
42023004	Tua ciangin Pilate in siampi makaite le mihonte kiangah, “Hih pa, mawhmat theih nading thubul ka mu kei hi,” ci-in a pulak hi.
42023005	Ahi hangin amaute in, “Amah in a thuhilhna tawh Judeab gam sunga mi khempeuh a tokbuai hi. Galilee pan hong panin hih ciang dong hong tun hi,” a ci teitei uh hi.
42023006	Pilate in hih thu a zak ciangin Galilee gam mi ahi hiam, ci-in a dong hi.
42023007	Jesu, Herod uk sung mi ahilam a theih ciangin amah Herod kiangah a puak hi. Tua hun laitakin Herod zong Jerusalem ah a om hi.
42023008	Herod in Jesu a muh ciangin, a muh nop sawt zo ta ahi manin a lungkim mahmah hi. Ama thu a na zaksa mah bangin amah in nalamdang pawlkhat a bawl ding a lamen hi.
42023009	Amah in thu tampi adot kawikawi hangin Jesu in a dawng kik kei hi.
42023010	Siampi makaite le thukham siate tua lai-ah ding uh a nakpi in a mawhsak uh hi.
42023011	Tua ciangin Herod le a galkapte in amah ciamnuih-bawlna in nei uh a, a zahko uh hi. Amah kumpi puan hoih mahmah khat silhsakin Pilate kiangah a puak kik uh hi.
42023012	Tua ni-in Herod le Pilate a kilawmta kik uh hi - tua ma-in amau gel a kigalneih uh ahi hi.

42023014	amaute kiangah, “Note in hih mipa in kumpi langpang dingin mite tawsawn hi, ci-in ka kiangah nong paipih uh hi. Nomau mai mahmah ah amah ka sittel ciangin amah na mawhmatna uh thubul ka mu kei hi.

43001001	Atungin Thu om-a, tua Thu Pasian tawh omkhawmin, tua Thu Pasian ahi hi.
43001002	Atungin amah Pasian tawh a omkhawm hi.
43001003	Ama tungtawnin na khempeuh kibawl hi. A kibawlsate khempeuh ama bawlloh a om kei hi.
43001004	Ama sungah nuntakna om-a, tua nuntakna, mite khuavak ahi hi.
43001005	Khuamial sungah tua khuavak tanga, ahi hangin khuamial in amah a theitela kei hi.
43001006	Pasian kiang pana hong kisawl mi khat a om hi. Ama min John ahi hi.
43001007	Mi khempeuh in ama tungtawnin tua khuavak a up theih nadingin khuavak tawh kisai a theisak dingin teci-a hong pai ahi hi.
43001008	Amah ahileh tua khuavak ahi kei hi. Khuavak tawh kisai teci-a hong pai hi bek hi.
43001009	Mikim tungah a tang tua khuavak taktak leitungah hong pai hi.b
43001010	Amah leitungah om-a, leitung ama piansak hi napi leitung in amah a thei kei hi.
43001011	Ama aa mahmah ahi te kiangah hong pai ahi hangin ama aa te in amah a sang kei uh hi.
43001012	Ahi zongin amah a sangte khempeuh, ama min a umte khempeuh tungah Pasian tate suah nading thuneihna a pia hi.
43001013	Tuate pianngei tatec banga suak hi lo, mihing khensatna bang le pasal deihna pana suak zong hi lo, Pasian pana suak ahi uh hi.
43001014	Tua Thu, ci-le-sa suak a, eite lakah amah a teng hi. Eite in ama minthanna – Pa kiang pana hong pai thutak le hehpihna a dim Tapad neihsun minthanna i mu khin hi.
43001015	Amah tawh kisai John in teci a pang hi. Amah in, “‘Kei nunga hong pai pa, kei ma-a om khin ahi manin amah in kei hong khup zo hi,’ ci-a ka genpa hih pa ahi hi,” ci-in kiko hi.
43001016	A kicing ama hehpihna panin eite khempeuh in thupha khat khit khat i ngah hi.
43001017	Ahang in, Moses tungtawnin thukham kipia hi. Jesu Khrist tungtawnin hehpihna le thutak hong pai ahi hi.
43001018	Kuamah in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi. Ahi hangin Pa kianga om Tapa neihsun beke f in amah a kitheisak zo hi.
43001019	Tu-in Jerusalem a Jew-te in, John kua hiam cih a dong dingin siampite le Levi-te ama kiangah a sawl uh ciangin ama teci panna hih ahi hi.
43001020	Amah ki-im loin teltakin kipulak a, “Kei, Khrist ka hi kei hi,”g kici hi.
43001021	Amaute in, “Tua ahileh nang kua na hi hiam? Elijah na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Amah in, “Ka hi kei hi,” a ci hi. “Nang Kamsangpa pen na hi hiam?” ci-a a dot uh ciangin, Amah in, “Ka hi kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43001022	A tawpna ah amaute in, “Nang kua na hi hiam? Ko hong sawlte kianga ka gen kik ding uh dawnna khat hong nei in. Nang kua kici na hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43001023	John in Isaiah kammalte zangin dawng a, “‘Topa ading lampi na tangsak un,’ ci a gamlaka kiko pa aw, keimah ka hi hi,”h a ci hi.
43001024	Tua ciangin a kisawl Pharisee-te pawlkhat in,
43001025	"Khrist lah hi lo, Elijah lah hi lo, tua Kamsangpa lah hi lo na hileh bang hangin baptise na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43001026	John in, “Keimah in tui ini ka baptize hi. Ahi hangin note lakah na theih loh uh mi khat a om hi.
43001027	Amah ka nunga hong pai pa ahi hi; ama khedapkhau sut ding nangawnin ka cin zo kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43001028	Hihte khempeuh John baptisena mun Jordan galkhat lam Bethany khua a thupiang ahi hi.
43001029	A zing ciangin ama lam manawh a Jesu hong pai John in a muh ciangin, “En un, leitung mawhna a puakhia Pasian Tuuno!
43001030	‘Ka nunga hong pai pa, ka mai-a omsa ahi manin kei hong khup zo hi,’ ci-a ka kiko lai-a ka genpa hih pa ahi hi.
43001031	Kei zong amah ka thei kei hi. Ahi hangin baptise-a kong paina pen Israel-te tunga amah a kipulak nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43001032	Tua ciangin John in teci panga: “Vantung panin vakhu bangin Kha hong kumsuka, ama tunga khawlden ka mu hi.
43001033	Baptize dinga kei hong sawlpa, ‘Kha hong kumsukin ama tunga a khawlna pa pen Khasiangtho-a hong baptize ding pa ahi hi,’ ci-in kei hong hilh lo hileh amah ka thei kei ding hi.
43001034	Ken ka mu khin ta a, Pasian Tapa hi, cih teci ka pang hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
43001035	A zing ciangin John a nungzuite lakah nih tawh tua lai-ah a om kik uh hi.
43001036	Amah in Jesu hong pai a muh ciangin, “En un, Pasian’ Tuuno!” a ci hi.
43001037	A nungzuite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Jesu nung a zui uh hi.
43001038	Jesu kihei-a, amaute in a nung a zuih uh a muh ciangin, “Bang deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Rabbi, (Siapa cihna) nang koi-a taam na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43001039	Amah in, “Hong pai le uh cin na mu ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Amaute va pai uh a, a omna a mu uh hi. Amah tawh tua ni a taam khawm uh hi. Tua hun nai sawmna pawl ahi hi.
43001040	John thugen za-a Jesu nung a zui nihte lakah Simon, Peter sanggampa Andrew khat ahi hi.
43001041	Andrew in a hih masak pen a sanggampa Simon zonga, “Messiah (Khrist cihna) ka mu zo uh hi,” ci-in a va gen ahi hi.
43001042	Tua ciangin Jesu kiangah amah a paipih hi. Jesu in amah en a, “Nang John tapa Simon na hi hi, na min ‘Cephas’(a kileh ciang Peterj)kici ding hi,” a ci hi.
43001043	A zing ciangin Jesu in Galilee lamah pai a sawm hi. Philip mu-a, “Ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
43001044	Andrew le Peter mah bangin Philip zong Bethsaida khuapi mi mah ahi hi.
43001045	Philip in Nathanael a muh ciangin, “Moses in Thukham sunga ama thu a gelh, kamsangte in zong amah tawh kisai a na gelh uh, Joseph tapa Nazareth mi Jesu ka mu zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
43001046	Nathanael in, “Nazareth e! Tua panin na hoih piang thei maw?” ci-in a dong hi. Philip in, “Hong pai inla hong en in,” a ci hi.
43001047	Nathanael ama kiang zuana pai Jesu in a muh ciangin, “Hih lai-ah a sunga khialhna khat beek a om lo Israel mi taktak khat a om hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
43001048	Nathanael in, “Kei bang hong ci theih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Philip in nang hong sap ma, theikung nuai-a na om lai-in kong thei zo hi,” a ci hi.
43001049	Tua ciangin Nathanael in, “Rabbi, nang Pasian Tapa na hi hi. Israel Kumpipa na hi hi,” ci-in a genkhia hi.
43001050	Jesu in, “Theikung nuai-ah nang kong mu zo hi, ci-a kong gen manin na umk hi. Tua sanga thupizaw nate na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
43001051	Amah in, “Nangl thutak kong geninah: Van kihongin, Mihing Tapa tungah Pasian vansawltakte a kumsuk le a kahto nam mu ding hi,” ci-in a genbeh lai hi.
43002001	A ni thum ni-in Galilee gam Cana ah mopawi khat a om hi. Tua lai-ah Jesu nu om a,
43002002	Jesu le a nungzuite zong tua mopawi ah kisam hi.
43002003	Lenggahzu a bei ciangin Jesu nu in, “Amaute’n lenggahzu a nei nawn kei uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
43002004	Jesu in, “Kong it numei aw, bang hanga kei hong kaaipaan na hi hiam, ka hun a tung nai kei hi,” a ci hi.
43002005	A nu in a nasemte kiangah, “Ama hong gen bangbang na hih un,” a ci hi.
43002006	Tua kiang nai-ah gallona sawmnih pan sawmthum a ta suang tuibel guk om-a tuate Jew-te biakna ngeina-a kisilna a zatte nam ahi hi.
43002007	Nasemte kiangah Jesu in, “Tuibel sungah tui dim un,” ci a, amaute in agong ciang a dim uh hi.
43002008	Tua khit ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Bang zah hiam khat suakkhia unla, pawi thusapa kiangah va puak un,” a ci hi. Amaute in a cih bangin a hih uh hi.
43002009	Pawi thusapa in tui, lenggahzu a kisuaksak pen a ciam hi. Tui a dim nasemte in a theih uh hangin amah in lenggahzu koi pan kingah cih a thei zo kei hi. Tua ciangin zipipa sam tuama,
43002010	"Mi khempeuh in lenggahzu alim pente hawm masa a, lenglate in a kham khit ciangin a lim lote hawm hi. Nang na hileh tu dong alim pente na sit lai hi,” a ci hi.
43002011	Jesu nalamdang bawlte lakah a masa pen hih Galilee gam Cana-a a bawl ahi hi. Amah in a minthanna tua bangin kilaaka, a nungzuite in amah a um uh hi.
43002012	Hih khit ciangin a nu, a sanggamte le a nungzuite tawh Capernaum ah a paisuk uh hi. Tua lai-ah ni tawmkha a taam uh hi.
43002013	Jew-te Paisan pawi hun a tun dektak ciangin, Jerusalem ah Jesu a pai to hi.
43002014	Biakinnpi huang sungah bawngte, tuute le vakhu zuak-a omte le sum khek-a tu midangte a mu hi.
43002015	Amah in satna khauhual tep nei bawl-a, tuute, bawngte le mi khempeuh biakinnpi huang sung panin a hawlkhia hi. Sum khekte dangka-tangte thehthangsaka, a sabuaite uh a lumletsak hi.
43002016	Amah in vakhu zuakte kiangah, “Hihte hih mun panin lakhia un. Bang hangin ka Pa inn van zuakna mun suaksak ngam na hi uh hiam!” a ci hi.
43002017	A nungzuite in, “Na inn ading ka aam luatna in kei hong netum ding hi,”b ci-a kigelh thu a phawk uh hi.
43002018	Tua ciangin Jew-te in, “Hihte khempeuh na hih theih nading thuneihna na neih lam ka theih nadingun kote nalamdang khat hong lak in,” ci-in a kal uh hi.
43002019	Jesu in, “Hih biakinnpi susia un, ni thum sungin ka ding kiksak ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43002020	Jew-te in, “Hih biakinnpi lam nading kum sawmli le kum guk a sawt hi. Nang ni thum sungin dingsak zo ding na hi hiam?” a ci kik uh hi.
43002021	Ahi hangin Jesu gen biakinnpi pen, ama pumpi ahi hi.
43002022	Misi panin amah a kithawhsak ciangin a nungzuite in hih a gensa thute a phawk kik uh hi. Tua ciangin Laisiangtho le Jesu gensa thute a um uh hi.
43002023	Paisan Pawi sung Jerusalem a, a om laitakin, a lim lamdang bawlte mi tampi in mu uh a, ama min a um uh hi.c
43002024	Ahi hangin Jesu in mi khempeuh thei ahi manin amaute tungah a ki-ap kei hi.
43002025	Amah in mihing lungsim sunga omte thei khina, mihing in mihing thu a gen ding kisam lo hi.
43003001	Jew-te vaihawm pawlte lakah Nicodemus kici Pharisee-te khat a om hi.
43003002	Amah zanin Jesu kiangah va pai-a, “Rabbi aw, Pasian kiang pana hong pai siapa na hi cih ka thei uh hi. Ahang in, Pasian in a ompih kei leh kuamah in na bawl lim lamdangte a bawl thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43003003	Jesu in a dawnna in, “Thutak kong geninah, ‘Mi khatpeuh a suah kika kei leh Pasian gam a mu thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
43003004	Nicodemus in, “A khangham khinsa mi khat bangci in suak kik thei ding ahi hiam?” ci-in dong a, “A nih veina a suak dingin a nu sungah lut kik thei lo takpi mah ding hi!” a ci hi.
43003005	Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, tui le Kha-a suak kik lote peuhmah Pasian gamah a lut thei kei hi.
43003006	Ci-le-sa in ci-le-sa mah piangsaka, Khab in kha mah a piangsak hi.
43003007	Nangc suahkiksak pelmawh ding na hi hi ‘kong cih lamdang sa kei in.
43003008	Huih, a utna peuhah a nung hi. Aging na za hi, ahi hangin koi pan hong nung a, koi lamah nung ding cih na thei kei hi. Kha pana piang mi peuhmah tua bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43003009	Nicodemus in, “Hih thu bangci pian theih ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43003010	Jesu in, “Nang Israel-te siapa hi napi hih nate thei lo na hi hiam?
43003011	Thutak kong geninah, kote in ka theih uh ka gen uh a, ka muhsa uh teci ka pang uh hi.
43003012	Note kiangah leitung nate thu ka gen hangin na um kei uh hi. Tua ahileh vantung nate thu ka gen hangin bangci up thei ding na hi uh hiam?
43003013	Vantung pana hong pai Mihing Tapad longal vantungah kuamah a pai ngei kei hi.
43003014	Moses in gamlakah gul a khai bang tektekin Mihing Tapa kikhai ding hi.
43003015	Amah a um mite khempeuh in, nuntak tawntungna a neih theih nading ahi hi.e
43003016	Pasian in leitung it lua ahi manin, a Tapa a um khempeuh mangthang lo-a nuntak tawntungna a neih nadingin a Tapa khat neihsunf a pia hi.
43003017	Ahang in, leitung mawhpaihsak dingin Pasian in a Tapa leitungah a sawl kei hi. Ama tung tawnin leitung a honkhia dingin a sawl hizaw hi.
43003018	Amah a um khempeuh a kimawhpaih kei hi. Ahi hangin amah a um lo mi peuhmah Pasian Tapag khat neihsun a min um lo ahi manin mawh paihsa ahi hi.
43003019	Thutanna hih ahi hi: Leitungah Khuavak hong tung zo hi, ahi hangin mihingte in a gamtatnate uh gilo ahi manin khuavak a it tangun khuamial a it uh hi.
43003020	Gitlohna a hih mi peuhmah in a gamtatnate a kipholak ding lau ahi manin khuavak mudah a, khuavak ah a lut kei ding hi.
43003021	Ahi hangin thutaka a nungta mi peuhmah, a gamtatna khempeuh Pasian tungtawna sem a hina teltaka a kilat nadingin khuavak ah a lut hi,”h a ci hi.
43003022	Hih teng khit ciangin Jesu le a nungzuite Judea gam sungah pai uh a, tua lai-ah amaute tawh tawlkhat sung taamin a baptise uh hi.
43003023	Tu-in John in zong Salim kiang Aenon munah a baptise hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, tua munah tui tam ahi manin a kibaptise dingin mite va pai den uh hi.
43003024	(Hih pen thong sunga John a kikhum ma ahi hi).
43003025	John nungzuite le Jewi pawlkhat kikalah biakna ngeina zui-a kisilna tawh kisai-in kiselna a piang hi.
43003026	Amaute John kiangah pai uh a, “Rabbi aw, Jordan gala na ompihpa – ama thu na genpa in baptise-a mi khempeuh in amah zuan uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43003027	Hih thu ah John in, “Mihingte in vantung pana kipiate bek ngah thei hi.
43003028	‘Kei, Khristj ka hi kei hi. Ama mai-a hong kisawlpa ka hi hi,’ ci-a ka gen note mahmah in teci na pang thei uh hi.
43003029	Mo pen zineipa aa ahi hi. Zineipa lawmpa in zineipa kithuahpihin ngak-a, zineipa aw a ngai hi; zineipa aw a zak ciangin lungnopna tawh a kidim hi. Tua lung nopna kei aa hi-a tu-in kicing ta hi.
43003030	Amah lian semsem dinga, kei ka neu semsem ding hi.
43003031	"Tunglam pana hong paipa na khempeuh tungah a om hi. Leitung pana hong paipa leitung aa hi-a leitung mi bangin thu a gen hi. Van tung pana hong paipa ahileh mi khempeuh tungah a om hi.
43003032	Amah in a muhsa le a zaksa teci panga, ahi hangin a teci panna kuamah in a sang kei hi.
43003033	Ama teci panna a sang mi in Pasian thutak ahi hi, cih a thukimpih ahi hi.
43003034	Ahang in, Pasian sawlpa in Pasian thute a gen hi. Pasiank in ama tungah ciangtan loin Kha a pia hi.
43003035	Pa in Tapa it a; na khempeuh a khutah a koih hi.
43003036	Tapa a um mi peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi; ahi hangin Tapa a nial peuhmah in nuntakna a mu kei ding hi; ahang in, Pasian thangpaihna ama tungah a om hi,”l a ci hi.
43004001	John sangin Jesu in nungzui tam ngahzaw, tam baptise zaw hi, ci-in Pharisee-te in a za uh hi.
43004002	A taktakin Jesu hi loin a nungzuite in a baptise uh hizaw hi.
43004003	Topa in hih thu a zak ciangin Judea gam nusia-a, Galilee gamah khat vei a pai kik hi.
43004004	Amah Samaria gam tawnin a pai kul hi.
43004005	Tua hi-a Jacob in a tapa Joseph adingin a piakna mun kiang Samaria a khuapi khat, Sychar kici ah a tung hi.
43004006	Tua lai-ah Jacob tuikhuk a om hi. Jesu a khualzinna-in gim a, tuikhuk kiangah a tu hi. Tua hun pen nai gukna pawl ahi hi.
43004007	Samaria numei khat tui tawi-in va pai a, Jesu in ama kiangah, “Ka dawn ding tui nong pia diam?” a ci hi.
43004008	(A nungzuite an lei dingin khuapi sungah paikhin uh hi.)
43004009	Samaria numei in, “Nang Jew mi hi-in, kei Samaria numei ka hi hi, bangci-a tui dawn ding hong ngen na hi hiam?” a ci hi. (Ahang in, Samaria mite tawh Jew-te kithuah lo uh hi.a)
43004010	Jesu in, “Pasian letsong thei-in, na kianga tui hong ngenpa thei hi lecin, ama kiangah na ngen zaw ding a, amah in a nungta tui hong pia khin zo ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43004011	Numei in, “Sia aw, tuikhuk lah thuka, na khai nading bangmah na neih loh pi hih a nungta tui koi pan ngah thei ding na hi hiam?
43004012	Amah mah le a tate, a tuuhonte, a ganhonte in a dawnna uh, hih tuikhuk hong piapa ka pa uh Jacob sangin lianzaw na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43004013	Jesu in, “Hih tui a dawnte peuhmah a dangtak kik ding hi;
43004014	ahi hangin kei piak tui a dawn mi peuhmah a dangtak ngei nawn kei ding hi. Ken ka piak tui, ama sungah tuinak suakin nuntak tawntungna dongin a phulto taktak ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43004015	Numei in ama kiangah, “Sia aw, ka dangtak nawn loh nading le hih muna tui khai-a ka pai nawn loh nadingin, tua tui kei hong pia in,” a ci hi.
43004016	Amah in tuanu kiangah, “Pai-in na pasal va sam inla, hong pai kik in,” a ci hi.
43004017	Amah in, “Pasal ka nei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “Pasal ka nei kei hi, na cih amaan hi,
43004018	a taktakin pasal nga na nei zo a, tu-a na neih pa pen na pasal a hi kei hi. Tu-a na gen pak maan mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
43004019	Numei in, “Sia aw, kamsang khat na hilam ka thei thei hi.
43004020	Ka pate un hih mualtungah bia uh a, ahi hangin no Jew-te in: Jerusalem bekah kibia thei hi, na ci se uh hi,” a ci hi.
43004021	Jesu in, “Numei aw, kei hong um in. Hih mual tung ahi a, Jerusalem ah ahi zongin Pa na biak loh hun uh hong tung ding hi.
43004022	No Samaria mite in na theih lohpi uh na bia uh hi; kote in ka theih uh ka bia uh hi. Ahang in, hotkhiatna, Jew-te pan ahi hi.
43004023	Ahi hangin a bia taktakte in a kha le thutak a, Pa a biak hun uh hong tung ding tham loin tu-in a tung zo hi, ahang in, tua banga biate bek Pa in a zong hi.
43004024	Pasian in kha ahi hi. Amah a biate in kha le thutakin a bia pelmawh ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43004025	Tua numei in, “Tua Messiah (Khrist kici) hong pai ding cih ka thei hi. Amah hong pai ciangin eite tungah na khempeuh hong telgen ding hi,” a ci hi.
43004026	Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Amah pen tu-a nang hong hopih pa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43004027	Tua khit phetin a nungzuite tung kik uh a, numei tawh a kiho a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi. Ahi hangin khat beek in, “Bang deihna hiam?” ahikeh “Bang hang tuanu hopih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong kei uh hi.
43004028	Tua ciangin tua numei in tuibel nusia in khuapi sungah pai kik a, mite kiangah,
43004029	"Hong pai un, ka hihsa khempeuh kei tunga hong genpa khat hong en un. Hih pa Khristb hi kha lo ding hiam?” a ci hi.
43004030	Amaute khuapi panin paikhia uh a, ama lam a zuan uh hi.
43004031	Tua kalin a nungzuite in, “Rabbi aw, bang khatpeuh ne in,” ci-in a sawl uh hi.
43004032	Ahi hangin amah in amaute kiang ah, “A thu bangmah na theih loh uh an nek ding ka nei hi,” a ci hi.
43004033	Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, “Mi khatpeuh in an na puak zo hi ve maw?” a kici uh hi.
43004034	Jesu in, “Kei hong sawlpa deihna bang sep ding le tua nasep ka zawh ding, ka an ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43004035	"Note in, ‘tu zawh kha li ciangin an lak hun ta ding hi,’ ci hi lo na hi uh hiam? Note kong hilh hi, khuadakin lote en dih un! Ante min khin in lak hun ta hi.
43004036	Tu nangawn in buh atpa in thaman a sang hi. A vawh pa le a at pa a lungdam khawm theih nadingin tu nangawnin tawntung nuntakna ading an a la hi.
43004037	‘Mi khat in vawh a, midang khat in a at hi,’ kici in thumaan ahi hi.
43004038	Na sep loh uh at dingin note kong sawl hi. Midangte in nakpi-in na sem uh a, amau sep gah note in na at uh hi,” a ci hi.
43004039	Tua numei in, “Ka hih ngeisa khempeuh hong gen hi,” ci-a teci a panna hangin tua khuapi a Samaria mite tampi in amah a um uh hi.
43004040	Tua ciangin Samaria mite ama kiangah pai-in amaute kiangah a taam nadingin kho uh a, ni nih a taam hi.
43004041	Ama thugente hangin thu-um tampi a kibehlap hi.
43004042	Amaute in tua numei kiangah, “Nang hong genna hang bek-a um ka hi nawn kei uh a, ko mahmah in tu-in ka za uh a, hih mipa, leitung Honpa taktak hi, cih ka thei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43004043	A ninih ni khit ciangin Galilee zuanin a pai hi.
43004044	(Jesu mahmah in, kamsangpa in ama gamah pahtawina ngah lo hi, cih a kawkkhia khin hi.)
43004045	Galilee ah a tun ciangin Galilee mite in amah a na muak uh hi. Amaute, Jerusalem a Paisan Pawi hun sungin va om kha uh ahi manin a hihsate khempeuh a mu zo uh hi.
43004046	Tui, lenggahzu a suahsakna mun Galilee gam Cana ah khat vei va hawh kik hi. Tua lai-ah kumpi nasem ulian khat oma, a tapa Capernaum ah cina-in a lum hi.
43004047	Hih pa in, Judea panin Galilee ah Jesu tung zo cih a zak ciangin ama kiangah va pai a, a si dektak a tapa a va damsak nadingin a thum hi.
43004048	Jesu in ama kiangah, “No mihingte in na lamdang le a lamdangte na muh loh ngalun na um ngei kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
43004049	Tua kumpi nasem ulianpa in, “Sia aw, ka ta a sih ma-in hong paisuk in” a ci hi.”
43004050	Jesu in, “Pai lel in, na tapa nungta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tuapa in Jesu thugen muangpah a, a paikhia hi.
43004051	Amah lamkal ah a om laitakin a nasemte in a tapa nungta hi, cih thu tawh amah a na dawn uh hi.
43004052	Amah in a tapa noptuam hun a kan ciangin amaute in, “Zanni a nai sagihna hunin nattun a dam hi,” a ci uh hi.
43004053	Jesu in, “Na tapa a nungta ding hi,” a cih hun lian hi, cih a pa in a thei hi. Tua ciangin amah le a innkuanpihte in a um uh hi.
43004054	Hih pen Judea pan Galilee ah Jesu, tun zawh nalamdang a bawl a nihna ahi hi.
43005001	Tua nung a sawt loin Jew-te pawi sim dingin Jerusalem ah Jesu a paito hi.
43005002	Jerusalem a, Tuu kongpi kici kiangah Aram pau-a Bethsaidaa kici tuili khat a om hi. Tua tuili kimkotah talap nga a om hi.
43005003	Hih munah a lumden mittawte, khebaite, pumzawte, mipoi tampi a om uh hi.b
43005004	A hunhunin Topa vansawltak kumsukin tui va lok zelzel hi. Tua tui a tat ciangin a kidiah masa penpen a cinatna peuhpeuh a dam hi.c
43005005	Tuate lakah kum sawm-thum-le-giat sung a zawngkhal khat a om hi.
43005006	Jesu in tuapa mu-a, tua munah tua bangin sawtveipitak lum hi, cih thei-in a kiangah, “Na dam nuam hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43005007	Tua mi zawngkhalpa in, “Sia aw, tui a tat ciangin, tui sungah hong diah ding kuamah ka nei kei hi. Kidiah dinga ka kithawi ciangin kei ma-ah midang khat na kidiah khin zel hi,” a ci hi.
43005008	Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Ding in, na phek la inla pai in,” a ci hi.
43005009	Tuapa thakhatin dampah-a a phek la-in a pai hi. Hih thupiang Sabbath ni khat ahi hi.
43005010	Tua ahitak ciangin Jew-te in a kidam sakpa kiangah “Sabbath ni ahi hi, thukham in phek na puak ding kham hi,” a ci uh hi.
43005011	Ahi hangin amah in, “Kei hong damsakpa in ka kiangah, ‘Na phek la inla pai in,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43005012	Tua ciangin amaute in, “‘Na phek la inla pai in,’ hong ci kua hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43005013	Tua lai-a om mihonte lakah Jesu lutmangpah ahi manin a cidampa in a damsakpa kua hiam, cih a thei kei hi.
43005014	Tua nung ciangin Jesu in amah biakinnpi ah mu a, “En in, na dam kik hi, mawhna na bawl nawn kei in, tua hikeileh nang tungah a siazaw hong tung kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
43005015	Tua mipa paikhia-a, Jew-te kiangah amah a damsakpa Jesu ahilam a gen hi.
43005016	Tua ciangin Jesu in hih nate Sabbath ni-a sem ahi manin Jew-te in amah a bawlsia uh hi.
43005017	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Ka pa in tuni mahmah dongin na sem tawntunga, kei zong ka sem hi,” a ci hi.
43005018	Jesu in Sabbath ni a tan loh man bek hi loin Pasian nangawn ama Pa a cihna hang le Pasian tawh a kikim-a a kikoihna thute hangin Jew-te in amah thah ding a hanciam semsem uh hi.
43005019	Jesu in amaute hih in a dawng hi: “Thutak kong geninah, Tapa in amah guakin bangmah a hih thei kei hi; a Pa hih a muhsate bek hih thei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, Pa hih peuhpeuh Tapa in zong a hih hi.
43005020	Ahang in, Pa in Tapa it-a a hih khempeuh amah a lak hi. Himah hi, lamdang na sak dingun hihte sanga a lamdangzaw nangawn a lak lai ding hi.
43005021	Ahang in, Pa in misite nuntakna pia-in a thawhkiksak bangin Tapa in zong a piak nop mite tungah nuntakna a pia hi.
43005022	Tua banah, Pa in kuama tungah thu a khen kei hi, ahi hangin thukhenna khempeuh Tapa tungah a ap hi;
43005023	tua pen mi khempeuh in Pa a pahtawi bangin Tapa a pahtawi nading uh ahi hi. Tapa a pahtawi lote in amah a sawlpa, Pa pahtawi lo ahi hi.
43005024	"Thutak kong geninah, ka thugen za a, kei hong sawlpa a um peuh in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi; a kimawhpaih kei ding hi. Amah in sihna kantanin nuntakna ah tung zo hi.
43005025	Thutak kong geninah, misite in Pasian Tapa aw a zak hun hong tung dinga, tu-in zong hong tung zo hi; a zate a nungta ding hi.
43005026	Ahang in, Pa in amah mah-a nuntakna a neih bangin Tapa in zong amah mah-a nuntakna a neih nadingin a pia zo hi.
43005027	Amah Mihing Tapa ahi manin thukhen nading thuneihna amah in pia zo hi.
43005028	"Hih thu lamdang sa kei un, ahang in, amau han sunga omte in ama aw za in,
43005029	hong paikhiat hun hong tung dinga, a hoih a nasemte a nungta dingin tho ding uh hi. A tatsiate kimawhpaih dingin tho ding uh hi.
43005030	Kei thu guakin bangmah ka hih thei kei hi. Ka zak bangin thu ka khen hi.Tua ahi ciangin ka thukhenna atang hi. Ahang in, kei lungkim nading zong loin kei hong sawlpa lungkimna ka zong zaw hi.
43005031	"Kei thu ah kei le kei teci kipang leng, ka teci panna a kip kei ding hi.
43005032	Kei hong angvan teci pang midang khat om hi, kei thu teci panna a kip hi, cih ka thei hi.
43005033	"Note in John kiangah na kansak zo uh hi. Amah in thutak teci a pang hi.
43005034	Mihing teci panna ka sang hi, ka cihna hi loin note in hotkhiatna na ngah theih nadingun ka gen hizaw hi.
43005035	John pen meivak hi-a a kuang in khua a vaksak hi. Ama khuavak ah hun khat sung nopsak ding na teel uh hi.
43005036	"John teci panna sanga thugik zaw ka nei hi. Ahang in, Pa in zawh khit dinga hong piak tua ka nasep pen Pa in kei hong sawl ahina teci ahi hi.
43005037	Kei hong sawlpa Pa mahmah in kei tawh kisai teci a pang hi. Note in a aw na za ngei kei uh a, a mel zong na mu ngei kei uh hi.
43005038	Ama sawlpa um lo na hi manun a thu zong note sungah a teng kei hi.
43005039	Laisiangtho simna hangin nuntak tawntungna a kinei sa na hi manun limtakin na sind uh hi. Hih Laisiangtho, kei thu teci pang ahi hi.
43005040	Tua hi napi nuntakna ngah dingin kei kiangah nong pai nuam kei uh hi.
43005041	"Mite hong phatna ka sang kei hi.
43005042	Ahi hangin note kong thei hi. Note lungsungah Pasian itna na neih loh uh ka thei hi.
43005043	Ka Pa minin kong pai-a, note in nong sang kei uh hi. Ahi hangin midang khat ama minin hong pai leh, amah na sang ding uh hi.
43005044	Note khat le khat kiphatna kisangin, Pasian khat beke hong phatna ngah ding na sawm kei uh leh bangci up thei ding na hi uh hiam?
43005045	"Ahi hangin Pa mai-ah note hong mawhsak dingin hong ngaihsun kei un. Note hong mawhsak, na lametna uh a kingakna pa Moses ahi hi.
43005046	Moses in kei thu gelh zo ahi manin amah na up uh leh kei zong nong up ding uh ahi hi.
43005047	Ahi zongin ama gelhsate na up loh nung sangun kei gente bangci up thei ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43006001	Tua nung ciangin Galilee Tuipi (tua pen Tiberias tuipi) galkhat lam pekah Jesu a galkah hi.
43006002	Mihon tampi in cinate tunga a hihsa lim lamdangte mu uh ahi manin amah a zui uh hi.
43006003	Tua ciangin mual pangah Jesu paito-a a nungzuite tawh a tu hi.
43006004	Jew-te Paisan Pawi hun a nai ta hi.
43006005	Jesu a daktoh leh ama lam zuana pai mihonpite a mu hi. Philip kiangah, “Hih mihonpite nek ding an koi-ah i lei ding hiam?” a ci hi.
43006006	Amah in a hih ding a lungsim sungah theikhol khin napi a zia-et nop manin a dot ahi hi.
43006007	Philip in, “Hih teng in kam khat ciat a nek ding uh kha giat thamana in zong a lei zo kei ding hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
43006008	A nungzui dangte khat, Simon Peter sanggampa Andrew in,
43006009	"Hih lai-ah naupangno khat in mangbuh ham lum nga le ngasa neu nih a nei hi. Ahi zongin mihing hizah in bang tham a ne ding uh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
43006010	Jesu in, “Mipite na tusak un,” a ci hi. Tua munah lopa a tam hi. A tu mi peuhmah tul nga bang a pha hi.
43006011	Tua ciangin Jesu in anlum la a, lungdam ko-in a tu mihonpite lakah a duh zahzah uh a luisak hi. Tua mah bangin ngasa zong a hih hi.
43006012	Amaute in a duh zahzah uh a nek khit pikpek uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, “Khamval themte khawm kik un. A thelthang khat beek omsak kei un,” a ci hi.
43006013	Tua ciangin mangbuh ham lum nga a nete in a khamval uh athem a khop uh leh bawmta sawm le nih a pha hi.
43006014	Jesu nalamdang bawl mite in a muh khit uh ciangin, “Hih pa, leitunga hong pai ding Kamsangpa hi takpi hi,” a ci pan uh hi.
43006015	Amaute in zawhthawh thu-in Jesu, kumpi-in koih nuam uh ahilam Jesu in a theih ciangin mual tungah a kihem khia hi.
43006016	Nitak ciangin a nungzuite tuilipi ah paisukin,
43006017	gunkuang ah tuang uh a, tuilipi kantanin, Capernaum lamah a galkah uh hi. Tua hunin khua mial ta-a, Jesu lah a mau kiang a tung nai kei hi.
43006018	Huih khauh nunga, tui nakpi-in a kilok hi.
43006019	Amaute in tai thum ahikeh tai thum le alangb a hot khit uh ciangin gunkuang lam manawh in Jesu tui tunga pai mu uh a, a lau mahmah uh hi.
43006020	Ahi hanign amaute kiangah, “Keimah ka hi hi, lau kei un,” a ci hi.
43006021	Tua ciangin amaute in gunkuang sungah amah tuangsak nuam uh a, tua khit phetin a manawhna uh tuigei-ah gunkuang a tung pah hi.
43006022	A zing ciangin tuilipi galkhat-a om mihonpite in, gunkuang khat bek tua lai-ah om a, Jesu lah a nungzuite tawh tuang khawm loin amauteng guak a pai uh a thei uh hi.
43006023	Tua ciangin Tiberias pan gunkuang pawlkhat va pai-a, Topa in lungdam a koh khit ciangin anlum a nekna mun kiang uh, mun khatah a khawlsak uh hi.
43006024	Mihonpite in Jesu le a nungzuite tua lai-ah a om loh lam a theih uh ciangin gunkuang tungah tuang leuleu uh a, Jesu zong dingin Capernaum ah a pai uh hi.
43006025	Tuilipi galkhatah amah a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Rabbi aw, cik-a hihtak tung na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43006026	Jesu in thutak kong geninah, lim lamdang na muh manun kei hong zong na hi kei uh a, anlum ne in na gilvah manun kei hong zong na hi uh hi.
43006027	A sia thei an ngah nadingin na na sep uh sangin Mihing Tapa hong piak ding, nuntak tawntungna donga kimang ding an ngah nadingin sem zaw un. Pa Pasian in amah a sanna ciamtehna ama tungah a koih zo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43006028	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Pasian deih na ka sep nadingun bang hih kul ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43006029	Jesu in, “Ama hong sawlpa up ding, Pasian’ na sepna ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43006030	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tua ahileh ka muh uh cianga nang kong up theih nadingun lim lamdang bang nong lak ding hiam? Bang hih ding na hi hiam?
43006031	‘Amah in vantung panin amaute nek ding anlum a pia hi,’c ci-a kigelh bangin ka pute un gamlakah manna a ne uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43006032	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, vantung pana anlum hong pia Moses hi lo hi. Vantung pana anlum taktak hong pia, ka Pa ahi hi.
43006033	Ahang in, Pasian anlum ahileh vantung pan hong paisuk in, leitung khempeuh nuntakna a piapa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43006034	Amaute in, “Sia aw, tu-a kipan tua anlum ko hong pia in,” a ci uh hi.
43006035	Tua ciangin Jesu in telgen a, “Kei mah, nuntakna anlum ka hi hi. Kei kianga hong paite a gilkial ngei kei dinga, kei hong umte a dangtak ngei kei ding hi.
43006036	Ahi hangin kong gensa bangin note in hong mu khin napi nong um kei lai uh hi.
43006037	Ka Pa hong piakte khempeuh ka kiangah hong pai dinga, ka kianga hong pai khempeuh ka hawlkhia ngei kei ding hi.
43006038	Ahang in, kei deih bang sem ding hi loin kei hong sawlpa deih banga sem dingin vantung pan kong paisuk hi.
43006039	Kei hong sawlpa deih na ahileh, kei hong piak khempeuh khat zong mansuah lo a, nitawp ni ciangin amaute ka thawhsak ding ahi hi.
43006040	Ahang in, ka Pa deihna ahileh Tapa mu a, amah a um peuhpeuh in nuntak tawntungna nei-a, ni nunung ni ciangin amah ka thawhsak ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43006041	Amah in, “Vantung pana hong pai suk anlum ka hi hi,” a cihna hangin Jew-te in amah a phunsan uh hi.
43006042	Amaute in, “A nu le a pa i theih mahmah Joseph tapa Jesu hi lo hiam. Bangci a, ‘Vantung pana hong paisuk ka hi’ ci thei ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43006043	Jesu in, “Note phun zelzul nawn kei un.
43006044	Kei hong sawlpa, Pa in a huai lohte khat beek kei kiangah hong pai thei lo dinga, hong paite lah ni nunung ni ciangin ka thosak ding hi.
43006045	Kamsangte laibu sungah, ‘Pasian in amaute khempeuh a hilh ding hi,’d ci-in kigelh hi. Ka Pa thu ngai-a ama kianga a sin khempeuh ka kiangah hong pai hi.
43006046	Pasian kiang pana hong pai mi khat longal Pa a mu ngei a om kei hi. Amah bek in Pa a mu zo hi.
43006047	Thutak kong geninah, a um mi in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi.
43006048	Keimah, nuntakna anlum ka hi hi.
43006049	Na pute na pate un gamlak ah manna a nek uh hangin a si thei lai veve uh hi.
43006050	Ahi hangin mite in ne-a, a sih theih nawn lohna uh vantung pana hong paisuk anlum hih lai-ah a om hi.
43006051	Keimah in vantung pana hong pai a nungta anlum ka hi hi. Mi khat in hih anlum a nek leh a nungta tawntung ding hi.Hih anlum in leitung buppi nuntak nadinga ka piak ding ka sa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43006052	Tua ciangin Jew-te in, “Hih pa in i nek dingin a sa bang hong ci piak theih ding hiam?” ci-in nakpi-in a kinial uh hi.
43006053	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Thutak kong geninah, Mihing Tapa a sa ne-a, a si na dawn kei uh leh note sungah nuntakna na nei kei ding uh hi.
43006054	Ka sa ne a, ka si a dawn peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi. Ni nunung ni ciangin tua mi ka thokiksak ding hi.
43006055	Ahang in, ka sa, an taktak hi-a ka si dawn ding taktak ahi hi.
43006056	Ka sa ne a ka si a dawn peuhmah kei sungah tenga, ama sungah kei ka teng hi.
43006057	A nungta Pa in kei hong sawl-a, Pa hangin kei ka nuntak bangin kei-a kivak peuhmah kei hangin a nungta ding hi.
43006058	Hih in Vantung pana hong kumsuk anlum ahi hi. Na pute na pate un manna ne uh a, a si veve uh hi; ahi hangin hih anlum-a kivakte a nungta tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
43006059	Hih thu, Capernaum a synagogue ah thu a hilh laitaka a gen ahi hi.
43006060	A nungzuite tampi in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Hih in a khauh thuhilhna ahi hi. Kua in sang thei ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43006061	Hih thu ah a nungzuite phun uh cih a theih ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Hih thu in no hong dong ahi hiam?
43006062	Note in Mihing Tapa ama-a a omna munah a kahtoh mu le uh cin, bang na ci tazen uh tam!
43006063	Kha in nuntakna a pia hi, ci-le-sa bangmahin kimang lo hi. Note tunga kong gen thute khae hi-a amaute nuntakna ahi hi.
43006064	Ahi zongin note lakah a um lo na om lai uh hi,” a ci hi. Ahang in, Jesu in a kipatcilin amaute kua teng in um lo dinga, kua in lehhek ding cih a thei khol khin hi.
43006065	Amah in a gen ban zom lai-a, “Pa in a hihtheihsakte longal kuamah ka kiangah hong pai thei lo hi, ka cihna ahang hih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43006066	Hih huna kipan a nungzui mi tampi nunghei-in amah a zui nawn kei uh hi.
43006067	Jesu in Sawm-le-nihte kiangah, “No zong kei nong taisan nuam uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43006068	Simon Peter in, “Topa ko kua kiang ah pai ding ka hi uh hiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntungna thu na nei hi.
43006069	Pasian’ Mi Siangtho na hi cih kong um uh a, kong thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43006070	Tua ciangin Jesu in, “No, Sawm-le-nihte hong teel khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Hi napi note lak nangawn ah khat, dawi mangpa ahi hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
43006071	(Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat ahi hanga a nung cianga a lehhek ding pa Simon Isacariot tapa Judas a genna ahi hi.)
43007001	Hih teng khit ciangin Jew-te in Jesu thah sawmin tua munah a ngak uh ciangin Judea pan kihemkhia-in Galilee kim tengah a vak kawikawi hi.
43007002	Ahi hangin Jew-te Biakbuk Pawi hun nai ta a,
43007003	Jesu sanggamte in, “Na nungzuite in nalamdang na bawlte a muh theih nadingun hih mun nusia in Judea ah na pai ding kilawm hi.
43007004	Tangpi theih tham mi a hi nuam peuhmah in a simthamin na a sem ngei kei hi. Hih nate hih na hi nungsang, leitung mite mai-ah kilakkhia in,”a ci uh hi.
43007005	Ahang in, ama sanggamte nangawn in amah a um kei uh hi.
43007006	Tua ahi ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Kei ading hun hoih a tung nai kei hi. No adingin hun khempeuh a hun ahi hi.
43007007	Leitung in no hong mudah thei kei ding hi. Ahi hangin a gamtat hoih lote lakkhia ka hi manin kei hong mudah hi.
43007008	Tua Pawi va sim un. Kei hun tung nai lo ahi ciangin tua Pawi simin ka pai naia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43007009	Hihte a gen khit ciangin Galilee ah a taam lai hi.
43007010	Ahi zongin a sanggamte in pawi sim dinga a paisan khit uh ciangin mipite theih lohin amah zong va paisim hi.
43007011	Pawi bawlna phualah Jew-te in amah kan uh a, “Tua mipa koi-ah om hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43007012	Mihonpite lakah ama thu kihuausim uh a, a kizel thang hi. Pawlkhatte in, “Amah mi hoih hi,” a ci uh hi. Adangte in, “Hi kei, amah’n mite a khem hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007013	Ahi hangin Jew-te kihtakna hangin ama thu kuamah in mipi zakin a genkhia kei uh hi.
43007014	Pawi bawlna alang bang a kiman ciangin biakinnpi tualah Jesu paito in thuhilh a kipan hi.
43007015	Jew-te in lamdang sa in, “Hih mipa in sinna nei lo napi hih bang theihna sang koi pan ngah hi ding hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
43007016	Jesu in, “Ka thuhilhte kei aa ahi kei hi. Hong sawlpa kiang pana hong pai ahi hi.
43007017	Mi khatpeuh in Pasian deihna hih ding a teel leh, ka thuhilhna Pasian pan hiam, ahikeh keima thu a gen ka hi hiam, cih a mukhia ding hi.
43007018	Amah leh amah-a thugen peuhmah in ama minphat nading zongin a gen hi. Ahi hangin amah a sawlpa min phat nading thu gen pa ahileh mi thutak hi a, ama thu ah zuauthu bangmah a om kei hi.
43007019	Moses in note thukham hong pia zo hi lo ahi hiam? Hi napi note khat beek in thukham na zui kei uh hi. Bang hangin kei thah hong sawm na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43007020	Mihonte in, “Nang dawi lut na hi hi; kua in nang thah hong sawm ahi hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
43007021	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Nalamdang khat ka bawl-a, na vekun lamdang na sa uh hi.
43007022	Ahi zongin Moses in vun-at ding thu hong piak manin (A taktakin Moses pana hong kipia hi loin pupite pan peka hong kipia hizaw hi.) Sabbath ni-in nau-pangte vun na atsak uh hi.
43007023	Sabbath ni-a naupangte vun-at in Moses thukham palsat lo ahileh bang hangin Sabbath ni-a mi ka damsiangsak ciangin ka tungah heh na hi uh hiam?
43007024	A pualam-a kilangkhia bek enin thu na khen kei unla, amaantakin thu na khen un,” a ci hi.
43007025	Tua laitakin Jerusalem mite pawl khat, thu dot ding kipan uh a, “Amaute in thah a sawm uh hih pa hi lo hiam?
43007026	Amah hiah om a, tangpi zakin thu gen napi, amaute in kam khat beek a ci ngam kei uh hi. Thunei vaihawmte in amah Khristb taktak hi, ci ta uh hi inteh maw?
43007027	Ahi hangin hih mipa koi pan hong pai cih i thei hi. Khrist hong pai ciangin amah koi pana hong pai cih kuamah in a thei kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007028	Tua hun Jesu in biakinnpi tual ah thu a hilh laitak hi-a, “Himah hi, kei nong thei uh hi. Koi pana hong pai cih zong nong thei uh hi. Kei thu-a hih lai-a om ka hi kei hi. Ahi hangin kei hong sawlpa a thumaan hi. Note in amah na thei kei uh hi.
43007029	Ahi hangin kei, ama kiang pan ka hi-a, amah in kei hong sawl ahi manin, amah ka thei hi,” ci-in a kikokhia hi.
43007030	Amaute in hih thu ah mat a sawm uh hi. Ahi hangin a hun tung nai lo ahi manin kuamah in ama tungah khut a nga kei hi.
43007031	Tua hi napi mipite lakah tampi in amah a um lai uh hi. Amaute in, “Khrist hong pai ciangin hih mipa bawl sangin lim lamdang zaw a bawl ding hiam?” a kici uh hi.
43007032	Ama thu tua banga mipite a kihuau sim uh Pharisee-te in a za uh hi. Tua ciangin siampi makaite le Pharisee-te in amah man dingin biakinnpi cingte a sawl uh hi.
43007033	Jesu in, “Note tawh hun tawm no sung bek ka om a, tua khit ciangin kei hong sawlpa kiangah ka pai ding hi.
43007034	Kei nong zong ding uh a, ahi hangin nong mu kei ding uh hi; ka omna ah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43007035	Jew-te in, “Hih pa i muh theih lohna mun koi lai-ah pai sawm hiam? Greek-te laka kithehthang i mipihte lakah pai-in Greek-te hoh hilh ding ahi tam?
43007036	‘Kei nong zong ding uh a, ahi hangin nong mu kei ding uh hi; ka omna ah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,’ a cih ciangin bang a cihnopna hi ding hiam?” a kici uh hi.
43007037	Pawi, a ni nunungpen le a thupi pen ni-in Jesu dinga, “A dangtak mi khatpeuh a om leh kei kiangah hong pai-in dawn ta hen.
43007038	Laisiangtho gensa bangin, kei hong um mi peuhmahd sung pan a nungta tui lui-in a luang ding hi,” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko hi.
43007039	Hih in amah a umte in a nung ciangin a ngah ding uh Kha a genna ahi hi. Jesu kipahtawi nai lo ahi manin tua hun dong Kha a kipia nai kei hi.
43007040	Ama thute a zak uh ciangin mi kimkhat in, “Hih pa tua Kamsangpa hi takpi hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007041	Adangte in, “Amah Khrist ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Adang pawlkhatte leuleu in, “Bang ci-a, Galilee pan Khrist hong pai thei ding hiam?
43007042	‘Khrist pen David innkuane pan le David tenna khuapi Bethlehem pan hong pai ding hi,’ ci-in Laisiangtho in gen hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43007043	Tua bangin Jesu hangin mihonpite a kikhen uh hi.
43007044	Pawlkhatte in amah a mat nop uh hangin ama tungah kuamah in khut a nga kei hi.
43007045	A tawpna ah, siampi makaite le Pharisee-te kiangah biakinnpi cingte ciah kik uh a, “Bang hangin amah hong paipih lo na hi uh hiam?” ci-in amaute in a dong uh hi.
43007046	A cingte in, “Hih mipa gen bangin kuamah in thu a gen ngei kei hi,” ci-in a pulak uh hi.
43007047	Pharisee-te in, “Note zong hong khem zo ta, na cihna uh maw?” ci-in a dongkhak uh hi.
43007048	Gam-ukte khempeuh ahikeh Pharisee-te khatpeuh in amah um uh ahi hiam?
43007049	Hi lo! Ahi hangin thukham neukha zong a thei lo hih mihonte – hamsiatna thuak ahi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43007050	A masa lai-a Jesu kianga a paingei amau mite Nicodemus in,
43007051	"I thukham sungah, ama thu za masa lo, a nasepna mu masa loin mi mawhpaih nading thu a om hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43007052	Amaute in, “Nang zong Galilee pan na hi hiam? En lecin Galilee panin kamsangf hong pai lo hi, cih na mu ding hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
43007053	Tua ciangin amaute a inn tek uah a ciah uh hi.
43008001	Jesu ahileh Olive Vum ah a pai hi.
43008002	Ni suah tungin amah biakinnpi tualah a kilang kik hi. Mi khempeuh a kimah kikhawm uh a, amaute thuhilh dingin a tu hi.
43008003	Thukham siate le Pharisee-te in angkawm kimlai a mat uh numei khat a va puak uh hi. Amaute in mihonpite mai-ah amah dingsak uh a,
43008004	Jesu kiangah, “Sia aw, hih numei a angkawm laitaka kiman ahi hi.
43008005	Thukham sungah Moses in tua bang numeite suanga den dingin thu a pia hi. Tu-in nang bang na gen ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43008006	Amah mawhmat theih nadingin hih dotna tawh a thangsiah uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu kunsuka, a khutme in leilak a gelh hi.
43008007	Amaute in a dot cinten uh ciangin Jesu tutang toin amaute kiangah, “Note mawh nei lo khatpeuh a om leh tuapa in amah suangin deng masa hen,” a ci hi.
43008008	Amah kunsuk kik-a leilak a gelh hi.
43008009	Tua laitakin hih thu a zate a tek pente masa in khatkhatin paikhia uh a, Jesu le a kianga ding numei bek a om lai hi.
43008010	Jesu tutang to kik-a, “Numei aw, amaute koi-ah om uh hiam? Kuamah in hong mawhpaih lo hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43008011	Numei in, “Kuamah in hong mawh paih kei, sia aw,” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Ken zong kong mawhpaih kei hi, tu-in pai inla, mawhna tawh na nuntakna pen na nusia in,” ci-in a thuhilh hi.
43008012	Jesu in mihonpi tungah thu a gen khit ciangin, “Keimah leitung khuavak ka hi hi. Kei hong zui peuhpeuh khuamial lakah pai loin nuntakna khuavak a nei ding hi,” a ci hi.
