43008013	Pharisee-te in, “Hih thu ah nangma thu nangmah in teci na kipang hi. Na teci panna a kip kei hi,” ci-in a to uh hi.
43008014	Jesu in, “Keima thu keimah in teci ka pang zongin ka teci panna a kip hi. Ahang in, koi panin hong pai, koi lamah pai ding cih ka kithei hi. Ahi hangin note in kei, koi pana hong pai, koi-ah pai ding cih neukha zong na thei beek kei uh hi.
43008015	Note in mihing thukhen bangin na khen uh a, ken kuama tungah thu ka khen kei hi.
43008016	Ahi hangin ken thu ka khen leh kei guak-a khen hi lo ka hi manin ka thukhenna amaan hi. Kei hong sawlpa, Pa tawh ka ding khawm hi.
43008017	Note neih thukham sungah, ‘Mi nih in teci a pan nak leh kip hi,’ ci-in kigelh hi.
43008018	Keima thu kei le kei teci ka kipanga, ka teci dang khat, ka Pa kei hong sawlpa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43008019	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Na Pa koi-ah om hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Jesu in, “Note in kei ka hi-a, ka Pa ahi zongin na thei kei uh hi. Kei hong thei le uh cin, ka Pa zong na thei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43008020	Hih thute biakinnpi huang sung, biakna-a kipia nate koihna munah, a hilh lai-a a gen ahi hi. Ama hun tung nai lo ahi manin kuamah in a man kei hi.
43008021	Jesu in khat vei genbeh lai-a, “Kei ka paikhiamang dinga, nong zong ding uh hi; note na mawhnate uh sungah na si ding uh hi. Ka paina ah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43008022	Hih thu a gen ciangin Jew-te in, “Amah le amah kithat ding hi ding hiam? Bang dinga, ‘Ka paina munah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi ci hi ding hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
43008023	Jesu in a thugen ban zom lai-a, “Note nuai lam pan na hi uh a, kei, tung lam pan ka hi hi. Note hih leitung pana, na hi uh a kei, hih leitung pan ka hi kei hi.
43008024	Na mawhnate uh sungah na si ding uh hi, kong ci hi. Keimah tua ka cih paa ka hi cih na up kei uh leh na mawhnate uh sungah na si takpi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43008025	Amaute in, “Nang kua na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Jesu in, “Kong kipulak tawntung sa bang ka hi hi.
43008026	Note tungah thukhena gen ding tampi ka nei hi. Ahi hangin kei hong sawlpa muantham ahi manin ama tung pana ka zakte leitung buppi ka hilh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43008027	A Pa thu a gen ahilam amaute in a phawk thei kei uh hi.
43008028	Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Mihing Tapa na khaitoh khit uh ciangin kei a tua ci ding mah ka hilam nong thei ding uh hi. Pa in kei hong hilh teng bek ka gena, kei thu-in bangmah ka sep loh lam zong na thei ding uh hi.
43008029	Ama lungkimna bek sem ka hi manin, kei hong sawlpa kei tawh omkhawma, kei guak hong nusia kei hi,” a ci hi.
43008030	Amah a pau laitak nangawnin mi tampi in amah a um uh hi.
43008031	Jesu in amah a um Jew-te kiangah, “Ka hilhna na let uh leh ka nungzuite taktak na hi uh hi.
43008032	Tua ciangin thutak na thei ding uh a, tua thutak in note hong suaktasak ding hi,” a ci hi.
43008033	Amaute in, “Kote Abraham suanteb ka hi uh a, kuama sila ka suak ngei kei uh hi. Bangci a hong kisuaktasak ding ci thei na hi hiam?” ci-in amah a dong uh hi. lk 3:8
43008034	Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, mawhna a bawl peuhmah mawhna sila ahi hi.
43008035	Silate in, innkuan sungah munkip a nei kei hi. Ahi hangin tapa in a tawntungin innkuan sung mi ahi hi.
43008036	Tua ahi ciangin Tapa in note hong suaktasak leh na suakta taktak ding uh hi.
43008037	Note Abraham suan na hi uh kong thei hi. Ahi zongin ka thu note sungah tasak zo lo na hi manun kei hong that dingin na kiging khin zo uh hi.
43008038	Pa omna muna ka muhsate no tungah kong gen hi. Note in na pac uh tung pana na zakte uh na hih uh hi,” a ci hi.
43008039	Amaute in, “Ka pa uh Abraham ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Jesu in, “Note Abraham tate hi le uh cind Abraham septe na sem ding uh hi.
43008040	Tua bang ahileh Pasian tung pana ka zaksa thumaan a gen pa kei, thah nong sawm zel uh hi. Abraham in tua bangte a hih kei hi.
43008041	Na pa uh hih bangin note in na hih uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Kote zawlta ka hi kei uh hi. Pa khat bek ka neih uh, Pasian mahmah ahi hi,” ci-in a sel uh hi.
43008042	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Na Pa uh Pasian ahileh note in kei nong it ding uh hi. Ahang in, kei Pasian kiang pana hong pai ka hi-a, tu-in hiah ka om hi. Keima thu-a hong pai hi loin hong sawlpa thu-a hong pai ka hi hi.
43008043	Bang hang ka thu gen thei siang lo na hi uh hiam? Ka thu gen na za thei kei uh hi.
43008044	Note, na pa uh dawimangpa suan na hi uh hi. Tua ahi manin na pa uh deihna na tangtungsak nuam uh hi. Amah a cil panin tualthatpa hi-a, ama sungah thutak om lo ahi manin thutak a len kei hi. Amah zuau thei-a, zuauphuakte pa ahi manin zuau a gen ciangin ama pianpih pau-a pau ahi hi.
43008045	Ahi zongin thutak kong gen manin kei nong um kei uh hi!
43008046	Note khatpeuh in ka mawhna nong man thei uh hiam? Ken thutak hong gen ka hileh bang dinga kei hong um lo na hi uh hiam?
43008047	Pasian aa ahite in Pasian gente a za hi. Pasian aa hi lo na hi manun na za thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43008048	Jew-te in, “Nang, Samaria mi hi in, dawi lut hi, kong cih uh maan lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
43008049	Jesu in, “Kei sungah dawi a lut kei hi. Ahi hangin ken ka Pa ka pahtawi-a, no kei nong pahtawi kei uh hi.
43008050	Ken keima minthanna ka zong kei hi; ahi hangin a zong khat om-a, amah thukhenpa ahi hi.
43008051	Thutak kong geninah ka thu a zui mi in sihna a mu ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43008052	Jew-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, “Dawi lut na hilam tu-in ka thei ta uh hi! Abraham si-a tua mah bangin kamsangte zong a si uh hi. Tua hi napi mi khatpeuh in na thu a zuih leh sihna ciam kha lo ding, na ci hi.
43008053	Ka pa uh Abraham sangin lianzaw na hi hiam? Amah si-a tua mah bangin kamsangte zong a si uh hi. Nang kua-a kingaihsun na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43008054	Jesu in, “Kei le kei ka kiminthansak leh ka minthanna a mawkna a suak hi. Ka Pasian uh hi, na cih uh ka Pa in kei hong pahtawipa ahi hi.
43008055	Note in amah na theih loh uh hangin ken amah ka thei hi. Amah ka thei kei hi, ci leng note mah bangin zuauphuak ka hi ding hi. Ahi hangin amah ka thei-a a thu ka zui hi.
43008056	Na pa uh Abraham in ka ni a muh ding a ngaihsut ciangin a nuam hi; a mu a, a lungdam hi,” a ci hi.
43008057	Jew-te in, “Kum sawmnga zong upa nai lo napi, Abraham maw na muh tazen!” a ci uh hi.
43008058	Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, Abraham suah ma-in kei ka om hi!” a ci hi.
43008059	Hih thu a gen a zak uh ciangin amah a den nading uh suang a tawm uh hi. Ahi hangin Jesu bu-a biakinnpi tual panin a kihemkhia hi.
43009001	Jesu a paipai laitakin mittawsa-a suak khat a mu hi.
43009002	A nungzuite in, “Rabbi aw, hih pa mittawsa-a a suah kua mawhna hang hiam, amah hiam, a nu-le-pa hizaw hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43009003	Jesu in, “Amah lah mawh kei, a nu-le-pa lah mawh kei, ahi hangin ama nuntakna ah Pasian nasepna a kilat nadinga piang ahi hi.
43009004	Sun ahi laiteng kei hong sawlpa na i sep pel mawh ding ahi hi. Kuamah in na a sep theih loh hun zan hong tung ding hi.
43009005	Leitunga ka om laiteng, leitung khuavak ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43009006	Hih teng a cih khit ciangin lei lakah a cil phiha, a ciltui tawh buan bawlin mittaw pa mit a nuh hi.
43009007	Ama kiangah, “Pai inla Siloam (Hih Kammal Sawl cihna) bualah va sil in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Tua ciangin tuapa pai-in va sil-a khua musa-in innah a ciah hi.
43009008	A vengte le khut dawh-a a nget lai a musate in, “Hih pa, mun khatah tu-a a ngenpa pen hi lo hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
43009009	Pawlkhat in, “Hi mah hi,” a ci uh hi. Adangte in, “Hi kei tuapa tawh a kisun bek hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahi hangin amahmah in, “Tua mipa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
43009010	Amaute in, “Tua ahileh na mitte bang hong ci vak hiam?” ci-in a dong tentan uh hi.
43009011	Amah in, “Jesu a cih uh mi khat in, buan bawlin ka mit nuha, ‘Siloam bual ah va pai inla va sil in,’ ci-a hong gen ciangin kei zong pai-a ka va sil leh khua ka mu thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43009012	Amaute in, “Tuapa koi-ah om ta hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Amah in, “Thei keng,” a ci hi.
43009013	Amaute in Pharisee-te kiangah mittaw ngei pa a paipih uh hi.
43009014	Jesu in buan bawla mipa mit a vaksak ni, Sabbath ni khat ahi hi.
43009015	Tua ahi ciangin Pharisee-te in zong khua bangci muh kik hiam, cih amah a dong uh hi. Mipa in, “Ka mit ah buan hong nuhsaka ka sil leh tu-in khua ka mu thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43009016	Pharisee-te pawlkhat in, “Tua mipa in Sabbath ni tang lo ahi manin Pasian kiang pana hong pai ahi kei hi,” a ci uh hi. Adangte in, “Mawh nei mi khat in tua bang limlamdang bangci bawl theih ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute a kipawlkhen uh hi.
43009017	A tawpna ah mittawpa kiangah kihei kik uh a, “Amah in na mitte vaksak ahi ciangin, ama thu gentheih bang na nei hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua mipa in, “Kamsang khat hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43009018	Jew-te in amah mittaw ngei-a tu-in khua mu thei ahilam, a nu-le-pa a sapsak matengun a um kei teitei uh hi.
43009019	Amaute in, “Hih pa no tapa ahi hiam? A mittawsa-a suak na cih pa uh ahi hiam? Tu-a khua a muh theih kikna bangci bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43009020	A nu-le-pa in, “Amah ka tapa uh hi, cih ka thei uh hi; mittawsa-a suak ahilam zong ka thei uh hi.
43009021	Ahi zongin bangci bangin tu-a khua mu thei-a, kua in a mit vaksak cih ka thei kei uh hi. Amah dong dih un. Amah picing ta hi; ama thu amahmah in gen hen,” a ci uh hi.
43009022	Jew-te in: Jesu pen Khrista hi, ci-a a sang peuhmah synagogue pan kihawlkhia ding hi, ci-a thukhensatna nei zo uh ahi ciangin a nu a pa-te in Jew-te a kihtak manun hih banga a gen uh ahi hi.
43009023	A nu-le-pa in, “Amah picing ta hi, amah dong un,” a cihna uh tua thu hang ahi hi.
43009024	Mittaw ngei pa a nihveina sam kik uh a, “Pasian min thangsak inb Kote in hih pa mawhnei hi, cih ka thei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43009025	Amah in, “Amah mawh nei ahi le ahi loh ka thei kei hi. Na khat ka thei hi, ka mit a tawsa hi-a ahi zongin tu-in khua ka mu hi!” ci-in a dawng hi.
43009026	Tua ciangin amaute in, “Nang tungah bang hong hih hiam? Na mit bang hong ci vaksak ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43009027	Amah in, “Kong gen khin zo-a na ngai kei uh hi. Bang dinga za kikkik nuam se na hi uh hiam? No zong ama nungzui suak nuam na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
43009028	Tua ciangin amaute in amah sim mawh bawlin tai gawpgawp uh a, “Hih mipa nungzui nang na hi mah ve! Ko bel Moses nungzui ka hi uh hi!
43009029	Pasian in Moses a hopih lam ka thei uh hi. Ahi hangin hih pa koi pana hong pai cih nangawn ka thei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43009030	Tuapa in, “Tua hi ve a ciamteh huai! Note in hong paina thei lo. Amah’n lah ka mit hong vaksak.
43009031	Pasian in mawh neite thu ngai lo hi, cih i thei hi. Amah in a deihna a hih a pasian-mite thu a ngai hi.
43009032	Mittawsa a suak, mit kivaksak thu kuamah in a za ngei kei hi.
43009033	Hih pa, Pasian kiang pan hi kei leh bangmah a hih thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43009034	Hih thu ah amaute in, “Nang, suah tunga mawhna tawh a kidim pa, bang hangin ko thu hong hilh ngam tazen na hi hiam!” ci-a a dawn kik khit uh ciangin amah a hawlkhia uh hi.
43009035	Amaute in tuapa hawlkhia uh cih Jesu in za a, amah a muh ciangin, “Mihing Tapa na um hiam?” a ci hi.
43009036	Mipa in, “Sia aw, amah kua ahi hiam? Amah ka up theih nadingin hong gen in,” ci-in a dong hi.
43009037	Jesu in, “Tu-in amah na mu zo hi; tu laitaka nang tawh a kihopa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43009038	Tua ciangin tuapa in, “Topa aw, ka um hi,” ci-in a bia hi.
43009039	Jesu in, “Mittawte in khua a muh nading le mitvakte a mit uh a tawt nading, thukhen dingin hih leitungah kong pai hi,” a ci hi.
43009040	Amah tawh a om khawm Pharisee-te pawlkhat in hih banga a gen a zak uh ciangin, “Bang e? Ko zong a mittaw maw?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
43009041	Jesu in, “Mittawsa hi le uh cin mawhna ah na khial kei ding uh hi. Ahi hangin tu-in ka mit uh a vak hi, ci na hi manun na mawhna uh a om lai hi.
43010001	"Thutak kong geninah, tuukhumna kongpi lam pan lut lo-a, mundang ah kahin a lut peuhmah, guta le misuam ahi hi.
43010002	Kongpi lam tawna lutpa ahileh ama tuute a cingpa ahi hi.
43010003	Kong cingpa in amah kong honin tuute in a aw a ngai uh hi. Ama tuute a minin sama a pikhia hi.
43010004	Ama aa khempeuh a pikhiat khit ciangin amaute mai-ah amah masa-a, a tuute in a aw thei uh ahi manin anung a zui uh hi.
43010005	Ahi hangin a theih loh uh mi nung a zui ngei kei uh hi. A taktakin, a mel a theih loh mite aw thei lo uh ahi manin, amah a taisan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43010006	Jesu in hih bang tehpihna zangin thu gena, ahi hangin amaute tungah bangci nuam hiam cih a theitel kei uh hi.
43010007	Tua ahi ciangin Jesu in, “Thutak kong geninah, keimah tuute adingin kongpi ka hi hi.
43010008	Ka mai-a hong pai ngei khempeuh gutate le misuamte hi uh a, ahi hangin tuute in amau thu a ngai kei uh hi.
43010009	Keimah, tua kongpi ka hi hi; kei hong tawna a lut mi peuhmah kihonkhiaa ding hi. Amah sungtumin pusuakkhia dinga lonona a mu ding hi.
43010010	Gutate ahileh, a gu ding, a that ding le a siasak ding beka pai ahi hi. Kei ka hileh amaute in nuntakna a neih nading, adim a neih nadingun hong pai ka hi hi.
43010011	"Keimah, tuucing hoihpa ka hi hi. Tuucing hoihpa in a tuute ading a nuntakna a pia hi.
43010012	A kicial tuucing pen tuu neipa hi lo hi. Tua ahi ciangin keivom pai a muh ciangin a tuute nusia in a taimangsan hi. Tua ciangin keivom in tuute mana, tuuhonte a kithehthangsak hi.
43010013	Tua mipa a kicial ahi manin a tuute don lo-a, a taimangsan ahi hi.
43010014	"Keimah, tuucing hoihpa ka hi hi; ka tuute ka thei-a, ka tuute in zong kei hong thei uh hi.
43010015	Pa in kei hong theih bang tektekin kei zong Pa ka thei hi – tua hi-a ka tuute ading ka nuntakna ka kham hi.
43010016	Hih tuu khumna inn sungah a om lo tuu dang zong ka nei hi. Amaute zong kong paipih pelmawh ding hi. Amaute in zong ka aw ngai ding uh a, tuuhon khat omin tuucingpa khat a om ding hi.
43010017	Ka Pa in kei hong itna pen, ka lakkik dinga ka nuntakna ka kham hang ahi hi.
43010018	Kei tung pan kuamah in hong lak khiatsak hi lo hi. Keima ut thu-a kikham ka hi hi. Keima ut thu-a kikham-theihna le lakkik-theihna thuneihna ka nei hi. Hih thupiak, ka Pa tung pana ka ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43010019	Hih thute hangin Jew-te a kipawl khen leuleu uh hi.
43010020	Amaute tampi in, “Amah dawi lut-a a haipau ahi hi. Bang dinga ama thu ngai i hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43010021	Ahi hangin adangte in, “Dawi lut mi thugen hih bang hi lo hi. Dawi in mittawte mit vaksak thei ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43010022	Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah Apnab Pawi a tung hi. Phalbi lai hi a,
43010023	biakinnpi huang sunga om, Solomon Talap sungah Jesu a vak kawikawi hi.
43010024	Jew-te a kimah va kikhawm uh a, “Bang tan vei lungsim laklawha hong koih ding na hi hiam? Nang, Khristc na hileh siangtakin hong gen dih in,” a ci uh hi.
43010025	Jesu in, “Kong gen hangin na um kei uh hi. Ka Pa min a ka bawl nalamdangte in kei adingin gen khin zo hi.
43010026	Ahi hangin ka tuute hi lo na hi manun na um kei uh hi.
43010027	Ka tuute in ka aw a ngai uh hi; keimah in amaute ka thei-a amaute in kei hong zui uh hi.
43010028	Amaute nuntak tawntungna ka pia-a, a mangthang ngei kei ding uh hi; amaute ka khut sung pan kuamah in a lakhia thei kei ding hi.
43010029	Amaute hong pia ka Pa, na khempeuh sangin lianzaw a,d ka Pa khut panin kuamah in hong sutkhia thei kei ding hi.
43010030	Kei le ka pa, khat ka hi uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43010031	Jew-te in amah deng dingin suang a tawm leuleu uh hi.
43010032	Ahi hangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Pa kiang pana nalamdang a thupi tampite kong lak zo hi. Tuate lakah a koi pen hanga kei suang tawh hong deng ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43010033	Jew-te in, “Tua thute khatpeuh hanga nang suang tawh hong deng ding ka hi kei uh hi. Pasian na gendaina hanga hong deng ding ka hi uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mihing leltak khat Pasian na kici hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
43010034	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note’ Thukham sungah, ‘Note pasiante na hi uh hi, ka ci zo hi,’e ci-in kigelh hi lo hiam?
43010035	Amah in Pasian thu tunna amaute ‘pasiante’ ci ahileh, Laisiangtho thu lah kipelh thei lo dinga,
43010036	Pasian in ama aa mahmah a, a sehtuampa le leitunga, a sawlpa kua hi ding hiam? ‘Pasian Tapa ka hi hi’ ka cih mana bang hangin Pasian gendai a hong ngawh na hi uh hiam?
43010037	Ka Pa hih banga ka hih keileh hong um kei un.
43010038	Ahi hangin Pa hih banga ka hih leh kei nong um kei uh zongin, kei sungah Pa om a, Pa sungah kei om ka hilam thei in, na theihtel theih nadingun nalamdangte na um beek un,” a ci hi.
43010039	Amaute in amah mat sawm leuleu uh a, ahi hangin amaute khut panin a suakta hi.
43010040	Tua ciangin ni masa lai-a, John in a baptisena mun Jordan galah Jesu a pai kik hi. Hih lai-ah amah taam a,
43010041	a kiangah mi tampi a va pai uh hi. Amaute in, “John in na lamdang a bawl ngei loh hangin hih mipa thu a gen khempeuh amaan hi,” a ci uh hi.
43010042	Tua munah mi tampi in Jesu a um uh hi.
43011001	Amah Mary le a sanggamnu Martha tenna Bethany khua mi ahi Lazarus kici mi khat a ci na hi.
43011002	Hih a cina pa sanggamnu Mary pen, Topa tunga sathau namtui sunga a khepekte a sama a nulsaknu mah ahi hi.
43011003	Tua ciangin a sanggam numeite in Jesu kiangah, “Topa aw, na itpa cina hi,” ci-in kam a vaikhak uh hi.
43011004	Jesu in hih thu a zak ciangin, “Hih natna sih nading hi lo hi. Hi lo hi, hih tungtawnin Pasian Tapa kiminthangsaka Pasian in minthanna a ngah nading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43011005	Jesu in Martha le a sanggamnu le Lazarus a it hi.
43011006	Ahi zongin amah in Lazarus cina hi cih za napi a omna mah ah ni nih a taam lai hi.
43011007	Tua ciangin ama nungzuite kiang ah, “Judea ah ciah kik ni,” a ci hi.
43011008	Ahi hangin amaute in, “Rabbi aw, Jew-te in suang tawh den hong sawm uh sawt nai lo hi, tuapi mah tua lai-ah pai kik ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43011009	Jesu in, “Khuavak hun sung nai sawm-le-nih pha hi lo ahi hiam? Sun lai-a lampaite in hih leitung khuavak hangin khua mu ahi manin a kisuikha kei ding hi.
43011010	Zanin lam a pai ciangin khua vak lo ahi manin a kisuikha uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43011011	Hih teng a cih khit ciangin amaute tunga a thugen ban zomlai-a, “I lawmpa Lazarus ihmu hi, ahi hangin amah phong dingin tua lai-ah ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
43011012	A nungzuite in, “Topa, ihmu ahileh a nuamtuam ding hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
43011013	Jesu in a si a genna hi napi, a nungzuite in ihmut ngei-a ihmu a sa uh hi.
43011014	Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, Lazarus si zo hi;
43011015	na up theih nadingun kei tua lai-a ka om loh note adingin ka nuam hi. Ahi zongin ama kiangah pai ni,” ci-in a telgen hi.
43011016	Tua ciangin Thomas (Didymus kici) in a nungzui dangte kiangah, “Amah tawh i sihkhawm theih nadingin ei zong va zui ni,” a ci hi.
43011017	Jesu a tun ciangin, Lazarus han sungah a om zawh ni li pha zo hi, cih a thei hi.
43011018	Jerusalem panin Bethany taia nih sangin naizaw a,
43011019	a sanggampa sihna hangin Mary le Martha hehnem dingin Jew-te tampi a pai uh hi.
43011020	Martha in Jesu tung ta cih a zak ciangin a dawn dingin paikhia-a, inn ah Mary a om lai hi.
43011021	Martha in Jesu kiangah, “Topa, hih lai-ah om lecin ka sanggampa a si kei ding hi.
43011022	Ahi hangin tu nangawnin na nget peuhpeuh Pasian in hong pia ding cih ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
43011023	Jesu in tuanu kiangah, “Na sanggam-pa a tho kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
43011024	Martha in, “Ni tawp ni-a thawhkik hun ciangin a thawh kik ding ka thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43011025	Jesu in tuanu kiangah, “Keimah in, thawhkikna le nuntakna ka hi hi. Kei hong um mi a sih hangin a nungta ding hi;
43011026	nungta-a kei hong um peuhmah a si ngei kei ding hi. Hih thu na um hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43011027	Tuanu in, “Ka um hi Topa aw, leitunga hong pai ding Pasian Tapa Khristb na hi, cih ka um hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
43011028	Hih teng a gen khit ciangin kileh kika, a sanggamnu Mary a va sam tuam hi. Amah in, “Siapa hih lai ah om-a, nang hong kan hi,” a ci hi.
43011029	Mary in hih thu a zak ciangin dingkhia vat-a a kiangah a va pai hi.
43011030	Tua hunin Jesu khua sungah lut nai lo a, Martha tawh a kituahna mun ah om lai hi.
43011031	Inn sunga Mary tawh a om, amah a hehnem Jew-te in, Mary thakhatin dinga a paikhiat a muh uh ciangin han ah pai-a a va kap ding sa in a zui uh hi.
43011032	Jesu omna mun ah Mary tunga, amah a muh ciangin a khephung ah bokin, “Topa, nang hih lai-ah om lecin ka sanggampa a si kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
43011033	Jesu in tuanu kah mu a, amah a zui Jew-te zong a kap uh a muh ciangin a lungsim ah na sa mahmah in a lunggim hi.
43011034	Amah in, “Amah koi-ah sial na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Topa aw, hong pai inla hong en dih in,” a ci uh hi.
43011035	Jesu a kap hi.
43011036	Tua ciangin Jew-te in, “En sin uh, nak it mahmah si!” a ci uh hi.
43011037	Ahi hangin amaute pawlkhat in, “Mittawte khua a musak theipa in amah silosak thei lo hi ve maw?” a ci uh hi.
43011038	Jesu, a lungsim sunga na sa mah mah kawmin han lam zuanin a pai hi. Tua han, a vang suangpek a kikhak kawhawm khat ahi hi.
43011039	Jesu in, “A suang lakhia un,” a ci hi. Misipa sanggamnu Martha in, “Ahi zongin Topa, tua lai-a a om zawh ni li pha khin ta a tu-in namsia ta hi,” a ci hi.
43011040	Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Na up leh Pasian minthanna na mu ding hi, hong ci zo hi lo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43011041	Tua ciangin suang a likkhia uh hi. Tua khit ciangin Jesu dakto a, “Pa aw, kong ngetna hong zazo na hi manin ka lung dam hi.
43011042	Ka thu nong sang tawntung cih ka thei hi. Ahi hangin hih lai-a ding mite phattuam nading, nang kei hong sawl na hilam a up nading uh deihna-in hih ka gen hi,” a ci hi.
43011043	Hih teng a cih khit ciangin Jesu in, “Lazarus, hong paikhia ou!” ci-in nakpi in a sam hi.
43011044	Misipa paikhia-a, a khut le a khete hanpuan tawh kitunin, a maitang puan khatin a kituam hi. Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Han puante phelkhia unla, amah paisak un,” a ci hi.
43011045	Tua ahi manin Mary inn-a a hawh, Jesu sepsa a mu Jew-te tampi in amah a um uh hi.
43011046	Ahi hangin pawlkhatte Pharisee-te kiangah pai uh a, Jesu hihsa teng a gen uh hi.
43011047	Tua ciangin siampi makaite le Pharisee-te in Sanhedrin kikhop a sam uh hi. Amaute in, “A bangci tazen i hi hiam? Hih mipa in limlamdangte bawlbawl a;
43011048	hih banga i hih saksak leh mi khempeuh in amah um ding uh a, tua ciangin Rome mite hong kuanin i munc le i minam a lamang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
43011049	Tua ciangin amaute lakah tua kum a tulpi a sem Caiaphas kici pa paukhia a, “No bangmah thei kei uh teh!
43011050	Minam khat a bupa a manthan sangin mipite tangin mi khat si leh a hoihzawk lam na phawkkha kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43011051	Amah in ama lungsim puaka hih thu a gen hi lo hi. Ahi hangin tua kuma tulpi ahi bangin Jew minam tangin Jesu si ding hi, cih a genkhol hizaw hi.
43011052	Tua minam tang ding bek hi loin a kitheh thang Pasian tate tang ding zong hi a, amaute kaikhawm kikin khat a suahsak nading ahi hi.
43011053	Tua ahi ciangin tua ni-a kipan amah thah nading a gelsim uh hi.
43011054	Tua ahi manin Jew-te lakah mipi theihin Jesu a pai nawn kei hi. Tua sangsikin sehnel-gam gei Ephraim khua omna kualah kileh kik zaw a, a nungzuite tawh tua lai-ah a om uh hi.
43011055	Jew-te Paisan-pawi hun a nai mahmah ciangin kisakkholhna, Paisan-pawi ma-a biakna ngeina-a kisiansuahna bawl dingin gamsung khua panin mi tampi Jerusalem ah a paito uh hi.
43011056	Amaute in Jesu zongzong uh a, biakinnpi huang-sung tengah dingin, “Nang bang na ci ngaihsut hiam? Pawi sungah amah hong pai lo ding hi ve maw?” a kici uh hi.
43011057	Ahi hangin siampi makaite le Pharisee-te in, amah a mat theih nadingun Jesu omna mun a mu a om leh amau kiangah a va gen nadingun thu a pia uh hi.
43012001	Paisan-pawi ma ni guk laitakin Jesu in misi pana a thawhsakpa Lazarus tenna Bethany ah Jesu a tung hi.
43012002	Hih lai-ah Jesu pahtawina in nitak-an kivak hi. Martha in an nek ding bawl-a sabuai-a kingamte lakah Lazarus a om hi.
43012003	Tua ciangin Mary in nard sathau citak a namtui, a manpha mahmah pinta khat tawi a, Jesu khepekte buakin a sam tawh a khepekte a nul hi. Tuateh sathau namtui gim in inn sung khempeuh a zel khin hi.
43012004	Ahi hangin a nungzuite khat, a nung cianga amah lehhek ding pa Judas Iscariot in,
43012005	"Bang hanga hih sathau namtui zuaka a sum mizawngte kipia zaw lo ahi hiam? Tua in kum khat thamanb zah man hi,” a ci hi.
43012006	Amah in mizawngte a khualna tawh a cih hi loin amah guta ahi man ahi hi; amah sum-ip kem hi-a tua sunga kikoihte ama adingin a la zelzel pa ahi hi.
43012007	Jesu in, “Amah bangmah cih dah un, ka kivui ni cianga dingin a sit sathau namtui zang ahi hi.
43012008	Note mizawngte tawh na om khawm lai ding uh hi. Ahi hangin kei tawh na omkhawm tawntung kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43012009	Tua hun sungin Jesu tua lai-a a om lam Jew mihon tampi in a theih uh ciangin a va pai uh hi. Ama hang bek hi loin misi pana a thawhsakpa Lazarus zong a mu nuam uh hi.
43012010	Tua ahi ciangin siampi makaite in Lazarus zong thah a sawm uh hi.
43012011	Ahang in, ama hangin Jesu lamah Jew-te kihei uh a, amah a muang uh hi. uh hi.
43012012	A zing ciangin Pawi sima pai mihon tampi in, Jesu in Jerusalem zuan, cih thu a za uh hi.
43012013	Amaute nisuh hiang tawi-in amah dawn dingin paikhia uh a, “Hosanna!”c “Topa mina hong paipa in thupha a ngah hi!”d “Israel Kumpipa in thupha a ngah hi!” ci-in a awng uh hi.
43012014	Jesu in laano khat mu a,
43012015	"Zion Tanu aw, lau kei in; en in, na kumpipa laapi ta laano tungah tuangin hong pai hi,” ci-a kigelhsa bangin tua tungah a tuang hi.e
43012016	A tunglai teng a nungzuite in hihte khempeuh a theitel kei uh hi. Jesu a kipahtawi khit ciang bekin ama thu hih banga, a kigelh lam le amaute in hih banga hih uh ahilam a thei pan bek uh hi.
43012017	Tua laitakin amah tawh a om khawm mihonpite in, amah in han sung panin Lazarus sama, misi pan a thawh sakna thu a thangsak beh lailai uh hi.
43012018	Hih nalamdang a bawlna thu a zak manun mi tampite amah dawn dingin a kuankhia uh hi.
43012019	Tua ciangin Pharisee-te in, “Thei un, bangmah i lawh zo nawn kei hi. Leitung bupin ama nung zui khinmang uh hi!” a kici uh hi.
43012020	Pawi sunga Pasian bia dinga pai mite lakah Greek-te pawlkhat a om uh hi.
43012021	Amaute Galilee gama Bethsaida a teng Philip kiangah pai uh a, “Sia aw, Jesu ka mu nuam uh hi,” ci-in a thum uh hi.
43012022	Philip in Andrew ko-a Andrew le Philip in Jesu a ko sawn uh hi.
43012023	Jesu in, “Mihing Tapa a kimin-thansak hun tung zo hi.
43012024	Thutak kong geninah, mangbuh tang khat lei lakah kia-a, a sih phot kei leh a tang khat guak mah om niloh hi. Ahi hangin a sih leh tang tampi a suang hi.
43012025	Ama nuntakna a it mi in taan dinga, hih leitunga, a nuntakna a mudah mi in nuntak tawntungna adingin a kemcing ding hi.
43012026	Ka na a sem peuhmah in kei hong zuih pelmawh kul-a, kei omna ah ka nasempa zong a om ding hi. Ka na a sem mi peuhmah ka Pa in a pahtawi ding hi.
43012027	"Tu-in ka lungmang hi, bang ka ci gen ding hiam? ‘Pa aw, hih hun panin hong hon in,’ ka ci ding hiam? Ka ci kei ding hi, hih hang maha hih hun dong a tung ka hi hi.
43012028	Pa aw, na min thangsak in!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin, “Ka thangsak zo a, ka thangsak lai ding hi,” ci-in vantung pan aw khat a ging hi.
43012029	Tua lai-a om mihonpite in za uh a, vanging hi, a ci tawh, vansawltak in amah hopih hi, a ci tawh a om uh hi.
43012030	Jesu in, “Hih aw, kei phattuam nading hi loin note ading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43012031	Hih leitunga thu khen ding tu hun ahi hi; hih leitung a kumpitapa tu-in kihawlkhia ding hi.
43012032	Ahi hangin kei ka hileh leitung pan hong kikhaitoh ciangin kei lamah mi khempeuh ka huai ding hi,” a ci hi.
43012033	Hih bang a cih ciangin a sih cianga a sihzia ding lak ahi hi.
43012034	Mihonpite in, “Thukham sungah, ‘Khrist,f a om tawntung ding hi,’ cih ka za uh hi. Tua hi napi bang dinga, ‘Mihing Tapa kikhaito ding,’ ci thei na hi hiam? Hih Mihing Tapa kua ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
43012035	Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiang ah, “Note in tawmvei sung bek khuavak na nei lai ding uh hi. Khuamial in hong lap ma-in khuavak na neih lai-un pai un. Khuamial laka paite in a pai nading uh a thei kei uh hi.
43012036	Khuavak tate na suah theih nadingun khuavak na neih lai-un khuavak muang un,” a ci hi. Thu a gen khit ciangin Jesu paikhia a, amaute lak pan a kisel hi.
43012037	Jesu in amaute om-a, hih lim lam dangte a bawl khit nangawnin amaute in a um tuan kei lailai uh hi.
43012038	Hih in kamsangpa Isaiah gen: “Topa aw, ka thugen kuan um-a, kua tungah Topa khut kilaak hiam?”g a cih thu a tangtunsak nading ahi hi.
43012039	Hih thu hangin amaute in a um thei kei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Isaiah in mun dangah:
43012040	"Amah in amaute mit tawsakin, a lungtangte uh sisak hi, tua ahi manin a mit uh tawh bangmah mu thei lo uh a, a lungtang uh tawh zong bangmah theitel thei loin a kihei thei kei uh hi – tua hi kei leh amaute ka damsak kha ding hi,”h ci hi.
43012041	Isaiah in Jesu minthanna mu zo ahi manin ama thu a na gen ahi hi.
43012042	Tua hi napi a makai tampite lak nangawn ah tua hun mahmah in tampi in amah a um uh hi. Ahi zongin Pharisee-te in synagogue pan a hawlkhiat ding a lau manun a upna uh a pulakkhia ngam kei uh hi.
43012043	Ahang in, amaute in Pasian phatna sangin, mihing phatna a itzaw uh hi.
43012044	Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Mi khat in kei hong up leh, kei bek hong um kei hi. Kei hong sawlpa zong a um hi.
43012045	Kei hong et ciangin kei hong sawlpa a mu hi.
43012046	Kei hong um khat beek khuamial ah a om loh nadingin khuavakin leitung ah hong pai ka hi hi.
43012047	"Ka thugente za napi a zui lo mi tungah thu ka khen kei ding hi. Ahang in, leitung thukhen dinga hong pai ka hi kei a, a honkhia dinga hong pai ka hizaw hi.
43012048	Kei hong nial a, ka thugente a sang lo mi ading thukhenpa khat a om hi. Ni nunung ni ciangin tua ka thu genkhiat tektek in amah a mawhpaih ding hi.
43012049	Ahang in, keima ut thu-a gen ka hi kei a, kei hong sawl Pa in bang thu gen dinga, bangci gen ding cih hong thu piaksa bek ka gen hi.
43012050	Hih thupiakna in nuntak tawntungna tun hi cih ka thei hi. Tua ahi ciangin ka gen peuhmah Pa in kei gen dinga hong hilh tektekte bek ka gen hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
43013001	Tua hun, Paisan Pawi madiak ahi hi. Jesu in hih leitung nusia in, Pa kiangah a pai hun ta, cih a thei hi. Hih leitunga om ama mite it a, amaute a itnaa a vekpi-in tu-in a lak hi.
43013002	Nitak-an nek laitakin dawimangpa in Simon tapa Judas Iscariot tungah Jesu a lehhek nadingin tawsawn khin zo hi.
43013003	Pa in ama vangliatna nuai-ah na khempeuh koihin amah Pasian kiang pana hong pai hi-a, Pasian kiangah a ciah kik ding ahi hi, cih Jesu in a thei hi.
43013004	Tua ahi ciangin ankuang um kimlai dingkhia-a a puantungsilh suahkhia in mainulpi khat a kawngah a vial hi.
43013005	Tua khit ciangin kuang sungah tui sunga, a nungzuite khe silsakin, a kawnga a vialh mainulpi in a nulkeusak hi.
43013006	Simon Peter ciang tunga amah in, “Topa nang lawmlawm in ka khe hong silsak zawzen ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43013007	Jesu in, “Tu-in bang hih ka hi hiam, cih na thei kei hi, ahi hangin nung ciangin na theihtel ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43013008	Peter in, “Hi kei, ka khe na sil ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Nang kong sil kei leh kei tawh a kipawl lo na hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43013009	Simon Peter in, “Tua ahileh Topa aw, ka khe bek hi loin ka khutte le ka lu zong hong silsak in!” a ci leuleu hi.
43013010	Jesu in, “A kipumsilsate, a khe bek sil kul hi; a pumpi khempeuh a siang hi. Note na siang uh hi, ahi hangin na vekpi un na siang kim kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43013011	Amah in a lehhek ding pa thei zo ahi manin, note na siang kim kei uh hi, a ci ahi hi.
43013012	Amaute khe a silsak a man ciangin a puan silha, a tutna munah a pai kik hi. Amaute kiangah, “Note adinga ka septe na theitel uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43013013	"Note in kei ‘Sia’ le ‘Topa’ nong ci uh a, amaan hi; kei zong tua mah ka hi hi.
43013014	Tu-in keimah na Topa le na Siapa un na khe uh hong silsak ka hileh, no zong khat le khat na khe uh na kisilsak ding uh hi.
43013015	Note tunga ka hih banga na hih dingun na etteh ding uh kong lak zo hi.
43013016	Thutak kong geninah, a pu sangin a nasemte a lianzaw kei hi. Tua mah bangin thupuapa in a sawlpa sangin a lianzaw kei hi.
43013017	Hihte thei khin na hi uh ciangin na sep uh leh thupha na ngah ding uh hi.
43013018	"Note na vekpi un kong ci khin kei hi; ka teelsate ka thei hi. Ahi zongin hih in, Laisiangtho sunga; ‘An ka nekkhawm pihpa in kei langah a khetul a liikto zo hi,’b a cih thu a tangtunsak nading ahi hi.
43013019	"Hih thu a pian ciangin kei amah ka hilam na up nadingun a pianma tu-in note tungah kong gen khol hi.
43013020	Thutak kong geninah, ka sawl mi khatpeuh a sang peuhmah, kei hong sang ahi hi; kei hong sang peuhmah, kei hong sawlpa a sang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43013021	Jesu in hih teng a cih khit ciangin a lungsim buai mahmah a, “Thutak kong geninah, note lakah khat in kei nong lehhek ding uh hi,” ci-in a telgen hi.
43013022	Kua a cihna hiam cih thei zo loin a nungzuite khat le khat a ki-en uh hi.
43013023	Amaute lakah khat, Jesu in a it nung zuipa ama zomah a kingam hi.
43013024	Simon Peter in hih nungzuipa suphei a, “Kua gen hiam, na dong dih in,” a ci hi.
43013025	Amah Jesu lamah awnphei a, “Topa kua gen na hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43013026	Jesu in, “Hih anlum them khat kuang sungah diaha, ka piak ding pa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin anlum them khat diah a Simon tapa Judas Iscariot a pia hi.
43013027	Judas in anlum a san phetin a sungah Satan a lut hi. Jesu in, “Na hih ding manlangin hih in,” a ci hi.
43013028	Ahi hangin ankuang umte khat beek in, Jesu in bang hanga hih banga ama kiangah ci hiam, cih a thei kei uh hi.
43013029	Pawlkhatte in, Judas sum kem ahi ciangin Pawi-a zat ding na kisam khatpeuh lei dinga sawl ahikeh mi zawngte na khatpeuh pia dinga sawl hi ding hi, ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi.
43013030	Anlum a san khit phetin Judas a paikhia hi. Tua hun zan laitak ahi hi.
43013031	Amah a paikhiat khit ciangin Jesu in, “Tu-in Mihing Tapa kipahtawi-a, ama sungah Pasian a kipahtawi hi.
43013032	Ama sungah Pasian a kiminthansakc leh Pasian in ama sungah Tapa minthangsak dinga, amah minthangsak pah ding hi.
43013033	"Ka tate aw, note tawh tawmvei sung bek ka omkhawm lai ding hi. Note in kei nong zong ding uh hi, Jew-te ka hilh bangin note kong hilh hi: Ka paina munah nong pai thei kei ding uh hi.
43013034	"Thupiak thak khat note kong pia hi: Khat le khat na ki-it un. Keimah in note kong it bangin note khat le khat na ki-it pelmawh un.
43013035	Note khat le khat na ki-it uh leh ka nungzuite na hilam uh mi khempeuh in a thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43013036	Simon Peter in, “Topa koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Jesu in, “Ka pai nading mun ah tu-in nong zui thei kei ding uh hi, ahi hangin tunung ciangin nong zui ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43013037	Peter in, “Topa, bang dingin tu-a hong zui thei lo ding ka hi uh hiam? Nang adingin ka nuntakna ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
43013038	Tua ciangin Jesu in dawnga, “Nang, kei adingin na nuntakna paitakpi ding na hi hiam? Thutak kong geninah, ak khuan ma-in kei thumvei nong kitheihmawhbawl ding hi!
43014001	"Note kilungmangsak kei un. Pasian muang unla, a kei zong hong muang un.
43014002	Ka Pa inn sungah inndei tampi a om hi; om lo hileh kong gen zo ding hi. Note om nading mun bawlkhol dingin tua lai-ah ka pai ding hi.
43014003	Pai-in note om nading mun ka bawl khit ciangin ka omna munah note na om theih nadingun hong pai kikin note kong la ding hi.
43014004	Ka paina mun tunna lampi na thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
43014005	Thomas in, “Topa aw, na pai nading ka thei kei uh hi. Lampi bangci theih ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
43014006	Jesu in, “Keimah in, lampi, thutak le nuntakna ka hi hi. Kei tawn loin kuamah Pa kiang a tung thei kei hi.
43014007	Kei nong theih takpi uh leh ka pa zong na theib ding uh hi. Tu-a kipan amah na thei zo uh a, na mu zo uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43014008	Philip in, “Topa aw, Pa hong lak lecin tua pen ko adingin phazo ding hi,” a ci hi.
43014009	Jesu in, “Philip aw, note tawh hih tanveitak ka omkhawm nangawnin kei hong thei nai lo na hi hiam? Kei hong mute peuhmah, Pa mu ahi hi. Bangci a, ‘Kote, Pa hong lak in,’ ci thei na hi hiam?
43014010	Pa sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah Pa a om cih um lo na hi hiam? Note kianga kong gen thute, kei thu beka, gen ka hi kei hi. Ka sunga a nungta Pa in ama na a sem hizaw hi.
43014011	Pa sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah Pa a om hi, ka cih ciangin kei hong um un. Tua ahikeh zong nalamdangte kitelsakna beek um un.
43014012	Thutak kong geninah, kei hong um mi peuhmah in ka sepsa pen mah a sem ding hi. Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin hihte sangin na lianzaw nangawn a sem ding hi.
43014013	Tapa in Pa tungah minthanna a puak theih nadingin kei min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh ka na sepsak ding hi.
43014014	Note in kei min suanga na khatpeuh nong nget uh leh kong sepsak ding hi.
43014015	"Kei nong it uh leh kong thupiak na mang ding uh hi.
43014016	Pa kiangah ka ngen dinga, amah in note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thukuppihpa dang khat –
43014017	Thutak Kha note hong pia ding hi. Leitung in amah thei ngei lo, mu zong mu ngei lo ahi manin a sang thei kei hi. Ahi zongin amah note tawh omkhawm a, note sungah om dingc ahi manin amah na thei uh hi.
43014018	Tagahte bangin note kong nusia kei ding hi. No kiangah kong pai ding hi.
43014019	A sawt loin leitung in kei hong mu nawn kei ding hi. Ahi hangin no nong mu ding uh hi. Kei nungta ka hi manin note zong na nungta ding uh hi.
43014020	Tua ni ciangin kei ka Pa sungah om-in, kei sungah note na om uh a, note sungah kei ka om cih na theitel ding uh hi.
43014021	Ka thupiakte nei-a a mang peuhmah kei hong it ahi hi. Kei hong itte ka Pa in it dinga, kei zong amah it-in, ama tungah ka kilak ding hi,” a ci hi.
43014022	Tua ciangin Judas (Judas Iscariot lo pen) in, “Ahi hangin Topa aw, bang dinga kote kianga kilah sawm a, leitung mite kianga kilah sawm lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43014023	Jesu in, “Mi khatpeuh in kei hong it leh ka hilhna a mang ding hi. Ka Pa in amah it dinga, ama kiangah ka pai ding uh a, amah tawh ka teng khawm ding uh hi.
43014024	Kei hong it lote in ka hilhna a mang kei ding uh hi. Hih na zak uh thute kei aa hi lo hi; kei hong sawlpa ka Pa aa ahi hi.
43014025	"Note tawh ka omkhawm lai-in hihte khempeuh kong gen khin zo hi.
43014026	Ahi hangin tua Thukuppihpa keima mina Pa in hong sawl ding tua Khasiangtho in na khempeuh hong hilh dinga, kong gensa khempeuh hong phawkkiksak ding hi.
43014027	Lemna note kong nusiat hi; ka lemna note kong pia hi. Leitung piak bangin note tungah kong pia kei hi. Na lungmang kei unla, na lau kei un.
43014028	"Note in, ‘Ka paimang dinga no kiangah kong pai kik ding hi,’ ka cih na za uh hi. Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin kei nong it uh leh na kipak ding uh hi. Ahang in, kei sangin Pa lianzaw hi.
43014029	Hih thu a pian cianga na up theih nadingun a pian ma-in no tungah tu-in kong gen hi.
43014030	Hih leitung kumpitapa hong pai ta ahi manin note tawh sawtveipi ka kiho nawn kei ding hi. Amah in kei bangmah hong cih zo kei hi.
43014031	Kei in Pa ka it a, ka Pa in kei hong thupiak bang tektekin ka sep lam leitung in a theih pelmawh kul hi. "Hong pai un; tu-in paikhia ni.
43015001	"Keimah lenggui taktak ka hi-a, ka Pa, tua lo neipa ahi hi.
43015002	Kei sungah oma, a gah lo hiang peuhmah a sattan hi; a gah hiang peuhmah tam a gah zawk nadingin heuhin a hahsianga hi.
43015003	Note tungah kong gensa thu hangin na siang khin ta uh hi.
43015004	Keima sungah om un, note sungah ka om ding hi. Amah beka gah thei hiang a om kei hi. A guipi-ah a om pelmawh kul hi. Note zong keima sunga na om kei uh leh na gah thei kei ding uh hi.
43015005	"Keimah, lengguipi ka hi hi. Note hiangte na hi uh hi. Mi khat kei sungah oma, ama sungah kei ka om leh gah tampi a gah ding hi. Kei loin bangmah na hih thei kei uh hi.
43015006	Mi khatpeuh kei sungah a om kei leh amah, a kipaimang a vul hiang tawh kibang hi. Tua bang hiangte kitawmin mei sungah kikhula, a kangtum hi.
43015007	Kei sungah na om uh a, ka thute no sungah a om leh na ut peuhpeuh uh na ngen un; hong kipia ding hi.
43015008	Note in gah tampi na gah uh a, ka nungzuite na hina uh na lahna uh, ka Pa minthanna ahi hi.
43015009	"Ka Pa in kei hong itsa bangin note kong it zo hi. Tu-in ka itna sungah om un.
43015010	Ka Pa thupiakte manga ama itna sungah ka om bang tektekin, kong thupiakte na man uh leh ka itna sungah na om ding uh hi.
43015011	Ka lungnopna note sungah om a, note lungnopna a kicin theih nadingin hih thu kong gen zo hi.
43015012	Kong thupiak hih ahi hi: Note kong it bangin note khat le khat na ki-it thuk un.
43015013	A lawmte tang dinga a nuntakna a paai itna sanga itna lianzaw a nei kuamah om lo hi.
43015014	Ka thupiak na zuih uh leh ka lawmte na hi uh hi.
43015015	Silate in a pu nasep thei lo uh ahi manin note silate kong ci nawn kei hi, tua sangsikin ka Pa tung pana ka theih khempeuh note hong theisak khin ka hi manin lawmte kong ci ta hi.
43015016	Note in kei nong teel kei uh a, keimah in pai-a gah a gah tawntung dingin note kong teel hi. Tua ciangin ka min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh Pa in note hong pia ding hi.
43015017	Ka thupiak hih ahi hi: Khat le khat ki-it thuk un.
43015018	"Leitung in note hong muhdah leh, kei hong mudah masa hi, cih thei gige un.
43015019	Leitung aa na hi uh leh ama aa bangin note hong it ding hi. A taktak in leitung aa na hi kei uh hi. Keimah in leitung mite lak panin note kong teelkhia zo hi. Tua hangin leitung in note hong mudah hi.
43015020	Note tunga kong gensa thute ciamteh un: ‘A pu sanga lianzaw nasem kuamah a om kei hi.’b Amaute in kei hong bawlsia uh ahileh, no zong hong bawlsia ding uh hi. Amaute in ka hilhna a man’ uh leh no aa zong a mang ding uh hi.
43015021	Ka min hangin amaute in note hih bangin hong bawl ding uh hi. Ahang in, amaute in kei hong Sawlpa a thei kei uh hi.
43015022	Amaute kiangah hong pai-in thu gen lo hi leng khialhna hanga a mawh a suak kei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin tu-in ahileh a mawhna uh paulap ding a nei kei uh hi.
43015023	Kei hong mudahte in ka Pa zong a mudah uh hi.
43015024	Amaute lakah kuama bawl loh va bawl kei leng, amaute khialhna hangin a mawh suak lo ding uh hi. Ahi hangin tu-in hih nalamdangte mu zo uh a, tua hi napi amaute in kei le ka Pa hong mudah khawm uh hi.
43015025	Ahi hangin hih in amaute thukham sunga kigelhsa: ‘Amaute in ahang om lopi-in kei hong mudah uh hi,’c cih a tangtunna ahi hi.
43015026	"Pa kiang pana no kianga kong sawl ding, Pa kiang pana hong paikhia thutak Kha – Thukuppihpa hong pai ciangin kei tungtang thu teci a pang ding hi.
43015027	Note zong a cil a kipan kei tawh om khawm na hi uh ciangin teci na pang pelmawh ding uh hi.
43016001	"Note in lam na khialh loh nadingun hihte khempeuh kong gen zo hi.
43016002	Amaute in synagogue panin hong hawlkhia ding uh hi. A taktakin, note hong that peuhpeuh Pasian nasem-a a kingaihsut hun hong tung ding hi.
43016003	Kei ka hi a, ka Pa ahi zongin hong thei lo uh ahi manin amaute in tua bangin a hih ding uh hi.
43016004	Ahun hong tun ciangin kong vauhilhsa ahilam na phawk nadingun hih thu kong gen hi. A cil-in note tawh omkhawm ka hi manin hih thu note kong hilh kei hi.
43016005	"Tu-in kei hong sawlpa kiangah ka pai ta ding hi. Ahi hangin note khat beek in, ‘Koi-ah pai ding na hiam?’ ci-in nong dong kei uh hi.
43016006	Hih thute ka gen manin na dah lua uh hi.
43016007	Ahi hangin thutak kong geninah: Ka paikhiat note hoih nading ahi hi. Kei paikhia lo hileng Thukuppihpa no kiangah hong pai lo ding hi. Ahi zongin kei va paikhia leng, no kiangah amah kong sawl ding hi.
43016008	Amah hong pai ciangin mawhna, thumaanna le thukhenna thu ah, leitung a mawhnaa a laktel ding hi:
43016009	mawhna thu ah, mite in kei hong up loh hang uh ahi hi;
43016010	thumaanna thu ah, note in kei nong muh nawn loh nading uh mun Pa kiangah ka pai ding hang;
43016011	tua ciangin thukhenna thu ah, hih leitung kumpitapa tu-in a kimawhpaih laitak hang ahi hi.
43016012	"Tu-a na san zawh ding sangua tamzaw note kiangah gen ding ka nei hi.
43016013	Ahi hangin amah thutak Kha hong pai ciangin thutak khempeuh ah hong pi ding hi. Ama thu hong gen ding ahi kei hi. A zak thute bek gen dinga, hong piang lai ding thu note hong hilh ding hi.
43016014	Amah in kei kiang pan la-in note tungah hong theihsakna tawh kei hong minthangsak ding hi.
43016015	Pa aa khempeuh kei aa ahi hi. Kha in kei aa pan la-in note tungah hong theisak ding ka cih tua hang ahi hi.
43016016	"Hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mukha nawn kei ding uh hi; tua khit a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43016017	A nungzuite pawlkhat in, “‘Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi; tua khit a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi,’ a cih bang a cih nopna hi ding hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
43016018	Amaute in, “‘Hun tawm vei,’ a cih bang a cihna hi ding hiam, a thugen lah i tel zo peuhmah kei a?” ci-in a kidong lailai uh hi.
43016019	Jesu in amaute in hih thu dong nuam uh cih a theih ciangin, “‘Hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mukha nawn kei ding uh hi, tua khit ciangin a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi,’ ka cih ciangin ka cihnopna bang hiam cih khat le khat kidong na hi uh hiam?
43016020	Thutak kong geninah, leitung a lungdam laitakin note kapin na dah ding uh hi. Na lungkham ding uh a, ahi hangin na lungkhamna uh lungnopna a suak ding hi.
43016021	"Numei tasuak in tasuah hun tung ahi manin a na a thuak hi. Ahi hangin ta a suah khit ciangin leitungah ta khat suak ahi manin lungdamin a thuaknate a mangngilh hi.
43016022	Tua mah bangin note zong tu lai-takin na dah uh hi. Ahi zongin note kong mu kik dinga, na lungdam ding uh hi. Note lungdamna kuamah in hong sutkhia kei ding hi.
43016023	Tua ni ciangin kei, bangmah nong dong nawn kei ding uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, kei min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
43016024	Tu hun dong kei min suangin bangmah na ngen nai kei uh hi. Ngen le uh cin na ngah ding uh a, tua ciangin na lungdamna uh a kim ding hi.
43016025	"Tehpih zanga thu kong gen khit hangin hih bang pau namte zanga kong gen loh hun hong tung ta hi. Ahi hangin ka Pa thu siangtaka kong gen hun hong tung ding hi.
43016026	Tua ni ciangin note in kei min suangin na ngen ding uh hi. Note tangin Pa kiangah kong ngetsak ding a ci ka hi kei hi.
43016027	Hi lo hi, Pa mahmah in note hong it hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei nong it uh a, Pa kiang pana hong pai ka hilam na um uh hi.
43016028	Pa kiang panin kong pai-a, leitung ah kong lut khin zo hi; tu-in leitung nusia in Pa kiangah ka ciah kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
43016029	Tua ciangin Jesu nungzuite in, “Tu-in tehpih zang loin kiteltakin na gen hi.
43016030	Tu-in ahileh na khempeuh na thei a, kuama hong dot nangawn a kul kei hi, cih ka thei ta uh hi. Nang, Pasian kiang pana hong pai na hilam hih in ko hong umsak ta hi,” a ci uh hi.
43016031	Jesu in, “Hong um ta buang uh teh maw!b
43016032	Ahi hangin note na inn ciatuah na kikhenthang hun uh hong tung ding tham loin hong tung zo hi. Note in kei guak nong nusia ding uh hi. Ahi zongin ka Pa tawh om khawm ka hi manin kei guak ka hi kei hi.
43016033	Note in kei sungah lungnopna na ngah nadingun hih thute kong gen khin ta hi. Hih leitung ah note na lungmang ding uh hi. Ahi hangin kilungkhauhsak un! Leitung ka zo zo hi,” a ci hi.
43017001	Jesu in hih teng a genkhit ciangin vantung lam entoin thu ngen a: “Pa aw, a hun tung zo hi. Na Tapa in nang hong minthansak theih nadingin, na Tapa minthangsak in.
43017002	Ahang in, amah na piaksa mi khempeuh tungah nuntak tawntungna a piak theih nadingin mi khempeuh tunga thuneihna amah na pia zo hi.
43017003	Tu-in hih in nuntak tawntungna ahi: nang bek a maan Pasian na hina le na sawlpa Jesu Khrist a theihna uh ahi hi.
43017004	Ka hih dinga nong piakte zawhsiangna tawh leitungah minthanna nang kong puak zo hi.
43017005	Tu-in ahileh Pa aw, leitung a om ma-a nang tawh ka neih minthanna-in kei hong minthangsak in.
43017006	"Leitung pana nong piakkhiatte tungah nanga na laakkhia zo hi. Amaute nang aa ahi uh hi; amaute kei nong pia zo-a na thu a mang uh hi.
43017007	Tu-in amaute in kei nong piak khempeuh nang kiang pana hong pai ahilam thei ta uh hi.
43017008	Ahang in, kei nong piak thute, amaute ka pia-a, tuate a sang uh hi. Amaute in nang kiang pana pai ka hilam theitel uh a, nang kei nong sawl zong a um uh hi.
43017009	Amaute ading thu kong ngetsak hi. Leitung ading kong ngen kei hi. Ahi hangin nong piaksate ading kong ngen hi. Ahang in, amaute nang aa ahi uh hi.
43017010	Kei neih khempeuh nang aa hi-a, nang neih khempeuh kei aa ahi hi. Tua hi-a, amau tungtawnin minthanna ka ngah hi.
43017011	Leitung ah sawt ka om nawn kei ding hi. Ahi hangin amaute leitung ah om lai ding uh a, nang kiangah kei kong pai ding hi. A Siangtho Pa aw, nang le kei khat i hi bangin, amaute khat ahi theih nading un kei nong piaksa min – nangma min vangliatna tawh amaute hu in.
43017012	Amaute tawh ka omkhawm laitakin, nong piaksa min tawh amaute bittakin ka hu zo hi. Laisiangtho a tangtun nadinga a mang thang pa pen simloh khat beek ka mansuah kei hi.
43017013	"Tu-in nang kiangah kong pai ta ding hi. Ahi hangin amaute in amau sungah ka lungnopna a dim a neih theih nadingun leitung a ka om laitakin hih thute ka gen hi.
43017014	Amaute tungah na thu ka pia khin a, kei leitung aa ka hi lo bangin amaute zong leitung aa hi nawn lo uh ahi manin leitung in amaute a mudah hi.
43017015	Amaute leitung pan na lakkhiat ding kong ngen kei hi. Ahi hangin gilopa panin na hut ding kong ngen hi.
43017016	Kei, leitung aa ka hi lo bangin, amaute zong leitung aa hi lo uh hi.
43017017	Amaute thutak tawh siangthosakb in; na thu thutak ahi hi.
43017018	Leitungah kei nong sawl bangin, amaute leitungah ka sawl zo hi.
43017019	Amaute zong a siantho takpi nadingun keimah le keimah ka kisiangthosak hi.
43017020	"Amaute ading kia kong ngen kei hi. Amaute thupuakte tungtawn a kei hong um ding mite adingin zong kong ngen hi.
43017021	Pa aw, nang kei sungah na om a, kei nang sungah ka om bang tektekin amaute khat a suah theih nadingun kong ngen hi. Nang, kei nong sawl ahilam leitung in a up nadingin amaute zong ei sungah om uh hen.
43017022	Eite khat i hi mah bangin amaute zong khat ahi theih nadingun nong piaksa minthanna amaute ka pia zo hi.
43017023	Amaute sungah kei ka oma kei sungah nang na om hi. Nang, kei nong sawl le kei nong it bangin amaute na it cih leitung in a theih nadingin amaute kiciantakin pumkhat suak uh hen.
43017024	"Pa aw, nong piaksa mite ka omna-ah kei tawh a om khawm ding le nong it mana leitung piansak ma-a minthanna nong piak keima minthanna a muh ding uh ka deih hi.
43017025	"A thumaan Pa aw, leitung in nang hong thei kei zongin, ken nang kong thei-a, nang, kei nong sawl amaute in a thei uh hi.
43017026	Amaute tungah nang kong pulak zo-a, nangmah in kei nong itna amaute aa ahi theih nading le kei mahmah amaute sungah ka om theih nadingin kong pulak lai hi,” a ci hi.
43018001	Jesu in thu a nget khit ciangin a nungzuite tawh tua mun nusia in Kidron Kuam a kantan uh hi. Tua kuam galkhatah Olive lo khat a om hi; tua lo sungah amah le a nungzuite a lut uh hi.
43018002	Jesu le a nungzuite tua lai-ah kituah pahpah uh ahi manin amah lehhekpa Judas in tua mun a thei hi.
43018003	Tua ahi ciangin Judas in, galkap pawlkhat le siampi makaite le Pharisee-te pana ulian pawlkhat makaih in lo sungah a va pai uh hi. Amaute in meisel, meivak le hiam a keng uh hi.
43018004	Jesu in ama tunga thu piang ding khempeuh thei khin a, paikhia-in amaute kiangah, “Kua deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43018005	Amaute in, “Nazareth mi Jesu,” ci-in a dawng uh hi. Jesu in, “Kei, amah ka hi hi,” a ci hi. (Tua laitakin a lehhekpa Judas zong amaute lakah a ding hi.)
43018006	Jesu in, “Kei, amah ka hi hi,” a cih ciangin amaute nungkin in lei-ah a puk uh hi.
43018007	Jesu in, “Kua deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in amaute a dong kik hi. Amaute in, “Nazareth mi Jesu,” a ci uh hi.
43018008	Jesu in, “Kei, amah ka hi hi, ci-in kong gen zo hi. Kei hong zong na hi uh leh hih mite paisak un,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43018009	"Nong piaksa mi khat beek ka mansuah kei hi,”a a cih thu a tangtun nadingin hih thu a piang ahi hi.
43018010	Tua ciangin namsau khat a nei Simon Peter in a namsau dokin tulpipa nasempa a sat leh a taklam bil a satkhia hi. (Tua nasempa min Malchus ahi hi.)
43018011	Jesu in Peter kiangah, “Na namsau paimang in. Pa hong piaksa hai dawn lo ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in thu a pia hi.
43018012	Tua ciangin galkap pawlkhatte le a makaipa uh tawh Jew-te uliante in Jesu a man uh hi. Amaute in amah hen uh a,
43018013	tua kuma tulpi a sem Caiaphas sungpa Anna kiangah a puak masa uh hi.
43018014	Caiaphas pen, mipite tangin mi khat si leh hoih ding hi, ci-a Jew-te tungah thuhilh pa ahi hi.
43018015	Simon Peter le nungzui dang khat in Jesu a nungzuih uh hi. Hih nungzuipa pen tulpipa meltheih ahi manin tulpipa huang sung dong Jesu tawh a tonkhawm hi.
43018016	Ahi zongin Peter in a pualam kongbiang ah a ngak hi. Tulpipa meltheih nungzuipa pai kika, nasem-a om nungak kiangah a gen ciangin huang sungah Peter a lutsak hi.
43018017	Kongkhak a nungaknu in Peter kiangah, “Nang hih mipa nungzui lakah khat hi lo na hia?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Hi keng,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43018018	Khuadam a, nasemte le uliante mei awi-in mei kimkotah a ding uh hi. Peter zong amaute lakah mei awi-in a ding hi.
43018019	Tua hun laitak, tulpipa in Jesu, a nungzuite le a hilh thute a dot laitak ahi hi.
43018020	Jesu in, “Leitung kiangah a lang tang in ka gen zo hi. Jew-te kikhopna ahi zongin synagogue-te le biakinnpi ah thu ka hilh tawntung hi. Ka sim gen bangmah a om kei hi.
43018021	Bang dinga kei hong dong na hi hiam? Ka thugen a zate dong in. Ka gensate thei mahmah uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43018022	Jesu in hih bang a cih ciangin a kianga om uliante laka khat in, “Tulpipa dawn nading hih bang maw?” ci-in a maitang a beng hi.
43018023	Jesu in, “Thu maan lo gen ka hileh ka khialhna hong gen in. Ahi hangin thutak gen ka hileh bang hanga hong beng na hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.
43018024	Tua ciangin Annas in amah hensa mah in tulpi Caiaphas tungah a puak hi.b
43018025	Simon Peter mei awi-a a din laitakin, “Ama nungzui dang khat hi ngel ve teh aw?” ci-in amah kidong hi. Amah in, “Hi keng,” ci-in a nial hi.
43018026	Tulpipa nasemte laka Peter in a bil a satkhiatsak pa tanaute khat in, “Olive lo sungah amah le nang hong mu khawm hi lo ka hia?” ci-in a to hi.
43018027	Peter in nial kik leuleu a, tua hun laitakin ak a khuang hi.
43018028	Tua ciangin Jew-te in Caiaphas inn panin Rome-te ukpipa innpi ah Jesu a paipih uh hi. Tua hun zingsang tung ahi hi. Jew-te in Paisan Pawi ne thei nuam uh a, biakna ngeina palsat a, a nit loh nadingun kumpipa inn sungah a lut kei uh hi.
43018029	Tua ahi ciangin amaute kiangah Pilate paikhia a, “Hih mipa na mawh matna uh bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43018030	Amaute in, “Amah in tatkhialh na lian nei kei leh nang khut sungah kong tun kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
43018031	Pilate in, “Note mah in amah pai-pih unla, nomau thukham bangin thu khen un,” a ci hi. Jew-te in, “Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh tungah thu khena thah theih nading thu ka nei kei uh hi,” ci-in a nial uh hi.
43018032	Bangci banga sihna thuak ding cih, Jesu in ama sih nading thu a genkholhna, a tangtun nadingin hih thu a piang ahi hi.
43018033	Tua ciangin innpi sungah Pilate lut kik a, Jesu samin thu donga, “Nang, Jew-te kumpipa na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43018034	Jesu in, “Tua pen nang ngaihsut mah ahi hiam, ahikeh kei thu midang khatpeuh hong gen ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43018035	Pilate in, “Kei Jew mi ka hi hiam? Nang, kei khut sung hong tun na mipihte le na siampi makaite ahi hi. Nang bang hih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43018036	Jesu in, “Kei kumpi gam hih leitung hi lo hi. Hi hileh, Jew-te hong matin ka nasemte in kei hong hutna un a do ding uh hi. Ahi hangin kei kumpi-gam mundang pan ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43018037	Pilate in, “Nang, kumpi khat na hi maw leh!” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Kei kumpi nong cih na maan hi. A taktakin, hih thu hangin ka suaka, hih thu hang mahin leitung ah kong pai-a thutak ah teci ka pang hi. Thutak lama pang peuhmah in ka thu a ngai uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43018038	Pilate in, “Thutak bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Tua a cih kawmin Jew-te kiangah paikhia kik a, “Amah mawhsak nading thukho bangmah ka mu kei hi.
43018039	Ahi hangin Paisan-pawi hun ciangin note kiangah thongkia khat ka khah ding na ngeina uh ahi hi. ‘Jew-te kumpipa’ kong khah ding na deih uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
43018040	Amaute in, “Hi lo, amah hi lo! Barabbas hong pia ou,” ci-in a kiko kik uh hi. Barabbas ahileh kumpi langdona-a kihel khat ahi hi.
43019001	Tua ciangin Pilate in Jesu a satsak hi.
43019002	Galkapte in ling phekkhawmin kumpi lukhu phan uh a, a lu-ah a khusak uh hi. Amaute in kumpi puan dupsan silhsak uh a,
43019003	ama kiangah pai thithe in, “Jew-te kumpipa, cidam ta in!” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a mai a beng uh hi.
43019004	Pilate khatvei paikhia kik a, Jew-te kiangah, “En un, amah mawhsak nading thukho bangmah ka mu kei hi, cih kong theihsakna-in amah note kiangah kong khahkhia hi,” a ci hi.
43019005	Jesu, kumpi puan dupsan silhin, ling lukhu khusa-in a paikhiat ciangin Pilate in amaute kiangah, “Mipa hiah om hi!” a ci hi.
43019006	Siampi makaite le uliante in amah a muh phetun, “Kilhlum in! Kilhlum in!” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Ahi hangin Pilate in, “Amah la unla, kilhlum un. Ken ahileh amah mawhsak nading thukho ka mu zo kei hi,” a ci hi.
43019007	Jew-te in, “Kote in thukham ka nei uh hi; tua thukham tawh kizui-in amah a sih pelmawh kul hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, amah ‘Pasian Tapa ka hi hi,’ kici hi,” a ci teitei uh hi.
43019008	Pilate in hih thu a zak ciangin lau semsem zaw a,
43019009	innpi sungah a lut kik hi. Amah in, “Koi pana hong pai na hi hiam?” ci-in Jesu a dot ciangin Jesu in a dawng kei hi.
43019010	Pilate in, “Kei hong dawng nuam lo na hi hiam? Nang, kilhlup theihna le khahkhiat theihna thuneihna a nei ka hilam phawk lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
43019011	Jesu in, “Tunglam pana hong kipia ahikeh kei tungah bangmah vangliatna na nei kei hi. Tua ahi ciangin nang tunga kei hong puakpa in mawhna lianzaw a bawl hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43019012	Tua-a kipan Pilate in Jesu a khah nading a hanciam hangin Jew-te in, “Hih mipa na khahkhiat leh Caesar lawm na hi kei hi. Kumpipa ka hi hi, a kici peuhmah Caesar langpang ahi hi,” ci-in a kiko niloh uh hi.
43019013	Pilate in hih thu a zak ciangin Jesu a pualam ah paikhiatpih a, Suangphah (Aram pau in Gabbatha) kici mun-a thukhenna tokhom tungah a tu hi.
43019014	Tua hun, Paisan-pawi Nipikal Kiginkholh ni, nai gukna pawl ahi hi. Pilate in Jew-te kiangah, "Hih lai-ah na kumpipa uh om hi," a chi hi.
43019015	Ahi hangin amaute in, “Amah lakhiamang in! Amah lakhia mang in! Amah kilhlum in!” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Pilate in, “Na kumpipa uh kilhlum ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Siampi makaite in, “Caesar longal kumpi dang kuamah ka nei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
43019016	A tawpna-ah Pilate in amah kilhlup dingin amaute tungah piakhia ta hi. Tua ciangin galkapte in Jesu cingin a paikhiatpih uh hi.
43019017	Ama singlamteh ding amah in pua-a, Luguh Mun (Aram pau-a Golgotha kici) lamah a paikhia hi.
43019018	Amaute in amah singlamteh tungah a kilh uh hi. Amah tawh midang nih – alang tuakah khat tuak kilhin a laizangah Jesu a kilh uh hi.
43019019	Pilate in theihsakna khat bawlsak a, singlamteh ah a suang hi. Tua ah, JEW-TE KUMPIPA, NAZARETH MI JESU, kici hi.
43019020	Jew-te tampi in hih lai kisuang a sim uh hi. Ahang in, Jesu singlamteh tunga a kikilhlupna mun khuapi kiang hi-a, tua theihsakna lai, Aram, Latin le Greek pau-in kigelh hi.
43019021	Jew-te siampi makaite in Pilate kiangah, “‘Jew-te’ Kumpipa’ ci-in gelh kei in, hih mipa’ Jew-te kumpipa ka hi hi’ kici hi, ci-in gelh in,” a va ci uh hi.
43019022	Pilate in, “Ka gelh khitsa, ka gelhkhitsa ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43019023	Galkapte in singlamteh tungah Jesu a kilh uh ciangin a puansilhte la in phel li suah uh a phel khat ciatin tang uh a, a puan sungsilh a siit lai uh hi. A puan sungsilh pen a khuina om lo, alu pan ataw dong zang khata kiphan ahi hi.
43019024	Amaute in, “Balkek kei ni, a ngah ding pen aisan ni,” a kici uh hi. Hih banga a hihna uh, Laisiangtho sunga kigen, “Amaute in ka puante hawm uh a, ka puan-ak ading ai a san uh hi,”a cih thu a tangtun nading ahi hi. Tua hi-a, hih pen galkapte hih ahi hi.
43019025	Jesu singlamteh gei-ah a nu, a nu sanggamnu, Clopas zi Mary le Magdalane a Mary-te a ding uh hi.
43019026	Jesu in tua lai-a om a nu le a kianga ding, a it a nungzuipa khat a muh ciangin a nu kiangah, “Kong it numei aw, na tapa hih lai-ah om hi,” ci-in,
43019027	nungzuipa kiangah, “Na nu hih lai-ah om hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun a kipan hih nungzuipa in tuanu a inn ah a kem hi.
43019028	Tua khit, Jesu in na khempeuh cingkim khin ta, cih a theih ciangin Laisiangtho a tangtun nadingin, “Ka dangtaak hi,” a ci hi.
43019029	Tua lai-ah lenggahzu thuk bel khat a om hi. Amaute in tua sungah tuihup diah uh a, puknah hiang dawnah suangin Jesu mukah a tah uh hi.
43019030	Jesu in tua dawn ding a ngah khit ciangin, “Kizo zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua tawh a lukunsukin, a kha a khahkhia hi.
43019031	Tua ni pen Kiginkholh ni hi-a, a zingciang lah Sabbath ni thupi tuam ni ding ahi hi. Jew-te in Sabbath ni-a singlamtehte tungah a luangte uh a om ding a deih loh man un, Pilate kiangah a khete uh sutan-a, a luangte uh a lakkhiat ding a ngen uh hi.
43019032	Tua ahi ciangin galkapte va pai in, Jesu tawh kikhai khawm, a masa pa khete sutan uh a, tua ciangin adang khat aa a sutan uh hi.
43019033	Ahi hangin Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin amah a sisa in mu uh a, a khete a sutan kei uh hi.
43019034	Tua tangin galkapte khat in Jesu teneem teipi khatin sun-a, sisan le tui kihel a luangkhia pah hi.
43019035	A mu pa in a muh thu teci panga, ama teci panna thutak ahi hi. Amah in thutak gen ahilam thei a, nang zong na up theih nadingin teci a pang hi.
43019036	Laisiangtho in: “Ama guh khat beek a kisutan kei ding hi,”b a cih le
43019037	Laisiangtho mundang khatah: “Amaute in a sutpa uh a en ding uh hi,”c a cih thu a tangtun nadingin hih banga piang ahi hi.
43019038	Tua nung ciangin Arimathea a teng Joseph in Pilate kiangah, Jesu luang a ngen hi. Joseph, Jesu nungzui khat ahi hangin Jew-te a kihtak manin a langtang in a zui kei hi. Amah pai-in Pilate phalna tawh a luang a la hi.
43019039	Amah tunung lama zana Jesu kianga hawhpa Nicodemus in a zui hi. Nicodemus in paknamtui kha le aloes kihel poundd sawm sagih le nga ding khawng a keng hi.
43019040	Amaute in Jesu luang lakhia uh a, saihadial puanin gim namtui tawh a tuam khawm uh hi. Hih pen Jew-te kivuina ngeina zuihna ahi hi.
43019041	Jesu kikilhlupna munah huan khat om a, tua huan sungah kuamah a kisial ngei nai lohna han thak khat a om hi.
43019042	Jew-te Kiginkholh ni ahi hang le a kiangah han om pah ahi manin amaute in tua lai-ah Jesu a sial uh hi.
43020001	Nipi kal a ni masa ni, zingsang tung khuamial laipi-in Mary Magdalene, hanah pai-a, han kongvang panin suang kilikkhiasa-a om a mu hi.
43020002	Tua ciangin Simon Peter le Jesu in a it nungzuipa kiangah amah va tai-a, “Amaute in han sung panin Topa a lakhia zo uh hi, amah koi-ah koih uh hiam, ka thei kei uh hi!” a ci hi.
43020003	Tua ciangin Peter le nungzui dang khat pen in han lam a manawh uh hi.
43020004	A nih un taikhawm uh a, ahi hangin tua nungzui dang khat pa in Peter makhelhin han a tung masa hi.
43020005	Amah kunsukin a sung ena, tua lai-a om a kitunna saihadial puante enin, a sungah a lut kei hi.
43020006	Tua ciangin a nunga om Simon Peter tunga, han sungah a lut hi. Tua lai ah a luang tunna saihadial puan mu a,
43020007	Jesu lutang kimkot-a han puan om zong a mu hi. Tua puante kizial tuamin saihadial puan tawh a tuamtuakin a om hi.
43020008	A tawpna ah han a tung masa nungzuipa zong a sungah a lut hi. Amah in mu-a a um hi.
43020009	(Amaute in tua hun dong, Laisiangtho in, Jesu misi pan kithosak ding hi, cih thu a theitel nai kei uh hi.)
43020010	Tua ciangin nungzuite a inn uah ciah kik uh a,
43020011	ahi hangin Mary han pua-ah dingin a kap hi. A kah kawmkawmin kunsukin han sung a et leh,
43020012	puanpak silh vansawltak nih, Jesu luang kisialna mun, a lukhungah khat, a khekhuantaw-ah khat a tu a mu hi.
43020013	Amaute in, “Numei aw, bang dinga kap na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Tuanu in, “Ka Topa lakhiamang uh a, koi-ah koih uh hiam, ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
43020014	Tua laitakin a nunghei leh a nunga ding Jesu a mu hi; ahi zongin Jesu ahilam a thei kei hi.
43020015	Amah in, “Numei aw, bang dinga kap na hi hiam? Kua zong na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tuanu in huan neipa sa a, “Sia aw, amah na puakkhiat mang ahileh koi-ah koih na hi hiam, hong gen in, ken ka la kik nuam hi,” a ci hi.
43020016	Jesu in, “Mary” ci-in a sam hi. Ama lam nga-in amah kihei a Aram pau in, “Rabboni!” (Sia cihna) ci-in a awngkhia hi.
43020017	Jesu in, “Pa kiangah ciah nai lo ka hi manin hong lenlen kei in. Tua sangin ka sanggamte kiangah pai inla, ‘Ka Pa, na Pa uh, ka Pasian na Pasian uh kiangah a ciah kik dek ta ka hilam amaute va hilh in,’” a ci hi.
43020018	Tua thu tawh nungzuite kiangah Mary Magdalene pai-in, “Topa ka mu khin hi!”a ci hi. Jesu in ama tunga a gen khempeuh amaute a ko hi.
43020019	Tua nipikal, ni masa ni nitak in, Jew-te kihta-in kong kikalhkhum uh a, a kikhop laitakun, Jesu pai-in amaute lakah va dinga, “Lungmuanna, note tawh om ta hen!” a ci hi.
43020020	Hih a cih khit ciangin a khutte le a teneem amaute a lak hi. Nung-zuite in Topa a muh uh ciangin a nuam lua mahmah uh hi.
43020021	Jesu in, “Note tawh Lemna, om ta hen! Pa in kei hong sawl bangin note kong sawl hi,” a ci leuleu hi.
43020022	Tua tawh amaute tungah a huu khah a, “Khasiangtho na sang un.
43020023	Mi khatpeuh a mawhnate na maisak uh leh amau mawhnate a kimaisak hi a, amau mawhnate na maisak kei uh leh amau mawhnate a kimaisak lo ahi hi,” a ci hi.
43020024	Nungzuite kiangah Jesu a pai lai-in Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat Thomas (Didymus kici) a om kei hi.
43020025	Nungzui dangte in ama kiangah: “Topa ka mu khin uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi. Ahi hangin amah in, “A khut sunga siktukkilh ma mu-a, ka khutme-in siktukkilh omna munte lawng-a, a pang ka lawn tektek mateng ka um kei ding hi,” a ci bikbek hi.
43020026	Nipikal khat khit ciangin a nungzuite tua inn ah kikhawm kik uh a, Thomas zong amaute tawh a omkhawm hi. Kongkhakte a kikalh hi napi, Jesu pai-in amaute lakah dinga, “Lemna, note tawh om ta hen!” a ci hi.
43020027	Tua ciangin “Thomas kiangah, “Na khutme in hih lai lawng in; ka khutte en in. Na khut zan inla ka pang lawng in. Lunghei nawn kei inla um in,” a ci hi.
43020028	Thomas in, “Ka Topa le ka Pasian!” a ci hi.
43020029	Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Na muh khit manin nong um hi; mu lo napi-a umte thupha ngah ahi hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
43020030	Jesu in a nungzuite muhin hih laibu sunga kigelh lo lim lamdang tampi a bawl hi.
43020031	Ahi hangin Jesu, Khrist hi-a, Pasian Tapa hi, cih na up theiha nading uh le tua upna hangin ama minin nuntakna na neih theih nadingun hihte a kigelh ahi hi.
43021001	Tua nungin Tiberiasa tuipi gei-a a nungzuite kiangah Jesu a kilang kik hi. A kilahzia hih bang ahi hi:
43021002	Tua lai-ah Simon Peter, Thomas (Didymus kici) Galilee gam Cana pan Nathanael, Zebedee tapate le adang nungzuite nih a om uh hi.
43021003	Simon Peter in amaute kiangah, “Kei nga beng dingin ka kuan ding hi,” a cihleh amaute in, “Ko zong kong zui ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute paikhia-in gunkuang sungah a tuang uh hi. Ahi hangin tua zanin bangmah a man kei uh hi.
43021004	Zingsang tungin gun gei-ah Jesu dinga, ahi hangin nungzuite in Jesu ahilam a thei kei uh hi.
43021005	Amah in amaute galsap a, “Lawmte, nga khat beek man lo maw?” a ci hi. Amaute in,“Man het lo,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
43021006	Amah in, “Na len-un na gunkuang taklam pang uh khuh dih un; tua hileh pawlkhat na man ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in a khuh uh ciangin nga tam awk lua ahi manin a len uh gunkuang sung a tun zo kei uh hi.
43021007	Tua ciangin Jesu it nungzui pa in Peter kiangah, “Topa hi!” a ci hi. “Topa hi” a cih Simon Peter in a zak phetin a puan tungnung tengin (ahang in, amah puansilh loin a om hi) tui sungah a diangkhia pah hi.
43021008	Nungzui dangte tuigei pan a gamla lo tong zanihb bangah om uh a, amaute in len dima ngasa kai kawmin gunkuangin a zui uh hi.
43021009	Tui gei a tun uh ciangin amaute in tua lai-ah meihol-am tunga ngasa le anlum kihang a mu uh hi.
43021010	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Tu-a na ngasa matte uh tawm hong la dih un,” a ci hi.
43021011	Simon Peter gunkuang tungah kah a, tui gei-ah len a kai hi. Ngasa a lian bekbek 153 tak a awk hi. Tua zahtak hi napi len a kek kei hi.
43021012	Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Hong pai unla zing-an ne un,” a ci hi. Nungzuite khat beek in, “Nang kua na hiam?” ci-in a dong ngam kei uh hi. Amaute in Topa ahilam a thei uh hi.
43021013	Jesu pai-in anlum la-a, amaute pia-in tua mah bangin ngasa zong a pia hi.
43021014	Hih in, Jesu misi pan a thawh kik zawh a nungzuite kiangah a kilah a thumveina ahi hi.
43021015	An a nek khit uh ciangin Jesu in Simon Peter kiangah, “John tapa Simon aw, hihte sangin kei nong it zaw taktak hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hihi Topa aw, nang kong it na thei hi,” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Ka tuunote na vak in,” a ci hi.
43021016	Jesu in, “John tapa Simon aw, kei nong it taktak hiam?” a ci kik hi. Amah in, “Hihi Topa aw, nang kong it na thei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Jesu in, “Ka tuute na cing in,” a ci hi.
43021017	Ama kiangah, “John Tapa Simon aw, kei nong it hiam?” ci-in a thumveina a dong hi. Jesu in, “Kei nong it hiam?” ci-a a thumveina a dot manin Peter lungsim a nasak hi. Amah in “Topa aw, na khempeuh na thei hi; nang kong it na thei hi,” a ci hi. Jesu in, “Ka tuute na vak in.
43021018	Thutak kong geninah, na khangno zawk lai-in nang le nang kizemin na utna peuhah na pai hi. Ahi hangin na khangham ciangin na khutte zanin midang khatpeuh in nang hong zem dinga, na pai nop lohna pi-ah hong paipih ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
43021019	Hih thu pen bangci bang sihna tawh Peter in Pasian a minthansak ding cih Jesu in a genna ahi hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Kei hong zui in,” a ci hi.
43021020	Peter a nunghei leh Jesu it nungzui pa-in amaute a zuih laitak a mu hi. (Hih pa pen, nitak-an a nek khawm lai-ua Jesu tungah kingama “Topa, kua-in nang hong lehhek ding hiam?” ci-a a dong pa ahi hi.)
43021021	Peter in amah a muh ciangin, “Topa amah bangci ding?” ci-in a dong hi.
43021022	Jesu in, “Amah kong pai kik dong a nungta lai dingin deih leng zong nang tawh bang kisai hiam? Nang kei nong zuih pelmawh kul hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
43021023	Hih thu hangin ‘Hih nungzui pa a si kei ding hi,’ ci-in sanggamte lakah kam lengsawn a kithang hi. Ahi hangin Jesu in amah si lo ding a cihna hi lo-a, “Kong pai kik dong amah a nungta lai dingin deih leng zong nang tawh bang kisai hiam,” a ci hi bek hi.
43021024	Hih nate ah teci panga a gelh pa hih nungzui pa ahi hi. Ama teci panna amaan hi, cih i thei hi.
43021025	Jesu in nadang tampi zong a sem lai hi. A vekpi in kigelh khin hileh leitung buppi nangawn in a kigelh ding laibute a koih nading mun a nei kei ding hi, ci-in ka um hi.
44001001	Theophilus aw, ka laibu masa sungah Jesu in a septe le a hilhte khempeuh a kipat tunga kipan
44001002	a teelsa sawltakpite tungah Khasiangtho tungtawna a lah khit ciangin vantungah a kilaktoh ni donga thute ka gelh ahi hi.
44001003	A thuak dingte a thuak khit nungin hih mite kiangah amah mah kilak-a, amah a nungta takpi ahina, a uptak kitelna tampitak a lak hi. Amaute kiangah amah kilak in, ni sawmli sung Pasian gam thu a gen hi.
44001004	Khatvei amaute tawh an a nek khawm laitakun amah in: “Jerusalem nusia kei un. Ahi zongin kong gen na zaksa uh ka Pa in letsong hong piak dinga hong ciam, na ngak un.
44001005	Ahang in, John in tui-ina hong baptise hi. Ahi hangin ni tawmkha khit ciangin Khasiangtho-in na kibaptisa ding uh hi,” ci-in thu a pia hi.
44001006	Tua ahi ciangin amaute a kisuktuah khawm laitakun, “Topa aw, Israel tungah tuhunin kumpi-gam ding kiksak ding na hi hiam?” ci-in dong uh hi.
44001007	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Pa in ama thuneihna tawh a seh ani ahi zongin ahun ahi zongin note theih ding hi lo hi.
44001008	Ahi hangin note tungah Khasiangtho hong tun ciangin vangliatna na ngah ding uh a, Jerusalem, Judea gam, Samaria gam khempeuh le leimong dongah ka tecite na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
44001009	Tua teng a cih khit ciangin amaute muh mahmah in amah kilato a, amaute muhtawp ah meii in a liah hi.
44001010	Amah a paito amaute in a et zuizui laitakun, amaute gei-ah thakhatin puanpak silh mi nih a ding hi.
44001011	Amaute in, “Galilee mite aw, hih lai-ah vanlam enin bang hangin ding na hi uh hiam? Note kiang pan vantung ah kilato hih Jesu tektek mah vantung ah a pai na muh bangun hong pai kik ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
44001012	Tua ciangin khuapi pana Sabbath ni khat lamb a gamla Olive Vum kici mualno panin Jerusalem ah a ciah kik uh hi.
44001013	Amaute a tun uh ciangin amau omna ngei dei tungnung ah a pai uh hi. Tua lai-a omte: Peter, John, James le Andrew; Philip le Thomas, Bartholomew le Matthew; Alphaeus tapa James le Zealot pawla Simon le James tapa Judas-te ahi uh hi.
44001014	Amaute in numeite, Jesu sanggamte le a nu Mary tawh thu a ngen khawm tawntung uh hi.
44001015	Tua nite in, thu-umtec (za le sawm nih bang a pha ding mi hon khat) lak panin Peter ding to-a,
44001016	"Sanggamte aw, tanglai peka Khasiangtho in David kam tawna a na gen, Jesu a mante a makaih Judas tawh kisai Laisiangtho thu a tangtun ding kisam hi.
44001017	Tuapa eite lakah khat hi-a i naseppih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44001018	(Judas in a gitlohna mana a ngah pahtakman tawh lo khat a lei hi. Tua munah bungbu kiatin a pumpi kitam a, a gilzangte buakhia hi.
44001019	Jerusalem a om mi peuhmah in hih thu a za uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin amaute in tua mun amau kamin, Sisan-lo cihna Akeldama, ci-in a phuak uh hi.)
44001020	Peter in, “Bang hang hiam na ci uh leh Phatna-late bu sungah, “‘Ama mun kinusia ta hen; tua sungah a teng ding kuamah om kei hen,’d tua ciangin, ‘Ama makaihna mun midang in laih ta hen’”e ci-in kigelh zo hi.
44001021	Tua ahi manin Topa Jesu eite lakah sungtum pusuak in a om sung khempeuh,
44001022	John baptise a kipan eite kiang pana Jesu a kilaktoh hun dong eite tawh a om khawmsa mite lak-a khat i teel ding kisam hi. Ahang in, tuate lakah khat in eite tawh ama thawhkikna teci a pan tektek ding kisam hi,” a ci hi.
44001023	Tua ciangin mi nih: Barsabbas kici Joseph (Justus zong a kici) le Mathias-te a sehkhia uh hi.
44001024	Tua khit ciangin thu ngen uh a, “Topa aw, mi khempeuh lungtang na thei hi.
44001025	Judas ama munah pai-a, a nusiat hih sawltakpi nasep a sem ding hih mi nihte kua zaw teel na hi hiam, kote hong lak in,” a ci uh hi.
44001026	Tua ciangin ai lawn uh a, Mathias tung a tu hi. Tua ahi ciangin amah sawltakpi sawm-le-khat lakah kigawm beh hi.
44002001	Pentecost ni a tun ciangin amaute a vekpi un mun khatah a om khawm uh hi.
44002002	Van pan thakhatin huihpi nung ging bangin ging a, amaute tutna inn sung khempeuh a dim hi.
44002003	Amaute in meileiite hileh a kilawm amah le amah kikhenin amaute tung tekah a khawl ciat a mu uh hi.
44002004	Amaute khempeuh Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh a, Kha hihsak theih bang, kam dangtea in a pau uh hi.
44002005	Tua lai-in van nuai-a minam khempeuh panin a pai Pasian kihta Jew-te, Jerusalem ah a tam lai uh hi.
44002006	Amaute in hih awging a zak uh ciangin mi hon khat lungmangin va kikhawm uh hi. Ahang in, amaute thugente amau pau ciatin a za uh hi.
44002007	Amaute in lamdang sa lua mahmah uh a, “Hih mite a vekpi-un Galilee-te pau-a pau mi hi lo uh ahi hiam?
44002008	Tua hi napi eite in amaute pau, ei pianpih pau tekin i zak theih bangci dan hiam?
44002009	Parthia-te Media-te Elam-te;Meso - potamia le, Judea le Cappadocia, Pontus le Asia,
44002010	Phrygia, le Pamphylia, Egypt le Cyrene kianga Libya gam khente a tengte; Rome pana a hawhte,
44002011	(Jew-te le Jew biakna a zuite tawh); Cret-te le Arab-te – eite khempeuh in, amaute in Pasian nalamdang bawlte a gen uh ei pau ciatin lah i za mawk a!” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
44002012	Lamdang sa mahmah in lungzing uh a, “Bang cihna hi peuhmah ding hiam?” a kici uh hi.
44002013	Ahi zongin mi pawlkhatte in amaute nuihsan in, “Lenggahzu tam dawn lua ta uh hi,”b a ci uh hi.
44002014	Tua ciangin Sawm-le-khatte tawh Peter ding to-a a aw sangsak in mihonte kiangah, “Ka mipih Jew-te le Jerusalem a om note khempeuh aw, hih thu note tungah kong telgen ding hi. Ka thugen limtakin na ngai un.
44002015	No upmawh bangin hih mite zukham hi lo uh hi. Tu-in zingsang nai kua sat pan bek hi!
44002016	Hi lo hi, hih in kamsangpa Joel in a na gen:
44002017	"Pasian in, ‘Ni nunungte ah mi khempeuh tungah ka Kha ka sungkhia ding hi. Na tanute na tapate un kamsang ding uh a, na tangvalte un mangmu in, na putekte un mang a man ding uh hi.
44002018	Tua ni ciangin, ka nasem numei le pasalte tung nangawn ah ka Kha ka sungkhia ding a, amaute in thu a genkhol ding uh hi.
44002019	Tunglam vanah a lamdangte le nuailam leitungah limte le sisan le mei le meikhu sahpite ka lak ding hi.
44002020	A lian a minthang Topa ni hong tun ma-in ni khuamial suak dinga khapi sisan a suak ding hi.
44002021	Tua ciangin Topa min a lote peuhmah kihonkhia ding hi,’c a cihsa ahi hi.
44002022	"Israel mite aw, hih thu ngai un: note in na theih mah bangun Nazareth mi Jesu pen Pasian in note lakah ama tungtawna a bawl nalamdangte, a lamdangte le limte tawh Pasian in a kipsak mi ahi hi.
44002023	Pasian in a tupsa le a theihkholhsa bangin note khutah hong kipia hi. Tua ciangin note in mitatsiated huhna tawh singlamteh tungah na kilhlum uh hi.
44002024	Ahi hangin sihna in amah lenden zo lo ahi manin, Pasian in misi pan thokiksak a, sih gentheihna pan a suaktasak hi.
44002025	David in ama thu a genna-ah: “ ‘Ka mai-ah Topa ka mu tawntung hi. Ka taklamah om ahi manin, kei ka ling kei ding hi.
44002026	Tua ahi manin ka lung nuam a; ka leii a kipak hi; ka pumpi zong lametna-in a nungta ding hi.
44002027	Ahang in, hankhuk ah kei nong nusia kei dinga, na Mi Siangthopa zong na muatsak kei ding hi.
44002028	Nuntakna lampi kei nong theisak zo hi; na omna munah lungnopna tawh kei nong dim ding hi,’e a na ci hi.
44002029	Sanggamte aw, pupi David si zo a, kivui zo-in, tuni mahmah in hih lai-ah a han om hi, cih kimuangtakin kong gen thei hi.
44002030	Ahi hangin amah kamsang khat hi-a, Pasian in kiciama, ama suante sung pan khat ama kumpi tokhoma, a tutsak ding a kamciamsa a thei hi.
44002031	Hong tung ding mukhol ahi manin hankhuk sungah kinusia lo-a, a pumpi zong muat lo ding, ci-in Khristf thawhkikna thu a na genkhol hi.
44002032	Pasian in hih Jesu thosakin nung tasaka, hih thu a taktak a hina kote khempeuh, teci ka hi uh hi.
44002033	Amah Pasian taklam ah kitawisang a, Pa kiang pana kamciamsa Khasiangtho ngahin ama hong buakkhiat tu-a na muh na zakte uh ahi hi.
44002034	Ahang in, David vantung ah kah lo napi: “‘Topa in ka Topa kiangah,
44002035	"Na galte khempeuh na khepekte ngak nading ka suahsak matengin ka taklam ah na tu in,”’g ci hi.
44002036	"Tua ahi manin Israel mi khempeuh in tel ta un: Na kilhluppa uh hih Jesu, Pasian in Topa le Khrist suaksak zo hi,” a ci hi.
44002037	Mite in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a lung uh vut a, Peter le sawltakpi dangte kiangah, ‘Sanggamte aw, bang hih ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
44002038	Peter in, “Na mawhnate uh a kimai sak theih nadingin note, na vekpi un kisik unla Jesu Khrist minin na kibaptise un. Tua ciangin Khasiangtho letsong na ngah ding uh hi.
44002039	Tua kamciam pen note le na tate uh ading le gamlapi-a omte khempeuh ading – i Topa Pasian in a sap dingte khempeuh ading ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44002040	Kammal dang tampi tawh amaute vauhilh a, “Hih a kisiasa khang mite panin note kihonkhia un,” ci-in amaute tungah a thum hi.
44002041	Ama thu gen a sangte kibaptise uh a, tua ni-in amau pawl sungah mi tul thum bang a kibehlap hi.
44002042	Sawltakpite thuhilhna le amau tawh kithuahna, anlum balkhapna le thu ngetnate ah, amau le amau a va kipumpiak uh hi.
44002043	Mi khempeuh in lamdang sa mahmah uh a, sawltakpite in alamdang tampi le apiandang limte a bawl uh hi.
44002044	Thu-umte khempeuh omkhawm uh a na khempeuh a nei khawm uh hi.
