44002045	A neihsate uh le a vante uh zuakin mi khatpeuh a kisapna bangbangin a pia uh hi.
44002046	Nisimin biakinnpi huangte sungah a kithuah khawm ngitnget uh hi. Amaute innah anlum balkhamin lungdamna le itna lungsimtak tawh nekhawm uh a,
44002047	Pasian phatin, mi khempeuh in angvanna nuam a sa uh hi. Topa in nisimin amau pawl sungah a kihonkhia mi a kibehlapsak hi.
44003001	Ni khat, nitak lam nai thum laitak thunget hunin biakinnpi ah Peter le John paito uh hi.
44003002	Tua laitakin a suah tunga mipoi khat, biakinnpi huangte sunga paite tungah khutdawh-a ngen dingin nisima a kikoihna mun Kilawm kici biakinnpi kongpi ah kipuak hi.
44003003	Tuapa in Peter le John a lut dektak a muh ciangin amaute kiangah sum a ngen hi.
44003004	Peter in amah en gega a, John in zong a en hi. Tua ciangin Peter in “Ko hong en dih in!” a ci hi.
44003005	Tua ciangin tuapa in, amaute in bang khatpeuh a piak ding uh lamena, a law pet hi.
44003006	Tua ciangin Peter in, “Kham ahi-a ngun ahi zongin ka nei kei hi. Ahi hangin ka neih pen nang kong pia hi. Nazareth mi Jesu Khrist minin lam pai in,” a ci hi.
44003007	A khut taklam ah manin kaito a, tua mipa khepekte le siakmite thahatin a khauh hi.
44003008	Amah a khe-in diang to a, lam a pai hi. Tua ciangin amaute tawh biakinnpi huangte sungah paikhawma, pai-in dianga Pasian a phat hi.
44003009	Mite khempeuh in amah lam pai a Pasian a phat a muh uh ciangin,
44003010	Kilawm kici biakinn kongpi-a tu, khutdawh-a ngen pa mah hi cih thei tel uh a, amaute in tuapa tunga thupiangte lamdangsa in a lungmang uh hi.
44003011	Khutdawh-a ngenpa in Peter le John a zuihzuih laitakin, mi khempeuh in lamdang sa uh a, amaute omna Solomon Talap a kicihna mun ah a tai uh hi.
44003012	Peter in a muh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Israel mite aw, bang hangin hih in note lamdang hong sasak ahi hiam? Kote vang tawh ahikeh ka pasianmina uh hanga hih mipa lam a paisak thei bangin bang hangin kote hong hi ci et na hi uh hiam?
44003013	Abraham, Isaac le Jacob-te’ Pasian, i pate Pasian in ama nasem Jesu min thangsak zo hi. Note in amah thah dingin na piakhia uh a, Pilate in amah khah ding thukim napi ama mai-ah amah na nolh uh hi.
44003014	Note in a Siangtho le Thumaan Pa na nolh uh a, tualthat khat no kianga hong khah dingin na ngen uh hi.
44003015	Note in nuntakna a piapa na that uh a, ahi hangin Pasian in amah misi pan a thosak hi. Hih thuah kote teci ka hi uh hi.
44003016	Note in na muh uh le na theih uh hih mipa Jesu min upna hangin kihatsak hi. Note khempeuh in na muh uh bangin ama tunga damsiangna a pia pen Jesu min le ama tungtawna hong pai upna ahi hi.
44003017	"Tu-in sanggamte aw, na makaite uh hih bangin khuaphawk loin a gamtat uh ka thei hi.
44003018	Ahi hangin Pasian in kamsangte khempeuh tungtawn a, ‘Khrista in thuak ding hi,’ ci-a a gen kholhsate a tangtunsakna hih bang ahi hi.
44003019	Tua ahi ciangin kisikin Pasian lam nga kik un. Tua hileh na mawhnate uh kisiaksiangin Topa tung panin thathak ngahna hun hong tung thei dinga;
44003020	tua ciangin note adinga kisehsa tua Khrist – Jesu nangawn note kiangah hong sawl thei ding hi.
44003021	Sawt lai peka ama kamsang siangthote tungtawna a kamciam bangin Pasian in na khempeuh a bawlphat hun hong tun masiah amah ahileh pel loin vantung ah a om lai ding hi.
44003022	Ahang in, Moses in, ‘Topa na Pasian un nomau mite lak panin note adingin kei tawh kibang kamsang khat hong khangkhiasak ding hi; amah in note tungah hong gen peuhmah na man pelmawh uh kul hi.
44003023	Ama thu a ngai lo peuhpeuh ama mite lak panin kikhenkhia siang ding hi,’b ci hi.
44003024	"Hi takpi hi, Samuel a kipan, kamsangte khempeuh thu na gen zahzah in tu lai hunte a na genkhol zo hi.
44003025	Tua hi-a kamsangte le Pasian in, na pu na pa-te uh tawh thukhunna a na bawlsate a luahte na hi uh hi. Amah in Abraham tungah, ‘Na suan na khakte tungtawnin leitunga mi om khempeuh thupha kipia ding hi,’c ci hi.
44003026	Pasian in a nasempa a khankhiatsak ciangin note, na tatsiatna panun na vekun kikhelin thupha hong piak theih nadingin note kiangah hong sawl masa hi,” a ci hi.
44004001	Peter le John in mipite tungah thu a gengen laitakun siampite, biakinnpi cing makaipa le Sadducee-te va pai uh hi.
44004002	Sawltakpite in Jesu ah misite a thawhkikna mipite tungah hilhin a tangkona un, amaute a lungzingsak mahmah hi.
44004003	Amaute in Peter le John man uh a, nitaklam ahi manin a zingciang dong thong sungah a khum uh hi.
44004004	Ahi hangin amaute thupuak a za mi tampi in um uh a, pasal tulnga bang pha ta hi.
44004005	A zing ciangin gam-ukte, upate le thukham siate Jerusalem ah a kikhawm uh hi.
44004006	Tua lai-ah tulpi Annas om a, amah tawh Caiaphas, John Alexandar le adang tulpite innkuanpihte zong a om hi.
44004007	Amaute in Peter le John a mai-uah dingsak uh a: “Bang vangliatna le bang min tawh hih bawl na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
44004008	Tua ciangin Khasiangtho tawh Peter kidima, amaute kiangah, “No gam-ukte le upate aw,
44004009	mipoi khat tunga migitna nasep hangin amah bangci dam hiam cih thusitna thuak dingin tuni-in ko hong kisam ahileh,
44004010	note le Israel gama midangte khempeuh in hih thu thei ta un. A dam siang sinsensa a note mai-a ding hih mipa pen, note in na kilhlup uh, ahi hanga Pasian in misi pana a thawhkiksak pa Nazareth mi Jesu Khrist min hanga dam ahi hi.
44004011	Amah, “‘No innlamte nolh suang, inntungkhuma suang a suak ahi hi,’b
44004012	Midang khat beek sungah hotkhiatna a om kei hi. Ahang in, eite kihotkhiat nading van kikhupsin nuai-a mihing tungah a kipia, min dang a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
44004013	Amaute in Peter le John a hanna mu uh a, lai siam lo mi mawkmawk ahilam uh thei uh ahi ciangin lamdang sa-in hih mite Jesu tawh a om khawm uh hi, cih a phawk uh hi.
44004014	Ahi hangin cina a damsakpa uh amau tawh ding khawm a muh theih manun bangmah a gen thei kei uh hi.
44004015	Tua ahi ciangin Sanhedrin panin kihemkhia dinga thu a piak khit uh ciangin, amaute thu a kikum uh hi.
44004016	Amaute in, “Hih mite bang cih ding i hi hiam? Jerusalem a teng mi peuhmah in lah, nalamdang thupi khat a bawl uh thei uh a, i nial nading lah a om kei hi.
44004017	Ahi hangin tu-a ban, hih thute milakah a kizelhbeh nawn loh nadingin kham ni. Hih min tawh mi khatpeuh tungah thu a gen nawn loh nadingun i vauhilh kul hi,” a kici uh hi.
44004018	Tua khit ciangin amaute sam kik uh a, Jesu minin thu gena, a hilh nawn het loh nadingun thu a pia uh hi.
44004019	Ahi hangin Peter le John in “No le no kingaihsun dih un, Pasian mitmuhna ah Pasian thu sangin no thu kong man ding uh, koi maanzaw ding ahi hiam?
44004020	Ahang in, ka muhsa uh le ka zaksa uh thu gen loin ka om thei kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
44004021	A nasia zaw in tawng’ uh a, tua khit ciangin amaute a paikhiasak uh hi. A piangsa thu hangin mi khempeuh in Pasian phat uh ahi manin, amaute in gawtna a piak nading uh a khensat thei kei uh hi.
44004022	Ahang in, a lamdangtaka kidamsak tua mipa kum sawmli val upa ta hi.
44004023	Peter le John a kikhah ciangin amau mite kiangah pai kik uh a, amaute tunga siampi makaite le upate thugen khempeuh a zasak uh hi.
44004024	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a aw uh sangsakin Pasian kiangah thu a ngen khawm uh hi. Amaute in, “Thuneipipen Topa aw, vantung, leitung, tuipite le a sunga omte khempeuh na bawlsa ahi hi.
44004025	Na nasempa ka pa uh David kam tawnin Khasiangtho-in na gen a: “‘Bang hang minamte heh a, mite in a mawknapi sawmsim uh hiam?
44004026	Topa langa pang ding le a Sathau Nilh-pac langpang dingin, leitung kumpite panmun la-in, gam-ukte a kikhawm uh hi,’d ci hi.
44004027	Hi takpi hi. Herod le Pontia Pilate in Gentile-te le hih khuapi sunga Israel mitee tawh kimu khawmin na sathau nilhsa pa, na nasem siangtho Jesu langpang dingin kithuhual uh hi.
44004028	Amaute in nang vangliatna le nang deihna-in a piang dinga a khentat kholsa bangin sem uh hi.
44004029	Tu-in Topa aw, amaute hong tawnna ngaihsun inla, hangtaka na thu a gen dingin na nasemte hihtheihna lianpi hong guan in.
44004030	Na nasem siangtho Jesu min tungtawnin cina damsaka, a lamdang limte lak ding le a lamdang tuamtuamte hih dingin na khut hong zankhia in,” a ci uh hi.
44004031	Thu a nget khit uh ciangin amau te kikhopna mun a ling hi. Amaute khempeuh Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh a, Pasian thu hangtakin a gen uh hi.
44004032	Thu-umte khempeuh, lungsim le ngaihsutna kikhatin a om uh hi. Amau neihsate kuamah in aituamin nei lo uh a, ahi hangin a neih khempeuh uh a neikhawm uh hi.
44004033	Sawltakpite in, vangliatna lianpi tawh Topa Jesu thawhkikna teci pang uh a amaute khempeuh tungah hehpihna tampitak a tung hi.
44004034	Amaute lakah a kitasam a om kei hi. Ahang in, leitangte ahikeh inn neite in a hunhunin zuak uh a, a khot uh sumte,
44004035	sawltakpite khe phungah koihin a kitasam peuhpeuh tungah a hawm uh hi.
44004036	Cyprus pan, Joseph kici Levi mi khat, sawltakpite in Barnabas (Hanthawnna Tapa cihnopna) a cih uh mipa in
44004037	lo khat a neih zuak a, a sum paipihin sawltakpite khephungah a koih hi.
44005001	A min Ananias kici mi khat in zong a zi Sapphira tawh a neihsa leitang a zuak khawm uh hi.
44005002	A zi theihpih sinsenin amah mah in a sum khenkhat a im hi. Ahi hangin a ip loh teng sawltakpite khe phungah va puak hi.
44005003	Tua ciangin Peter in, “Ananias aw, Satan in na lungsim hong zo-in, Khasiangtho khema, na leitang zuak mana na ngah sum pawlkhat nang adingin na kep, bangci bang hiam?
44005004	A kizuak ma-in zong nang aa hi lo ahi hiam? A kizuak khit ciangin zong tua sumte nang thu-a na zat theih hi lo ahi hiam? Tua banga hih ding ngaihsutna bang in hong neisak hiam? Mihingte khem hi loin Pasian khem na hi hi,” a ci hi.
44005005	Ananias in hih thu a zak ciangin, puksukin a si hi. Tua thupiang a zate khempeuh nak lau mahmah uh hi.
44005006	Tua ciangin tangvalnote pai-in a luang tun uh a, amah puakhia-in a vui uh hi.
44005007	Tua khit nai thum bang ciangin, thupiangte bangmah thei loin a zi a va lut hi.
44005008	Peter in, “Nang le Ananias in na leitang man-ua na ngah uh hih zah mah ahi hiam? Hong gen dih in,” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Himah, aman tua zah mah hi,” a ci hi.
44005009	Peter in, “Bangci-a Topa Kha zia-et ding kithukim na hi uh hiam? En dih in! Na pasal vuite khe kongkhak bulah om hi; nang zong hong puakhia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
44005010	Tua hun laitakin ama khephung ah puksukin a si hi. Tua ciangin tangvalnote tumin amah a sisa a om mu uh a, puakhia in a pasal geiah a vui uh hi.
44005011	Pawlpi bup le hih thu a zakha mi khempeuh a nak lau mahmah uh hi.
44005012	Sawltakpite in mite lakah lim lam dang le a lamdang tampi a bawl uh hi. Thu-umte khempeuh Solomon Talap ah a kituahkhawm zel uh hi.
44005013	Mipite in amaute tunget mahmah tei napi, a pawlpih ngam kuamah a om kei hi.
44005014	Tua hi napi lah Topa a um numei pasal tam semsema amau pawlmi a kibehlap hi.
44005015	Tua thu hangin Peter in tua lai tawna a pai ciangin amaute pawlkhat alim in a liahkhak beek nadingin mite in a cinate uh lupna le phek in lampi-ah a na sial uh hi.
44005016	Jerusalem kima khuapite panin zong mihonpite va kikhawm uh a, a cinate uh le kha giloa in a gentheihsakte va puakin amaute khempeuh a dam uh hi.
44005017	Tua ciangin Sadducees pawlte sunga kihel tulpipa le ama kithuahpihte in a haza mahmah uh hi.
44005018	Amaute in sawl takpite man uh a, tangpi thong inn ah a khum uh hi.
44005019	Ahi hangin Topa vansawltak khat in zan laitakin thong kongkhakte hongin a paikhitpih hi.
44005020	Amah in, “Pai un, biakinnpi huangte ah ding unla, hih nuntak-thakna thupuak bucing mite tungah gen un,” a ci hi.
44005021	Amaute tunga kigensa bangin khuavak phetin biakinnpi huangte ah lut uh a, mite thu a hilh uh hi. Tulpipa le a kithuahpihte a tun uh ciangin Israel upate—Sanhedrin khempeuh kikhawmsakin, thonga sawltakpite a samsak uh hi.
44005022	Ahi hangin thong inn a tun uh ciangin makaite in tua lai-ah amaute a mu kei uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute ciah kik uh a,
44005023	"Thong inn muanhuai taka kikalh le kongkhakte ah a cingte a ding ka mu uh hi. Ahi hangin tuate ka hon uh ciangin a sungah kuamah ka mu kei uh hi,” ci-in a zasak uh hi.
44005024	Hih zaksakna a zak uh ciangin biakinnpi cingte makaipa le siampi makaite in, hih thu bang hong suak zen tam, ci-in a lungmang uh hi.
44005025	Tua ciangin mi khat va pai a, “En un, thong sunga na khum uh mite in, biakinnpi huangte sungah dingin mite thu hilh uh hi,” a ci hi.
44005026	Tua phetin biakinn cing makaipa a makaihpih teng tawh va pai uh a, sawltakpite hong tonpih uh hi. Mipite in suang tawh a den ding lau uh ahi manin thagum a suang kei uh hi.
44005027	Sawltakpite a tunpih khit uh ciangin tulpipa thusit dingin Sanhedrin mai-ah a dingsak uh hi.
44005028	Amah in, “Hih minin thu na hilh loh nadingun thukhauh kong pia zo uh hi. Ahi hangin na thuhilhna un Jerusalem khua sung teng zelkhin a, hih mipa sisan ah ko nong mawhkhusak uh hi,” a ci hi.
44005029	Peter le sawltakpi dangte in, “Mihing thu sangin Pasian thu ka man zawk pelmawh uh kul ding hi.
44005030	Amah sing tungah khai-a na thah pa uh Jesu, ka pate uh Pasian in misi pan thosak zo hi.
44005031	Amah in Israel-te tungah kisikna leh mawhmaisakna a piak theih nadingin Pasian in amah tawisanga ama taklamah koih in, Kumpitapa le Honpa in a tusak hi.
44005032	Hih thu ah kote teci ka hi uh a, Pasian in ama thu a mangte a piak Khasiangtho zong teci ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
44005033	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungso uh a, amaute a that nuam uh hi.
44005034	Ahi hangin mi khempeuh in a zahtak uh Gamaliel kici thukham sia Pharisee khat Sanhedrin sungah ding to a, tua mite tawm vei sung a pua lamah omsak phot nading thu a pia hi.
44005035	Tua ciangin amaute tungah thu gen a, “Israel mite aw, hih mite na bawl nopna thu uh limtakin ngaihsun un.
44005036	A beisa hun khat lai-in Theudas hong kilang in, mi gina ngel khatin hong kigena mi zali bang in amah pawl uh hi. Amah kithat in, ama nungzuite maimang a, bangmah ahi kei hi.
44005037	Mi kisim hun laitakin ama nungah Galilee mi Judas kilang leuleu a, gam lehdo mi honkhat a makaih hi. Amah zong kithata, a nungzuite a kithehthang uh hi.
44005038	Tua ahi manin tu laitaka i thu tawh kisai-in ngaihsutna kong piak nopinah: hih mite hi ci omsak un! Khahkhong lel un! Ahang in, amau sawm le a nasepte uh mihing sawm lel ahileh lawhsam ding uh hi.
44005039	Ahi hangin Pasian pan ahileh mite na kho zo kei ding uh hi; Pasian langdo na hi lel kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
44005040	A thugen in amaute a thuzawh hi. Amaute in inn sungah sawltakpite sam in a sat uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jesu mina thu a gen nawn loh nadingun thu pia uh a, amaute a khah uh hi.
44005041	Sawltakpite, tua Min hanga zah lakna a thuak tham dinga a om uh nuam uh a, Sanhedrin panin a paikhia uh hi.
44005042	Ni khat khit ni khat biakinnpi tual le inn khat pan inn khatah, Jesu in Khristb hi cih lungdamna thu tawlnga loin hilhin a tangko uh hi.
44006001	Tua hun lai-in nungzuite tam semsem uh a, nisim an hawmna tawh kisai-in Greek-Jew-te in amau meigongte kithu don lo hi, ci-in Hebrew-Jew-te a phunsan uh hi.
44006002	Tua ciangin Sawm-le-nihte in, nungzuite khempeuh kikhawmsak uh a, “Pasian thu gen ding thu don lo liangin annek tuidawn dingah kong tuanvai uh leh ko adingin man lo ding hi.
44006003	Sanggamte aw, note lakah Kha le pilna tawh kidim pasal sagih teel un. Tuate tungah hih nasep ka suan ding uh a,
44006004	kote in thungetna le nasepna kong hahbawl ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44006005	Hih thusun in a pawl bup uh a lungkimsak hi. Amaute in upna le Khasiangtho tawh adim Stephen; tua banah Philip, Procorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas le Jew biakna-a kikhel Antioch pana Nicolas zong a teel uh hi.
44006006	Amaute in hih mite sawltakpite tungah ap uh a, amaute in a lutung-uah a khut uh nga-in thu a ngetsak uh hi.
44006007	Tua bangin Pasian thu a kizel hi. Jerusalem ah nungzuite khang semsem a, siampite tampi in tua upna a zui uh hi.
44006008	Tu-in Stephen, Pasian hehpihna le vang tawh a dim mi khat hi-a, mite lakah a piandang mahmah le a lamdang limte a bawl hi.
44006009	Ahi zongin Synagogue-a Salsuaktate (amaute a kilawhna uh) pawlmite langpanna hong piang hi. Tuate Syrene le Alexandria, Cilicia le Asia gamkhente pana a pai Jew-te ahi uh hi. Hih mite in Stephen thu a sel uh hangin,
44006010	ama pilna le a thugenna-a pang, Kha langah a pang zo kei uh hi.
44006011	Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat zolsim uh a, “Stephen in Moses le Pasian langah daisakna thu a gen ka za uh hi,” a cisak uh hi.
44006012	Tuaci-in amaute in mipite le upate le thukham siate a hansuah uh hi. Amaute in Stephen man uh a Sanhedrin mai-ah a tun uh hi.
44006013	Teci zuau phuak-a teci pang amaute in, “Hihpa in mun siangtho le thukham a langgen niloh hi.
44006014	Kote in, ‘Hih Nazareth mi Jesu in hih mun susia dinga, Moses in eite khuta hong piaksawm i pupa ngeina a kheng ding hi,’ a cih ka za uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44006015	Sanhedrin a tu mi khempeuh in Stephen limtakin entek uh a, amaute in a maitang, vansawltak maitang tawh kibangin a mu tek uh hi.
44007001	Tua ciangin tulpipa in ama kiangah, “Hihte hong matna a maan hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
44007002	Hih thu a dawnna in amah in, “Sanggamte le pate aw, ka thugen na ngai un! I pa Abraham Haran-a a ten ma Mesopotamia a, a om lai-in ama kiangah minthanna Pasian a kilang hi.
44007003	Pasian in, 'Na gam le na mite nusia inla, kong lah nading gamah pai in,’a ci hi.
44007004	"Tua ahi ciangin Chaldea gam nusia in Haran ah a teng hi. A pa a sih khit ciangin tu-a note tenna mun hih leitang ah Pasian in amah sawl hi.
44007005	Amah in ama tungah a luah ding leitang khepek cia nangawn a pia kei hi. Ahi hangin Abraham in ta a neih loh lai nangawn in, amah le a nunga asuan akhakte in tua leitang a tang ding uh hi, cih Pasian in kamciam khin hi.
44007006	Pasian in ama tungah: ‘Na suan na khakte amau gam lo khatah mikhualin om ding uh a, amaute sila suakin, kum zali sung kibawlsia ding hi.
44007007	Ahi hangin amaute sal-a a khawi mite ka gawt ding hi, ci-in gen a, tua nung ciangin amaute tua mun pan paikhia ding uh a, hih munah kei hong bia ding uh hi,’b Pasian in ci hi.
44007008	Tua ciangin Abraham tungah vun at ding thukhun a pia hi. Tua hi-a Abraham, Isaac’ pa hong hi-in a suah khit ni giat ciangin a vun a at hi. Tua nung ciangin Isaac, Jacob’ pa hong hi-a James, pupi sawm le nihte pa hong suak hi.
44007009	Pupite in Joseph a hazat manun Egypt ah sila-in a zuak uh hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in amah ompih a,
44007010	ama lungkhamna khempeuh panin hukhia hi. Amah in Joseph tungah pilna le Egypt kumpi Pharaoh mai-ah maipha ngahna a pia hi. Tua ahi ciangin amah in Egypt gam khempeuh le a kumpi inn sung khempeuh a uksak hi.
44007011	"Tua ciangin Egypt le Canaan gam sung khempeuh ah kialpi tungin, gim thuakna lianpi tunga, i pate in an a mu zo kei uh hi.
44007012	Egypt ah an om hi cih Jacob in a zak ciangin i pate a khat veina hawh dingin a sawl hi.
44007013	A nih veina a hawh uh ciangin, Joseph in a sanggamte kiangah amah kua hi hiam cih kigen a, Pharaoh in Joseph innkuan sung thu a na thei hi.
44007014	Hihte khit ciangin Joseph in a pa Jacob a innkuan bup tawh samsaka, a vekun sawm sagih le nga a pha uh hi.
44007015	Tua ciangin amah le i pate sihna mun Egypt ah Jacob a paisuk hi.
44007016	Amaute luangte Shechem ah kipuak kika, Abraham in Shechem-a Harmor tate tung pana sum bangzah hiam khat tawh a leisa hankhuk sungah kisial hi.
44007017	Pasian in Abraham tunga a kam ciam a tangtunsak ding hun a nai ciangin Egypt a i mite kibehlapin tam mahmah uh hi.
44007018	Tua ciangin Joseph thu bangmah a thei kha lo kumpi dang khat in, Egypt gam uk hi.
44007019	Amah in i mipihte khembawl in, i pute nengcipa, a ta suakthakte uh, a sih nadingin thatang hat thu-in a paikhiasak hi.
44007020	"Tua hun laitakiin Moses suak a, amah naupang mawkmawk ahi kei hi.c Ahang in, a pa inn sungah kha thum sung kikem hi.
44007021	A pua-ah a kikoihkhiat ciangin Pharaoh tanu in amah la a, ama tapa bangin khoi hi.
44007022	Moses in Egypt pilna khempeuh sin a, thugenna le nasepna ah a vanglian hi.
44007023	"Moses kum sawmli a phak ciangin ama mipih Israel mite veh ding a khensat hi.
44007024	Ama mipihte khat, Egypt-te khatin a khelbawl laitak mu-a, a hu dingin va pai-in, a phulakna in Egypt pa a that hi.
44007025	Moses in, Pasian in amaute honkhia dingin amah zang hi, cih a phawk ding uh hi, ci-in a ngaihsun hi. Ahi hangin amaute in a phawk kei uh hi.
44007026	A zing ciangin Israel mite nih a kilai laitak Moses in a tuak hi. Amah in amaute lep sawmin, ‘Guaite aw, note sanggam khat hi napi, bang hanga khat le khat kisiasak nuam na hi uh hiam?’ ci hi.
44007027	"Ahi hangin a gilo-zawpa in Moses thalsawn a, ‘Kua in kote tungah uk a thukhenpa dingin nang hong koih ahi hiam?’
44007028	Zan-a Egypt pa na thah bangin kei hong that nuam na hi hiam?’d ci hi.
44007029	Moses in hih thu a zak ciangin, Midian ah taimang sanin tua lai-ah mikhualin va tenga tapa nih a nei hi.
44007030	"Kum sawmli khit ciangin Sinai Vum kiang gamlakah vansawltak khat, sawl kawm meikuangin Moses kiangah kilang hi.
44007031	Amah in hih a muh ciangin a na muh lamdang a sa mahmah hi. A naizaw-a en dingin a pai leh amah in Topa aw za a:
44007032	‘Na pate uh Pasian, Abraham, Isaac le Jacob-te’ Pasian ka hi hi,’e ci hi. Moses lau in linga, a en ngam kei hi.
44007033	"Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Na dinna mun siangtho ahi manin na khedap suahkhia in.
44007034	Egypt a ka mite a kinencipna ka mu zo hi. Amaute tauna ka za zo-a, a suaktasak dingin hong paisuk ka hi hi. Tu-in hong pai in, Egypt ah kong sawl kik ding hi,’f ci hi.
44007035	"Amaute in, ‘Kua in kote tungah uk a thukhenpa dingin nang hong koih ahi hiam?’ ci-a, a thu a nialpa uh hih Moses mah ahi hi. Amaute ukpa le hukhia pa dingin Pasian mahmah in amah, sawl kawm meikuang sunga ama kianga kilang vansawltak tungtawna a sawl ahi hi,
44007036	Amah in amaute Egypt panin pai khiatpih a, Egypt gam, San Tuipig le sehnel-gam ah kum sawmli sung a lamdangte le lim lamdangte a bawl hi.
44007037	‘Pasian in nomau mite lak panin keimah bang kamsang khat hong sawl ding hi,’h ci-a Israel-te tungah a na hilh pa tua Moses mah ahi hi.
44007038	Amah sehnel-gam a mihon kipawlkhawmte’ pate le Sinai Vum tunga amah a hopih van sawltak tawh a omkhawm hi; amah in eite tunga hong puaksawn ding a nungta thute a ngah hi.
44007039	"Ahi hangin i pate in ama thu a mang kei uh hi. A man’ sangsik un, amah nolh uh a, a lungtangte uh Egypt lam a nga kik uh hi.
44007040	Amaute in Aron kiangah, ‘Kote mai-a pai ding pasiante hong bawlsak in. Egypt pana hong pikhia hih mihing pa Moses lah bang suak ta hiam, ka thei kei uh hi!’i ci uh hi.
44007041	Amaute in bawngno suna lim a bawl uh tua hun lai ahi hi. Amaute in tua tungah kithoihnate puak uh a, a khut uh tawh a bawlsate uh pahtawi-in a lawm uh hi.
44007042	Ahi hangin Pasian in lehngatsana vantung nate biakna adingin amaute a ngawh piak hi. Hih kamsangte laibu sunga kigelhsa thu: “O Israel innkuante aw, gamlak ah kum sawmli sung, biakpiakna le biaknate kei nong puak uh hiam?
44007043	Moloch biakbukno le na pasian uh Rephan aksi, biak dinga na bawl uh milimte na tawisang uh hi. Tua ahi manin Babylon galkhatah salinj kong paisak ding hi,’ kici le hih thu kituak hi.
44007044	"I pu i pa-te in gamlak ah Teci panna biakbuk a nei uh hi. Tua pen, Pasian in Moses tunga a hilh, alim a muhsa banga kibawl ahi hi.
44007045	Biakbuk ngah khin in, Pasian in amaute mai-a a hawlkhiat minamte leitang a lak uh ciangin i pate in Joshua makaihna tawh tua biakbuk na pua uh a, tua biakbuk, David khanghun dong tua gamah a om hi.
44007046	Amah in Pasian angvanna nuamsa a, Jacobk Pasian ten nading a lamsak theih nading ngen hi.
44007047	Ahi hangin ama ading inn lam pa Solomon ahi hi.
44007048	"Bangbang ahi zongin a Sang Penpa ahileh mihing bawlsa innte ah a teng kei hi. Kamsangpa gen bangin:
44007049	"‘Vantung ka tokhom hi-a, leitung ka khe ngakna ahi hi. Kei ading bangci bang inn lam ding na hi hiam? Ahikeh ka khawl nading mun koi lai hi ding hiam?
44007050	Hih na khempeuh ka khuta ka bawlsa hi lo ahi hiam? Topa in ci hi.’l
44007051	"No a genhak mite, lungtang le bil vun-at lohte! Na pate uh tawh na kibang tektek uh hi. Note in Khasiangtho na nang ngitnget uh hi!
44007052	Na pate un a bawlsiat loh kamsang om ngei ahi hiam? Amaute in Thumaan Pa hong pai ding thu a genkholte nangawn a that uh hi.
44007053	Vansawltakte tungtawna kizang thu kham ngah napi a zui lo note in tu-in amah lehhekin na that uh hi,” a ci hi.
44007054	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungso uh a, a ha uh a gawisan uh hi.
44007055	Ahi hangin Khasiangtho tawh kidim Stephen in vantung lam ento-in, Pasian minthanna le Pasian taklam a ding Jesu a mu hi.
44007056	Amah in, “En un, van kihong le Pasian taklama Mihing Tapa a ding ka mu hi,” a ci hi.
44007057	Tua takteh, amaute in a bil uh hum uh a, a aw neih zah un kiko in amah a bawhhuan uh hi.
44007058	Khuapi sung panin talkaih gawp uh a, suangin a deng uh hi. Tua hun tektekin tecite in Saul kici tangvalno khat khephungah a puante uh a koih uh hi.
44007059	Amaute in amah suang tawh a den laitakun Stephen in, “Topa Jesu aw, ka kha na sang ta in,” ci-in thu a ngen hi.
44007060	Tua ciangin khukdin-a, “Topa aw, hih mawhna amaute tungah na phul kei in,” ci-in a kiko hi. Hih teng a cih khit ciangin a ihmu hi.
44008001	Saul zong tua lai-ah om a, ama sihna a thukimpih hi. Tua ni-in Jerusalem ah pawlpi kibawlsiatna lianpi om a, sawltakpite longal adangte khempeuh Judea le Samaria gam sung tengah a kithehhthang uh hi.
44008002	Pasian a zahtak mite in Stephen vui uh a, amah a kah ngutngut uh hi.
44008003	Ahi hangin Saul in pawlpite suksiat ding a kipan hi. Inn khat pan inn khatah pai-in numei hitaleh pasal hitaleh kaikhia gawpin amaute thong ah a khum hi.
44008004	A kithehthang mite in amau paina peuhpeuh ah thu a hilh uh hi.
44008005	Samaria gam khuapi khatah Philip paisuak a, tua lai-ah Khrista thu a tangko hi.
44008006	Mihonte in Philip thugen za uh a, a limlamdang bawlte a muh ciangun amaute khempeuh a kiangah va pai-in a thugen limtakin a ngai uh hi.
44008007	Mi tampi sung pan kha giloteb kiku vangvang in paikhia uh a, pumzawte le mipoite tampi a dam uh hi.
44008008	Tua ahi ciangin tua khuapi sungah lungdamna lianpi a tung hi.
44008009	Simon kici mi khat, khuapi sungah tawlkhat sung oma, ai sanin Samaria mi khempeuh in lamdang mahmah a sa uh hi. Amah mi lian khatin kingaihsun-a a kisial hi.
44008010	Mi lian mi neu, mi khempeuh in ama thu ngai-in, “Hih mipa, Vangliatna Lian kici Pasian vangliatna ahi hi,” ci-in a thangsak uh hi.
44008011	Amah in amaute sawtveipi a mitphial bawlna lamdang sasak mahmah ahi manin, amah a zui uh hi.
44008012	Ahi hangin Philip in Pasian gam thupha le Jesu Khrist min thute a hilh ciangin um uh a, a numei a pasalin a kibaptise uh hi.
44008013	Simon mahmah in zong uma a kibaptise hi. Amah in a lian lim lamdang le a nalamdang a muhte lamdang sa in Philip a zui kawikawi hi.
44008014	Jerusalem a sawltakpite in, Samaria ah Pasian thu kisang ta cih a zak uh ciangin amaute kiangah Peter leh John a sawl uh hi.
44008015	Amaute a tun uh ciangin Khasiangtho a ngah nadingun amaute thu a ngetsak uh hi.
44008016	Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute khat beek tungah Khasiangtho a tung nai kei hi; amaute Topa Jesu min sungahc a kibaptise pan bek uh hi.
44008017	Tua ahi ciangin Peter le John in amaute tungah a khut uh nga uh a, Khasiangtho a ngah uh hi.
44008018	Simon in sawltakpite khut ngakna tawh Kha kipia cih a muh ciangin amaute sum tah a,
44008019	"Ka khut ka ngaknate in Khasiangtho a ngah theih nadingin hih, hihtheihna kei zong hong pia un,” a ci hi.
44008020	Peter in, “Na sum tawh mangthang khawmta in! Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian letsong sum tawh lei theih dingin na ngaihsut hi.
44008021	Pasian mai-ah na lungtang maan lo ahi manin hih nasepna sungah tanh ahi a, panna ahi zongin na nei kei hi.
44008022	Hih tatsiatna pan kisik inla, Topa tungah thu ngen in. Na lungsungah tua bang ngaihsutna na neih, amah in hong maisak kha thei ding hi.
44008023	Ahang in, khaatna tawh na kidim a, mawhna sila-in na om cih kong mu hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44008024	Tua ciangin Simon in, “Na gensate kei tungah bangmah hong tun loh nadingin Topa tungah thu hong ngetsak in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44008025	Peter le John in Topa thu teci pangin a thansak khit uh ciangin Samaria gam khuaneu tampi ah lungdamna-thu a hilh kawmun Jerusalem ah a ciah kik uh hi.
44008026	Tu-in Topa vansawltak khain Philip tungah, "Jerusalem pana Gaza lama paisuk - gamlak lamneu ah leitaw-lam manawhin pai in," a ci hi.
44008027	Tua ciangin amah kipankhia a, lampi ah Ethiopia mid cil kigetpa, Ethiopia kumpinu Canda gou khempeuh a uk kumpi nasem ulian pa tawh a kituak hi. Hih mipa Jerusalem ah Pasian bia dinga va pai hi-a
44008028	inn lamah ciah kikin sakolleng tungah tu-a, kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a sim hi.
44008029	Philip kiangah Kha in, "Sakolleng va naih inla, a kiangah va om in," ci-in a gan hi.
44008030	Tua ciangin Philip in tua sakol leng a va delh leh tua mipa in kamsangpa Isaiah laibu a sim a za hi. Philip in, “Tu-a na lai sim na theitel hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
44008031	Amah in, “Mi khatpeuh in hong hilhcian kei ngal leh bangci theih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Philip kahto-a amah tawh a tukhawm dingin a sam hi.
44008032	Tua cilgehpa in: “A gopa kianga kipaipih tuu bangin amah kipaipih a, a mul metpa mai-a a ham lo tuuno bangin a kamka kei hi.
44008033	Amah kizahlaksakin thutang ahina kisuhsak hi. Ama nuntakna leitang pan kilaksak ahi manin asuan a khakte thu kua in gen thei ding hiam?”e cih Laisiangtho mun a sim laitak ahi hi.
44008034	Cilgehpa in Philip kiangah, “Nong hehpihna in, hih kamsangpa amah le amah kigen ahi hiam, ahi keileh mi khatpeuh thu gen ahi hiam hong hilh dih in,” ci-in a dong hi.
44008035	Tua ciangin Philip in tua Laisiangtho mun tektek mah pansanin Jesu tawh kisai lungdamna thu a genpih hi.
44008036	A paipai laitakun tui omna mun khat tung uh a, cilgehpa in, “En in, hih lai-ah tui a om hi. Bang hangin kibaptise lo ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
44008037	Philip in, “Na lungsim khempeuh tawh na up leh na kibaptise thei hi,” a ci hi. Kumpi nasempa in, “Jesu Khrist, Pasian Tapa hi, cih ka um hi,”f ci-in a dawng hi.
44008038	Tua ciangin sakolleng a khawl nading thu a pia hi. Philip le cilgehpa tui sungah paisuk khawm uh a, Philip in amah a baptise hi.
44008039	Tui sung pan a paikhiat toh uh ciangin Topa Kha in Philip lakhiamang pah a, cilgehpa in a mu kik nawn kei hi. Ahi hangin lam tawntungah lungnuamtakin a pai hi.
44008040	Philip ahileh Azotus ah kilang a, zin kawikawi-in Caesarea a tun dong khuapi khempeuh ah lungdamna-thu a hilh hi.
44009001	Tua hun sungin Saul in Topa nung zuite langbawla thahnopna huu a sangkhia lailai hi. Tulpipa kiangah va pai a,
44009002	Lampi thu a zui mi a muh nak leh numei ahi a pasal ahi zong in Jerusalem ah thong a khiat theih nadingin Damascus a synagogue-te a, a lah ding lai a ngen hi.
44009003	Amah zinkhia a, Damascus a tun dektak laitakin vantung panin khuavak khat in a kimkot a tanzal hi.
44009004	Amah lei lakah puka, aw khat in, “Saul, Saul, bang hangin kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam?” a cih a za hi.
44009005	Saul in, “Topa aw, kua na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Na bawlsiat Jesu ka hi hi.
44009006	Tu-in tho inla khuapi sungah lut in. Na hih pelmawh ding hong kigen ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44009007	Saul tonpih mite gen ding nei loin tua lai-ah a ding uh hi. Awging a zak uh hangin kuamah a mu kei uh hi.
44009008	Lei lak panin Saul thoto-a, a mit a hak hangin bangmah a mu thei kei hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah a khutin len uh a, Damascus khua sungah a paipih uh hi.
44009009	Mittawsa in ni thum sung oma bangmah a ne a dawn kei hi.
44009010	Damascus ah Ananias kici nungzui khat a om hi. A mangmuhna sungah Topa in amah sama, Ananias aw,’” a ci hi. Amah in, “Topa aw, ka om hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44009011	Topa in ama kiangah, “Kongzing Tang a Judas inn ah va pai inla, Tarsus khua mi Saul va kan in. Amah in thu a nget laitak ahi hi.
44009012	Amah in a mangmuhna ah, Ananias kici mi khat pai-a, a mit in khua a muh kik nadingin a tungah a khut a nga hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
44009013	Ananias in, “Topa aw, hih mipa in Jerusalem a na misiangte a bawlsiatna thu tampi ka za zo hi.
44009014	Tua hi-a amah in siampi makaite thuneihna tawh na min a lote khempeuh man dinga hih lai-a hong pai ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44009015	Ahi hangin Topa in Ananias kiangah, “Va pai in! Gentile-te le a kumpite uh le Israel mite mai-ah ka min a pua dinga ka vanzat dingin amah ka teelsa ahi hi.
44009016	Kei min hangin bangzah ta thuak ding cih amah ka lak ding hi,” a ci hi.
44009017	Tua ciangin Ananias tua inn ah pai-a, a lut hi. Saul tungah a khutte nga a, “Sanggampa Saul aw, hih lai-a nong pai laitak-a lampi ah nang tunga hong kilak Topa – Jesu in, khua na muh kik theih nading le Khasiangtho tawh na dim theih nadingin kei hong sawl zo hi,” a ci hi.
44009018	Saul’ mitte panin a lip bang khat, thakhat in kiakhia-a khua a mu thei kik hi. Amah tho-in kibaptise a,
44009019	an a nek khit ciangin a tha a hat kik hi. Damascus a om nungzuite tawh Saul ni tampi a omkhawm hi.
44009020	Amah in synagogue-te sungah Jesu, Pasian Tapa hi, cih thuhilh a kipan pah hi.
44009021	Ama thugen a zate khempeuh in lamdang sa lua in, “Jerusalem ah hih min a lote nakpi-a a siattutpa hih pa hi lo ahi hiam? Amaute thonga khum bangin siampi makaite khut sunga a khum dinga hong pai hi lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
44009022	Tua hi napi Saul khangin vanglian semsem a, tua Jesu, Khrista a hina kitelsakin Damascus a teng Jew-te khempeuh gen ding thei loin a kamkasak hi.
44009023	Ni tampi khit ciangin Jew-te in amah thah sawmsim uh a,
44009024	ahi hangin Saul in amaute geelsimna a thei hi. Amaute in amah a thah theih nadingun sun le zanin khuapi kongpite ah a pang uh hi.
44009025	Ahi hangin ama nungzuite in, zanin khuapi kulh vang panin bawm tawh amah a khaisuk uh hi.
44009026	Amah Jerusalem a tun ciangin nungzuite tawh kipawl a sawm hi. Ahi hangin amaute in amah, nungzui hi taktak dingin um zo lo uh a, a vekun amah a kihta uh hi.
44009027	Ahi hangin Barnabas in amah paipihin sawltakpite kiangah a pi hi. Amah in amaute kiangah Saul in a khualzinna-ah Topa a muh zia le Topa in amah a hopihna le Damascus ah lau loin Jesu mina thu a hilhnate a gen hi.
44009028	Tua ciangin amaute tawh Saul om khawm-in, adal om loin Jerusalem khuapi sungah vak kawikawi uh a, Topa minin hangtakin thu a gen hi.
44009029	Amah, Greek kampau Jew-te tawh kiho in thu a kinial hi. Ahi hangin amaute in thah a sawm uh hi.
44009030	Tua lai-a om sanggamte in hih thu a theih uh ciangin Caesarea ah tonpih suk uh a Tarsus ah a kha uh hi.
44009031	Tua ciangin Judea, Galilee le Samaria gam sunga om pawlpite in lungmuan hun a ngah uh hi. Khasiangtho in hanthawnin thakhauhsak a, tua bangin Topa kihta-a, a nungta mi khangin a tam semsem hi.
44009032	Tua gam sung tengah Peter a zin kawikawi lai-in Lydda a misiangte kiangah a va hawh hi.
44009033	Tua lai-ah Aeneas kici a pum zaw a, kum giat sung lupna ngaka om mi khat a mu hi.
44009034	Peter in, “Aeneas aw, Jesu Khrist in nang hong damsak hi. Tho inla na lupna phek zial in,” a ci hi. Aeneas a thoto pah hi.
44009035	Lidda le Sharon a teng mite khempeuh in amah mu uh a, Topa lamah a kihei uh hi.
44009036	Joppa ah (a khiatna Dorcasb ahi) Tabitha kici nungzui khat om a, amah in mizawngte huhin, na hoih sem tawntung khat ahi hi.
44009037	Tua hun pawlin amah cina-a a si hi. A luang a kisil khit ciangin inntung dei khatah kisial hi.
44009038	Lidda pen Joppa khua kiang ahi hi. Tua hi-a a nungzuite in Lidda ah Peter om cih a zak uh ciangin ama kiangah mi nih sawl uh a, “Hehpihna in hong paipak dih in!” ci-in a kun uh hi.
44009039	Peter in amaute zui-a, amah a tun ciangin inntung dei-ah a kahpih to uh hi. Meigongte khempeuh Peter kimkotah ding uh a, Dorcas amau tawh a om khawm lai-a, a bawlsa puantualte le puan dangte amah lakin a kapkap uh hi.
44009040	Peter in amaute khempeuh inndei pua lamah a sawlkhia hi. Tua ciangin khukdin sukin thu a ngen hi. A si numei lamah kihei a, “Tabitha, tho in,” a ci hi. Tuanu hakin Peter mu-a a tu to hi.
44009041	Peter in a khutah lenin a khe-in a dingsak hi. Tua ciangin thu-umte le meigongte sama, amaute tungah amah a nungta in a pia hi.
44009042	Hih thu Joppa khua sung khempeuh ah kithei khawka mi tampi in Topa a um uh hi.
44009043	Joppa a Simon min nei savun bawlpa tawh Peter tawmvei sung a om hi.
44010001	Caesarea ah Cornelius min nei, Italy galkap pawl a kici ah, zakhat-ukpa khat a om hi.
44010002	Amah le a innkuanpihte khempeuh biakna ah kipumpiakin Pasian kihta uh hi. Amah in a kitasamte phaltakin pia a, Pasian kiangah ahun simin thu a ngen hi.
44010003	Ni khat, nitak lam nai thum pawlin mang a mu hi. Topa vansawltak khat ama kianga pai kiciantakin mu a, amah in, “Cornelius!” a ci hi.
44010004	Cornelius lau-in amah en gega a, “Topa aw, bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Tua vansawltak in, “Na thungetnate le mizawngte na citpiaknate Pasian mai-ah a kiphawk den biakna dingin hong tungto zo hi.
44010005	Tu-in Joppa ah mi sawl inla, Simon min nei Peter kici pa va samsak kik in.
44010006	Amah savun bawl Simon tawh omkhawm a, ama inn tuipi gei ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44010007	Amah a hopih vansawltak a ciah khit ciangin Cornelius in a nasemte nih le a galkapte lakah biakna-a kipumpiak khat a sam hi.
44010008	Amah in amaute tungah a piangsa thu khempeuh gena, Joppa ah a sawl hi.
44010009	A zingciang sun pawl, amaute khuapi zuana a pai laitakun, thungen dingin Peter inntungah a pai to hi.
44010010	Amah a gil kiala, bang khatpeuh duh in; a an ding a kihuan san laitakin mumang bangin a om hi.
44010011	Van kihonga, a pek lianpi khat a kiu li tek panin leitunga kikhaisuk a mu hi.
44010012	Tua sungah khe li nei ganhing nam khempeuh, leitunga, a bokvak ganhingte le huih lak vasate zong a om hi.
44010013	Tua ciangin aw khat in ama kiangah, “Peter aw, tho in. Go inla ne in,” ci-in a gen hi.
44010014	Peter in “Hi buang lo e, Topa! Ken a siangtho lo le a nin na khatpeuh ka ne ngei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44010015	Tua aw in a nih veina hopih a, “Pasian in a sianga a bawlsa na khatpeuh, siang lo hi, ci kei in,” a ci hi.
44010016	Thum vei tua bangin hi-a tua khit ciangin tua a pek lianpi vantungah kila kik pah hi.
44010017	Peter in tua a mangmuh a khiatna a ngaihsutsut laitakin Cornelius sawl mite in Simon inn mu uh a, a kongpi ah a khawl uh hi.
44010018	Peter kici Simon tua munah a taam lai hiam, ci-in a galdot uh hi.
44010019	Peter in a mangmuhna a ngaihsutsut laitakin Kha in ama kiangah, “Simon aw, mi thuma in nang hong zong hi.
44010020	Tua ahi ciangin tho inla, kumsuk in. Amaute kong sawl ahi manin, na zuih ding lungsit kei in,” a ci hi.
44010021	Peter kumsuk a mite kiangah, “Na zonpa uh keimah ka hi hi. Bang dinga hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
44010022	Tua mite in, “Zakhat-ukpa Cornelius kiang pana hong pai ka hi uh hi. Amah thumaanin Pasian kihta mi hi a, Jew mi khempeuh in a zahtak khat ahi hi. Vansawltak siangtho khat in ama kiangah, nang thu gena, amah in a zak theih nadingin ama kiangah nang hong sap dingin a gen hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
44010023	Tua ciangin Peter in tua mite inn sungah sama zin a tungsak hi. A zing ciangin amaute tawh Peter tonkhawma, Joppa a, sanggamte pawl khat in a zui uh hi.
44010024	A thai ciangin Caesarea a tung uh hi. Cornelius in amau tun ding lamena, a tanaute le a kinaipih a lawmte a na samkhol hi.
44010025	Inn sungah Peter luta, Cornelius in amah na dawn tuahin, amah zahtaka, a khephungah a bok hi.
44010026	Ahi hangin Peter in amah phong to-a, “Ding to in, kei zong mihing lel mah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
44010027	Amah tawh a kiho kawmin Peter sungtuma, mi tampi a kikhawm a mu hi.
44010028	Amah in amaute kiangah, “Jew mi adingin Gentile mi tawh kikholh ahi zongin, amau kiangah va hawh ahi zongin, ka thukham uh tawh kituak lo hi, cih na theihsa uh ahi hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh a siangtho lo ahikeh nin hi ka cih loh nadingin Pasian in hong lak zo hi.
44010029	Tua hi-a kei hong kisapsak ciangin nial loin kong pai hi. Bang hanga kei hong samsak na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
44010030	Cornelius in, “Nung ni li lai-in, ka inn sungah nitak lam nai thum, tu hunin thu ka ngen hi. Thakhatin ka mai-ah puan atang selsal a silh mi khat hong dinga,
44010031	‘Cornelius aw, Pasian in na thungetna za zo a, mizawngte na piakte ciamteh zo hi.
44010032	Joppa a Peter kici Simon samsak in. Amah tuipi gei-a teng savun bawlpa Simon inn ah tung hi,’ ci hi.
44010033	Tua ciangin nang kong samsak pah a, nong pai a hoih mahmah hi. Tu-in kote nong hilh dinga Topa hong thupiak peuhmah a ngai dingin kote khempeuh hih lai Pasian mai-ah ka om uh hi,” a ci hi.
44010034	Tua ciangin Peter thugen kipan a, “Pasian in angvan tuam nei loin
44010035	minam khempeuh panin amah kihta-a, a dik-a gamta mite khempeuh a sanna thu, amaan a hina teltakin ka thei ta hi.
44010036	Pasian in Israel-te tunga a thupuak mite khempeuh Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawna kigen hih lemna hong tun lungdamna thute ahi hi.
44010037	John in baptise-na thu a gen khit nungin Galilee gama kipan Judea gamsung khempeuh ah bang thu piang hiam, cih na thei zo uh hi.
44010038	Pasian in Nazareth mi Jesu, Khasiangtho le vangliatna sathau a nilh zia le amah pai kawikawi in, Pasian in amah a ompihna hangin na hoih sema, dawimangpa vangliatna nuai-a mi khempeuh a dam saknate na thei zo uh hi.
44010039	Jew-te gam le Jerusalem a, a septe khempeuh ah kote teci ka hi uh hi. Amaute in amah sing tungah khai-in that uh a,
44010040	ahi hangin a ni thum ni-in Pasian in misi pan amah thokiksaka, a kimusak hi.
44010041	Amah mi khempeuh in mu lo a, Pasian in a teci dinga a teelkholhsa kote in mu in – misi pana a thawh khitin amah tawh a nekhawm a dawnkhawm kote ka om uh hi.
44010042	Amah in mite tunga thuhilh ding le mihingte le misite tunga thukhen ding pa in amah a sehna thu teci ahi dingin Pasian in kote thu hong pia hi.
44010043	Amah a umte khempeuh in ama min tungtawnin mawh maina a ngah nading uh thu, kamsangte khempeuh in teci a pang zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
44010044	Peter in hih thute a gengen laitakin hih thupuak a za mi khempeuh tungah Khasiangtho a tung hi.
44010045	Peter tawh a pai khawm vunatte lakah a um mite in, Gentile-te tung nangawna Khasiangtho a kisunkhiat ciangin lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
44010046	Ahang in, amaute pauteb in pau uh a, Pasian a phat uh a za uh hi. Tua ciangin Peter in,
44010047	"Hih mite tui-in a kibaptise ding kua in kham thei ding ahi hiam? Eite bang tektekin amaute in Khasiangtho a ngah zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
44010048	Tua ciangin amah in amaute Jesu Khrist min-a kibaptise dingin thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin amaute in ni tawmkha sung amaute kiangah Peter a taam lai nading a thum uh hi.
44011001	Sawltakpite le Judea gam sunga om sanggamte in, Gentile-te in zong Pasian thu sang khin ta uh cih a za uh hi.
44011002	Tua ahi ciangin Jerusalem ah Peter a pai toh ciangin vunatte laka thu-umte in amah mawhsak in,
44011003	"Nang, vunat-lote innah hawhin amaute tawh an na nekhawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
44011004	Peter in na khempeuh a pian bang bangin a cingin gen a:
44011005	Joppa khuapi ah thungen a ka om laitakin mumang bangin mang ka mu hi. Vantung panin a kiu li tek pana kikhaisuk, a pek lianpi bang khat ka omna-ah ka mu hi.
44011006	Asung ka et leh leitung a khe li nei ganhingte, gamsate, a bokvak ganhingte le huih lak vasate ka mu hi.
44011007	Tua ciangin kei kiangah, “Peter aw, tho in. Go inla ne in,” ci-a hong gen aw khat ka za hi.
44011008	"Ken, ‘Hi buang lo e, Topa! A siangtho lo le a nin na khat beek ka kam sungah tum ngei nai lo hi,’ ci-in ka dawng hi.
44011009	"Tua aw in vantung panin a nih veina hong gen a, ‘Pasian in a siang a, a bawlsa na khatpeuh, siangtho lo hi, ci kei in,’ ci hi.
44011010	Hih bangin thum vei dong hi-a, tua ciangin vantungah kikhai to kik hi.
44011011	"Tua hun laitak tektekin Caesarea pana kei kianga hong kisawl mi thum ka tunna inn ah hong tung lian uh hi.
44011012	Amaute tawh lungsit lo-a ka pai ding Kha in hong gen hi. Hih sanggamte guk in zong kei hong zui uh a, tua mipa inn ah ka lut uh hi.
44011013	Amah in kote kiangah, a inn sungah vansawltak kilang a, ‘Joppa a Peter kici Simon samsak in.
44011014	Amah in nang le na innkuanpihte khempeuh kihotkhiat nading thu puak khat hong puak ding hi,’ ci-in a genzia hong gen hi.
44011015	"Thu gen ka kipat takin, a cila eite tunga hong tung bangin amaute tungah Khasiangtho a tung hi.
44011016	Tua ciangin Topa in, John in tui ina hong baptise hi; ahi hangin note Khasiangtho in hong kibaptise ding hi,’ ci-a a gensa ka phawk hi.
44011017	Tua hi-a Topa Jesu a um, eite hong piak tawh a kibang letsong, Pasian in amaute pia ahileh Pasian a nial thei dinga kingaihsun kei kua ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
44011018	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin bangmah nialna nei nawn tuan loin, “Tua ahi mawk leh Pasian in, nuntakna ngah nadingin kisikna Gentile-te tungah phal tazen hi lo maw!” ci-in Pasian a phat uh hi.
44011019	Stephen tawh kisai-a bawlsiat na hangin a kithehthang mite Phoenicia, Cyprus le Antioch dongah tung uh a, Jew-te tung bekah thupuak a gen uh hi.
44011020	Bangbang ahi zongin amaute pawlkhat Cyprus le Cyrene pana mite, Antioch ah pai-in Greek-te tungah zong Topa Jesu lungdamna thu gen ding a kipan uh hi.
44011021	Topa khut, amaute tawh omkhawm a, mi tampitakin um in, Topa lamah a kihei uh hi.
44011022	Hih thu Jerusalem a pawlpite in na za uh a, Antioch ah Barnabas a sawl uh hi.
44011023	Amah tungin, Pasian hehpihna a tunzia a muh ciangin a nuam mahmah hi. Amaute khempeuh in a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa tungah a muanhuai nadingun a hanthawn hi.
44011024	Amah mi hoih hi-a Khasiangtho le upna tawh kidim in, Topa kiangah mi tampitak a tun hi.
44011025	Tua ciangin Saul zong dingin Tarsus ah Barnabas pai a,
44011026	amah a muh ciangin Antioch ah a paipih hi. Tua hi-a Barnabas le Saul tua lai-a pawlpi tawh kum khat vilvel kikhawl uh a, mi tampitak thu a hilh uh hi. Antioch ah nungzuite, Khristian-te a kici masa pen hi.
44011027	Hih hun sungin kamsangte pawlkhat Jerusalem pan Antioch ah a paisuk uh hi.
44011028	Amaute lakah Agabus min nei khat ding to a, “Kha tungtawnin, Rome gam sung khempeuh ah kialpi nasiatakin tung ding hi,” ci-in a genkhol hi. (Hih pen Claudius in a uk laitakin a tung hi.)
44011029	Nungzuite in amau hihtheihna ciat tawh Judea gama teng sanggamte huhna piak dingin thu a khensat uh hi.
44011030	Amaute in tua thu tangtungsak uh a, Barnabas le Saul tungah amau letsongte upate ngah dingin a khak uh hi.
44012001	Tua hunlai pawlin Kumpi Herod in pawlpi mite pawlkhat bawlsiat sawmin a man hi.
44012002	Amah in John sanggampa James namsau tawh that khin zo hi.
44012003	Hih thu in Jew-te lung kimsak cih a muh ciangin Peter zong mat beh a sawm lai hi. Hih in Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi huna thupiang ahi hi.
44012004	Amah a mat khit ciangin thong sungah khuma, galkap li-a kipawl, pawl lite cin dingin a ap hi. Herod in, Paisan Pawi a ven cianga mipite mai-ah thukhen dingin lakkhiat a sawm hi.
44012005	Tua dinga Peter thong sunga a khum ahi hi. Ahi hangin pawlpite in ama ading cihtakna tawh Pasian tungah thu a ngen uh hi.
44012006	Herod in thukhen dinga lakkhiat a sawm ni ma zanin, galkap nih kikalah Peter luma, sikkhainiang nihin kikhihin, a cingte in kong a cing uh hi.
44012007	Thakhatin Topa vansawltak khat kilanga, thong inn sung teng khuavak in a tan hi. Amah in Peter a pang bengin a phawng hi. Amah in, “Manlang in, tho in!” ci-a Peter khutdawh pan sikkhainiangte a kitolkhia hi.
44012008	Tua ciangin vansawltak in a kiangah, “Na puante silh in, na khedapte bulh in,” a ci hi. A cih bangin Peter in a hih hi. Vansawltak in, “Na puantualpi silh inla kei hong zui in,” ci-in a gen hi.
44012009	Peter in amah thong pua ah a zuih hangin, vansawltak hihna a takpi mah hiam, cih thei loin mangmu-in kingaihsun hi.
44012010	Amaute in thong cingte a masa le a nihna khengin khuapi sung paina sik kongpi a tung uh hi. Tua kongpi ama thu-in na kihonga, amaute a paikhia uh hi. Kongzing khat a zuih suak khit uh ciangin vansawltak in amah thakhatin a nusia hi.
44012011	Tua ciangin Peter in khua phawk a, “Topa in ama vansawltak hong sawla, Herod khutlum pan le Jew mite in zong lamena, a ngak uh na khempeuh panin kei hong hukhia ahilam lungheina om loin tu-in ka thei ta hi,” a ci hi.
44012012	Amah in hih thu a phawkkhiat ciangin, mi tampi kikhawm a thu a ngetna mun Mark zong a kici John nu Mary inn ah a pai hi.
44012013	Peter in kongkhak puanung pen va kiu-a, a hon dingin Rhoda kici nasem numeino khat a pai hi.
44012014	Tuanu in Peter aw ahilam a theihcian ciangin nuam mahmah a, kong hon loin lehtai kika, “Kongkhak ah Peter om!” ci-in a kiko zak hi.
44012015	Amaute in ama kiangah, “A hai hi mai niteh!” a ci uh hi. Hi taktak hi, ci-in a nial teitei ciangin amaute in, “Ama vansawltak hi inteh,” a ci uh hi.
44012016	Ahi hangin Peter in kongkhak kiukiu a, kong a hon uh ciangin amah mu uh a, lamdang a sa mahmah uh hi.
44012017	Peter in amaute a daih nadingun a khut vana, thong sung panin Topa in amah a lakkhiatna zia teng a gen hi. Amah in, “James le sanggamte kiangah hih thu na ko un,” a cih khit ciangin mundang ah a pai hi.
44012018	A zingsang ciangin galkapte lakah patauhna lianpi khat a om hi. Amaute in, “Peter tungah bang thu piang ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
44012019	Herod in kiciantakin amah zonga, a muh loh ciangin thong cingte sittel a, amaute thah dingin thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin, Judea gam panin Caesarea ah Herod pai-a tua lai-ah tawmvei sung a om hi.
44012020	Amah Tyre le Sidon mite tawh a kitawng den ahi hi. Amaute kipawl khawmin amah tawh kihopih a sawm uh hi. Amaute in kumpipa nasem muan pa Blastus panpihna tawh lemna a ngen uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute an ngahna ama kumpipa gam sung bek ahi hi.
44012021	A ni ciam ni ciangin Herod in a kumpi puantual silh-a a kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in, mipite tungah thu a gen hi.
44012022	Amaute in, “Hih aw, mihing aw hi loin Pasian aw ahi hi,” ci-in a awng uh hi.
44012023	Herod in, Pasian phatna pia lo ahi manin Topa vansawltak khat in, amah sattukin than in ne-a a si hi.
44012024	Ahi hangin Pasian thu khangin a kizel semsem hi.
44012025	Barnabas le Saul in a nasep uh a zawh khit uh ciangin Jerusalem panina ciah kik uh a, Mark zong a kici John a tonpih uh hi.
44013001	Antioch a pawlpi sungah kamsangte le thuhilhte: Barnabas, Niger kici Simeon, Cyrene mi Lucius, Manaen (Gam ukpa Herod tawh a khangkhawmpa) le Saul-te a om uh hi.
44013002	Amaute in Topa bia in an a tan laitakun Khasiangtho in, “Amaute ka sapna na a sem dingin Barnabas le Saul hong sehkhiatsak un,” a ci hi.
44013003	Amaute in an tangin thu a nget khit uh ciangin amaute gel tungah a khut uh nga uh a, a sawlkhia uh hi.
44013004	Amaute gel Khasiangtho sawlin Seleucia ah paisuk uh a, tua lai panin Cyprus manawhin tembaw in a tuang uh hi.
44013005	Amaute Salamis a tun uh ciangin, Jew-te synagogue-te ah Pasian thu a tangko uh hi. John zong amaute huh in amau tawh a omkhawm hi.
44013006	Amaute Paphos a tun dongun tua tuikulh tung khempeuh ah a zin kawikawi uh hi. Tua lai-ah dawi-ai tawi-a, kamsang zuau Bar-Jesus kici Jew mi khat om a,
44013007	amah pen gam ukpa Sergius Paulus nasempa ahi hi. Tua gam ukpa a pil mahmah mi khat hi-a Pasian thu za nuam ahi manin, Barnabas le Saul a samsak hi.
44013008	Ahi hangin Elymas dawi-ai tawi pa (tua pen a min khiatna) in amaute na nang a, tua upna panin gam ukpa heikhiat a sawm hi.
44013009	Tua ciangin Paul zong a kici Saul, Khasiangtho tawh kidim a, Elymas en gemgam in,
44013010	"Nang dawimangpa ta khat na hi-a amaan nate khempeuh gal na hi hi! Khemna nam khempeuh le zuautatna tawh na kidim hi. Topa lampi maan na lehheina, tawp ngei lo ding na hi hiam?
44013011	Tu-in Topa khut in nang hong langpan hi. Na mit a taw dinga, hun bang tan hiam khat nitang na mu thei kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Ama tungah thakhatin meiilum le khuamial in tuam a, amah in zawt kawikawi-in a khuta amah kai ding a zongzong hi.
44013012	Gam-ukpa in a piangsa thu a muh ciangin a um hi; ahang in, Topa tawh kisai tua thuhilhna lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
44013013	Paphos panin Pamphylia gama Perga lam manawhin Paul le a pawlte tembaw in tuang uh a, John in amaute tua khua ah nusia-in amah Jerusalem ah a kileh kik hi.
44013014	Perga panin amaute Pisidia gama Antioch ah a paisuak uh hi. Sabbath ni-in amaute synagogue ah lutin a tu uh hi.
44013015	Synagogue ukte in Thukham le Kamsangte laibu pan a sim khit uh ciangin amaute kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, mipite hanthawn nopna thupuak na neih uh leh hehpihna tawh hong gen un,” a ci uh hi.
44013016	Paul ding to-in a khut vana, “No, Pasian a bia Israel-te le Gentile-te aw, ka thugen na ngai un!
44013017	Israel mite’ Pasian in i pate na teeltuama, Egypt a, a om lai-un tua mite na lawhcingsakin ama vangliatna thupi tawh tua gam panin amaute na pikhia hi.
44013018	Kum sawmli sung sehnel-gam ah amau gamtatnaa a thuak keikai hi.
44013019	Amah in Canaan gam sunga minam sagihte lawnthal a, amaute leitang ama mite luah dingin a pia hi.
44013020	Hihte khempeuh a tun nading kum 450 bang sawt hi. “Tua nung ciangin kamsang Samuel hun dong, Pasian in amaute ading thukhente a pia hi.
44013021	Tua ciangin tua mite in kumpi khat ngen uh a, amah in Benjamin beh ahi Kish tapa Saul, amaute a pia hi. Amah in kum sawmli sung a uk hi.
44013022	Saul paikhiat khit ciangin amaute kumpi dingin David a koih hi. Amah tawh kisai-in teci panga, ‘Ka lungsim tawh kituak Jesse tapa David ka mu zo hi; amah in sep dinga ka deih peuhpeuh a sem ding hi,’ ci hi.
44013023	"Pasian in hih mipa suan le khakte panin Israel-te kianga a ciamsa bangin Honpa Jesu a puak hi.
44013024	Jesu a pai ma-in John in, Israel mite khempeuh tungah kisikna le baptisena a hilh hi.
44013025	John in a nasep a zawh kuan in, ‘Kei kua hi-in nong ngaihsun uh hiam? Tua na ngaihsut pa uh ka hi kei hi. Amah ka hi kei a, amah ka nungah hong pai dinga, ama khe dapkhau phel ding nangawnin ka cin kei hi,’ ci hi.
44013026	"Sanggamte, Abraham tate le no Pasian kihta Gentile-te aw, hih hot-khiatna thupuak eite tungah hong kipuak zo hi.
44013027	Jerusalem a mite le a gam-ukte un, Jesu theitel lo napi, Sabbath tenga kisim kamsangte thugente amah mawhpaihna tawh a tangtun uh hi.
44013028	Amaute in sihna ding zahin thukho mu zo lo napi Pilate in a thah nading a ngen uh hi.
44013029	Ama thu a kigelhsa khempeuh a hih kim khit uh ciangin singtung pan lakhia uh a, han sungah a sial uh hi.
44013030	Ahi hangin Pasian in amah misi pan thosak a,
44013031	Galilee pan Jerusalem a, a khual zinpihte in ni tampi sung a mu uh hi. Tu-in i mipihte tungah amaute teci ahi uh hi.
44013032	"Kote in note tunga kong gen uh lungdamna thu: Pasian in i pate tunga a kamciamsa,
44013033	ei amau tate adingin Jesu thawhsaktohna tawh tangtun zo hi. Phatna-late a nihna ah: “‘Nang ka Tapa na hi hi; tuni-in na Pab kong suak hi,’c ci-a kigelhsa bangin,
44013034	a muat ngei nawn lo dinga Pasian in misi pana a thawhsak takpina thu, hih thute: “‘David tunga kamciamsa, a siangtho le a kip thupha nang kong pia ding hi,’d ci-a,
44013035	tua ahi manin mundangah zong, “‘Nang in, nangma Misiangtho Pa na muatsak kei ding hi.’e ci-in kigelh hi.
44013036	"Ahang in, David in ama khan sungin Pasian deihna bangin na a sep khit ciangin a ihmu hi; a pate tawh kivui-a, a pumpi a muat hi.
44013037	Ahi hangin Pasian in misi pana a thawhsak pa ahileh a muat kei hi.
44013038	"Tua ahi manin ka sanggamte aw, Jesu tungtawnin mawhnate maisakna thu note tungah kitangko ahilam na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
44013039	Moses thukham pana dik na tan theih lohnate khempeuh uh, ama tungtawnin a um peuhpeuh in dik tang ta hi.
44013040	Kamsangte gensa no tunga a tun loh nadingin na kikem un; tua in:
44013041	"‘No mizahpih hatte aw en un lamdang sa unla mangthang un; ahang in, mi khatpeuh in hong gen taleh na up ngei loh ding uh na khat, na nuntak sungun ka hih ding hi,’f ci hi,” a ci hi.
44013042	Synagogue panin Paul le Barnabas a ciah uh leh mite in Sabbath ni kik ciangin hih nate thu a ban a genlai dingun a sam uh hi.
44013043	A kikhawm mipite a kikhen uh ciangin Jew mite le Jew-te biakna-a kikhelsa a kipumpiak mahmah mi tampite in Paul le Barnabas a zui uh hi. Amaute in na hopih uh a, Pasian hehpihna sungah kiptaka a om den nadingun a kun uh hi.
44013044	Sabbath ni kik ciangin khuapi bupa mi khempeuh phial Topa thu ngai dingin a kikhawm uh hi.
44013045	Jew-te in mihonpite a muh uh ciangin haza mahmah uh a, Paul thugente langbawlin a siatgen uh hi.
44013046	Tua ciangin Paul le Barnabas in: “Note kiangah Pasian thu kong gen masak ding mah uh ahi hi. Note in tua thu nial a, nuntak tawntungna ngah dingin cing kisa lo na hi nungsangun, tu-in Gentile-te lam ka nga ta uh hi.
44013047	Ahang in, Topa in eite hong thupiak hih ahi hi. “‘Nang in leitung mongte dongin hotkhiatna na puak theih nadingin keimah in nog Gentile-te tungah khuavak ahi dingin kong bawl zo hi,’h ci hi,”i ci-in amaute hangtakin a dawng uh hi.
44013048	Gentile-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungdam mahmah in Topa thu pahtawi uh a, nuntak tawntungna ngah dinga kisehsate khempeuh in a um uh hi.
44013049	Tua kual bup tengah Topa thu a kizel hi.
44013050	Ahi hangin Jew-te in Pasian kihta numei zahtakhuaite le khuapi sunga tangpi makaite a holhthawh uh hi. Amaute in Paul le Barnabas langbawlin a bawlsia ding mi tawsawn uh a, amau kual panin a hawlkhia uh hi.
44013051	Tua ciangin amaute in tua mite a langpanna un a khepekua leivuite singkhia uh a, Iconium ah a pai uh hi.
44013052	Nungzuite, lungnopna le Khasiangtho tawh kidim uh hi. 1Th 2:16
44014001	Iconium a Jew-te synagogue ah Paul le Barnabas a paingei bang un a pai uh hi. Tua-a a thugenna un mi lungsim sukha lua ahi manin Jew-te le Gentile-te tampitak in a um uh hi.
44014002	Ahi hangin a um nuam lo Jew-te in Gentile-te tawsawn uh a, sanggamte langpang dingin a lungsim uh a hihsiatsak uh hi.
44014003	Tua lai-ah amah in Paul le Barnabas lim lamdangte le a lamdangte bawl theisakin ama hehpihna thupuakte a kipsak pa Topa adingin hangtakin thu genin hun sawt khop a zang uh hi.
44014004	Khuapi mite kipawl khen uh a, pawlkhatte Jew-te lamah pangin adangte sawltakpite lamah a pang uh hi.
44014005	Tua lai-ah Gentile-te le Jew-te lakah a makaite uh tawh amaute bawlsiat ding le suanga den ding a sawmsimna uh kipan hi.
44014006	Ahi hangin amaute in tua thu theikhia uh a, Lycaonia khuapite ahi Lystra, Derbe le a kima gamte ah tai-in,
44014007	tua lai-ah lungdamna thu a hilh veve uh hi.
44014008	Lystra ah a suah tunga kipan khebai, lam pai ngei lo khe poi khat a om hi.
44014009	Paul a paupau laitakin amah in thu va ngai hi. Paul in amah tangtakin enin, dam nading upna a neih lam mu a,
44014010	"Na khe in ding in!” a ci hi. Tuateh mipa diangto paha lam a pai hi.
44014011	Mihonte in Paul nasepsate a muh uh ciangin, “Eite kiangah pasiante mihing bangin hong paisuk hi!” ci-in Lycaonia pau-in a kiko uh hi.
44014012	Barnabas pen Zeus ci uh a, Paul pen a thugen makai ahi manin Hermes ci uh hi.
44014013	Khuapi pua mahmah a biakinn nei pa siampi Zeus in khuapi kongpite ah bawngtal le pak kualte a va puak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah le mihonpite in amau tungah biakpiakna pia nuam uh hi.
44014014	Ahi hangin sawltakpi Barnabas le Paul-te in a zak uh ciangin a puansilh lai uh balkek uh a, mihonpite lakah tai-in a kiko uh hi.
44014015	"Mite aw, bang hangin hih bawl na hi uh hiam? Kote zong no mah bangin mihing lel ka hi uh hi. Kote in lungdamna thu no hong puakin, hih kimanna a nei lo nate panin, van le lei le tuipi le tuate sunga omte a bawl a nungta Pasian lama na kihei ding uh hong gen ka hi uh hi.
44014016	Amah in a beisa hunin, minam khempeuh amau ut bangbangin gamtasak hi.
44014017	Tua hi napi teci panna om loin amaute a mawk nusiat kei hi: vantung pana guah le amau hun ciata, a gah an pia-in a migitna hong lak hi. An tampi-in hong vaka, na lungtang uh lungnop na tawh a dimsak hi,” a ci uh hi.
44014018	Hih thute nangawn tawh amaute tunga kithoihna bawl ding mihonte a kham zo kei dektak uh hi.
44014019	Tua ciangin Antioch le Iconium panin Jew-te pawlkhat va pai uh a, mihonte a thu zawh uh hi. Amaute in suangin Paul deng uh a, a sisa in ngaihsunin khuapi pua-ah a talkaihkhia uh hi.
44014020	Ahi hangin ama kimkotah nungzuite a kikhop khit uh ciangin amah tho-a khuapi sungah a lut kik hi. A zing ciangin amah le Barnabas Derbe ah a pai uh hi.
44014021	Tua khuapi ah amaute in lungdamna thu hilh uh a, nungzui tampitak a ngah uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute Lystra, Iconium le Antioch ah ciah kikin
44014022	nung zuite thakhauhsak uh a, upna-ah thutakin a om den nading uh a hanthawn uh hi. Amaute in, “Pasian gam i lut nadingin haksatna tampi i thuak ding mah ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
44014023	Amau pawlpi tekah Paul le Barnabas in upate sehsaka uh a, a muante uh thungetna le antanna tawh Topa tungah a ap uh hi.
44014024	Pisidia gam sung tawna a pai khit uh ciangin Pamphylia tung uh a,
44014025	Perga ah thu a gen khit uh ciangin Attalia ah paisuk uh hi.
44014026	Attalia panin a zawh khitsa uh nasepte sem dinga, Pasian hehpihna sunga a ki-apna uh Antioch ah tembaw in a ciah kik uh hi.
44014027	Tua lai a tun uh ciangin amaute in pawlpi teng kai khawm uh a, amaute tungtawna Pasian nasepnate khempeuh le Gentile-te tungah upna kong a kihon takpinate a zasak uh hi.
44014028	Tua lai ah nungzuite tawh sawt veipi a taam uh hi.
44015001	Judea gam panin Antioch ah mi pawlkhat paisuk uh a, “Moses hong hilh ngeina tawh kizui-in vun na at kei uh leh note hong kihonkhia thei lo ding hi,” ci-in sanggamte a hilh uh hi.
44015002	Hih thu in Paul le Barnabas tawh amaute nakpi-a kinialna le kiselna a piangsak hi. Tua ciangin Paul le Barnabas sehin adang thu-um pawlkhat tawh, hih thu tawh kisai-a sawltakpite le upate tawh kimu dingin Jerusalem ah a paitosak uh hi.
44015003	Pawlpite in lampi-ah kha uh a, Phoenicia le Samaria gamte tawna a zin kawmun Gentile-te kikhelna zia a gen uh hi. Hih thuthak in sanggamte khempeuh a nuamsak mahmah hi.
44015004	Amaute Jerusalem a tun uh ciangin pawlpite, sawltakpite le upate in na dawn uh a, amaute in amau tungtawna Pasian nasepnate a zasak uh hi.
44015005	Tua ciangin Pharisee-te pawl lakah thu-umte pawlkhat dingin, “Gentile-te, vun-atsakin Moses thukham pelloin zuihsak ding ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
44015006	Sawltakpite le upate hih thute kikum dingin a kikhawm uh hi.
44015007	Tampitak a kikup khit uh ciangin Peter ding to a, “Sang gamte aw, a beisa tawlkhat lai-in Gentile-te in keima kam panin lungdamna thupuak za uh a, a up theih nadingun note lak panin Pasian in hong teelkhia cih na thei uh hi.
44015008	Mihing lungtang sung a thei, Pasian in amaute a sanna hong lahna-in eite hong piak bang tektek, amaute Khasiangtho a pia hi.
44015009	Amah in amau lungtangte, upna tawh siansuah khin ahi manin eite le amaute hong deidan lo hi.
44015010	Tua bang ahileh eite le i pate in i puak zawh loh hakkol nungzuite ngawngah suanin Pasian zia-et ding i hi hiam?
44015011	Hi lo! Amaute mah bangin eite zong i Topa Jesu hong hehpihna tungtawnin i suakta cih i um hi,” ci-in thu a gen hi.
44015012	Barnabas le Paul in amaute tung tawna Pasian in Gentile-te laka lim lamdang le a lamdang a bawlte a gen laitakun, a kikhawm khempeuh thungai-in a sip dide uh hi.
44015013	Amaute a man khit uh ciangin James in, “Sanggamte aw, ka thugen na ngai un.
44015014	Pasian in ama mi mahmah dingin Gentile-te lak pan pawlkhat a lakna in, amaute bangci awlmawh hiam cih a masa penin hong lak zo hi, cih eite kiangah Simona in hong telgen zo hi.
44015015	Kamsangte thugente hih tawh kituak hi:
44015016	“‘Tua khit ciangin kong kileh kik dinga a puksa David puanbuk ka lam kik ding hi. A kisiasa ka lam kik dinga, ka puahthak ding hi.
44015017	A mangthang baang’ mite le ka min a suang Gentile-te khempeuh in, Topa a zon theih nading ci-in hih nate khempeuh a hih pa Topa in a gen hi,’b
44015018	khanghunte khempeuhin tuate kithei khin zo hi, ‘c ci-in kigelh hi.
44015019	"Tua ahi manin Pasian lama hong kihei Gentile-te adingin haksatna i bawl loh ding ka thupukna ahi hi.
44015020	I bawl sangsikin amaute lai khakin, milim biakna in a nitsak ante, numei-pasal paktatna, ngawng heklupte sate le sisante a tan dingun hilh zaw ni.
44015021	Ahang in, amasapen hunlai-a kipan khuapi khempeuh ah Moses in a hilhsa hi-a Sabbath ni simin synagogue-te sungah a kisimsimsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44015022	Tua ciangin sawltakpite le upate in pawlpi bup tawh, amau mite pawlkhat teeltuam ding le Paul le Barnabas tawh Antioch ah sawl dingin thu a khensat uh hi. Amaute in sanggamte laka makai (Barsabbas kici) Judas le Silas mi nih a teel uh hi.
44015023	Amaute in a nuai-a bangin lai a puasak uh hi: Sawltakpite le upate, na sanggamte un, Antioch, Syria le Cilicia a om thu-um Gentile-te tungah: Kong hopih uh hi.
44015024	Kote in thuneihna ka piak loh pi un, ko kiang pan mi pawlkhat hong pai-in a thugen un na lungsim uh hong buaisaka, amau thugente in hong lungzingsak cih ka za uh hi.
44015025	Tua ahi ciangin kote khempeuh in mi pawlkhat teelkhia-in i lawm itte Barnabas le Paul tawh no kianga sawl khawm dingin ka thukim uh hi.
44015026	Amaute i Topa Jesu Khrist min hanga a nuntakna a pia ngamte ahi uh hi.
44015027	Tua ahi manin lai-a kong gelhte uh a kam uh tawh a kipsak dingin Judas le Silas kong sawl uh hi.
44015028	A kisam a nuai-a kigente simloh a dang bangmah no tungah kong suat loh ding uh, Khasiangtho le kote in hoih ka sa uh hi:
44015029	Milimte thoihna ante, sisan, ngawngheklup ganhingte sa, le numei-pasal paktatna na tang ding uh hi. Hih nate pelh le uh cin a hoiha gamta na hi ding uh hi. Mangpha.
44015030	Tua mite sawlkhia uh a, amaute Antioch ah paisukin, tua lai-a pawlpite kaikhawm uh a, laikhak a pia uh hi.
44015031	Mipite in sim uh a, hanthawnna thupuak hangin a nuam mahmah uh hi.
44015032	Amau mahmah zong kamsang ahi Judas le Silas-te in sanggamte tungah hanthawnna kam tampitak genin a thakhauhsak uh hi.
44015033	Tua lai-ah tawlkhat sung a taam khit uh ciangin sanggamte in, lemna thupha tawh amaute a sawlte kiangah a ciahkiksak uh hi.
44015034	Ahi hangin Silas in tua lai-a taam lai dingin a khensat hi.d
44015035	Ahi hangin Antioch ah Paul le Barnabas taam lai uh a, tua lai-ah amaute le midang tampi sinsakin Topa thu a hilh uh hi.
44015036	Tua zawh tawmvei khit ciangin Paul in Barnabas kiangah, “Topa thu i gennasa khuapi khempeuh ah pai kikin, sang gamte kiangah hawhin, amaute bang a ci uh hiam, va en ni” a ci hi.
44015037	Barnabas in Mark zong a kici John tonpih nuam a,
44015038	ahi hangin Paul in amah tonpih ding hoih a sa kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Pamphylia gamah amaute na taisan a, amaute tawh na a sem zom kei hi.
44015039	Amaute nasiatakin kithutuak lo uh a, a kipawlkhen uh hi. Barnabas in Mark tonpih a, tembaw tuangin Cyprus ah pai uh a,
44015040	ahi hangin Paul in Silas teela, sanggamte in Topa hehpihna ah a ap khit uh ciangin a kuankhia uh hi.
44015041	Pawlpite thakhauhsakin amah Syria le Cilicia tawnin a pai hi.
44016001	Derbe ah amah tunga, tua khit ciangin nungzui Timothy tenna Lystra a tung hi. Timothy nu, thu um Jew mi hi-a a pa Greek mi ahi hi.
44016002	Lystra le Iconium a sanggamte in amah phat mahmah uh hi.
44016003	Paul in a khualzinna ah amah tonpih nuam ahi manin a vun a atsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua huam a tengte Jew-te vive hi-a, a pa Greek mi ahilam a theih khitsa uh ahi hi.
44016004	Amaute khuapi khat pan khuapi khatah zin uh a, Jerusalem a sawltakpite le upate in mite zuih dinga thukhensatna a bawlsate uh a gen kawikawi uh hi.
44016005	Tua hi-a pawlpite upna ah kithakhauhsakin nisimin mi a kibehlap hi.
44016006	Paul le a lawmte Phrygia le Galatia kual khempeuh ah zin kawikawi uh a, Asia gama thu a hilh ding uh Khasiangtho in a phal kei hi.
44016007	Mysia tawh gamgi a tun uh ciangin amaute, Bithynia ah lut sawm uh a, ahi hangin Jesu’ Kha in amaute a pai ding uh a phal kei hi.
44016008	Tua ciangin Mysia khengin Troas ah a paisuk uh hi.
44016009	Zan laitakin Paul in Macedonia gam mi khat dingin, “Macedo-nia ah hong galkah unla, ko hong huh un,” ci-a gen khat a mangin a mu hi.
44016010	Paul in mang a muh khit ciangin Pasian in eite amau kianga lungdamna-thu hilh dingin hong deih hi, ci-a Macedonia a pai dingin a kithawi pah uh hi.
44016011	Troas panin tuipi tungah tembaw in Samothrace zuanin tangtakin ka pai uh a, a zing ciangin Neapolis ka tung uh hi.
44016012	Tua lai panin Macedonia khuapi khen sunga a lian pen Rome pemtate tenna khua ahi, Philippi ka tung uh hi. Tua lai ah sawt veipi ka taam uh hi.
44016013	Sabbath ni-in khuapi kongpi pualam ah paikhia-in thunget nading mun om a ka lametna uh gungei-ah ka pai uh hi. Tua lai-a a na kikhawmsa numeite tungah thu ka gen uh hi.
44016014	Tua thungaite lakah Lydia min nei, Thyatira khuapi pana puan dupsan zuak Pasian a bia numei khat a om hi. Topa in Paul thupuak sang dingin a lungsim a honsak hi.
44016015	Amah le a innkuanpihte a kibaptise khit uh ciangin a inn ah kote hong sam hi. Amah in, “Kei, Topa a um khat hi, ci-a nong sim uh leh hong pai-in ka inn ah hong taam un,” a ci hi. Tua ci-in kote hong zol zo ta hi.
44016016	Khat vei thungetna muna ka pai laitakun dawi lawmnei-a mailam thu a genkhol thei sila numeino khat ka tuak uh hi. Amah in mailam thu genkholin, amah a neite ading sum tampitak a thalawhsak hi.
44016017	Hih numeino in Paul le ko adangte hong zui a, “Na suahtak nading uh lampi hong gen hih mite Sang pen Pasian nasemte ahi uh hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
44016018	Hih bangin amah in ni tampi sung a hih den hi. A tawpna ah Paul in nawngkai sa mahmah a kihei-in tua kha kiangah, “Ama sung pan paikhia dingin Jesu Khrist minin thu kong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua hun lianin kha in tuanu a nusia hi.
44016019	Tua silanu a neite in a sum muhna uh bei ta cih a theih uh ciangin Paul le Silas man uh a, thuneite mai-a ding dingin vanzuakna mun sumbuk tualah a kaigawp uh hi.
44016020	Amaute in thukhen mangte mai-ah amaute puak uh a, “Hih mite Jew-te hi uh a, ka khuapi uh a tokbuai gawp uh hi.
44016021	Tua pen, ko Rome mite san le zuih dinga ngeina tawh kituak lo hong hilh hang uh ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
44016022	Paul le Silas langah mihonpite pang uh a, thukhen mangte in amaute puan hawkkhiatsakin satsak dingin thu a pia uh hi.
44016023	Amaute nakpi-a, a kisat khit ciangin thong sungah kikhum a, limtaka a cin ding in thong cingpa thu a pia uh hi.
44016024	Tua bang thupiaknate a ngah bangin amaute thong sungnung pen ah khuma, a khete ah kol a bulh hi.
44016025	Zankim pawlin Paul le Silas in, Pasian kiangah thu ngenin biakna late sa uh a, thongkia dangte in a ngai uh hi.
44016026	Thakhatin zin nakpi-in linga, thong inn bulpi a kilok hi. Thakhatin thong kong khak khempeuh kihonga, mi khempeuh kikhihna sik khainiang khempeuh kitolkhia hi.
44016027	Thong cingpa khanglo a thong kongkhakte kihongsa a om a muh ciangin, thongkiate suakta khin hi ci-a ngaihsun ahi manin a namsau dokin amah le amah thah a kisawm hi,
44016028	Ahi hangin Paul in, “Bangmah kicih kei in! Kote ka vekun hiah ka om uh hi!” ci-in a kiko hi.
44016029	Thong cingpa in meivaksakin a sungah lut pah a, Paul le Silas-te mai-ah ling kawmin a bok hi.
44016030	Tua ciangin amah in amaute paikhiatpih a, “Pute aw, hong kihotkhiat nadingin bang ka hih ding kul hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
44016031	Amaute in, “Topa Jesu um un, nang le na innkuanpihte hong kihonkhia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
44016032	Tua ciangin amaute in amah le a inn sunga om adangte khempeuh tungah Topa thu a genpih uh hi.
44016033	Tua zan hunpi mah in thong cingpa in amaute paipih a, a liamnate uh silsakin amah le a innkuanpihte khempeuh a kibaptise uh hi.
44016034	Thong cingpa in a inn ah paipih a, amaute an lui-in, Pasian um ta uh ahi manin a innkuan bupun lungnopna tawh kidim uh hi.
44016035	Khuavak ciangin thukhen mangte in thong cingpa kiangah a bupate uh sawlin, “Tua mite khahkhia in,” cih thupiak tawh a paisak uh hi.
44016036	Thong cingpa in Paul kiangah, “Thukhen mangte in nang le Silas khahkhiat ding thu hong pia zo uh hi. Na pai thei ta uh hi. Lungnuamtakin pai ta un,” ci-in a gen hi.
44016037	Ahi hangin Paul in uliante kiangah, “Kote Rome mi hi napi thudotna om loin mipi mai-ah hong satin thong sungah hong khum uh hi. Tua hi napi tu-in sim khahkhiat hong sawm uh ahi hiam? Hi thei peuhmah lo ding hi! Amaute mahmah hong pai-in kote hong tonpihkhia ta uh hen,” a ci hi.
44016038	Uliante in hih thu thukhen mangte kiangah tun uh a, amaute in Paul le Silas, Rome mi ahilam a theih uh ciangin a patau uh hi.
44016039	Amaute lungkimsak dingin va pai uh a, thong sung pan tonpihkhia in khuapi a nusiat nadingun a ngen uh hi.
44016040	Paul le Silas thong sung pan a paikhiat khit uh ciangin Lydia inn ah a pai uh hi. Tua lai-ah sanggamte tawh kimu-in amaute a hanthawn uh hi. Tua ciangin a paikhia uh hi.
44017001	Amaute Amphipolis le Apollonia nawkin a pai uh ciangin Jew-te kikhopna innpi omna Thessalonica a tung uh hi.
44017002	Ama ngeina bangin synagogue sungah Paul pai a, Laisiangtho pansanin Sabbath ni thum sung amaute thu a kikuppih hi.
44017003	Khrista in thuak in, misi pan a thawh ding mah a hihna zia teltakin genin a lak hi. Amah in, “Note tunga kong tangko hih Jesu, Khristb ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44017004	Jew-te pawlkhat kithuzawha Paul le Silas a pawl uh hi; tua mah bangin Pasian kihta Greek-te tampitak le a kipi-et numei a tawm het lo in a pawl uh hi.
44017005	Ahi hangin Jew-te in haza uh a, vanzuakna muna migilo pawlkhat kaikhawmin khuapi sungah mipi khawm uh a, ngongtatna a pan uh hi. Amaute Jason innah lut henhan uh a, mihontec lak pan kaihkhiat dingin Paul le Silas a zong uh hi.
44017006	Ahi hangin amaute a muh loh uh ciangin Jason le sanggamte pawlkhat kaigawpin khuapi vaihawm uliante mai-ah tun uh a, “Leitung khempeuhah buaina bawl hih mite hih lai hong tung uh a,
44017007	Jason in amaute a innah a tungsak hi. Amaute khempeuh in Caesar thukipte thusim loin, ‘Jesu kici adang kumpi khat om hi,’ ci uh hi,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
44017008	Mihonpite le khuapi vaihawm uliante in hih thu a zak uh ciangin a pumbuai gawp uh hi.
44017009	Tua ciangin Jason le adangte kitatna piasakin a khah uh hi.
44017010	Khuamial tungin sanggamte in Berea ah Paul le Silas a khakhia pah uh hi. Tua lai a tun uh ciangin Jew-te synagogue ah amaute a pai uh hi.
44017011	Thessalonica mite sangin Berea mite nampi tat zaw uh hi. Ahang in, lawptakiin thupuak sang uh a, Paul thugente amaan mah ahi hiam, ci-in nisimin Laisiangtho a encian uh hi.
44017012	Jew mi tampi in um uh a, tua mah bangin a kipi-et Greek numei honkhat le Greek pasal tampi in zong a um uh hi.
44017013	Thessalonica a Jew-te in Berea ah Paul in Pasian thu a hilh lam a theih uh ciangin tua lai-ah zong va pai uh a, mihonpite tawsawnin a kitomsak uh hi.
44017014	Sanggamte in tuipi gei-ah Paul sawlkhia pah uh a, ahi hangin Silas le Timothy Berea ah a tam lai uh hi.
44017015	Amaute in Athen dong va kha uh a, Paul in Silas le Timothy in a manlang theithei-a, a nungdelh nading uh thu puasak in a ciahsak kik hi.
44017016	Paul in amaute ngaka Athen a, a om sungin tua khuapi milimte tawh a kidim mu-a, a lungdong lua mahmah hi.
44017017	Tua ciangin synagogue sungah Jew-te le Pasian kihta Greek-te thu kuppih a, tua mah bangin vanzuakna munah nisima a omkha peuhpeuh a kikuppih hi.
44017018	Epicurea le Stoic thuguizuihte honkhat amah tawh a kisel uh hi. Amaute pawlkhat in, “Hih kam theipa in bang gen nuam ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Paul in lungdamna thu ahi Jesu thu le thawhkikna thu hilh ahi manin a dangte in, “Amah in gamdang pasiante a gum hileh kilawm,” a ci uh hi.
44017019	Tua ciangin amaute in amah Areopagus thu kikupna ah paipih uh a, tua lai-ah, “Tu-a na hilh thuhilhna thak ko ka thei thei ding uh hiam?
44017020	Zak ngei loh ngaihsutna pawlkhat nong zasak a, tuate bang cihnopna hiam, ka thei nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44017021	(Athen mite le tualai-a teng gamdang mi khempeuh in bangmah dang sem loin a nunung pen ngaihsutna thak peuhpeuh ngai-in tua thu bek genna in a hun uh a zang uh hi.)
44017022	Tua ciangin Areopagus thukikupna ah Paul ding to a, “No Athen mite’ lam khempeuh ah na biakna-mi uh cih ka mu hi.
44017023	Ahang in, pai kawikawi-a, na biak uh nate ka vel leh biakna-tau khat ah: THEIHLOH PASIAN ADING, ci-a kigelh ka mu hi. Tu-in note in na theih loh uh na biak uh, note tungah kong tangko ding hi.
44017024	"Leitung le a sunga om na khempeuh a bawl Pasian, van le lei Topa hi-a khut tawh kilam biakinnpite ah a teng kei hi.
44017025	Amah in kisapna khat peuhpeuh a nei bangin mihing khuta na a kisepsak hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah mah in mite khempeuh nuntakna le huu le adang khempeuh a pia hi.
44017026	Mi khat panin mihing nam kim bawla, amaute leitung bup a luahsak hi. Amaute ading hunte sehsaka, amaute ten nading mun ciat a sehsak hi.
44017027	Eite tek kiang panin Pasian gamla lo hi napi, mihingte in amah zonga, zama, a muh khak zenzen leh cih deihna in hihte a hih ahi hi.
44017028	’Ahang in, ama sungah eite nungta-in, i tanga mihing hina i nei hi. Na la phuahte uh pawlkhat ah, ‘Eite ama suan ama khak i hi hi,’ ci hi.
44017029	"Tu ahi ciangin eite Pasian suan le khak i hi khit nungsang khutsiamte in a zep uh kham, ngun ahikeh suang tawh kibawl milim a bang dingin a pasian-hina i ngaihsut ding hi lo hi.
44017030	Pasian in a beisa hunin tua bang khuaphawklohna a kimuh-mawhbawl hangin tu-in amah in mun khempeuhah mi khempeuh a kisik dingin thu pia zo hi.
44017031	Ahang in, amah in a sehkholhsa mipa zangin thumaan tawh leitung mi khempeuh thu a khen ni ding sehkhol khin zo hi. Hih thu amaanna mi khempeuh tungah a lahna-in, amah misi pan a thokiksak hi,” a ci hi.
44017032	Amaute in misi thawhkikna thu a zak uh ciangin pawlkhat in zahpih uh a, ahi hangin adangte in, “Hih thu tungtang na gen ka za kik nuam uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44017033	Tua laitakin Paul in tua kikhawmte a nusia hi.
44017034	Mi tawmkhat in Paul nung zuisuak uh a, a um uh hi. Amaute lakah Areopagus a pawl mi Dionysius le Damaris kici numei khat le adang tampi zong ahi uh hi.
44018001	Hih teng khit ciangin Athen nusia in Corinth ah Paul a pai hi.
44018002	Tua lai-ah Pontus gammi Aquila kici Jew mi khat tawh a kituak hi. Amah, Jew-te khempeuh in Rome nusia dinga Claudius in thu a piakna hanga Italy pana a zi Priscilla tawh hun sawt nai lo-a a tung uh ahi hi. Amaute tawh kimu dingin Paul a pai hi.
44018003	Bang hang hiam cih leh amah amaute banga puanbuk bawlpa ahi manin amaute kiangah taamin na semkhawm uh hi.
44018004	Sabbath ni simin Jew-te le Greek-te zol sawmin synagogue sungah thu a kikuppih hi.
44018005	Macedonia panin Silas le Timothy a tun uh ciangin Paul amahmah thuhilhna bekah kipumpiak a, Jew-te kiangah, “Jesu in Khrista hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.
44018006	Ahi hangin Jew-te in Paul sel uh a, a selpho uh ciangin amaute a langpan dingin a puante singkhia a, amaute kiangah, “Na sisan uh nomau lutungah tu ta hen! Ka tavuan ah ka siang zo hi. Tu-a kipan Gentile-te kiangah ka pai ta ding hi,” a ci hi.
44018007	Tua ciangin Paul in synagogue nusia a, tua inn zoma om Pasian bia pa khat Titus Justus inn ah a lut hi.
44018008	Synagogue ukpa Crispus le a innkuan pihte khempeuh in Topa um uh a, ama thu a za Corinth mite tampi in umin a kibaptise uh hi.
44018009	Zan khat Paul mangmuhna sungah Topa in hopih a: “Kihta kei in, na gen ban zom in, dai tuan kei in.
44018010	Nang tawh omkawm ka hi manin kuamah in nang hong doin hong liamsuah lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih khuapi sungah mi tampi ka nei hi,” a ci hi.
44018011	Tua ciangin Paul, kum khat le alang sung om a, amaute Pasian thu a hilh hi.
44018012	Gallio, Achaia-a gam-ukpa ahi laitakin Jew-te kipawlkhawmin Paul va busim uh a, thukhen zumah a tun uh hi. Amaute in,
44018013	"Hih mipa in thukham tawh kileh bulhin Pasian bia dingin mite a zol hi,” ci-in a ngawh uh hi.
44018014	Paul a pau dektak laitakin Gallio in Jew-te kiangah, “No Jew-te in a kilawm lo gamtatna ahikeh khialhna lian thu hong gen hi le uh cin na thu uh, thu-in kisang thei ding hi.
44018015	Ahi hangin nomau thukham tawh kisai kammalte le minte thu hanga piang ahi manin no le no mah in na siangsak un. Tua bang thute a khen in ka pang kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
44018016	Tua ciangin thukhen zum panin amaute a hawlkhiasak hi.
44018017	Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh in synagogue ukpa Sosthene bawhhuan uh a, thukhen zum mai-ah a sat uh hi. Ahi hangin Gallio in a awlmawh kei hi.
