44018018	Corinth ah tawm vei sung Paul a taam lai hi. Tua ciangin sanggamte nusia in Priscilla le Aquila tonpih a Syria ah tembaw-in a pai uh hi. Amah in kiciam nasa khat a neih manin tembaw tung a tuan ma-in Cenchrea ah a sam a metmaisak hi.
44018019	Amaute Ephesus tung uh a, tua lai-ah Paul in Priscilla le Aquila a nusia hi. Amah ahileh synagogue ah pai-a Jew-te thu a kikuppih hi.
44018020	Hun tamzaw a zat ding a nget uh ciangin amah in a sel hi.
44018021	Ahi hangin a nusiat ding ciangin, “Pasian deihna ahileh kong pai kik ding hi,” ci-in a kamciam hi. Tua ciangin Ephesus panin tembaw tuangin a dingkhia hi.
44018022	Caesarea a tun uh ciangin paito-in pawlpite va hopih a, tua ciangin Antioch ah a paisuk hi.
44018023	Antioch ah hun sawtkhop a zat khit ciangin tua lai pan Paul kipankhia kik a, Galatia le Phrygia kual mun khat khit mun khatah zin kawikawi-in, nungzuite khempeuh a va thakhauhsak hi.
44018024	Tua hun sungin Alexandria khua mi Apollos kici Jew mi khat Ephesus ah a pai hi. Amah theihna sang khat hi-a, Laisiangtho theih mahmah tawh a thuah hi.
44018025	Amah Topa lampi lama kihilh ngiingeisa hi-a, John baptisena bek a thei hi napi, Jesu thu tawh kisai siangtakin hilha, lawptakinb thu a gen hi.
44018026	Amah, synagogue sungah hangtakin a pau ngam hi. Priscilla le Aquila in a thu gen a zak uh ciangin a innuah sam uh a, ama tungah Pasian lampi thu a kimzawin a hilh cian uh hi.
44018027	Achaia-a Apollos a pai nop ciangin sanggamte in amah hanthawn uh a, tua lai-a om nungzuite in amah a na muak nadingun lai a khak uh hi. Amah a tun ciangin hehpihna hanga a um mite adingin amah a phatuam pha mahmah hi.
44018028	Ahang in, mipi laka thu kinialnate ah amah in Jesu in Khrist hi, ci-in Laisiangtho panin Jew-te a dongkhak giapgiap hi.
44019001	Corinth ah Apollos a om laitakin gam sung lamzikpi zui in Paul zina, Ephesus a tung hi. Tua lai-ah nungzuite pawlkhat mu a, amaute kiangah,
44019002	"Na up uh ciangina Khasiangtho na ngah uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Ka ngah kei uh hi, Khasiangtho a om lam nangawn ka za ngei nai kei uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
44019003	Tua ciangin Paul in, “Tua ahileh bang baptisena na ngah uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “John baptisena” a ci uh hi.
44019004	Paul in, “John baptisena pen kisikna hanga baptisena ahi hi. Amah in mipite kiangah ama nunga paipa a up dingun hilha, tua pen Jesu um ding cihna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44019005	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Topa Jesu min sungahb a kibaptise uh hi.
44019006	Paul in amaute tungah a khut a ngak ciangin amaute tungah Khasiangtho tunga pautec in pau-in thu a gen uh hi.
44019007	Tua mite a vekpi un sawm-le-nih bang a pha uh hi.
44019008	Synagogue sungah Paul luta, mi lungsim a zo theithei dingin Pasian gam thu kiselin, hangtakin kha thum sung tua lai-ah thu a gen hi.
44019009	Ahi hangin amaute pawlkhat phengphi uh a, um nuam loin mipi mai-ah Lampi thu a gensia uh hi. Tua ciangin Paul in amaute a nusia hi. Amah in nungzuite paikhiatpih a, Tyrannus-te thugenna innpi sungah nisimin thu a kikuppih hi.
44019010	Asia gam sunga teng Jew-te le Greek-te khempeuh in Topa thu a zak nadingun hih bangin kum nih sung a hih hi.
44019011	Pasian in Paul tungtawnin a lam dang tuan nalamdangte a bawl hi.
44019012	Paul tawh a kisukhasa mainul neute le angtuamte, cinate kiangah a kitawi ciangin a natnate uh damin, kha gilote in amaute a nusia uh hi.
44019013	Kha gilote hawlkhia-a, a vak kawi kawi Jew-te pawlkhat in dawilut mite tungah Topa Jesu min zangin kha gilote hawlkhiat a sawm uh hi. Amaute in, “Paul in a thu a hilhpa Jesu minin na paikhiat ding thu kong pia hi,” khawng a ci uh hi.
44019014	Hih banga a hihte, Jew siampi makai khat Sceva tapa sagihte ahi uh hi.
44019015	Ni khat tua kha gilo in amaute tungah, “Jesu ka thei a, Paul thu zong ka thei hi, no kua na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
44019016	Tua ciangin kha gilo lutna mipa amaute tungah diang gawpa, a vekpi un a zogawp hi. Amah in amaute nakpi-in vua a, guaktangin sisan luang sa-in a taikhia uh hi.
44019017	Ephesus a teng Jew-te le Greek-te in hih thu a theih uh ciangin lau uh a, Topa Jesu min nakpitakin a zahtak uh hi.
44019018	A umte tampi hong pai uh a, a gitloh gamtatnate uh a pulakkhia khin uh hi.
44019019	Dawi-ai tawi mi honkhat in a laizialte uh kaikhawm uh a mipite muhin a haltum uh hi. Tua laizialte aman a seh uh ciangin a vekpi in drachmasd tul sawmnga man hi.
44019020	Hih bangin Topa thu zaipitakin kizela, a vangliatna a khang hi.
44019021	Hihte khempeuh a pian khit nungin Paul in Macedonia le Achaia-a nawkin Jerusalem ah pai ding a khensat hi. Amah in, “Tua lai ka tun khit ciangin Rome ah zong ka hawh kul hi,” ci hi.
44019022	Amah a huhte nih, Timothy le Erastus, Macedonia ah sawl a, amah tawmvei sung Asia gamah a taam lai hi.
44019023	Tua hun pawlin Lampi thu tawh kisai buaina lianpi khat a piang hi.
44019024	Ngun seek Demetrius min nei khat oma, tuapa in ngun tawh, Artemis biakbuknote bawla, khutsiamte adingin sumzuakna neu het lo khat a suaksak hi.
44019025	Amah in amau sep bang a semte le sumbawlna-a a neite khempeuh samkhawm in, “Guaite aw, hih sum bawlna panin sum tampitak hong tum hi, cih na thei uh hi.
44019026	Tua hi-a hih mipa Paul in Ephesus le Asia gam bupah mi tampitak thuzawha, a pimang zia mu-in na za zo uh hi. Amah in, ‘Mihing bawltawm pasiante Pasian hi peuhmah lo hi,’ ci hi.
44019027	I sumbawlna a minsiat ding a lauhuai bek tham loin alian numei Artemis biakinnpi zong kithusim loin Asia gam le leitung bup khempeuh-a kibia nusian mahmah kiminsiasaka a pasian thupina teng a kisuh ding lauhuai hi,” a ci hi.
44019028	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin lungso uh a, “Ephesus-te Artemis alian hi!” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
44019029	Khuapi sung bup a so pah henhan hi. Mipite in Macedonia pana Paul khualzinpihte, Gaius le Aristarchus man uh a, limlahna inn sungah khekhatkhai bangin a lut henhan uh hi.
44019030	Mihonpite mai-ah Paul kilaak nuama, ahi hangin a nungzuite in a phal kei uh hi.
44019031	Paul lawmte, tua gam uliante pawlkhat nangawn in tua limlahna inn sungah a va kilai-phum loh nadingin thumin thu a khak uh hi.
44019032	Tua-a kikhawmte pumbuai gawp uh a, pawlkhat in thu khat genin, adang pawlkhat in thu dang khat mah gen uh a, a kiko uh hi. Mi a tamzaw thamte, amau bang hanga tua lai-a om uh hiam, cih nangawn a kithei kei uh hi.
44019033	Jew-te in amai lamah Alexander sawn uh a, mihonpite pawlkhat amah lamlakin a kiko uh hi. Amah in mipite mai-ah a kiphelhna thu a gen theih nadingin a daih nading uh a khut a van hi.
44019034	Ahi hangin amah Jew mi hi, cih a theihcian uh ciangin amaute khempeuh kithukhat in, “Ephesus-te Artemis a lian hi!” ci-in nai nih sung bang a kiko uh hi.
44019035	Khuapi lai-atpa in mihonpite daisak a: “Ephesus mite aw, Ephesus khuapi in a lian Artemis biakinnpi le van pana hong kia tuanu lim a kem ahilam leitung bupin a theihsa hi lo ahi hiam?
44019036	Tua ahi manin hih thute nial theih nading a om lo ahi khit nungsang daitakin om a, na gamhtat loh ding uh ahi hi.
44019037	Hih mite in eite nusian gendai loin i biakinnpi lah luh lo napi hih lai-ah nong tun zo uh hi.
44019038	Demetrius le ama khutsiampihte in mi khatpeuh tungah lungkimlohna nei uh ahileh thukhenna innte honsa in om a, gam-ukte lah om uh hi. Amaute in ngawhna thu a bawl thei uh hi.
44019039	Tua lo adang thu puaktoh nop lai na neih uh leh a ngeina om bangin kikhopna ah a kisiansak kul ding hi.
44019040	Tuni-a thupiangte hangin a ngongtat a hong kingawh khak ding lauhuai hi. Hih thu tungtang ah siksan ding thukho i neih loh nungsang hih banga buaina bawl kei ni,” a ci hi.
44019041	Hih teng a gen khit ciangin tua-a kikhawm teng a kikhensak hi.
44020001	Tua buaina a ven ciangin Paul in nungzuite samsaka, amaute a hanthawn khit ciangin mangpha khaka, Macedonia a pai dingin a dingkhia hi.
44020002	Amah tua huam tengah zin kawikawi-a, mite kiangah hanthawnna thu tampi genin a tawpna-ah Greek a tung hi.
44020003	Tua lai-ah kha thum a taam hi. Syria gam zuana tembaw tawh pai a sawm hi napi Jew-te in thah a sawsim manin Macedonia tawna ciah kik dingin a khensat hi.
44020004	Berea panin Pyrrhus tapa Sopater, Thessalonica panin Aristarchus, Secundus, Derbe panin Gaius le Timothy zong, Asia gam panin Tychicus le Trophimus-te in a zui uh hi.
44020005	Hih mite na mapai uh a, Troas ah kote hong ngak uh hi.
44020006	Ahi hangin Silngo-sawhloh Anlum Pawi khit ciangin Philippi panin tembaw in ka tuang uh a, ni nga khit ciangin Troas ah ka lawmte uh pha in tua lai-ah ni sagih ka taam khawm uh hi.
44020007	Nipikal ni masa pen ni-in anlum balkham dingin ka kikhawm uh hi. Paul in mite kiangah thu gena, a zing ciangin paisan sawm ahi manin zankim dong thu a gen niloh hi.
44020008	Ka kikhopna mun uh inn tungnung dei sungah meivak tampi a om hi.
44020009	Paul in thu gengen mai ahi ciangin Eutychus kici tangvalno khat tawhlet ah tu-a, a ihmut suak mahmahin a lusu hi. Amah a kikhim ciangin inn dawl thumna panin lei-ah kiasuka, a sisa in kitawm hi.
44020010	Paul kumsuka, tua tangvalnopa tungah boksukin a kawi hi. Amah in, “Amah nungta hi, patau kei dih un!” a ci hi.
44020011	Tua ciangin inn tungah kahto kika anlum balkhamin a ne hi. Khuavak dong thu a gen khit ciangin a paisan hi.
44020012	Mite in tangvalnopa a nungta in a inn ah ciahpih uh a, amaute nakpi-in a kihehnem hi.
44020013	Tembawpi-in Assos lamah ka na ma pai uh a, tua lai-ah tembaw tawh Paul a la ding ka hi uh hi. Amah tua lai-ah khe-a, a na mapai ding ahi manin amah in hih banga a gel ahi hi.
44020014	Amah in Assos ah kote hong dawntuah a, tembaw ah ka tuansak khit uh ciangin Mitylene ah ka paisuak uh hi.
44020015	A zing ciangin tua lai panin ka paikhia leuleu uh a, Kios ka tung uh hi. A thai ciangin Samos ka kantan uh a, a zing ciangin Miletus ka tung uh hi.
44020016	Paul in a hi theih le Pentecost ni lap nuam ahi manin Asia gam sungah ahun zang khin loin, Ephesus khengsuakin a manlangin Jerusalem tun a sawm hi.
44020017	Miletus panin Paul in, Ephesus a pawlpi upate a samsak hi.
44020018	Hong tun uh ciangin amaute kiangah: “Asia gam kong tun a ni masa pen ni-a kipan no lakah ka om sung khempeuh ka nuntakzia na thei khin zo uh hi.
44020019	Jew-te in kei thah dingin hong sawmsimna un nakpi-in hong zia-et ta leh, nakpitakin kiniamkhiatin khitui tawh Topa na ka sem hi.
44020020	Note adingin a phatuam ding peuhmah kong hilh ding ka lungsit kei a, tangpi theih ahi zongin inn simah ahi zongin note kong hilh hi, cih na thei uh hi.
44020021	Jew-te le Greek-te tungah, i Topa Jesu upna nei-in kisik a, Pasian lamah a kihei pelmawh nadingun ka tangko zo hi.
44020022	"Tu-in Kha hong sawl teiteina mangin, ka tungah bang thu piang ding cih thei loin Jerusalem ah ka pai ding hi.
44020023	Khasiangtho in kei tungah, khuapi simah thong kiat ding le haksatna in hong maituah hi, cih vauhilhna bek ka thei hi.
44020024	Ahi zongin tai kidemna man thei in Topa Jesu in ka sep dinga hong piaksa Pasian hehpihna lungdamna-thu teci ka pan ding mansiang khin peuh leng kei adingin ka nuntakna bangmah man loin ka ngaihsun hi.
44020025	"Tu-in kumpi-gam thu gena a laka ka pai kawikawina mite khat beek in nong mu kik nawn kei ding uh cih ka thei hi.
44020026	Tua ahi manin mi khempeuh sisan tungah ka mawhpeng hi, cih tuni-in note tungah kong pulak hi.
44020027	Ahang in, Pasian deihna buppi no tungah kong tangko ding sit ka nei kei hi.
44020028	Khasiangtho in nomau mahmah a cinga mite hong suahsak, tua tuuhonte limtakin na kem un. Ama sisan tawh a leisa Pasianb pawlpi a cingte na hi un.
44020029	Ken kong nusiat khit ciangin note lakah ngia hangsante hong lutin tuuhonte a hawi loh ding uh ka thei hi.
44020030	Note lak nangawn ah nungzuite amau lamah a kaihmang zawh nadingun thumaan a lehkaih mi hong khangkhia ding hi.
44020031	Tua ahi ciangin kigalging un! Kum thum sung khawl lo-a, sun tawh zan tawh khitui luanga note a milip tunga kong vauhilhna ciamteh un.
44020032	"Tu-in Pasian tung le note hong picingsak thei-a, a sianthosak sate khempeuh lakah gouluahna a pia ama hehpihna thu tungah note kong ap hi.
44020033	Mi khatpeuh neihsa, ngun ahi a, kham ahi a, nikten puansilh ahi zongin ka deih gawh kei hi.
44020034	Hih ka khutte in kei kitang sapna le ka lawmte kitangsapna pia, cih note mahmah in na thei zo uh hi.
44020035	Ka sepnasa peuhmah ah Topa Jesu kammal mahmah in, ‘Ngahna sangin piakna ah thupha omzaw hi,’ a cih phawk kawmin, hih bang nasep hahkatna tawh a thanem mi i huh ding kul hi, cih kong lak hi,” a ci hi.
44020036	Hih teng a cih khit ciangin amaute khempeuh tawh khukdinin thu a ngen uh hi.
44020037	Amaute khempeuh in amah kawi-in, namin, a kap uh hi.
44020038	Ama mai mu kik ngei nawn lo ding a cih in amaute a dahsak pen hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah tembaw tung dong a kha uh hi.
44021001	Amaute tawh ka kikhen khit uh ciangin tembaw in ka tuang uh a tangtakin Cos ka zuan pah vingveng uh hi. A zing ciangin Rhodes pai-in tua panin Patara ah ka pai uh hi.
44021002	Phoenicia ah a galkah ding tembaw khat ka mu uh a, tua ah tuangin ka pai uh hi.
44021003	Cyprus ka galmuh khit uh ciangin a khang lam nawkin Syria dong ka pai uh hi. Tyre ah ka kinga uh hi. Tua lai-ah ka tembaw un a vanpuakte a suahkhia ding ahi hi.
44021004	Tua lai-ah nungzuite ka muh uh ciangin ni sagih sung amau kiangah ka taam uh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem dong, Paul a pai loh nadingin Kha tungtawnin a kho uh hi.
44021005	Ahi hangin ka hun uh a bei ciangin ka ding khia uh a, ka zinna ban uh ka zom uh hi. Nungzuite khempeuh le a zi a tate un khuapi nawl ciang hong kha uh a, tua lai mun, tuipiau-ah khukdinin thu ka ngen uh hi.
44021006	Khat le khat mangpha ka kikhak khit uh ciangin tembaw tungah ka kah uh a, amau bel inn ah a ciah kik ta uh hi.
44021007	Tyre panin ka zinna ban uh ka zom uh a, Ptolemais ah ka kinga uh hi. Tua lai-a sanggamte ka hopih uh a, amau kiangah ni khat ka kulh uh hi.
44021008	A zing ciang pai leuleu in Caesarea ka tung uh a, tua Sagihte lakah khat, lungdamna thugen Philip inn ah ka tung uh hi.
44021009	Amah in pasal a nei nai lo kam a sang tanu li a nei hi.
44021010	Tua lai-ah ni tam khop ka tam khit uh ciangin Judea panin Agabus kici kamsang khat hong paisuk hi.
44021011	Kote kiangah hong pai-a, Paul kawnggak la-in ama khut le a khete kihenin, “Khasiangtho in, ‘Jerusalem ah hih kawng gak neipa, Jew-te in hih bangin hen ding uh a, Gentile-te khut sungah pia ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
44021012	Kote in hih thu ka zak uh ciangin kote le tua lai-a om mipite in Jerusalem ah Paul a pai loh nadingin ka kho uh hi.
44021013	Tua ciangin Paul in, “Bang hangin note kapa, ka lungtang tamkhamsak na hi uh hiam? Hong kihen bek tham loin Topa Jesu min hangin Jerusalem a sih ding nangawn a kigingkholsa ka hi hi,” hong ci hi.
44021014	Ka khohna uh hong man nop loh ciangin ka kho nawn kei uh a, “Pasian deih bangin piang ta hen,” ka ci uh hi.
44021015	Hih teng khit ciangin ka kithawi uh a, Jerusalem ah ka paito uh hi.
44021016	Caesarea panin nungzuite pawlkhat in hong zui uh a, ka tun nading uh Manson inn ah hong kha uh hi. Amah Cyprus mi hi-a, nungzui masate lakah khat ahi hi.
44021017	Jerusalem ah ka tun uh ciangin sanggamte in lungtaitakin hong tungsak uh hi.
44021018	A zing ciangin Paul le ko adang teng James tawh kimu dingin ka pai uh a, tua lai-ah upate khempeuh a kim uh hi.
44021019	Paul in amaute hopih in, Gentile-te lakah ama nasepna tungtawna Pasian nasepna cingtakin a zasak hi.
44021020	Amaute in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Pasian a phat uh hi. Tua ciangin Paul kiangah, “Sanggam aw, Jew-te tul bangzah in um khin zo cih le amaute khempeuh thukham zuih hahkatte hi cih na mu hi.
44021021	Gentile-te laka teng Jew-te khempeuh in a tate uh vunat loh ding ahi zongin ngeina zui loin Moses pan kiheikhia dingin nang na hilh, ci-in amaute a kizasak uh hi.
44021022	Bang cih ding i hiam? Amaute in hihtak nong tun za ngel ding uh hi.
44021023	Tua ahi ciangin kong gen bangun hih in. Kote kiangah a kiciam khinsa mi li a om hi.
44021024	Hih mite va tonpih in amaute a ngeina-a a kisiansuahna ah va kihel inla, a sam uh a metmai theih nadingun a sam met man ding uh sik in. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in nang thu a kigennate a maanlohna thei ding uh a, nang mahmah thukham thu manga a nungta na hina thei ding uh hi.
44021025	Thu um Gentile-te ahi uh leh ka thukhensatna uh lai amaute ka khak zo uh a, amaute in milimte thoihna ante, sisan, ngawnghek ganhing sate le numei-pasal paktatna a tan dingun ka gelh zo uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44021026	A zing ciangin Paul in tua mite tonpih a, amaute tawh amah mah a kisiansuah hi. Tua ciangin kisiansuahna nite bei ni ding le amau ciat in biakna a bawl ni ding uh theisak dingin biakinnpi ah a pai hi.
44021027	Tua ni sagih a cin dektak ciangin Asia gam pana Jew-te pawlkhat in biakinnpi ah Paul a mu uh hi. Amaute in mihonpite khempeuh tawsawnin amah man uh a,
44021028	"Israel mite aw, ko hong huh un! I mite, i thukham le hih mun lang panga, mun khempeuh-a mi khempeuh tungah thu a hilhpa hih pa ahi hi. Tua tham loin biakinnpi huang sungah Greek-te hong paipih in hih munsiangtho a buahsak hi,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
44021029	(Tua hun ma-in khuapi sungah Ephesus mi Trophimus le Paul a kithuah mu uh a, Paul in amah biakinnpi huang sungah lutpih khin zo ding hi, ci-a theihsa banga a koih uh ahi hi.)
44021030	Khuapi sung khempeuh linglawnga, mun khempeuh panin mi hong tai-in a kisutuah uh hi. Paul manin biakinnpi panin kaigawp uh a, kongpite kikhak pah lian hi.
44021031	Amah thah a sawm laitakun Jerusalem khuapi bup hehin a so hi, cih Rome galkap mangpa kiangah thu va tung hi.
44021032	Amah in bute hon khat le galkapte tonpih a mihonpite lamah a taisuk uh hi. Tua mi ngonghtatte in galkap mangpa le a galkapte a muh uh ciangin Paul a sat nawn kei uh hi.
44021033	Galkap mangpa paikhia a, amah manin sik khainiang nih tawh hen dingin thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin amah kua hi-a, bang hih hiam, cih a dong hi.
44021034	Mihonpi lakah pawlkhat in thu khat gena, adang pawlkhat in a thu dang khat mah genin a kiko uh hi. Galkap mangpa in mite buaina hangin thutak a muh theih loh ciangin galkap inn sungah Paul paipih dingin thu a pia hi.
44021035	Kahlei ah Paul a tun ciangin tua migilote uang lua uh ahi manin galkapte in Paul a puak uh kul hi.
44021036	A nungzui mihonpite in, “Amah thatmang un,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
44021037	Galkapte in galkap inn sungah Paul a lutpih dektak laitakun amah in galkap mangpa kiangah, “Kam khat kong gen thei ding hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Greek pau na thei hiam?
44021038	A beisa hunlai-a mi linthawn pawl, tulli makaih a kumpi langpang dinga kipan Egypt mipa hi lo na hia?” ci-in a dawng hi.
44021039	Paul in, “Kei Jew mi ka hi hi. Cilicia gam Tarsus pan ka hi-a khuapi mawk mawk a mi ka hi kei hi. Nong hehpihna in mipite tungah thu hong gensak in,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44021040	Galkap mangpa tung pan thu a ngah khit ciangin kahlei tungah Paul dingto a, mihonte lamah a khut a van hi. Amaute khempeuh a daih dide khit uh ciangin amaute kiangah Arama pau-in:
44022001	“Sanggamte le pate aw, tu-in kei kihutna thu na ngai un,” a ci hi.
44022002	Amaute in amah Aram pau-a, a pau a zak uh ciangin a daipah khipkhep uh hi. Tua ciangin Paul in:
44022003	"Kei Jew mi ka hi hi. Cilicia gam Tarsus ah ka suak a, ahi hangin hih khuapi-a khangkhia ka hi hi. Gamaliel khut nuai-ah i pate thukhamte khempeuh sina, a siamsa ka hi a, tuni-a note khat peuhpeuh zah a Pasian ading a hahkat ka hi hi.
44022004	Hih Lampi thu a zuite a sih dongun ka bawlsia a, numei hi ta leh pasal hi ta leh manin thong sungah ka khum hi.
44022005	Hih bang ka hihna tulpipa le Vaihawmte in zong teci hong pang thei ding uh hi. Keimah in Damascus a, a sanggamte uh a laikhak nangawn uh amaute tung pan ka ngah a, hih mite Jerusalem thonga khum ding le gawt dinga puak dingin ka va kuan hi.
44022006	Damascus kiang ka tun laitak sun pawlin thakhatin van pan a tangpha mahmah khuavak khat in ka kimkot hong tanzal hi.
44022007	Lei-ah ka puk a, aw khat in ka tungah, ‘Saul! Saul! Bang hangin kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam?’ hong cih ka za hi.
44022008	"‘Topa kua na hiam?’ ci-in ka dong hi. “Amah in, ‘Na bawlsiat Nazareth mi Jesu ka hi hi,’ ci-in hong dawng hi.
44022009	Ka tonpihte in tua khuavak mu uh a, ahi hangin kei tunga hong hopih aw a theitel kei uh hi.
44022010	" ‘Topa aw, bang hih ding ka hi hiam?’ ci-in ka dong hi. “Topa in, ‘Tho inla Damascus khua sungah pai in, tua lai-ah na sep dinga kisehsate hong kigen ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
44022011	Tua khuavakpi in ka mit tawsak ahi manin ka tonpihte in ka khutin hong kai uh a, Damascus khua sungah hong lutpih uh hi.
44022012	"Ananias kici mi khat kei hong veh dingin hong pai hi. Amah thukham tan a ngentel mahmah khat hi-a, tua lai-a teng Jew-te khempeuh in a zahtak mahmah khat ahi hi.
44022013	Amah ka kiangah hong dinga, ‘Sanggampa Saul aw, khua mu in!’ hong ci hi. Tua hun lianin amah ka mu thei pah hi.
44022014	"Tua ciangin amah in: ‘I pate Pasian in, ama deihna thei ding Thumaan Pa mu ding le ama kam pan thute za dingin nang hong teel zo hi.
44022015	Na muhsa le na zaksate mite khempeuh tungah ama teci na hi ding hi.
44022016	Tua hi-a tu-in nang bang ngak lai na hi hiam? Tho in; ama min lo inla, kibaptise-in na mawhnate silkhia in,’ hong ci hi.
44022017	"Jerusalem ah ka ciah kika, biakinnpi ah thu ka nget ciangin mumang bangin ka om a,
44022018	kei kiangah, ‘Kinawh in!’ Amaute in, kei thu teci na panna hong sang lo ding uh ahi manin, Jerusalem nusia pak in,’ hong ci Topa ka mu hi.
44022019	"Topa aw, synagogue-te ah a banbanin pai-a, nang hong umte thong sungah khumin ka sat lam hih mite in thei zo uh hi.
44022020	Nang hanga si paa Stephen sisan a luan lai-in ka thukimpihna lakin amah a thatte puante cingin tua lai-ah ka ding hi,’ ci-in ka dawng hi.
44022021	"Tua ciangin Topa in ka kiangah, ‘Pai peuh in; gamlapi a om Gentile-te kiangah kong sawl ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
44022022	Hih a gen hun ciang dong mihon pite in Paul thugen a ngai uh hi. Tua ciangin nakpi-in kiko uh a, “Leitungah omsak kei un! Hing-khawi huai kei!” a ci uh hi.
44022023	Amaute in a kiko kawmun a puan tualpite uh suahkhia-in van lamah leivui a theh gawp uh ciangin
44022024	galkap mangpa in galkap inn sungah Paul a tumpihsak hi. Bang hang mihonpite in amah kikosan ahi hiam, cih a theihkhiat nadingin amah sata, thu dot dingin a gen hi.
44022025	Amaute in amah sat dinga a dawhsak laitakun, Paul in tua lai-a ding zakhat ukpa kiangah, “A mawhna kimu nai lopi in, Rome mi khat na sat ding thukham tawh kituak na sak mah hiam?” a ci hi.
44022026	Zakhat-ukpa in hih thu a zak ciangin galkap mangpa kiangah pai-in a va zasak hi. Amah in, “Hih mipa Rome mi ahi hi, bang cih ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
44022027	Paul kiangah galkap mangpa pai-in, “Nang Rome mi na hi hiam, hong gen in?” ci-in a dong hi. Amah in, “Ka hi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44022028	Tua ciangin galkap mangpa in, “Rome gammi ka suah nadingin a man tampi ka pia hi,” a ci hi. Paul, in, “Ahi hanign kei ka suah a kipan gammi ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
44022029	Amah thu dong dinga kisate a tawp kik pah lian uh hi. Galkap mangpa mahmah zong Rome gammi khat ahi Paul, sik khainiang a khih ahilam a tel ciangin a patau hi.
44022030	A zing ciangin galkap mangpa in, bang pen hanga Jew-te in Paul hih banga mawhmat nuam uh ahi hiam, cih cian taka a theih khit nop manin, amah khahkhia a, siampi makaite le Sanhedrin-te khempeuh a kikup dingun thu a pia hi. Tua ciangin Paul paipiha amaute mai-ah a dingsak hi.
44023001	Paul in Sanhedrin-te tangtakin en a, “Ka sanggamte aw, tuni dongin Pasian tungah kisuantaakna om loin ka sep ding teng ka tangtun khin zo hi,” a ci hi.
44023002	Hih bang a cih ciangin tulpi Ananias in Paul kianga dingte kiangah a muk a satsak dingun thu a pia hi.
44023003	Tua ciangin Paul in, “Nang, a kanga kizut kawm aw, Pasian in nang hong sat na ve! Thukham tawh kituaka thukhen dingin tua lai-a tu hi napi kei sat dinga thu na piakna tawh thukham na palsat hi!” a ci hi.
44023004	Paul kianga dingte in, “Nang, Pasian tulpipa eng cih ngam maw?” a ci uh hi.
44023005	Paul in, “Sanggamte aw, ken amah tulpi ahilam ka thei kei hi, ‘Na mite ukpa gensiatna kam pau kei in,’a ci-in kigelh mah hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44023006	Tua ciangin Paul in amaute pawlkhat Sadducee hi-in, adangte Pharisee ahilam uh thei a, Sanhedrin mai-ah, “Ka sanggamte aw, kei Pharisee khat tapa Pharisee khat mah ka hi hi. Misite thawhkikna ka lamet manin thukhenna a thuak ka hi hi,” a cikhia hi.
44023007	Hih banga cih ciangin Pharisee-te le Sadducee-te kikalah kiselna pianga tua-a kikhawmte a kipawlkhen uh hi.
44023008	(Sadducee-te in thawhkikna om lo, vansawltak ahi a, kha ahi zongin om lo hi, ci uh a, ahi hangin Pharisee-te in, tuate khempeuh om hi, ci uh hi.)
44023009	Mihonpi buaina lianpi pianga, thu kham sia ahi Pharisee-te pawlkhat dingin nakpitakin sel uh a, “Hih mipa a tat khialhna bangmah ka mu kei uh hi. Vansawltak khatpeuh, kha khatpeuh in ama tungah thu gen hileh eite in bang lawh ding!” a ci uh hi.
44023010	Kiselna nasia lua mahmah a, amaute in Paul a balzan khak ding uh, galkap mangpa a lau hi. Amah in galkapte va paisuk a, thatang hat suanga amaute lak pan amah lakhia in galkap inn sungah a paipih dingun thu a pia hi.
44023011	A zing ciang zanin Paul kiangah Topa dinga, “Kilungkhauhsak in! Jerusalem a ka thu teci na pansa bangin Rome ah zong teci na pan teitei kul ding hi,” a ci hi.
44023012	A zing ciang zingsang in Jew-te in kisimzopna khat bawl uh a, Paul a thah khit matengun an ne tui dawn om lo ding, ci-in a kiciam uh hi.
44023013	Hih sawmsimna ah mi sawmli sanga tamzaw kihel uh hi.
44023014	Siampi makaite le upate kiangah amaute pai uh a, “Paul ka thah khit matengun, bangmah ne lo dingin khauh takin ka kiciam zo uh hi.
44023015	Tua ahi ciangin tu-in nang le Sanhedrin in Paul thu a cingzaw a thei nuam kineihin note mai-ah galkap mangpa in amah hong puak nadingin na ngen un. Amah hih lai hong tun ma-in a that dingin kigingsa-in ka om uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
44023016	Ahi hangin Paul sanggamnu tapa in hih sawmsimna a zak ciangin galkap inn sungah pai-in Paul a va hilh hi.
44023017	Tua ciangin Paul in zakhat-ukpa khat sam a, “Hih khangnopa galkap mangpa kiangah va paipih in, amah in thugen ding a nei hi,” a ci hi.
44023018	Tua ciangin amah in galkap mangpa kiangah a paipih hi. Zakhat ukpa in, “Thong kiapa Paul in kei hong samsak a, hih khangnopa in nang kiangah gen ding nei ahi manin nang kianga puak dingin hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.
44023019	Galkap mangpa in khangnopa a khutah lenin kai a, “Kei kianga nong gen nop bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
44023020	Amah in: “Jew-te in ama thu a cingzaw-a thei nuam kineih in, zing ciangin Sanhedrin mai-ah Paul na puak nading hong nget ding uh a thukim zo uh hi.
44023021	Amaute thu mang peuhmah kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute, mi sawmli sanga tamzaw in amah lamkalah na pangsim ding uh hi. Amaute in amah a thah khit matengun, an ne tui dawn om lo dingin kiciamna bawl zo uh hi. Amaute tu-in a kigingsa-in om uh a, a ngetna uh na phal ding bek ngakin om uh hi,” a ci hi.
44023022	Galkap mangpa in khangnopa ciahsak in, “Hih thu kei kiangah nong theihsak lam kuama kiangah gen kei in,” ci-in limtakin a vaikhak hi.
44023023	Tua khit ciangin amah in zakhat ukte nih sama, “Tu zan nai kua in Caesarea a pai ding, galkap zanih, sakol tuang galkap sawm sagih le teipi tawi galkapb zanih tawh na kithawikhol un.
44023024	Ukpipa Felix kiang bittaka a tun nadingin Paul tuan nading zong vai hawmsak un,” ci-in thu a pia hi.
44023025	Amah in a nuai-a bangin laikhak khat a gelh hi:
44023026	Claudius Lysias, A Hoihpipen Ukpipa, Felix tungah: Kong hopih hi.
44023027	Hih mipa Jew-te in man uh a, that dektak uh hi. Ahi hangin amah Rome mi hi, cih thei ka hi manin ka galkapte tawh pai-in amah ka va hukhia uh hi.
44023028	Amaute in bang hanga amah mawhsak uh hiam, cih ka thei nuama, amau Sanhedrin tungah amah ka puak uh hi.
44023029	Amaute ngawhna pen amau thukham tawh kisai hi-a, ahi hangin amah a kingawhna, sih nading ahi zongin thong a khiat nading ahi zongin thukho ka mu kei hi.
44023030	Hih mipa thah ding kisawmsim cih hong kizaksak ciangin thakhatin nang kiangah kong paisak pah hi. Amah a mawhsakte zong, nangma kiangah thulang dingin hong om nading thu ka pia zo hi.
44023031	Tua bangin galkapte in amaute thupiakte pua uh a, Paul tonpihin azan azanin Antipatris dong a paipih uh hi.
44023032	A zing ciangin amah sakol tuang galkapte tonpihsak uh a, amaute galkap innte ah a ciah kik uh hi.
44023033	Sakol tuang galkapte Caesarea a tun uh ciangin ukpipa tungah laikhak pia-in ama tungah Paul a ap uh hi.
44023034	Ukpipa in laikhak sim a, amah bang gam pan hiam, cih a dong hi. Amah Cilicia pan ahilam a theih ciangin,
44023035	"Na thulangte hih lai hong tun ciangin na thu ka za ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Herod kumpi inn sungah Paul kem a, cin dingin thu a pia hi.
44024001	Ni nga khit ciangin tulpi Ananias in a upate pawlkhat le Tertullus kici taangding khat tonpihin Caesarea ah paisuk uh a, Paul a mawhsaknate uh ukpipa mai-ah a puak uh hi.
44024002	A sungah Paul a kisap ciangin Tertullus in Felix mai-ah a mawhsakna thu gen a: “Kote, nangma ukna nuai-ah lungmuangin sawtpi ka om uh hi. Na thumuhkholna tawh hih minam ah kipuahphatnate a om hi.
44024003	A hoihpipen Felix aw, mun khempeuh le lam khempeuh ah na hihnate lung damtakin ka sang uh hi.
44024004	Ahi hangin nang kong gimsak sawnsawn loh nadingun ka thu uh a tom theithei a kong gen nong ngaihsak ding kong thum hi.
44024005	"Kote in buaina a piangsak hih mipa, leitung khempeuh a Jew-te lakah mipi ngonghtatsakin a linglawngsakpa hi, cih ka mu uh hi. Amah Nazareth pawl tuam makaipa hi a,
44024006	biakinnpi nangawn buahsak a sawm hi; tua hi-a, amah ka man uh hi.a
44024007	Ahi hangin galkap mangpa Lysias hong pai-a, thatang hat thu-in kote khut sung pan amah dokkhia a, ama thulangte na mai-ah a pai dingin thu hong pia hi.
44024008	Nang mahmah in ama tungah dongin kan lecin amah ka mawhmatnate uh thutak ahina na theikhia thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
44024009	Jew-te in hih mawhmatna thumaan hi, ci-in a panpih uh hi.
44024010	Ukpipa in Paul a gen dingin a khut van ciangin amah in, “Hih minamte tungah kum tamkhop thukhenpa na hilam ka thei hi; tua ahi ciangin ka kihutna thu lungkim takin kong gen hi.
44024011	Jerusalem ah Pasian bia dinga ka paitoh, ni sawm-le-nih sawt nai lo, cih baihtakin na khentel thei ding hi.
44024012	Biakinnpi-ah mi khatpeuh tawh ka kiselna ahi zongin, synagogue-te sungah ahi zongin khuapi sung mun khat beekah ahi zongin mihonpite ka linglawngsakna ka thulangte in a mu kei ding uh hi.
44024013	Tua hi-a amaute in kei hong ngawhnate uh na mai-ah hong tellah thei kei ding uh hi.
44024014	Bangbang ahi zongin amaute in biakna pawltuam khat a cih uh Lampi nungzui ka hi bangin ka pate Pasian ka bia hi, cih kong pulak hi. Thukham tawh a kituak le Kamsangte lai sunga kigelhsa peuhmah ka um hi.
44024015	Hih mite bangin mi thumaante le mi tatsiate thawhkikna om tuak ding, ci-in Pasian sungah lametna ka nei hi.
44024016	Tua ahi ciangin Pasian le mite mai-ah kisuantakna a om lo dingin gamtat ka sawm tawntung hi.
44024017	"Kum tampitak ka om loh khit ciangin mizawngte ading letsong ka mipihte puak ding le biaknate pia dingin Jerusalem ah kong pai hi.
44024018	Biakinnpi huang sunga hihte hih a ka om amaute in hong muh lai-un, biakna ngeina tawh kisai-in ka siang hi. Kei tawh mihon kuamah om lo a, buaina khat beek ah zong ka kihel kei hi.
44024019	Ahi hangin Asia gam Jew-te pawlkhat a om uh hi. Tuate in kei langah mawhsak nading hong nei uh ahileh hih lai na mai-ah hong dingin hong mawhsak ding uh kilawm hi.
44024020	Ahikeh Sanhedrin mai-a ka din lai-in, kei tungah bang mawhsakna a mu uh hiam? Hih lai-a omte in gen uh hen.
44024021	Amaute mai-a ka din lai-a: ‘Misite thawhkikna thu tawh kisai-in tuni-in note mai-ah thusitna ka thuak hi,’ ka cih hoh ahi kei buang leh,” ci-in a gen hi.
44024022	Tua ciangin Lampi thu a thei mah mah Felix in thusit hun a sotto hi. Amah in, “Galkap mangpa Lysias hong pai ciangin na thu kong khensak ding hi,” a ci hi.
44024023	Amah in zakhat-ukpa tungah, “Paul limtakin cingsak inla, ahi zongin bang tan hiam khat kolsak in, a kisapnate a lawmte piasak in, ci-in thu a pia hi.
44024024	Ni tampi khit ciangin Jew numei ahi a zi Drusilla tawh Felix va pai uh hi. Amah in Paul samsak a, Khrist Jesu upna thu a gen a ngai uh hi.
44024025	Paul in, thumaanna, ei le ei pumpi ki-ukna le hong tung ding thukhenna thute a gen ciangin Felix lau a, “Pha zo! Ciah ta in. Hun hoih ka sak ciangin kong sam kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
44024026	Paul in amah golhguk a piak ding lamen kawmin, amah samsak pahpah a, amah tawh a kiho uh hi.
44024027	Kum nih a bei ciangin Porcius Festus in Felix za laih a, ahi hangin Felix in, Jew-te angvan nuam ahi manin thong kiasa in Paul a nusia hi.
44025001	Tua gam a tun zawh ni thum khit ciangin Caesarea panin Jerusalem ah Festus pai to a,
44025002	tua munah siampi makaite le Jew makaite ama mai-ah dingin Paul a mawhmatnate uh a gen uh hi.
44025003	Amaute in Festus kiangah amau a angvanna-in, a manlang theithei a Jerusalem ah Paul a puak nading a ngen uh hi. Ahang in, amaute in lamkal ah buksimin Paul thah nading a kigingkhol khin zo uh hi.
44025004	Festus in, “Caesarea ah Paul a kikhumsa hi a, kei mahmah zong tua lai-ah ka paipah ding hi.
44025005	Na makaite uh pawlkhat kei hong zuisak unla, tua mipa in hihkhialh nei ahileh tua lai-ah a mawhmatna uh gen uh hen,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44025006	Amaute tawh ni giat hiam, ni sawm hiam a omkhawm khit ciangin Caesarea ah paisuka, a zing ciangin thukhenna zum ah kahin a mai-ah Paul a puak nadingun thu a pia hi.
44025007	Paul a kilak ciangin Jerusalem pana paisuk Jew-te a kimkotah ding uh a, kiteltaka a lah theih loh uh mawhmatna nasia mahmah tampi tawh a mawhsak uh hi.
44025008	Tua ciangin Paul in a kihutna thu gen a: “Jew-te thukham tungah ahi zongin, biakinnpi tungah ahi zongin Caesar tungah ahi zongin khialhna bangmah ka bawl kei hi,” a ci hi.
44025009	Festus in Jew-te angvan-nopna khat nei a, Paul kiangah, “Hih mawh matna mah hong kisit dingin Jerusalem a paitoh ding na ut hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
44025010	Paul in, “Kei hong kisit nading a kilawm mun Caesar thukhenna mai ah tu-in ka ding hi. Nang mahmah in zong siangtaka na theihsa bangin Jew-te tungah bangmah khialhna ka bawl kei hi.
44025011	Ahi ta zongin sihna thuak nading donga mawhna ka neih leh sih ding ka nial kei hi. Ahi hangin hih Jew-te hong mawhmatna a maan lopi ahileh amaute tungah kei a piak nading thuneihna kuamah in a nei kei hi. Caesar tunga ka thu ka tun hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44025012	Festus in ama vaihawm mite tawh a kikup khit uh ciangin, “Na thu Caesar tungah na tun zo hi. Caesar tungah na pai ding hi!” ci-in a thukhenna a pulakkhia hi.
44025013	Ni tawm vei khit ciangin Kumpi Agrippa le Bernice in, Festus zahtakna pia dingin Caesarea a tung uh hi.
44025014	Tua lai-ah ni tampi a taam khit uh ciangin Festus in Paul thu, kumpipa a kikuppih hi. Amah in, “Hih lai-ah Felix in thong kiasa-a a nusiat mi khat a om hi.
44025015	Jerusalem ah ka pai ciangin siampi makaite le Jew-te upate ama langah pangin amah mawhpaih dingin hong ngen uh hi,
44025016	"Ken amau kiangah, ‘Mi khatpeuh a kimawhmat ciangin amah a mawhmatte mai-ah dinga, a mawhmatna uh pan a kihut nading hun hoih a ngah khit mateng, piakkhiat ding Rome-te ngeina hi lo hi,’ ci-in ka hilh hi.
44025017	Hih mun kei kiang hong tut uh ciangin a thu uh zia-olsak loin a zing ciangin thukhen zum ah ka kah pah a, tua mipa hong paipih nadingun thu ka pia hi.
44025018	Amah a mawhmatte thugen dinga a din uh ciangin ka upmawh bangin gitlohna lian khat beek tawh a mawhmat kei uh hi.
44025019	Tua sangsik in, amau biakna thu le Jesu kici mi sisa khat, Paul in nungta hi, a cih thu tawmkhat kitotpih uh ahi hi.
44025020	Tua thu ka kantel nading ka thei zo kei a, ‘Jerusalem ah paito in hih mawhmatna thu mah tua mun ah hong kisit leh na ut hiam?’ ci-in amah ka dong hi.
44025021	Paul in a thu Rome-te kumpipa thukhen dinga a tut ciangin Caeisar tunga ka puak theih mateng thong sunga khum dingin thu ka pia hi,” a ci hi.
44025022	Tua ciangin Agrippa in Festus kiangah, “Hih mipa thugen kei mahmah in ka za nuam hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ama thugen zing ciangin na za ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
44025023	A zing ciangin Agrippa le Bernice thupitakin hong pai uh a, kumpipa nasem zaliante le khuapi uliante tawh kikhopna inndei lianpi sungah a lut uh hi. Festus in thu pia a, Paul kilutpih hi.
44025024	Festus in: “Kumpi Agrippa le kote tawh a om khawmte khempeuh aw, hih mipa na mu uh hi! Jew mite khempeuh in, Jerusalem le hih lai Caesarea a kei tungah a thu hong tun uh a, amah hingkhawi lai ding hi peuhmah lo hi, ci-in kiko uh hi.
44025025	Sihna thuak nading zahin ama gamtatna bangmah ka mu kei hi. Ahi hangin amah in Rome kumpipa tungah a thu tun ahi manin amah Rome ah puak dingin ka khensat hi.
44025026	Ahi hangin a Thupi Kumpipa tungah ama thu ka gelh ding thu kician bangmah ka nei kei hi. Tua ahi manin na thudotnate panun gelh ding khatpeuh ka neih nadingin noteng khempeuh le a diakdiak in nang Kumpipa Agrippa mai-ah amah kong paisak hi.
44025027	Ahang in, a kimawh matna om lopi a, thongkia khatpeuh a bana sawn ding, thu kicingtak hi thei lo hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
44026001	Tua ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiangah, “Na thu nang mahmah gen dingin phalna kong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Paul in a khut van a, ama kihutna thu a gen hi:
44026002	"Kumpi Agrippa aw, Jew-te hong mawhmatnate khempeuh, tuni-in nang mai-ah dinga ka kihutna thu ka gen theih hampha ka kisa hi.
44026003	Jew mite ngeinate le a kikalhnate uh theician mahmah na hi manin ka hampha diak hi. Tua ahi manin ka thugente lungduaitakin nong ngaihsak ding kong thum hi.
44026004	"Ka tenna gam sung ahi a, Jerusalem ah ahi zongin ka neu tunga kipan ka nuntak zia Jew-te khempeuh in a theih khitsa uh ahi hi.
44026005	Amaute in sawt peka kei hong theihsa uh hi-a Pharisee-te bangin nungta in, ka biakna pawltuam-uah a ciikpen pawl ka hilam, a ut nak uh leh teci hong pang thei ding uh hi.
44026006	Tua in ka pate uh tunga Pasian in a kam ciamsa ka lametna hangin tuni-a thusit a thuak ka hi hi.
44026007	Ko beh sawm-le-nihte in hahkattaka sun le zanin Pasian na sema, a tangtunna mu dinga ka lamet uh hih thuciam ahi hi. Kumpipa aw, hih ka lametna uh hangin Jew-te in kei hong mawhmat uh hi.
44026008	Bang hangin note khatpeuh in, Pasian in misite thosak, cih uphuai lo a ngaihsun ding na hi uh hiam?
44026009	"Kei mahmah in zong Nazareth mi Jesu min langdo-a, a hi thei zahzah ka sep ding mah hi, ci-in ka kipsan hi.
44026010	Jerusalem khua sungah zong tua mah ka hih hi. Siampi makaite thuneihna tawh misiangte tampi thong sungah ka khuma, amaute a kithah ciangin amaute langah thukimna ka khut ka lam hi.
44026011	Amaute gawt dingin synagogue khat pan khatah tam veipi ka pai a, thatang hatthu-in amaute Pasian gendaisak ding ka hanciam hi. Amaute ka huat luat manin a bawlsia dingin gamdang khuapite nangawn ah ka pai hi.
44026012	"Hih banga ka khualzinna khatah siampi makaite thuneihna le thupiakna tawh Damascus zuatna lampi ah ka pai hi.
44026013	Sun pawlin Kumpipa aw, ka paipai laitakin van panin ni sanga tangzaw khuavak khat ka mu a, kei le ka tonpihte kimkot a tanzal hi.
44026014	Ka vekpi un lei-ah ka puk uh a, aw khat in Arama pau in kei kiangah, ‘Saul, Saul, bang hangin kei hong bawlsia na hi hiam? Na khe tawh tulzum na suih ding, nang adingin haksa hi,’ hong ci hi.
44026015	‘Tua ciangin, ‘Topa aw, kua na hi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi. “Topa in, ‘Nong bawlsiat Jesu ka hi hi;
44026016	tu-in tho inla, na khe-in ding in. Nang ka nasem ding le kei tawh kisai na muhsa teng le kong lah lai dingte ah teci dinga hong seh dingin na kiangah kong kilak hi.
44026017	Na mipihte lak le Gentile-te panin kong hukhia ding hi.
44026018	Keimah hong upna hangun mawhnate maisakna le sian thosaksate lakah mun a ngah theih nadingun, amaute mit honsak ding, khuamial pan khuavak ah a hei ding, Satan vangliatna pan Pasian lam a ngasak dingin nang kong sawl ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
44026019	"Tua bang ahi manin Kumpi Agrippa aw, van pana mangmuhna thu mang loin ka om kei hi.
44026020	Amaute kisik a Pasian lamah a kihei nading uh le a kisikna uh, a gamtatna uh tawh a lah nadingun a masa in Damascus-ate kiang, tua khit ciangin Jerusalem-ate kiang le Judea gam khempeuh le Gentile-te kiangah zong ka hilh hi.
44026021	Jew-te in biakinnpi huang sungah hong mana thah hong sawmna hih hang ahi hi.
44026022	Ahi hangin tuni mahmah ciang dong Pasian huhna ngahin hih lai-ah ka dinga, milian mineute tungah a kibangin teci ka pang hi. Kamsangte le Moses in hong piang dinga a gen uh,
44026023	Khristb in thuak dinga misi pana tho masa pen hi in, ama mite kiang le Gentile-te kiangah khuavak thu a tangko ding hi,’ a cih valkan ka gen kei hi,” a ci hi.
44026024	Hih thu tak a gen laitakin Festus in Paul kihutna na pauhelha, “Paul aw, a hai na hi hi! Na sinna tam lua in hong haisak hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
44026025	Paul in, “A hoihpipen Festus aw, a hai ka hi kei hi. Ka gente maan a, thu-a santak ahi hi.
44026026	Kumpipa in hihte teltaka a theihsa hi-a, ama tungah ka ut bangbangin ka gen thei hi. Kong kawmlak peuha kihih hi lo ahi manin a theih loh om lo dingin ka kipsan hi.
44026027	Kumpi Agrippa aw, kamsangte na um hiam? Na up lam ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
44026028	Tua ciangin Agrippa in Paul kiang ah, “Hih hun tomno sungin Khristian suak dingin hong zol zo a ki-um na hi haim?” a ci hi.
44026029	Paul in, “Hun tom taleh sau ta leh, nang bek hi lo tuni-a ka thugen a ngaite khempeuh hih sik khainiangte bulhna lo buangah kei a bat theih nading uh Pasian tungah thu ka ngen hi,” a ci hi.
44026030	Kumpipa dinga, ukpipa le Bernice le amau tawh a tute zong a ding uh hi.
44026031	Khat le khat kiho kawmin inndei nusia uh a, “Hih mipa in sih nading le thong kiat nading zahin bangmah a hih kei hi,” a kici uh hi.
44026032	Agrippa in Festus kiangah, “Hih mipa in Caesar tungah a thu tun lo hileh kikhah thei mah hi ven,” a ci hi.
44027001	Italy gam zuana tembaw tawh ka pai ding uh a kikhensat khit ciang in Paul le thongkia dangte Kumpi Galkap a sem Julius kici zakhat-ukpa tungah ki-ap hi.
44027002	Adramyttium pana Asia gam tuipi dunga khuate a pai ding tembawpi ah tuangin tuipi tungah ka om uh hi. Thessalonica pana hong pai Macedonia mi khat Aristarchus, ko tawh hong tuang khawm hi.
44027003	A zing ciangin Sidon ah ka kinga uh a, Paul kisapnate a lawmte in a piak theih nadingun, Julius in Paul hehpih a, a lawmte kianga a pai ding a phal hi.
44027004	Tua lai panin tuipi tungah ka om kik leuleu uh hi. Huih hong lehnun ahi manin Cyprus kiliahsakin ka pai uh hi.
44027005	Cilicia le Pamphylia gam tuipi gei gala tuipi tungah ka pai khit uh ciangin Lycia gama Myra ah ka kinga uh hi.
44027006	Tua lai-ah zakhat ukpa in Italy a pai ding Alexandria tembaw khat mu a, tua tungah kote hong tuangsak hi.
44027007	Ni tampi sung damdamin mai ka nawt uh a, haksapi in Cnidus ka tung uh hi. Huih in ka pai nopna uh tangtakin hong paisak thei lo a, Crete kiliahsakin Salmone leidawk tawh kigalsai-ah ka pai uh hi.
44027008	Tuipi gei zui-in haksapi-in ka pai uh a, Lasea khuapi kiang Van Siang kici mun ka tung uh hi.
44027009	An tana khit hun ahi tawh, hun tampi lah beita a, tembaw-a pai lauhuai mahmah ta hi. Tua ahi ciangin Paul in amaute vauhilh khol a,
44027010	"Guaite aw, i khualzinna siathuai ta ding hi. Tuahsia lehang tembaw le a vanpuakte i sup banah, i nuntakna zong kisia ding cih ka thei hi,’ a ci hi.
44027011	Ahi hangin zakhat ukpa in Paul thugen a ngaih tangin tembaw hawlpa le tembaw neipa thu a ngaizaw hi.
44027012	Tua tembaw khawlna phalbi sunga om nadingin kituak lo ahi manin tua lai panin paikhia a, Phoenix tungin tua lai-ah phalbi sung om ding lamenin a tamzaw thukimna tawh ka paisuak uh hi. Tua pen khang-nitumna le sak-nitumna a maingat tuak Crete-a tembaw khawlna ahi hi.
44027013	Khang huihdam hong nun ciangin amaute in a deih uh a ngah in a kingaihsun uh hi. Tua ciangin sikkip khai-in Crete gei zui-in ka pai uh hi.
44027014	A sawt lua nai loin tua tuikulh lamah “Sak-nisuah” kici huihpi hat mahmah khat hong nung hi.
44027015	Huihpi in tembaw zialnelh a, mai a nawt thei kei hi. Tua ahi ciangin huih zui-in huih nunna lamlamah ka pai uh hi.
44027016	Cauda kici tuikulh neu khat kidalsakin kihutna gunkuang neute ka hu zo kei dektak uh hi.
44027017	A nasemte in tuate tembaw tungah a kaihtoh uh ciangin tembaw nuai dongah khauzen paisakin a henkhawm uh hi. Syrtis sehtakte a phut khak ding uh lau-in, tuipi sikkip khaisa in tembaw a pai bangbangin a hawl uh hi.
44027018	Huihpi nak thuak den lua ka hi manun, a zing ciangin tembaw puak vante a lawnkhia uh hi.
44027019	A nithumna ni-in amaute in tembaw khauzialna a paikhia uh hi.
44027020	Ni tampi sung ni le aksite hong dawk het loh ciang le huihpi in hong nuai denden ciangin suahtak zawh nading lametna ka nei nawn kei uh hi.
44027021	Tua mite an ne loin hun sawtpi a om khit nungun amaute mai-ah Paul ding a: “Guaite aw, Crete panin paikhia kei ni, ka cihin ka thu hong mang hoh le uh cin nomau mahmah supna le siatna pan a kihu na hi ding uh hi.
44027022	Ahi hangin tu-in kilungkhauhsak un; bang hang hiam cihleh note khat beek na mangthang kei ding uh hi. Tembaw bek kisia ding hi.
44027023	A beisa zanin ama aa hi-a, a na ka sep Pasian vansawltak khat ka kiangah dinga,
44027024	‘Paul aw, lau kei in. Caesar mai-ah thu kisitin, na ding pelmawh ding hi. Pasian in a hehpihna-in nang tawh tembaw tunga tuangte khempeuh nuntak nading hong pia hi,’ hong ci hi.
44027025	Tua ahi ciangin guaite aw, na lungsim uh khauhsak lailai un. Ahang in, kei tunga hong gen bangbangin a piang ding hi, ci-in Pasian ka muang hi
44027026	Tua ahikeh zong tuikulhte khat teitei ah leilak i phukha pelmawh ding hi,” a ci hi.
44027027	A zan sawm-le-lina zanin Adriaticb Tuipi kantanin huih mutin ka om lailai uh a, zankim pawl ciangin tembaw nasemte in gam khat tung dek ta cih a thei uh hi.
44027028	Tui thukna teh uh a, pi zakhat sawmnihc a thuk lam a thei uh hi. Tomkha vei khit ciangin teh kik uh a, pi sawmkuad a thuk lam a thei uh hi.
44027029	Suangte tawh ka kitah khak ding uh lau uh a, tembaw nunglam pan sikkip li khia in zingsang khuavak nading thu ka ngen uh hi.
44027030	Tembaw nasemte taisim nuamin kihutna gun kuang neute tuipi sungah khia uh a, tembaw mailama sikkipte khai a kineih uh hi.
44027031	Tua ciangin Paul in zakhat-ukpa le a galkapte kiangah, “Hih mite tembaw ah om kei leh na suakta kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
44027032	Tua ciangin galkapte in kihutna gunkuang henna khauzente attat uh a, a khahkhia mang uh hi.
44027033	Khuavak ma diakin Paul in amaute khempeuh, an a nek ding uh a kun hi. Amah in, “A beisa ni sawm-le-li sung, bangmah ne loin an ngawlin lauthawngsa in na om den uh hi.
44027034	Tu-in an tawmkha beek ne teitei un. Na sih loh nading uh an kisam hi. Note lakah khat beek in a lutang pan a samzang khat zong mansuah lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
44027035	Hih teng a cih khit ciangin anlum honkhat la-a, amaute khempeuh mai-ah Pasian tungah lungdam a ko hi. Tua ciangin balkhama, a ne hi.
44027036	Amaute khempeuh zong lungkhauh kik uh a, an tawm tek a ne uh hi.
44027037	Tembaw tunga tuang mi a vekpi in 276 ka pha uh hi.
44027038	A duh zahzah uh a nek khit uh ciangin tembaw a zang tuam nadingin buhhumte tuipi sungah a lawmkhia uh hi.
44027039	Khua a vak ciangin a gam a theih loh uh hangin tuipi gei sehtak khat mu uh a, ahi theih liai leh tua lai-ah tembaw khawlsak a sawm uh hi.
44027040	A sikkipte attat in tuipi sungah nusia uh a, tua hun mah in tembaw heina khihna khaute zong a phel uh hi. Tua ciangin tembaw mailam puanzak huih mut dingin khai uh a, tui gei lam ka zuan uh hi.
44027041	Ahi hangin tembaw in sehtak kho khat phukha-a, leitungah a kingacip hi. A mailam in phukha a, tangkhia thei nawn loin a nunglam zong tui kilok in a sattam gawp hi.
44027042	Galkapte in thong kiate tui pekin a suahtak khak ding uh dalna in thah a sawm uh hi.
44027043	Ahi hangin zakhat ukpa in Paul suaktasak nuam ahi manin amau sawmna a hihsak kei hi. Amah in tui pek theite tembaw tung pan leitung ah a diangkhia masa dingin thu a pia hi.
44027044	A om lai teng singpek tung peuh, tembaw sia tung peuh ah tuangin a pai uh kul hi. Hici bangin mi khempeuh leitung ah a suakta uh hi.
44028001	Tui gei-ah ka suahtak tak uh ciangin tua tuikulh Malta ahilam ka thei pan uh hi.
44028002	Ko tungah tuikulh mite, lamet loh zahin hong migi uh hi. Guah zu a khua dam ahi manin mei hong cihsakin hong muak uh hi.
44028003	Paul in singkang lom khat tomin meikhuk ah a khul hi. Meisa sa-in ngan khat taikhia-a, a khutah a kivial hi.
44028004	Tuikulh mite in a khuta gul kikhai a muh uh ciangin, “Hih pa tualthat hi ngel incin, tuipi sung pan a suahtak hangin Thutang in amah a nuntak ding phal lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
44028005	Ahi hangin Paul in mei sungah gul singkhia-a, a na a thuak kha kei hi.
44028006	Mite in hong bawk kei leh si-in hong puksuk ding hi, ci-in a muangmawh uh hi. Sawt veipi ngak uh a, amah bangmah a cih loh ciangin a ngaihsutna uh laih in, “Amah pasian khat hi,” a ci uh hi.
44028007	Tua lai tawh kigamla lo-ah tuikulh-a kumpi nasem ulianpa Publius neihsa huang a om hi. Amah in kote a inn ah hong tungsaka, ni thum sung limtakin zin hong do hi.
44028008	A pa gilsan le nattun thuahin cina-a lupna ah lum hi. Amah vehin inn sungah Paul va tum a, thu a ngetsak khit ciangin ama tungah a khut nga-a, a damsak hi.
44028009	Hih banga a damsak ciangin tuikulh-a cina dang teng hong pai-in a dam uh hi.
44028010	Amaute in lam tampi ah kote hong pahtawi uh a ka dinkhiat kuan uh ciangin ka taksapnate uh hong guan uh hi.
44028011	Kha thum khit ciangin tua tuikulh a, phalbi sung a na khawlsa tembaw khatah tuangin ka pai uh hi. Alexandria-te tembaw hi-a a mai-ah pasian pengte, Castor le Pollux lim a kisuang hi.
44028012	Syracuse ah ka lut uh a, tua lai-ah nithum ka taam uh hi.
44028013	Tua panin ka dingkhia leuleu uh a, Rhegium ka tung uh hi. A zing ciangin khanglam huih hong nunga, a thai ciangin Puteoli ka tung uh hi.
44028014	Tua lai-ah sanggamte pawlkhat na om uh a, amaute in nipikal khat hong taampih un, ci-in hong kho uh hi.
44028015	Tua lai-a om sanggamte in ka pai uh a zak uh ciangin Appius sumbuk-zawn le Buzung Thumte dong hong zinin na dawn uh hi. Hih mite muh in Paul in, Pasian tungah lungdam ko-in a hanthawn hi.
44028016	Rome ka tun uh ciangin a cing galkap khat tawh, Paul ama thu-a a om ding a kiphal hi.
44028017	Ni thum khit ciangin amah in Jew makaite a samkhawm hi. Amaute a kikhop khit uh ciangin Paul in, “Ka sanggamte aw, i minamte tung ahi a, i pupa ngeina tungah ahi zongin bangmah siatna bawl lo napi Jerusalem ah kei hong kimanin Rome mite tungah hong ki-ap hi.
44028018	Amaute in kei hong sittel uh a, sih dan thuak ding zahin ka mawhna om lo ahi manin hong khah kik nuam uh hi.
44028019	Ahi hangin Jew-te in a nial uh ciangin kei ma mite tungah ka thu ka tut nop man hi loin, Caesar tungah ka thu hong kitunsak teitei ahi hi.
44028020	Tua thu hangin note tawh maitang kimu a, kiho nuamin kong sapsak ahi hi. Israel-te lametna hanga hih sik khainiang tawh hong kikhih ahi hi,” a ci hi.
44028021	Amaute in, “Kote in nang thu tawh kisai-in Judea gam panin lai khatpeuh lah ka ngah kei uh a, tua pana hong pai sanggamte kuamah lah nang thu hong ko-a asia-a gen a om kei hi.
44028022	Ahi hangin mun khempeuh ah mite in, hih biakna pawltuam thu a langpan uh thei ka hi manun nang bang na ci muh hiam, ka za nuam uh hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
44028023	Amaute in Paul tawh kimuh kik ding ni khat seh uh a, a omna munah mi a tamzaw tham a va pai uh hi. Amaute kiangah zingsang a kipan nitak dong, amah in Pasian gam thu hilhcianin pulak a, Moses Thukham le Kamsangte panin Jesu thu ah amaute thuzawh a sawm hi.
44028024	Pawlkhatte ama thugen in thuzawh a, ahi hangin, adangte in a um kei uh hi.
44028025	Amau sung le amau sung kithutuak lo uh a, Paul in hih a tawpkhakna a gen khit ciangin a paikhia hi: “Na pu na pa-te uh kiangah Khasiangtho in kamsangpa Isiah tungtawna a gen a man hi. Amah in,
44028026	‘Hih mite kiangah pai inla, “Note in na zak ngitnget uh hangin na theitel ngei kei ding uh hi; na muh ngitnget uh hangin na mutel ngei kei ding uh hi,”
44028027	‘Hih mite lungtang sak lua ahi manin a bil uh tawh za mel lo uh a, mitsi uh hi. Tua hikeileh a mit uh tawh mu thei-in a bil uh tawh za a, a lungtang uh tawh theitel in kihei ding uh a, amaute ka damsak kha ding hi,’a ci hi.
44028028	"Tua ahi manin Pasian hotkhiatna Gentile-te tungah kipuak ta ding hi; amaute in a ngai ding uh hi, cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi,” a ci hi.b
44028029	Hih teng a gen khit ciangin Jew-te in ciahsan uh a, amau le amau sungah kiselna lianpi a om hi.
44028030	Ahang in, tua lai-ah kum nih hul, ama sapsa inn sungah Paul om a, amah tawh a kimu nuam khempeuh a sang hi.
44028031	A dal om loin hangtakin Pasian gam thu hilh a, Topa Jesu Khrist thu a sinsak hi.
45001001	Sawltakpi dinga kisam Pasian lungdamna-thu hilh dinga kisehtuama, Khrist Jesu nasem keimah Paul in –
45001002	Pasian in a kamsangte tungtawnin Laisiangtho sungah a ciamkholhsa,
45001003	a Tapa tawh kisai lungdamna-thu, amah mihing pianngei-a David suan,
45001004	sianthona Khaa tungtawna misi pana a thawhkikna hanga Pasian Tapa ahina vangliatna tawh a kipulakkhia pab i Topa Jesu Khrist ahi hi.
45001005	Ama tungtawn le ama min hangin upna pana piang thumanna-ah Gentile-te khempeuh lakpanin mite sam dingin kote in hehpihna le sawltakpi za ka ngah uh hi.
45001006	Jesu Khrist adinga kisam mite lakah note zong na kihel uh hi.
45001007	Pasian in it-a misiang dinga a sap Rome a omte khempeuh tungah: I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
45001008	Amasa penin na upna uh leitung khempeuh ah kithang ahi manin note khempeuh hangin Jesu Khrist tungtawnin ka Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi.
45001009	Hun khempeuh a ka thungetna ah note kong phawk tawntung lam, ama Tapa lungdamna-thu ka lungsim khempeuh tawh hilh a, a na ka sep Pasian ka teci ahi hi.
45001010	Tua ciangin tu-in Pasian deihna banga note kianga kong pai theih nadingin lampi kihong ta buang hen, ci-in thu ka ngen hi.
45001011	Note hong thakhauhsak ding khalam letsong kong piak theih nadingin note kong muh ding ka lunggulh hi.
45001012	Tua pen, kei le note upna tawh khat le khat i kihanthawn tuah theih nading ahi hi.
45001013	Sanggamte aw, Gentile dangte lakah an ka lak bangin note lakah zong ka lak theih nadingin note kianga pai ding tamveipi ka geel (hangin tu ciang dong hong kidaltan ahilam) na phawk loh khak ding uh ka deih kei hi.
45001014	Greek-te le Greek lote tawh ahi zongin, a pilte le a haite tungah bat ka nei tuak hi.
45001015	Rome a om note kiangah zong lungdamna-thu hilh ding ka lawp mahmah na tua hang ahi hi.
45001016	Tua lungdamna-thu a um mite peuhmah hotkhiat nadinga Pasian vangliatna ahi manin ka maizumpih kei hi; a masa in Jew mite, tua khit ciangin Gentile-te ading ahi hi.
45001017	Ahang in, “A thumaante upna hangin a nungta ding uh hi,”c ci-a kigelhsa bang tektek in lungdamna-thu ah Pasian tung pan thumaanna kilaakkhia a, tua thumaana a masa pen pan a nunung pend dong upna hang ahi hi.
45001018	Amau tatsiatna tawh thutak neng cipa, pasian-milohna le tatsiatna khempeuh tungah Pasian thangpaihna van panin hong kilaak hi.
45001019	Pasian tawh kisai theihtel ding khempeuh Pasian in amau tungah kitelsak khin hi.
45001020	Ahang in, leitung piancil a kipan a kimu thei lo Pasian pianziate, a tawntung vangliatna le a Pasian pianngei a kipiangsaksa nate panin kitheitelin kimu ta ahi manin mihingte in pauhlam ding a nei kei uh hi.
45001021	Tua hi-a amaute in Pasian thei napi Pasian bangin minthangsak lo in ama tungah lungdamna a ko kei uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute ngaisutte thu ginalo suakin a lungtang haite uh a mialcip hi.
45001022	Amaute pil kisa napi mihai suak uh a,
45001023	a si thei mihing, vasate, ganhingte le a bokvak ganhingte tawh kisuna kibawl, limte tawh a si thei lo Pasian minthanna a kheng uh hi.
45001024	Tua ahi manin amaute khat le khat a zumhuaipi-a a pumpi uh kizang dingin mawhdim a lunggulhna uh tawh kizui-a, numei-pasal paktat dingin Pasian in a ngawhngatsan hi.
45001025	Amaute in Pasian thutak zuauthu tawh kheng uh a, a Piangsakpa sangin a piansak nate bia-in a na sem uh hi. Amah ahileh a kiphat tawntung hi. Amen.
45001026	Hih thu hangin Pasian in amaute a zumhuai kilunggulhnate ah a ngawh ngatsan hi. A numeite nangawn un, pasal tawh lupkhawmna ngeina uh a ngeina lo tawh a kheng uh hi.
45001027	Tua mah bangin pasalte in zong numei tawh lupkhawmna ngeina nusia in pasal le pasal a kilung gulh mahmah uh hi. Pasalte, pasal dangte tawh a muh thadahhuai-in gamta uh a, amau lehtatna tawh kituak gawtna a thuak uh hi.
45001028	Tua banah Pasian theihna kepcing ding thaman sa lo uh ahi manin hih dinga kilawm lo pipi a hih nadingun lungsim siat dimdem na-ah amaute a ngawhngatsan hi.
45001029	Amaute tatsiatna, gitlohna, duhhopna le lungsim siat dimdemna tawh kidim uh hi. Amaute enna, tualthahna, kitotna, khemna le etsatna tawh a kidim uh hi. Amaute, gensiathatte,
45001030	gendai hatte, Pasian muhdahte, kimisakte, kisatheite le kihisakte ahi uh hi. Amaute in gitlohna zia a thakthak phuan uh hi; amaute in a nu-le-pate uh thu a mang kei uh hi;
45001031	amaute, ngaihsutna neilo, upna nei lo, itna nei lo, hehpihna nei lo mi a suak uh hi.
45001032	Tua bang a hihte sih ding kilawm hi cih thukip Pasian thukhenna maan amaute in thei napi, hih nate tektek mah hih zom tham loin tua banga gamtate a thukimpih zawsop uh hi.
45002001	Tua ahi ciangin midangte tunga na thukhenna mun mah ah nangmah a kimawhpaih na hih manin midang khatpeuh tunga thukhen nang in paulap ding na nei kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang a thukhenpa mah in tuate mah in tua mah na hih hi.
45002002	Tua banga hihte tunga Pasian thukhenna in thutak pansan hi, cih i thei ciat hi.
45002003	Tua ahi ciangin mihing lel ahi nang in amaute tungah thu khen napi amau hihte mah na hih ciangin Pasian thukhenna pan a suakta dingin na kingaisun hiam?
45002004	Ahikeh Pasian migitna in kisikna lamah nang hong pi lam phawk loin a kicing ama migitna, a thuakzawhna le a lungduainate simmawh na hi hiam?
45002005	Ahi hangin na lungkhauhna le na kisik theihlohna lungtang hangin Pasian thukhenna maan a kilaak hun ahi Pasian’ thangpaihna ni adingin nang le nang tungah thangpaihna a khol na hi hi.
45002006	Pasian in “Mi khempeuh amau gamtatsa bangin a pia ciat ding hi.”a
45002007	A hoih gamtat denna tawh minthanna pahtawina le sihtheih nawnlohna a zongte tungah, amah in nuntak tawntungna a pia ding hi.
45002008	Ahi hangin ama angsung bek khuala, thutak nialin gitlohna a zuite adingin thangpaihna le hehna a om ding hi.
45002009	Gilo a gamta mihing khempeuh, a masa in Jew-te tua ciangin Gentile-te tungah lungmanna le lungdonna a tung ding hi.
45002010	Ahi hangin a hoiha gamtate khempeuh, a masa in Jew-te tua ciangin Gentile-te tungah minthanna pahtawina le lemna a tung ding hi.
45002011	Ahang in, Pasian in angvan tuam nei lo hi.
45002012	Thukham pualama mawhte khempeuh, thukham pua mah ah mangthang ding uh a, thukham nuai-a mawhte khempeuh thukham pansan in thu a khen ding hi.
45002013	Ahang in, Pasian muhna ah thukham a zate a thumaan hi loin thukham a mangte a thumaanin kipulak ding hi.
45002014	(A taktak in thukham nei Gentile-te in amau pianngei, ngeina pana thukham in a kalh nate a hih uh ciangin amaute in thukham nei lo napi, amau adingin tuate thukham suak ahi khit nungsang,
45002015	thukham in a kalhte amau lungtang ah kigelh hi, cih amau mah in kilangsak uh a, amau kitheihna lungsim in teci pang ahi manin a ngaisutnate un amaute a mawhsak a diksak thei zel hi.)
45002016	Keima hilh lungdamna-thu in a pulakkhiat mah bangin Pasian in Jesu Khrist tungtawna mi hingte’ thusimte a khen ni ciangin hih thu a tung ding hi.
45002017	Tu-in nang le nang Jew mi kici na hileh; thukham tungah kinga a, Pasian tawh na kizopna kisialhpih na hileh;
45002018	thukham in nang lam hong lah manin ama deihna thei-a a thupizaw nate a paktapa na hileh;
45002019	mittaw lampipa, khuamial sunga omte adinga khuavakpa
45002020	mihaite lamlakpa le naupangnote a hilhpa, theihna le thutak kiguanna thukham nei kici na hileh;
45002021	nang, midangte a hilhpa, nang le nang kihilh lo maw? Midangte guta lo dinga a hilh nang guta maw?
45002022	Nang mite angkawm lo dinga a hilhpa nang angkawm maw? Nang milim a kihpa nang biakinnpi luh maw?
45002023	Thukham kisialhpihpa aw, nang, thukham palsatna tawh Pasian daisak maw?
45002024	A kigelhsa mah bangin: “Note hangin Gentile-te lakah Pasian min kigendai hi.”b
45002025	Thukham na zuih uh leh vunat in man a nei hi. Ahi hangin thukham na palsat uh leh vunat loh mah na suak uh hi.
45002026	Vunat lo mite in thukham in a kalhte a zuih uh leh amaute vunat bangin kisim lo ding ahi hiam?
45002027	Taksa-a vunat lo napi, thukham a zui mi in, ngeina-bucing gelhsa neic a, vunat napi thukham palsatpa nang, hong mawhpaih ding hi.
45002028	A pualam Jew mi hihna bek tawh mi khatpeuh Jew mi a suak hi lo hi. Pualam le taksa-a vunatna lel tawh, vunat a kisuak tuan kei hi.
45002029	Ahi peuhmah kei hi. A sunglam Jew mi hihna bek tawh mi khatpeuh Jew mi a suak hi-a tua mah bangin vunatna in gelhsa ngeina bucing tawh hi lo, Kha tawh lungtanga vunatna ahi hi. Tua bang mipa, mite in a phat loh uh hangin Pasian in a phat hi.
45003001	Tua a hileh Jew mi hina hangin bang phattuamna oma, vunat mi suahna in bang man nei ahi hiam?
45003002	Lam khempeuh ah phattuamna a nei kim hi. A masa penin amaute tungah Pasian kammalte tektek a kikemsak khinsa ahi hi.
45003003	Mi kimkhat in upna nei kei leh bangci ding? Amau uplahna in Pasian muan huaina a guaksuaksak ding hiam? A guaksuaksak peuhmah kei hi!
45003004	Mi khempeuh zuau gen hi henla, Pasian a thutak hi ta hen. “Na thukhenna-a na zawhna le na kammal-a na thumaanna a kilat theih nading ahi hi,”a ci-a kigelhsa bang ahi hi.
45003005	Ahi hangin eite thumaanlohna in Pasian thumaanna siangtakin kilangsak zaw ahileh bang i gen ding hiam? Eite tungah Pasian thangpaihna hong tun manin Pasian thutang lo hi, i ci ding hiam? (Mihing pansante mah zanga sel ka hi hi.)
45003006	Ahi peuhmah kei hi! Tua bang hi mawk leh Pasian in leitung mite tungah thu bangci khen theih ding hiam?
45003007	"Keima zuau theihna in Pasian thutakna liansak zaw a, ama minthanna khangsak ahileh bang hangin kei mawh nei mi khat bangin hong kimawhpaih lai ahi hiam,” mi khatpeuh in ci kha thei ding hi.
45003008	Mi kimkhat in, “‘A hoih pian nadingin a sia bawl ni,’ ci uh hi,” ci-in hong gendai a, hong mawhmat uh bangin, bang hanga ci lel lo i hi hiam? Amaute in a kilawm bang mawhpaihna a thuak ding uh hi.
45003009	Tua ahileh thu bangci khup ding i hi hiam? Eite i hoihzaw tuan hiam?b I hoihzaw tuan peuhmah kei hi! Jew-te le Gentile-te khempeuh mawhna nuai-ah a kibangin om khin uh hi, i ci khin hi.
45003010	"Mi thumaan khat beek a om kei hi, khat nangawn a om kei hi;
45003011	a theitel kuamah om lo a, Pasian a zong khat beek a om kei hi.
45003012	A vekpi un lampial khin uh a, amaute a vekpi un kimanna a nei kei uh hi: a hoiha gamta kuamah om lo a, khat nangawn om lo hi,”c
45003013	"Amau gawlte hahkhuk kihongsa hi-a, amaute leii in zuauthu a gen hi."d Amaute muk ah mualtan gu a om hi."e
45003014	"Amaute kam, hamsia le kamkha tawh a dim hi.”f
45003015	Amaute khe sisan luangsak dingin manlang hi.
45003016	Amaute paina peuhpeuh siatna le gentheihna dima,
45003017	amaute in kilemna lampi a thei kei uh hi.”g
45003018	"Amaute mit ah Pasian kihtakna a om kei hi.”h ci-a kigelhsa bang ahi hi.
45003019	Kam khatpeuh a kisipsak nading le leitung mi khempeuh in Pasian mai-ah sittelna a thuak nadingin thukham in a gen khempeuh thukham nuai-a omte tunga a gen ahilam tu-in eite in i thei hi.
45003020	Tua ahi manin ama muhna ah thukham zuihna hangin kuamah thumaanin a kiseh kei ding hi; tua hi lo zaw in thukham tungtawnin mawhna i phawk hi.
45003021	Ahi hangin tu-in thukham tawh kisai kha lo, Thukham le Kamsangte in teci a pansa uh Pasian kiang pana hong pai thumaanna, kitheisak khin ta hi.
45003022	Pasian kiang pana hong pai hih thumaanna Jesu Khrist upna tungtawnin a umte khempeuh tungah a tung hi. A kilamdanna a om kei hi.
45003023	Ahang in, mi khempeuh mawh khin a, Pasian minthanna ngah zo loin,
45003024	Khrist Jesu hanga hong pai tatkhiatna tungtawnin, ama hehpihna hangin a khawnkhonga diktansak ahi uh hi.
45003025	Ama sisan upna tungtawnin thoihdamna-a biakpiakna-in Pasian in amah hong pia hi.i Amah thutanna a lahkhiat nadingin hih banga a hih ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a thuakzawhna hangin nidang lai-a mawhnate gawt loin hawi lai-a,
45003026	tu-in amah thutang ahi ding le Jesu sunga upna a ngah mitdik a tangsakpa ahi lai dingin a thutangna hih bangin a lak hi.
45003027	Tua ahileh kisialhna koi-ah a om hiam? A kipuaseh zo hi. Bang thu siksan in? Thukham zuihna hang maw? Hi lo hi. Upna hang ahi hi.
45003028	Ahang in, mi khatin thukham zuihna hang hi lo upna hangin dik a tang hi cih i kiplet hi.
45003029	Pasian, Jew-te bek Pasian ahi hiam? Gentile-te Pasian zong hi lo hiam? Hi mah hi.
45003030	Vunatte amau upna hangin midik tangsak dinga, tua upna mah tungtawnin vunat lote, dik a tangsak ding Pasian khat bek om ahi nungsang amah, Gentile-te Pasian zong ahi hi.
45003031	Tua hileh hih upna tawh eite in thukham guaksuaksak i hi hiam? A hi peuhmah kei hi! Tua hi lo zaw in eite in thukham i kipsak hi.
45004001	Tua ahileh i pu Abraham in hih thu ah bang mukhia ci ding i hi hiam?
45004002	A taktak in, Abraham in a sepsa hangin diktang hileh amah in kisialh nading a nei hi – ahi hangin Pasian mai-ah ahi kei hi.
45004003	Laisiangtho in bang ci ahi hiam? “Abraham in Pasian na uma, tua ama upna thumaanna in kisimsak hi,”a ci hi.
45004004	Mi khat in na a sep ciangin tua ama nasep thaman pen letsong in kisim lo-a, thalawhsa in kisim hi.
45004005	Ahi hang in na sem lo a, mi tatsiate dik a tangsak Pasian a muang mipa ama upna pen thumaanna-in kisim hi.
45004006	Sepnate tawh kisai lo, Pasian in thumaan hi, ci-a a sim mipa thupha ngahna thu David in a gen lai-in tua mah a na gen ahi hi. A gen na ah:
45004007	"A tatkhialhnate uh kimaisak a, a mawhnate uh a kikhuhsakte, thupha ngah ahi uh hi.
45004008	Topa in ama langah a mawhna mawhna-a a simsak lopa thupha ngah ahi hi.”b a na ci hi.
45004009	Hih thupha vunatte ading bek ahi hiam? Vunat lote ading zong hi lo ahi hiam? Abraham upna ama adingin thumaanna in kisim khin hi, cih i gengen lai hi.
45004010	A bangci dana kisim ahi hiam? A vunat khit ciang ahi hiam? A at ma ahi hiam? A at khit hi lo, a at ma ahi hi!
45004011	Vunat ahi nai loh lai-a upna hanga a ngah thumaanna ciamteh nadingin vunat ciamtehna a ngah hizaw hi. Tua ahi ciangin amau adinga thumaanna-a a kisimsak theih nadingin vunat lo napi-a a umte khempeuh pa hong suak hi.
45004012	Amah vunat bek hi lo, i pa Abraham in a vunat ma-a, a neih upna khekhap a zui vunatte pa zong ahi hi.
45004013	Leitung luahpa ahi nadingin kam ciam, Abraham le a suan a khakte in a ngahna uh thukham tungtawn hi loin upna hanga hong piang thumaanna tungtawn hizaw hi.
45004014	Ahang in, thukham suanga nungtate gouluahte hi ahi uh leh upna in man nei lo a, tua kamciam in zong kimanna a nei kei hi.
45004015	Bang hang hiam cih leh thukham in thangpaihna a tun hi. Tua hi-a thukham om lohna ah tatkhialhna zong a om kei hi.
45004016	Tua ahi manin tua kamciam hehpihna hang ahi theih nading le thukham suangte hi loin Abraham upna bang upna a suangte ahi ama suan le khakte khempeuh tungah thukho ahi theih nadingin upna hanga hong tung ahi hi. Amah, eite khempeuh pa ahi hi.
45004017	"Nang minam tampite pa kong suaksak khin zo hi.”c ci-a ki gelhsa bang ahi hi. Amah a site nuntakna pia-a a om lopi nangawn a omsa banga a genpa, a uppa Pasian muhna ah eite pa ahi hi.
45004018	"Tua mah bangin na suan na khakte zong ahi ding hi,”d ci-a ama tunga kigensa bangin Abraham in lamet nading om lo napi lamen in um ahi manin minam tampite pa a suak hi.
45004019	Amah a khan kum zakhat bang pha ta a, ama pumpi a si tawh kibang ahina le Sarah sul zong a keu ahina thu upna kiam tuan loin a maituah hi.
45004020	Tua hi napi Pasian kamciam tawh kisai-in uplahna hangin hoi lo, a upna khauhzawin Pasian minthanna apia zo hi.
45004021	Pasian in a kamciam banga a tang tunsak theih nading vang a neihna thu, kiptakin a sang hi.
45004022	"Ama adingin thumaanna in kisim hi,” cih hih thu hang ahi hi.
45004023	"Ama adingin kisim hi,” cih kammalte amah guak ading bek hi lo a,
45004024	i Topa Jesu misi pana a thosakpa Pasian in thumaanna-a a simsak ding a um eite adingin zong a kigelh ahi hi.
45004025	Eite mawhna hangin amah sihna sungah kipiakhia a, diktansakna i ngah nadingin kihing kiksak hi.
45005001	Tua ahi manin upna tungtawnin diktansak i hi khit nungsang eitea Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin Pasian tawh i kilem hi.
45005002	Ama tungtawnin upna hangin tu-a i omna hehpihna sungah lut theihna i ngah hi. Tua hi a, Pasian minthanna lametna sungah eite i nuam hi.b
45005003	Tua bek tham lo i thuakna ah zong i nuam hi.c Bang hang hiam cih leh thuakna in thuakzawhna a piangsak hi;
45005004	thuak zawhna in nundan piangsak a, nundan in lametna piangsak ahilam eite in i thei hi.
45005005	Pasian in eite hong piak Khasiangtho tawh i lungsungah ama hong itna hong sungkhia khinta ahi manin lametna in eite hong lungkiasak kei hi.
45005006	Vangliatna i neih loh lai, a hun laitak lianin pasian-milote ading Khrist hong si hi, cih na thei hi.
45005007	Mi hoih adingin a singam a om kha mawh kei ding hi; ahi zongin mi thumaan khat adingin a singam kuamah a om khol kei ding hi.
45005008	Ahi hangin Pasian in eite hong it takpina hih bangin hong lak hi: Eite mawhnei i hi laitakin eite adingin Khrist a si hi.
45005009	Tu-in ama sisan hangin diktansak i hi khit nungsang, ama tungtawnin Pasian thangpaihna pan honkhiat in i om zawsem ding hi!
45005010	Pasian gal i hi laitakin, ama Tapa sihna tungtawnin eite amah tawh hong kilemkiksak ahileh tua banga kilem khinsate ama hinna tungtawnin hotkhiat in i om zawsem ding hi!
45005011	Tua bek tham loin ama tungtawna kilemkikna i ngahna pa i Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin Pasian sungah i nuam hi.
45005012	Tua ahi manin mi khat tungtawnin leitungah mawhna a lut bang tektekin mawhna tungtawnin sihna lut-a mi khempeuh mawh khin zo ahi manin mi khempeuh tungah sihna a tung hi.
45005013	Ahang in, thukham a kipiak ma-in leitungah mawhna na om zo hi. Ahi hangin thukham a om loh ciangin mawhna pen mawhna-in a kisim kei hi.
45005014	Tua hi napi, Adam hun pan Moses hun dong Adam palsat banga thupiak palsatna hanga a khial tektek lote nangawn tungah sihna in a uk hi. Adam pen hong tung ding pa lahna ahi hi.
45005015	Ahi hangin letsong pen thupalsatna tawh a kibang kei hi. Ahang in, tua mi khat thupalsatna hangin mi tampi si ahileh, Pasian hehpihna le mi khat mah ahi Jesu Khrist hehpihna hanga hong tung tua letsong, mi tampi tungah dimlet zawsem hi!
45005016	Tua ciang leuleu in Pasian letsong le tua mi khat mawhna hanga thupiang a kibang kei hi: Thukhenna in mawhna khat zui-in mawhpaihna tun a, ahi hangin letsong in thupalsatna tampi zui-in diktansakna a tun hi.
45005017	Ahang in, tua mi khat thupalsatna hangin tua mi tungtawnin sihna in hong uk ahileh Pasian hong piak a kicing hehpihna le thumaanna letsong a sangte in mikhat Jesu Khrist tungtawnin amau nuntakna sungah uk zawtham ding hi lo ahi hiam?
45005018	Tua bang diudeu in, thupalsatna khat in mawhpaihna piangsak ahileh thumaan khat bawlna in zong mi khempeuh nuntakna a tun diktansakna a piangsak hi.
45005019	Ahang in, tua mi khat thumanlohna tungtawnin mi tampi mawhnei a suah bang tektek in mi khat thumanna tungtawnin zong mi tampi mi thumaan kisuaksak ding hi.
45005020	Thupalsatna a khan nadingin thu kham hong kipiak beh hi. Ahi hangin mawhna a khanna munah hehpihna a khang semsem zaw hi.
45005021	Tua pen, sihna sungah mawhna in a uk bang tektek in i Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin nuntak tawntungna a tun dingin hehpihna in thumaanna tungtawna a uk theih nading ahi hi.
45006001	Tua ahileh bang i gen ding hiam? Hehpihna a khan nadingin mawhna bawl denden ding i hi hiam?
45006002	Mawh denden peuhmah lo e! Mawhna i sihsan zo hi; tua mawhna sungah bangci nuntak thei lai ding i hi hiam?
45006003	Khrist Jesu sunga kibaptise eite khempeuh ama sihna sungah zong a kibaptise zo i hilam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
45006004	Tua ahi manin Pa minthanna tungtawnin misi pan Khrist a thawh kik mah bangin eite zong nuntakna thak sungah i nuntak theih nadingin ama sihna sungah i kibaptisena tungtawnin amah tawh i kivuikhawm hi.
45006005	Ama sihna sungah eite kigawm khawm khin i hileh ama thawhkikna sungah zong amah tawh i kigawm khawm taktak ding hi.
45006006	Ahang in, mawhna pumpi’ thahatna a beia a suah nading le mawhna sila i suah nawn loh nadingin i pianlui pumpi amah tawh a kilhlum khin zo hi, cih i thei hi.
45006007	Bang hang hiam cih leh a si khinsa mi peuhmah mawhna pan a suakta hi.
45006008	Tu-in Jesu tawh i sihkhawm leh amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi, cih zong i um hi.
45006009	Ahang in, misi pan Khrist kithosak khin ahi nungsang a si kik thei nawn kei ding hi, cih i thei hi; sihna in amah a uk zo nawn kei hi.
45006010	Ama sih sihna pen khatvei-a cing dingin mawhna sihsanna ahi hi; ahi hangin ama nuntak nuntakna pen Pasian ah a nungta ahi hi.
45006011	Tua mah bangin note, mawhna sihsan khinin kingaihsun unla, Pasian ah Jesu sunga a nungta in na kingaihsun un.
45006012	Tua ahi manin mawhna kihhuai lunggulhnate na zuih khak loh nadingun a si thei na pumpi uh mawhna na uksak kei un.
45006013	Tatsiatna vanzat dingin na pumpi nate uh mawhna tungah na pia kei un. Ahi hangin sihna pan nuntakna a kitunsate bangin Pasian tungah nomau na kipia zaw unla na pumpi nate uh thumaanna vanzat dingin amah na pia zaw un.
45006014	Ahang in, note thukham nuai-a om hi loin hehpihna nuai-a om na hi manun mawhna in note hong uk teitei lo ding hi.
45006015	Tua ahileh bang? Eite thukham nuai-ah om hi loin hehpihna nuai-a om i hi manin mawhna i bawl ding hiam? A hi peuhmah kei hi!
45006016	Mi khatpeuh tungah ama thu mang dingin na kipiak uh ciangin ama thu na man pa uh sila na hi uh bangin, sihna ah hong tun mawhna sila na hi uh zongin, thumaanna ah hong tun thuman'na sila na hi uh zongin a thu na man pa uh sila na hilam uh thei lo na hi uh hiam?
45006017	Ahi hangin mawhna sila na hi ngei uh hangin no hong ki-apsa thuhilhna, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh mang na hi manun Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen.
45006018	Mawhna panin note hong kisuaktasak khin zo a, thumaanna sila na suak khin ta uh hi.
45006019	Na pianngei pumpi uh ah thanem na hi manun mihing kammal tawh hong gen ka hi hi. Na pumpi nate uh, sian tholohna le a khang semsem tatsiatna-ah sila dingin na piak ngei bang tektek un, sianthona hong tun ding thumaanna-ah sila dingin na pumpi nate uh tu-in na pia un.
45006020	Mawhna sila na hi laitakun thumaanna in hong ukna pan na suakta zo uh hi.
45006021	Tua hun laitakin tu laitaka na maizumpih uh nate panin bang phat tuamna gah at na hi uh hiam? Tua nate in sihna a tun hi.
45006022	Ahi hangin tu-in mawhna panin note hong khahkhia a, Pasian lamah sila suak khin zo na hi manun na at uh phattuamna in sianthona ah hong tuna, tua in nuntak tawntungna hong tun hi.
45006023	Ahang in, mawhna thaman sihna hi-a, ahi hangin Pasian letsong ahileh i Topa Jesu Khrist sungab nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
45007001	Sanggamte aw, thukham theite tunga thugen ka hi hi. Mi khat a nuntak sung teng bek thukham in ama tungah thu nei hi, cih thei hi lo na hi hiam?
45007002	Gentehna in pasal nei numei khat, a pasal a nuntak laiteng thukham hangin a pasal tawh ki-awhcip hi. Ahi hangin a pasal a sih leh kitenna tawh kisai thukham panin amah a kikhahkhia ahi hi.
45007003	Tua ahi ciangin a pasal a nuntak lai-in midang khat a tenpih leh amah angkawmnu a suak hi. Ahi hangin a pasal a sih leh tua thukham panin amah a kikhahkhia hi-a, midang khat a tenpih zongin amah angkawmnu a suak kei hi.
45007004	Tua ahi ciangin sanggamte aw, misi pana tho kik midang khat tawh ki-awh a, Pasian ah gah na gah theih nadingun Khrist pumpi tungtawnin note in zong thukham na sihsan uh hi.
45007005	Pianngeia mawhna in eite hong uk laitakin, sihna ading gah i gah nadingin thukham in a khanlawhsak lunggulh mawhnate in i pumpi sungah na a sem hi.
45007006	Ahi hangin tu-in ahileh hun khat lai-a eite hong hencip pen i sihsan zo-a a kigelhsa ngeina-bucinga nuntakna lui sung hi lo Kha a nuntakna thak sungah na i sep theih nadingin tua thukham panin eite hong kikhahkhia zo hi.
45007007	Tua hileh bang i gen ding hiam? Thukham pen mawhna ahi hiam? Hi zenzen lo hi! Thukham tungtawn hi kei leh mawhna bang hiam, cih ka thei kei takpi ding hi. Ahang in, thukham in “Deihgawh kei in”b na ci lo hileh deihgawh kici bang cihna hiam, cih ka thei kei ding hi.
45007008	Ahi hangin thupiak in a piankhiatsak hun hoih, mawhna in na bawh lian-a, keima sungah deihgawhna namkim gahkhiasak hi. Ahang in, thukham pualam ah mawhna a si hi
45007009	Hun khat lai-in thukham pua-ah ka nungta hi; ahi hangin thupiak hong tun khit ciangin mawhna nungta a kei ka si hi.
45007010	Nuntakna a tun ding thupiak tektek in a taktakin sihna a tun zawsop hi, cih ka theikhia hi.
45007011	Ahang in, thupiak in a piankhiatsak hun hoih na bawh lian-a, kei hong khemin thupiak tungtawnin kei hong sisak hi.
45007012	Tua hi-a thukham siangtho a, thupiak zong siangtho-in maanin a hoih hi.
45007013	Tua ahileh hoih a kici penin kei adingin sihna suak ahi hiam? Ahi peuhmah kei hi. Mawhna pen mawhna banga a kitheihtel theih nadingin a hoih tungtawnin keima sungah sihna a piangsak hi; tua in thupiak tungtawnin mawhna pen mawhna taktak a suah takpi nading ahi hi.
45007014	Thukham ahileh khalam thu ahilam i thei hi; ahi hangin keimah ka khami kei a, mawhna ah sila banga hong kizuak ahi hi.
45007015	Ka hih nop pen ka hih kei a, ahi hangin ka muhdah pen hih ka hi manin, ka hih pen ka theitel kei hi.
45007016	Ka hih nop loh pen hih ka hileh thukham hoih hi, ci-a thukimpih ka hi hi.
45007017	Tua hi-a tua banga a gamtang pen kei mahmah hi nawn loin ka sunga nungta mawhna ahi hi.
45007018	A hoih bawl ding ka lunggulh hangin bawl thei lo ka hi manin mawhna a dim keima pianngei pumpic sungah a hoih bangmah nungta lo hi, cih ka thei hi.
45007019	Ahang in, kei hihte a hoih ka hih nopte ahi kei hi; hi lo hi, ka hih nop loh a siate ka hih den zaw hi.
45007020	Tu-in ka hih nop lohte hih ka hileh, a hih pen kei hi nawn loin ka sunga nungta mawhna hih ahi hi.
45007021	Tua ahi ciangin hih thukham in na sem ahilam ka phawkkhia hi: A hoih ka hih nop laitakin kei tawh a omkhawm den a gilo a om na hi mawk hi.
45007022	Ahang in, ka mihinna laigil ah Pasian thukham ka lungkimpih hi.
45007023	Ahi hangin ka pumpi nate sungah thukham dang khat nasem ka mu hi. Tua thukham in ka lungsim thukham do a, kei pumpi nate sunga mawhnate sungah hong koltangsak hi.
45007024	Hinggim na zen ing e! Hih sihna pumpi panin kua in kei hong honkhia ding ahi hiam?
45007025	I Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen! Tua hi-a kei mahmah ka lungsim sungah Pasian thukham sila ka hi-a ahi hangin mawhdim ka piangngei sungah mawhna thukham sila ka hi hi.
45008001	Tua ahi manin Khrist Jesu sunga omte adingina tu-in mawhpaihna a om kei hi.
45008002	Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrist Jesu tungtawnin nuntakna Kha thukham in mawhna le sihna thukham panin kei hong suaktasak zo hi.
45008003	Ahang in, mawhdim pianngeib in a thanemsak thukham, a thahatna bei-a, a sep theih loh pen, Pasian in mawhna hanga biaknac a kizang dingin mawhdim mihing bangind ama Tapa mahmah hong sawlna tawh a sem zo hi.
45008004	Tua ahi ciangin mawhdim pianngei banga nungta hi lo, Kha deihna banga nungta eite sungah thukham in a kalh thumaan a tun theih nadingin amah in mawhdim mihing sungah mawhna a mawhpaih hi.
45008005	Pianngei mawhna banga nungtate in, tua pianngei deihna bekbek a lunggulh uh hi. Ahi hangin Kha deihna banga nungtate in Kha deihna bekbek a lunggulh uh hi.
45008006	Mawhdim mie lungsim sihna hi-a ahi hangin Kha in a uk lungsim, nuntakna le lemna ahi hi.
45008007	Mawhdim lungsimf in Pasian a langneih hi. Tua in Pasian thukham a mang kei hi; zong a mang thei kei hi.
45008008	Mawhdim pianngei in a uksa mite in Pasian a lungkimsak thei kei uh hi.
