45008009	Ahi zongin Pasian Kha note sungah a ten nak leh mawhdim pianngei in note hong uk nawn loin Kha in note hong uk hi zaw hi. Mi khatpeuh in Khrist Kha a neih kei leh Khrist aa ahi kei hi.
45008010	Ahi hangin note sungah Khrist a om leh mawhna hangin note pumpi si taleh thumaanna hangin na kha uh a nungta hi.
45008011	Misi pana Jesu a thosakpa Kha note sungah hong teng ahileh misi pana Khrist a thosakpa in no sunga teng ama Kha tawnin a si thei na pumpite uh zong nuntakna a pia ding hi.
45008012	Tua ahi ciangin sanggamte aw, tu-in bat khat i nei hi. Tua in mawhdim pianngei deihna banga a nungta dingin pianngei tungah i ba kei hi.
45008013	Ahang in, mawhdim pianngei deihna banga na nuntak uh leh na si ding uh hi; ahi hangin Kha hangin na pumpi uh gamtatsiate na sihsak uh leh na nungta ding uh hi.
45008014	Bang hang hiam cihleh Pasian Kha in a makaihte Pasian tapate ahi uh hi.
45008015	Ahang in, note launa sila hong suaksak kik kha a sangte na hi kei uh hi; ahi hangin tapa-suahnag Kha na sang zo uh hi. Tua hi a, ama hangin eite in, “Abba,h Pa,” i ci hi.
45008016	Pasian tate i hina eimau kha tawh tua Kha mahmah in teci a pang hi.
45008017	Tu-in tate i hileh gouluahte i hi hi. Khrist minthanna eite in zong i tanhpih theih nadingin ama thuaknate i thuakpih takpi leh Khrist tawh gouluah khawm Pasian gouluahte i hi hi.
45008018	Tu laitaka i thuak gimnate le eite sunga hong kilang ding minthannate tehkak tham ka sa kei hi.
45008019	A kipiangsak na khempeuh in Pasian tapate a kilaak nading lawptakin lamenin a ngak uh hi.
45008020	Ahang in, a kipiangsak nate khempeuh amau deihtel hang hi lo, amau a nuai siahpa deihna bangin bucinlohna nuai-ah kihen hi.
45008021	Tua in a kipiangsak khempeuh muatna sila pan kisuaktasaka, a minthang Pasian tate suahtakna sungah a tun nading lametna hang ahi hi.
45008022	A kipiangsak khempeuh in tu hun mahmah dong nausuahnat thuak bangin tau lai uh hi, cih i thei hi.
45008023	Tua bek hi lo Kha gahmasa a nei eite mahmah zong eite pumpi tatkhiat nading tapa i suah ding lawptakin ngakin i sungah tau-in i om hi.
45008024	Ahang in, hih lametna sungah eite hotkhiat i hi hi. Ahi hangin a kimusa lametna pen lametna ahi peuhmah kei hi. Kua in a muhsate lamen ahi hiam?
45008025	Ahi hangin i muh nai lohte i lamet leh tuate i ngak keeikai hi.
45008026	Tua mah bangin i thanemnate ah Kha in eite hong huh hi. Eite in thu bangci nget ding cih i thei kei hi, ahi hangin Kha mahmah in kammala lawhkhiat theih loh tuanate tawh eite adingin hong thumsak hi.
45008027	Tua hi a, eite lungsim a zongpa in Kha lungsim a thei hi. Bang hang hiam cihleh Pasian deihna tawh kizui-in Kha in misiangte ading a thumsak hi.
45008028	Tua ciangin Pasian in ama ngimna tawh kizui-a, a sapsa mitei ahi, amah a itte a hoih nadingin na khempeuh a sepsak hi,j cih i thei hi.
45008029	Ahang in, Tapa pen sanggam tampite lakah tacil a suah theih nadingin Pasian in a theihkholhsa mite ama Tapa tawh a kibang dingin a laitansa ahi hi.
45008030	Tua hi-a a laitansate zong a sam hi; a sapsate zong dik a tangsak hi; dik a tansaksate zong a minthangsak hi.
45008031	Tua ahileh hih thu dawn nadingin bang i gen ding hiam? Pasian eite lamah a pan leh ei langah kua pang zo ding ahi hiam?
45008032	Ama Tapa neihsun sit loin eite khempeuh ading hong pia pa in amah tawh na khempeuh hong citpiak khawm loin om ding ahi hiam?
45008033	Pasian in a telsate kua in mawhmat ding ahi hiam? Dik a tangsak Pasian ahi hi.
45008034	A mawhpaihpa kua ahi hiam? Si bek tham loin nungta-a, a tho kik pa Khrist Jesu, tu-in Pasian taklamah tu-a eite adingin hong thumsak hi.
45008035	Khrist hong itna panin eite kua in hong khenkhia zo ding hiam? Lungmanna, haksatna, bawlsiatna, kialna, silh ding kisapna, lauhuaina, namsaute in hong khenkhia zo ding ahi hiam?
45008036	"Nangma hangin kote in ni thapai-in sihna ka maituah uh hi; gawh ding tuute bangin kote hong kiseh hi,”k ci-a kigelhsa bangin,
45008037	hong khenkhia zo kei ding hi. Hihte khempeuh ah eite hong it ama tungtawnin gualzote sang i gualzo zaw hi.
45008038	Ahang in, sihna le hinna ahi zong in, vansawltakte le dawitel ahi zongin, tu hun le tu nung ciang ahi zongin, vangliatna khatpeuh ahi zongin,
45008039	a thukna le a sanna ahi zongin, a kipiangsak nate khat beek in i Topa Khrist Jesu sunga om Pasian hong itna panin hong khenkhia zo kei ding hi, cih ka kipsan takpi hi.
45009001	Khrist sunga om tua thutak ka gen hi – ka zuau hi loin Khasiangtho sunga ka kitheihna lungsim in tua kipsakna,
45009002	ka lung sungah dahna lianpi le lunggim ngitngetna nei-in ka om hi.
45009003	Ahang in, Israel-te keima mipih ka sanggamte hangin kei mahmah Khrist pan kikhen khia-in samsiatna thuak maileng ka ut hi.
45009004	Tapa suahsakna amau aa hi-a Pasian minthanna ahi zongin, thukhunte ahi zongin, thukham ngahna ahi zongin biakinnpi-a biakna le kamciamte khempeuh amau aa ahi hi.
45009005	Pubulte amau aa hi a, amaute panin Khrist leitung pu le pate kiguisut hi. Tua Khrist in na khempeuh tunga Pasian hi-a a tawntungin kiphat hi!a Amen.
45009006	Pasian thu a hawmsuak bang ahi kei hi. Ahang in, Israel-te pana piangte khempeuh Israel ahi kim kei uh hi.
45009007	Amaute ama suan le khak ahi uh hangin Abraham tate ahi kim kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin: “Na suan na khakte Isaac tungtawnin kiseh ding hi.”b ci hi.
45009008	Kammal dangin gen lehang pianngei tate Pasian tate ahi kei uh hi. Ahi hangin kamciamna tate, Abraham suan le khakte in kisim hi.
45009009	Ahang in, tua kamciam in: “A kisehsa hun a tun ciangin kong kileh kik dinga, Sarah in tapa khat a nei ding hi”c a na ci hi.
45009010	Tua bek tham loin Rebecca tate in pa kikhat eite pa Isaac a nei uh hi.
45009011	Tua hi napi tua a peng tate gel a suah ma uh asia apha a bawl theih mapek un, Pasian teelkhiatna tawh kisai ama ngimna:
45009012	sepna hang hi lo hong sampa hangin, cih thu a kip nadingin tuanu kiangah, “A uzaw in a naupa nasem a suak ding hi”d ci-in na kigen hi. Tua bang tektek in:
45009013	"Jacob ka it a, ahi hangin Esau ka mudah hi.”e ci-in kigelh zo hi.
45009014	Tua ahileh bang gen ding i hi hiam? Pasian a thutang lo ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo hi!
45009015	Ahang in, amah in Moses kiangah “Ka lainatte ka lainat dinga, ka khuatuahte ka khuatuah ding hi”f a na ci hi.
45009016	Tua ahi ciangin mihing lunggulhna tung ahi zongin, a hanciamna tungah ahi zongin kinga loin Pasian lainatna tung bekah kinga hi.
45009017	Ahang in, Laisiangtho in Pharaoh kiangah: Ka vangliatna nangma sungah ka lah theih nading le leitang tung khempeuh ah ka min a kitangko theih nading ngimna tawh nang kong laamto zo hi.”g ci hi.
45009018	Tua ahi manin Pasian in a lainat nopte tungah lainatna nei-a, a lungkhauhsak nopte a lung khauhsak hi.
45009019	Note khatpeuh in ka kiangah: “Tua ahileh bang hangin Pasian in eite hong mawhsak lai ahi hiam? Kua in ama deihna nang ahi hiam?” nong ci kha ding uh hi.
45009020	Ahi hangin mihing aw, Pasian a sel kik dingin nang kua na hi hiam? A kibawl na in a bawlpa kiangah, ‘Bang hangin kei hih bangin hong bawl na hi hiam?’ ci thei ding hiam”h
45009021	Beelseekpa in beellei lom khat panin a thupi-a zat ding beel le zattaang ding beel, bawl theihna thu nei hi lo ahi hiam?
45009022	Pasian in a thangpaihna lak ding le ama vang kitheikhawksak dingin suksiat dinga a koihsa ama thangpaihna a tun nadingte lungduaitakin thuak keikai ahileh bang gen nawn tuan ding i hi hiam?
45009023	A minthang dinga a bawlkholhsa, ama lainatna a ngahte tungah a kicing ama minthanna a lahkhiat ding
45009024	Jew-te pan bek hilo Gentile-te laka eite nangawn hong sam ahileh bang gen nawn ding i hi hiam?
45009025	Amah in Hosea sungah: “Keima mi ahi lo amaute, ‘keima mite’ ka ci ding hi; ka it loh nu zong, ‘ka it nu’i ka ci ding hi,
45009026	le “ ‘Note, keima mite na hi kei uh hi,’ ci-a amau tunga ka genna mun tekek ah amaute, ‘a nungta Pasian tapate,’j kici ding hi, cih thu a tung ding hi.” ci-in a gen hi.
45009027	Israel tawh kisai-in Isaiah in: “Israel mite tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam uh hangin a baanglaite bek kihonkhia ding hi.
45009028	Ahang in, Topa in leitang tungah ama thukhenna a kip den dingin a manlangin tungsak ding hi,”k ci-in a kiko hi.
45009029	Nidang lai-a Isaiah in: “Thahatpen Topa in eite ading suan le khak hong nusiat lo hileh eite, Sodom bang i hi khin zo dinga, eite Gomorrah bang i hi khin zo ding hi,”l ci-a a gen bang tektek ahi hi.
45009030	Tua ahileh bang i gen ding hiam? Thumaanna a deih lo Gentile-te in upna hanga kingah tua thumaanna a ngah zo uh hi;
45009031	ahi hangin Israel-te in a delh uh tua thumaanna thukham a ngah kei uh hi.
45009032	Bang hanga ngah lo? Amaute in upna tawh zong loin sepna tawh a zon hang uh ahi hi. Amaute kimuktukna suang tungah a muktu uh hi. Hih bangin kigelh hi:
45009033	"En in, mi a muktusak ding suangtum khat le amaute a puksak ding suangtumpi khat Zion ah ka nga a, amah amuangte a maizum ngei kei ding uh hi,”m
45010001	Sanggamte aw, Israel mite adinga ka lunggulhna le Pasian tunga ka thungetna pen amaute a kihotkhiat theih nading ahi hi.
45010002	Ahang in, Pasian adingin amaute nakpi-a a hanciamna uh teci ka pang thei hi. Ahi hangin amaute hahkatna in theihna pansan ahi kei hi.
45010003	Amaute in Pasian kiang pana hong pai thumaanna thei lo uh a, amau thu-a phuaktawm nuam uh ahi manin Pasian thumaanna ah a ki-ap kei uh hi.
45010004	A um peuhmah in thumaanna a ngah theih nadingin thukham tawpna Khrist ahi hi.
45010005	Moses in thukham hanga kingah thumaanna a genna ah: “Hih nate a sem mi in hihte hangin a nungta ding hi.”a ci hi.
45010006	Ahi hangin upna hanga kingah thumaanna in: “Na lungsim sungah, ‘Vantung ah kua kahto ding hiam?’ ci kei in.”b (tua pan Khrist lasuk ding cihnopna)
45010007	cih ahi zongin, “ ‘A thuk sungah kua kumsuk ding hiam?c (tua pen misi panin Khrist lato ding cihnopna)” ci kei in.
45010008	Ahi hangin tua in bang gen ahi hiam? “Na kiangah thu om hi. Tua thu na kam sung le na lungtang sungah a om hi,"d ci hi. Kote tangko upnathu ahih le:
45010009	"Note in na kam uh tawh, ‘Jesu in Topa hi,’ ci-in pulaka, Pasian in amah misi pan thokiksak zo hi, ci-a na lungtang sung uhah na up uh leh note hong kihonkhia ding hi, cih upna thu ahi hi.
45010010	Ahang in, na lungtang uh tawh umin dik na tang uh a, na kam uh tawh pulakin note hong kihonkhia hi.
45010011	Laisiangtho in: “Amah a muang peuh mah a kimaizumsak ngei kei ding hi,”e ci hi.
45010012	Ahang in, Jew-te le Gentile-te kikal ah kilamdanna bangmah a om kei hi. Tua Topa mah mite khempeuh Topa hi-a ama tungah a kote khempeuh kicingtakin thupha a pia hi.
45010013	Ahang in, “Topa min a sam peuhmah kihonkhia ding hi,”f ci hi.
45010014	Tua ahileh amaute in amau uplohpa bangci sap theih ding uh hiam? Tua ciangin amaute in a thu a zak ngei lohpa uh bangci up thei ding uh ahi hiam? Amaute kiangah a hilh khatpeuh om kei leh bangci zak theih ding uh ahi hiam?
45010015	A kisawl kei leh amaute in bangci hilh theih ding uh ahi hiam? A kigelhsa bangin: “Lungdamna thu a puakte khe etlawm mahmah si e!”g
45010016	Ahi hangin Israel mite khempeuh in lungdamna thuthak a sang kim kei uh hi. Tua hangin, Isaiah in, “Topa aw, kote thupuak a um kua om ahi hiam?”h a na ci hi.
45010017	Tua bang ditdetin, tua thupuak zakna panin upna pianga, Khrist thu tungtawnin tua thupuak a kiza hi.
45010018	Ahi hangin amaute in za lo uh ahi hiam, cih kong dong hi. Za tham uh hi: “Amaute aw in leitung khempeuh zel khin zo-a, a kammalte un leimongte ban khin zo hi.”i
45010019	Israel-te in thei lo uh ahi hiam, cih kong dong leuleu hi. A masa penin Moses in: “Minam ahi lote eng dingin note kong bawl ding hi; theihna a nei lo minamte in note hong hehsak dingin ka bawl ding hi.”j na ci hi.
45010020	Tua ciangin Isaiah in hangtakin, “Keimah hong zong lote in hong mu zo uh hi; keimah hong kan lote tungah kei le kei ka kilaak zo hi.”k na ci hi.
45010021	Ahi hangin amah in Israel tawh kisai-in, “Thumang lo le paupeng mite lamah sun nilohin ka khut ka zan hi”l na ci hi.
45011001	Tua ahileh, Pasian in ama mite nolh ahi hiam, cih kong dong hi. A nolh peuhmah kei hi! Kei mahmah zong Abraham suan ahi Benjamin beh pana Israel mi khat mah ka hi hi.
45011002	Pasian in a theihkholhsa ama mite a nolh kei hi. Elijah in Israel-te langpanin Pasian tungah a hekna Laisiangtho gen thei ngei lo na hi uh hiam?
45011003	"Topa aw, amaute in na kamsangte that zo uh a, na biakna-taute a phelkhia zo uh hi. Kei kia bek ka om lai-a, amaute in kei thah hong sawm uh hi,”a ci hi.
45011004	Tua ciangin ama tungah Pasian dawnna bang ahi hiam? “Keima ading Baal mai-ah a khukdin lo mi tul sagih ka siit khin zo hi,”b
45011005	Tua hunmah bangin tuhun laitakin zong hehpihna hanga teelsa a baanglaite a om hi.
45011006	Tua hi-a hehpihna hang ahileh sepna hang hi nawn lo hi; sepna hang hi, hileh hepihna pen hehpihnac ahi nawn kei ding hi.
45011007	Tua ahileh bang ahi hiam? Israel-te in kuhkaltaka a zon uh mu lo uh a, ahi hangin a teelte in a ngah zo uh hi. Adangte kisak sak lai-a,
45011008	hih-a kigelh bang ahi hi: “Pasian in tuni tektek dong, amawk lungsim ahi zongin, a mu thei lo mittang ahi zongin a za thei lo bil ahi zongin, amaute a pia hi.”d
45011009	David in zong: “Amaute adingin a sabuai uh thangzak le tehlop suak henla, muktukna le gawina suak ta hen.
45011010	Amaute in a muh theih loh nadingun a mitte uh mial henla, a nungte uh kul tawntungta hen.”e a na ci hi.
45011011	Amaute a tho kik zo nawn lo dingin muktu uh ahi hiam, cih kong dong kik leuleu hi. Ahi peuhmah kei hi! Amaute tatkhialhna hangin Israel-te in Gentile-te a en nadingun hotkhiatna thu Gentile-te tungah tung zawsop hi.
45011012	Ahi hangin amaute tatkhialhna hangin leitung mite adingin hauhna suaka, amaute supna Gentile-te adingin hauhna suak ahileh amaute kicinna in bangzah a lianzaw hauhna a tunzaw tazen tam!
45011013	No Gentile-te tunga thugen ka hi hi. Gentile-te adinga keimah sawltakpi ka hina tawh,
45011014	ka mipihte in note hong eng-a pawlkhat ka hotkhiat theih nading lametna tawh keima mipihte a phawng dingin nakpi-in na ka sem hi.
45011015	Ahang in, amaute a kinolhna leitung mite kilemkikna hi ahileh amaute a kisanna, sihna panin hinna lo bang dang hi ding hiam?
45011016	Gahmasa banga kipia buhnel mekman them khat siangtho ahileh a lom bitin zong a siangtho hi; azung a siantho leh ahiangte zong a siangtho hi.
45011017	Tua hiangte pawlkhat kitankhia-in gamlak olive dawng khat ahi nang, tuate tungah hong kipeh a, olive tung pan hong pai khanna tui dawn khawm na hileh,
45011018	tua a kitankhiasa hiangte tungah na kisial kei in. Tua banga na kisialh leh hih thu na ngaihsun in: Nang in azung na vak kei-a azung in nang hong vak zaw hi.
45011019	Tua ahileh, “Kei hong kipeh theih nadingin hiangte kitankhia hi,” na ci kha ding hi.
45011020	Himah hi. Ahi hangin amaute uplahna hangin amaute a kitankhia hizaw a, nang na upna hanga ding na hi hi. Kisathei kei inla lau zaw in.
45011021	Tua hi-a Pasian in pianngei hiangte hawi lo ahileh nang zong hong hawi tuan kei ding hi.
45011022	Tua ahi manin Pasian migitna le ama thukhauhna; a pukte tungah a thukhauhna le ama migitna sunga na kip den nak leh nang tunga a migitnate ngaihsun in. Ama migitna sunga na kip den kei leh nang zong hong kisattan ding hi.
45011023	Amaute amau uplahna sungah a kohkan kei nak uh leh Pasian in amaute peh kik thei ahi manin amaute zong a kipeh ding hi.
45011024	A tawpna ah, pianngei-a gamlak olive kung ahi nang, hong satkhia-in pianngei tawh kilehbulhin a kicing olive kung tungah hong kipeh ahileh, hih pianngei hianga amau menkhiatna olive kung tunga peh ding baihzaw tham lo ding ahi hiam?
45011025	Sanggamte aw, note na kimisak loh nadingun; a lut ding zah a lut kim khit mateng Israel-te khenkhat lungkhauh tadih ding uh hi, cih thuthuk na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
45011026	Tua hi-a: “Zion panin tanpa hong pai ding hi; amah in Jacob panin pasian-milohna a hemkhia ding hi.
45011027	Tuateh amaute mawhnate a kilakkhiat ciangin amaute tawh ka thukhun hih ahif hi.”g ci-a kigelh bangin Israel-te khempeuh kihonkhia ding hi.
45011028	Lungdamna-thu tawh kisai-in ahileh note hangin amaute gal ahi uh hi. Ahi hangin teelna tawh kisai-in ahileh pubulte hangin amaute, itte ahi uh hi.
45011029	Ahang in, Pasian letsongte le ama hong sapnate a kidok kik thei kei hi.
45011030	Amaute thu manlohna hangin hun khat lai-a Pasian thu a mang lo note in, tu-in lainatna na ngah uh mah bangin
45011031	Pasian in note hong lainat bangin amaute in zong tu-inh lainatna a ngah theih nadingun amaute zong tu-in thumang lote a suak uh hi.
45011032	Ahang in, Pasian in mi khempeuh tungah lainatna a neih theih nadingin thumanlohna ah mi khempeuh a hencip hi.
45011033	Aw, Pasian in pilna le theihna a hauhi zia thuk na mahmah e! Ama thukhennate telzawh hi lo a, ama lampite sulkan zawh ding hi peuhmah lo hi!
45011034	"Topa lungsim kua in thei a, ahikeh a thudotpa kua hiam?j
45011035	"Pasian thukkik dingin Pasian tungah kua’n pia ngei ahi hiam?”k
45011036	Ahang in, nate khempeuh, ama kiang pan le ama tung pan le ama aa ahi hi. Amah in minthanna ngah tawntung ta hen! Amen.
45012001	Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, a siangtho le Pasian lungkimna ahi a nungta biakpiakna ahi dingin na pumpi uh na piak nadingun Pasian lainatna hangin kong kun hi. Tuamah lah na khalama biakna uh ahi hi.
45012002	Hih leitung deihna tawh kizui-in na gamta nawn kei unla, na lungsim uh thaksuaksakin na kipumkhel un. Tua hileh a hoih, a lungkimhuai, a hoihkim Pasian deihna bang ahi hiam, cih khentel thei-in na pakta thei ding uh hi.
45012003	Ahang in, nangma hina tan sanga a sangzaw-in nang le nang kingaihsun kei in. Ahi hangin Pasian in nang hong piaksa upna za tawh kizui-in amaan thukhenna tawh nang le nang na kingaihsut nadingin ka ngahsa hehpihna hangin note tungah kong gen hi.
45012004	I pumpi in pumpi na tampi nei ciat a, tua pumpi nate khempeuh a nasep a kibat loh mah bangin,
45012005	a tampi eite in zong Khrist sungah pumpi i suaka, eite khempeuh khat le khat a kizom dimdiam i hi hi.
45012006	Eite in hong kipiasa hehpihna tawh kizui-in letsong a tuamtuam i ngah hi. Mi khat letsong thugen theihna ahileh amah in amab upna tawh kituakin zang ta hen.
45012007	Nasepna a ngah leh sem ta hen; Laihilhna a ngah leh limtakin hilh ta hen;
45012008	hansuah theihna a ngah leh hansuah ta hen; midang kitasamte huh theihna a ngah leh cinghtakin huh ta hen; makaihna a ngah leh kiciantakin uk ta hen; lainatna lahtheihna a ngah leh lungtaitakin lak ta hen.
45012009	Itna, a taktak hi pelmawh ding hi. Gitlohna na mudah un, a hoih na pom cinten un.
45012010	Note khat le khat unau ki-itna kho tawh na ki-it thuk un. No sangin midangte a sangzaw-in na kipahtawi thuk un.
45012011	Hahkat lo ngei kei unla, khalam hanciamna ah lenkipin Topa na sem un.
45012012	Lametna ah lungnuam unla, thuaksiatna ah lungduai-in, thungetna ah muanhuai un.
45012013	Pasian mi a kitasamte na hawm un. Zindo na siam un.
45012014	No hong bawlsiate thupha na pia un; thupha na pia unla, na hamsiat kei un.
45012015	A lungdamte tawh na lungdam khawm un. a dahte tawh na dah khawm un.
45012016	Note khat le khat na kithuhual un. Kisathei kei unla, dinmun niamtec tawh na kikhawl khawm nuam un. Na kimisak kei un.
45012017	Khatpeuh gitlohna, gitlohna-in na thuk kik kei un. Mikim muhna-ah amaana gamtat ding na hanciam un.
45012018	Ahih theih leh nang tunga a kingak laiteng mikim tawh na kilem un.
45012019	Ka lawmte aw, phu na la kei un; Pasian thangpaihna adingin na awnzaw un. Ahang in, Topa in: “Phulakna keima aa ahi hi. Keimah in ka thuk kik ding hi.”d ci hi.
45012020	Tua sangsik in: “Na galpa a gil a kial leh na vak in; adangtak leh a dawn ding bang khatpeuh na pia in. Hih bangin na hih leh amau lutungah mei-am vumsak na hi ding hi.,”e ci-in kigelh hi.
45012021	Gitlohna kizosak kei unla, a hoih tawh gitlohna na zo un.
45013001	Pasian piaksate longal in thuneihna nei lo uh ahi manin mi khempeuh in a ukte thu a mang pelmawh ding uh hi. Tu laitaka thuneite thuneihna Pasian piaksa ahi hi.
45013002	Tua bang diudeu-in thuneite a langdote, Pasian phuh kipsate a langdo ahi hi. Tua banga a langdote thukhenna kithuaksak ding hi.
45013003	Ahang in, a khiala gamtate adingin, gam-ukte lauhuai bek a, amaan-a gamtate adingin a lauhuai kei hi. Thunei mi khat na kihtakna panin na suakta nuam hiam? Na suahtak nop leh amaanin gamta lecin amah in nang hong phat ding hi.
45013004	Ahang in, nang tunga a hoih sem dingin amah Pasian nasempa ahi hi. Ahi hangin asia-a na gamtat leh lauthawng in; amah in a mawkna-in namsau a tawi kei hi. Amah, Pasian nasem hi-a, asia-a gamtate tungah thangpaihna ahi gawtna a tungsak dinga kisawlsawn ahi hi.
45013005	Tua ahi manin gawtna thuak khak ding hang bek hi loin, sia le pha khentheihna hangin zong thuneite thu man ding ahi hi.
45013006	Thuneite, hunbit a gam-uk Pasian ading nasemte ahi manin hih thu hangin zong siah na pia uh hi.
45013007	Mi khempeuh tungah na bat bangun na pia un. Siah piak dingte siah na pia un; mangmu piak dingte mangmu na pia un; zahtak dingte na zahtak un; pahtawi dingte na pahtawi un.
45013008	Khat le khat ki-it den ding leiba pen longal kuamah na kibasak kei un, ahang in, ama mipih a it mi in thukham tangtun ahi hi.
45013009	"Angkawm kei in” “Tual that kei in” “Gu kei in” “Deihgawh kei in”a kici thupiakte le thupiak dang a om peuhpeuh “Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengpa it in,”b kici zuihtawm ngeina in huam khin hi.
45013010	Itna in a vengpa a nasak kei hi. Tua ahi manin itna pen thukham tangtunna ahi hi.
45013011	Tu lai hun theitelin hih na nasem un. A tunga i up sangin eite hotkhiatna tu-in naizaw ahi manin na ihmutna panun khanlawh hun tung ta hi.
45013012	Zan bei dektak hi; sun hong tung dektak hi. Tua ahi ciangin khuamial gamtatnate paikhia-in khuavak galvante silh ni.
45013013	Zu uang dawnna, zukhamna, numei-pasal pak tatna le hukna lanna, kilungkimlohna le hazatnate sem loin sun huna i tat bangin eite a kilawmin gamta ni.
45013014	Mawh dim pianngeic lunggulhnate ngaihsun kei unla Topa Jesu Khrist na silh zaw un.
45014001	Kisel theihna thute tawh kisai-in upna thanemte mawhpaih pah kei unla, na sang zaw un.
45014002	Mi khat in a upna tawh kituakin an khempeuh ne thei hi. Ahi hangin upna thanem midang khat in anteh singgah bek a ne hi. Pasian in amah sang khin ahi manin,
45014003	nek theih khempeuh a nepa in a ne lopa neu-et kei hen. Nek theih khempeuh a ne kim lopa in a nepa mawhpaih kei hen.
45014004	Midang khatpeuh nasempa tungah thu khen dingin nang kua na hi hiam? Tua nasempa a pu thu-in a ding thei a puk thei hi. Topa in amah dingsak thei ahi manin amah a ding ding hi.
45014005	Mi khat in ni khat sangin ni dang khat a siangtho zaw in ngaihsun hi. Adang khat in ni khempeuh a kibangin ngaihsun hi. Mi khempeuh in ama lungsima a kipsan bang hi ding hi.
45014006	Ni khatpeuh a thupi tuan a sapa in Topa hangin thupi a sa hi. Sa nepa in Pasian tungah lungdam ko ahi manin Topa hangin a ne ahi hi. Sa tangpa in Pasian tungah lungdam ko ahi manin Topa hangin a tang ahi hi.
45014007	Ahang in, mi kuamah ama ading beka nungta hi loin, a si kuamah in ama ading bekin a si kei hi.
45014008	Eite i nuntak leh Topa adinga nungta i hi hi; eite i sih leh Topa adinga si i hi hi. tua ahi ciangin eite i si-a i hing zongin Topa aa i hi hi.
45014009	Ahang in, hih thu hang mahmahin a site le a hingte Topa aa ahikhawm theih nadingin Khrist si-a tua ciangin nungta kik hi.
45014010	Tua ahileh bang hangin na sanggampa tungah thu khen na hi hiam? Ahikeh bang hangin na sanggampa neu-et na hi hiam? Ahang in, eite khempeuh Pasian thukhenna tokhom mai-ah i ding kim ding hi.
45014011	"Topa in,'Ka nuntakna ka lo hi, ka mai-ah mi khempeuh khukdin ding uh a, Pasian tungah leii khempeuh in a pulak ding uh hi,’ ci hi,”a ci-in kigelh hi.
45014012	Tua ahi tak ciangin eite khempeuh in Pasian tungah eima thu tek i gen ciat ding hi.
45014013	Tua ahi manin eite khat le khat thu kikhen nawn kei ni. Tua sangsikin na sanggampa lampi ah muktukna suang, a dongkholh na ahi zongin a koih lo dingin na lungsim uh khensat un.
45014014	Topa Jesu sunga om mi khat ka hina tawh anb peuhmah asiang lo khat beek a om kei hi, cih ka kipsan mahmah hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in na pawlkhat siang lo a sak leh ama adingin a siang lo ahi hi.
45014015	Na nek khatpeuh hangin na sanggampa a lungdon leh itna sunga gamta na hi nawn kei hi. Ama adinga zong Khrist a si na sanggampa a lungdon leh itna sungah gamta na hi nawn kei hi. Na nekna hangin ama adingin zong Khrist a si na sanggampa, siasak kei in.
45014016	A hoiha na ngaihsutte a sia banga a kigen ding phal kei in.
45014017	Ahang in, Pasian gam pen nekna le dawnna thu hi loin, Khasiangtho sunga thumaanna, lemna le lungnopna ahi hi.
45014018	Bang hang hiam cihleh hih banga Khrist na a sem peuhmah in Pasian lungkimsak a, mite in zong a thukimpih uh hi.
45014019	Tua ahi manin kilemna le khat le khat kihansuahna sungah hong tun ding na i sep nadingin hanciam theih tawpin hanciam ni.
45014020	An hangin Pasian nasepna susia kei un. An khempeuh asiang ahi hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh a muktusak dinga na khatpeuh a ne mi a khial ahi hi.
45014021	Na sanggampa pukna a piangsak ding sa nek loh ding ahi zongin, zu dawn loh ding ahi zongin, khat peuhpeuh hih loh ding ahi zongin hoihzaw hi.
45014022	Tua ahi ciangin hih nate tawh kisai-in na up peuhpeuh nang le Pasian kikal thu hisak in. Amah in maan a sak nate hangin amah le amah a kimawhpaih lo mipa, thupha ngah ahi hi.
45014023	Ahi hangin lunghei neihna a neipa in a nek leh amah a kimawhpaih ahi hi. Ahang in, ama nekna upna pan ahi kei hi. Tua hi-a upna pana hong pai lo khempeuh mawhna ahi hi.
45015001	A thahat eite in a thanemte’ hihzawhlohnate i thuakzawh ding hi-a, eimah le eimah i kilungkimsak ding hi lo hi.
45015002	Eite khempeuh in i vengte hoih nadingin amaute lungkimsaka, i khan suahtoh ding ahi hi.
45015003	Ahang in, “Note hong engkote engkona kei tung hong tu hi.”a ci-a kigelh bangin Khrist nangawn zong amah le amah a kilungkimsak kei hi.
45015004	Ahang in, eite in lametna i neih theih nadingin eite thuakzawhna le Laisiangtho hansuahnate tungtawnin a beisa huna kigelhte khempeuh eite hong hilh nadinga kigelh ahi hi.
45015005	Thuakzawhna le tha hong pia Pasian in Khrist Jesu na zuih bangun note lakah kipumkhatna kha hong pia ta hen.
45015006	Tua hileh lunsim khat le kam khat tawh i Topa Jesu Khrist Pasian le Pa na minthangsak thei ding uh hi.
45015007	Tua ahi ciangin Pasian na phat theih nadingun Khrist in note hong san bang tektekin note khat le khat na kisang un.
45015008	Ahang in, pubulte tungah kamciamsate a kipsak dingin Pasian thutak hangin Khrist, Jew-teb nasempa hong suak hi, cih note kong hilh hi.
45015009	Gentile-te in Pasian lainatna hanga amah a minthansak theih nadingin hih bangin kigelh zo hi: “Tua ahi manin Gentile-te lakah nang kong phat ding hi; biakna late sa-in na min ka phat ding hi.,”c
45015010	"Gentile-te aw, ama mite tawh kipakkhawm un,"d na ci kik a,
45015011	"No Gentile-te khempeuh aw, Topa phat unla, no mite khempeuh aw, lasa in amah phat un,”e na ci leuleu in.
45015012	Tua ciangin Isaiah in, “Jesse zungpi hong meng dinga, minamte a uk dingin khat hong khang ding hi; Gentile-te in ama sungah lametna a nei ding uh hi.”f na ci kik leuleu hi.
45015013	Khasiangtho vangliatna hangin lametna tawh na kidimlet theih nadingun amah na muan bangun lametna Pasian in lungdamna le lemna tawh note hong dim ta hen.
45015014	Ka sanggamte aw, note mahmah hoihna tawh kidimin, theihna kicing nei-in, khat le khat lam kilak dingin na cin uh cih kei mahmah in ka kipsan hi.
45015015	Note kiangah hangtakin thumal pawlkhat kong gelh zo hi; tua kong phawkkiksakna-in Pasian hong piak hehpihna hangin
45015016	Khasiangtho in Gentile-te a siangthosak Pasian santheih biakna a suah nadingun Gentile-te tungah siampi sepna tawh Pasian lungdamna-thu tangko dinga Khrist Jesu nasem khat ka hi hi.
45015017	Tua ahi manin Pasian na ka sepnate ah Khrist Jesu sungah ka minthang hi.
45015018	Ka gensate, ka sepsate hanga Gentile-te, Pasian thu a mangsak ding Khrist in kei tungtawn a, a sep khitsate longal bangmah kong gen ngam kei ding hi –
45015019	amah in Kha vangliatna tungtawnin lim le nalamdangte, vangliatna tawh a sem hi. Tua ahi ciangin Jerusalem a kipan Illyricum kimkot khempeuh ah Khrist lungdamna-thu ka tangko khin dipdep hi.
45015020	Mi khatpeuh bulkip tunga lam ka suah loh nadingin Khrist a kitheih nai lohna munte ah lungdamna-thu va hilh ding ka tup ngitnget ahi hi.
45015021	Hih bangin kigelh zaw hi: “Ama thu a kihilh lote in mu ding uh a, a za nai lo mite in a theitel ding uh hi,”g
45015022	Tua hangin note kianga kong pai ding a kikhaktan zelzel hi.
45015023	Ahi hangin tu-in hih kual tengah ka sep nading mun om nawn lo ahina le note kong muh kal ka ngaklah zawh kum tampi pha ta ahi manin,
45015024	Spain a ka pai ciangin no kiang phak dingin ka geel hi. No kiang kong nawk ciangin kong hawh ding le no tawh tawlkhat sung i kikholh khit cianga ka zin nading lam ka manawh ciangin nong huh ding uh ka lamen hi.
45015025	Ahi zongin tu tadihin Jerusalem a misiangte nasem dingin tua khua lam ka manawh laitak ahi hi.
45015026	Ahang in, Maccedonia le Achaia mite in Jerusalem a misiangte laka mizawngte citpiak a piak ding uh a lungkim uh hi. Amaute in sep ding lungkim uh a, amau tunga a bat uh zong ahi hi.
45015027	Ahang in, Gentile-te in Jew-te khalam thuphate tanhpih uh ahileh amau leitung thuphate zong a tanhpih ding uh Jew-te tungah a ba uh hi.
45015028	Tua ahi ciangin hih nasep ka zawh khit ciang le amaute in hih gah ngah uh hi, cih ka tel khit ciangin Spain gamah ka pai dinga, tua kawmin no kiangah kong bang ding hi.
45015029	Note kiangah kong pai ciangin Khrist thupha a dimtak tawh kong pai ding ka thei hi.
45015030	Sanggamte aw, kei ading Pasian kiangah nong thungetsakna uh tawh ka do, nong dopih dingun eite Topa Jesu Khrist itna hang le Kha itna hangin note kong kun hi.
45015031	Judea gama om thu um lote khut sung pana ka suahtak theih nading le Jerusalem a ka sep nate tua lai-a om misiangte in hong san theih nadingun thu na ngetsak un.
45015032	Tua pen Pasian deihna hangin note kiangah lungdamna tawh hong pai-a note tawh thathak i ngah khawm theih nading ahi hi.
45015033	Lemna Pasian note khempeuh tawh om ta hen. Amen.
45016001	Cenchrea pawlpi a nasema i sanggamnu Phoebe note tungah apin ka phat hi.
45016002	Amah, kei-a kipan mi tampi a huh mahmah khat ahi manin huhna a kisap peuhpeuh na piak ding uh le misiangte hih dinga kilawm bangin amah Topa sungah na san dingun kong thum hi.
45016003	Khrist Jesu sunga ka naseppihte Priscillab le Aquila, na hohpihsak un.
45016004	Amaute in kei adingin a luang uh a kham ngam khin uh hi. Kei bek hi loin Gentile-te pawlpi khempeuh zong amau tungah a lungdam uh hi.
45016005	Amau inn a kikhawm pawlpi teng zong na hopihsak un. Asia gama Khrist ah a kikhel masapen, ka lawm it Epenetus, na hopihsak un.
45016006	Note adingin na a sem Mary, na hopihsak un.
45016007	Kei tawh thong kiakhawm ka tanau Andronicus le Junias, na hopihsak un. Amaute sawltakpi lakah kikhaituam uh a, tua ciangin amaute Khrist sunga ka om ma-in a na om khinte ahi uh hi.
45016008	Topa sunga ka it Ampliatus, na hopihsak un.
45016009	Khrist sunga ka naseppih uh Urbanus le ka lawm it Stachys, na hopihsak un.
45016010	Khrist sungah kizia-eta, a kisang Apelles, na hopihsak un. Aristobulus bangkua sunga om teng, na hopihsak un.
45016011	Ka tanau Herodion, na hopihsak un. Topa sunga om Narcissus bangkua sunga omte, na hopihsak un.
45016012	Topa sunga nasep hakat numeite Tryphena le Tryphosa, na hopihsak un. Topa sunga nasep a na hahkat mahmah numei dang khat ka lawm it Persis, na hopihsak un.
45016013	Topa sunga teltuamsa Rufus le kei zong nu-a ka neih ama nu zong na hopihsak un.
45016014	Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermes le amau tawh a omkhawm sanggamte, na hopihsak un.
45016015	Philologus, Julia, Nereus le a sanggamnu, le Olympas le amaute tawh a omkhawm misiangte khempeuh na hopihsak un.
45016016	A siangtho kinapna tawh note khat le khat na kihopih un. Khrist pawlpite khempeuh in hong hopih uh hi.
45016017	Sanggamte aw, na sansa uh thuhilhna tawh kilehbulh, na lampi uh hong dongkhaksakin na kipawl khen nading uh a bawlte panin na kidawm un, ci-in kong kun hi. Amaute kiang pan na kihemkhia un.
45016018	Ahang in, tua bang mite i Topa Khrist nasem hi loin amau ankam lim nading bek a sem ahi uh hi. Amaute in kamzolna le mi maitang phatna tawh mi melmawlte lungsim a khem uh hi.
45016019	Mi khempeuh in na thumannate uh a za zo uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin note tungah lungdamna tawh ka kidim hi. Ahi hangin thu hoih lamsangah note na pilvang unla, asia lamsangah mawhpengin na om un.
45016020	Lemna Pasian in note khepek nuai-ah Satan a sikpek hak nawn kei ding hi. Eite Topa Jesu hehpihna note tawh om ta hen.
45016021	Ka naseppih Timothy in hong ho pihna note hong khak hi. Tua mah bangin ka tanaute, Lucius, Jason le Sosipater-te in zong hong khak uh hi.
45016022	Hih laikhak a gelhkhia keimah Tertius in Topa sungah note kong hopih hi.
45016023	Hih lai-a om pawlpi bup le keimah in a zindona nuam ka sak uh Gaius in note hong hopihna hong khak hi. Khuapi sung tang nasep ukpa, Erastus le i sanggampa Quartus-te in hong hopihna uh hong khak uh hi.c
45016024	Eite Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna note khempeuh tawh omkhawm ta hen. Amen.
45016025	Tu-in khanghun sawtpi sung a kiselcip thuthuk kilaakkhiatna tawh kizui-a ka hilh lungdamna-thu le Jesu Khrist kitangkona tawh note hong kipsak zopa –
45016026	tua thuthuk tu-in kilaak khin a, minam khempeuh in um-a a thu a man theih nadingun tawntung Pasian thupiakna tawh kamsangte’ laigelhte tungtawnin kitheisak khin hi –
45016027	Jesu Khrist tungtawnin tua a pil Pasian khat bek tungah minthanna om tawntung ta hen. Amen.
46001001	Pasian deihna hanga Khrist Jesu sawltakpi khat dinga kisam Paul le i sanggampa Sosthenes in,
46001002	Corinth a om Khrist Jesu sunga sianthosaksa Pasian pawlpite le a siangtho dinga sapte, koimah peuh a om amaute le eite Topa – Topa Jesu Khrist min a lote khempeuh tungah:
46001003	I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
46001004	Khrist Jesu sungah note hong piak hehpihna hangin note adingin Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko tawntung hi.
46001005	Ahang in, ama sungah note na thugenna uh le na theihna khempeuh uh lam citengah hong kihausak zo hi;
46001006	bang hang hiam cih leh Khrist thu teci ka panna uh note sungah kikipsak zo hi.
46001007	Tua ahi ciangin eite Topa Jesu Khrist hong kilaak ding lawptaka na ngak kawmun khalam letsong kisap na nei kei uh hi.
46001008	I Topa Jesu Khrist ni ciangin kawk na baan loh nadingun amah in a tawp dongin hong thakhauhsak ding hi.
46001009	A Tapa i Topa Jesu Khrist tawh kipawlna sunga note hong sampa Pasian a muanhuai hi.
46001010	Sangamte aw, note khempeuh khat le khat kithutuakin note lakah kipawl khenna a om loh nading le lungsim le ngaihsutna-a kicingtaka na kigawm theih nadingun i Topa Jesu Khrist minin kong thum hi.
46001011	Ka sanggamte aw, Chloe innkuanpihte pawlkhat in note lakah kitotna om ci-in hong zasak zo uh hi.
46001012	Ka cihnopna hih ahi hi. Note khat in,”Ken Paul ka zui hia,” adang khat in,”Ken Apolos ka zui hi,” adang khat leuleu in, Ken Cephasa ka zui hi,” adang khat lai in, “Ken Khrist ka zui hi,” na ci ciat uh hi.
46001013	Khrist kisehkhen ahi hiam? No adingin Paul kikilhlum ahi hiam? Paul min sungahb note kibaptise na hi uh hiam?
46001014	Crispus le Gaius longal note kong baptize khak loh ka nuam mahmah hi.
46001015	Tua ahi ciangin kuamah in kei min sungah na kibaptise uh, ci-in a ci thei kei hi.
46001016	(Himah hi, Stephanas-te innkuan zong ka baptise lai hi. Tua lo adang ka baptise lam ka phawk kei hi.)
46001017	Ahang in, Khrist in baptize dingin hong sawl lo a, lungdamna-thu hilh dingin hong sawl hi. Tua pen mihing pilna kammalte tawh gen ding hilo hi. Hi hileh Khrist singlamteh vangliatna a hawmsuaksak kha ding hi.
46001018	Ahang in, a mangthang mite adingin singlamteh thupuak, haina ahi hi. Ahi hangin hong kihonkhia eite adingin Pasian vangliatna ahi hi.
46001019	Ahang in, “A pilte pilna ka susia ding hi; a tei mite teina ka hawmsuaksak ding hi,”c ci-in kigelh zo hi.
46001020	Mipil koi-ah om hiam? Lai siam koi-ah om hiam? Hih khanghun ah thuguizuih mi koi-ah om hiam? Pasian in leitung pilna, haina suaksak hi lo ahi hiam?
46001021	Ahang in, Pasian pilna sungah leitung in ama pilna tungtawnin amah thei lo ahi nungsang a kihilh haihuaina tungtawnin a um mite a hotkhiat ding Pasian lungkimna ahi hi.
46001022	Jew-te in lim lamdang ngen uh a, Greek-te in pilna a zong uh hi.
46001023	Ahi hangin kote in Jew-te adingin kisuih khakna suang, Gentile-te adingin haina ahi, a kikilhlum Khrist thu ka hilh uh hi.
46001024	Ahi hangin Pasian sap Jew-te le Greek-te tungah Khrist, Pasian vangliatna le Pasian pilna ahi hi.
46001025	Ahang in, Pasian haina in mihing pilna sangin pilzaw a, Pasian thanemna in mihing hatna sangin thakhauhzaw hi.
46001026	Sanggamte aw, note hong kisap lai-in, bang na hi uh hiam, ngaihsun un. Hong sap mite lakah mihing tehnate-a apil na tam kei uh hi; mihing a thuzawh zong na tam kei uh hi; pianpih nampi zong tampi na om kei uh hi.
46001027	Ahi hangin Pasian in a pilte a maizumsak nadingin leitunga a hai nate a teel hi; Pasian in a thahatte a maizumsak nadingin leitunga a thanemte a teel hi;
46001028	Amah in a om nate a guak suaksak nadingin hih leitung na niamte, a simmawhhuai nate le a om lo nate a teel hi.
46001029	Tua pen ama mai-ah kuamah a kisaktheih theih loh nading ahi hi.
46001030	Ama hangin eite adinga Pasian tung pana pilna a hong suakpa Khrist Jesu sungah note na om uh a, tua in eite thumaanna, sianthona le tatkhiatna ahi hi.
46001031	Tua ahi manin “A kisial peuhmah Topa sungah kisial ta hen,”d ci-in kigelh hi.
46002001	Sanggamte aw, note kiangah Pasian thu teci pang dingaa kong pai lai-in dangnalna ahi zongin pilna thupizaw tawh ahi zongin kong pai kei hi.
46002002	Ahang in, note tawh ka om khawm sung teng Jesu Khrist le a kikilh lum amah longal bangmah theih ka tum kei bikbek hi.
46002003	Note kiangah thanemna, launa le linna tampi tawh kong pai hi.
46002004	Ka thupuak le ka thuhilhnate pilna le zolna kammalte tawh hi lo a, Kha vangliatna lahkhiatna tawh hizaw hi.
46002005	Tua-in na upna uh mite pilna tungah kinga loin Pasian vangliatna tungah a kingak zawk nading ahi hi.
46002006	Ahi ta zongin a picingsate lakah pilna thupuak ka gen uh a, ahi hangin hih khanghun ahikeh bangmah ahi lo ding hih khanghun gam-ukte pilna ahi kei hi.
46002007	Hi lo hi, kote in a kiselcip pilna le hun kipat ma-a eite minthan nadinga Pasian sehkholhsa Pasian pilna thusim ka gen uh hi.
46002008	Tu khanghun a gam-ukte khat beek in hih thu a theitel kei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thei uh hileh minthanna Topa a kilhlum kei ding uh hi.
46002009	Ahi zong in: “Amah a itte adingin Pasian bawlkholhsate mitin mu ngei nai lo, bilin za ngei nai lo lungsimin ngaihsun ngei nai lo”b ci-a kigelhsa bang hi a,
46002010	ahi hangin Pasian in a Kha in eite tungah hong laak zo hi. Tua Kha in na khempeuh zonga, Pasian thuthukpite nangawn a zongkha hi.
46002011	Ahang in, mite lakah mi khat ngaihsutna a thei thei a sunga om mihing kha longal kua ahi hiam? Tua mah tawh kibangin Pasian Kha longal kuamah in Pasian ngaihsutnate a thei thei kei hi.
46002012	Pasian in eite man nei lo a hong piak i theihtel theih nadingin leitung kha i ngah kei a, Pasian tung pana Kha i ngah hi.
46002013	Kote in ka gen uh hih thu mah ahi hi, mihimc pilna in eite hong hilh kammalte hi lo a, ahi hangin Kha hong hilh kammaltea zangin khalam thutakte khalam kammalte-in ka genkhia zaw uh hi.
46002014	Tua Kha a nei lo mite adingin Pasian Kha pana hong pai nate haina suak ahi manin a sang kei uh hi. Ahang in, khalam tawh kikhentel thei bek ahi manin amah in tuate a theitel thei kei hi.
46002015	Khami bek in nate khempeuh thu khena, ahi hangin amah kuama thukhena mai-ah a om kei hi.
46002016	"Ahang in, Topa a hilh thei dingin kua in ama lungsim thei ahi hiam?”d Ahi hangin eite in Khrist lungsim i nei hi.
46003001	Sanggamte aw, khamite kianga gen bangin note kiangah kong gen thei kei hi. Ahi hangin samite – Khrist sunga naupangnote kianga gen bangin kong gen hi.
46003002	Note in antak ne zo nai lo na hi manun antak hong pia loin nawizu kong pia hi. Hitakpi hi, tu dongin na ne zo nai kei uh hi.
46003003	Note na sami lai uh hi. Note sungah kihazatna le kitotna a om lai nungsang, note sami lai hi lo na hi uh hiam? Note mihing lel banga gamta hi lo na hi uh hiam?
46003004	Ahang in, khat in, “Ken Paul ka zui hi,” ci a, adang khat in,”Ken Apolos ka zui hi,” a cih ciangin note mihing lel mah hi lo na hi uh hiam?
46003005	Bangbang hi ta leh Apolos bang hi peuhmah hiam? Paul zong bang hi mawk hiam? Amaute tungtawna na up theih nadingun amaute sep dinga Topa in a guat ciat nasemte hi bek uh hi.
46003006	Keimah in a ci ka tuh a, Apolos in tui buak hi, ahi hangin Pasian in a khangsak hi.
46003007	Tua ahi ciangin a khangsakpa Pasian bek longal a tuhpa ahi-a tui buakpa ahi zongin bangmah ahi kei hi.
46003008	A tuhpa le tuibuakpa a tup uh a kibang hi a, a sepna uh tawh kizui-in pahtakman kipia tuak ding hi.
46003009	Ahi hangin kote Pasian tawh nasem khawmte ka hi uh a, note Pasian inn Pasian lo na hi uh hi.
46003010	Pasian in hong piaksa hehpihna zangin inn lam siampa bangin bulkip khat ka phut zo a, midang khatpeuh in tua tungah a lam hi. Ahi hangin mikim in a lamdan pilvang uh hen.
46003011	Ahang in, khat a kiphutsa Jesu Khrist longal bulkip dang peuhmah kuamah in a phut thei kei hi.
46003012	Mi khatpeuh in hih bulkip tungah kham, ngun, suang manphate, sing, lopa keu ahikeh buhtu zangin a lam leh,
46003013	tua Ni in tua nasep khuavak ah pholak ding ahi manin ama nasep bang ahi hiam cih a kilakkhia ding hi. Mei tawh tua nasep kilakkhia dinga, mei in mikim nasep ahina bangbang a zia-et ciat ding hi.
46003014	A lamsate bangmah a cih kei leh ama pahtakman a ngah ding hi.
46003015	A kattum leh a sum ding hi; amah bek mah suakta dinga, ahi hangin meikuang laka suakta bang lelin a suakta ding hi.
46003016	Note mahmah Pasian biakinnpi hi-in, note sungah Pasian Kha a ten lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
46003017	Pasian biakinnpi siangtho a, note tua biakinnpi na hi manun, mi khatpeuh in Pasian biakinnpi a suksiat leh Pasian in amah a susia ding hi.
46003018	No le no kikhem kei un. Note lakah mi khatpeuh in tu khanghun tawh kituaka pil a kisak leh a pil a suah theih nadingin a “hai” suak hen.
46003019	Ahang in, hih leitung pilna Pasian mitmuh ah haina ahi hi. “Amah in a pilte amau zuau siamnaa ah a man hi” a cihleh
46003020	"Topa in a pilte ngaihsutna a mawkna hi, cih a thei hi”b ci-a kigelh bang ahi hi.
46003021	Tua ahi tak ciangin mihingte kisaktheihpih ding ahi nawn kei hi. Na khempeuh no aa hi a,
46003022	Paul ahi-a, Apolos ahi-a, Cephasc ahikeh kei tung ahi-a, nuntakna ahi-a, sihna ahi-a, tu hun ahi a, mailam hun ahi zongin – a vekpi-in no aa hi-a,
46003023	note Khrist aa hi-in, Khrist Pasian aa ahi hi.
46004001	Tua ahi ciangin mite in kote Khrist nasemte le Pasian thusim a kemte bangin hong ngaihsut ding uh ahi hi.
46004002	Kep ding a kipiakna mite a muanhuai pelmawh ding uh kisam hi.
46004003	Note na hi uh a, leitung thukhen zum khatpeuh ahi zongin kei tungah thu nong khen uh hangin phamawh ka sa kei hi; a taktakin kei le kei nangawn thu ka kikhen kei hi.
46004004	Kisuantakna ka nei kei hi, ahi hangin tua in kei mawhpeng hong suaksak tuan lo hi. Kei tunga thukhenpa Topa ahi hi.
46004005	Tua ahi ciangin a kisehsa hun a tun matengin bangmah thu na khen kei un; Topa hong pai ding ngak un. Amah in khuamial sunga kiselsimte khuavak ah pusuahkhia dinga, mihing lungtang tupnate a pholakkhia ding hi. Tua hun ciangin mikim in Pasian tung pan phatna a ngah ciat ding uh hi.
46004006	Sanggamte aw, tu-in no phattuam nadingin “Akigelhsa khengin pai kei in” cih thu a khiatna kote panin na sin theih zawk nadingun hih thute kei mahmah le Apolos tungah ka bulh hi. Tua hi-a mi khat sangin midang khat na kisaktheihpih zaw kei ding uh hi.
46004007	Ahang in, kua in note midang khatpeuh tawh a kibang loin hong bawl ahi hiam? Na ngah loh uh bang nei na hi uh hiam? A ngah na hi uh leh bang hangin a ngah lo bang kekin kisathei na hi uh hiam?
46004008	Na deih khempeuh uh na nei khin uh hi! A hau khin na hi uh hi! Kote tawh loin kumpi na suak khin uh hi! Note tawh kumpi ka suahkhawm theih nadingin kumpi suak takpi le uh cin ka ut mahmah hi!
46004009	Pasian in ko sawltakpite, kidemna muna mihonpite meizoma thah dinga kimawh paihsa mite tawh kibanga hong koih tawh kibang ka sa hi. Kote, khuavannuai buppi-a om vansawltakte le mihingte etnop lelin hong kinei hi.
46004010	Khrist adingin kote a hai ka hi uh a, ahi hangin note Khrist sungah na pil mahmah uh hi! Kote ka thanem uh a, note na thakhauh uh hi! Note hong kipahtawi-a, kote hong kisimmawh hi!
46004011	Tu hun laitak mahmah in ka gil uh kialin ka dang uh taka, puansiapi silhin, mi ngongtatna ka thuak uh a, inn loin ka om uh hi.
46004012	Ka khut uh tawh nakpi-in na ka sem uh hi. Hong kihamsiat ciangin thupha ka pia uh hi; hong kibawlsiat ciangin ka thuak keikai uh hi.
46004013	Hong kigensiat ciangin kamkhumin ka thuk uh hi. Tu hun mahmah ciang dong leitung deih loh leitang tunga ninpathem bang ka suak uh hi.
46004014	Hih lai note maizumsak nadinga ka gelh hi loin ka it ka tate banga kong vauhilhna hizaw hi.
46004015	Khrist sungah hong kem tulsawm bang na nei zawzen uh zongin pa tampi na nei kei uh hi. Ahang in, lungdamna-thu tungtawnin Khrist Jesu sungah note pa ka suak hi.
46004016	Tua ahi manin note in kei nong etteh ding uh kong thum hi.
46004017	Hih thu hangin Topa sungah a muanhuai ka it ka tapa Timothy no kiangah kong sawl hi. Amah in mun khempeuh a, pawlpi khempeuh ah ka thu hilh tawh kituaka, Khrist Jesu sunga ka nuntak zia note hong phawksak ding hi.
46004018	Note kiangah kei hong pai nawn lo ding bangin note pawlkhat na ki-uangsak uh hi.
46004019	Ahi hangin Topa in hong awi leh no kiangah kong pai baih dinga, tua ciangin hih a ki-uangsak mite kampauzia bek hi lo, bang vangliatna nei uh hiam, cih ka mukhia ding hi.
46004020	Ahang in, Pasian gam pen genzawh thu hi loin, vangliatna hizaw hi.
46004021	Note kiangah satna ciang tawh hong pai ding ka hi hiam? Itna le lungnemna tawh hong paizaw ding ka hi hiam? Bang teelzaw na hi uh hiam?
46005001	Note lakah numei-pasal paktatna om a, lawkite lak nangawna a om ngei lo: Mi khat in a pa zi tenpih hi, cih thu hong kithang takpi hi.
46005002	Na kisathei laidep uh hi! Na dah mahmah ding uh hizaw a, tua banga gamta mipa na kipawlna panun na puaseh ding uh hi lo ahi hiam?
46005003	Ka pumpi in kong om loh hangin kha-in no tawh ka omkhawm hi. Kei om mah tawh kibangin tua bang a hih mite tungah thu ka khen zo hi.
46005004	Note i Topa Jesu mina na kikhop uh ciangin kha in note tawh hong omkhawma, i Topa Jesu vangliatna zong a om hi.
46005005	Ama mawhdim pianngeia a kisiat theih nading le Topa ni ciang ama kha a kihotkhiat theih nadingin hih mipa Satan khut ah pia un.
46005006	Na kisaktheihna uh a hoih kei hi. Silngo tawnkha in buhnel mekman lom sung teng khempeuh tawkzo cih thei lo na hi uh hiam?
46005007	Silngo sawh loh buhnel mekman thak na hi takpi bangun tua mah na suah nadingun silngo lui paimang un. Ahang in, Khrist eite Paisan Tuuno in biakna i pia zo hi.
46005008	Tua ahi manin etsatna le tatsiatna silngo lui tawh hi loin, silngo kisawh lo, a taktak le thutak anlumin Pawi bawl ni.
46005009	Kong laikhaknasa sungah numei pasal paktatte tawh kipawl loh ding kong gelh zo hi.
46005010	Hih leitunga a paktatte, huaiham le sum nesimte ahikeh milim biate ka cihna ahi peuhmah kei hi. Tuate hi hileh hih leitung na nusiat uh kul ding hi.
46005011	Ahi hangin amah le amah na sanggam uh ka hi kici napi numei pasal-a paktat ahikeh a huaiham, milim bia khat ahikeh mi gensiat hat khat, zukham khat ahikeh sum nesim khatpeuh tawh na kipawl peuhmah loh nadingun kong gelh ahi hi. Tua bang mi khatpeuh tawh an nangawn na nekhawm kei un.
46005012	Pawlpi pua lamate tungah bang nuammawh in thu va khen ding ka hiam? A sunga omte tungah thu na khen ding uh hi lo hiam?
46005013	A pua-a omte tungah Pasian in thu a khen ding hi. “Tua tatsiapa note lak pan hawlkhia un”b
46006001	Note lakah khatpeuh midang tawh a kisiat leh a thu a khensak dingin misiangte mai a tut tangin pasian-milote mai tun ngam ding uh ahi hiam?
46006002	Misiang te in leitung thu khen ding ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note in leitung thu khen ding na hi uh leh thuneute khen dingin cin buang lo ding na hi uh hiam?
46006003	Eite in vansawltakte thu i khen ding thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahileh tu i nuntak sunga nate thu khen zawsem lo ding i hi hiam?
46006004	Tua ahi manin tua bang kisiatna na neih uh leh pawlpi sunga a kineu koih mite nangawn thukhen dingin seh lel un!a
46006005	Na maizum nadingun hih thu kong gen hi. Thu-umte kikalah thusiate khen ding zaha pilna nei note lakah om buang lo na hi uh hiam?
46006006	Ahi hangin tua sangsikin sanggam khat in adang khat thukhente tungah hekin tua nangawn thu um lote tung hi sawnsawn hi!
46006007	Tua banga note lakah thusia na kineihna uh no mahmah a guallel dimdemsa na hina uh a kilatna ahi hi. Bang dinga khial tangzaw mai lo na hi uh hiam? Bang dinga mi khemsa hizaw mai lo na hi uh hiam?
46006008	Tua sangsikin no le no kikhemin khialhna na bawl uh a, tua pen mah na sanggamte uh tungah na hih uh hi.
46006009	Mi tatsiate in Pasian gam a luah loh ding lam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Mi khemsa-in om kei un: Numei pasal paktatte, milim biate, angkawmte, pasal kizuakte, pasal le pasal paktatte,
46006010	gutate, duhhopte, zu khamkhamte, mi gensiate, sum ne simte khempeuh in Pasian gam a luah kei ding hi.
46006011	Note pawlkhat tua bang na hi uh hi. Ahi hangin i Topa Jesu Khrist min le i Pa Pasian Kha tawh note hong kisawp zo, hong kisiangthosak zoin, dik hong kitangsak zo hi.
46006012	Na khempeuh hih ding a kiphal hi – ahi hangin na khempeuh phattuamna a hi kim kei hi. “Kei adingin na khempeuh a kiphal hi” – ahi hangin na khat beek ka ki-uksak nuam kei hi.
46006013	An in gilpi ading ahi mah bangin gilpi zong an ading mah ahi hi – ahi hangin Pasian in tuate gel a susia ding hi. Pumpi pen numei pasal paktatna-a zat ding hi loin Topa ading hi-a Topa zong pumpi ading ahi hi.
46006014	Pasian in ama vangliatna tawh misi panin Topa thosak-a, eite zong hong thosak ding hi.
46006015	Note pumpi Khrist mahmah pumpi nate ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahileh Khrist pumpi nate la-in a kizuakte tawh gawmkhawm ding ka hi hiam? Ka gawnkhawm ngei peuhmah kei ding hi!
46006016	A kizuaknu tawh a kigawmpa tuanu tawh pumpi ah khat suak ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Ahang in, “Tua nihte cikhat sakhat a suak uh hi”b ci hi.
46006017	Ahi hangin amahmah Topa tawh a kigawmte kha-in amah tawh khat ahi hi.
46006018	Numei pasal paktatna na taisan un. Mihing in a bawl mawhna dangte khempeuh a pumpi pualam hi-a, ahi hangin numei pasal mawhna-a a mawhte ama pumpi tungah a mawh ahi hi.
46006019	Note pumpi Pasian tung pana na ngah uh no sunga om Khasiangtho biakinnpi ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Note nomau aa na hi kei uh hi;
46006020	note man kipia-a leisa na hi uh hi. Tua ahi manin na pumpi uh tawh Pasian na pahtawi un.
46007001	Tu-in lai-a nong gelh uh thute tawh kisai-in pasal in zi nei kei leh a hoih hi.a
46007002	Ahi hangin paktatna hihzahta a om nungsang pasal in ama zi, numei in ama pasal ciat a nei tek ding uh hi.
46007003	Pasal in a zi tungah nupa hihna a tangcingsak ding hi. Tua mah bangin zi in zong a pasal tungah a tangcingsak ding hi.
46007004	Zi pumpi amah kia aa hi loin a pasal aa zong ahi hi. Tua mah bangin pasal pumpi zong amah kia aa hi loin a zi aa zong ahi hi.
46007005	Thungen dinga na kipumpiak theih nadingun na kithukimna uh hun tomkha kal simloh kuamah na kideek kei un. Note pumpi na ki-uk zawh lohna uh hanga Satan in hong khem zawh loh nadingin tua bang hun khit ciangin na kigawm kik un.
46007006	Hih pen thupiak bang hi loin a hi thei liailiai-a kong gen ahi hi.
46007007	Mi khempeuh kei tawh kibang leh ka ut hi. Ahi hangin mikim in Pasian tung panin letsong a tuamtuam nei ciat uh hi. Mi khat in hih letsong ngah a, midang khat in adang khat a ngah hi.
46007008	Kitenpih nei nai lote le meigongte tunga ka cihinah amaute in kei bangin tenpih nei kei le uh a hoih hi.
46007009	Ahi hangin amau le amau ki-uk zo loin huklua lanlua-a a om uh sangin tenpih neih hoihzaw ahi manin tenpih zaw uh hen.
46007010	Tenpih neisate tungah hih thupiak ka pia hi. (Kei piak hi lo, Topa piak): Zi, a pasal tawh kikhen peuhmah kei hen.
46007011	Ahi hangin a kikhen leh pasal nei loin om pelmawh hen. Ahikeh a pasal tawh kilemkik hen. Pasal in zong a zi ma peuhmah kei ta hen.
46007012	Adangte tungah hih ka gen hi. (Topa hi lo, kei gen): sanggampa khatpeuh in thu um lo mi zi-a a neih a, tuanu amah tawh a omkhawm nop nakleh ma kei hen.
46007013	Numei khat in zong thu um lo mi khat pasalin nei a, tuapa amah tawh a omkhawm nop nakleh ma kei hen.
46007014	Ahang in, a um lo pasal a zi tungtawnin sianthosaksa hi-a, a um lo zi zong a um a pasal tungtawnin sianthosaksa ahi hi. Tua hi kei leh na tate uh a siang lo hi dinga, ahi hangin tua mah bangin amaute a siangtho uh hi.
46007015	Ahi hangin thu um lo mi in a ciahsan leh ciah ta hen. Thu umpa ahikeh thu umnu tua bang thu in a khih kei hi. Pasian in kilema nungta dingin eite hong sapsa ahi hi.
46007016	Zi aw, na pasal na hotkhiat theih ding, na hotkhiat theih loh ding bang thei na hi hiam? Ahikeh pasal aw, na zi na hotkhiat theih ding le na hotkhiat theih loh ding bang thei na hi hiam?
46007017	Hi tase leh mi khatpeuh in Topa in a nuntak nadinga a sehna le tua dinga Pasian in a sapna kembit ta hen. Hih in pawlpi khempeuh tunga ka piak ngeina ahi hi.
46007018	Mi khat a kisap lai-in vunatsa ahi hiam? Amah vunat loh suak kei hen. Mi khat a kisap lai-in vun at loh ahi hiam? Amah in vunat kei hen.
46007019	Vunatna bangmah ahi kei hi. Vunat loh zong bangmah a hi tuan kei hi. Pasian thupiakte zuihna bek a thupi ahi hi.
46007020	Pasian in a sap laitak huna a om bangbangin mikim om ta hen.
46007021	Nang hong kisap laitak sila na hi hiam? Tua kilunghimawhsak kei in. Na suahtakna a ngah thei ding na hi zongin na om ngei bangin om in.
46007022	Topa in a sap laitakin sila a om mi, Topa suahtaksak mi hi a; tua mah bangin amah a kisap laitaka suakta mi, Khrist sila ahi hi.
46007023	Note man kipia-a leisa na hi uh hi. Mihingte sila na suak kei un.
46007024	Sanggamte aw, Pasian tunga hih dinga Pasian in a sapna ah mikim om ciat uh hen.
46007025	Tu-in nungak bitte tawh kisai-in: Topa tung pana thupiak ka nei kei hi; ahi hangin Topa lainatna hanga a muantak mi khat bangin thu ka khen hi.
46007026	Tu laitaka haksatna hangin na om bangbangua na om ding uh a hoihin ka ngaihsun hi.
46007027	Zi na nei ta hiam? Mak sawm kei in. Zi nei nai lo na hi hiam? Zi zong kei in.
46007028	Ahi hangin zi na neih khit leh na mawh kei hi, nungak bit khat in pasal a neih leh a mawh kei hi. Ahi hangin kitenpih a nei peuhmah in hih a nuntak sungin lung khamna tampi a tuak ding hi; tua hi-a tua pan in nang kong awngsut nuam hi.
46007029	Sanggamte aw, hun tom ta ka cihnopna ahi hi. Tu-a kipan zi neite a nei lo bangin om uh hen.
46007030	A kapte a kap lo bangin om uh hen. A lungdamte a lungdam lo bangin om uh hen; na khatpeuh a leite amau ading ahi lo bangin om uh hen.
46007031	Leitung na a zangte in uangzat lua kei uh hen. Ahang in, hih leitung tu-a a om bang lah a beibei ta ahi hi.
46007032	Lunghimawhna na neih loh ding uh ka deih hi. Zi nei lopa in Topa a lungkimsak theih nadingin Topa nate mah a lung himawhpih hi.
46007033	Ahi hangin zi neipa in a zi bangci lungkimsak ding cihna-in hih leitung nate lunghimawh a,
46007034	ama lung lutnate a kikhenthang hi. Pasal a nei lo numei ahikeh nungak bit in Topa nate a lunghimawh hi; tuanu tupna, a pumpi le a kha Topa tungah a pumpiak ding ahi hi. Ahi hangin pasal neisa numei in ahileh a pasal a lungkimsak thei ding cihna-in hih leitung nate a lunghimawh hi.
46007035	Note hoih nadingin hih thu kong gen hi; note kong ukcip nopna hi loin Topa tungah thumaana ki-apna bukimin na nuntak theih nading uh hizaw hi.
46007036	Mi khatpeuh in nungak bit khat a dot manin a kilawm loin gamta-in a kingaih sut-a, ahi hangin tuanu kulta-in nialna a neih kei-a, a lawmpa in tenpih loh theih lohin a ngaihsut leh ama lungkimna bangin tenpih ta hen. Amah a mawh kei hi. Amaute kiteng uh hen.
46007037	Ahi hangin tuapa in hi lo thei lo ahi man hi loin ama lungsim ah tenpih loh dingin kizo a, tua nungak bit tenpih loh nadingin a lungsim a khentat leh hih mipa a mana gamta ahi hi.
46007038	Tua ahi ciangin nungak bit a tenpihpa thumaana gamta ahi hi. Ahi hangin a tenpih lopa a hoihzaw a gamta ahi hi. b
46007039	Numei, a pasal nuntak sung teng a pasal ah kikhih hi. Ahi zongin a pasal a sih leh a deih peuhpeuh tenpih thei hi. Ahi hangin a lawmpa Topa aa hi pelmawh ding hi.
46007040	Kei khentatna ah tuanu a tuaci-in om leh a lungnuam zaw ding hi. Tua hi-a kei zong Pasian Kha nei-in ka kingaihsun hi.
46008001	Tu-in milim thoihna an tawh kisai-in: Eite khempeuh in theihna i neih lam i thei tek hi.a Theihna in mi kisatheisak a, itna in a khansuah hi.
46008002	Ka thei hi ci-a a kingaihsun mi in ama theih ding zah a thei nai kei hi.
46008003	Ahi hangin Pasian a it mi Pasian in a thei hi.
46008004	Tua tak ciangin milim thoihna an nekna thu panin milim pen, leitung ah bangmah a hi lopi hi-a Pasian khat longal adang om lo cih i thei hi.
46008005	Ahang in, vantung ahi-a leitung ahi zongin pasian a kicite om taleh zong (“pasiante” tampi le “topate” tampi om takpi hi.)
46008006	eite adingin Pasian khat bek om a, amah Pa hi-in, na khempeuh amah panin pianga eite ama adingin i nungta hi; tua ciangin Topa khat bek om a, amah Jesu Khrist ahi hi; ama tungtawnin na khempeuh pianga, ama tungtawnin eite i nungta hi.
46008007	Ahi hangin mi khempeuh in hih thu a thei kim kei hi. Mi pawlkhatte milim biak zongsang khin lua uh ahi manin tua bang ante a nek uh ciangin milim thoihna-a kizangsa ci-a ngaihsunsa-in a ne uh hi. Amau kitheihna lungsim thanem ahi manin a buah a suak uh hi.
46008008	Ahi hangin an in Pasian tawh hong kinaisak tuan kei hi. I nek loh hangin i siazaw tuan kei a, i nek hangin zong i hoihzaw tuan kei hi.
46008009	Bangbang ahi zongin na suahtakna uh na zatna uhah a thanemte adingin kimuktukna a suah loh nadingin kidawm un.
46008010	Ahang in a kitheihna lungsim thanem mi khatpeuh in theihna a nei nang milim biakna inn sungah an na nek hong mu leh milim thoihna-a kipiate a nek ding uh maingal kha lo ding uh ahi hiam?
46008011	Tua ciangin ama adinga Khrist a si, a thanem sanggampa nang theihna in a siasak ahi hi.
46008012	Hih bangin na sanggamte uh tunga na mawh uh a, a thanem amau kitheihna lungsim na liamsak beh uh ciangin Khrist tunga mawh na hi uh hi.
46008013	Tua ahi manin ka annek in mawhna sungah ka sang gampa a puksak leh amah ka puksak loh nadingin sa ka ne nawn peuhmah kei ding hi.
46009001	Kei suakta hi lo ka hi hiam? Sawltakpi khat hi lo ka hi hiam? I Topa Jesu mu khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Topa sunga ka nasepna gah note hi lo na hi uh hiam?
46009002	Adangte tungah sawltakpi ka hi kei kha zongin note adingin ka hi taktak hi! Ahang in, Topa sungah sawltakpi ka hina ciamtehna, note na hi uh hi.
46009003	Kei tunga thukhena tute tungah ka kihutna hih ahi hi.
46009004	A ne a dawn dingin thuneihna nei lo ka hi uh hiam?
46009005	Sawltakpi dangte Topa sanggamte le Cephasa-te bangin thu um mi zi neih theihna thuneihna nei lo ka hi uh hiam?
46009006	Ahikeh kivakna nasem ding Barnabas le kei bek ka hi uh hiam?
46009007	Ama sum zanga galkap na a sem kua ahi hiam? Lenggui suan napi lenggah ne lo kua ahi hiam? Ganhon khawi napi a nawi dawn lo kua ahi hiam?
46009008	Mihing muhna lel ah hih thu a gen ka hi hiam? Thukham in zong tua mah gen hi lo ahi hiam?
46009009	Ahang in, Moses thukham sungah “Bawngtal in buh a cil laitakin a muk hencip kei in”b ci-in kigelh hi. Pasian lunghimawh bawngtalte ahi hiam?
46009010	Amah in eite adingin hih thu gen takpi hi lo ahi hiam? Himah hi, eite adinga kigelh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lokhopa in lo a khawh a, ancilpa in an a cil ciangin a gah ngah ding lamena a sep ding mah ahi hi.
46009011	Kote in note lakah khalam khaici vawhin note pan leitung nate ka at uh val lua ahi hiam?
46009012	Midangte in note panin hih huhna thuneihna ngah uh ahileh kote in a tamzaw san ngah lo ding ka hi uh hiam? Ahi hangin hih thuneihna ka zang kei uh hi. Tua tangin Khrist lungdamna-thu a khaktan ka suah loh nadingun na khempeuh ka thuak zaw uh hi.
46009013	Biakinnpi sunga nasemte in biakinnpi panin an ngah uh a, biakna-tau a nasemte in biakna-tau tunga kiluite a ngah lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
46009014	Tua mah tawh kibangin Topa in: Lungdamna-thu a hilhte in, lungdamna-thu panin kivakna a ngah ding uh hi, ci-in thu a pia hi.
46009015	Ahi hangin hih thuneihnate khat beek ka zang kei uh hi. Kei adingin tua bang nong hih ding uh lamenin lai hong khak ka hi kei hi. Mi khatpeuh in hih kisialhna hong suhkhiat sangin ka si zaw ding hi.
46009016	Tua hi napi hih teitei dinga phut ka hi manin lungdamna-thu ka hilh ciangin ka kisial thei kei hi. Lungdamna-thu ka hilh kei leh gimna ka thuak hi!
46009017	Keima utthu-a hilh ka hileh pahtakman ka nei hi. Keima utthu-a hilh ka hi kei leh muanga sep dinga hong kipia a semkhia bek ka hi hi.
46009018	Tua hileh ka pahtakman ding bang ahi hiam? Lungdamna thu ka hilhna ah ka thuneihna zang lo a, man nei loin ka piak theih nading bek mah ahi hi.
46009019	Kei suakta-in kuama aa ka hi lo hangin mi a tam theithei ka ngah zawh nadingin mi khempeuh sila ka kisuaksak hi.
46009020	Jew-te ngah nadingin Jew-te tungah Jew-te bang ka suak hi. Thukham nuai-a omte ka ngah theih nadingin(kei mahmah thukham nuai-ah om lo napi) thukham nuai-a omte khat bangin ka om hi.
46009021	Thukham nei lote ka ngah zawh nadingin (Pasian thukham pan suakta hi loin Khrist thukham nuai-ah omzaw in)thukham nei lote kiangah thukham nei lote khat bangin ka om hi.
46009022	A thanemte ka ngah theih nadingin a thanemte kiangah a thanem ka suak hi. Mi pawlkhat ka hotkhiat theih nadingin a hih theihna lamlam ah mi khempeuh tungah na khempeuh ka suak hi.
46009023	Lungdamna thuphate ah tanh ka neih theih nadingin lungdamna-thu hangin hihte khempeuh ka sem hi.
46009024	Tai kidemna ah a taite khempeuh tai uh a, ahi hangin khat bek in pahtakman a san lam thei lo na hi uh hiam? Pahtakman na san theih nading lam lamun tai un.
46009025	Kidemna-a kihel dingte peuhmah nakpitakin a kisin uh hi. Amaute a kisia thei lukhu ngah dingin a kidem uh hi. Ahi hangin eite in a kisia thei lo ding lukhu ngah dingin i kidem hi.
46009026	Tua ahi manin tupna mel a nei lo mite a tai bangun ka tai kei hi. Huih lak a tum mi bangin ka do kei uh hi.
46009027	Tua bang lel bek hi loin midangte tungah thu ka hilh khit ciangin pahtakman sang dingin ka cinlah phing loh nadingin ka pumpi tumin sila in ka bawl hi.
46010001	Bang hang hiam cih leh sanggamte aw, i pu i pate meiipi nuai-ah omin amaute khempeuh tuipi sung tawna a paisuakna thu na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
46010002	Amaute khempeuh Moses sungah meii le tuipi-in a kibaptise uh hi.
46010003	Amaute khempeuh in khalam an a kibang ne uh a,
46010004	khalam dawn a kibang a dawn uh hi; ahang in, amaute a tonpih khalam Suangpi panin dawn uh a, tua Suangpi Khrist ahi hi.
46010005	Ahi hangin amaute a tamzaw tungah Pasian lungkim lo a, amaute pumpi gamlakah a kithehthang hi.
46010006	Amaute bangin a gilo nate lunggulhin i om loh nadingin eite etteha dinga hihte a tungkhol ahi hi.
46010007	"Tua mite a ne a dawn dingin tusuk uh a, lawkite noptatna haihuai sunga bual dingin a dingto uh hi.”b ci-a kigelhsa amaute pawlkhat bangin milim biate suak kei ni.
46010008	Amaute pawlkhat in numei pasal paktatna a bawlna uh hangin ni khatin tul sawmnih le tulthum si uh hi – eite in tua bang mawhna bawl kei ni.
46010009	Amaute pawlkhat in Topa zia-et uh a, gul in a tuklup bangin eite in i Topa zia-et kei ni.
46010010	Amaute pawlkhat phun uh a, a thatgam thei vansawltak in amaute a thah bangin eite phun kei ni.
46010011	Amaute tungah hih thute etteh dingin na pianga, khanghunte a bukimna hong tunna, eite kivauhilh nadingin a kigelh hi.
46010012	Tua ahi ciangin kiptakin dinga na kingaihsut leh na puk loh nadingin kidawm in!
46010013	Note in mihingte tuah ngei zia-etna longal na tuak kei uh hi. Pasian a muanhuai hi; na thuak zawh loh ding zahval zia-etna hong tungsak kei ding hi. Ahi hangin note hong kizia-et ciangin na thuakzawh nadingun suahtakna lampi hong bawlsak ding hi.
46010014	Tua ahi manin ka lawm itte aw, milim biakna na taisan un.
46010015	Thu ngaihsun thei mite kianga thugen ka hi hi. Ka thugente nomau mahmah adingin na khentel un.
46010016	Eite in lungdam i koh tua lungdamkohna hai in, Khrist sisan a i kihelna hi lo ahi hiam? Eite in i balkhap anlum zong Khrist pumpi-a i kihelna mah hi lo ahi hiam?
46010017	Bang hang hiam cih leh anlum khat om a, lum khat panin ne tek i hi manin a tampi eite pum khat i hi hi.
46010018	Israel mite ngaihsun dih un: kithoihna sa a nete in biaknatau ah kihelna nei uh hi lo ahi hiam?
46010019	Tua ahileh milim tunga kipia kithoihna na khatpeuh ahi zongin, milim ahi zongin thupi hi, ka cihnopna ahi hiam?
46010020	Hilo hi. Ahi hangin lawkite kithoihna pen dawite tungah thoihna-a kipia hi-a, Pasian tunga kipia ahi kei hi. Tua hi-a dawite tawh na kikop khawm ding uh ka deih kei hi.
46010021	Topa hai dawnin dawite hai zong na dawn khawm thei kei ding uh hi. Topa sabuai le dawite sabuai ah a nihin na umkhawm thei kei ding uh hi.
46010022	Eite in Topa hazatna sosak dingin hanciam i hi hiam? Eite amah sangin thahat zaw i hi hiam?
46010023	Na khempeuh hih ding a kiphal hi. Ahi hangin na khempeuh phattuamna ahi kim kei hi. Na khempeuh hih ding a kiphal hi – ahi hangin na khempeuh in a hoihsak kim kei hi.
46010024	Kuamah in ama hoih nading bek zong loin midangte hoih nading zong zaw hen.
46010025	Na kitheihna lungsim dong loin sa zuakna-a kizuak sa khatpeuh na ne in.
46010026	Ahang in, “Leitung le a sunga om khempeuh Topa aa ahi hi.”c
46010027	Thu um lo mi khatpeuh in an ne dingin hong sapa na va hawh nop leh na kitheihna lungsim dong loin na mai-a kilui peuhpeuh ne in.
46010028	Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in, “Hih in kithoihna-a kipia sa ahi hi,” hong cih leh tua hong genpa hang le na lungsim kisuantakna hangin ne kei in.d
46010029	Nang aa hi lo midang lungsim kitheihna gen ka hi hi. Ahang in, bang hangin kei suahtakna, midangte lungsim kisuantakna in thu kikhen ding ahi hiam?
46010030	Lungdamtaka tua an ka nek leh bang hanga na khatpeuh tungtanga Pasian tung lungdam ka kohna hangin kei hong kimawhsak ahi hiam?
46010031	Tua ahi ciangin na ne, na dawn uh zongin na hihna peuhpeuhuah na hihna khempeuh uh Topa minthan nadingin na hih un.
46010032	Jew-te le Greek-te ahikeh Pasian pawlpi khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin kimuktusak kei unla,
46010033	lam khempeuh ah mi khempeuh lungkimsak ka sawm bangin na hih un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a kihotkhiat theih nadingin keimah kia hoih nading zong loin mi tampi hoih nading ka zong hi.
46011001	Keimah in Khrist ka etteh bangin kei hong etteh un.
46011002	Na khempeuh ah kei nong phawk gige man uh leh kong piaksawn hilhnatea bang tektekin lenkipa na sep manun note kong phat hi.
46011003	Tu-in pasalte khempeuh lutang Khrist hi-a, numei lutang pasal hi-in, Khrist lutang Pasian ahilam na theihtel ding uh ka deih hi.
46011004	Pasal peuhmah in thu a ngen a, thu a gen zongin a lutang a khuh leh a lutang simmawh ahi hi.
46011005	Tua mah bangin numei peuhmah in thu a ngen a, thu a gen zongin a lutang a khuh kei leh a lutang simmawh ahi hi – tua pen a sam a metmai tawh kibang tektek hi.
46011006	Numei in a lutang a khuh kei leh a sam a tan ding hi Numei adingin sam tan ahikeh sam metmai a zumhuai ding leh a lutang a khuh ding hi.
46011007	Pasal pen Pasian lim le a minthanna ahi nungsang a lutang a khuh kei ding hi.b Ahi hangin numei pen pasal minthanna ahi hi.
46011008	Ahang in, numei pana pasal kibawl hi loin, numei pen pasal pan hizaw hi.
46011009	Numei adingin pasal kibawl hi lo a, pasal adingin numei kibawl hizaw hi.
46011010	Hih thu hang le vansawltakte hangin numei in a lutang tungah thu a kineihna lim a neih ding kilawm hi.
46011011	Bangbang ahi zongin Topa sungah pasal loin numei a tangdin kei a, numei loin pasal a tangdin tuan kei hi.
46011012	Ahang in, pasal panin numei a kibawl bangin pasal zong numei pana suak ahi hi. Ahi hangin na khempeuh Pasian pana piang ahi hi.
46011013	No le no in khentel un: Numei in a lutang khuh loin Pasian tungah thu a nget ding a kilawm hiam?
46011014	A pianzia mahmah in zong pasal a sam a sau leh zumhuai-a,
46011015	ahi hangin numei a sam a sau leh ama minthanna ahi hi, ci-in hong hilh hi lo ka hi hiam? Ahang in, samsau pen numei lutang khuh nadinga kipia ahi hi.
46011016	Hih thu tawh kisai-in mi khatpeuh a selkhah nop leh eite in zat ngeina adang i nei kei a, Pasian pawlpite in zong a nei kei uh hi.
46011017	Na kikhopnate un hoihna sangin siatna piangsak zaw ahi manin a nuai-a kong lahte ah note kong phat kei hi:
46011018	A masa penin pawlpi hina tawh note na kikhop uh ciangin note lakah kipawl khenna om cih ka za a, upna ciang zong ka nei hi.
46011019	Note lakah kuate Pasian san hiam, cih a kilat nadingin ngaihsutna kibang lo zong a om ding mah ahi hi.
46011020	Note na kikhop uh cianga na nek pen uh Topa nitak-an ahi kei hi.
46011021	Ahang in, na nek uh ciangin kuamah kingak loin na ne tek pah uh hi. Khat gilkialin om a, adang khat in zu a kham hi.
46011022	Na nek na dawn nading uh inn nei lo na hi uh hiam? Ahikeh Pasian pawlpi simmawhin bangmah a nei lote zahlaaksak na hi uh hiam? Note kiangah bang kong gen ding hiam? Hih thu hangin note kong phat ding hiam! Kong phat peuhmah kei hi!
46011023	Ahang in, note kong piaksawn pen Topa tung pana ka ngah ahi hi: Topa Jesu a kilehhek ni zanin anlum la a,
46011024	lungdam a koh khit ciangin balkham a, “Hih in note adinga kipia ka pumpi ahi hi, kei nong phawk nadingun na hih un,” a ci hi.
46011025	Tua mah bangin nitak-an a nek khit uh ciangin hai la a, “Hih hai in ka sisana thukhunna thak ahi hi. Na dawn simun kei nong phawk nadingun na hih un,” a ci hi.
46011026	Ahang in, hih anlum ne a, hih hai na dawn simun Topa sihna ama hong pai dong a tangko na hi uh hi.
46011027	Tua ahi manin a kilawm loin anlum ne a, Topa hai a dawn peuhmah Topa pumpi le ama sisan tungah a mawh hi.
46011028	Mi khatpeuh in anlum a nek ma le hai a dawn ma-in amah a kisittel ding kisam hi.
46011029	Ahang in, Topa pumpi theician lopi-a, a ne a dawn mi peuhmah ama tungah thukhenna a tun nadingin a ne a dawn ahi hi.
46011030	Tua thu hangin note lakah tampi zawngkhalin cina uh a, mi tampi a ihmu zo uh hi.
46011031	Ahi hangin eite, ei le ei thu i kikhen khit leh thukhenna i thuak kei ding hi.
46011032	Topa in eite thu hong khen ciangin leitung tawh hong kimawhpaih khawm loh nadingin eite hong sekna ahi hi.
46011033	Tua ahi tak ciangin sanggamte aw, a ne dinga na kikhop uh ciangin khat le khat na kingak un.
46011034	Na kikhopna un thukhenna hong tut loh nadingin a gilkial khatpeuh a om leh a inn ah ne ta hen. Tua banah kong pai ciangin thudangte kong lak lai ding hi.
46012001	Sangamte aw, tu-in khalam letsongte thu na theih loh ding uh ka deih kei hi.
46012002	Note lawki na hih lai-un, a pau thei lo milimte lamah midangte thuzawh le pimangin na om lam uh na thei uh hi.
46012003	Tua ahi manin Pasian Kha pansana thugen mi peuhmah in, “Jesu kihamsiat hen” ci thei lo a, Khasiangtho pansan longal kuamah in, “Jesu in Topa hi,” a ci thei kei hi, cih kong gen hi.
46012004	Letsong a tuamtuam a om hangin Kha a kibang ahi hi.
46012005	Nasepna a tuamtuam a om hangin Topa a kibang hi.
46012006	Sepsakna nam tuamtuam a om hangin mi khempeuh sungah tua Pasian mah in a sem hi.
46012007	Tu-in mi khempeuh i hoihkim nading mikim tungah Kha kilatkhiatna kipia ciat hi.
46012008	Mi khat tungah Kha tungtawnin pilna thupuak kipia hi. Midang khat tungah tua Kha mah in theihna thupuak,
46012009	midang khat tungah a kibang Kha in upna kipia a, tua Kha khat mah in cina damsakna letsongte,
46012010	midang khat tungah nalam dang bawl theihna vangte, midang khat tungah thu magen theihna, midang khat tungah khate khentel theihna, midang khat tungah pau nam tuamtuama pau theihna, midang khat lai tungah paute khiat theihnab kipia hi.
46012011	Hihte khempeuh a kibang Kha khat nasep hi-a, amah in a sehsa bangin amaute a pia ciat hi.
46012012	Pumpi in na tampi tawh kibawl hi napi pumkhat ahi hi. A nate tampi ahi hangin pumpi khat a piangsak uh hi. Khrist zong tua mah bang ahi hi.
46012013	Ahang in, eite Jew-te i hi-a, Greek-te i hi zongin sila i hi-a, sila lo i hi zongin Kha khat inc pumpi khat sungah i vekpi-in hong baptise a, eite i vekpi in i dawn ding Kha khat mah hong kipia hi.
46012014	Na khat bek tawh pumpi kibawl hi loin na tampi tawh kibawl ahi hi.
46012015	Khe in,”Khut hi lo ka hi manin pumpi aa ka hi kei hi,” cileh tua a cihna lel tawh pumpi na a hina a bei tuan kei hi.
46012016	Tua ciangin bil in, “Kei mit hilo ka hi manin pumpi aa ka hi kei hi,” cileh tua a cihna lel tawh pumpi aa a hihna a bei tuan kei hi.
46012017	Pumpi a vekpi in mittang khat hi mawk leh khuazak theih nading koi-ah om ding ahi hiam? Pumpi a vekpi-in bil khat hi mawk leh a gimnam zak theih nading koi-ah om ding ahi hiam?
46012018	Ahi hangin Pasian in amaute, ama deihna bang tektekin pumpi tungah a guang kim hi.
46012019	Amaute khempeuh pumpi na khat bek hileh pumpi koi-ah om ding ahi hiam?
46012020	Tu in ahileh pumpi na tampi om a, ahi hangin pumpi khat ahi hi.
46012021	Mit in khut kiangah,”Nang kong kisam kei hi,” a ci thei kei hi. Lutang in zong khepek kiangah, “Nang kong kisam kei hi,” a ci thei kei hi.
46012022	Tua sangsikin pumpi na a gina lo hileh a kilawmte a kisampente hizaw hi.
46012023	Tua hi-a i thupisim loh pumpi nate i nak pahtawite hi thei zaw hi. A kithusim tham lo pumpi nate nakpi-in dop kulzaw hi.
46012024	I thusimzawk pumpi nate, tua banga limbawl tuan a kul kei hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in pumpi nate ki-awhsaka a kisamzaw pumpi nate tungah nakpitakin pahtawina pia-in,
46012025	pumpi sungah tua bangin kituam khenna om loin, a nate khat le khat a kibanga a kithusim tuah ciat nading uh ahi hi.
46012026	Khat in a thuak leh adang khempeuh in a thuakpih hi. A nate khat a kipahtawi leh adang khempeuh in a lungdampih uh hi.
46012027	Tu-in note Khrist pumpi na hi uh a, a pumpi nate na hikim uh hi.
46012028	Tua hi-a Pasian pawlpi sungah a masapenin Pasian in sawltakpite, a nihna-in kamsangte, a thumna ah lai hilhte, tua ciangin nalamdang bawlte, cina damsak theihna letsong ngahte, midang a huh theite, ki-ukna letsong ngahte le pau nam tuam tuam a paute zong a seh hi.
46012029	Mi khempeuh sawltakpi ahi uh hiam? Mi khempeuh kamsangte ahi uh hiam? Mi khempeuh lai hilhte ahi uh hiam? Mi khempeuh in nalamdangte a bawl uh hiam?
46012030	Mi khempeuh in cina damsakna letsong a nei uh hiam? Mi khempeuh pauted in a pau uh hiam? Mi khempeuh in a khiatna a gen uh hiam?
46012031	Ahi hangin letsong lianzawte lawpin na lunggulh zaw un.e
46013001	Mihingte pau le vansawltakte pau-ina ka pau theih hangin itna ka neih kei leh zam ahikeh daltuah ging bang lel ka hi hi.
46013002	Thugentheihna letsong nei-in thuthuk khempeuh le theihna khempeuh thei-in mual a kinsak zo upna ka neih hangin itna ka neih kei leh a mawkna ka hi hi.
46013003	Ka neihsa khempeuh mizawngte pia-in ka pumpi mei-a halb dingin ka pumpiak hangin itna ka neih kei leh bangmah ka lawhtak kei hi.
46013004	Itna lungduai a, itna a migi hi. Eng loin a kisial kei a, a kisathei kei hi.
46013005	Gamhtat loin ama angsung ding bek zong lo a, heh baih loin gamtatkhialhnate a ciamteh kei hi.
46013006	Itna in gitlohna pakta lo a, ahi hangin thutak ah a lungdam hi.
46013007	Itna in hu tawntungin, muang dena; lamen den in, a tawntungin a thuak keikai hi.
46013008	Itna a bei ngei kei hi. Kamsanga thugennate a om hangin a bei ding hi; paute a om hangin a dai ding hi; theihna a om hangin a beimang ding hi.
46013009	Ahang in, eite in a kim loin i thei a, a kim loin thu i gen hi.
46013010	Ahi hangin kicinna hong tun ciangin kicinlohna a maimang ding hi.
46013011	Naupang ka hi laitakin naupang bangin ka pau hi; naupang bangin ka ngaihsun a, naupang bangin ka khaikak hi. Ka khan khit ciangin naupang vaite ka nusia hi.
46013012	Tu-in limlang ah ahi milmial a muh bangin i muh hangin tua hun ciangin kimaituahin i mu ding hi. Tu-in a kim loin ka thei hi; tua hun ciangin a kicinga kei hong kitheih khit bangin a kicingin ka thei ding hi.
46013013	Tu-in upna, lametna le itna hih thumte a om den hi. Ahi hangin hih thumte lakah itna a lianpen hi.
46014001	Itna lampi tawnin khalam letsongte lawptakin na lunggulh un; adiakdiakin kamsanga thu gentheihna letsong na deih un.
46014002	Ahang in, pau khata a thugente mi tawh kiho hi loin Pasian tawh kiho ahi hi. A taktakin kuamah in amah a theitel kei hi; ama khab tawh thuthukte a gen ahi hi.
46014003	Kam sanga thugente peuhmah in, amaute tha khauhsak ding, hanthawn ding le hehnem dingin mihing tungah thu a gen hi.
46014004	Pautuam khata thugente ama phattuam nading hi-a; kam sanga thugente in pawlpi a phatuamsak hi.
46014005	Note khempeuh pautec zangin thugen thei hi le uh cin ka ut hi. Ahi hangin kam sanga thugen thei hi le uhcin ka utzaw lai hi. Pauted zanga thugen mi in pawlpi phattuam nadingin a thugen a khiatna a gen kei leh amah sangin kam sanga thugenpa a lianzaw hi.
46014006	Tu-in sanggamte aw, note kiangah hong pai-in paute zanga thu ka gen hangin kilaakna ahi a, theihna ahi zongin, kamsanga thugenna ahi a, thuhilhna kammal ahi zongin kong puak kei leh no adingin ka phattuamna bang om ahi hiam?
46014007	Nuntakna nei lo a ging thei bek nate nangawn: tamngai ahi zongin, harp ahi zongin, a bite ah khentelna om loin kiteltaka a gin kei leh bang aw in kitum hiam, cih kua in bangci theih ding ahi hiam?
46014008	Tua banah pengkul kiteltakin ging lo-a, a cihnopna a kitheih kei leh galsim dingin kua kithawi ding ahi hiam?
46014009	Note zong tua mah bang na hi uh hi. Na leii uh tawh a kitheithei kammalte na gen loh ngalun, kua in na thugen uh thei ding ahi hiam? Note huih laka thugen na suak lel ding uh hi.
46014010	Leitungah pau nam khempeuh a om takpi hi-a, ahi hangin khiatna nei lo khat beek a om kei hi.
46014011	Tua ahileh mi khatpeuh thugen bang a cihnopna hiam, cih ka theihtel theih kei leh tua thugenpa adingin gamdang mi ka suak a, kei adingin amah gamdang mi a suak hi.
46014012	Note zong tua mah bang na hi uh hi. Note in khalam letsongte neih ding lawp na hih nungsangun pawlpi a khangsak a ginazaw letsongte neih ding na hanciam un.
46014013	Hih thu hangin pautuam khat zanga thugen mi in, a thugen a khiatna a theih nadingin ngen ta hen.
46014014	Ahang in, pautuam khat zanga thu ka nget leh ka kha-in thu ka ngen a, ahi hangin ka lungsim in gah a gah kei hi.
46014015	Tua ahileh bang ka cih ding hiam? Ka kha-in thu ka ngen dinga ka lungsimin zong thu ka ngen ding hi. Ka kha-in la ka sa dinga ka lungsimin zong la ka sa ding hi.
46014016	Na kha-in Pasian na phat leh amaute lakah na thugen, a theitel lo-a kitheitee in na lungdamkohna-a na gen a theih loh nungsang bangci-in “Ámen” ci thei ding ahi hiam?
46014017	Nang pen lungdam a ko takpi na hi kha ding hi. Ahi hangin midangte a phatuamsak tuan kei hi.
46014018	Note khempeuh sangin paute zanga thu ka gen theih zawk manin Pasian tungah ka lungdam hi.
46014019	Ahi hangin midangte lamlak dingin pawlpi sungah pautuam khat zangin kammal tulsawm ka gen sangin a kithei kammal nga ka genzaw ding hi.
46014020	Sanggamte aw, naupang banga na ngaihsutnate uh tawp ta un. Gitlohna lamah naungeekte hi un; ahi hangin lungsim ngaihsutna lamah a khang hamsate na hi un.
46014021	Thukham sungah: “Pau theih loh mite tungtawn le gamdang mite muk tungtawnin hih mite tungah thu ka gen dinga ahi hangin tua ciang nangawnin amaute in ka thu a ngai kei ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi,”f ci-in kigelh hi.
46014022	Tua ahi ciangin paute pen a umte ading hi loin a um lote adingin lim ahi hi. Kamsanga thugenna ahileh a um lote ading hi loin a umte ading ahi hi.
46014023	Tua ahi ciangin pawlpi mite a vekun hong kikhawmin, a vekun paute zangin pau le uh, a theitelg nai lo pawlkhat ahi zongin, a um lo mi pawlkhat ahi zongin hong lut leh note mihai hong sa lo ding uh ahi hiam?
