46014024	Ahi hangin mi khempeuh in kamsangin thu a gen laitakin a um lote ahi zongin, a theitelh nai lote ahi zongin va lut leh amah mimawh ahilam mi khempeuh in phawksakin thu khen ding uh a,
46014025	tua ciangin a lungtang sunga thusimte a kilang ding hi. Tua ciangin kiko-in,” Note lakah Pasian om takpi hi!” ci-in bokin Pasian a bia ding hi.
46014026	Tua ahileh sanggamte aw, bang gen ding i hi hiam? Na kikhop uh ciangin biakna la hiam, lamlahna hiam, kilaakna hiam, pautuam khat hiam, a khiatna genna hiam, khat ciat na nei tek uh hi. Hihte khempeuh pawlpi thahatsak nadinga zat pelmawh ding ahi hi.
46014027	Mi khatpeuh in pautuam khat a zat leh nih ahikeh a tampen thum in genin, khatkhatin kigenkhelin khat peuhmah in kam a phen pelmawh kul ding hi.
46014028	Kamphen ding a om kei leh biakinn sungah thugenpa daitakin om henla amah le Pasian tungah thu gen hen.
46014029	Kamsangte nih ahikeh thum in thu genin adangte in a thugen limtakin khaikak uh hen.
46014030	A tu mite khatpeuh tungah kilaakna a tun leh thugen masa pen khawl hen.
46014031	Ahang in, mi khempeuh lam kilakin a kihanthawn ahi theih nadingin note khempeuh in kikhelin thu na gen thei uh hi.
46014032	Kamsangte’ khate kamsangte ukna nuai-ah a om hi.
46014033	Ahang in, Pasian pen buaina Pasian hi loin lemna Pasian ahi hi. Misiangte kikhopna khempeuh bangin
46014034	pawlpi sungah zong numeite dai dide-in om uh hen. Amaute pau ding a kiphal kei hi; ahi hangin Thukham in a gen bangin amaute ukna nuai-ah om uh hen.
46014035	Amaute in thu khatpeuh a kan nop uh leh a inn ah a pasalte uh dong uh hen. Ahang in, numeite adingin pawlpi sunga thugen zumhuai hi.
46014036	Pasian thu note pana kipankhia ahi hiam? Ahikeh Pasian thu tunna note bek na hi uh hiam?
46014037	Mi khatpeuh, kamsangpa khat ahikeh khalam letsong nei mi khatin a kingaihsut leh note kianga kong gelhte Topa thupiakin sang ta hen.
46014038	Amah in hih thu a thusim keileh amah a kithusima kei ding hi.i
46014039	Tua ahi manin ka sanggamte aw, kamsanga thugen ding na lawp unla, paute a thugen ding zong na kham kei un.
46014040	Ahi hangin na khempeuh a kilawm a kituaka hih ding ahi hi.
46015001	Sanggamte aw, tu-in note in na sansa uh le dinmuna na neihsa uh kong hilh lungdamna-thu kong phawksak kik nuam hi.
46015002	Note kianga kong hilhsa thu kiptaka na let nak uh leh hih lungdamna-thu pansanin hotkhiat na hi ding uh hi. Tua hi kei leh a mawkna-a um na hi uh hi.
46015003	Ahang in, a thupia masa penin ka sansa kong piaksawn ahi: Laisiangtho gen bangin eite mawhna adingin Khrist si a,
46015004	amah kivui-in, Laisiangtho gen bangin a nithum ni-in tho kika,
46015005	Peterb kiangah kilangin tua khit ciangin Sawm-le-nihte kiangah a kilang hi.
46015006	Tua khit ciangin hun kibangin sanggam zanga sanga tamzawte kiangah a kilang hi. Amaute pawlkhat a ihmut khit uh hangin a tamzaw a nungta lai uh hi.
46015007	Tua ciangin James tungah kilang a, tua khit ciangin sawltakpite khempeuh kiang le
46015008	a nunung penin mi suah ngei banga suak lo kei tungah zong hong kilang hi.
46015009	Ahang in, sawltakpite lakah kei a neupen ka hi-a, Pasian pawlpi bawlsia ka hi manin sawltakpi cih ding nangawnin ka kilawm kei hi.
46015010	Ahi hangin Pasian hehpihna hangin ka hi bangbang ka hi-a, kei tungah ama hehpihna a mawkna-in a bei kei hi. A bei kei takpi hi, amaute khempeuh sangin na ka nak sepzaw a, tua nangawn kei sep hi loin kei tawh a omkhawm Pasian hehpihna sep ahi hi.
46015011	Tua ahi ciangin kei ka hi-a, amaute ahi zongin ka hilh uh thu hih thu hi-a, note up zong hih thu mah ahi hi.
46015012	Ahi hangin misi panin Khrist kithosak hi, ci-in kihilh ahileh bangci bangin note pawlkhat in misi thawhkikna om lo hi, ci thei ahi hiam?
46015013	Misi thawhkikna om lo hileh Khrist nangawn kithosak lo hi ding hi.
46015014	Khrist tho kik lo hileh kote thuhilhna kimanna nei lo hi dinga note upna zong kimanna nei lo hi ding hi.
46015015	Tua tham loin Pasian in Khrist misi pan thosak hi, cih thu teci ka pan manun kote Pasian thu ah zuau teci pang hong suaksak ding hi. Ahi hangin misi kithokiksak lo takpi hileh Pasian in amah a thokiksak lo hi ding hi.
46015016	Ahang in, misi kithokiksak lo hileh Khrist zong a kithokiksak nai lo lai hi ding hi.
46015017	Tua hi-a, Khrist kithokiksak lo hileh na upna uh a mawkna hi-a na mawhnate uh sungah a om lai na hi ding uh hi.
46015018	Tua ciangin Jesu sunga a ihmu masate zong a mangthang ahi ding uh hi.
46015019	Tu i nuntak sunga ding bekin Khrist sunga lametna nei i hileh mi khempeuh sangin a hehpih huaizaw i hi ding hi.
46015020	Ahi hangin misi pan Khrist kithokiksak zo takpi-a a ihmusate lak pan gahmasa ahi hi.
46015021	Ahang in, mi khat tungtawnin sihna hong tun mah bangin misi thawhkikna zong mi khat mah tungtawnin hong tung hi.
46015022	Ahang in, Adam sungah mi khempeuh a sih bangin Khrist sungah mi khempeuh a kinungtasak ding hi.
46015023	Ahi hangin mi khempeuh amau hun ciat hi ding uh hi. A gahmasa Khrist ahi hi; tua ciangin ama hong pai ciangin ama mite a tho kik ding uh hi.
46015024	Tua ciangin amah in ukna thuneihna le vangliatna khempeuh a suksiat khit, Pa Pasian tungah kumpi-gam a piakkhiat ciangin beina a tung ding hi.
46015025	Ahang in, amah in a galte khempeuh a khepek nuai-ah a koih mateng a uk ding hi.
46015026	A kisusia ding gal nunung pen sihna ahi hi.
46015027	Ahang in, amah in, “A khepek nuai-ah na khempeuh koih zo hi”c Ama nuai-ah “Na khempeuh” a cih ciangin Khrist nuai-ah na khempeuh a koihpa Pasian a gen khak loh lam kitel hi.
46015028	Amah in hih a sep khit ciangin Pasian pen na khempeuh ah na khempeuh ahi theih nadingin ama nuai-ah na khempeuh a koihnapa Tapa mahmah zong ama nuai-ah a koih ding hi.
46015029	Tua hi-a thawhkikna om lo hileh misi adinga kibaptise-te in bang hih ding uh ahi hiam? Misi kithosak lo hileh bang hanga amaute adingin mite kibaptise uh ahi hiam?
46015030	Kote adingin bang dinga a nai simin ko le ko kilausak ka hi uh hiam?
46015031	Sanggamte aw, nisimin ka si hi – ka cih pen i Topa Khrist Jesu sungah note kong minthanpih bang tektek hi, ka cihnopna ahi hi.
46015032	Mihing ngaihsutnate hang lelin Ephesus a gamsa gilote tawh ka kilai leh bang lawhtak ka hi hiam? Misi kithosak lo ahileh, “Zing cianga si ding i hi manin ne-in dawn lel ni”d
46015033	Mi khemsa-in om kei un: Kikholhpih hoih lo in tatzia hoih siasak hi.”
46015034	Note ahi ding bangin kiphawk kik unla, mawh nawn kei un; Pasian phawk lo pawlkhat om na hi manun na maizum nadingun hih thu kong gen hi.
46015035	Ahi hangin mi pawlkhat in, “Misite bang kici thawhkiksak hiam? Amaute bangci pumpi hong hi ding hiam?” ci-in dong thei kha ding hi.
46015036	Haihuai na zen e! Na tuh pen a sih phot kei leh a hing thei kei hi.
46015037	Na tuh ciangin a kungpi ding pen na suan kei hi; mangbuh ci ahikeh adang khatpeuh na tuh hi.
46015038	Ahi hangin Pasian in ama geelsa bangin kung guana, khaici nam tekah amau kung ciat a guan hi.
46015039	Sa khempeuh a kibang kim kei hi. Mihing in sa nam khat i nei hi. Gamsate in atuam, vasate in atuam, ngasate in atuam a nei hi.
46015040	Van pumpite zong om-a lei pumpite zong a om hi; ahi hangin van pumpite a thupina nam khat hi a, lei pumpite a thupina a namtuam khat ahi hi.
46015041	Ni in thupina nam khat nei a, kha in adang khat nei-in, aksite in zong adang khatmah a nei uh hi. Aksi ciatciat zong a thupina a kibang kei hi.
46015042	Misite thawhkikna zong tua tawh a kibang ding hi. A kituh pumpi a sia thei ahi hi. A sia thei loin a kithokiksak hi;
46015043	a simmawh huai-in kituh a, minthanna in kithokiksak hi. A thanemin kituh a, a vanglianin kithokiksak hi;
46015044	pianpih pumpi-in kituh a, kha pumpi in kithokiksak hi. Pianpih pumpi om ahileh kha pumpi zong a om hi.
46015045	Tua ahi ciangin “Mi masa Adam, a nungta mi suak hi.”e ci-in kigelh hi. A nunung Adam, nuntakna a pia kha ahi hi.
46015046	Ahi hangin khalam a om masa kei a, pianngei om masa-in tua khit ciangin khalam a om pan hi.
46015047	Mi masapen leitang vui tawh kibawl hi a, a nihna mi vantung pan ahi hi.
46015048	Lei mipa bangin lei mite a om uh hi. Vantung pana mipa bangin vantung a te a om uh hi.
46015049	Lei mipa tawh kibatna i neih bangin eitef in vantung pana mipa tawh kibatna i nei ding hi.
46015050	Sanggamte aw, si le sa in Pasian gam a luah thei kei hi, a kisia thei na in a kisia thei lo na a luah thei kei hi, cih note tungah kong pulak hi.
46015051	Ngai un, thuthuk khat kong gen ding hi: Eite khempeuh i ihmu kim kei ding hi.
46015052	Ahi hangin a nunung pengkul a mut ciangin thakhat thu mitphiat khat sungin i vekpi-in i kikhel ding hi. Ahang in, pengkul hong ging dinga, misite a sia thei lo dingin kithosak dinga eite i kikhel ding hi.
46015053	Ahang in, a siatheite in siat theihlohna silhin, a si theite in sihtheihlohna a silh ding hi.
46015054	A sia theite in siat theihlohna silh-a a si theite in sih theihlohna a silh ciangin: “Gualzawhna sungah sihna kivalhtum zo hi.”g
46015055	"Sihna aw, na gualzawhna koi-ah om hiam! Sihna aw, na gu koi-ah om hiam?”h ci-a kigelh thu a tung ding hi.
46015056	Sihna gu in mawhna hi-a mawhna vangliatna in thukham ahi hi.
46015057	Ahi hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen! Amah in eite Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin gualzawhna hong pia hi.
46015058	Tua ahi manin kong it sanggamte aw, kiptakin ding un. Bangmah kilokzosak kei un. Topa sungah na nasepna uh a mawkna ahi loh lam thei na hi uh ciangin Topa nasem dingin nomau mahmah na kipum piak tawntung un.
46016001	Tu-in Pasian mite ading kaihkhopna thu: Galatia pawlpite hih dinga ka gen bangin na hih un.
46016002	Kong pai cianga kaihkhop a kul nawn lo dingin nipi kalkhat a ni masapen simin na sum ngahzah uh tawh kizui-in sehkhia ciat unla, na koih un.
46016003	Kong tun ciangin no hoihsak mite thu ka pulakna lai ka gelh dinga, na letsongte uh tawh Jerusalem ah amaute ka puasak ding hi.
46016004	Kei zong ka va pai ding a kul leh amaute ka tonpih ding hi.
46016005	Macedonia gam tawna pai ding ka hi manin Macedonia ka nawk khit ciangin no kiangah kong pai ding hi.
46016006	Note kiangah tomkha sung bang kong taam thei kha ding hi. Ahi kei leh ka paina peuhpeuha ka khualzinna nong huh theih nadingun phalbi sung nangawn ka taam kha ding hi.
46016007	Tu laitakin ban pak ding bek ka ut kei hi. Topa in hong phal leh no kiangah tawmvei sung kong taam ding ka lamen hi.
46016008	Ahi hangin Pentecost ni dong Ephesus ah ka taam ding hi.
46016009	Bang hang hiam cih leh kei adingin a lawhcin huai nasep theihna kong lianpi khat hong kihon zo hi. Ahi zongin kei hong langpan tampi a om hi.
46016010	Timothy hong pai leh no kiangah a om sung bangmah a kihtak loh nadingin na bilpil un. Ahang in, amah zong keimah banga Topa na a sem den ahi hi.
46016011	Tua ahi ciangin amah san ding kuamah in nial kei hen. Kei kiangah hong ciah kik theih nadingin a khualzinna ah lungmuangtakin na kha un. Amah sanggamte tawh hong tonkhawm dingin ka lamen hi.
46016012	I sanggampa Apolos tawh kisai-in: Sanggamte tawh no kiangah pai dingin nakpitakin ka kun hi. Tu-in hong pai nop het loh hangin hun hoih a neih peuhpeuh ciangin hong pai ding hi.
46016013	Note kikem un, upna-ah kiptakin ding un; pasal hangte hi un, thahat un.
46016014	Na khempeuh itna tawh sem un.
46016015	Stephanas-te innkuan Achaia ah a piangthak masapente hi uh a, amaute mahmah zong misiangte nasepna ah a kipumpiak zo mahmah uh ahilam na thei uh hi.
46016016	Sanggamte aw, hih bang mite le amau naseppihte khempeuh le tua lai-a nasem mite tungah na kiniamkhiat ding uh kong thum hi.
46016017	Stephanas, Fortunatus le Achaicus-te hong tun uh ciangin ka nuam hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note tung pan a kisam laiteng amaute in hong puak uh hi.
46016018	Ahang in, amaute in kei lungsim le no aa zong hong thakhauhsak uh hi. Tua bang mite a phawktak hi.
46016019	Asia gam sunga pawlpite in hong hopih uh hi. Aquila le Priscillaa te in Topa sungah lungsimtak tawh hong hopih uh a, amau inn a kikhawm pawlpi mite in zong hong hopih uh hi.
46016020	Hih lai-a om sanggamte khempeuh in zong hong hopih uh hi. Kinapna siangtho tawh khat le khat na kihopih un.
46016021	Keimah Paul in hih hopihna keima khut tekteka ka gelh ahi hi.
46016022	Mi khatpeuh in Topa a it kei leh hamsiatna thuak ta hen. Topa aw, hong pai ta in!b
46016023	Topa Jesu hehpihna note tawh om ta hen.
46016024	Khrist Jesu sunga om note khempeuh tawh ka itna om ta hen. Amen.c
47001001	Pasian deihna hanga Khrist Jesu sawltakpi Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in, Corinth a Pasian pawlpi tung le Achaia gam sung tenga misiangte khempeuh tungah:
47001002	I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
47001003	Eite Topa Jesu Pasian le Pa, khuatuahna Pa le hehnepna khempeuh Pasian kiphat ta hen.
47001004	Pasian tung pana ka ngah uh hehnepna tawh gim thuakte ka hehnep theih nadingun amah in kote ka gim thuakna khempeuh panun hong hehnem hi.
47001005	Ahang in, kote nuntakna sunga hong luang Khrist thuaknate bang tektekin Khrist tungtawna hong pai kote hehnepna a dimlet hi.
47001006	Kote ka lungdon uh leh note hehnepna le hotkhiat nading ahi hi; kote hong kihehnem leh tua in kote thuak bangbang na thuak zawh nading uh note thuakzawhhatna hong guan hehnepna ahi hi.
47001007	Ko thuakte bang tektek na thuakna uh le kote hehnepna na ngah manun note adinga ka lametna uh a kip hi.
47001008	Sanggamte aw, Asia gama ka thuak uh haksatnate thu theihsak lo-a na om ding uh ka deih kei hi. Nuntakna nangawn khahsuah nading zahin kote thuak zawhzah valin hong kinehcih hi.
47001009	Hitakpi hi, ka lungsimun sihna thu khenna a thuak khinin ka kingaihsun uh hi. Ahi zongin ko le ko kimuang loin misite a thosak Pasian ka muan nadingun hih thu a piang ahi hi.
47001010	Amah in kote tua banga lauhuai sihtheihna panin hong hukhia khin a, hong hukhia lai ding hi. Na thungetna uh tawh nong huhna uh hangin amah in hong hukhia lai ding ci-in amah ka lamen uh hi.
47001011	Tua ciangin mi tampite thungetna dawnga, hehpih angvanna ko tungah hong kipia ahi manin kotea tangin mi tampite in lungdamna a ko kik ding uh hi.
47001012	Kote kisialhna hih ahi hi: Leitunga ka gamtatnate uh le a diakdiakin note tawh i kizopna thu ah kote ngaihsutna zang loin Pasian tung pana sianthona le cihtakpina tawh ka gamtatna uh ka lungsim kitheihna un teci a pang hi. Kote in leitung pilna tawh kizui-in hih loin Pasian hehpihna tawh kizui-in tua bangin ka hih uh hi.
47001013	Ahang in, note in na sim theih loh ding uh le na theihtel loh dingun bangmah kong gelh kei uh hi.
47001014	Tua ciangin note in kote a kim lo-a nong theihsa uh bangin Topa Jesu ni ciangin kote in note kong kisialhpih ding bangun note in zong kote hong kisialhpih thei ding ci-in a cingtaka na theihtel takpi ding uh ka lamen hi.
47001015	Hih mah ka muan manin nihvei na hamphat theih nadingun note kianga hawh masak dingin ka geel hi.
47001016	Macedonia a ka pai kawmin no kiangah hong hawhin, Macedonia pan kong ciah ciangin hong bang leuleu lenga, Judea ka manawh ciangin hong kha le uhcin ci-in ka geel hi.
47001017	Hici-a ka geel ciangin baihtaka geelziau ka hi hiam? Ahikeh lei mite hih bangin, Hihi, hihi,” le “Hikei, hikei,” cih a thuah lel ka hi hiam?
47001018	Ahi hangin Pasian a muanhuai takpi bangin kote in note tunga kong thupuak uh, “Hihi,” le “Hikei,” a hikhawm kei hi.
47001019	Ahang in, note lakah kei le Silasb le Timothy in kong hilh uh Pasian Tapa Jesu Khrist thu ah, “Hihi” le “Hikei,” cih a hikhawm kei hi. Ahi hangin ama sungah, “Hihi,” cih a hiden hi.
47001020	Ahang in, Pasian in bangzah ta in thuciam a bawl khin zongin tuate Khrist sungah,"Hihi," cih ahi khin hi. Tua ahi ciangin ama tungtawnin Pasian minthan nadingin eite in, “Amen,” i ci hi.
47001021	Tu-in Khrist sungah note le kote kiptaka hong ding khawmsakpa Pasian ahi hi.
47001022	Amah in eite sathau hong nilh zo a, ama hong neihna seal eite tungah hong khenin, hong tung ding ciamna-in khamkholhna ama Kha eite lungsungah hong koihsak hi.
47001023	Corinth ah kong kileh kik lohna note kong dopna ahilam ka teci ding Pasian ka ko hi.
47001024	Note upna tunga kiliansak hi loin, note na upna hangun kiptaka ding na hi manun, na lungnop nadingun no tawh a semkhawm ka hizaw hi.
47002001	Tua ciangin note a dahsaka kong hawh nawn loh nadingin ka lungsim ka khensat hi.
47002002	Ahang in, note hong dahsak leng kong dahsak note longal kei hong nuamsak ding kua dang om ahi hiam?
47002003	Kong pai ciangin kei hong lungnuamsak dinga kilawmte in hong lungkhamsak loh nadingin hih bangin lai kong gelh hi. Kei lungnopna hong lungnoppih dingin note khempeuh tungah muanna ka nei hi.
47002004	Ahang in, note kong lungkhamsak nopna hi loin kong itna athukzia kong theihsak nopna-in lungdonna lianpi, lungsung natna le khitui tampi tawh lai hong gelh ka hizaw hi.
47002005	Ka uanggenna hi loin mi khatpeuh in lungkhamna a piansak leh note khempeuh hong lungkhamsakna zahin kei hong lungkhamsak lua kei hi.
47002006	Mi a tamzawte in ama tungah gawtna a piak uh ama adingin kicing khin hi.
47002007	Tu-in ahileh tua sangsikin amah a khengvala dahna in a vukcip loh nadingin maisakin na hehnep zawk ding uh kisam hi.
47002008	Tua ahi manin amah na itna uh kipsak kik dingin note kong kun hi.
47002009	Lai kong gelhna pen note in zia-etna thuak zo-in na khempeuh ah na thumang uh hiam, cih kong zia-etna ahi hi.
47002010	Note in mi khatpeuh na maisak uh leh kei zong amah ka maisak hi. A mawhna ka maisak khitin maisak ding dang a om lai leh note tangin Khrist muhna ah
47002011	Satan in eite hong nopneh loh nadingin amah ka maisak hi. Ahang in, ama hong sawmnate i haih kei hi.
47002012	Troas ah Khrist lungdamna-thu gen dingin ka pai lai-in Topa in kei ading kong khat hong honsak hi, cih thei napi,
47002013	tua lai-ah ka sanggampa Titus mu lo ka hi manin ka lung a nuam kei lailai hi. Tua ciangin amaute mangpha ka khaka, Macedonia ah ka paisuak hi.
47002014	Ahi zongin Khrist hanga gualzawhna ah hong makaih den kote tungtawna ama theihna namtui mun khempeuh ah a kizelsakpa Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen.
47002015	Ahang in, a kihonkhiate le a mangthangte lakah kote, Pasian tungah gimnamtui ka hi uh hi.
47002016	Khat tungah sihna gimnam ka hi uh a, adang khat tungah nuntakna gimnamtui ka hi uh hi. Tua bang nasem dingin kua kicing ahi hiam?
47002017	Mi tampite tawh kibang loin met nadingin Pasian thu ka thangbawl kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin Pasian kiang pana kisawl mite bangin Pasian mai-ah cihtakna tawh Khrist sungah thu ka gen uh hi.
47003001	Kote, ko le ko kiphat kik dinga kipan ka hi uh hiam? Ahikeh mi pawlkhatte bangin note tungah ahikeh note tung panin panpihna laite kisam ka hi uh hiam?
47003002	Note mahmah kote lungtang tunga kigelhsa, mi khempeuh in thei-a a sim uh lai na hi uh hi.
47003003	Note Khrist tung pana lai na hi uh a, kote nasep gah, laitui tawh kigelh hi lo, a nungta Pasian Kha tawh a kigelh, suangpekte tungah hi lo, mihing lungtang pekte tunga kigelh lai na hina uh na lak uh hi.
47003004	Khrist tungtawnin kote in Pasian mai-ah tua zahta kimuanna ka nei uh hi.
47003005	Na khatpeuh ko pana piang hi, ci-a ngaihsun dingin ko mahmah in kicinna ka nei kei uh hi. Kote kicinna Pasian tung pan hizaw hi.
47003006	Amah in kote lai-a gelh hi loin Kha in thukhun thak nasemte bangin hong kicingsak zo hi. Ahang in, lai gelh in that a, ahi hangin Kha in nuntakna a pia hi.
47003007	Tu-in sihna hong tun nasepna, tua suang tunga kigelhkuak laimalte a mual thei minthanna hi napi-in Israel-te in Moses maitang tangtaka a et theihloh zah a, minthanna tawh hong tung ahileh
47003008	Kha nasepna minthang zawtham lo ding ahi hiam?
47003009	Mihingte a mawhpaih nasepna minthang ahileh thumaanna hong tun nasepna nak minthan zaw ngel ve!
47003010	Ahang in, a minthang ngeisa in a minthang zaw tham tawh tehin tu-in minthanna a nei nawn kei hi,
47003011	A mual thei nangawn minthanna tawh hong tung ahileh a om den minthanna bangzahin a lianzaw tham tam!
47003012	Tua ahi manin tua bang lametna ka neih khit nungsangun ka hang mahmah uh hi.
47003013	Kote ka hi uh leh a maitanga a vangtannate a mual hiaihiai lam Israel-te in a muh loh nadinga a maitang puan a khuhpa Moses bang ka hi kei uh hi
47003014	Ahi hangin amaute lungsim kimawlsaka tuni dongin thukhun lui a kisim ciangin tua khuhna puan mah a om lai hi. Khrist tungtawnin kilakhia thei bek ahi manin a kihawkkhiatsak nai kei lai hi.
47003015	Tuni dong nangawnin Moses laite a kisim ciangin khuhna puan in amaute lungtang a khuh lai hi.
47003016	Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh Topa lamah a kihei peupeuh ciangin khuhna puan a kihawkkhia ahi hi.
47003017	Tua Topa pen tua Kha hi-a, Topa Kha a omna ah suahtakna a om hi.
47003018	Maitang kikhuh lo-a Topa minthanna a tang sawnsaka kote pen Kha ahi Topa tung pana hong tung, a lian semsem minthanna tawh amah bang dingin hong kibawlpha den hi.
47004001	Tua ahi manin kote in Pasian lainatna tungtawna hih nasep ka neih khit nungsangun ka lungkia kei uh hi.
47004002	Tua sangin a simtham le a zumhuai-a gamtatnate ka tawpsan uh hi. Khem bawlnate zang loin Pasian thu zong ka lehkaih kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin tua thutak teltakin ka pholak uh a, Pasian mitmuh ah mi khempeuh lungsim tawh kituakin ka om zaw uh hi.
47004003	Tua ciangin ko gen lungdamna-thu a kikhuh leh zong a mangtangte adinga kikhuh hi lel hi.
47004004	Pasian lim a hipa Khrist minthanna lungdamna-thu khuavak a muh theih loh nadingun a um lote lungsim mit hih khanghun pasian in a tawsak hi.
47004005	Ahang in, kote in ko thu ka gen kei uh a, Jesu Khrist Topa a hina le Jesu hanga note nasem ka hina uh ka genzaw uh hi.
47004006	Ahang in, “Khuamial lak panin khuavak tang hen,”a a cipa Pasian in Khrist maitang a om Pasian minthanna, tua theihna khuavak hong piak nadingin kote lungsim sungah khuavak hong tangsak hi.
47004007	Ahi hangin na khempeuh sanga lianzaw, a vangliatna kote tung pan hi lo Pasian tung pan a hina a kilat nadingin hih gou, leibeelte sungah ka nei uh hi.
47004008	Kote ka kimkot panun nakpi-in hong kinehcih hangin netkhapin ka om kei uh hi; amkhamin ka om uh hangin lung mangin ka om kei uh hi;
47004009	bawlsiatin ka om uh hangin taihsatin ka om kei uh hi; hong kisattuk hangin hong kisusia kei hi.
47004010	Kote pum tungah Jesu nuntakna zong a kilaak theih nadingin kote pumpi ah Jesu sihna ka pua kawikawi uh hi.
47004011	Ahang in, a si thei kote pumpi tungah ama nuntakna a kilat theih nadingin a nungta kote, Jesu hanga si dingin piakkhiatsa in ka om tawntung uh hi.
47004012	Tua ahi tak ciangin kote sungah sihna in na sem a, ahi hangin note sungah nuntakna in na a sem hi.
47004013	"Ka um hi; tua ahi manin ka gen zo hi”b ci-in kigelh zo hi. Tua upna kha mah tawh kote in zong ka um uh a, tua ahi manin ka gen uh hi.
47004014	Bang hang hiam cih leh misi pana Topa Jesu a thosakpa in Jesu tawh kote hong thosak khawm dinga, ama omna ah kote tawh note hong tunkhawm ding hi, cih ka thei uh hi.
47004015	Hihte khempeuh note phattuam nading hi-a, mi a tam semsemte kianga tung, tua hehpihna in Pasian minthan nading lungdamkohna a dimlet a piansak theih nading ahi hi.
47004016	Tua ahi manin ka lungkia kei uh hi. Ka pualam uh a kiamkiam hangin ka sunglam uh a ni a ni-in hong kithak suaksak hi.
47004017	Ahang in, a cihtak lo le hun tomno sunga ka thuak uh lungkhamnate in tuate khempeuh a khup tawntung minthanna kote hong ngahsak hi.
47004018	Tua ahi ciangin a kimu theite mitsuan loin a kimu thei lote ka mitsuanzaw uh hi. Ahang in, a kimu theite tomkha kal sung bek om a, a kimu thei lo pen ahileh a om tawntung ahi hi.
47005001	Tu-in eite tenna leibuk a kisiat leh mihing khut tawh kibawl lo, Pasian bawlsa tawntung inn khat vantungah i neih lam i thei hi.
47005002	Tu laitakin vantunga ten nading hong kisilhsak ding lunggulhin i thum i tau hi.
47005003	Bang hang hiam cih leh eite hong kisilhsak ciangin guaktangin i om kei ding hi;
47005004	ahang in, eite hih buk sungah i om laitakin hong kigimsaka i tau hi; tua pen silh loh ding i ut man hi loin i vantung tenna hong kisilhsak ding i ut man le a sithei pen nuntakna in a valh ding i ut man hizaw hi.
47005005	Tua hi-a hih ding mah a eite hong bawl Pasian in hong tung ding khamkholhna-in Kha hong piakhol zo hi.
47005006	Tua ahi manin eite muangtakin i om den a, i pumpi-a i om laitengin Topa kiang tawh i kigamlat lam lah i thei hi.
47005007	Eite muhna tawh nungta loin upna tawh i nungta hi.
47005008	Eite lungmuangtakin i om a, pumpi nusia-in Topa tawh inn a omkhawm ding i utzaw lai hi, ka ci hi.
47005009	Tua hi-a i pumpi inn ah i om a, i om kei zongin amah i lungdamsak ding i tuppi pen ahi hi.
47005010	Ahang in, eite khempeuh Khrist thukhenna tokhom mai-ah i ding pelmawh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in asia ahi zongin apha ahi zongin, pumpi-a a om sunga a hihsate hangin amau ngah dinga kituakte a sang ding uh hi.
47005011	Tua ahi ciangin kote in Topa kihtakzia ding thei ka hi manun mite zol ding ka hahkat uh hi. Kote ka hi bangun Pasian mai-ah a kiteltakin ka kilang uh a, tua pen mah note in zong na lungsim uh tawh na theihtel ding uh ka lamen hi.
47005012	Lung sunga om pen hi lo, a kimu thei pen a kisaktheihpihte na dawn theih nadingun note tungah hong kisial kik ka hi kei uh a, kote nong kisaktheihpih nadingun hun hoih hong bawlsak ka hizaw uh hi.
47005013	Kote ka hai uh leh Pasian hang ahi hi; ka hai kei uh leh note ading ahi hi.
47005014	Ahang in, mi khempeuh adingin mi khat si-a, tua ahi manin mi khempeuh si hi, cih taksang takpi ka hi manun Khrist itna in kote hong sawl teitei hi.
47005015	Tua hi-a ama hangin a nungtate amau adingin nungta nawn loin amau adingin si-a, a tho kiksakpa adingin a nuntak theih nadingun amah mi khempeuh tangin a si hi.
47005016	Tua ahi ciangin tu-a kipan kote in leitung mite muh bangin kuamah ka mu kei uh hi. Khatvei lai-in hih bangin Khrist ka na mu uh a, tu-in ka mu nawn kei uh hi.
47005017	Tua ahi ciangin mi khatpeuh Khrist ah a om leh amah piansak thak ahi hi; alui pen beimanga, athak a tung zo hi!
47005018	Hihte khempeuh Khrist tungtawna kote amah tawh hong kilemkiksaka kilemna nasep hong piapa Pasian tung pan ahi hi:
47005019	Pasian in Khrist tungtawnin leitung amah tawh kilemsaka, mihingte mawhna amaute mawhna-in a simsak kei hi. Tua hi-a, tua kilemkiksakna thupuak kote hong kemsak hi.
47005020	Tua ahi manin kote tungtawnin Pasian in hih ngetna hong bawl bangin kote Khrist palaite ka hi uh hi. Kote in Khrist tangin: Pasian tawh kilemkik un, ci-in kong thum uh hi.
47005021	Eite ama tungtawnin Pasian thumaanna i suah theih nadingin Pasian in mawhna a nei lo amah eite adingin mawhnaa a suaksak hi.
47006001	Pasian tawh na semkhawm ka hi uh bangin Pasian hehpihna kimanna a nei lo-a ngah na suah loh nadingun kong thum uh hi.
47006002	“Kong angvan hunin note kong za a, hotkhiatna ni-in note kong huh hi,”a ci hi. Pasian angvan hun tuhun hi-a, hotkhiatna ni tuni ahi hi, cih kong gen hi.
47006003	Kote nasep a kiminsiatsak loh nadingin kuama lamlai-ah kimuktuk nading ka koih kei uh hi.
47006004	Pasian nasemte ka hi mah bangun lam khempeuh ah ko le ko a phathuai-in ka kilangsakzaw uh a: bawlsiatna thuakna ah; lungmanna ah, haksatna le lungdonna ah;
47006005	satnate ah, koltanna le ngongtatna ah; naham sepna, zana ihmut theihlohna le gilkialna ah;
47006006	siangthona, theihtelna, lungduaina le migitna ah; Khasiangtho le it takpina in;
47006007	thutaka genna le Pasian vangliatna tawh; veilam le taklama thumaanna galhiam tawh;
47006008	minthanna le simmawhna lakah, siatgenna le phatgenna lakah; a taktak hi napi a khema kingawhna bangin,
47006009	kithei napi a kithei lo bangin; sidekdek napi ka nungta uh hi; hong kisatgawp napi hong kithat liang lo a;
47006010	dah napi ka lungnuam tawntung uh a; zawng napi mi tampi ka hausak uh a; bangmah nei lo napi, na khempeuh ka nei uh hi.
47006011	Corinth-te aw, note kiangah siit nei loin thu kong gen uh a, ka lungtang uh zapi kong hon uh hi.
47006012	Kote in note tungah ngaihna ka kidaam het kei uh a, kote tungah note na kidaam zaw uh hi.
47006013	Ko aa bangin a kilawma nong thukna-un note in zong na lungtang uh zapi in hong hon un, ci-in tate tunga thugen bangin kong gen uh hi.
47006014	Thu um lote tawh hakkol na zawng khawm kei un. Ahang in, thumaanna le gitlohna in bang kikop khawm ahi hiam? Ahikeh khuamial le khuavak in bang kipawl khawmna nei thei ahi hiam?
47006015	Khrist le Belialb kikal ah bang kithutuahna om ahi hiam? A umte le a um lote in bang neikhawm ahi hiam?
47006016	Pasian biakinnpi le milimte kikal ah bang kithukimna om ahi hiam? Ahang in, eite a nungta Pasian biakinnpi i hi hi. Pasian in: "Amaute tawh ka teng dinga amaute lakah gamtangin, amaute Pasian ka hi dinga amaute keima mi ahi ding uh hi,”c
47006017	"Tua ahi manin amaute lak panin paikhia unla, a tuamin om un. Topa in ci hi. A siang lo peumah lawng kei le uhcin note kong sang ding hi.”d
47006018	"Keimah note Pa ka hi dinga, note ka tanu ka tapate na hi ding uh hi. Thahatpen Topa in ci hi.”e a cihsa ahi hi.
47007001	Kong it lawmte aw, hih kamciamte i neih khit nungsang, pumpi le kha a buahsakte khempeuh panin ei le ei kisiangthosakin Pasian zahtakna tawh siangthona ah bukimin om ni.
47007002	Note lungtang sungah kote mun hong awn un. Kote kuama tungah ka khial kei uh a, kuamah siasak loin, kuamah ka zawhthawhbawl kei uh hi.
47007003	Note mawhpaih nadinga hih thu hong gen ka hi kei hi. Note tawh sihkhawm ahi zongin nuntak khawm nading zah dongin kote lungsim sungah note na teng uh hi, cih kong genkhol khin zo hi.
47007004	Note kong muang mahmah hi; note kong kisaktheihpih mahmah hi. Keimah nakpi-in kihan thawnin, kote lungmanna khempeuh ah ka lungnopna uh a dimlet hi.
47007005	Ahang in, kote Macedonia a kong lut lai-un hih ka pumpi uh a tawlnga ngei kei hi. Ahi hangin kote kiheina peuhpeuh ah pualam ah kidona, sunglam ah launate ka tuak den uh hi.
47007006	Ahi hangin a kinengniamte a hehnempa Pasian in, Titus hong tunna tawh hong hehnemin,
47007007	ama hong tunna hang bek hi loin note in amah na hehnemna hang uh zong ahi hi. Amah in kote kiangah kei nong lunggulh uh, na dahluatna uh, kei nong lunghi mawh luatna uh thute hong gena ka lungnopna a lianzaw sem hi.
47007008	Lai kong khak hanga note hong dahsak ka hileh zong ka kisik kei hi. Ka kisik ta zongin kong laikhak in na lungsim uh a natsak lam ka thei a, ahi hangin tomcik sung bek ahi hi.
47007009	Note kong dahsak hang hi loin, na dahna un note hong kisiksakna hangin tu-in ka lung a dam hi. Ahang in, Pasian geel banga dah na hi uh hi; banglam banglam ah kote hong natsak hi lo hi.
47007010	Pasian lama dahna in hotkhiatna a tun kisikna piangsak a, a kisuanlah huai kei hi. Ahi hangin leitung dahna in sihna a tun hi.
47007011	En dih un hih Pasian lama dahna in note sungah bang cihtakna, no le no kihahsiang nop nading bang lawpna, bang ngaihdahna, bang patauhna, bang lunggulhna, bang lunghi mawhna, amaana thukhen ding a tunsak lam mu un. Hih thu tawh kisai-in bangmah peuhah na mawhpen' lam uh na kiciansak zo uh hi.
47007012	Tua hi-a note kiangah ken kong gelh ta zongin a khiala gamtapa hang hi lo a, a thuakte pawl hang zong ahi tuan kei hi, ahi hangin kote tungah note na kipiak zawhna uh nomau le nomau in Pasian mai-ah na muh theih nading uh hizaw hi.
47007013	Hihte khempeuh hangin kote hong kihanthawn hi. Kote hong kihanthawn banah note khempeuh hanga Titus in lungsim thathak a ngah mana a lungdam luatna ka muh uh ciangin ka nuam diak uh hi.
47007014	Ama tungah note kong kisaktheihpih a, tua thu ah nong zahlaksak kei uh hi. Ahi hangin note tunga kong gente khempeuh uh a maan ahi bangin Titus tunga note kong kisaktheihpihna uh zong a maanna hong lak hi.
47007015	Note khempeuh in a thu mangin lau le ling kawmin amah na san uh, a ngaihsut kik ciangin amah in note hong itna a lian semsem hi.
47007016	Note tungah muanna a kim kong neih theih manin ka nuam hi.
47008001	Sanggamte aw, tu-in Macedonia pawlpite tunga Pasian piak hehpih na thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
47008002	Amaute nakpi-a zia-et bawlsiatna lak pan, a lungnopna uh a dimletna le a zawn luat mahmahna panun nakpi-a citna nak nei-in a phulto hi.
47008003	Ahang in, amaute in a piak theih zahzah uh le a piak theihzah val nangawn uh a piak lam uh ka theihpih hi. Amau utthu-in,
47008004	misiangte ading nasepsakna amau zong hamphatna a tanh theih pah nadingun kote kiangah hong ngen uh hi.
47008005	Ko lamet bangin hih loin Topa tungah amau mahmah kipia masa-in tua khit ciangin Topa deihna tawh kituakin ko tungah hong kipia uh hi.
47008006	Tua ahi ciangin Titus in a masa lai-a a na patkhitsa ahi manin hih note hehphna nasep hong zawhpih vet dingin amah ka na kun uh hi.
47008007	Ahi hangin note upna, thugenna, theihna, cihtakna khempeuh le kotea nong itna uhah midangte sangin na tungnun zawk uh bangin hih piakna tawh kisai hehpihna ah zong na tungnung zaw un.
47008008	Note thu kong pia kei hi. Ahi hangin midangte cihtakna tawh tehin note itna a taktak ahina kong theih nop man ahi hi.
47008009	Ahang in, i Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna na thei uh hi; ama zawnna tungtawna na hauh theih nadingun amah a hau hi napi note hangin a zawng hi.
47008010	Hih thu tawh kisai-in note ading a hoih pen kong thuhilhna in: Nikum in note a pia masa bek hi loin tua banga piak ding a ut masa na hi uh hi.
47008011	Hih dinga utna tawh lawptaka sep na sawm bangun na neih bangbang uh tawh kituak pia-in hih nasep na zosiang un.
47008012	Ahang in, utna a om nak leh a neih loh tawh kizui hi loin a neih tawh kizui-a a piak letsong a santak ahi hi.
47008013	Midangte vanzansak nadingin note vangik suat hong sawm ka hi kei uh a, a kikim ciat nading a deih ka hizaw uh hi.
47008014	Amaute hauhna in note tangsapna hong huk kik theih nadingin tu laitaka note hauhna in amaute sapna a hu ding hi.
47008015	"Tampi a khawmpa in tam lua nei lo a, tawmkha a khawmpa inlah tawm lua a nei kei hi”b ci-a kigelhsa bangin tua ciangin kikim dimdiamna a om ding hi.
47008016	Keimah in note kong lunghimawh bang lunghimawhna Titus lungsim sunga a guanpa Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
47008017	Ahang in, Titus in ka ngetna uh hong thukimpih bek hi loin ama lungsim tup tawmna bangin note kiangah lawptakin hong pai ding ahi hi.
47008018	Tuateh lungdamna-thu nasepna ah pawlpi mi khempeuh in a pahtak uh sanggampa amah kong zuisak uh hi.
47008019	Tua banah amah pen sumpi puaka ka pai lai-un kote hong zui dinga pawlpite in a teelpa uh ahi hi. Topa mahmah pahtawi nading le huh nuam ka hina uh lahna-in tua sum piak ka hawm uh hi.
47008020	Citna tawh a kipia hih letsongte ka zek uh ciangin gensiatna ka pelh nuam uh hi.
47008021	Ahang in, Topa muh bek hi lo mihingte muh mahmah in zong amaan na sem dingin ka hih theih tawpun ka kidawm uh hi.
47008022	Tua banah ka sanggampa un lam tampi ah ama lawpna hong latsak tham loin note hong muanna lianpi hangin amau tawh kong sawl uh hi.
47008023	Titus ahileh note laka ka naseppih le ka kikoppih hi-a, ka sang gam dangte uh ahileh pawlpi palaite le Khrist pahtawina ahi uh hi.
47008024	Tua ahi manin note in kong itna uh le kong kisaktheihpihna uh ahang pawlpi in a muhtel theih nadingun hih mite tungah na lak un.
47009001	Misiangte tunga hih nasepna thu no tungah lai-a gelh ding kisam ka sa kei hi.
47009002	Ahang in, midangte huh nading na lawpna uh ka thei zo a, nikum nungsang no Achaia gama omte a pia dingin a kithawisa-a om cih thu Macedonia gama omte tungah ka kisialhpih densa ahi hi. Tua ciangin note thalawpna in amaute a tamzaw nasep thanuamsak hi.
47009003	Ahi hangin, note kong kisaktheihpihna uh a hawmsuak loh nadingin amaute a kithawisa uh ahi hi, ka cih bangin a kithawisa na hih theih nadingun sang gamte kong sawl hi.
47009004	Ahang in, Macedonia-te khatpeuh in kei hong zuih a, note a kithawisa-in hong muh kei leh note kong muan gen mahmahsa ahi manin note gen loh kote zong ka maizum ding uh hi.
47009005	Tua ahi ciangin citpiak dinga na ciamsate uh pia dingin kithawikholsa-a na om theih nadingun hong ma hawh dingin sanggamte kut ding kisamin ka um hi. Tua hileh itsa pipi-a piak hi loin phaltaka kipiasa citpiak ahina hong kilang ding hi.
47009006	Hih thu ciamteh un: A cil vawh peuhmah in tawmcik at dinga, phaltaka a vawh ziahziah peuhmah in tampi a at ding hi.
47009007	Mi khempeuh in piak dinga a lungsima a khensatsa bangin pia uh hen; lungsit pipi ahikeh piak loh phamawh cihna-in pia kei uh hen, ahang in, Pasian in lungtaitaka piate a it hi.
47009008	Na kisap khempeuh uh Pasian in nei-a, hun khempeuh ah na khempeuh na hauh theih nadingun nasep hoih tawh note tungah hehpihna khempeuh kicingsak thei hi.
47009009	"Amah in a zawngte tungah ama letsongte mun khempeuh ah a hawmthang zo hi; ama thumaanna a tawntungin kipden hi.”a ci-in kigelh zo hi.
47009010	Khaici vawhpa tungah khaici pia a, a an ding anlum a piapa in, na sal ah antang khangsakin note thumaanna gah na khopte uh zong a tamsak semsem ding hi.
47009011	Note hun khempeuh ah na cit theih nadingun hauhna namcinin hong kihausak dinga, tua ciangin kote tung tawnin na citna uh Pasian tungah lungdamkohna suak ding hi.
47009012	Hih na nasepna uh Topa mite huhna bek hi loin Pasian tungah lungdam thu genna tampi a dimletna lahna hi lailai hi.
47009013	Na kilatkhiatna uh ahi tua nasepna hangin, Khrist lungdamna-thu na pulakna uh a zui thuman’na le amaute le mi khempeuh tawh na tanh khop uh na citna uh hangin mite in Pasian a phat ding uh hi.
47009014	Pasian in a hehpihna a dimletin note hong piakna hangin amaute in note hong lunggulhin thu hong ngetsak ding uh hi.
47009015	A kigen khin zo lo ama letsong hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen.
47010001	Note tawh i kimaituah cianga “zahkai” a, i kigamlat cianga “hang san” pa keimah Paul in Khrist lungnemna le migitna pansanin kong ngen hi!
47010002	Hih leitung mite gamtat bangin gamta-a hong ngaihsun mi pawlkhat tungah, kong pai ciangin hangtaka cih ka sawm bangin cih a kul loh nadingin kong thum hi.
47010003	Ahang in, leitunga teng ka hi uh hangin leitung mi bangin gal ka do kei uh hi.
47010004	Kote galdona galvante leitung galvante ahi kei hi. Tuate tawh kilehbukhin, akip mahmah kulhte phel nading Pasian vangliatna a neizaw hi. Kitotnate le
47010005	Pasian theihna langdo-in, kipilsaknate khempeuh ka phelkhia uh a, Khrist thu a mang dingin ngaihsutna khempeuh salin ka kai uh hi.
47010006	Note thuman’na khatvei-a a kicin siang nak leh thuman’lohna nasep peuhmah gawtna pia dingin kigingsa in ka om ding uh hi.
47010007	Note in nate a pualama kilangkhia bekin na en uh hi.a Mi khatpeuh in: Khrist aa ka hi hi, ci-a a kimuan leh amah tawh kibang zahin kote zong Khrist aa ka hilam uh ngaihsun kik hen.
47010008	Ahang in, note hong phelgawp ding hi lo, hong laamto dinga Topa hong piak thuneihna kidaam lo-a a suang ka hileh zong ka zumpih kei ding hi.
47010009	Ka laikhakte tawh note hong linthawn ka bat ding ka ut kei hi.
47010010	Ahang in, mi pawlkhat in, “A laikhakte gikin khauh naven, amah taktakin mi lungsim kuai zo kei, a thugen zong bangmahpi hi kei,” hong ci uh hi.
47010011	Tua bang mite in no kiangah om lo-a, ka laikhakte uh sunga ka gelh bangbangun note kianga ka om ciangin zong ka hih ding uh ahilam phawk uh hen.
47010012	Amau le amau a kiphat mi pawlkhatte laka kihel ahikeh a kitehkak ngam ka hi kei uh hi. Amau le amau mah kitehin, amau le amau mah a kitehkak uh ciangin amau a pil ahi kei uh hi.
47010013	Kote ka hi uh leh a kilawm zah valin ka kisial kei uh a, bangbang ahi zongin Pasian in kote adinga hong sehsaksa zah note nangawn hong huamkha ciangah ka kisial ding uh hi.
47010014	Note kiang hong tung khin lo bangin aval akanin ka kisial kei ding uh hi. Ahang in, Khrist lungdamna-thu tawh no ciangciang kong ban khin ta uh hi.
47010015	Ko adinga kisehsa valin midangte nasepsa a kisialhpih zong ka hisam kei uh hi.b Kote lametna ahileh na upna uh a khantohna bangbangin note laka ka nasepna uh nakpi-a a zai semsem nading ahi hi.
47010016	Tua banga note khena gamte ah zong lungdamna-thu ka gen theih nading uh ahi hi. Ahang in, midangte gamhuam sunga na kisemsa ka kisialhpih nuam kei uh hi.
47010017	Ahi hangin, “A kisial mi, Pasian sungah kisial ta hen,”c
47010018	Ahang in, amah le amah a kiphatte kuamah in sang lo-a Topa in a phat mi kisang hi.
47011001	Note in ka haina tawmkha beek nong thuak zawh ding uh ka lamen hi; ahi hangin nong thuak zo khin uh hi.
47011002	Keimah in Pasian aamna-in note kong aam hi. Pasal khat tua Khrist tungah note nungak bit banga piak dingin kong kamciam zo hi.
47011003	Ahi hangin gulpi zuau siamna tawh Eve a khem zawh bangin Khrist tunga atak le a siangtho-a na kipiakna pan un na lungsim uh na pialsak khak ding uh ka lau hi.
47011004	Ahang in, no kiangah mi khatpeuh hong pai-in ko gen Jesu lo, Jesu dang khat thu hong genin, na ngahsa uh kha lo kha dang khat na ngah uh a, na sansa uh lungdamna-thu lo a kilamdang khat na san uh leh na nang zo kei baih lua uh hi.
47011005	Ahi hangin tua “sawltakpipente” sangin neukha zong a niamzaw in ka kingaihsun kei hi.
47011006	Thugen kisinna, a siam mi ka hi kholloh hangin theihna ka nei hi. Note tungah hih bang ka hina lam khempeuh ah kitel sinsenin ka langsak zo uh hi.
47011007	Note tungah man ngen loin Pasian lungdamna-thu ka genna tung tawnin a sangzaw munah note kong tut theih nadingin ka kiniamkhiatna kei adingin mawhna ahi hiam?
47011008	Note na ka sep nadingin pawlpi dangte pan huhna ngahin amaute aa ka sut hi.
47011009	Note kiangah ka om lai-in kisapna khatpeuh ka neih ciangin kuama vangik ka suak kei hi. Ahang in, Macedonia pana hong pai sanggamte in ka sapna teng hong pia uh hi. Note vangik ka suah loh nadingin lam khempeuh ah ka kikem a, tua bangin ka kikem lai ding hi.
47011010	Keima sungah Khrist thutak a om takpi bangin Achaia kuala omte khempeuh in hih ka kisialhna a beisak kei ding uh hi.
47011011	Bang hangin? Ken note kong it loh hang ahi hiam? Kong it lam Pasian in a thei hi!
47011012	A kisialhpih uh nate tawh kisai-a kote tawh kikima, a kingaihsut theih nading uh hun hoih a deih mite panmun ka bulkalh theih nadingun ka hih pen ka hih lailai ding hi.
47011013	Ahang in, tua bang mite sawltakpi zuau hi-a, zuauphuak nasemte, Khrist sawltakpi banga kineih tawmte ahi uh hi.
47011014	A lamdang hi lo hi. Satan zong amah le amah khuavak vansawltak khatin a kineih tawm hi.
47011015	Tua ahi ciangin ama nasemte thumaanna na sema, a kineihtawm uh leh lamdang sak ding ahi kei hi. Amaute beina in amau gamtatna tawh kituak ahi ding hi.
47011016	Kong gen kik inah: Kua mah in kei ahai-in hong ngaihsun kei hen. Ahi hangin nong ngaihsut uh leh tawm beek ka kisialhpih nadingin a haite na san bangun hong sang un.
47011017	Kei mahmah kimuanga ka kisialhna hih thu ah, Topa gen ding banga gen hi loin ahai banga gen ka hizaw hi.
47011018	Mi tampite leitung kisialh-a a kisialh nungsang kei zong ka kisial sam ding hi.
47011019	Pil lua na hi manun lungdam takin mihaite na thuak zo uh hi.
47011020	A taktakin note sal-a hong kai mi, note metna-a hong nei mi, hong zawh thawhbawl mi, amah le amah a kisangkoih mi, hong pangbet mite nangawn na thuak zo uh hi.
47011021	Tua bang dingin kote ka gina kei lua uh hi, cih maizumpipi-in kong gen hi. Mihai banga thu ka geninah: Mi khatpeuh in a kisialhpih ngam pen kei zong ka kisialhpih ngam hi.
47011022	Amaute Hebrew mi ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Israel mi ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Abraham suante ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi.
47011023	Amaute Khrist nasem ahi uh hiam? (Mihai banga hih bang thu a gen ka hi hi) Kei ka hi zawsem hi. Na ka nak sepzaw hi; thong ah ka kia munzaw hi. A nasia zaw-in hong kisat hi. Sih theihna ah hong kitun pahpah hi.
47011024	Jew-te satna sawmli ah khatvei kiam, ngaveitak ka thuak hi.
47011025	Ciangpum in thumvei hong kisat hi. Suang in khatvei hong kideng hi. Tembaw kisiatna thumvei ka tuak hi. Sun khat le zan khat tuipi laizangah ka om ngei-a,
47011026	tawlnga loin mai ka nawt hi. Gunte ah lauhuaina, misuamte lauhuaina, keima gam mite kihtakhuaina, Gentile-te kihtakhuaina, khuapi sungah lauhuaina, gamlaka lauhuaina, tuipi tunga lauhuaina le sanggam-zuaute kihtak-huainate ka tuak zo hi.
47011027	Nakpitakin na semin ka gima, ihmu man lo liangin ka om thithe hi. Gilkial dangtakna ka thuak a, an ngawla ka om hun a tam hi. Ka guaktangin khuadam ka thuak hi.
47011028	Nadang khempeuh banah pawlpite khempeuh lunghimawhin nisimin ka lunggimpih lai hi.
47011029	Ken ka thanempih loh a thanem kua ahi hiam? Ka sunga ka thuakpih loh mawhna sunga om kua ahi hiam?
47011030	Kisial lo thei lo hileng ka ginatlohna hong lak nate ka sial ding hi.
47011031	A tawntunga kiphat ding Topa Jesu Pasian le Pa in ka zuau loh lam a thei hi.
47011032	Damascus a Kumpi Aretas khut nuai-a om ukpipa in kei hong matsak nadingin Damascus khuapi a cingsak hi.
47011033	Ahi hangin kulh tawhlet panin bawmin hong kikhaisuk a, amau khut panin ka suakta hi.
47012001	Ka kisial lailai ding hi. Met nading bangmah a om kei zongin Topa tung pana mangmuhnate le kilaaknate ka gen lai ding hi;
47012002	a kilato Khrist sunga mi khat ka thei hi. A beisa kum sawm le li lai-in van thumna-a kila to, a pumpi-in maw, a pumpi loin maw, cih ka thei kei a, Pasian in a thei hi.
47012003	Hih mipa ka thei-a a pumpi-in hiam, a pumpi tawh kikhen hiam, ka thei kei hi; ahi hangin Pasian in thei-a,
47012004	paradise ah kilato hi. Amah in genkhiat theih loh nate, mihing gen dinga kiphal lo nate a za hi.
47012005	Tua bang mipa ka kisialhpih dinga ahi hangin kei tungtang ah ka thanemnate longal ka kisialhpih kei ding hi.
47012006	Thutak gen ding ka hi manin kisial nuam leng zong mihai ka hi kei ding hi. Ahi hangin ka thugen le ka nasepna in a kilatsak zah vala kuamah in hong ngaihsut loh nadingin ka kidawm hi.
47012007	Hih a lian pha mahmah kilaaknate hanga ka ki-uatsak luat loh nadingin kei hong gimsak ding, ka ci-le-sa sungah ling khat – Satan thupuapa khat kei hong kipia hi.
47012008	Kei tung panin tua hong kilakkhiatsak nadingin Topa tungah thumvei ka ngen zo hi.
47012009	Ahi hangin amah in, “Ka hehpihna nang adingin kicing hi; ahang in, thanemna sungah ka vangliatna kicing hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ahi manin Khrist vangliatna kei tungah a om theih nadingin lungdam semsemin ka thanemna ka kisialhpih ding hi.
47012010	Tua hi a, thanemnate, simmawhnate, thuaksiatnate, bawl-siatnate, haksatnate sunga ka lung-nopna Khrist hang ahi hi. Ahang in, ka thanem ciangin ka tha a khauh hi.
47012011	Keimah le keimah mihai kong kisuah a, ahi hangin note in tua banga nong bawl uh ahi hi. Note in kei nong phat ding uh ahi hi. Ahang in, bangmah ka hi lo hangin “sawltakpi-pente” sangin neucik zong ka niamzaw peuhmah kei hi.
47012012	Sawltakpi khat kiciamtehna limte alamdangte le nalamdangte note lakah lungduaitakin kibawl zo hi.
47012013	Note adingin vangik ka suah lohna lobuang pawlpi dangte sanga na niam zawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Hih ka tatkhialhna hong maisak un.
47012014	Tu-in a thumveina note kiangah hong hawh dingin ka kithawi zo hi. Na neihsate uh deih ka hi kei hi, kei deih note hizaw na hi manun note adingin vangik ka suak kei ding hi. A taktakin, tate in nu le pate ading a khol ding uh hi loin nu le pate in tate ading a khol ding uh hizaw hi.
47012015	Tua ahi ciangin note adingin ka neihsa khempeuh lungdamtakin pia-in kei mahmah nangawn ka kizang nuam hi. Ken note kong it semsem leh note in kei hong it lo semsem ding na hi uh hiam?
47012016	Tua pen ahi hi, himai ta hen, note adingin vangik ka suak kei hi. Tua hi napi khemsiamin note khembawlin note hong man ka hi ve maw!
47012017	No kianga kong sawlte khatpeuh zangin a met lakna-in hong zang ka hi hiam?
47012018	No kianga pai dingin Titus ka kun-a, i sanggampa kong zuisak hi. Titus in note a met lakna-in hong nei lo hi, hong nei ahi hiam? Ka lungsim uh kibangin lam khat zuikhawm lo ka hi uh hiam?
47012019	Note tungah kote a kihu nilohin hong ngaihsun lai na hi uh hiam? Khrist sunga omte bangin Pasian mitmuh a thu gengen ka hi uh hi. Tua hi-a kong it lawmte aw, ka hih khempeuh uh note thakhauhsak nading ahi hi.
47012020	Ahang in, kong pai cianga note na hi ding uh kong deih banga kong muh loh khak ding le note in kei ka hi dinga nong deih bangua nong muh loh khak ding uh ka lau hi. Kitotna, kihazatna, heh-a kiselnate, kipawlkhennate, kidaisakna, kigensiatna, ki-uatsakna le buaina a om khak ding zong ka lau hi.
47012021	Note kiangah kong pai kik ciangin ka Pasian un note mai-ah hong niamkhiatin nidanga na khialhnasa uh: kihuai-gamtatna, numei-pasal mawhna, huk luatna lanluatnate hangin mawh napi a kisik lo mi tampite hangin ka dah khak ding ka lau hi.
47013001	Hih in note kianga kong hawh a thumveina ding ahi hi. “Thu khempeuh teci nih ahikeh thum theihpihna tawh kipsak ding ahi hi”a
47013002	Note kianga a nihveina kong hawh lai-in vauhilhna kong pia khin zo hi. Ka om loh kala mah, tu-in kong gen kikinah: Kong kileh kik ciangin a beisa huna a mawhte ahikeh adangte kuamah ka dawm kei ding hi.
47013003	Tua in, Khrist in kei tungtawnin thu gen ahi hiam, cih a kitelna na kalh sese hang uh ahi hi. Note hong thazawh dingin amah thanem lo a, note lakah vanglian hi.
47013004	Ahang in, a taktakin ama thenemna ah kikilhlum napi Pasian vangliatna hangin a nungta hi. Tua mah tawh kibangin ama sungah kote thanem napi note nasem dingin Pasian vangliatna hangin amah tawh ka nungta ding uh hi.
47013005	Upna sungah na om uh hiam, no le no kisittel ciat un; no le no kizia-et un. Na kizia-et uh ciangin cing zo lo na hi kei buang uh leh Khrist no sungah a ten lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
47013006	Kote tua zia-etna ah cing zo ka hilam uh hong thei dingin kong muang hi.
47013007	Khialhna bangmah na bawl loh nadingun, tu-in Pasian tungah thu ka ngen uh hi. Zia-etna ah kote cing ka hina uh mite theih ding deihna hi loin, zia-etna ah cing zo lo banga ka kilat uh hangin note amaan-a na gamtat ding uh deihna hizaw hi.
47013008	Ahang in, kote in thutak langdoin bangmah ka hih thei kei uh hi; thumaan lam bekah ka pang uh hi.
47013009	Kote ka thanem laitakun note na thakhauh manun ka nuam uh hi; na kicinkim nadingun thu ka ngen uh hi.
47013010	Kong pai cianga phelkhiat nading hi lo, note lamtoh nadinga Topa hong piak thuneihna ka khauh zat luat loh nadingin ka om loh kala hih bang teng hong gelh ka hi hi.
47013011	A nunung penin sanggamte aw, mangpha na man un. Kicinkimna na tum unla, kong ngetna na ngai un. Lungsim kikhatin na kilem un. Itna le lemna Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.
47013012	Kinapna siangtho tawh khat le khat na kihopih un.
47013013	Misiangte khempeuh in hong hopih uh hi.
48001001	Mihing pan hi lo, mite sawl zong hi lo, ahi hangin Jesu Khrist le misi pana amah a thosak Pa Pasian sawltakpi Paul le
48001002	kei tawh a omkhawm sang gamte khempeuh in, Galatia a om pawlpite tungah:
48001003	I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
48001004	I Pasian le Pa deihna bangin tu a gilo khanghun pana eite hong hu dingin i mawh nate adingin amah le amah hong kipia Pa
48001005	Pasian tungah a tawntung in minthanna om den ta hen. Amen. Lungdamna-thu Adang Om Lo
48001006	Khrist hehpihna hanga note hong sampa tawh hizahta a manlangin ki khena, lungdamna-thu adang na sanpah uh lamdang ka sa hi;
48001007	tua na san uh lah lungdamna-thu a hi peuhmah kei hi. Mi pawlkhatte in Jesu Khrist lungdamna-thu lehkaihin note hong lungbuaisak nuam uh ahi hi.
48001008	Ahi hangin kote ka hi uh zongin vantung pana vansawltak khat ahi zongin note kianga kong gen uh ahi lo, lungdamna-thu dang hong hilh a om leh tawntung mawhpaih hi ta hen!
48001009	Kote in kong gensa bangun tu-in kong gen kikinah: Mi khatpeuh in na sansa uh lungdamna-thu lo adang hong hilh leh a tawntungin kimawhpaih ta hen!
48001010	Tu-in mihingte maipha ahikeh Pasian maipha a zong ka hi hiam? Ahikeh mihingte lungdamsak a sawm ka hi hiam? Mihingte lungdamsak a sawm lailai ka hileh Khrist nasem ka hi kei ding hi. Pasian in Paul Sam
48001011	Sanggamte aw, ka hilh lungdamna-thu, mihing bawltawm ahi loh lam na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
48001012	Mi khatpeuh tung pana ka ngah hi lo a, hong hilhsak zong ahi kei hi; Jesu Khrist tung pan kilaakna-a ka ngah ahi hi.
48001013	Ahang in, nidang lai-in Jew biakna ngeina sunga ka nuntak zia, Pasian pawlpi nakpi-a ka bawlsiat zia le suksiat gawp ka sawmzia na za zo uh hi.
48001014	Ka khangual Jew mi tampi sung panin ka madawk a, ka pate ngeina gumin nakpi-in ka hahkat hi.
48001015	Ahi hangin ka pian tunga kei hong sehtuampa le a hehpihna hanga kei hong sampa Pasian in,
48001016	Gentile-te laka ka gen theih nadingin lungkimtaka a Tapa kei sunga hong kilaaksak lai-in mi khatpeuh ka dong kei hi.
48001017	Kei ma-a sawltakpi ahi masate tawh kimu dingin Jerusalem ah zong ka paito kei a, ahi hangin Arabia ah paipah in tua khit ciangin Damascus ah ka ciah kik hi.
48001018	Tua zawh kum thum khit ciangin Peter tawh kimeltheih dingin Jerusalem ah paito-in ama kiangah ni sawm-le-nga ka taam hi.
48001019	Topa sanggampa James bek longal sawltakpi dang kuamah ka mu kei hi.
48001020	Note tunga kong gelh thu, zuau ahi loh lam Pasian mai-ah kong theitelsak hi.
48001021	Tua khit ciangin Syria le Cilicia ah ka pai hi.
48001022	Khrist sunga om Judea gam pawlpite kuamah in kei hong meltheih kei uh hi.
48001023	Amaute in: “Tunung lai-a eite hong bawlsia pa in, khatvei lai-a a suksiat a sawm tua upna thu tu-in a hilh ta hi,” ci-a kigen bek a za uh hi.
48001024	Keima hangin amaute in Pasian a phat uh hi.
48002001	Tua nung kum sawm-le-li ciangin Jerusalem ah ka paito kik hi; tua tungin Barnabas tawh ka hi hi. Titus zong ka tonpih hi.
48002002	Kilaakna thu manga pai ka hi-a, Gentile-te laka ka gen lungdamna-thu mah amaute mai-ah ka lui hi. Ahi hangin ka kitaitehna uh ahi zongin ka tainasa ah ahi zongin, a mawkna a suah ding ka lau manin makai hileh a kilawmte kiangah ka hilh sim hi.
48002003	Tua hi napi ka tonpih Titus nangawn Greek mi ahi hangin vunat dingin a kisawl teitei kei hi.
48002004	Khrist Jesu sunga i suahtakna hong ensimin sila hong suaksak dingin eite lakah sanggam zuau pawlkhat hong lutsim ahi manin hih thu hong piang ahi hi.
48002005	Note sungah lungdamna-thu, thutak a om theih nadingin tawmvei sung zong amaute thu ka mang kei uh hi.
48002006	Bangzahta in mi thupi hi le uh kilawm ta leh kei adingin amaute kilamdanna a om tuan kei hi. Pasian in a pualam kilatna in thu a khen kei hi—tua mite in ka thupuak bangmah a behlap kei uh hi.
48002007	Tua tawh kilehbulh in, Jew-te tungah lungdamna-thu hilh dingin Peter a kipiak bang tektek in, kei zong Gentile-te tungah a hilh dingin hong kipia hi, cih a mu uh hi.
48002008	Ahang in, Jew-te tunga sawltakpi Peter nasepna-a a sempa Pasian mah in Gentile-te tunga sawltakpi keima nasepna ah zong na a sem hi. Khuampite dinga a minthang
48002009	James, Peter le John-te in kei tungah hehpihna hong kipia cih a theih uh ciangin kei le Barnabas kilawmtakna khut taklam hong khak uh hi. Amaute in kote Gentile-te tungah pai-a, amaute Jew-te tungah a pai dung uh a thukim uh hi.
48002010	Amaute khempeuh in mizawngte phawk gige ding hong deih uh, kei zong ka lawp penpen mah ahi hi. Paul in Peter Sel
48002011	Antioch ah Peter hong pai ciangin amah khial khin ta ahi manin a mai-tangah amah ka sel hi.
48002012	James kiang pan kuate hiam a pai ma-in, amah in Gentile-te tawh an a ne khawmkhawm hi. Ahi hangin amaute hong tun uh ciangin vunatte pawl-a pangte a kihtak manun Gentile-te panin kikang koihin amah le amah a kituam koih hi.
48002013	Jew dangte in zong ama kineihsiamna zui uh a, tua ama kineihsiamna in Barnabas nangawn a pialmangsak hi.
48002014	Lungdamna-thu amaan bangin amaute in sem lo uh cih ka muh ciangin amaute khempeuh mai-ah Peter kiangah, “Nang Jew mi hi napi, Jew mi bang loin Gentile mi bangin na nungta hi. Tua hi napi Jew ngeina zui dinga Gentile-te na kalh teitei bangci bang hiam?
48002015	"Mawh nei Gentile-te bang hi lo pianpih a Jew mi ahi eite in
48002016	thukham zuihzawhna hang hi lo, Jesu Khrist upna hangin mi in diktansakna ngah hi cih i thei hi. Tua ahi ciangin eite in zong thukham zuihna hang hi lo, Khrist upna hangin dik tansak-a i om theih nadingin Khrist Jesu sungah i upna i nga hi; bang hang hiam cih leh thukham zuihna hangin kuamah dik a kitangsak kei ding hi.
48002017	"Eite in Khrist sungah dik kitansak ding i zon laitakin eite mahmah mawh neite i hina hong kilang ahi ciangin Khrist in mawhna khangsak cihna ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo hi:
48002018	Ka suksiat gawpsa ka lam kik leh thukham palsat mi ka hilam ka kitelsak hi.
48002019	Ahang in, Pasian adinga ka nuntak theih nadingin thukham tungtawnin thukham ka sihsan hi.
48002020	Jesu tawh ka kikilhlum zo a, kei ka nungta nawn kei hi; ahi hangin ka sungah Khrist a nungta hi. Ka pumpi sunga ka nuntakna pen, kei hong it-in, kei ading amahmah a kipia pa Pasian Tapa upna-in a nungta ka hi hi.
48002021	Thukham tungtawnin thumaanna kingah thei hileh Khrist a mawkna-a si hi ding ahi manin, Pasian hehpihna ka pampaih kei hi!” ka ci hi.
48003001	No Galatia mihaite! No kua in hong bumhai ahi hiam? Jesu Khrist a kilhlup bangin a kiteltakin note mitmuh tektek ah hong kilak hi.
48003002	Note tung pan na khat bek ka thei nuam hi. Thukham zuihna hangin Kha na ngah uh hiam, ahikeh na zakte uh na upna uh hangin na ngah uh hiam?
48003003	Tua zahta a hai lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? Kha tawh na pat khit nungun mihing nasepna tawh na ngim na tup uh tangtun sawm na hi uh hiam?
48003004	A mawkna-in tua zahta thuak na hi uh hiam, a mawkna taktak himawk ding hiam?
48003005	Pasian in thukham na zuihna uh hangin note, ama Kha hong pia in note lakah nalamdangte hong bawl ahi hiam, ahikeh na zaksa uh na up hang uh hizaw hiam?
48003006	Abraham ngaihsun un: “Amah in Pasian uma, ama adingin tua mah thumaanna in kisimsak hi,”
48003007	Tua ciangin a umte Abraham tate suak cih theitel un.
48003008	Pasian in upna hangin Gentile-te dik tangsak nuam cih Laisiangtho in mukhol a, Abraham kiangah, “Nang tungtawnin minam khempeuh thupha kipia ding hi,” ci-in lungdamna-thu na magen hi.
48003009	Tua ahi ciangin a umte khempeuh, upna nei mipa Abraham tawh thupha kipiakhawm hi.
48003010	Thukham zuihna-a kingate khempeuh hamsiatna nuai-a om lai uh ahi hi. Ahang in: “Thukham Laibu sunga kigelhte khempeuh a zuikim suak zolote peuh mah hamsiat ahi uh hi,” ci-in kigelh zo hi.
48003011	A teltakin thukham hangin Pasian mai-ah kuamah diktansak ahi kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Mi thumaante upna hangin a nungta ding hi,”
48003012	Upna tungah thukham kibulphuh lo hi; tua tawh kilehbulh in, “Tuate a hih mi, tuate hang mahin a nungta ding hi.”
48003013	Eite tang dingin Khrist hamsia hong suakin thukham hamsiatna panin hong tan zo hi. Ahang in, “Sing tunga kikhai peuhpeuh hamsiat ahi hi,” ci-in kigelh hi.
48003014	Eite in upna hangin a kiciamsa Kha i ngah theih nadingin Abraham tunga kipia tua thupha, Khrist Jesu tungtawnin Gentile-te tungah hong tun theih nadingin amah in eite hong tan zo hi. Thukham le Thuciam
48003015	Sanggamte aw, nisim nuntakna panin gentehna khat kong gen ding hi. A kikipsaksa mihing thukhun pen, kuamah in paikhia thei loin a behlap thei kei hi. Hih thu ah zong tua mah bang ahi hi.
48003016	Abraham le a suan a khak tungah thuciamnate kipia hi. Laisiangtho in mi tampi a gennopna-in “na suan na khakte tungah zong” ci loin Khrist ahi mi khat genna in, “na suan na khak tungah” ci zaw hi.
48003017	Ka gennop hih ahi hi: A beisa huna Pasian in a kipsaksa thukhun pen tua khit kum 430 a kipia thukham in tua thuciam a phiat tuan kei hi.
48003018	Ahang in, thukham tungah gouluahza kinga hileh thuciam tunga kinga ahi kei ding hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in a hehpihna hangin thuciam tungtawnin gouluahna Abraham a pia hi.
48003019	Tua hi mawk leh, thukham bang ngimna ahi hiam? Thukham pen thuciam in a na gen tua Ci-le-sa hong tun mateng adingin khialhnate hanga kipia thuah ahi hi. Tua thukham pen vansawltakte tungtawn in palai khat zanga kikipsak ahi hi.
48003020	Ahi zongin mi pawlkhat bek tangin palai a ding kei hi; ahi hangin Pasian khat ahi hi.
48003021	Tua ahi manin thukham in Pasian thuciamte a langpan hiam? Langpan peuhmah lo hi! Ahang in, nuntakna a pia thei thukham kipia hileh thukham hangin thumaanna hong tung khin takpi ding hi.
48003022	Ahi hangin a kikamciam pen Jesu Khrist upna tungtawna kipiasa, a um mite tungah a kipiak thei nadingin Laisiangtho in leitung buppi mawhna thong kiapa ahi hi, ci-in genkhia hi.
48003023	Hih upna hong tun ma-in thukham in eite khempeuh thongah hong khia a, upna hong kilat mateng hong khumcip hi.
48003024	Tua ahi ciangin upna hangin dik tansak i hi thei nadingin Khrist kiangah eite hong pi ding in tua thukham hong ki-uksak hi.
48003025	Tu-in tua upna tungta ahi manin thukham in hong uk kha nawn kei hi. Pasian Tapate
48003026	Khrist Jesu upna tungtawnin note khempeuh Pasian tapate na hi uh hi;
48003027	ahang in, Khrist sunga kibaptise note khempeuh Khrist a silh na hi ta uh hi. Jew mi,
48003028	Greek mi a om kei hi; sila, sila lo a om kei hi; numei pasal a om kei hi. Ahang in, note khempeuh Khrist Jesu sungah khat na hi uh hi.
48003029	Note Khrist aa na hi uh leh Abraham suan na hi uh a, thuciam bangin gouluahte na hi uh hi.
48004001	Ka gen thu in, gouluahpa in a neu lai-in a luah ding khempeuh a neipa ahi hangin sila tawh a kilamdanna a om kei hi.
48004002	Apa hun seh hun a tun mateng a donte le a kemte ukna nuai-ah a om hi.
48004003	Tua mah bangin eite i neu lai-in leitung ngeina bulpite nuaiah sila i suak hi.
48004004	Ahi hangin a hun hong tun kim ciangin Pasian in a Tapa hong sawla, thukham nuai-ah numei sung panin hong suak hi.
48004005	Thukham nuai-a omte tapa hina, thuneihna a kimin i ngah theih nadingin hong tan hi.
48004006	Note tapate na hi manun “Abba, Pa” a ci khia tua Kha, ama Tapa Kha eite lungsungah Pasian in hong sawl hi.
48004007	Tua ahi ciangin note sila hi nawn loin tapa na hi uh hi; tapa na hi nungsangun Pasian in note zong gouluahpa in hong koih zo hi. Paul in Galatia-te Lunghimawh
48004008	Tunung lai, Pasian na theih ma un pianngei-a pasian a hi lote sila-in na om uh hi.
48004009	Ahi hangin tu-in note in Pasian thei tham loin, Pasian hong theih na hi nungsangun a thanem le bangmah a man lo thubulpite ah na kihei kik uh bangci bang ahi hiam? Tuate nuai-ah sila suak kikkik nuam na hi uh hiam?
48004010	Note in a kisehtuam nite, khate, khuahunte le kumte na tang uh hi!
48004011	Note adingin bang tan hiam khat a mawkna-a hahkat ka hi khak ding kong laupih hi.
48004012	Sanggamte aw, kong kun hi: note tawh a kibanga kong om bangin note zong kei bangin hong hi un. Kei tungah nong khial kei uh hi.
48004013	Na theihsa bangun, note tungah lungdamna-thu kong gen masakna ka ci natna hang ahi hi.
48004014	Ka dam loh no adingin zia-etna a suah hangin simmawhna peuh kihna peuhin nong nei tuan kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin Pasian vansawltak mahmah, Khrist Jesu mahmah bangin nong muak uh hi.
48004015	Note lungnopna khempeuh bang suak ta ahi hiam? Hih thei liai hi le uh cin na mittang nangawn uh khelkhia-in tuate kei nong piak nop lam uh ka thei hi.
48004016	Tu-in note thutak kong hilh mana na gal uh suak ka hi hiam?
48004017	Tua mite in note hong zogawp nuam uh hi; ahi hangin a hoih nading lam ahi kei hi. Amaute in kote pan note hong khenkhia in amau adingin nakpi-a na hahkat ding uh a deih uh hi.
48004018	Ngimna a hoih nak leh hahkat ding hoih hi; note tawh kong om sung bek hi loin a tawntungin na hahkat den un.
48004019	Note sungah Khrist lim a kilat matenga nausuahnat thuak banga kong thuak kik kong it tate aw,
48004020	note hangin amkham ka hi manin tu-in note tawh omkhawm hileng, ka aw suah khel nuam na zen ing e! Hagar le Sarah
48004021	Thukham nuai-a om nuam note in, thukham in a gen bang hiam, cih za lo na hi uh hiam, hong gen dih un?
48004022	Ahang in, Abraham in tapa nih nei a, khat sila numei tawh a neih hi-in, a khat pen a suakta numei tawh a neih ahi hi, ci-in kigelh hi.
48004023	Sila numei tawh a neih a tapa pen a ngeina banga suak hi-a, ahi hangin a suakta numei tawh a neih a tapa pen kamciamna khat tangtunna ahi hi.
48004024	Tua numeite thukhun nih tanga ding ahi manin, hihte tehkakna-a lak theih ding ahi hi. Thukhun khat Sinai Vum pan hi a, sila a suak ding tate a nei hi. Tua pen Hagar ahi hi.
48004025	Tu-in Hagar pen Arabia a om Sinai Vum tangin ding a, tu huna Jerusalem khuapi tawh a kibang ahi hi; bang hang hiam cihleh tuanu a tate tawh sila-in a om uh hi.
48004026	Ahi hangin tunglama om Jerusalem pen sila hi lo a, amah eite nu ahi hi.
48004027	Ahang in, “Ta nei lo tasel numei aw, nuam in; nang, nausuahnat a thuak kha lo nu aw, nuamin ngaihtakin kikokhia in; bang hang hiam cihleh pasal nei numei sangin a kipampaih numei khat in ta tam a nei zaw hi,” hi ci-in kigelh hi.
48004028	Tu-in sanggamte aw, note Isaac bangin kamciamna tate na hi uh hi.
48004029	Tua hunlai-in suah ngei-a suak tapa in Kha vangliatna pana suak tapa a bawlsia hi. Tu-in zong tua mah bang ahi hi.
48004030	Ahi hangin Laisiangtho in bang gen ahi hiam? “Sila numei tapa in a suakta numei tapa tawh gouluah khawm ngei lo ding ahi manin sila numei le a tapa hawlmang un.” ci hi.
48004031	Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, eite sila numei tate hi loin sila lo numei tate i hi hi.
48005001	Khrist in a suakta dingin eite hong khahkhia hi. Tua ahi ciangin kiptakin ding unla, sila hakkol tawh no le no vangik kisuan kik nawn kei un.
48005002	Ka kammalte ciamteh un! Keimah Paul in kong hilh hi; vun na atsak uh leh no adingin Khrist in kimanna a nei peuhmah kei ding hi.
48005003	Vunatsak mi peuhmah in thukham a vekin a zuih kim kul hi, kong ci lai hi.
48005004	Thukham zuihna hangin diktansakna ngah a sawm note, Khrist panin khenkhiatsa na hi uh a, hehpihna panin na pukmang khin uh hi.
48005005	Ahi hangin kote in ka lamet uh thumaanna pen upna hangin Kha tungtawnin lawptakin ka ngak uh hi.
48005006	Ahang in, Khrist Jesu sungah vunat, ahi zongin, vunat loh ahi zongin kimanna a nei kei hi. Itna tungtawna kipulak tua upna bek in kimanna a nei hi.
48005007	Note kitaitehna hoihtakin na tai uh hi. Thutak na zuih loh nadingun kua in hong dal ahi hiam?
48005008	Tua bang kizolna ahileh note hong sampa kiang pan hi lo hi.
48005009	"Silngo tawmkha in annel mekman lompi khat sung khempeuh a tawksak thei hi.”
48005010	Note, lungsim tuamdang a nei lo dingin Topa sungah kong muang hi. Note hong lungbuaisak peuhpeuh in kuakua ahi zongin gawtna thutanna a thuak ding hi.
48005011	Sanggamte aw, vunat thu mah a hilh lailai hi leng bang hangin bawlsiatna thuak lai ding ka hi hiam? Tua bang hileh singlamteh hanga ngaihdahna a beisak ka hi ding hi.
48005012	Note hong buaisakte amau le amau kiget vet le uh hi lo ding hiam?
48005013	No ka sanggamte aw, a suakta dinga hong kisam na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin na suahtakna uh mawhdim pianngei deihna-a bualna in zang kei unla, tua sangin ki-itna tawh khat le khat na kisepsak thuk un.
48005014	"Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in,” a cih thupiak khatah thukham khempeuh a kigawm khin hi.
48005015	Note khat le khat kikei-in na kinek thuk uh leh kikem un, khat le khat na kihihsia gawp ding uh hi. Kha-a Nuntakna
48005016	Tua ahi ciangin Kha-in na nungta un, tua hileh mawhdim pianngei deihna na tangtun kei ding uh hi, kong ci hi.
48005017	Ahang in, mawhdim pianngei lunggulhna pen Kha deihna tawh kilehbulh a, Kha lunggulhna pen mawhdim pianngei lunggulhna tawh kilehbulh hi. Tuate gel khat le khat kido ahi ciangin na hih nop uh na hih thei kei uh hi.
48005018	Ahi hangin Kha in nang hong pi leh thukham nuai-ah na om kei hi.
48005019	Mawhdim pianngei gamtatna telnop mahmah hi: numei-pasal paktatna, siantho-lohna le hukna-lanna;
48005020	milim biakna le bumna; muhdahna, kilemlohna, hazatna, hehluatna, angsung khualna, kilungkim lohna, kipawlkhennate le
48005021	en-na, zukhamna, uangtatna le tua bang nam khempeuh ahi hi. Tua banga nungtate in Pasian gam a luah kei ding hi, ci-a kong vauhilhsa bangin kong hilhkhol hi.
48005022	Ahi hangin Kha gah in: itna, lung nopna, kilemna, thuakzawhna, citna, hoihna, muanhuaina,
48005023	migitna le pumpi ukzawhnate ahi hi. Hihte a langpang ding thukham a om kei hi.
48005024	Khrist Jesu aa ahite in tua mawhdim pianngei deihna le a lunggulhna teng tawh a kilhlum zo uh hi.
48005025	Kha hanga nungta i hi nungsangin Kha tawh kalsuan khawm ni.
48005026	Eite khat le khat kimisak, kihehsakin ki-eng kei ni.
48006001	Sanggamte aw, mawhna a bawl mi khat a kimat leh a khami note in migitakin na phong ding uh hi. Ahi hangin no le no na kikem un; tua hi kei leh note in zong zia-etna na thuak kha ding uh hi.
48006002	Khat le khat na vangik uh kidawn tek un. Hih bangin gamta le uh cin Khrist thukham na tangtun ding uh hi.
48006003	Mi khatpeuh bangmah hi lo napi a thupi-a a kingaihsut leh amah le amah kikhem ahi hi.
48006004	Mi khempeuh in amau gamtatna encian ciat uh hen. Tua ciangin, midangte khatpeuh tawh kitehkak se loin amah le amah a kihisak thei pan ding hi.
48006005	Ahang in, mi khempeuh in amau van tek a pua ciat ding uh hi.
48006006	Thu-a kipantah peuhmah in, a pantah pa tawh a hoih khempeuh a tangkhawm pelmawh hi.
48006007	Khem zawhin na om kei un: Pasian pen ciamnuih bawl theih hi lo hi. Mi in ama vawh bangin a at ding hi.
48006008	Ama mawhdim pianngei lungkim nading a vawh mi in, tua pianngei panin siatna a at ding hi; Kha lungkim nading a vawh mi in, tua Kha panin nuntak tawntungna a at ding hi.
48006009	Eite in i tawpsan kei nakleh a hun a tun ciangin a gah at ding i hi manin na hoih sep cimtak kei ni.
48006010	Tua ahi manin hun hoih i neih sungin mi khempeuh tungah na hoih sem ni, a diakdiak in thu-um innkuante tungah sem ni. Vunat hilo Piansak Thakna
48006011	Keima khut mahmah in laimal golpipi-a no tunga kong gelhte en dih un!
48006012	A tungthama maipha ngah nuam mi pawlkhat in, vun hong atsak nuam teitei uh hi. Hih banga a hihna uh a thu, Khrist singlamteh thu hanga bawlsiatna tawh a kipelh nop man bek uh ahi hi.
48006013	Vunatte nangawn in thukham a zui kei uh hi. Tua hi ta leh note hong kisialhpih nuam uh ahi manin, vun hong atsak teitei uh ahi hi.
48006014	Kei adingin leitung kikilhcip a, kei zong leitung adingin hong kilhcipna ahi tua Topa Jesu singlamteh longal ka kisialhpih kei ding hi.
48006015	Vunat le vunat loh in phattuamna a nei kei hi. A thaka piansakna bekin phattuamna a nei hi.
48006016	Hih zuih ding ngeina a zuite khempeuh le Pasian Isreal-te tung dongah lemna le lainatnate om ta hen.
48006017	A nunung penin, ka pumpi tungah Jesu ciamtehnate pua ka hi manin, kuamah in kei hong buaisak kei ta hen.
48006018	Sanggamte aw, Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna, note kha tawh om ta hen. Amen.
49001001	Pasian deihna hanga Jesu Khrist sawltakpi Paul in, Ephesus a om misiangte, Khrist Jesu sunga a muanhuaite tungah:
49001002	I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
49001003	Vanlam gama, Khrist sunga khalam thuphate khempeuh eite thupha hong pia i Topa Jesu Khrist Pasian le Pa kiphat ta hen.
49001004	Ahang in, ama mitmuh ah ‘siangtho-a pau i ban loh nadingin leitung piansak ma-in ama sungah eite hong teel zo hi.
49001005	Ama nopsakna le deihna tawh kizui-in Jesu Khrist tungtawnin tate a hong san theih nadingin –
49001006	amah in a Itpa sungah eite hong piakkhong a minthang ama heh pihna pahtawi nadingin itna-in hong laitan kholhsa ahi hi.
49001007	Pasian hehpihna kicing tawh kizui-in ama sisan hangin ama sungah tatkhiatna le mawh maisakna i ngah a,
49001008	amah in pilna le theihcianna khempeuh tawh tua hehpihna kicingtakin eite hong pia zo hi.
49001009	Tua ciangin amah in Khrist sunga a ngimsa ama deihna thuthuk, a lungkimna hoih tawh kizui-in eite hong theisak hi.
49001010	A hun a cin ciangin a tangtung dingin vantung le leitunga na khempeuh lutang khat, Khrist mahmah nuai-a gawmkhawm ding ama tup ahi hi.
49001011	Ama deihna banga a ngimna tawh kituakin na khempeuh a semkhia pa in a deihna tawh kizui-in a laitansa bangin ama sungah kote hong kiteelsa hi-a,
49001012	Khrist sunga lametna a nei masa kote ama minthanna pahtawina ka suah theih nading uh ahi hi.
49001013	Note hong hotkhiatna lungdamna-thu, tua thutak thu na zak khit uh ciangin note zong Khrist sungah hong kihuai khawm hi. Na up khit uh ciangin ciamtehna khat, hong kikamciamsa Khasiangtho-a kiciamtehsa na hi uh hi.
49001014	Tua pen ama minthanna pahtawi nadingin Pasian neihsate tatkhiatna dongin i luah ding hong kamciamna ahi, khamkholhna ahi hi.
49001015	Hih thu hangin Topa Jesu na up na uh le misiangte khempeuh na itna uh ka zaka kipan,
49001016	ka thungetnate ah note hong phawk gige in no ading lung damkohna ka tawlnga nai kei hi.
49001017	Eite Topa Jesu Khrist’ Pasian a minthang Pa in, amah na theihcian zawk nadingun pilna le kilaakna Kha note hong piak theih nadingin thu ka ngen den hi.
49001018	Note hong sapna ahi lametna, misiangte sunga a minthang ama gouluah a kicinna le
49001019	a um mi eite adinga tehpih bei ama vangliatna thupi na theih nadingun na lungsim mitte uh a kivaksak nadingin zong thu ka ngen hi.
49001020	Misi pan amah a thawhkiksak lai-a vanlam gamah a taklam-a a tutsak lai-a
49001021	ukna le thuneihna, vangliatna le gam-ukna khempeuh, tu khanghun bek hilo hong tung ding khanghun ah zong a kipia thei za khempeuh tungpek ah Khrist a, a zatsa thahatna mah ahi hi.
49001022	Pasian in na khempeuh ama khepek nuai ah koih a, pawlpi adingin amah na khempeuh tungah lutang in seh khinin,
49001023	tua pawlpi pen ama pumpi hi-a, na khempeuh, lam khempeuh-a, a cingsakpa’ kicinna ahi hi.
49002001	Note na hi uh leh na mawhnate uh le na khialhnate uh sungah na si khin uh a,
49002002	hih leitung thu, tu laitaka thumang lote sunga na a sem kha tua huihgam ukpa na zuih lai-un, tuate sungah na nungta uh hi.
49002003	Hun khat lai-in eite khempeuh zong amaute lakah i nungta a, i mawhdim pianngei ukluatna tangtun in pumpi lunggulhnate le ngaihsutnate zui-in i om hi. Midangte bangin pianngeia in, thangpaihna nuai-a omte i hi hi.
49002004	Ahi hangin lainatna a hau Pasian in a lian mahmah eite hong itna hangin
49002005	khialhna sungah si-a i om laitak nangawnin Khrist tawh eite hong nungtasak khawm – hehpihna hangin hotkhiat na hi uh hi.
49002006	Pasian in Khrist tawh eite hong thosak khawma, vanlam gamah Khrist Jesu sungah amah tawh hong tukhawmsak hi.
49002007	Khrist Jesu sunga a migitna hanga eite tunga hong kigenkhia tehpih bei ama hehpihna kicinna, hong tung ding khanghunte ah eite tunga hong kilatsak nading ahi hi.
49002008	Ahang in, hehpihna hangin upna tungtawnin hotkhiat na hi uh hi. No le no a na ngah uh hi loin Pasian letsong ahi hi –
49002009	kuamah a kisialh theih loh nadingin sepna hang ahi kei hi.
49002010	Ahang in, eite sep dinga Pasian geelkholh, nasep hoih sem dinga Khrist Jesu sunga kipiangsak Pasian khutsiam i hi hi.
49002011	Tua ahi manin nidang lai-in pianngei in Gentile-te na hi uh a, amau le amau “vunat” (mihing khut tawh pumpi tunga ki-at) a kicite in note “vunat loh” hong cih uh phawk unla,
49002012	tua hunlai-in note Khrist tawh kikhenin Israel mi hina pan kipuaseh in, kam ciamna thukhunte-a tan nei lo gamdang mi hi-in, lametna a om lo le Pasian lo-a leitunga om na hilam uh phawk gige un.
49002013	Ahi hangin khatvei lai-a gamlapi-a om note, tu-in Khrist sisan tungtawnin Khrist Jesu sungah hong kinaisak ta hi.
49002014	Ahang in, nihte khat hong suaksak a, kikal dalna ahi kilemlohna kulhte a phelkhia pa a mahmah eite lemna hi-in,
49002015	amah in ama ci-le-sa ah tua thukham le thukham’ thupiakte le ngeinate a beisak hi. Mi nihte panin mi thak khat a mahmah sunga piansak ding a ngimna hi-a, tua hangin kilemna bawlin
49002016	hih pumpi khat sungah amaute gel sing lamteh tungtawnin Pasian ah kilemkiksaka tua tawh amaute kilang neihna a lamang hi.
49002017	Amah hong pai-in no a gamlapi-a omsate tungah kilemna thu, a nai-a omsate tungah zong kilemna thu mah hong gen zo hi.
49002018	Ahang in, ama tungtawnin eite in Kha khat tawh Pasian mai-ah luttheihna i nei tuak hi.
49002019	Tua thu hangin note mikhual le gamdang mi hi nawn loin, Pasian mite tawh tualsung mi na hikhawm uh a Pasian innkuan sung mite na hi uh hi,
49002020	innkiu suangpi Khrist Jesu mahmah tawh sawltakpite le kamsangte bulkip tunga hong kilam na hi uh hi.
49002021	Ama sungah tua inn buppi kizomkhawm a, Topa sungah a siangtho biakinnpi a suak dingin a khang hi.
49002022	Tua hi-a note zong Pasian ama Kha-in a tenna a suak dingin a kilamkhawm toto na hi uh hi.
49003001	Hih thu hangin, no Gentile-te tanga Khrist Jesu’ hanga thongkia keimah Paul in –
49003002	Note adinga kei tunga hong kipia Pasian hehpihna in na a sepkhiatna thu na za zo tham uh hi.
49003003	Tua in, a toma ka gelhsa bangin kilaakna tawh kei tunga hong kitheisak thuthuk ahi hi.
49003004	Tua ahi teh hih thu na sim uh ciangin Khrist thuthuk ka theihzia na thei ding uh hi.
49003005	Tua pen Pasian sawltakpi siangthote le kamsangte tunga tua Kha tawh tu huna a kilaak bangin khang dang mite tungah a kitheisak kei hi.
49003006	Hih thuthuk i cih in, lungdamna-thu tungtawnin Gentile-te in Israel-te tawh luah khawmin, pumpi nate suakkhawm uh a, Khrist Jesu sunga kamciam a tangkhawm a suahna uh ahi hi.
49003007	Ama vangliatna nasepna tungtawna kei tungah tua Pasian hehpihna letsong hong kipiak hanga hih lungdamna-thu nasempa a suak ka hi hi.
49003008	Pasian mi a neupente sanga a neuzaw hi napi hih hehpihna a kizongkhia zo lo Khrist hauhna thu Gentile-te tunga hilh ding
49003009	le a beisa khanghunte a, na khempeuh a piangsak Pasian sunga a kiselcip hih thuthuk nasepna mikim tungah teltaka lakkhia dingin kei hong kipia hi.
49003010	Ama ngimna in Pasian pilna thuap tampite pawlpi tungtawnin vanlam gam sunga thuneihna neite le ukna a neite tunga theihsak ding deihna hi a,
49003011	tua pen ama tawntung ngimna tawh kizui-in i Topa Khrist Jesu sunga a bukimsak pen ahi hi.
49003012	Ama sung le, ama sunga upna tungtawnin suahtakna le kimuanna tawh Pasian i nai thei ta hi.
49003013	Tua ahi manin note adinga ka thuaknate hangin a lungkia lo dingin kong ngen hi, tuate note minthanna ahi hi.
49003014	Hih thu hangin Pa mai-ah ka khukdin hi,
49003015	amah panin vantung le leitung ama innkuanbupa min a kilo hi.
49003016	Amah in a minthang ama hauhna panin, Kha tungtawnin vangliatna tawh na sunglam mi uh hong thakhauhsak nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
49003017	Tua pen upna tungtawnin note lungsungah Khrist a ten theih nading ahi hi. Tua ciangin note ading kong ngetsakna in itna ah zungkha-in, kipin,
49003018	misiangte khempeuh tawh vangliatna nei khawmin Khrist hong itna, a zaina, a sauna, a sanna, le a thukna na theih zawh nading uh,
49003019	le theihbatloh ahi itna thei-in, Pasian kicinna khempeuh ah note na dim theih nading uh ahi hi.
49003020	Tu-in i nget khempeuh le i lunggeel khempeuh sanga nakpi-a thupi zawtham le, eite sunga a sem a vangliatna tawh kizui-a a hih thei pa tungah
49003021	pawlpi le Khrist Jesu tungtawnin akhang akhang a tawntungin minthanna omden ta hen. Amen.
49004001	Tua ahi ciangin Topa adingin thongkia keimah in na ngahsa uh hong sapna tawh kilawm-a na nuntak ding uh kong kun hi.
49004002	Kiniamkhiat le migitakin om un; lungduai-in itna tawh khat le khat na kithuak keeikai un.
49004003	Kilemna in hong khihkhawmna tungtawnin, tua Kha a na kipumkhatna uh na letkip nadingun na hih theih tawpun hih un.
49004004	Pumpi khat le Kha khat – note hong kisap lai-a lametna khata hong kisap bangin –
49004005	Topa khat, upna khat, baptise-na khat,
49004006	na khempeuh tunga om, na khempeuh tungtawna, na khempeuh sunga ompa, mite khempeuh Pasian le Pa khat a om hi.
49004007	Ahi hangin Khrist sehsaknasa bangin eite tungah hehpihna hong kipia ciat hi.
49004008	Hih thu hangin: “A sangah amah a kahtoh ciangin, amatte pi-in tonpih to a, mite tungah letsongte a pia hi.” a na ci hi.
49004009	(Leilam gam, a niamna ah amah kumsuk lo hileh, “amah kahto” a cih, bang a cihnopna hi ding hiam?
49004010	Khuavannuai bup na khempeuh a kicingsak dingin a kumsukpa tektek vante khempeuh sanga sangzawin a kahto pa ahi hi.)
49004011	Amah, mi pawlkhat sawltakpi, pawlkhat kamsang, pawlkhat lungdamna thugen, pawlkhatte thuhilh sia le laihilh sia sem dingin a pia pa hi-a,
49004012	tuate in Khrist pumpi a khansuah theih nadingun Pasian mite na sem dinga a bawlkholh nading ahi hi.
49004013	Tua in eite khempeuh, tua upna le Pasian Tapa theihna ah khat suaka, Khrist kicinna zahzah a i picin mateng ading ahi hi.
49004014	Tua ciangin mite in zuau siamna le khelpilna tawh a geel uh amau khemna ah, tuihual in a lapsuk a laptoh, thuhilhna huih citeng in amut kawikawi naungekte i hi nawn kei ding hi.
49004015	Tua sangsik in, itna tawh thutak genin, Lutang ahi pa Khrist sungah, na khempeuh ah ama sungah i khangto ding hi.
