49004016	Amah panin pumpi na khempeuh thagui tekah kihuh kizom khawmin, amau sep ding tek a sep ciangin tua pumpi, itna sungah khangin amah le amah a kikhansuah hi.
49004017	Tua ahi ciangin note, Gentile-te ngaihsutna gina lo-a, a nuntak bangun na nuntak nawn loh nadingun hih thu Topa sungah kong gena, kong kun tangtang hi.
49004018	Amaute lungtang kikhauh sakna hanga bangmah a theih loh manun, Pasiana nuntakna panin amaute kikhenkhia-a, a theihtelna uh kimialsak hi!
49004019	Amaute in zumna mel thei nawn loin a siang lo namkima bual dingin a uangzaw kilunggulhna nei tawntung uh a, amau hukna le lanna ah a kipiakhia khin zo uh hi.
49004020	Bangbang hi ta leh note in tua bang lamin Khrist na thei kei uh hi.
49004021	Jesu sunga om thutak tawh kizui-in ama sungah hong kihilh zo ahi ciangin note in amah thu na zaksa uh hi takpi hi.
49004022	Tuma lai-a na nuntakna uh tawh kisai-in khemhat lunggulhna in a siatsaksa na milui uh suahkhia ding,
49004023	na lungsim puakzia uh kibawl thak ding,
49004024	amaan thumaanna le sianthona taktak sungah Pasian tawh kibang dinga kipiangsak mithak na silh ding uh note hong kihilh hi.
49004025	Tua ahi manin eite khempeuh pumpi khat sunga a nate i hi manin note a kuamapeuh in zuauphuahna suahkhia-in a vengte tungah maantakin thu a gen pelmawh ding hi.
49004026	"Na heh sungin na mawh kei in,” na heh dam loin ni na tumsak kei in,
49004027	dawimangpa siksan na awn kei in.
49004028	A guta densa pa in gu nawn peuhmah loin a kitangsamte na khatpeuh a hop theih nadingin ama khut tawh, kimanna a nei na khatpeuh sem pelmawh hen.
49004029	Na kam panun kam hoih lo pusuak sak kei un, ahi zongin a zate in phat tuampih in amau tangsapna tawh kizui-a, amaute bawlpha in, a huh thei ding kammal bek pusuaksak zaw un.
49004030	Tatkhiat ni adinga note hong kiciamtehna Pasian Khasiangtho na dahsak kei un.
49004031	Khaat-na, ngonghehna le hehna, kitotzakna le gensiatnate khempeuh etsatna nam khempeuh tawh na paikhia un.
49004032	Note migi in khat le khat na kikhuatuah unla Pasian in Khrist sunga note mawhna hong maisak bang tektek in, na mawhna uh na kimaisak ciat un.
49005001	Tua ahi manin itluat tate bangin Pasian a ettehte hi unla,
49005002	Khrist in eite hong it a, eite adingin Pasian tungah a namtui-a biakna ding le biakpiakna dingin amah le amah a kipiakkhiat bangin itna nuntakna tawh na nungta un.
49005003	Ahi hangin note lakah numei pasal paktatna lim ahi a, siantho lohna nam khat peuhpeuh le huaihamna ahi zongin a om peuhmah kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian misiangthote adingin hihte kilawm lo hi.
49005004	Note kam panin zahmawhpau le haipauna, ciamnuih thanghuaite, tua banga kilawm lote omsak loin lungdam na ko zaw un.
49005005	Ahang in, a thangtat, a siangtho lo ahikeh a huaiham, tua banga hihte milim bia hi-a, Khrist le Pasian gam ah luah ding bangmah a nei kei hi, cih na theitel uh hi.
49005006	Thu mawkmawk tawh kuamah na kikhem zosak kei un. Bang hang hiam cihleh tua bang thute hangin thumang lote tungah Pasian thangpaihna a tung hi.
49005007	Tua ahi manin amaute tawh kithuah kei un.
49005008	Ahang in, hun khat lai-in note khuamial na hi uh a, ahi hangin tu-in Topa sungah khuavak na hi uh hi. Khuavak tate bangin na nungta un;
49005009	Ahang in, khuavak gah in, hoihna khempeuh, thumaanna le thutak ahi hi.
49005010	Topa lungkimna bang hiam, cih na zong un.
49005011	Gah a gah lo khuamial gamtatna tawh na kisawhkha kei unla amau gamtatnate na pholak zaw un.
49005012	Ahang in, thumang lote in a simthama a septe uh a kigenkhiat bek zong maizumhuai hi.
49005013	Ahi hangin khuavak in a pholak na peuhmah a kimu thei hi.
49005014	Ahang in, na khempeuh a kimu theisak khuavak ahi hi. Hih thu hangin: “Ihmu mi aw, khanglo in, misi panin tho in, tua hileh nang tungah Khrist a tang ding hi,”a na ci hi.
49005015	Tua hi-a na nuntak zia uh, apil lote bang hi loin apilte bangin limtakin kidawm unla,
49005016	nite hoih lo ahi manin hun hoih na neih peuhpeuh uh a hoih penin na zang un.
49005017	Tua ahi ciangin hai kei unla, Topa deihna bang ahi hiam, cih theitel zaw un.
49005018	Zu kham kei un, uangtat luatna mun hong tun thei hi. Tua sangsikin, Kha tawh na kidim zaw un.
49005019	Phatna-late, biakna late le khalam late in khat le khat na kihopih un. Na lung sung uhah phat kawmin Topa tungah la sa un,
49005020	Topa Jesu Khrist minin na khempeuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam na ko tawntung un.
49005021	Khrist zahtakna tawh khat le khat na kiniamkhiat tuah un.
49005022	Zite aw, Topa tunga ki-ap bangin na pasalte uh tungah ki-ap un.
49005023	Ahang in, Khrist in ama pumpi ahi pawlpi lutang le a Honpa ahi bangin zi lutang in a pasal ahi hi.
49005024	Khrist tungah pawlpi a ki-ap bangin zite zong na khempeuh ah a pasalte uh tungah a ki-ap ding uh hi.
49005025	Khrist in a pawlpi it a, ama adingin amah mah a kipumpiak khiat bang tektek in, pasalte aw, na zite uh it un.
49005026	Amah in pawlpi siangtho dingin thu tungtawnin tui in sawp a, singthosak hi,
49005027	tua pen a nin baang lo, a vun tonna om lo, a melhemna khatpeuh om lo tham loin siangtho le kawkbaang lo-a, a tangkhia pawlpi-in amah le amah a kipiakkhiat theih nading ahi hi.
49005028	Tua tawh kibangin, pasalte in amau pumpi bangin a zite uh a it uh kul hi. A zi it pa amah le amah ki-it ahi hi.
49005029	Tuate khempeuh khit ah, ama pumpi mudah kuamah om ngei lo a, Khrist in a pawlpi cingin a vak bang tektekin ama pumpi cingin a vak zaw hi.
49005030	Ahang in, eite ama pumpi nate i hi hi.
49005031	"Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, tua nihte sakhat a suak ding uh hi.”
49005032	Hih in thuthukpi khat hi-a, ahi hangin kei gen ahileh Khrist le pawlpi thu ahi hi.
49005033	Bangbang ahi zongin, note a kua mapeuh amah leh amah a ki-it bangin na zite uh na it pelmawh un. Zi in zong a pasal a zahtak pelmawh ding hi.
49006001	Tate aw, Topa sungah na nu na pate uh thu na mang un, ahang in, hih in thumaan ahi hi.
49006002	"Na nu na pa pahtawi in.” Hih in thuciam tawh kizui thupiak masa pen ahi hi.
49006003	Tua bang na hileh na khan nuam dinga, leitungah sawtpi nuntak nuam na sa ding hi.
49006004	Pate aw, na tate uh mawk hehsak kei un, tua sangsikin, pattahna le Topa lamlahna ah khangtosak un.
49006005	Silate aw, Khrist thu na man ding bang tektek un, na lungsim sung uhah thutak cihtakna tawh zahtakna le kihtakna tawh na leitung pute thu na mang un.
49006006	Amaute hong muh sunga hong pahtak nading bek hi loin Khrist sila bangin na lungtang sung uhah Pasian deih bangin amaute thu na mang un.
49006007	Mihing nasem bang hi loin Pasian nasem bangin na lungtang khempeuh uh tawh na sem un.
49006008	Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in sila ahi a, sila lo ahi zongin na hoih a sem peuhpeuh pahtakman a piak ding na thei uh hi.
49006009	Tua ciangin pute aw, tuamah tawh kibangin na silate uh na hih un. Van tungah note le amaute Pu ahi khawmpa om a, amah in gup le paih a neih loh lam thei na hi manun amaute na tawng kei un.
49006010	A nunung penin, Topa sung le ama thahat vangliatna sungah thakhauh un.
49006011	Dawimangpa hong sawmnate na nan zawh nadingun Pasian galvan a kimin silh un.
49006012	Ahang in, eite do ahileh si le sa hi loin vanlam gama gam-ukte, thuneihnate, hih leitung khuamial vangliatnate le kha gilo galkapte ahi hi.
49006013	Tua ahi manin ni hoih lo hong tun cianga na pan theih nading uh le hih ding khempeuh na hih khit uh cianga na din zawh lai nadingun Pasian galvan a kimin silh un.
49006014	Tua ciangin na kawnguah thutak kawnggak gaksa, na awmuah thumaanna awmdal bulhsa le
49006015	na khe-uhah kilemna lung damna-thu pana hong pai kigin kholhna bulhsa-in kiptakin ding un.
49006016	Hihte khempeuh banah gilopa mei kuang thaltangte na sukmit theih nadingun upna lum tawi un.
49006017	Hotkhiatna sik lukhu le Pasian thu ahi Kha namsau la un.
49006018	Tua ciangin hun khempeuh ah thungetna nam khempeuh le ngetna tawh Kha-in thu na ngen un. Hih thu ngaihsun kawmin pilvang unla misiangte khempeuh ading thu na ngetsak den un.
49006019	Thu ka hilh peuhpeuh cianga thu hong kipiak theih nading le lungdamna thuthuk lau lo-a ka theihsak theih nadingin zong thu na ngetsak un.
49006020	Ahang in, tua thu hangin sikkhainiang bulh kawma palai ka hi hi. Ka hih ding bangin lau peumah loin ka pulakkhiat theih nading thu na ngetsak un.
49006021	Topa sunga nasem muanhuai ka it sanggampa Tychicus in kei bangci om a, na bangci sep cih na theih nadingun na khempeuh hong gen ding hi.
49006022	Kote bangci cih na theih nading uh le amah in note hong hanthawn theih nading mahmah deihna-in amah note kiangah kong sawl hi.
49006023	Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist panin upna tawh kigawmkhawm itna le lemna, sanggamte tungah om ta hen.
49006024	A si theilo itna tawh eite Topa Jesu Khrist a itte khempeuh tungah hehpihna om ta hen.
50001001	Khrist Jesu nasem Paul le Timothy in, Philippi a om Khrist Jesu sunga misiangte khempeuh le saptuam kemte le saptuam upa teng tungah:
50001002	Eite Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
50001003	Note kong phawk simin ka Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
50001004	Note khempeuh ading thu ka nget simin lungnopna tawh ka ngen tawntung hi,
50001005	bang hang hiam cih leh ni masa pen ni-a kipan tu dong lungdamna-thu sungah na kihel den uh hi.
50001006	Note sunga nasep hoih a panpa in Khrist Jesu ni dongin a bucing dingin semsuak ding cih ka muang hi.
50001007	Ka lungsunga note kong neih nungsangin hih bang zia a lungsim a kong neih ding a man ahi hi; kolbulhin ka om a, lungdamna-thu hu-in ka kipsak zongin note khempeuh in Pasian hehpihna kei tawh na tangkhawm uh hi.
50001008	Note khempeuh Khrist Jesu itna tawh kong lunggulh lam Pasian in a thei ding hi.
50001009	Ka thungetna in: note itna theihna le a sung thu khenteltheihna ah khang semsema,
50001010	a hoihpen telsiang thei-in Khrist ni dong siangtho-in, kawkbanna om loin,
50001011	Pasian minthan nading le a kiphat nadingin Jesu Khrist tungtawna hong pai thumaan gah tawh na dim nading uh ahi hi.
50001012	Tu-in sanggamte aw, kei tunga hong tungsa thu in lungdamna-thu khangsak takpi cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
50001013	Tua hangin Khrist hanga kol bulh a om ka hilam kumpi inn cingte khempeuh le mi khempeuh in theikhawk ta uh hi.
50001014	Kol hong kibulhna hangin Topa sunga sanggamte a tamzaw in Pasian thute hangtak le lau het loin gen ding hanthawnna a ngah zaw uh hi.
50001015	Mi kimkhatte in enna le kilungsim demna tawh Khrist thu hilh uh a, ahi hangin adangte in amau ngimna hoih nei in, a hilh uh hi, cih thumaan ahi hi.
50001016	Hih a nunungte mah in lungdamna-thu a hu dinga om lai ka hilam thei-in itna tawh a hilh uh hi.
50001017	A masa pawl in thutak paii loin, kol bulha ka om sungin buaina tawh kei hong linglawngsak thei ding uh kisa in huaiham sawmin Khrist thu a hilh uh hi.
50001018	Ahi hangin bang phamawh ahi hiam? A thupi penin, ngimna hoih ahi-a ngimna hoih lo ahi zongin bangbang lamah Khrist thu a kihilh nak leh pha zo hi. Hih thu hangin ka nuam hi. Hihi, ka nuam lailai ding hi.
50001019	Ahang in, note thungetna tung tawn le Jesu Khrist Kha in kei hong huhna bangin kei tunga piang thu pen ka suahtakna hong suak ding cih ka thei hi.
50001020	Ka pumpi ah nuntakna ahikeh sihna in ahi densa bangin tu-in Khrist a kipahtawi theih nadingin a kicing hanna ka nei ding cih maizum loin lawptakin kihehnemna le lametna ka nei hi.
50001021	Kei adingin nuntak, Khrist hi-a, sih lah metna ahi hi.
50001022	Pumpi-in nungta lai leng, ka nasepna gah, gah lai ding hi. Tua hi napi bang teelzaw ding ka hi hiam? Ka thei zo kei hi!
50001023	Tua nih saikakin ka om a, paikhia-in Khrist tawh omkhawm ding ka lunggulh hi; tua mah nakpi in hoihzaw tham hi.
50001024	Ahi hangin note adingin pumpi-a ka nuntak lai ding kisamzaw hi.
50001025	Hih thu theitel ka hi manin ka nungta lai dinga, upna sunga na khan nading uh le na lungnop nadingun note khempeuh tawh ka omkhawm lai ding hi.
50001026	Tua ciangin note tawh ka omkhawm kikna tungtawnin Khrist Jesu sunga na lungnopna uh kei hangin a dimlet ding hi.
50001027	Bang khatpeuh piang ta leh, Khrist lungdamna-thu tawh a kilawm in, ki-ukin na gamta un. Tua hileh hong hawhin note kong mu a, ka om loh kalin note thu ka galzak zongin lungdamna-thu upna hu in, lungsim kikhatin na dingkip uh cih ka thei ding hi;
50001028	note hong langpangte in bangmah lamah hong lausak zo lo cih zong ka thei ding hi. Hih in Pasian in amaute susia dinga note hong hon ding ahi na amaute tungah lim hi ding hi.
50001029	Ahang in, amah um ding bek hi lo, ama ading thuak dingin zong, Khrist tang dingin note hong kiphal hi.
50001030	Ka thuaksa bang note in na thuak uh cih na muh nung sangun tu-in thuak ding nei lai ka hilam thei ta un.
50002001	Khrist tawh note kigawmna hangin kihanthawnna khatpeuh na neih uh a, a itna panin kihehnepna khatpeuh na neih uh a, Kha tawh kipawlna khatpeuh na neih uh a, kikhuatuahna le kilainatna khatpeuh na neih uh leh
50002002	lungsim kibangin om a, itna kibang nei in, lungsim le tupna kikhatin na omna uh tawh ka lungnopna na kimsak un.
50002003	Huaihamna le kihisakna tawh bangmah hih loin kiniamkhiatin no sangin midangte a hoihzaw-in na ngaih sun un.
50002004	Note khempeuh in no angsung ding bek khual loin midangte angsung ding zong na khualsak ciat un.
50002005	Note in Khrist Jesu lungsim bang na nei un:
50002006	Amah Pasian pianngei taktak hi napi Pasian tawh kikima om ding khiatlahna a letcip ding ngaihsun loin,
50002007	bangmah kihisak loin nasem pianngei tektek hong nei-a mihing tawh hong kibang zaw hi.
50002008	Mihing mel taktak hong pua a, amah le amah kiniamkhiatin, singlamteh tungah a sih dongin thu a mang tazen hi!
50002009	Tua ahi manin Pasian in amah a sang pen munah tawisanga, min khempeuh sanga min tungnung zaw pia-in,
50002010	tua Jesu min ah vantung, leitung le leinuai-a om khempeuh khukdinin,
50002011	leii peuhmah in, “Jesu Khrist, Topa hi,” ci-in pulak dinga, Pa Pasian minthanna ahi ding hi.
50002012	Tua ahi manin kong it lawmte aw, thu na man densa bangun ka om sung bek hi lo, ka om loh sungin zong ka thu hong mangzaw in, lau kawm ling kawmin note hotkhiatna na semkhia den un.
50002013	Ahang in, a hoih ama deihna bang a deih ding le a sem dingin note sunga a sempa, Pasian ahi hi.
50002014	Na khempeuh phun lo sel loin sem un;
50002015	a lungsim kawi le lungsim mawk khangmite lakah no Pasian tate, mawh nei lo, kawkbaang lo, siangtho in, khuavannuai-a aksite bangin na tan theih nadingun
50002016	nuntakna thu na letkip uh tawh kizui-in ka taina le ka nasepna a mawkna hi lo hi, cih Khrist ni-a ka kisialh nading ahi hi.
50002017	Ahi zongin note upna pana piang kithoihna leh nasepna tungah dawntheih-a biakna bangin, biaknain kei hong kisungkhia taleh note khempeuh tawh nuamin ka lungdam khawm veve hi.
50002018	Tua mah bangin note zong nuamin kei tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.
50002019	Note thu ka zak ciangin kei zong ka kipak theih nadingin a sawt loin, note kiangah Timothy kong sawl pah ding Topa Jesu sungah ka lamen hi.
50002020	Note hoih nadinga hong khual taktak ding amah lo midang ka nei kei hi.
50002021	Ahang in, mi khempeuh in Jesu Khrist khual loin amau angsung bek a khual uh hi.
50002022	Ahi zongin tapa in a pa tawh a sepkhawm bangin Timothy in kei tawh lungdamna-thu a sepkhawmna ah amah le amah in a omzia a kilangsak hi, cih na thei uh hi.
50002023	Tua ahi manin kei tunga a piang ding thu a kitel phetin amah kong sawlpah ding ka lamen hi.
50002024	Kei mahmah zong kong paipah ding Topa sungah ka muang ngam hi.
50002025	Ahi hangin ka sanggampa, ka naseppih pa le ka galkappih le note thupuakpa zong ahi, ka kisapna teng hong huh dinga nong sawlpa uh Epaphroditus note kianga kong sawl kik ding kisam ka sa hi.
50002026	Ahang in, na zaksa bangun amah cina-a, note khempeuh hong ngai-in a lungdong hi.
50002027	Amah cina takpi-a, a si dektak hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in amah bek hi loin kei zong hong lainat a, dahna a kisuangsawnin hong tuaksak kei hi.
50002028	Tua ahi manin, note in amah na muh uh ciangin na nuam theih nading uh le keimah zong ka lunghimawhna a tawm tuam nadingin amah kong paisak ding ka lawpzawsan hi.
50002029	Topa sungah nuamna lianpi tawh amah na muak unla, amah bang mite na pahtawi un.
50002030	Bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei nong huh theih lohte uh hong huh dingin a nuntakna khaamin Khrist na semin a si dektak hi.
50003001	A nunung penin ka sanggamte aw, Topa sungah lungdam un! Note tungah a kibangmah gelh kik ding buaihuai lo a, note adingin bitna ahi hi.
50003002	Tua uite, tua gilo-a gamta mite tua misa a atgawpte lakah na pilvang un.
50003003	Ahang in, ei vunatte ei Kha-a Pasian biate, Khrist Jesu sunga a minthangte in, ci-le-sa ah muanna i nei kei hi.
50003004	Tua bangin suang nuam hi leng, kei mahmah in zong suan theih ding tampi ka nei hi. Midang khatpeuh in ci-le-sa suan ding nei a, a kingaihsut leh ken ka hauzaw sem hi;
50003005	a nigiat ni-a vunat Israel mi, Benjamin beh, Hebrew-te laka a Hebrew, thukham zuihna ah Pharisee,
50003006	hahkatna lamah pawlpi bawlsia; thukham tawh kisai thumaanna ah a genbaang lo ka hi hi.
50003007	Ahi hangin kei adinga metna ahi peuhmah tu-in Khrist hangin supna-in ka sim hi.
50003008	Tua tham loin ka Topa Khrist Jesu theihna a thupi luatna tawh tehin na khempeuh supna-in ka sima, ama hangin na khempeuh ka taan zo hi. Tuate khempeuh ninneng bangin ka ngaihsun hi, Khrist ka ngah nading le
50003009	ama sungah ka om theih nading hi-a, thukham pana hong pai keima thumaanna hi loin Pasian pana upna tawh hong pai Khrist upna tungtawna kingah thumaanna pen hizaw hi.
50003010	Khrist le ama thawhkikna’ vangliatna le a thuaknate thuakpihna, a sihna ah amah tawh kibatna ka thei nuam hi.
50003011	Tua pen misi pana thawhkikna ka ngah theih nading ahi hi.
50003012	Hih khempeuh a ngah khin ta, hong kicingsak khin zo, ka cihna hi loin Khrist Jesu in kei hong matna mah ken zong ka mat zawh nadingin mai ka nawt tentan hi.
50003013	Sanggamte aw, a mankha khin ta in ka kisim kei hi. Ahi hangin ka hih na khat in: nunglama omte ka mangngilh-a mailama om nate ka delh tentan hi.
50003014	Khrist Jesu sunga vanlam-a letsong ngah dinga Pasian in hong sapna kung lam manawh in ka nawt teitei hi.
50003015	A picing khinsa eite khempeuh in tua bang lungsim i neih ding ahi hi. Note in a kilamdang thu tuam khat na ngaihsut uh leh tua zong Pasian in hong theitelsak ding hi.
50003016	I ngahsa ciangciang bek tawh kikhom in eite nungta ni.
50003017	Sanggamte aw, kei omdan zui-in midangte tawh kipawl unla, note gamtat zia dinga kong piak bang uh zui-a a nungtate ciamteh un.
50003018	Ahang in, a beisa hunah mi tampite Khrist singlamteh galin a nungta uh hi, ci-a kong gensa bangin tu-in zong khitui nangawn tawh kong gen kik lai hi.
50003019	Amaute tupna, siatna hi-a, a pasian uh amau gilpi hi-in, a minthanna uh amau maizumna ahi hi. Amaute in leitung nate bek a ngaihsun uh hi.
50003020	Ahi hangin eite gammi i hina vantung ahi hi. Eite in tua mun panin Honpa Khat – Topa Jesu Khrist lawptakin i ngak hi.
50003021	Na khempeuh a ukna nuai-ah a koihsak thei tua vangliatna in a simmawh huai i pumpite, a minthang ama pumpi tawh kibang dingin a khel ding pa amah ahi hi.
50004001	Tua ahi manin ka sanggam, kong it, kong ngaih luat, ka lungnopna le ka pahtakman lukhute aw, Topa sungah na dinkip zia ding uh tua bang ahi hi, kong it lawmte aw!
50004002	Euodia le Sintyche-te, Topa sung-ah khat le khat a kilem nadingun ka thum hi.
50004003	Hihi, ka hakkol puakpih muanhuai aw, lungdamna-thu ka genna-a hong panpih hih numeite, Clement le ka naseppihte, nuntakna laibu sunga a min omte khempeuh na huh un.
50004004	Topa sungah lungnuam tawntung un. Kong genkik ding hi: Lungnuam un!
50004005	Mi khempeuh tungah na migitna uh na kitelsak un. Topa hong nai hi.
50004006	Na khatpeuhah lunghimawh in patau kei unla, na khempeuh ah lungdamkohna tawh thuahin, thungetna le ngetna Pasian tungah na tun un.
50004007	Tua hileh theihtelnate khempeuh a khup Pasian lemna in, Khrist Jesu sungah na lungsimte uh le na lungtangte uh hong cing ding hi.
50004008	A nunung penin sanggamte aw, a maan peuhmah, a zahtakhuai peuhmah, a dik peuhmah, a siang peuhmah, a ithuai peuhmah, a pahtakhuai peuhmah, na khatpeuh a hoih pen hi-a, a phattak nak leh tua bang nate na ngaihsun un.
50004009	Kei tung pana na sinsa, na ngahsa, na zaksa uh ahi zongin, kei sunga na muhsate uh ahi zongin na taksuaksak un. Tua hileh lemna Pasian, note tawh a omkhawm ding hi.
50004010	Kei nong deihsakna uh na thak suaksak takpi manun, tu petpetin Topa sungah nakpitakin ka lungnuam hi. Nong lunghimawh takpi uh a, ahi hangin nong lah nading uh hun hoih na nei kei uh hi.
50004011	A piang bangbang ka lungkim nadingin a kisin khinsa ka hi manin, kisapna nei-a hih thu a gen ka hi kei hi.
50004012	Taksap kici bang hi-a, kicing a kici bang hiam cih ka thei hi. Gilkialna hiam gilvahna, zawnna hiam hauhna – omzia namkim ah lungkimna thusim ka sin zo hi.
50004013	Kei thahatna hong pia pa tungtawnin na khempeuh ka hih thei hi.
50004014	Tua hi napi gimna ka thuak laitakin, kei nong thuakpih uh hoih mahmah hi.
50004015	Tua tham loin, no Philippi-te in na theihsa bangun, lungdamna-thu na theih cil lai nite ua, Macedonia pana ka zinkhiat lai-in, piakna le ngahna ah note longal hong huh pawlpi khat beek a om kei hi;
50004016	ahang in, Thessalonica a ka om sung nangawn in, kisapna ka neih ciangin huhna nong khakkhak uh hi.
50004017	Letsong ka zonna hi loin, note hamphat nading ka deihna hizaw hi.
50004018	Ken ka ngah ding zah ka ngah banah a tamzaw nangawn ka ngah zo hi; nong huhna uh kicing khengvala, Epaphroditus nong khak uh letsong zong ka ngah hi. Tuate, Pasian a lungdamsak, biakpiakna santham biakna namtui ahi hi.
50004019	Khrist Jesu sunga hauhna minthang tawh ka Pasian in note kisapna khempeuh hong guan ding hi.
50004020	Eite Pasian le Pa tungah a tawntung in minthanna om den ta hen. Amen.
50004021	Khrist Jesu sunga om mi siangte khempeuh na hopihsak un. Kei tawh a omkhawm i sanggamte in hong hopih uh hi.
50004022	Misiangte khempeuh, a diakdiak in Caesar innkuante in note hong hopih uh hi.
50004023	Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna in note kha hong ompih ta hen. Amen.
51001001	Pasian deihna hanga Khrist Jesu sawltakpi Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in,
51001002	Colosse a, Khrist sunga a siangtho le a muanhuai sanggamte tungah: Eite Pa Pasian tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
51001003	Note ading thu ka nget uh ciangin Pasian, eite Topa Jesu Khrist’ Pa tungah lungdam ka ko tawntung uh hi.
51001004	Bang hang hiam cih leh Khrist Jesu sunga na upna uh le misiangte khempeuh na itna uh ka za zo uh hi.
51001005	Tua upna le itna note adinga vantunga kikoihkholsa tua lametna pana piang hi-a, note tunga hong tung na zaksa uh tua lungdamna-thu – thumaan pen mah ahi hi.
51001006	Tua lungdamna-thu za-in Pasian hehpihna thutak khempeuh ah na theihtel ni-ua kipan note lakah a gah mah bangin, leitung mun khempeuh ah hih lungdamna thu in gah gahin a khang semsem hi.
51001007	Note in ka it uh, ka naseppih uh kote tanga Khrist nasem muanhuai Epaphras tung panin na za uh a,
51001008	amah in Kha sunga note itna zong kote hong hilh hi.
51001009	Hih thu hangin note thu ka zak ni-ua kipan, note ading khalam pilna le theihtelna khempeuh tungtawna, ama deih bang theihna tawh note hong dimsak nadingin Pasian tungah thunget ka tawp kei uh hi.
51001010	Hih banga ka thunget uh Topa adingin note a mannei-in nungta a, lam khempeuh ah amah lungkimsakin, na hoih khempeuh ah gah na gah ding uh, Pasian theihna lamah na khan nading uh,
51001011	le a lianpi sikdona le lungduaina lungnuamtaka ama thahatna minthang tawh kituaka vang liatna khempeuh tawh na thakhauh nading uh ahi hi.
51001012	Khuavak gama misiangte tawh gouluah khawm dingin note hong cingsak pa tungah lungdamna ka ko uh hi.
51001013	Ahang in, amah in khuamial ukna gam pan eite hong hukhia in, a it a Tapa gam sung hong tun zo a,
51001014	eite in ama sungah tatkhiatna le mawhnate maisakna i ngah hi.
51001015	Amah a kimu thei lo Pasian lim hi a, a kipiangsak nate khempeuh tunga a suak masa pen ahi hi.
51001016	Ahang in, na khempeuh ama piansak hi a: vantug le leitunga om nate, muh theih le muh theih lohte, kumpi tokhomte ahi zongin, vangliatna ahi zongin, ukte ahi zongin, thuneite ahi zongin, na khempeuh amah in ama adingin a piansak ahi hi.
51001017	Na khempeuh a om ma-in amah om a, ama sungah na khempeuh a kizom khawm hi.
51001018	Amah tua pumpi – pawlpi lutang ahi hi; na khempeuh ah amah a tung nungpen ahi theih nadingin, amah a kipatcilna le misite pana suak masa pen ahi hi.
51001019	Ahang in, ama sungah Pasian kicinna teng a om nading,
51001020	singlamteh tunga luang sisan tungtawnin kilemna piangsakin, leitunga om nate hitaleh vantunga om nate hitaleh na khempeuh ama tungtawnin amah tawh a kilemkik-sakna in Pasian lungkimna ahi hi.
51001021	Khatvei lai-in Pasian kiang panin gamdang mi na hi uh a, na gitloh gamtatnate uh hangin lungsim-a galte na hi uh hi.
51001022	Ahi hangin tu-in kawkbaanna om loin mawhsakna panin suakta a, ama muhna ah a siangtho-a hong piak theih nadingin Khrist in note ama pumpi-a sihna tawh hong kilemkiksak zo hi.
51001023	Tua pen lungdamna-thu pana piangkhia lametna pan kihei lo-a, kiptakin kilam a, note upna ah na omsuak uh leh cihna ahi hi. Hih lungdamna-thu, van nuai-a nungta khempeuh tungah a kitangko na zaksa uh hi-a, keimah Paul tua lungdamna thu nasempa ka suak zo hi.
51001024	Tu-in note adingin ka thuakna ah ka lung nuama, Khrist thuaknate tawh kisai-a pawlpi ahi ama pumpi hanga a sam lai thuaknate ka ci-le-sa in ka hudim hi.
51001025	Pasian thu a kicingtakin note tungah kong piak nadingin Pasian hong sawlna hangin nasempa ka suak hi.
51001026	Tua thuthuk, akhang akhang khanghunte ah a kiselcip hi-a ahi hangin tu-in misiangte tungah hong kipholak ta hi.
51001027	Pasian in a minthang hih thuthuk hauhnate, Gentile-te lak amau kianga a theisak dinga hong teel ahi hi. Note sunga om Khrist pen tua thuthuk a minthang lametna ahi hi.
51001028	Mi khempeuh Khrist sunga a kicing kim-a ka piak theih nadingun mi khempeuh tungah pilna namkim tawh taihilhin, hilhin amah ka tangko uh hi.
51001029	Tua ngimin kei sunga vangliantaka a sem ama thahatna khempeuh tawh pang tentanin a na ka sem hi.
51002001	No ading le Laodicia a omte ading le ka mel hong mu ngei nai lote adingin bangzahtakin na sem ka hi hiam, cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
51002002	Ka deihna in, amaute lungsungah kihanthawnin itna ah kigawm a, hauhna kicing theihtelna bukim nei-in Pasian thuthuk – tua Khrist a theih theih nading uh ahi hi.
51002003	Ama sungah pilna le theihna goute khempeuh a kisel hi.
51002004	Kuamah in note paulam nei-a kamsiam thu tawh hong khem zawh loh nadingin hih thute kong gen hi.
51002005	Tua hi-a note tawh ka pumpi a om khawm loh hangin note tawh kha-in ka om khawm a, Khrist sunga na upna uh a kipzia le hoihtaka na nuntakzia uh ka muh manin ka nuam hi.
51002006	Tua ahi ciangin Khrist Jesu, Topa a na sansa bang tektekun ama sungah nungta suakin,
51002007	note hong kihilh bangin ama sungah zungkha-in, kilamin upna ah thakhauhin om unla lungdamna tawh kidimlet tawntung un.
51002008	Khrist tunga kingak sangin mihingte tang ngeinate tung le hih leitung thubulte tunga kinga-a a hawmpi le a khem thei thuguizuihna tungtawnin kuamah in sal-a hong mat loh nadingun kikem un.
51002009	Ahang in, Khrist sunga Pasian-hina bucing pumpi nei-in a vekpi in om a,
51002010	vangliatna le thuneihna khempeuh tunga lutang ahipa, Khrist sungah kicinna note hong kipia hi.
51002011	Note zong mawhdim pianngei suahkhia-in ama sungah vunat na hi uh a, mihing khut-a at hilo Khrist hong at, vunatsa na hi uh hi.
51002012	Baptisena sungah amah tawh na kivui khawm uh a, amah misi pana a thosak Pasian vangliatna ah upna tungtawnin amah tawh na thokhawm zo uh hi.
51002013	Note na mawhnate uh le na mawh dim pianngei vunat lohna sung uhah na sih laitakun Pasian in note Khrist tawh hong nungta khawmsak hi. Amah in i mawhnate khempeuh hong maisaka,
51002014	eite langa pang eite hong do, a kigelhsa ngeina-bucing le a zuih ding ngeinate phiat-a, singlamteh ah kilhin a lakhiamang hi.
51002015	A vangliatnate le a thuneihnate suahkhiatsakin, singlamteh tawh tuate tungah gualzo-a, amah in tuate mipi muhnop a suaksak hi.
51002016	Tua ahi manin annek tuidawn ahi a, biakna pawikham ni, Kha Det pawi ahikeh Sabbath ni tawh kisai-in note tungah kuamah thu na khensak kei un.
51002017	Hihte in hong tung ding nate liim ahi hi; a taktak pen ahileh Khrist sungah a om hi.
51002018	Kiniam khiatna man lo le vansawltakte biakna a pakta mi khatpeuh, tua pah takman ngah zo lo dingin kibawlsak kei un. Tua bang mite in a muhsa uh thute a neng a tawngin gen a, ama khami lo lungsim in thadah ngaihsutnate tawh amah a kisatheisak hi.
51002019	Amah in, sazang le thagui-in vaka kizomkhawmsakin Pasian in a khansak banga a khang pumpi buppi pan, Lutang tawh a kizopna pa a mansuah hi.
51002020	Note in hih leitunga ngeina bulpite Khrist tawh na sihsan nungsangun, bang hangin hih leitung aa ahi lai banga, hih ngeinate:
51002021	"Len kei in! Ciam kei in! Lawng kei in!” a cihte nuai-a kipia lai na hi uh hiam?
51002022	Hihte khempeuh zatna tawh, leitung mite thupiakte le hilhnate kibulphuh ahi manin a kisia khin dinga laitansa ahi hi.
51002023	Tua bang ngeinate, amau bawltawm biakna, amau kiniamkhiatna man lo pumpi bawlsiatnate pilna takpi tawh kibang napi ci-le-sa deihluatna-a bualna kham nadingin kimanna taktak a nei kei hi.
51003001	Tua ahi ciangin, note Khrist tawh thokhawm khin na hi nungsang un Pasian taklama a om Khrist tutna mun, tunglam nate ah na lungsim uh na nga un.
51003002	Na lungsimte uh, leitung nate ahi lo tunglam nate tungah na nga un.
51003003	Ahang in, note na si zo uh a, tu-in na nuntakna uh, Khrist tawh Pasian sungah a kisel zo hi.
51003004	Note nuntakna ahi Khrist hong kilat ciangin note zong ama minthanna tawh na kilangkhawm ding uh hi.
51003005	Tua ahi manin na leitung pianngei uh ahi: numei-pasal paktatna siantholohna, kilunggulhluatna, gitlohnate le milim biakna ahi huaihamna na sisak un.
51003006	Hihte hangin Pasian thangpaihna hong tung ding hi.
51003007	Khatvei lai-in hih bang nuntakna tawh na nungta uh hi.
51003008	Ahi hangin tu-in ahileh tua nate khempeuh: hehna, ngonghehna, etsatna, gendaihatna le a kihhuai kampau, na muk panun na paikhia pelmawh un.
51003009	Na milui hinna uh le na gamtatna teng uh na suahkhiat khit nungsangun khat le khat na kikhem kei un.
51003010	A piangsak-Pa lim sunin theihna lama a kibawlthak mithak na silh un.
51003011	Hih thu ah Greek mi, Jew mi, vunat, vunat lo, mi melmawl, Scythia mi, sila, sila lo, a om kei hi; ahi hangin Khrist, na khempeuh hi-a, na khempeuh sungah a om hi.
51003012	Tua ahi manin note, Pasian teelsa a siangtho le a ithuai mi na hi bangun no le no in, kikhuatuahna, migitna, kiniam khiatna lungnemna le thuakzawhna na silh un.
51003013	Khat le khat kilungnoplohna na neih uh ciangin kithuak zo un. Topa in note hong maisak bangin na kimaisak tek un.
51003014	Hih a hoih pente khempeuh tungah, tuate khempeuh kicingtakin khata henkhawm itna na silhthuah un.
51003015	Pum khat a suak dingin lemna ah hong sap nungsangin na lungtangte uh Khrist lemna na uksak un. Na lungdam un.
51003016	Pilna khempeuh tawh note khat le khat kihilhin kithuhilh unla, na sunguah lungdamna tawh Phatna-late, biakna late le khalam-late Pasian tungah na sak kawmun na lungsim sunguhah Khrist thu na tengsak phitphet un.
51003017	Tua ciangin na hih peuhpeuh uh thu-in ahi-a, sepna-in ahi zongin Pa Pasian tungah ama tungtawnin lungdam na ko unla, Topa Jesu minin tuate na hih un.
51003018	Zite aw, Topa sungah a kilawm bangin na pasalte uh tungah na ki-ap un.
51003019	Pasalte aw, na zite uh it unla, amau tungah na ngongtat kei un.
51003020	Tate aw, na khempeuh ah na nu na pa-te uh thu na mang un, hih in Topa a lungkimsak hi.
51003021	Pate aw, na tate uh hehsak kei un, tua hi kei leh lungkia kha ding uh hi.
51003022	Silate aw, na khempeuh ah na leitung pute uh thu na mang un; amaute hong muh laitak le amau hong angvan nading deihna hi loin lungsim cihtakna le Topa zahtakna tawh na sem un.
51003023	Na khat peuhpeuh na hih uh ciangin mihing nasem bang hi lo, Topa nasem bangin na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh sem un.
51003024	Topa tung pan pahtakmanin gouluahna na ngah ding uh hi, cih na thei uh hi. A na nasep uh Topa Khrist ahi hi.
51003025	Khialhna a bawl mi peuhmah, angvantuamna om loin a khialhna man kipia kik ding hi.
51004001	Pute aw, note in zong vantung ah pu khat na neih lam uh phawk kawmin na nasemte uh a kilawm a kituak in vak un.
51004002	Lungdamtak le kikem gige kawmin thunget na hahkat un.
51004003	Tua ciangin sikkhainiang buna ka omna, Khrist thuthukte ka tangko theih nadingin kote ading zong thu na ngetsak un.
51004004	Ka tangko ding banga siangtaka ka tangko theih nadingin thu na ngetsak un.
51004005	A pualam mite tungah na gamtatzia uh na pilvang un; hun khempeuh a hoih penpenin zang un. _
51004006	Mi khatpeuh na dawn nading zia uh na theih nadingun, mi tawh na kihona uah hehpihna tawh kidim, ci sawhsa hi tawntung hen.
51004007	Tychicus in kei tunga thuthakte khempeuh hong gen ding hi. Amah i it sanggampa, nasem muanhuai le Topa sunga i naseppih khat ahi hi.
51004008	Kote omzia na theih theih nadingun hong gen ding le na lungsim uh hong hanthawn thei dingin amah note kiangah kong sawl hi.
51004009	Note lakah khat, a muanhuai, i it sanggampa Onesimus tawh hong ton uh hi. Amaute in hih lai-a thupiang khempeuh hong gen ding uh hi.
51004010	Barnabas tupa Mark hong hopih bangin ka thong kiatpih Aristarchus in zong hong hopih hi. (A thu kong gen na zaksa uh ahi hi; amah hong pai leh na muak un,)
51004011	Justus kici Jesu in zong hong hopih hi. Pasian gam adinga ka naseppih Jew mi om sun, hihte hi-a, amaute kei kihehnepna ahi uh hi.
51004012	Note lakah Khrist Jesu nasem khat ahi Epaphras in hong hopih hi. Amah in note, Pasian deihna khempeuh ah na dinkip nadingun, na picin nading uh le kitelcianna ciantak na neih nading-un nakpi-in thu a ngen den hi.
51004013	Note ading le, Laodicea le Hierpolis a omte adingin nakpi-in a sepna ka theihpih hi.
51004014	I lawm it siavuanpa Luke le Demas in hong hopih uh hi.
51004015	Laodicea a om sanggamte le Nympha le tuanu inn a pawlpi na hopihsak un.
51004016	Hih laikhak no kiangah a kisim khit ciangin Laodicea mi pawlpi ah zong na simsak unla, Laodicea pana laikhak zong na sim leuleu un.
51004017	Archippus kiangah, “Topa sunga na ngahsa nasep zosiang in,” ci-in na gen un.
51004018	Keimah Paul in hih hopihna laite keima khuta ka gelh ahi hi. Ka sik khainiangte na phawk un. Note tawh hehpihna om ta hen.
52001001	Paul, Silas le Timothy in, Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist sunga om Thessalonica Pawlpi tungah: Hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
52001002	Kote thungetna sungah na min uh loin note khempeuh hangin lungdam ka ko tawntung uh hi.
52001003	Kote in, upna in a gahsak na sepna uh itna in a sepsak na nasep gimna uh le i Topa Jesu Khrist sunga lametna in a guat na thuak zawhnate uh Pa Pasian mai ah ka na phawk den uh hi.
52001004	Pasian hong it sanggamte aw, amah in note hong teelsa ahilam ka thei uh hi;
52001005	bang hang hiam cih leh kote gen lungdamna-thu, a thu bekin hong tung loin vangliatna, Khasiangtho le kitheih telsakna thukpi tawh no tungah hong tung hi. Note adingin no laka ka nuntak zia uh na thei uh hi.
52001006	Kote le Topa etteh-a gamtate na suak uh a, nakpitakin thuak napi Khasiangtho hong piak lungnopna tawh tua thupuak na sang uh hi.
52001007	Tua hi-a Macedonia le Achaia a thu-umte khempeuh adingin etteh na suak uh hi.
52001008	Macedonia le Achaia bek hi lo, note tung panin Topa thupuak kithangkhia ta a, Pasian na upna uh mun khempeuh ah kithei zo hi. Tua ahi manin tua thu kong gen uh a kul nawn kei hi.
52001009	Ahang in, amaute mah in kote nong sanna zia uh hong zasak sawn uh hi. Milimte na biakna uh pan, a nungta a maan Pasian nasem dingin Pasian lama na kihei zia uh le
52001010	misi pana a thawhsak pa, hong tung ding thangpaihna pana eite hong suaktasak ding pa a Tapa Jesu vantung pana hong pai ding ngaka na om zia uh amaute in hong ko uh hi.
52002001	Sanggamte aw, no kianga kong hawhna uh, a guaksuak loh lam na thei uh hi.
52002002	Na theihsa bangun tunung in Philippi ah hong kiselphona ka thuak uh a, langbawlna khauhtak om napi, i Pasian huhna tawh ama lungdamna-thu no tungah ka gen ngam uh hi.
52002003	Ahang in, kote hong ngetna pen zuauthu le ngimna siang lo pan hi loin, khembawla zol hong sawm zong ka hi kei uh hi.
52002004	Tua sangsikin Pasian in lungdamna-thu kem dinga a sansa mite bangin ka gen uh hi. Kote in mihing lungkimsak sawm loin kote lungtang hong entel pa Pasian lungkimsak ka sawmzaw uh hi.
52002005	Kote in mi maitang phatna ahi zongin, huaihamna selna in maikhuhna ahi zongin ka zat ngei loh lam uh nong thei uh a, hong theihpih Pasian ahi hi.
52002006	Kote in, note le mi khatpeuh pan mihing phat ding ka zong kei uh hi. Khrist sawltakpi ka hi mah bangun note adingin vangik a suak thei ding mah ka hi uh hi.
52002007	Ahi hangin nu in taneute a khoi bangin note lakah kong lungnem uh hi.
52002008	Note hong it lua ka hi manun, no tungah Pasian lungdamna-thu bek hi lo, ka nuntakna nangawn uh zong kong hawm nuam uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note, kote it mahmah na suak uh hi.
52002009	Sanggamte aw, ka haksatna uh le ka nasep gimnate uh na thei lai takpi uh hi. Note kiangah Pasian lungdamna-thu ka hilh laitakun mi khatpeuh vangik ka suah loh nadingun sun le zanin na ka sem uh hi.
52002010	Thu um mite note lakah bangzah-a siangtho, thumaan le kawkbaang lo ka hi uh cih, note le Pasian ka tecite na hi uh hi.
52002011	Ahang in, pa in a tate a bawl bangin note kong bawl kim lam uh na thei uh hi;
52002012	ama gam le a minthanna sunga hong sampa Pasian tawh kilawma nungta dingin note kong hanthawn uh a, hong hehnem in kong kun uh hi.
52002013	Kote pana na zaksa uh Pasian thu na ngah uh ciangin, mihing thu bangin sang loin Pasian thu a hinatak bangin na sangpah uh a, tua thu in a um note sungah na sem ahi manin Pasian tungah ka lungdam tawntung uh hi.
52002014	Ahang in, no ka sanggamte aw, Khrist Jesu sunga om, Judea gam sunga Pasian pawlpite etteh-a gamtate na suak uh hi. Tua pawlpite in Jew-te khut a thuak uh bangin note in zong nomau gam mite khut na thuak uh hi.
52002015	Tua Jew mite in Topa Jesu le kamsangte that uh a, kote zong hong hawlkhia uh hi. Amaute in Pasian lungkimsak lo uh a mite khempeuh langah pangin,
52002016	Gentile-te a kihotkhiat theih nadingin amaute kianga thu ka hilh ding uh hong kham uh hi. Hih bangin a hih theih zahzah un mawhnate in amaute a kivuk uh hi. A tawpna ah amau tungah Pasian thangpaihna a tung petmah hi.
52002017	Ahi hangin sanggamte aw, tomvei sung note tawh hong kikhen ciangin (ngaihsutna hi lo, pumpi in) naseppih uh; adang khutgelhte ah ka sanggampa uh le Pasian’ nasem note kong ngaih luat manun, muh teitei kong sawm uh hi.
52002018	Ahang in, no kianga pai ding ka ut mahmah uh a, keimah Paul mahmah in .ka sawm thithe hangin Satan in hong khaktan hi.
52002019	Ahang in, eite Topa Jesu Khrist hong pai cianga ama mai-a ka minthanpih dingua ka lamet uh, ka lungnopna uh, ka pahtakna lukhu ding uh bang ahi hiam? Note hi lo na hi uh hiam?
52002020	Hi lua hi, note ka minthanna uh le ka lungnopna uh na hi uh hi.
52003001	Tua ciangin ka thuak zawh nawn het loh uh ciangin Athen ah ko kia hong kinusiat ding a hoih pen dingin ka ngaihsun uh hi.
52003002	Na upna uh hong thakhauhsak ding le hong hanthawn dingin Khrist lungdamna-thu zelhsakna ah Pasian na i seppih, i sanggampa Timothy kong sawl uh hi.
52003003	Tua in hih zia-etnate hanga kuamah a linglawn loh ding deihna ahi hi. Kote zia-etna thuak dinga laitansa ka hilam uh na theih luatsa uh ahi hi.
52003004	A taktakin no tawh i omkhawm lai-in kote hong kibawlsiat ding kong gengen zo uh hi. Na theih khitsa bangun a piang petmah hi.
52003005	Hih thu hangin ka thuak zawh nawn loh ciangin note upna thu kan dingin kong sawl hi. Mikhempa in bang lam hiam khatin hong khema, ka nasepna uh a mawkna a suah khak ding ka lauthawng hi.
52003006	Ahi hangin tumah in no kiang pan Timothy hong tung khinphet hi-a note upna itna le lungdamna thuthak hong puak hi. Amah in ko kiangah a lungdamhuai nong phawk tawntungna uh le kote no tawh i kimuh ding ka ut bang tektek un kote nong muhnopnate uh hong gen hi.
52003007	Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, kote ka lungdonna uh le hong kibawlsiatna khempeuh ah note upna thu in hong hanthawn hi.
52003008	Ahang in, tu-in Topa sungah kiptaka na din khit manun ka nungta takpi ta uh hi.
52003009	Pasian mai-ah note hanga ka lungnopna khempeuh uh thuk kik nadingin Pasian tungah bangci in a kicing lungdamna a kimin ko kik thei ding ka hi uh hiam?
52003010	Note tawh kimu kika na upna uh a kisam laite kong huh theih nadingun sun le zanin hahkat theih tawpin hahkatin thu ka ngen uh hi.
52003011	Tu-in Pasian le Pa mahmah le i Topa Jesu in no kianga kong hawh theih nading uh lampi hong honsak ta hen.
52003012	No kong itna uh a khan semsem bangin note khat-le-khat le midang khatpeuh na itna uh Pasian in khangsak in dimletsak ta hen.
52003013	I Topa Jesu a misiangthote khempeuh tawh hong pai ciangin eite Pasian le Pa mai-ah siangtho-a kawkbaanna a om loh nadingin amah in na lungtang uh hong thakhauhsak ta hen.
52004001	A nunung penin sanggamte aw, Pasian na lungkimsak nadingun tu a na nuntaksa bangua na nuntak nadingun lam kong lak uh hi. Tu-in note, a tam semsem a sem dingin Topa Jesu sungah ngenin kong kun uh hi.
52004002	Topa Jesu thu neihna tawh lamlahna kong piakte uh na thei uh hi.
52004003	Pasian deihna ahi: na siantho ding uh, numei pasal paktatna na pelh ding uh,
52004004	a kuamah peuh in ama – pumpi siangtho-in a pahtawihuai-a, a uk tek ding a kisin ding uh;
52004005	Pasian a thei lo lawkite banga numei pasal kilunggulhluatna neih loh ding;
52004006	hih thu-ah kuamah in a sanggam tungah khialin ama tungah hamphatna zong kei hen. Kote in kong vauhilhsa uh le kong gensa bangun hih mawhnate khempeuh hangin Topa in mihingte a gawt ding hi.
52004007	Ahang in, Pasian in a nina nungta dingin hong sam lo-a, a siangtho-a nungta dingin hong samzaw hi.
52004008	Tua ahi manin hih lamlahna a nialte, mihing nial hi loin note ama Khasiangtho hong pia Pasian nial ahi hi.
52004009	Sanggam ki-itna thu tawh kisai ahileh nomau mahmah khat le khat na ki-it ding uh Pasian in hong hilhsa ahi manin lai-a kong gelh ding uh a kisam kei hi.
52004010	Tua hi-a Macedonia gam khempeuh a sanggamte na it takpi uh hi. Tua hi khin napi sanggamte aw, na it semsem ding uh kong kun lai uh hi.
52004011	Kong gensa bang tektekun daitakin nungta hithiat a, nomau nasep mah semin nomau khut mah tawh na sep ding na tum pen un.
52004012	Tua pen a pualam mite in na nisim nuntakna uh a zahtak theih nading uh le kuama tunga kingasawn na hi loh nading uh ahi hi.
52004013	Sanggamte aw, a ihmusa mite thu thei lo-a na om ding uh le lametna a nei lo midangte dah banga na dah ding uh ka deih kei uh hi.
52004014	Eite in Jesu si a, tho kik zo hi, ci-in i um hi. Tua ahi ciangin ama sunga a ihmu khinsate Pasian in Jesu tawh hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.
52004015	Topa hong pai dong a om lai-a a nungta lai eite, a ihmusate sangin i masazaw peuhmah kei ding cih Topa kammal tawh kituakin note kong hilh uh hi.
52004016	Ahang in, Topa mahmah vantung panin, a ngaih mahmah thupiakna tawh, vansawltak lian aw le Pasian sapna pengkul ging tawh hong kumsuk dinga, tua ciangin Khrist sunga a sisate tho masa ding uh hi.
52004017	Tua khit ciangin a om lai a nungta lai-a om eite, huih lakah Topa dawn dingin amaute tawh meii lakah hong kilato khawm ding hi. Tua tak ciangin Topa tawh i om khawm tawntung ding hi.
52004018	Tua ahi manin hih thute in na kihanthawn ciat un.
52005001	Sanggamte aw, tu-in a ni le a hun thu kong gelh ding uh kisam lo hi.
52005002	Ahang in, zana guta bangin Topa ni, hong tung ding cih teltaka na theihsa uh ahi hi.
52005003	Mite in, “Lemna le muanna” a cih laitakun, naupaii numei, nausuahnat in a tut bangin amau tungah thakhatin siatna tung dinga, amaute a suakta kei ding uh hi.
52005004	Ahi hangin sanggamte aw, no na hi uh leh guta in a phawn banga, hih ni in hong phawn dingin khuamial laka om na hi kei uh hi.
52005005	Note na vekpi-un tua khuavak tapate le sunlai tapate na hi uh hi. Eite tua zan ahikeh tua khuamial aa i hi kei hi.
52005006	Tua ahitak ciangin a ihmu midangte tawh kibang loin a kigingsa le ei le ei ki-uk zo-in om ni.
52005007	Ahang in, a ihmute zanin ihmu a, zukhamte in zanin a kham uh hi.
52005008	Ahi hangin eite sunlai aa i hi nungsangin eimah le eimah ki-uk zoin, upna le itna awmdal in bulhin, lametna sik lukhu in hotkhiatna khu ni.
52005009	Ahang in, Pasian in eite ama thangpaihna thuak dingin hong seh lo a, ahi hangin i Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin hotkhiatna ngah dinga hong seh ahi hi.
52005010	Eite i ihmu zongin i hak zongin amah tawh i nuntak khawm theih nadingin eite adingin amah a si hi.
52005011	Tua ahi manin tu-a na hihsa bangun khat le khat kihanthawnin na kikhantohpih ciat un.
52005012	Tu-in sanggamte aw, note lakah nasep hahkatte, Topa sunga no hong ukte le no hong thuhilhte na zahtak ding uh kong sawl uh hi.
52005013	Amau nasepna hangin itna tawh a sangpenin na koih un. Khat le khat na kilem un.
52005014	Sanggamte aw, a thadahte vauhilh ding, a zahkaite hansuah ding, a thanemte huh ding le mi khempeuh tunga lungduai dingin kong kun uh hi.
52005015	Kuamah in khialhna, khialhna-in thuk kik loin note khat le khat ahi zongin, mi khempeuh tungah ahi zongin migit na sawm tawntung un.
52005016	Na lungnuam tawntung un;
52005017	thu na ngen den un;
52005018	hih in Khrist Jesu sungah note ading Pasian deihna ahi manin a piang khempeuh ah lungdam na ko un.
52005019	Tua Kha’ meikuang na mitsak kei un;
52005020	genkholhna thute na simmawhbawl kei un.
52005021	Na khempeuh sittel un. A hoihte kiplet un.
52005022	Siatna namte peuhmah na peel un.
52005023	Pasian mahmah, lemna Pasian in note hong siangthosak sinsen ta hen. Eite Topa Jesu Khrist hong pai cianga kawkbaanna a om lo dingin na kha, na lungsim le na pumpite uh a bupin hong kepsak ta hen.
52005024	Note hong sampa a muanhuai hi; amah in tuate a hih ding hi.
52005025	Sanggamte aw, kote ading thu na ngetsak un.
52005026	Kinapna siangtho tawh sanggamte khempeuh na kihopih un.
52005027	Hih laikhak sanggamte khempeuh tungah na sim nading uh Topa mai-ah thu kong pia hi.
52005028	Eite Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna note tawh om ta hen.
53001001	Paul, Silas le Timothy in, Eite Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist sunga om Thessalonica pawlpi tungah:
53001002	Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
53001003	Note hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh den ding uh kilawm hi. Sanggamte aw, amantakpi mah ahi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh na upna uh khangto semsem a, note khempeuh khat le khat na ki-itna uh a khangkhang hi.
53001004	Tua ahi manin bawlsiatnate le zia-etnate na thuakna uhah na sikdona uh le na upna uh Pasian pawlpite lakah ka kisialhpih uh hi.
53001005	Hihte khempeuh Pasian thukhenna man hi, cih a kilatna hi-a hih thu tawh kizui-in Pasian-gam adinga a santham ding na hina uh hanga a thuak na hi uh hi.
53001006	Pasian thutang hi; no hong buaisakte amah in buaisak dinga,
53001007	hong kibuaisak note buaina hong vengsakin, kote aa zong hong vengsak ding hi. Topa Jesu ama vansawltak vangliante tawh vantung pan meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin hih thu a piang ding hi.
53001008	Amah in Pasian a thei lote le i Topa Jesu lungdamna-thu a mang lote a gawt ding hi.
53001009	Topa ompihna pan le a vangliatna thupina panin amaute kikhenkhia dinga, tawntung siatna-in kigawt ding hi.
53001010	Amah hong pai ni-in a misiangthote sungah kiminthangsak dinga amah a um mite khempeuh lakah piandang a kisa ding hi. Note kianga ka teci panna uh na upna un note zong a umte lakah hong kihelsak hi.
53001011	Hihte khempeuh phawk kawmin i Pasian in hong sapna tawh kilawm hong sak theih nading le na tup uh a hoih peuhmah le na upna uh hanga piang nasep khempeuh, ama vangliatna tawh a tangtunsak nadingin note ading thu ka ngen niloh uh hi.
53001012	Eite Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna tawh kizui-in, note sungah i Topa Jesu min a kithansak nading le ama sungah note hong min thansak nadingin hih bangin thu ka ngen uh hi.
53002001	Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesu Khrist hong pai nading le ama kianga eite hong khop nading tawh kisai-in
53002002	Topa ni hong tung khin zo hi, ci-a a kigenkholhna pawlkhat ahi zongin, thu kigensawn ahikeh ko kiang pan hi a kici laikhakte hang ahi zongin, na linglawng, na patuah loh nadingun kong thum hi.
53002003	Lam khat peuhpeuh ah kuamah na kikhemsak kei un, ahang in, lehdona piangin, siatna-a kisehsa thukham palsatna mipa hong kilak mateng in tua ni hong tung lo ding hi.
53002004	Amah in Pasian a kici na khempeuh ahikeh a kibia khempeuh langdo dinga, Pasian biakinnpi sungah kikoihin, amah le amah kitawisangin amah le amah Pasian kici-in a kitangko hi.
53002005	Note tawh i omkhawm lai-a kong gen zel hih thute phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
53002006	A hun liana, a kilaak theih nadingin amah bang in dal hiam, cih tu-in na thei uh hi.
53002007	Ahang in, thukham neihlohna in a simtham-a a neih vangliatna in a nasep pan zo hi; ahi hangin tu-a amah a dalpa a kilakkhiat masiah amah in tua bangin a kham lailai ding hi.
53002008	Tua tak ciangin thukham nei lo pa hong kilang dinga, Topa Jesu in a kam pana a hu tawh amah zothal-in ama hong paina a thupina in amah a susia ding hi.
53002009	Thukham nei lo pa hong paina ahileh nalamdang, lim le a lamdang khemte tawh a kilak Satan nasepna tawh kizui hi-a,
53002010	a mangthang dingte a khem gitlohna namkimin hong pai ding hi. Amaute in thutak it ding le a kihotkhiat ding a nial manun a mangthang uh hi.
53002011	Hih thu hangin amaute in zuauthu a up nadingun Pasian in a vanglian lam pialsakna a puak hi,
53002012	tua in, thutak um lo a, gitlohna nuam a sate khempeuh a mawhpaih nading ahi hi.
53002013	Ahi hangin Topa in hong it sanggamte aw, a cilin Pasian in Kha siansuahna nasepna tungtawn le thutak upna tungtawna hotkhiat nadingin note hong teel manin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh den ding mah uh ahi hi.
53002014	I Topa Jesu Khrist minthanna na ngah theih nadingun amah in note, hih ka gen uh lungdamna-thu tungtawnin hong sam zo hi.
53002015	Tua ahitak ciangin sanggamte aw, kammal tawh ahi zongin, laikhak tawh ahi zongin no tunga kong puaksawn uh thuhilhnate lenin kiptakin ding un.
53002016	Eite hong itin ama hehpihna hanga tawntung hanthawnna le lametna pha hong pia i Topa Jesu Khrist mahmah le i Pa Pasian in,
53002017	na lungtang uh hong hanthawnin a hoih na gamtatnate uh le a hoih na pauna tenguhah hong tha khauhsak ta hen.
53003001	A nunung penin sanggamte aw, note laka ahi khinsa bang tektek in, Topa thupuak a manlangin kizel a, a kipahtawi theih nadingin kote ading thu na ngetsak un.
53003002	Mi khempeuh in upna nei kim lo ahi manin, a gilo a tatkhelte pan hong kihut theih nadingin thu na ngetsak un.
53003003	Ahi hangin Topa a muanhuai hi, na tha uh hong khauhsak dinga, gilopa panin hong hu ding hi.
53003004	Kong thupiakte uh na zui uh a, a zui lai dingin Topa sungah kong muang uh hi.
53003005	Pasian itna sung le Khrist thuakzawhna sungah a tung dingin Topa in lam hong lak ta hen.
53003006	Sanggamte aw, a thadahte le ko tung pana na ngah uh thuhilhna tawh kituaka nungta lo sanggamte peuhmah tawh na kithuah kei un, ci-in Topa Jesu Khrist minin thu kong pia uh hi.
53003007	Ahang in, kote etteh a nong neih ding uh ahi zia, no mahmah in na thei uh hi. No tawh ka om khawm lai-un ka thadah kei uh a,
53003008	a man piak lohin kuama an ka ne kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin, note khatpeuh adingin vangik ka suah loh nadingun gim pipi tawl pipi-in sun le zanin na ka sem uh hi.
53003009	Kote in hih banga ka hih uh ciangin, huhna ngah dinga thuneihna ka neih loh man uh hi loin ko le ko mahmah na zuih ding uh limlak ka suah nadingun ka sep uh hizaw hi.
53003010	Ahang in, no tawh ka omkhawm nangawnun zong: “Mi khat in na a sep kei leh an ne kei hen,” ci-in zuihtawm ngeina kong pia uh hi.
53003011	Note lakah pawlkhat thadah ci-in ka za uh hi. Amaute nasemin mahlah lo uh a, midangte thu va kumin a manlah uh hi.
53003012	Tua bang mite in na khatpeuh semin amau nektawm ding beek a thalawh nadingun Topa Jesu Khrist sungah thu pia-in ka kun uh hi.
53003013	Sanggamte aw, note na hi uh leh amaan note nasepna na cimtak ngei kei un.
53003014	Mi khatpeuh in hi lai sunga kong lah bangun a man nop kei leh amah na tuam ciamteh un. A maizum theih nadingin amah tawh na kikhawl kei un.
53003015	Ahi ta zongin na galbawl kei unla, sanggam bangin na vauhilh un.
53003016	Lemna Topa mahmah in, hun khempeuh a, lam khempeuh ah lungmuanna hong pia ta hen. Note khempeuh tawh Topa hong om khawm ta hen.
53003017	Keimah Paul in, hih hopihnate ka khutin ka gelh hi-a, ka laikhak khempeuh sungah ciamtehna tuam a suak hi. Hih in ka gelhzia ahi hi.
53003018	Eite Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna note khempeuh tawh om ta hen.
54001001	Eite Honpa Pasian le i lamet Khrist Jesu thupiakna hangin Khrist Jesu sawktakpi keimah Paul in,
54001002	Upna sunga ka tapa taktak Timothy tungah: Pa Pasian le i Topa Khrist Jesu tung pana hehpihna, lainatna le lemna om ta hen.
54001003	Macedonia ah ka pai lai-a kong kut bangin Ephesus mah ah na tam lai in. Tua pen mi pawlkhat in thu upna maan lo hilh nawn lo a,
54001004	tangthu phuahtawm le a bei thei lo khang ciamtehna peuh kana, a kipumpiak nawn loh nadingun thu na piak theih nading ahi hi. Hihte in upna hanga piang Pasian nasepna sangin kinialna a piangsak zaw hi.
54001005	Hih thupiakna ngim kung in, lungsim siangtho, eima kitheihna hoih le upna taktak pana piang itna ahi hi.
54001006	Mi pawlkhatte, hihte panin gamlapi gam mang zo uh a, a khiatna nei lo holimna ah a pial uh hi.
54001007	Thukham sia suak nuam uh a, ahi hangin a thugen uh a theih loh banuah hi taktak sa-a, kipsana a gente uh zong bang hiam cih a thei kei uh hi.
54001008	Mi khat in thukham ahi banga a zat nak leh hoih hi, cih i thei hi.
54001009	Eite theihna ah thukhama pen mi hoihte adinga kibawl hi loin; thukham palsatte, a langdote, a pasian-milote le mawhdimte, a siangtho lote le biakna nei lote; a nu a pa a thatte, tualthatte,
54001010	angkawmte le a lehtatte, sila zuaka summet bawlte le zuautheite, zuauthu-a a kiciamte le thu-up maantak tawh kilehbulh peuhmahte adinga kibawl hizaw a,
54001011	tua thu-up maantak pen, amah in kei hong kepsak thupha Pasian aa ahi, a minthang lungdamna-thu tawh kituak ahi hi.
54001012	Muanhuai hong sa a, ama nasem dinga hong koih, tha hong guan i Topa Khrist Jesu tungah ka lungdam hi.
54001013	Khatvei lai-in Pasian daisakpa, mi bawlsiapa, a ngongtatpa ka hi napi in, theihlah man le uplah mana gamta ka hi manin lainatna kei hong kipia hi.
54001014	Khrist Jesu sunga om upna le itna zui-in i Topa hehpihna a dimletin kei tungah hong kisungkhia hi.
54001015	Hih lai-ah a bupa santham thugen muanhuai khat om a, tua in: mawhneite hon dingin Khrist Jesu leitungah hong pai hi, ci hi. Tua mawhneite lakah kei a sia pen ka hi hi.
54001016	Ahi hangin tua thu hang tektekin Khrist Jesu in, amah um a, nuntak tawntungna a sang dingte etteh dingin mawhneite khempeuh laka a sia pen keima tungah a bei thei lo ama lungduaina a latsak theih nadingin lainatna kei hong kilak zo hi.
54001017	Tu-in tawntung Kumpipa, a si thei lo, a kimu thei lo, amah bek Pasian tungah, a tawntungin pahtawina le minthanna om den ta hen.
54001018	Ka tapa Timothy aw, nang thu tawh kisai, khatvei lai-a genkholhnate tawh kituakin hih lamlahnate kong pia hi. Tua lamlahnate zui-a, upna le lungsim kitheihna hoih lenin galdona hoih na do theih nading ahi hi.
54001019	Mi pawlkhat in hihte nolh uh a, a upna uh a siasak ngi-ingei uh hi.
54001020	Amaute lakah, Pasian a gendai loh nadingun a kihilh dinga Satan tunga ka ap Hymenaeus le Alexander zong a kihel uh hi.
54002001	Tua ciangin, a masa penin mi khempeuh ading ngetnate, thungetnate ngetsakna le lungdamkohnate nei dingin kong kun hi.
54002002	Tua pen eite i pasian-mina le sianthona ah lungmuang tak le kilemtaka i nuntak theih nadingin, kumpite le thuneite khempeuh ading thungen ding cihna ahi hi.
54002003	Hih in hoih a, eite Honpa Pasian a lungkimsak hi.
54002004	Amah, mi khempeuh a kihotkhiat ding le thutak a theih ding uh a deih pa ahi hi.
54002005	Ahang in, Pasian khat om a, Pasian le mite kikalah palai khat omin tua mipa Khrist Jesu ahi hi.
54002006	Mi khempeuh tat nadingin amah kipia a, tua teci panna thu a hun lianin kipia hi.
54002007	Tua hi-a hih thu ah kei tangko pa le sawltakpi-in hong kiseh hi; ka zuau hi loin ka takpi hi-a, Gentile-te tungah upna mantak a hilh dingin sia in hong kiseh hi.
54002008	Mun khempeuh ah pasal khempeuh in hehna le kitotna om loin a khut siangthote uh lamto a thu a nget ding uh ka deih hi.
54002009	Numeite zong a zahtak baang dingin, a kilawm a kituaka a kizep ding uh ka deih hi. Samphek ahi zongin, kham, kep manpha le puan mantamte tawh hi loin,
54002010	Pasian bia numeite adinga kilawm ciang gamtat hoih tawh a kizep ding uh hizaw hi.
54002011	Numei in dai hithiat in, kiniamkhiatna kim tawh sin ta hen.
54002012	Numei in pasal tungah thu a hilh ding ahikeh thu a neih ding ka phal kei hi; amah a sip dide kul hi.
54002013	Ahang in, Adam kibawl masa a, tua ciangin Eve kibawl hi.
54002014	A kikhem zo pen Adam ahi kei hi; a kikhem zo pen tua numei hi-a mawhnei a suak hi.
54002015	Ahi hangin numeite in a kilawm a kituakin upna, itna le siangthona a neih suak nak uh leh nausuahna tungtawnin kihonkhia ding hi.
54003001	Hih lai-ah thugen muantak khat a om hi: Mi khatpeuh in saptuam kem suah ding a ut leh nasep thupi sem nuam ahi hi.
54003002	Saptuam kem ahileh: ngawh bei, zi khat bek a nei, a kidaam thei, amah ki-uk zo, a zahtak baang, zindo a siam, a hilh thei,
54003003	lenggahzu a kham lo, a ngongtat lo, a lungnem, kitot a hat lo, sum iplah lo hi pelmawh ding hi.
54003004	Ama innkuan sung ukzo a a tate in zahtakna takpi tawh a thu a mante hi pelmawh ding hi.
54003005	(Mi khatpeuh in ama innkuan sung a uk nading zia a theih kei leh Pasian pawlpi bangci kep thei ding ahi hiam?)
54003006	A piangthak tung hi lo ding hi. Tua hi kei leh kimisak dinga, dawimangpa thuak bang thukhenna a thuak kha ding hi.
54003007	A maimawl loh nading le dawimangpa thanga a awk loh nadingin pualam mite in hoihtaka a zahtak hi pelmawh ding hi.
54003008	Tua mah bangin saptuam upate zong, zahtak a baang mi, a thutak, lenggahzu a hai lo, a maan lo metna a zong lo mi hi ding hi.
54003009	Amaute lungsim kitheihna siangtak tawh a thuk upna thutakte a lenkipte hi pelmawh ding hi.
54003010	A pel loin amaute kizia-et masa dinga, paubaanna a om kei leh upa kisemsak pan ding hi.
54003011	Tua mah tawh kibangin a zite uh zong zahtak a baang numei hi dinga, migensiat hat loin na khempeuh a kidaam thei, a muantak mi hi ding hi.
54003012	Saptuam upate, zi khat bek a nei hi pelmawh ding a, ama innkuan sung le a tate hoihtaka a uk zo hi pelmawh ding hi.
54003013	Limtaka na a semte in ama ading a hoih pen mun le Khrist Jesu sunga a upna uh kitelcianna lianpi a ngah uh hi.
54003014	No kianga kong paipah ding ka lamet hi napi, hih lamlahnate kong gelh hi.
54003015	Kong ziakai khak leh Pasian innkuan sunga mite in amau le amau bangci gamtat ding cih na theih nading uh ka deihna ahi hi. Tua Pasian innkuan, a nungta Pasian pawlpi hi-a thutak khuampi le bulkip ahi hi.
54003016	A lian mahmah nial nading a om lo pasian-mina thuthuk ahi: Amah pumpi-in hong kilang a, Kha in dik tangsakin vantung mite in mu uh a, minamte lakah a thu kihilhin leitungah ki-um a, minthanna tawh kilato hi.
54004001	Hun nunung ciangin mi pawlkhat in upna nusia ding uh a, zuau a phuak khate le dawite hilhnate a zui ding uh hi, ci-in Kha in kiteltakin a gen hi.
54004002	Tua bang hilhnate kineihsiam mi zuaute tungtawna hong pai hi-a, amau lungsim kitheihna siksa-a bikton tawh kibang ahi hi.
54004003	Amaute in mi a kiten ding kham uh a, thumaan thei a, a um mite in, lungdam ko-a, a san dingun Pasian in a piansak an pawlkhat a tan dingun thu a pia uh hi.
54004004	Ahang in, Pasian piansak na khempeuh a hoih hi-a lungdam ko-a, a kisan khit nak leh nial ding khat beek a om kei hi.
54004005	Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian thu le thungetna tawh siansaksa ahi hi.
54004006	Nang in hih nate, sanggamte kianga na hilhkhiat leh upna le na zuihsa thuhilhna hoih thutakte sunga khangto Khrist Jesu nasem hoih khat na hi ding hi.
54004007	A kiphuaktawm pasian-neilote tangthute le pitekte tangthu gente tawh kisawhkha kei inla, tua tangin na pasian-mi nadingin nang le nang kisin in.
54004008	Ahang in, pumpi kisinna in manphatna pawlkhat nei a, ahi hangin pasian-mina ahileh tu huna nuntak nading le hong tung ding nuntakna ah thuciam nei khawm ahi manin na khempeuh ah a manpha hi.
54004009	Hih in a bupa santham thugen muantak khat hi-a,
54004010	(hih hangin na semin nakpi-in i hanciam hi,) tua in mite khempeuh a diakdiakin a um mite ading, Honpa, a nungta Pasian sungah lametna i neihna ahi hi.
54004011	Hih nate thupiakna-in hilh in.
54004012	Na khangnona hangin kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in; ahi hangin thugenna, nun takna, itna, upna le sianthona ah thu-umte etteh dingin na om in.
54004013	Kong pai matengin mipite mai-ah Laisiangtho simin, thu hilhin lai hilhin hahkat in.
54004014	Upate in na tungah a khut uh a ngak laitak uh a thu genkholhna thupuak tungtawna hong kipia na letsong thudon loin om kei in.
54004015	Hih thute ah thanuam in; mi khempeuh in na khantoh zia a muh theih nadingin hihte ah kipumpiak in.
54004016	Na nuntakna le na thu-upna limtakin kemcing in. Tuate ah kuhkal lecin nang le na thugen a zate na honkhia ding hi.
54005001	A upazawpa tungah kamkhauh zangin tai kei inla, na pa bangin thudam tawh hansuah in. A khangnozawte na sang gampa bangin na bawl in;
54005002	a upazaw numeite, nute bang le a khangnozaw numeite siangthotakin sanggamnute bangin na bawl in.
54005003	A tasam takpi meigongnu limtakin na phawk in.
54005004	Ahi hangin meigongnu khat in tu le ta a neih leh amaute in a nu a pa, a pi a pu-te a thukkikna un, a biakna uh sepkhiat ding a masa penin sinin a innkuan sung uh kem uh hen; ahang in, hih in Pasian a lungkimsak hi.
54005005	Amah bek a kinusia a tasam takpi meigongnu in a lametna Pasian tungah nga-a, Pasian huh ding sun le zanin a ngen niloh hi.
54005006	Ahi hangin ama noptatna-a nungta meigongnu, a nuntak lai nangawnin a si ahi hi.
54005007	Kuamah a kimawhsak theih loh nadingin hih lamlahna mite tungah zong theisak in.
54005008	Mi khatpeuh in ama tanaute a diakdiak in a innkuanpih taktakte kisapna a huh kei leh upna a nial hi-a a um lo mi sangin a siazaw ahi hi.
54005009	Meigongnu khatpeuh a khan kum sawmguk a val khita, a pasal tunga a muanhuai ahi kei ngal leh meigongte lakah na ciamteh kei in.
54005010	Ahi zongin a gamtat hoihin, a tate khansuah zo a, zindo a siam, misiangte khe a silsak, gim ngahte huh tawntunga, gamtat hoih namkimte ah kipia zo mahmah in a kipahtak leh meigong lakah ciamteh in.
54005011	A khangno zaw meigong numeite ahileh tuate minlakah na hel kei in. Ahang in, a pumpi lunggulh nate in Khrist tunga a ki-apna uh a zawh ciangin pasal a deih uh hi.
54005012	Amaute in a kamciam masa uh a palsat manun amau le amau thukhenna a kitun uh hi.
54005013	Tua banah thadahna zongsang uh a, inn simah a banvak uh hi. A thadah bek uh hi loin mi gensiat hatin, na khempeuh ah kum zo uh a, amau gen loh ding pipi a gen uh hi.
54005014	Tua ahi ciangin a khangno lai meigong numeite in, pasal nei in, ta nei in, a inn sung uh kem uh henla, gensiat nading hun hoih galpa pia kei le uh, cih ka thuhilhna ahi hi.
54005015	Pawlkhatte Satan nung a zui dingin lam a pial khin takpi ta uh hi.
54005016	Thu um numei khat ama innkuan sungah meigong numei a nei a om leh amau hangin pawlpi vangiksak loin amah in amaute huh ta hen. Tua hileh a kitasam takpi meigongte pawlpi in huh thei ding hi.
54005017	Pawlpi sung hoihtaka a makaih upate, a diakdiak in thuhilh le laihilh na a semte a zahnih in pahtawi ding kilawm hi.
54005018	Ahang in, Laisiangtho in: “Bawngtal in buh a cil laitakin a muk hencip kei in,” ci a, tua ciangin, “Nasempa in a thaman a ngah ding kilawm hi,” ci hi.
54005019	Upa khat a kimawhsakna teci nih ahikeh thum a om kei leh thu-in na sang kei in.
54005020	Midangte vauhilhna a suah theih nadingin a mawhte mipite lakah na tai in.
54005021	Hih kong lamlahnate kuamah deidan lo, kuamah angvan tuan het loin na zat dingin Pasian le Khrist Jesu le a kiteltuam vansawltakte mitmuhin nang kong suan hi.
54005022	Mi tungah khutngak ding man langlua kei inla, midang mawhna ah va kikum kei in. Nang le nang a siangtho-in kikem in.
54005023	Na gilpi le na cinat pahpahna hangin tuisik bek na dawndawn tawp inla, lenggahzu tawmtawm na zang in.
54005024	Mi pawlkhatte mawhna a kilang sise hi-a, amau ma ah thukhenna mun a na tung zo hi; adangte mawhnate in amaute a sulzuih hi.
54005025	Tua mah bangin gamtatna hoihte kilang sise a, a kilang sise lote zong a kiselcip thei kei hi.
54006001	Pasian min le eite hilhna a kigen siat loh nadingin sila hakkol nuai-a omte khempeuh in, a pute uh na khempeuh ah a zahtak tham cingin ngaihsun uh hen.
54006002	Thu um mi pu-a, a neite in zong, amaute sanggamta ahi uh zongin zahtak lo tuan kei hen. Tua sangsikin, amaute nasepna hanga hamphatna a ngahte in, thu-umte le amau a itte ahi manin a na uh a hoihzaw a, a sepsak ding uh hizaw hi. Hihte na hilh ding le amaute tunga na kut ding ahi hi.
54006003	Mi khatpeuh in thu-upna maan lo hilh a, i Topa Jesu Khrist lamlahna bucing le Pasian thu lama hilhna a lungkim kei leh,
54006004	amah a kimisak hi a, bangmah a theitel lo ahi hi. Amah in kikalhna leh kiselna ah ukna maan lo a nei hi a, tuate in enna, kitotna, kigensiatna, a hoih lo lama kimuanmawhnate,
54006005	le lungsim sia mite kikalah kinawt ngitngetna a piangsak hi; amah thutak paii lo le pasian-mina, summet bawl nading beka a ngaihsun pa ahi hi.
54006006	Ahi hangin lungkimtaka pasian-mina in metna lianpi ahi hi.
54006007	Ahang in, eite in leitung ah bangmah i keng kei a, bangmah i puakhia thei kei hi.
54006008	Ahi hangin annek ding le puansilh ding i neih nak leh tua tawh i lungkim ding ahi hi.
54006009	Ahau nuam mite ahileh khemna le thang, a haihuai le a nasak thei lunggulh-luatnate hangin siatna le manthanna sungah a puk uh hi.
54006010	Ahang in, sum itna in siatna namkim bulpi ahi hi. Mi kimkhatte in sum deih lua-in tua upna pan pialkhia uh a, dahna tampi-in amau le amau a kisunlet uh hi.
54006011	Ahi hangin nang Pasian mipa aw, hihte khempeuh taisan inla, thumaanna, pasian-mina, upna, itna, sikdona le lungnemna na delh in.
54006012	Upna galdona hoih na do in. Hong theihpih tampite mai-ah kipulakna hoih na neihsa, hong sapna, tua nuntak tawntungna limtakin lenkip in.
54006013	Na khempeuh tungah nun takna a pia pa Pasian le Pontius Pilate mai-a pulakna hoih a pulak Khrist Jesu mitmuh in:
54006014	Topa Jesu Khrist hong kilat ni matengin a melhemna omlo, a kawk baang loin hih thupiakte na kep ding kong suan hi.
54006015	Tua hun pen Pasian thupha ngah amah bek Ukpa, kumpite’ Kumpi, tote’ Topa in ama hun lianin hong piangsak ding hi;
54006016	amah bek a si thei lo, a kineh thei lo khuavak sunga nungtapa, kuama muh ngei loh le a muh theih loh pa ahi hi. Ama tungah pahtawina le thahatna om tawntung ta hen. Amen.
54006017	Tu huna hih leitung sumhaute kiang ah, a ki-uatsak loh nading uh le a kician lo hauhna muang lo a, eite i lungnop nadingin na khempeuh kicingtaka hong piapa Pasian, a muan zawk nadingun thu pia in.
54006018	A hoih semin, gamtat hoih tampi a gamtat nading uh le cingh in mi a hop nop nadingun thu pia in.
54006019	Amaute in nuntakna taktak a letkip theih nadingun hong tung ding khanghun ah bulkip ahi dingin hih bangin gou a khol ding uh hi.
54006020	Timothy aw, na kep dinga hong kipia, limtakin cing in. Pasian nei lo thu mawk genna le a maan lopi-a theihna a kici, ngaihsutna kituak lote kiheimang san in.
54006021	Mi pawlkhatte tua bang nei a kicih hangun upna panin a pialmang uh hi. Hehpihna nang tawh om ta hen.
55001001	Khrist Jesu sunga om nuntakna kamciamsa tawh kizui-a Pasian deihna hanga Khrist Jesu sawltakpi Paul in.
55001002	Ka tapa it Timothy tungah: Pa Pasian le i Topa Khrist Jesu tung pana hehpihna, lainatna le lemna om ta hen.
55001003	Ka thungetnate ah sun le zanin nang kong phawk tawntung a, ka pu ka pa-te hihsa bangin lungsim kitheihna siang tawh a na ka sep Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
55001004	Lungnopna tawh ka kidim theih nadingin na khituite phawk kikin nang kong muh ding ka lunggulh mahmah hi.
55001005	Na up taktakna ka phawka, tua thu-upna, na pi Lois sungah nungta masa-in, tua khitteh na nu Eunic sungah nungta a, tu-in nang sungah zong nungta hi cih teltakin ka taksang hi.
55001006	Hih thu hangin nang tunga ka khut kong ngakna tungtawna, nang sunga om Pasian letsong pen na zapkuang den ding kong phawksak kik hi.
55001007	Ahang in, Pasian in eite, zahkaina kha hong pia loin, vangliatna, itna le ei le ei ki-ukzawhna kha hong piazaw hi.
55001008	Tua ahi ciangin i Topa thu na genkhiat ding maizum kei inla, ama thongkia ka hina zong maizumpih tuan kei in. Ahi hangin Pasian vangliatna tawh lungdamna-thu hanga ka thuak, hong thuakpih in.
55001009	Eite sepsa khatpeuh hang hi loin ama ngimna le hehpihna hangin hong honkhia a, nuntakna siangtho-a nungta dingin hong sam hi. Hun kipat ma-in hih hehpihna Khrist Jesu sungah eite hong kipia zo hi.
55001010	Ahi hangin tua hehpihna, eite’ Honpa Khrist Jesu hong kilatna tungtawnin tu-in hong kilaakkhia hi. Amah in sihna susia a, lungdamna-thu tung tawnin nuntakna le sih theihlohna hong puak hi.
55001011	Tua hi-a hih lungdamna-thu tawh kisai-in a tangkopa sawltakpipa le siapa dingin kei hong kiseh hi.
55001012	Tua thu hangin hih banga a thuak ka hi hi. Tua hi napi ka maizum kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ken ka up pa ka thei a, amah ka kepsakte tua ni adingin kem zo ding cih teltakin ka thei hi.
55001013	Kei tung pana na zaksate, Khrist Jesu sunga om upna le itna tawh, hilhna kician lahna-in lenkip in.
55001014	Nang hong kikemsak na hoih kemin, eite sunga teng a Khasiangtho huhna tawh na cing in.
55001015	Phygelus le Hermogenes-te zong kihel in, Asia gama omte khempeuh in kei hong taihsat lam na thei hi.
55001016	Topa in Onesiphorus-te innkuan tungah a lainatna na lak ta hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ka kolbulh maizumpih loin thathak hong ngahsak ngitnget hi.
55001017	Hong maizumpih gen loh Rome ah a om lai-in kei hong muh matengin haksapi in hong zong hi.
55001018	Tua ni teh Topa kiang pana lainatna mu dingin Topa in seh ta hen! Amah in Ephesus ah lam tampi in kei hong huh lam teltakin na thei hi.
55002001	Tua ahi ciangin nang ka tapa aw, Khrist Jesu sunga om hehpihna hangin thahat in.
55002002	Teci mi tampi mai-ah ka gen na zaksa nate midangte zong a hilh thei dinga a cin, a muanhuai mite na kemsak in.
55002003	Khrist Jesu galkap hoih bangin haksatna kote hong thuakpih in.
55002004	Galkap nasem mi kuamah in tangpi vai vasaipih loin amah a makaih mangpa a lungkimsak nuam hi.
55002005	Tua mah tawh kibangin kidemna sunga kihel mi khat peuh in kidemna ngeinate zui a, a dem kei leh a gualzote ngah lukhu a ngah kei hi.
55002006	Hahkattaka nasem, lokhopa in a gahte tang masa pen hi.
55002007	Topa in hihte khempeuh a sungthu hong theisak ding ahi manin, kong thugen ngaihsun kik in.
55002008	David suan le khak misi pana a kithosak Jesu Khrist phawk gige in.
55002009	Tualthat mawhna a nei khat banga kolbulhna ciang dong ka thuakna hih ka lungdamna-thu hang mah ahi hi. Ahi hangin Pasian thu kol a kibulh kei hi.
55002010	Tua ahi manin Khrist Jesu sunga om hot khiatna a tawntung minthanna tawh a ngah khawm nadingun tua a teelsate hangin na khempeuh ka thuak hi.
55002011	Hih lai-ah a muantak thugen khat a om hi: Amah tawh i sih khawm leh, amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi;
55002012	eite in i thuak leh, amah tawh i uk khawm ding hi. Amah leh amah kinial thei lo ahi manin amah i nial leh, amah in zong eite hong nial ding hi;
55002013	eite i muanhuai kei zongin, amah a muanhuai den ding hi, ahang in, amah le amah a kinial thei kei hi.
55002014	Hih thute amaute phawksak kik den in. Thumalte peuh tawh kisai-a a kitot loh nadingun Pasian mai-ah amaute vauhilh in; tua in kimanna nei loin a ngai mite a siasak bek hi.
55002015	Maizumna om lo thutak thu diktakin a zang a santak nasempa bangin, Pasian tunga na kipiak theih nadingin na hih theih tawpin hih in.
55002016	Pasian thusimlohna, thu mawk gengen nate pel in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang thu-a a uangte a pasian-mi kei semsem ding hi.
55002017	Amau thuhilhna, a banmuat meima bangin kizel hi. Amaute lakah Hymenaeus le Philetus,
55002018	thutak pana pialmangte kihel uh hi. Amaute in, “Thawhkikna tung khin ta hi,” ci uh a, pawlkhatte upna a siasak uh hi.
55002019	Ahi zongin Pasian bulkippi kiptakin dinga, “Topa in ama aate a thei hi,” cih le “Topa min a pulakte peuhmah in tatsiatna a taisan pelmawh ding uh hi,” ci-a kigelh tawh a tungah kiciamteh hi.
55002020	Inn lianpi sungah ngun le kham tawh kibawl nate bek om lo a, sing le bellei tawh kibawl zong a om hi; pawlkhat a zatna thupi a, pawlkhatte a gina kei hi.
55002021	Tua a nunung pen pana mi khat amah le amah a kisiansak leh a zatna a thupi-a vanzat siangtho suaka, a Pu adingin kimanna a nei na hoih peuhpeuh sem dinga kimang thei a suak hi.
55002022	Khangno gitloh lunggulhnate taisan inla, lungsim singtho-a Topa a sam mite tawh thumaanna, upna, itna le lemna na delh in.
55002023	A haihuai le thugina lo kiselnate in kitotna piangsak cih thei na hi manin tuate ah kikum kha kei in.
55002024	Topa nasemte kuamah tawh kitawng peuhmah lo ding uh hi; tua sangsikin mikim tungah migi-in, thu hilh thei dinga, zakdah hau lo ding hi.
55002025	Amah a langdote lungnemtakin lamlak pelmawh hen, Pasian in amaute kisiksakin kiheisak dinga thutak theihna ah a pi ding hi.
55002026	Tua ciangin khua hong phawk ding uh a, ama deihna bang sem dinga sal-a a khawi dawimangpa thang pan a suakta ding uh hi. 1Ti 1:5
55003001	Ahi hangin hih thu ciamteh in: ni nunungte ah a lauhuai hunte hong piang ding hi.
55003002	Mite in, amau le amau ki-itte, sum deihluate, kisialhhatte, kisa theite, siatgenhatte, nu-le-pa thu amang lote, lungdamna mel thei lote, a siangtho lote,
55003003	itna nei lote, a maisak nuam lote, gensiat-hatte, amah le amah ki-uk zo lote, a ngongtatte, a hoih deih lote,
55003004	a zuautatte, a gamhtatte, a kimisakte, Pasian it ding sanga nopsakna a itzawte,
55003005	pasian-mina lim nei napi a, a vangliatna a nialte hi ding uh hi. Amaute tawh kisawhkha kei in.
55003006	Amaute, kinelnelin mi innah va lut uh a, mawhnate tawh kidim lunggulhna namkim in a suknawk a tonawk,
55003007	a sinsin hanga thutak a thei lo numei zulhzaute a va zothawh gawpte ahi uh hi.
55003008	Jannes le Jambres-te in Moses a langdo bang tektekun, hih mite in zong thutak langdo uh a, amaute lungsim kisia gawpsa ahi manun upna thu tawh kisai-in a kinilkhiate ahi uh hi.
55003009	Ahi hangin amaute in ama uh a sot kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua mite thu tungtang mah bangin amaute haina zong mikim tungah a kitheitelsak ding hi.
55003010	Bangbang ahi zongin nang, ka thuhilhna thu khempeuh, ka nuntak zia, ka ngim ka tup, upna, lungduaina, itna, sikdona,
55003011	bawlsiatna, thuaknate – Antioch, Iconium le Lystra-te ah kei tungah bang teng pianga, bang bawl siatnate thuak ka hi hiam, cih a vekpi in na thei khin hi. Tua hi napi Topa in tuate khempeuh panin hong hukhia hi.
55003012	A taktakin Khrist Jesu sunga pasian-mina tawh a nungta nuam mi peuhmah kibawlsia dinga,
55003013	migilo le mi kheltatte, mi khem le khemna thuakin a siat semsem laitak uh hi ding hi.
55003014	Ahi hangin nang na hileh na sinsa le na kipsansa ah kip den in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in tuate na sinna pa na thei-a,
55003015	Khrist Jesu sunga upna tungtawnin hotkhiatna ngah nadingin hong pilsak thei a siangtho Laisiangtho na neu tunga kipan na theihsa ahilam zong na thei hi.
55003016	Laisiangtho khempeuh Pasian humuap hi-a, thuhilh nading, tai nading, bawlphat nading, thumaan lama pattah nadingin phatuamin manpha hi.
55003017	Tua in Pasian mipa pen na hoih khempeuh sem dingin kimtaka a kithuam theih nading ahi hi.
55004001	Pasian mai le misite le mihingte thukhen ding pa Khrist Jesu mai-ah, hong kilat nading le a gam paulamin hih nasep kong guan hi:
55004002	Thu hilh in; ahun ahi-a, ahun ahi kei zongin kigingsa-in om in; kuhkaltak le kidawm mahmah kawmin lam lakin, bawlpha in, tai-in, hanthawn in.
55004003	Ahang in, mite in thu-up bucing a cimtak hun hong tung ding hi. Tua sangsikin, amaute lunggulhna tawh kituakin, a bil thakna uh tawh kituak, a zaknophuai lel thu a gen dingin amau kiangah sia tampitak a kaikhawm ding uh hi.
55004004	Amaute in thutak lehngatsan ding uh a, phuahtawm tangthu lamah a nga ding uh hi.
55004005	Ahi hangin nang na hileh bangmah peuhah pilvang inla, haksatna thuakin sawltak na sem inla, na Pasian nasepna ah na nasep khempeuh zo in.
55004006	Ahang in, dawntheih-a biakna banga sun dingin a mansa in ka om a, ka pai hun hong tung zo hi.
55004007	Galdona hoih do khin in, tai kidemna ka tai zo a, upna ka kemcing zo hi.
55004008	Tu-in thumaana thukhenpa Topa in tua ni cinga kei hong piak ding thumaanna lukhu kei ading a om zo hi. Kei bek hong kipia loin ama kilat ding lawpa a ngakte khempeuh zong a pia ding hi.
55004009	A manlang theithei-in ka kiangah hong pai dih in.
55004010	Ahang in, Demas in hih leitung a it manin kei hong taisan a, Thessalonica ah a pai hi. Galatia ah Crescens pai zo a, Dalmatia ah Titus a pai hi.
55004011	Kei kiangah Luke bek a om hi. Mark hong zawn inla hong tonpih in. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka nasepna ah amah ka phattuampih mahmah hi.
55004012	Ephesus ah Tychicus ka sawl hi.
55004013	Nong pai ciangin Troas a Carpus kianga ka nusiat ka puantualpi le ka laizialte a diakdiak in ka savun laizialte hong puak in.
55004014	Sum sungpa Alexander in nakpi in kei hong bawlsia hi. Ama hihsa tawh kituakin Topa in a thukkik ding hi.
55004015	Amah in ka thupuak uh langdo lua mahmah ahi manin, nang zong kidawm mahmah in.
55004016	Ka kihutna thu ka gen masak lai-in kuamah in kei hong panpih lo-a, a kuamahpeuh in hong taisan uh hi. Amaute kimawhsak kei ta hen.
55004017	Ahi hangin ka gei-ah Topa dinga, kei tungtawnin Gentile-te khempeuh in tua thupuak a zak nadingun kicingtaka ka tangko theih nading tha hong guan hi. Tua hi-a, humpinelkai kam panin kei hong hukhia hi.
55004018	Gitlohna tawh hong kisukna citeng panin Topa in kei hong hu dinga, ama vantung gamah bittakin hong tunpih ding hi. Ama tungah a tawntungin minthanna om den ta hen. Amen.
55004019	Priscilla le Aquila le Onesiphorus-te innkuan na hopihsak in.
55004020	Korinth ah Erastus taam-a, Miletus ah Trophimus cinasa in ka nusia hi.
55004021	Phalbi ma-in hih lai tun hong sawm teitei in. Eubulus in nang hong hopih a Pudens, Linus, Claudia le sanggamte khempeuh in zong hong hopih uh hi.
55004022	Topa in na kha hong ompih ta hen. Hehpihna in nang hong ompih ta hen.
56001001	Pasian teelte, upna le pasian-mina – a tun thutak theih nadinga –
56001002	tua upna le theihna pen zuau a gen lo Pasian in hun kipat ma-a a ciamsa, nuntak tawntung nading lametna tungah kinga a,
56001003	eite Honpa Pasian thupiakna tawh hun a sak hun lianin, thuhilhna tungtawna ama thu hong kilatsakna Pasian nasem le Jesu Khrist sawltakpi keimah Paul in,
56001004	Eite in i upkhawm upna sunga ka tapa taktak Titus tungah: Pa Pasian le eite Honpa Khrist Jesu pana hehpihna le lemna hong tung ta hen.
56001005	Crete a nang kong nusiatna pen, a kizo nai lo a kinusiate na zawhsiang theih nading le nang kong lamlah bangin khuapi kima upate a seh ding na hi hi.
56001006	Upa dingte: a pel loin kawkbaanna om lo ding, zi khat bek a nei, a tate zong thu um mi hi ding a, phengphi-a a thumang lo mi a hi kei ding hi.
56001007	Saptuam kem pen, Pasian na a kikemsak ahi khit nung sangin pel loin kawkbaanna a om lo, a kiliansak lua lo, a heh baih lo, zu a kham lo, a gamhtat lo, met nading zonga a zuautat lo mi hi ding hi.
56001008	Tua sangsikin, a pel loin zindo siam mi, a hoih deih mi, ama pumpi ki-uk zo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho le a kisek zo mi hi ding hi.
56001009	Amah in midangte thu-upna maan tawh han thawna a langpante a nial theih nadingin a kihilhsa a muantak, thupuak kiptakin a len pelmawh ding hi.
