56001010	Bang hang hiam cih leh a diakdiakin vunat pawlte sungah a lehdo thei mi, a kamsi le a zuauphuak mi tampi a om hi.
56001011	Amaute kamhum ding uh hi. Ahang in, a hilh loh ding pipi uh hillhin innkuan sung buppi a siasak uh hi; tua zong a maan lo-a metna zonna ahi hi.
56001012	Amau kamsangte khat nangawn in, “Crete mite zuauphuak dente, gilo ngongtatte, thadah a anhaite ahi hi,” na ci hi.
56001013	Hih teci panna a maan ahi hi. Tua ahi manin amaute upna ah a kip theih nading uh le
56001014	Jew-te phuahtawm tang thute ahikeh thutak a nial mite thupiakte a thudon loh nadingun khauh takin tai in.
56001015	A siangthote aa in na khempeuh siangtho a, ahi hangin a kisiate le a um lo mite aa in a siangtho khat beek a om kei hi. A taktakin amaute lungsim le a lungsim kitheihna uh a siakhawm hi.
56001016	Pasian thei kineih uh a, ahi hangin a gamtatna uh tawh a nial uh hi. Amaute mi huathuai, a thumang lo, na hoih sem dinga a cin lo uh ahi hi.
56002001	Thu-up maan tawh kituakin hilh pelmawh in.
56002002	Pasal khanghamte a kidaam thei ding, zahtak baang ding, amau le amau ki-uk zo ding, upna, itna le thuakzawhna ah a kip nadingun hilh in.
56002003	Tua tawh kibangin numei khang hamte, amaute nuntakna ah zahtak baang ding, mi gensiat hat loin, zu hai lo ding, ahi hangin a hoih khempeuh a sinsak dingun hilh in.
56002004	Kuamah in Pasian thu a gensiat loh nading in, amaute in, nupilate in a pasalte uh le a tate uh a it ding,
56002005	amau le amau ki-uk thei ding uh a, siangthoin, innah manlahin, migi-in, a pasalte uh thu a man ding uh a hilh thei ding uh hi.
56002006	Tua mah bangin pasal khangno laite amau le amau a ki-uk zawh nadingun hanthawn in.
56002007	Na khempeuhah na hoih semin amaute etteh na suak in. Thu na hilh ciangin thutakna, cihtakna,
56002008	le a kimawhpaih thei lo kampau siangtho lak in. Tua hileh hong langpante in, eite tungah thusia bangmah mu loin a maizum ding uh hi.
56002009	Silate in na khempeuhah a pute uh thu manga, amaute a lungkimsak ding uh hahkatin, amaute kam sel loin,
56002010	a na uh guksak loin a muanhuai zaw dingin hilh in. Tua hileh i Honpa Pasian tawh kisai hilhnate a deihhuai a suaksak ding uh hi.
56002011	Ahang in, hotkhiatna hong puak Pasian hehpihna, mi khempeuh tungah a kilang zo hi.
56002012	Tua hehpihna in pasian-milohna le leitung vaite deihna tawh kisai-a, “Ut lo,” ci ding le pumpi ki-uk zo-a nungta ding, diktat ding le tu khanghunah pasian-mitakin nungta dinga hong hilh lai mah in,
56002013	a lian a minthang eite Pasian le Honpa Jesu Khrist hong kilat nading-lametna thupha i ngak hi.
56002014	Amah, tatsiatna khempeuh pana eite hong tankhia ding le ama hong neihtuam dingin amahmah in hong siansuaha, a hoih a gamtat ding a lawp dingin eite ading amahmah hong kipia pa ahi hi.
56002015	Tua ahi ciangin hihte khempeuh hilh in; thuneihna khempeuh tawh hansuah inla tai in. Kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in.
56003001	Tua mite in gam-ukte le thuneite thu nial lo-a, a thu uh mangin, a hoih peuhpeuh sem dingin kiging kholin,
56003002	kuamah gensia loin mi tawh kilemin, mi ading khualin mi khempeuh tungah kiniamkhiatna taktak a lah dingun phawksak kik in.
56003003	Hun khat lai-in eite zong ahai, a thumang lo, mi khemsa le pumpi lung gulhna namkim le noptatna sila i hi hi. Gitlohna le hazatna tawh kidim in, mite muhdah le khat le khat kimuhdahna tawh i nungta hi.
56003004	Ahi hangin eite Honpa Pasian migitna le itna hong kilat ciangin,
56003005	amah in thu maana na i sep hang hi lo, ama lainatna hangin eite hong hon hi. Amah in eite suahkikna-a silsiangna le a Khasiangtho bawlphat thakna tungtawnin hong hon hi.
56003006	Amah in eite Honpa Jesu Khrist tung tawnin tua Kha Siangtho cingtakin eite tungah hong sungkhia hi.
56003007	Tua pen ama hehpihna hanga diktansak, nuntak tawntungna lametna a nei gouluahte i suah theih nading ahi hi.
56003008	Hih in a muantak thugen ahi hi: Pasian a muangte in a hoih peuhmah hih dinga, amau le amau a kipiak zawh nadingun hih thute na uang gen ding kong deih hi. Hihte in mi khempeuh adingin a hoih pen le a phatuam pen ahi hi.
56003009	Ahi hangin a haihuai kikalhnate, khang tangthute, thukham thu a kiselnate le kitotnate peel in. Bang hang hiam cih leh hihte, phattuamna nei lo le a kimanna bei ahi hi.
56003010	Pawl khen nuam mipa khatvei vauhilh inla, tua khitin a nihveina vauhilh lai in. Tua khit ciangin amah thudon nawn kei in.
56003011	Tua bang mite a tuampian le mawhdim hi-a, amah le amah kimawhpaih hi cih ciantakin na thei ding hi.
56003012	Artemas ahikeh Tychicus no kiangah kong sawl phetin Nicopolis ah ka kiangah pai hong sawm teitei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah phalbi sung va om dingin ka khentat khin hi.
56003013	Tangdingpa Zenas le Apollos na huh theih bangbangun na huh unla, a kisap khempeuh uh na thei un.
56003014	I mite mawk nuntak loin a nisim kisapnate uh a kisiktawm zawh nadingun na hoih sem dingin amau le amau a kipiak nadingun kisin pelmawh uh hen.
56003015	Kei tawh a omkhawm teng in hong hopih kim uh hi. Upna sunga ei hong itte na hopihsak in. Hehpihna in note khempeuh hong ompih ta hen.
57001001	Khrist hanga thongkia pa Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in, Ka lawm it uh le ka naseppih uh Philemon,
57001002	ka sanggamnu uh Apphia, ka galkappih uh Archippus le na inna kikhawm pawlpi tungah:
57001003	I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
57001004	Ka thungetna ah note kong phawk simin ka Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko tawntung hi.
57001005	Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Jesu sunga na upna le misiangte khempeuh na itna thu ka za zo uh hi.
57001006	Na upna midangte na kuppihna ah thanuam-a, Khrist sunga i neih na hoih khempeuh theihtelna kim na neih theih nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
57001007	Sanggampa aw nang, misiangte lungsim thaksuaksak zo na hi manin na itna in kei hong lung nuamsakin hong hanthawn hi.
57001008	Tua ahi manin Khrist sungah na nasep ding hangtakin thu hong pia thei napi,
57001009	itna tawh kong thum zaw hi. Tua ciangin keimah Paul ka tek banah Khrist Jesu hanga thongkia zong ka hi lai-a,
57001010	kol ka bulh laitaka ka tapa hong suak Onesimus ading kong ngen hi.
57001011	Tunung lamin amah nang adingin kimanna a nei lo ahi hi. Ahi hangin tu-in nang le kei adingin mi manpha mahmah a suak hi. 1Co 1:10; 1Th 2:11
57001012	Kei pumpi zahin ngaihsunin am ah nang kiangah kong sawl kik hi.
57001013	Lungdamna-thu hanga sikkhainiang buna ka om sung teng, nang tanga kei hong huh dingin ka kiangah ka omsak nuam mahmah hi.
57001014	Ahi hangin nang hong deihsakna khempeuh nang utthu-a nong hihsa suaka, hong kihihsak teitei a suah loh nadingin nang thu loin bangmah ka hih nuam kei hi.
57001015	Nang tawh tawmvei sung na kikhenna uh pen amah a hoih a na neih kik theih nading hi kha ding hi –
57001016	tua nangawn zong sila hi nawn lo, sila sanga a hoihzaw sanggam it ahi zaw lai ding hi. Amah kei tungah a ithuai mahmah hi; ahi hangin mihing hina le Topa sunga sanggam khat hina tawh nang tungah hong ithuai zaw lai ding hi.
57001017	Tua ahi ciangin kei, na naseppih a nong sim leh kei nong muak ding bangin amah na muak in.
57001018	Amah in nang tungah khialhna khatpeuh a neiha, bat khatpeuh a neih leh kei tungah hong siik in.
57001019	Hih lai, keimah Paul in ka khut tekteka ka gelh ahi hi. Kei tungah nang mahmah nong kibat gen vet kei ni – keimah in a vekpi in kong din kik ding hi.
57001020	Sanggam aw, Topa sungah nang tung panin phattuamna ngah thei leng ka ut hi; Khrist sungah ka lungsim hong thaksuaksak in.
57001021	Hong mang dingin kong muanga, kong nget sanga lianzawin, na hih ding thei kawmin lai kong gelh ahi hi.
57001022	A kisam lai khatah: na thungetnate uh hong kidawnna-in, kei no tawh hong om khawm thei kik dingin kilamen ka hi manin zintunna inndei khat a baihsa-in na koih khol in.
57001023	Khrist hanga ka thong kiatpih Epaphras in nang hong hopih hi.
57001024	Ka naseppih Mark, Aristarchus, Demas le Luke-te in zong nang hong hopih uh hi
57001025	Topa Jesu Khrist hehpihna in na kha hong ompih ta hen.
58001001	A beisa hunin Pasian in kamsangte tungtawnin i pu i pa-te tungah lam tuamtuamin thu na gen a,
58001002	ahi hangin hih ni nunungte ah khuavannuai a bawlpa na khempeuh a luah dinga a sehpa, ama Tapa zangin eite tungah thu hong gen zo hi.
58001003	Tua Tapa in Pasian ahina taktak a kilatkhiatna le a minthanna tankhiatna hi-a, ama kammal vangliatna tawh na khempeuh a lenkip hi. Mawhnate siansak nading a bawl khit ciangin vantung Thupina taklam ah a tu hi.
58001004	Tua ahi ciangin vansawltakte sangin min thupi zawtham a luah mah bangin vansawltakte sangin a thupi zawtham hi.
58001005	Ahang in, Pasian in vansawltakte kua kiangah, “Nang ka Tapa na hi hi; tu ni-in na Pa ka suak zo hi, ” ci ngei ahi hiam? Ahikeh “Kei ama Pa ka hi dinga, amah ka Tapa ahi ding hi,” ci-in gen ngei ahi hiam?
58001006	Tua banah, Pasian in a ta masa pen leitungah hong paisak ciangin amah in, “Pasian vansawltakte khempeuh in amah bia uh hen,” ci hi.
58001007	Amah in vansawltakte a gen lai-in, “Amah in a vansawltakte huihte suaksakin, ama nasemte, meikungte a suaksak hi,” ci hi.
58001008	Ahi hangin Tapa thu ah amah in, “Pasian aw, na kumpi tokhom, a tawntungin om den dinga, a kumpi-gam ukna sik ciangkhut, thumaanna hi ding hi.
58001009	Thumaanna it-in, tatsiatna na mudah hi; tua ahi manin Pasian, na Pasian lungnopna sathau nilhna tawh na pawlte khempeuh sangin, nang hong tawisang zaw hi,”
58001010	Tua banah zong, “Topa aw, a tungin leitung bulpite na phut a, vantungte na khutin na bawl ahi hi.
58001011	Tuate a kisia ding uh a, nang na om den hi; tuate khempeuh puan bangin a patkhia ding uh hi.
58001012	Puantualpi bangin tuate na zialkhia dinga, puansilh bangin kikheng ding hi. Ahi hangin nang na kikhel kei a, kumte a bei ngei kei hi,” ci hi.
58001013	Pasian in, vansawltakte kua tungah: “Na galte khempeuh na khepekte ngak nadinga ka bawl khit matengin ka taklam ah na tu-in,” ci-in gen ngei ahi hiam?
58001014	Vansawltakte khempeuh, hotkhiatna luah dingte nasem dinga, kisawl khate hi lo ahi hiam?
58002001	Tua ahi manin eite i tolhmang loh nadingin i zaksa thute limtakin i thudon semsem kul ding hi.
58002002	Ahang in, vansawltakte gen thupuak kip zo a; tua thu zui loin a palsatte in gawtna diktak thuak tektek uh ahileh,
58002003	tua zahtaka thupi hotkhiatna thudon kei lehang bang i ci suahtak zawh ding hiam? Hih hotkhiatna a masa penin Topa in a genkhiat, ama gen a zate in ei tunga a kipsak ahi hi.
58002004	Pasian in zong limte, a lamdangte le nalamdang tuamtuamte le ama deih banga a hawm Khasiangtho letsongte tawh tua thu teci a pang hi.
58002005	Eite gen mailam huna hong om ding leitung pen vansawltakte nuai ah a koih kei hi.
58002006	Ahi hangin mi khat in teci a pannasa mun khat ah: “Nang ngaihsut tham dingin mihing bang hi-a, na thudon dingin mihing tapa bang ahi hiam?
58002007	Vansawltak sangin a niam zawzek in na bawl a; minthanna le pahtawina khusak in,
58002008	ama khepek nuai-ah na khempeuh na koih hi,” ci hi. Na khempeuh ama nuai ah koih a, Pasian in ama nuai ah a koih loh bangmah a om kei hi. Tua hi napi tu tadihin na khempeuh ama nuai-a omin i mu kei hi.
58002009	Ahi hangin vansawltakte sangin a niam zawdeuh a kikoih phot Jesu in, Pasian hehpihna hangin mi khempeuh adinga sihna a ciap theih nadingin sihna a thuak manin tu-in minthanna le pahtawina a kikhusak eite in i mu hi.
58002010	Tapa tampi minthanna ngahsakna ah ama ading le ama tungtawna na khempeuh a omna pa Pasian in, amaute hotkhiatna a piangsak pa thuakna tungtawna, a bukimsak ding mah kilawm hi.
58002011	Mite a siangthosak pa le a kisiang thosakte innkuan khat hi khawm hi. Tua ahi ciangin amaute sanggamte cih ding, Jesu a maizum kei hi.
58002012	Amah in, “Ka sanggamte tungah na min ka pulak ding hi; mihonte kikhopna ah nang phatna la ka sa ding hi,”
58002013	Tua ciangin, “Amah ka muang ding hi,” ci kik hi. Amah in, “Pasian in kei hong piaksa tate tawh, hiah ka om hi,” ci leuleu hi.
58002014	Tate in si le sa nei ahi nungsang amah in zong a sihna tungtawn a, sihna vangliatna a nei dawimangpa, a suksiat theih nading
58002015	le a nuntak sung teng sih ding launa sila-a omte a suahtak theih nadingin amaute mihing hina hong tang hi.
58002016	Ahang in, a taktakin ama huh vansawltakte hi loin Abraham suan le khakte hizaw hi.
58002017	Hih thu hangin Pasian na a sepna sungah mi lainat siam le a muanhuai tulpi a suah nading le mite mawhnate thoihdamna a bawl theih nadingin lam khempeuh ah a sanggamte mah bangin hong suah ding mah ahi hi.
58002018	Bang hang hiam cih leh zia-etna a thuakte a huh theih nadingin amah zong kizia-etin a thuak hi.
58003001	Tua ahi manin vantung-lam sapna a ngah a siangtho sanggamte aw, eite in i pulak tua sawltakpi le tulpi Jesu tungah na ngaihsutnate uh kipsak un.
58003002	Pasian inn sung khempeuh ah Moses a muanhuai bang tektekin amah a sehpa tungah amah a muanhuai hi.
58003003	Inn sangin a lampa in pahtawina a ngah zawk bang tektek in Moses sangin Jesu in pah tawina thupizaw a ngah ding kilawm hi.
58003004	Ahang in, inn peuhmah a lam mi khat om a, ahi hangin na khempeuh a lam Pasian ahi hi.
58003005	Moses pen mailam a kigen ding thute teci a pang, Pasian innkuan sung khempeuh ah nasem muanhuai ahi hi.
58003006	Ahi hangin Pasian innkuan tungah Khrist tapa muanhuai ahi hi. Eite in i hanna le i kisialhpih tua lametna i letkip suak leh ama innkuan i hi hi.
58003007	Tua hi-a, Khasiangtho in: “Tu ni-in ama aw na zak uh leh,
58003008	gamlak a zia-etna hun sungin na lehdo lai bangun, na lungtang uh khauhsak kei un.
58003009	Tua lai-ah na pate un kei hong zia-et in hong sin uh a kum sawmli sung ka hihte a mu uh hi.
58003010	Tua khang tungah ka heh a, tua ciangin, ‘Amaute lungtang lam pial tawntung a, ka lampite a thei kei uh hi,’ ka cihna tua hang ahi hi.
58003011	Tua ciangin ka heh a, ‘Amaute ka khawlna-ah a lut ngei kei ding uh hi,’ ci-in kiciamin ka genkhia hi,” a ci hi.
58003012	Sanggamte aw, note a kuamah peuh lungtang ah mawhdim le umlah in, a nungta Pasian kiang pan na pialmang loh nadingun kikem un.
58003013	Ahi hangin tuni a kici sungin mawhna’ khemhatna hangin kuamah in a lungsim a khauhsak loh nadingin nisimin khat le khat na kihan thawn un.
58003014	Eite in a masa-a i neih kimuanna, a tawp dongin kiptaka i letkip leh Khrist sungah tanh a nei i hi hi.
58003015	Amah in, “Tu ni-in ama aw na zak uh leh, na lehdo lai bangun na lungsim uh khauhsak kei un,” na ci khin phet hi.
58003016	Za napi-a, a lehdo kuate ahi hiam? Egypt pana Moses in a pikhiatte hi lo uh ahi hiam?
58003017	Amah kum sawmli sung a hehna kuate tung ahi hiam? Mawhna bawla, a pumpi uh gamlaka, a pukte tung hi lo ahi hiam?
58003018	Pasian in ama khawlna ah amaute a tung ngei kei ding uh hi, ci a, a tomlawh, a thumang lote tung lo kua tung hi ding hiam?
58003019	Tua ahi ciangin amaute uplahna hangin a lut thei kei uh hi, cih i thei hi.
58004001	Tua ahi ciangin ama khawlna sunga lut nading kamciam om lai ahi manin khatpeuh tua sunga lut dingin a cin zawh loh khak ding kidawm ni.
58004002	Ahang in, amaute zak bang tektekin eite kianga hong kihilh lungdamna-thu i za hi; ahi hangin a zate in upna tawh a gawmkhawm loh manin, amaute zaksa thupuak, amau adingin kimanna a nei kei hi.
58004003	Pasian in, “Tua ciangin ka heh a, ‘Amaute ka khawlna ah a lut ngei kei ding uh hi,’ ci-in kiciamin ka genkhia hi,” a cih bang tektek in, tu-in a umsa eite tua khawlna ah i lut hi. Tua hi-a leitung a kipiansak khit nungsang a nasep a zawhsa ahi hi.
58004004	Ahang in, mun khatah: “A ni sagihna ni-in a nasepna khempeuh panin Pasain a khawl hi,” ci-in tua kammalte tawh ni sagihna thu a gen hi.
58004005	A tunga thumal sung mah ah, “Amaute ka khawlna sungah a lut ngei kei ding uh hi,” ci kik hi.
58004006	Pawlkhatte tua khawlna ah lut thei lai ding uh a, a beisa hun sunga a kiangua lungdamna-thu kigen a zasate, amau thumanlohna hangin a lut thei kei uh hi.
58004007	Tua ahi manin Pasian in ni dang khat seh kikin, tu-ni, ci-a tua a cih khit a sawtpi ciangin a ma-a a gensa bangin David tungtawnin, “Tu ni-in ama aw na zak uh leh, na lungtangte uh khauhsak kei un,” na ci hi.
58004008	Ahang in, Joshua in amaute khawlna pia khin hileh, Pasian in tua khitin ni tuam khat thu gen nawn lo ding hi.
58004009	Tua ahi ciangin Pasian mite adingin Sabbath khawlna khat om lai hi.
58004010	Ahang in, Pasian khawlna sunga a lutte khempeuh in Pasian ama nasepna pan a khawl bang tektekin amau nasepna panin khawl ciat ding uh hi.
58004011	Tua ahi manin amaute hong lah thumanlohna zui-in kuamah puk lo-a, tua khawlna-ah i lut nadingin i hih theih zahzah in hahkat ni.
58004012	Pasian thu nungta in hihtheihna a nei hi. Langnih a hiam namsau sangin hiamzaw a, nuntakna le kha, tang le guhngekte nangawn pailetin khen thei a, lungsim ngaihsutnate le lungtang tupnate khentel thei hi.
58004013	A kipiangsak khempeuh Pasian muhna pan a kisel bangmah a om kei hi. I thu i tut nading mitmuhin a kisin bangmah om loin kitel sinsen in a om hi.
58004014	Tua ahi manin eite in, vantungte khengin a pai tulpi Pasian Tapa Jesu i neih khit nungsang i pulak tua upna kiptakin len ni.
58004015	Ahang in, eite zawn khalna hong thuakpih thei lo tulpi nei i hi kei hi; ahi hangin eite thuak mah bangin zia-etna a pawlpawl a thuak ngei, ahi hanga mawhna a nei lo tulpi khat i nei hi.
58004016	Tua ahi ciangin eite in lainatna i ngah a, i kisap hunhuna hong huh ding hehpihna i ngah nadingin kimuangtakin hehpihna tokhom zuan ni.
58005001	Tulpi peuhmah mihing lak pana kiteel hi a, Pasian tunga nasep khempeuh amau tanga sem ding mawhnate hanga biakpiakna le letsongte a pia dinga kiseh ahi hi.
58005002	Amahmah zong thanemna ah om ngei zo ahi manin a thei lo mite le a gammangte lungnemtakin kem thei hi.
58005003	Hih thu hangin, amah in ama mawhnate le mite mawhnate tang dingin biakpiakna a piak ding kul hi.
58005004	Pasian in Aaron a sap bang tektekin a sap mite longal kuamah in ama thu-in hih pahtawina a la kei hi.
58005005	Tua hi-a Khrist in zong tulpi suahna minthanna ama tungah amahmah in a la kei hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in ama tungah, “Nang ka Tapa na hi hi; tu ni-in na Pa ka suak zo hi,” ci hi.
58005006	Tua ciangin mundang khatah, “Nang, Melchizedek gui zui-in siampi khat na hi tawntung hi,” a ci hi.
58005007	Jesu leitungah a nuntak hunlai-in amah sihna pan a honkhia thei pa tungah nakpi in kahna le khitui luanna tawh thu ngetnate le ngetnate ngena zahtakna tawh a ki-ap manin kisang hi.
58005008	Amah tapa hi napi a thuaknate panin thuman’na sin a,
58005009	khatvei hoihkim khinin, ama thu a mangte khempeuh adingin hotkhiatna nak hong suak zo a,
58005010	Melchizedek gui zui-in Pasian in tulpi za pia zo hi.
58005011	Hih thu tawh kisai gen ding tampi om a, ahi hangin theihna ah tuantual na hi manun teltaka gen ding haksa hi.
58005012	A taktak in, siate suakin mite na hilh ding uh hun ta hi napi Pasian thu thutak bulpite hong hilh kik ding mi khat na kisam uh hi. Antak hi lo nawizu na kisam uh hi.
58005013	Nawizu-a kivak peuhmah naungek hi lai ahi manin, thumaanna tawh kisai thuhilhnate na thei nai kei uh hi.
58005014	Ahi hangin antak pen, a sia le a pha khen thei a, zangin zongsang a, amau le amau a kisek sa, a picing sate ading ahi hi.
58006001	Tua ahi manin Khrist tawh kisai ah picin lam manawh ni. Sihna hong tun nasepnate pan kisikna bulkipte phut kik loin Pasian upna,
58006002	baptisenate tawh kisai lamlahnate, khutngaknate, misite thawhkiknate, le tawntung thukhennate tawh kisai, thuhilhna bulpite nusia ni.
58006003	Pasian in hong phal leh tua bangin i hih ding hi.
58006004	Khatvei khuavak mu khin a, vantung letsong a ciam khin, Khasiangtho sunga tanh a nei khin,
58006005	Pasian thu hoihna le hong tung ding khanghun vangliatnate a ciam khin mite,
58006006	a pukmang uh leh kisik theih ahi kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau man nadingin Pasian Tapa a kilhlum kik uh hi-a, mipi mai-ah sim mawhna a thuaksak kik uh ahi hi.
58006007	A hunhunin guah a dawl, a kikhawh sakpa adingin a manpha gah a gahsak tua lo, Pasian thupha ngah ahi hi.
58006008	Ahi hangin ling le thanglingte a pona lo in kimanna nei lo-a, a kihamsiat ding lauhuai hi. A tawpna-ah a kihaltum ding hi.
58006009	Hih bang i cih tei hangin kong it lawmte aw, no tawh kisai-in hotkhiatna tawh kipawl a hoihzaw nate no aa hi, ci-in lungmuangin ka om hi.
58006010	Pasian thutang lo ahi kei hi; amah in na nasep uh le ama mite na huhnasa uh le na huh lai nadingte uhah amah na itna uh na lahnasa uh a mangngilh kei ding hi.
58006011	Na lametna uh a kip nadingin na vekun a tawpkhak dong tua bangin na thanuam ding uh kong deih uh hi.
58006012	Note na thadah ding uh kong deih kei uh a, upna le sikdona tungtawna kam ciamsa a luahte na etteh ding uh kong deih uh hi.
58006013	Pasian in Abraham tungah kamciam a piakin amah sanga lianzaw kiciam nading om lo ahi manin amahmah kilo in kiciam a,
58006014	"Thupha kong pia taktak ding a, suan le khak tampi kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
58006015	Tua mah bangin lungduaitaka a ngak khit ciangin Abraham in tua a kikamciamsa a ngah hi.
58006016	Mihingte, amau sanga lianzaw khat lo-in kiciam uh a, tua kiciamna in thu kigen pen kipsakin kiselna khempeuh a beisak hi.
58006017	Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in a kamciamsa a luahte tungah, ama tupna bang a khellohna theisak nuam ahi manin tomlawhna tawh a kipsak hi.
58006018	Eite in hong kipia lametna len-a i delh laitakin nakpi-a i kihanthawn theih nadingin Pasian zuautheihlohna thu nih tawh Pasian in a hih zo hi.
58006019	Eite in tua lametna kha adingin sikkipin i nei a, kip mahmah in muanhuai hi. Tua in, puanzak nung mun siangtho sungnung ah lut-a,
58006020	tua munah Jesu eite ma-ah eite tangin a na lut khinzo hi. Amah Melchizedek gui zui-in tawntung tulpi hong suak hi.
58007001	Hih Melchizedek pen Salem kumpipa hi-a a Sang Pen Pasian siampi ahi hi. Amah in, kumpite zo khina hong ciah, Abraham na dawnin thupha pia-a,
58007002	tua ciangin Abraham in, amah na khempeuh ah sawm ah khat a pia hi. A masa penin a min khiatna “thumaanna kumpipa” hi a, tua ciangin “lemna kumpipa” cihna “Salem kumpipa” zong ahi hi.
58007003	Nu nei lo, pa nei lo, khangsimna nei lo, kipat ni le nuntakna bei ni a nei lo, Pasian Tapa bangin, a tawntungin siampi-in a om den hi.
58007004	Amah bangzah takin lian hiam, ngaihsun dih ni. Pupi Abraham nangawn in a galvan matte panin sawm ah khat pia tanghial hi!
58007005	Tu-in Levi suan le khak siampi a suakte in a sanggamte uh ahi Abraham suan le khakte hi taleh amaute tung panin sawmah khat a kaih ding uh thukham in a kal hi.
58007006	Bangbang ahi zongin hih mipa in a pianna Levi pan sut lo napi, Abraham tung pan sawmah khat na kai-a, kamciamte a ngahpa thupha na pia hi.
58007007	Tua hi-a a lianzawpa in a neuzawpa thupha a piak pen theihkhialh nading a om kei hi.
58007008	Thukhat ah, a si thei mihingte in sawmah khat kai uh a, a thudang khatah a nungta hi a kici pa in a kai hi.
58007009	Sawmah khat a kai Levi in Abraham tungtawnin sawmah khat pia hi, nangawn kici thei ding hi.
58007010	Bang hang hiam cih leh Melchizedek in Abraham a na dawn hun laitakin Levi in a pubul pumpi sungah a om lai hi.
58007011	Levi-te siampi nasepna tungtawnin kicinna kingah hileh (ahang in, tua hihna kibulphuh in mite tungah thukham a kipia ahi hi.) bang hanga Aaron gui ahi lo, Melchizedek gui siampi dang hong pai kul lai ding ahi hiam?
58007012	Ahang in, siampi hina kilaihna a om bangin thukham zong laih pelmawh a kul hi.
58007013	Hih nate a kigenna pa ahileh beh tuam mi khat hi-a, tua beh panin kuamah biakna-tau ah nasem ngei a om kei hi.
58007014	Ahang in, eite Topa lah Judah suan le khak ahilam kitel zo a, tua beh tawh kisai-in Moses in siampite thu bangmah a gen kei hi.
58007015	Melchizedek bang siampi dang khat hong kilang ahi ciangin thugen hong kitelzaw semsem a,
58007016	tua siampi hong suakpa pen a pu a pa ua ngeina tawh hong suak hi loin, a kisia thei lo nuntakna’ vangliatna pansanin siampi hong suak ahi hi.
58007017	Ahang in, “Nang, Melchizedek gui zui-in tawntung siampi na hi hi,” ci-in kipulak hi.
58007018	Ngeina masa pen thanemin kiman na nei lo ahi manin kinawlkhin a,
58007019	(ahang in, thukham in bangmah a hoih kimsak kei hi.) a hoihzaw lametna hong kipia in, tua tungtawnin Pasian kiang i nai hi.
58007020	Tua nangawn zong kiciamna lo tawh hi peuhmah lo hi! Adangte kiciamna khat beek om loin siampi a suak uh hi.
58007021	Ahi hangin Pasian in kiciamna tawh ama tungah thu a gen khit ciangin siampi hong suak a: “Topa kiciam in, a lungsim a khel kei ding hi: “Nang tawntung siampi na hi hi,” ci hi,
58007022	Hih kiciamna hangin, Jesu a hoihzaw thukhun kipsakpa hong suak hi.
58007023	Tu-in sihna in amaute nasep a khaktan nungsangin siampi tampi a om hi.
58007024	Ahi hangin Jesu nungta tawntung ahi manin amah a kipden siampi ahi hi.
58007025	Tua ahi manin ama tungtawnin Pasian kianga a paite khempeuh kicingtakin honkhia thei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tanga a thumsak dingin a nungta tawntung hi.
58007026	Tua bang tulpi khat – a siangtho, a kawkbaang lo, a siang, mawhneite pana kikhenkhia, vante tunglama a kitawisang pa khat in, eite kitaksapna hong pia zo mahmah hi.
58007027	Tulpi dangte tawh kibang lo a, a masa in ama mawhna, tua ciangin mite mawhnate, biakpiakna ni khat khit ni khatin piak a kul kei hi. Amah in amaute mawhna ading amahmah biakpiakna-a a kipiak ciangin khatvei in cin khin hi.
58007028	Ahang in, thukham in a thanem mite’ tulpi in seh-a, ahi hangin thukham nunga hong pai kiciamna in a tawntunga hoihkim-a kibawl, Tapa a seh zo hi.
58008001	I thu gen, hih ahi hi; vantung ah Thupina kumpi tokhom taklam-a tu tua bang tulpi i nei a,
58008002	amah mihing bawl ahi lo, Topa bawl biakbuk taktaka munsiangtho-a sempa ahi hi.
58008003	Tulpi peuhmah biakpiakna le letsongte pia dinga kiseh ahi hi; tua ahi ciangin hih pa in zong piak ding na khat a neih ding kisam hi.
58008004	Thukham in a kalh letsongte a pia ding mi na om zo a hi manin, amah leitunga om hileh siampi a hi kei ding hi.
58008005	Amaute in munsiangtho khat sungah na sem uh a tua pen vantunga om pen liim leh kibatpih ahi hi. Hih thu hangin Moses in biakbuk lam dinga a kipat ciangin, “Mual tunga nang hong kilaksa bangin na khempeuh na bawl ding thei in,” ci-in a vauhilh hi.
58008006	Ahi hangin Jesu hong palaina thukhun bel, thukhun lui sanga thupizaw hoihzaw kamciamte tunga kibulphuh ahi manin amaute nasepna sangin Jesu nasepna a thupizaw hi.
58008007	Ahang in, a masa pen thukhun a khialhna khat beek om lo hileh thukhun dang ading mun a kizong kei ding hi.
58008008	Ahi hangin Pasian in tua mite mawhsak nading mu a, “Israel innkuante le Judah innkuante tawh thukhun thak ka bawl hun hong tung ding hi, Topa in cikhia hi.
58008009	A pu a pa-te a khut uah lenin Egypt pana ka paikhiatpih lai-in amaute tawh ka thukhun bang ahi kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka thukhun ah amaute muanhuai tawntung lo uh a, amaute ka nungngatsan ta hi, Topa in cikhia hi.
58008010	Hih in Israel innkuante tawh, tua hun khit cianga ka thukhun ding ahi hi, Topa in cikhia hi. Ka thukhamte amaute lungsim ah ka guang dinga, amau lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Amaute Pasian ka hi dinga, amaute ka mite ahi ding uh hi.
58008011	Kuamah in a vengte ahikeh ama sanggampa tungah hilhin, ‘Topa thei in,’ cih a kul nawn kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute khempeuh in a neu pen pan a lian pen dongin kei hong thei ta ding uh hi.
58008012	Ahang in, amaute gitlohna ka maisak dinga, a mawhnate uh ka ciamteh nawn kei ding hi,” ci khin hi.
58008013	Hih thukhun “athak” cihna in thukhun a masa zatmawh a suaksak hi, zatmawh a suaksa a lui pen a mangthang pah ding hi.
58009001	Thukhun masa in biakna-a zat ding zuihtawm ngeina le leitung mun siangtho zong a nei hi.
58009002	Biakbuk khat a kilam hi. Tua buk dei masa ah meivak tunna, sabuai le a ki-apsa anlum om a, Mun Siangtho kici hi.
58009003	Puanzak nihna nungah Mun Siangtho Pen kici inndei khat a om hi.
58009004	Tua mun ah gim namtui halna kham biakna-tau le kham a kizut thukhun singkuang a om hi. Hih sing kuang sungah manna koihna kham bel, asel Aron ciangkhut le thukhun kigelhna suangpekte a om hi.
58009005	Singkuang tungsan ah thoihdamna mun limsunin Minthanna cherub-te a om hi. Ahi hangin hih nate tu-in i sut ditdet zo kei ding hi.
58009006	Hih bangin na khempeuh a kigualh diudeu khit ciangin siampite a nasepna uh sem dingin dei puanung sungah a hunhunin a lut den uh hi.
58009007	Ahi hangin inndei sung nung pen sungah tulpipa bek lut-a, kum khatin khatvei bek lutin amahmah ading le mite in a theih loh man-ua a bawl uh mawhnate tang dingin sisan a tawi lo ngei kei hi.
58009008	Hih thu hangin biakbuk masa pen a om laiteng Mun Siangtho paina lampi kilak nai lo tadih hi, cih Khasiangtho in hong lak hi.
58009009	Hih pen tu hun ading etsakna hi-a, letsongte le biakpiakna-a kipiate in hih biakna a piate kitheihna lungsim a siangsak thei kei hi, cih lahna ahi hi.
58009010	Tuate nek le dawn a kisitna ngeina tuamtuam lel hi-a, biakna ngeina thak hong tun mateng-a zat ding zuihtawm ngeina bek ahi hi.
58009011	Hih lai-a omsa a na hoihte tawh tulpi dinga Khrist hong pai lai-in piansak na laka kihel lo, mihing khuta kibawl lo, a lianzaw le a kicianzaw biakbuk sungah a lutsuak hi.
58009012	Amah, keelte le bawngnote sisan tawh lut lo-a, ama sisan mahmah tawh khatvei-a cin ding, tawntung tatkhiatna ngahsa in Mun Siangtho Pen ah a lut hi.
58009013	Biakna ngeina-a a sianglote tungah keelte, bawngtalte sisan le bawngla-vute kithehin amaute kisian suah a, tua bangin a puatham uh a siang hi.
58009014	Tua ahileh tawntung Kha tungtawnin amahmah kawk baang lo a; Pasian tunga kipia Khrist sisan in sihna hong tun nasepna panin a nungta Pasian na i sep theih nadingin i lungsim kitheihna hong siangsak zawtham lo ding ahi hiam!
58009015	Hih thu hang mahin thukhun thak palai Khrist hong hi-a, a kisam mite in a kiciamsa tawntung gouluahna a ngah theih nadingun, thukhun masa nuai-a a bawlsa uh mawhnate pan a suaktasak dingin tu-in tatman dingin amah hong si zo hi.
58009016	Thusiah tawh kisai peuhmah ah, a thusiahpa a sihna theihcian ding kisam hi;
58009017	bang hang hiam cih leh a thusiahpa a sih khit ciang bekin a thusiah kizang thei pan hi; a thusiahpa a nuntak sungin a kizang thei ngei kei hi.
58009018	Thukhun masa na ngawn zong sisan lo-a a na hih theih lohna hih thu hang mah ahi hi.
58009019	Moses in mite khempeuh tungah thukham in a piak thu teng a tangko lai-in, bawngnote sisan le tui, samul dupsan le puknah hiangte in laizial le mite khempeuh theh khawm hi.
58009020	Amah in, “Hih in Pasian in note zuih dinga hong piak thukhun sisan ahi hi,” ci hi.
58009021	Tua mah tawh kibangin, biakbuk le biakna ngeina-a kizang na khempeuh sisanin a theh hi.
58009022	A taktakin thukham in na khempeuh phial sisan tawh siansak dingin kal-a, sisan kibua loin mawh maisakna a om kei hi.
58009023	Tua ciangin hih biakpiaknate zangin vantunglam nate kibatpihte siansuah a kul ahi hi. Ahi hangin vantunglam nate mahmah, hihte sanga biakpiakna hoihzaw ahi hi.
58009024	Ahang in, Khrist ahileh a taktak tawh a kisun bek, mihing bawl a siangtho mun ah a lut kei hi; Pasian mai-ah eite tanga a va kilang dingin vantung mahmah ah a lut khin zo hi.
58009025	Tulpi in ama sisan ahi lo sisan tawisa in Mun Siangtho Pen ah kum simin a lut bangin vantungah Khrist a lut kikkik kei hi.
58009026	Tua bang hi hileh leitung kipiansak nungsang Khrist in tamveipi a na thuak kul ding hi. Ahi hangin tu-in khanghunte bei hunin khatvei-a kimang den mawh maisak nadingin amahmah biakpiakna-in hong kilang zo hi.
58009027	Mihing adingin khatvei sih ding laitansa hi-a, tua khit ciangin thukhenna a thuak ding hi.
58009028	Tua bang tektek in Khrist zong mi tampi mawhnate lakhiamang dingin khatvei biakpiakna in kipia zo hi; tua hi-a mawhna a pua ding hi nawn lo, amah a ngak mite hotkhiatna puak dingin a nihveina hong kilang ding hi.
58010001	Thukham pen hong tung ding na hoihte liim bek hi-a a taktakte hi lo hi. Hih thu hangin thukham in kum khat khit kum khat a kipia kikkik biakpiaknate zangin, a bia dinga a kianga a va naihte a hoihkimsak thei ngei kei hi.
58010002	Hoihkimsak thei hileh tua piaknate kitawpsak khin lo ding ahi hiam? Ahang in, a biate khatvei a kimangden siansaksa hi dinga amau mawhnate hangin mawh kisakna a nei nawn kei ding uh hi.
58010003	Ahi hangin tua biakpiaknate kum sima mawhna phawksak kikna ahi hi,
58010004	bang hang hiam cih leh bawngtalte le keelte sisan in mawhna a lakkhiamang thei kei hi.
58010005	Tua ahi manin Khrist leitungah hong pai lai in: “Biakpiakna le biakna na lunggulh kei hi, ahi hangin kei ading pumpi khat nong bawlkholhsak zo hi.
58010006	Meihal biakna le mawhna hanga biaknate in hong lungkimsak lo hi.
58010007	Tua ciangin ken, ‘Kei hih lai-ah ka om hi – laizial sungah kei thu a kigelh zo hi — Pasian aw, na deih bang a sem dingin kong pai hi,’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
58010008	Amah in a masa penin, “Biakpiaknate le biaknate, meihal biakna le mawhna hanga biaknate na lunggulh kei a, tuate tawh zong na lungkim tuan kei hi,” (thukham in tuate bawl ding na kal napi) a ci hi.
58010009	Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei hih lai-ah ka om hi, na deihna sem dingin kong pai hi,” ci khin zo hi. A nihna a kipsak nadingin a masa pen a nawlkhin hi.
58010010	Tua thuseh hangin khatvei-a manden dingin Jesu Khrist pumpi-a biakpiakna tungtawnin eite hong kisiangthosak zo hi.
58010011	Siampi peuhmah in ni khat khit ni khat dingin ama biakna nasepte a sem hi; mawhnate a lakhiamang thei lo kithoihnate mah a pia kikkik hi.
58010012	Ahi hangin hih siampipa in hun khempeuh ading mawhnate biakpiakna khat a piak khit ciangin Pasian taklamah a tu hi.
58010013	Tua khit nungsang ama galte a khepek ngakna a kisuahsak ding a ngak hi;
58010014	ahang in, a kisangthosak mite, khatvei biakpiakna tawh a tawntungin a hoihkimsak hi.
58010015	Hih thu Khasiangtho in eite tungah teci a pang hi. A masa in,
58010016	"Tua hun khit ciangin amaute tawh ka bawl ding, thukhun hih ahi hi, Topa in ci hi. Amaute lungtang sungah ka thukhamte ka koih dinga, amaute lungsim sungah tuate ka gelh ding hi,” ci hi,
58010017	Tua khit ciangin: “Amaute mawhnate le thukham palsat-a a gamtatnate uh ka phawk nawn kei ding hi,” a cihbeh lai hi.
58010018	Tua ahi ciangin hihte a kimaisak nasa mun ah mawhna hanga biakpiakna khat beek a om nawn peuhmah kei hi.
58010019	Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, Jesu sisan hangin Mun Siangtho Pen ah lut ding kimuanna i neih nungsang,
58010020	eite adingin tua puanzak kantanin a nungta le a thak lampi khat kihong zo a; tua pen ama pumpi ahi hi.
58010021	Tua hi-a Pasian innkuan tungah eite in siampilian khat i neih nungsang,
58010022	eite lungsim kisuantakna panin i lungtangte thehsiangsa le i pumpi tuisiang tawh silsa in, upna hanga kitheihtelna kim tawh Pasian kiang zuan ni.
58010023	Eite hong kamciampa muanhuai ahi manin i sansa lametna hoihtakin lenkip ni.
58010024	Tua bangin eite khat le khat itna le gamtat hoih lama i kithanopsuah theih nadingin ngaihsun ni.
58010025	Pawlkhatte a kingeinaseh bang uh hi loin kikhop khawmna nusia kei ni. Ahi hangin, tua Ni in hong naih ta cih na theih bangun khat le khat kihanthawn semsem ni.
58010026	Thutak theihna i ngah nungin thei gegu pi mahin mawhna i bawl lai leh mawhnate biakpiak nading om nawn lo a,
58010027	ahi hangin thukhenna le Pasian galte a valhtum ding meikuang zuahzuah a lauhuai lametna bek a om lai hi.
58010028	Moses thukham a nial peuhmah teci nih hiam, thum hiam om nak leh lainatna om loin a si hi.
58010029	Amah a siangsak thukhun sisan, a siangtho lo na bangin simmawh a, hehpihna Kha engko-in, Pasian Tapa a khenuai-a a tuancil mi, bangzah ta-a, a nasiazaw-in gawttakin na ngaihsun hiam?
58010030	Ahang in, “Phulakna kei aa hi-a, ken ka thuk ding hi,” cih le “Topa in a mite thu a khen ding hi,” a ci kik pa i thei hi.
58010031	A nungta Pasian khut sunga puk ding mulkimhuai mahmah hi.
58010032	Note in khuavak na ngah khit nungua haksatna mai-ah panmun la a, nasiataka na do lai uh ni masate phawk un.
58010033	Khat veivei note, mi tampi mai-ah engko ding le bawlsiat dingin hong kipholaka, a hun dangte ah a kibawlsiate tawh na ding khawm uh hi.
58010034	Thong sunga kiate na khasiat uh a, na neih na lamte uh hong laksakna uh zong lungnuamtakin na sang uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note mahmah in no adingin a hoihzaw le a tozaw neihsa na nei uh cih na thei uh hi.
58010035	Tua ahi ciangin na kimuanna lungsim uh na paikhia kei un; pahtakman tampi hong kipia ding hi.
58010036	Pasian deihna na sep uh ciangin ama hong ciamsa na ngah nadingun na sikdo ding uh kisam hi.
58010037	Ahang in, hun tomno khat sungah, “Hong pai ding pa amah hong pai dinga a ziakai kei ding hi.
58010038	Ahi hangin ka mi thumaanpa upna tawh a nungta ding hi. Amah a nungtolh leh ama tungah ka lungkim kei ding hi,”
58010039	Eite i hileh nungtolh-a kisiate laka i hi kei a, ahi hangin uma kihonkhiate i hizaw hi.
58011001	Tu-in upna pen, i lamette tel cianna le i muh lohte theihtelna ahi hi.
58011002	Tanglai mite a kiphatna hihte hang ahi hi.
58011003	A kimu theite a kimu thei pana kibawl hi loin, khuavannuai, Pasian thupiaka piang ahi hi, cih upna-in i theitel hi.
58011004	Abel in upna hangin Cain sangin biakpiakna hoihzaw Pasian tungah a pia hi. Pasian in ama biaknate a phatgen lai-in upna hangin mi thumaan a hina a phat hi. Amah a sih khit hangin upna hangin thu gen lailai hi.
58011005	Enok in upna hangin sihna a thuak khak loh nadingin hih nuntakna pan a kilakhia hi; Pasian in amah lakhiamang zo ahi manin a kimu zo nawn kei hi. Ahang in, amah a kilak ma in, Pasian a lungkimsak pa khat hi, ci-a kiphatsa khat ahi hi.
58011006	Tua hi-a upna loin Pasian a kilungkimsak thei kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama kianga hong pai peuhmah in amah a om takpi mah hi, amah citaka a zongte pahtakman a pia hi, ci-a up ding a kul hi.
58011007	Noah in upna hangin a kimu nai lo nate ah a kivauhilh ciangin kihtakna siangtho tawh, a innkuanpihte hotkhiat nading gunkuangpi a lem hi. Ama upna hangin leitung mawhpaih a, upna hanga thumaanna a luahpa a suak hi.
58011008	Abraham in upna hangin a nung cianga, a luah dinga a ngahna muna pai dingin a kisap lai-in koi lamah pai ding cih nangawn a theih loh hangin mangin a pai hi.
58011009	Amah in a upna hangin gamdang a kiciamna gamah mikhual bangin inn a lam hi. Amah tawh a kibanga ciamna a luahpih Isaac le Jacob mah bangin tuipuan bukte ah a teng hi.
58011010	Ahang in, bulpite a nei khuapi lian khat a lamen hi. Tua khuapi a geelpa le a lampa Pasian ahi hi.
58011011	Abraham in upna hangin, amah tek lua ta-in Sara mahmah lah tasel hi napi ama tunga thu a ciampa muanhuai a sak manin amah pa khat a suah theihna kipia hi.
58011012	Tua hi-a hih a si tawh a kibang mi khat panin vantunga om aksite zaha tam le tuipi sehtak-a sehnel kisim zo lote zah, suan le khakte zong a piang hi.
58011013	Hih mite khempeuh upna tawh a nuntak lai mah un a si uh hi. Amaute in a kiciamsa nate ngah lo uh a, tuate gamlapi panin galmuh in a galmuak bek uh hi. Tua hi-a amaute leitungah gamdang mi le mikhual ahilam uh a kiphawk uh hi.
58011014	Tua bang a ci mite in amau ading gam khat a zong uh hi, cih a kilangsak hi.
58011015	Amaute in a nusiatsa uh gam na lunggulh den uh hileh ciah kik nading hun hoih nei khin tham ding uh hi,
58011016	Tua sangsikin, amaute in gam hoihzaw khat vantung gam a lunggulh uh hi. Pasian in amaute ading khuapi lian khat bawlkhol zo ahi manin, amau Pasian a kicih ding a maizum kei hi.
58011017	Pasian in a zia-et ciangin Abraham in upna hangin biakpiak nadingin Isaac a pia hi. Tua kam ciamna a ngahpa in a tapa khat neihsun biakpiakna-a pia dingin a kithawi hi.
58011018	Tua mah lah Pasian in, “Isaac tungtawnin na suan na khak a kiminlawh ding hi,” a cihna pa hi lai hi.
58011019	Abraham in, Pasian in misisate thosak thei, ci-in ngaihsun a tehpih in gen leng, amah in Isaac misi pan a ngah kik ahi hi.
58011020	Isaac in upna hangin Jacob le Esau mailam ding ngaihsunin thupha na pia hi.
58011021	Jacob in a sih kuanin upna hangin Joseph tapate thupha pia ciat-a a ciangkhut tungah kingamin na bia hi.
58011022	Joseph a sih kuanin upna hangin Israel mite Egypt pan a paikhiat nading le ama guhte tawh kisai lamlahna na pia hi.
58011023	Moses nu le pa-te in upna hangin, amah a suah khit kha thum sung sel uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amah naupang mawkmawk hi lo cih mu uh ahi manin kumpipa thupiak a kihta kei uh hi.
58011024	Moses in a khan khit ciangin upna hangin Pharaoh tanu’ tapa a kicih ding a nial hi.
58011025	Mawhna nopsakna-a tomvei sung gualnop sangin Pasian mite tawh bawlsiatna a thuak khawm ding teelzaw hi.
58011026	Mailam ah pahtakman a san ding a etkholh manin Khrist hanga maimawkna pen Egypt gam goute sangin manphazaw a sa hi.
58011027	Amah in upna hangin kumpipa hehna kihta loin Egypt nusia hi; amah in muh theih loh mipa a muh manin a thuak keeikai hi.
58011028	Amah in, upna hangin ta masa a thatpa in Israel ta masa a sukkhak loh nadingin Paisan-pawi le sisan thehna a na bawl hi.
58011029	Tua mite in upna hangin leihul a pai bangin San Tuipi a kantan uh hi; ahi hangin Egypt mite in tua bangin hih a sawm uh leh amaute tui ah kialum uh hi.
58011030	Mite in upna hangin, Jericho ni sagih sung a kimkot khit uh ciangin khulhte a cim hi.
58011031	Numei kizuak Rahab in, upna hangin thukansimte a tunsak manin thumang lote tawh a kithat khawm kei hi.
58011032	Bang genbeh lai ding ka hi hiam? Gideon Barak, Samson, Jephtha, David, Samuel le kamsangte thu gen nading ka hun a kicing kei hi.
58011033	Amaute in upna tungtawnin kumpi gamte zo uh a, thutang tawh ukin, a kiciamsate a ngah uh hi; amaute in humpinelkai kamte khak uh a
58011034	meikuangpi phelhmitin namsau ma pan suakta uh hi. Amaute thanemna thakhauhna suakin galdona ah vanglian uh a, gamdang galte zo mang uh hi.
58011035	Numeite in amau misite, a nungtasa-in ngah kik uh hi. Adangte kigawt-a, thawhkikna hoihzaw ngah dingin a kikhah khiat ding a nial uh hi.
58011036	Adangte sikkhainiang tawh kikhihin thong sungah a kikhum laitakin pawlkhatte in ciamnuih bawlna le sat gawpna a thuak uh hi.
58011037	Amaute suang in kideng, amaute singat tawh tumnih kisuah; amaute namsau tawh kithat hi. Amaute in tuu vun, keel vunte silhin vakvai uh a, gentheih bawlna, bawlsiatna le khel bawlna kithuaksak hi.
58011038	Amaute adingin leitung tenna taak hi lo hi. Amaute gamlak mualsang, suanghawm le kaw hawm sungah a tai kawikawi uh hi.
58011039	Amaute in a upna uh hangin phatna a ngah uh hi. Tua hi napi amaute kuamah in tua ciamsa pen a ngah kei uh hi.
58011040	Pasian in eite ading a hoihzaw khat geel khin zo ahi manin eite tawh i kimkhawm ciang bekin amaute kihoihkimsak ding hi.
58012001	Tua ahi manin hihzah taka a tam teci meiipite in i kimkot ah hong um ahi ciangin eite hong dal na khempeuh le baihtaka hong awksak ziau thei mawhna paikhia-in eite adingin i mai-a kiciamtehsa tai kidemna zui-in sikdotakin tai ni.
58012002	Ama mai-a kikoih lungnopna a ngah nadinga singlamteh ah simmawh bawlsiatnate a thuak keeikai khit ciangin Pasian taklamah a tu, i upna a piang sakpa le a hoihkimsakpa Jesu mitsuan gige ni.
58012003	Note lungkia a, thanemin na om loh nadingun mawhdim mite in amah a langbawlna a thuakpa na ngaihsun un.
58012004	Mawhna do-a na panna-uhah na sisan uh a luan dongin na do nai kei uh hi.
58012005	Tapate banga note kianga hong gen, “Ka tapa aw, Topa hong sekna neu ngaihsut kei in; amah in nang hong tai ciangin na lung kiasak kei in;
58012006	bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a itte sek-a, tapa-a a sante peuhmah dan a tuaksak hi”
58012007	Haksatnate sekna hi, ci-in thuak keeikai un; Pasian in tapa bangin hong bawl hi. Ahang in, a pa in a sek loh ta bangci ta ahi hiam?
58012008	Note hong kisek kei leh (mi peuhmah in sekna a thuak hi.) tapate taktak hi loin zawlta na hi-ua hi ding hi.
58012009	Tua tham loin eite khempeuh in pianna pa i nei teka amaute in ei hong sekin tua hangin amaute i zahtak hi. I khate’ Pa tungah ki-ap zawthamin nungta lo ding i hi hiam?
58012010	I pate in tomcik sunga dingin, amau in hoih pen a sak uh bangin eite hong sek uh a, ahi hangin Pasian in ama sianthona i tanhpih theih nadinga i hoih nadingin hong sek ahi hi.
58012011	Hong kisek laitakin sekna a nuam om loin na velval hi. A kisin khinsate in a nung ciangin thumaanna le lemna gah gahkhia uh hi.
58012012	Tua ahi manin a zawngkhal na bante uh le a thanem na khukte uh hatsak un!
58012013	Khebaite kilawi loin a dam zawk nadingin, “Na khete uh ading lamphei sial un.”
58012014	Mi khempeuh tawh kilemin nungta a, na siantho nadingun nakpi-in hanciam un; sianthona lo tawh kuamah in Topa a mu kei ding hi.
58012015	Kuamah in Pasian hehpihna ngah lo-a, a om loh nading le a khaatna zung po toin buaina piangsaka, mi tampi a ninsak ding tua zung a sel loh nadingin kikem un.
58012016	Kuamah in numei-pasal paktatna bawl kei hen, ahikeh an nek khat tawh tapa upa luahna za a zuak pasian-milo Esau bangin om kei hen.
58012017	Na theihsa bangun tua khit ciangin hih thupha a luah nop hangin amah kinial ta hi. Khitui luangin tua thupha a zon kik hangin lungsim kikhelna a suah zo kei hi.
58012018	Note a kilawng thei, mei-a a kang thei, khuamialpi, khuazing le huihpi;
58012019	pengkul mutna ahikeh thu kigen a zate in amau tunga tua bang thu a kigen nawn loh nadinga a nget zawzen uh aw a ginna mual a tung na hi kei uh hi.
58012020	Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Ganhing nangawn in tua mualpi a sukkhak leh suangin kidenglum pelmawh ding hi,” ci-a thu kipia amaute in a thuak zo kei uh hi.
58012021	Tua a muh pen lipkhaphuai lua ahi manin Moses in, “Lau in ka ling hi,” na ci hi.
58012022	Ahi hangin note hong tunna mual pen Zion Vum hi-a, a nungta Pasian khuapi ahi vantung Jerusalem ahi hi. Note, vansawltak tul tampi mun tul tampite lungnuama a kikhopna,
58012023	van tungah a min uh a kigelhsa, ta masa pawlpi kiang hong tung ta na hi uh hi. Mi khempeuh tunga thukhenpa: mi thumaante kha a hoihkimsakpa Pasian kiang,
58012024	thukhun thak palai pa Jesu kiang le Abel sisan sanga thu hoihzaw a gen sisan kitheh kiang tung zo na hi uh hi.
58012025	Tua thu a genpa na nial loh nading un kikem un. Leitung ah amaute a vauhilhpa a nial uh ciangin suakta lo uh ahileh vantung pana eite hong vauhilhpa nungngatsan lehang i suahtak nading baih lo semsem ding hi lo ahi hiam?
58012026	Tua hun laitakin a aw ging in lei lingsaka ahi hangin tu-in, “Khatvei lai, lei bek hi lo vante zong ka lingsak ding hi,” ci-in thu a ciam zo hi.
58012027	Tua kammal “khatvei lai” cih in a kipiangsak nate, a kiling thei khempeuh paikhiat nading le a kiling lote om den theih nading cihnopna ahi hi.
58012028	Tua ahi manin eite, a kiling thei lo gam a ngah i hi nungsangin lungdam ni. Tua ciangin zahtakna le launa tawh san theih dingin Pasian bia ni.
58012029	Ahang in, eite Pasian pen a haltum mei ahi hi.
58013001	Sanggam bangin khat le khat ki-it tawntung un.
58013002	Mikhualte zindo ding mangngilh kei un; tua banga a hih pawlkhatte in a theih loh kalun van sawltakte a zindo uh ahi hi.
58013003	Thongkiate tawh a kiakhawm bang le bawlsiatna a thuakte tawh nang mahmah a thuak khawm bangin amaute na phawk den un.
58013004	Numei-pasal paktatnate khempeuh le angkawmte tungah Pasian in thu khen ding ahi manin, mi khempeuh in, kitenna pahtawi-in nupa lupna siangthosak uh hen.
58013005	Pasian in, “Nang kong nusia kei dinga nang kong taisan ngei kei ding hi,” ci ahi manin sum iplahluatna panin kikem unla, na neih zahzah uh tawh lungkim un.
58013006	Tua ciangin eite in kimuangtakin, “Topa in kei hong huhpa hi; ka lau kei ding hi, mihing in kei bang hong cih thei ding ahi hiam? ci hi.
58013007	Note tunga Pasian thu hong gen na makaite uh phawk gige un. Amaute nuntakzia pana hong piangkhiate ngaihsun unla, amau upna etteh un.
58013008	Jesu Khrist zanni tuni le a tawntungin kibang den hi.
58013009	Thuhilhna tuamdangte khempeuh na kipimangsak kei un. A nete adingin kimanna a nei lo biakna ngeina ante sangin, hehpihna hanga a kithakhauhsak i lungtangte adingin a hoih hi.
58013010	Eite in biakbuk sunga nasemte in a nek theih lohna biakna-tau khat i nei hi.
58013011	Tulpi in, mawhna hanga biakna-in Mun Siangtho Pen ah gante sisan paipih hi; ahi hangin a luangte giahphual pualamah kihal hi.
58013012	Tua mah tawh kibangin Jesu in, ama sisan tungtawnin mite a siangthosak nadingin khuapi pualam ah thuak khin zo hi.
58013013	Tua ahi ciangin ama thuak maimawkna thuak dingin giahphual pua ama kiangah pai ni.
58013014	Ahang in, hih lai-ah a om den ding khuapi i nei kei a, ahi hangin hong tung ding khuapi i zong hi.
58013015	Tua ahi manin Pasian tungah Jesu tungtawna phatna biakpiakna-a ama min a lo mukte gah pia tawntung ni.
58013016	A hoih sep ding le midangte hop ding mangngilh kei ni; tua bang biakpiaknate tawh Pasian kilungkimsak hi.
58013017	Na makaite uh thu mangin amau thuneihna ah ki-ap un. Amaute nasepna a pulak pelmawh ding mi bangin note hong vil uh ahi hi. Amau nasepnate ah vangik suak lo a, lungnopna a suah nadingin amaute thu na mang un; tua hi kei leh no adingin phatuam lo ding hi.
58013018	Ko ading thu hong ngetsak un. Lungsim kisuantakna nei lo le lam khempeuh ah pahtawitaka nuntak ding ka lunggulh lam uh ka telcian uh hi.
58013019	A diakdiakin note kianga kong pai kik theih baih nading thu nong ngetsak ding uh kong thum hi.
58013020	Tawntung thukhun sisan tungtawn in a lian Tuu cingpa i Topa Jesu misi pana a thosak tua lemna Pasian in,
58013021	ama deihna sep nadingin a hoih na khempeuh note hong guanin Jesu Khrist tungtawnin eite sungah ama lungkimna bangbangin hong sem henla ama tungah a tawntungin minthanna om den ta hen. Amen.
58013022	Sanggamte aw, laikhak tomno khata kong gelh ahi manin kong hanthawnnate nong thuakzawh ding uh kong thum hi.
58013023	I sanggampa Timothy kikhah khia zo, cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi. Amah hong tun baih leh no tawh kimu dingin kong paikhawm ding uh hi.
58013024	Na makaite khempeuh uh le Pasian mite khempeuh na hopihsak un. Italy pana mite in hong hopihna uh hong khak uh hi.
58013025	Note khempeuh tawh hehpih na om ta hen.
59001001	Pasian le Topa Jesu Khrist nasem keimah James in, Minamte lakah kithehthang beh sawm-le-nihte: Kong hopih hi.
59001002	Ka sanggamte aw, zia-etna a tuam tuam na thuak uh ciangin nuamna takpi-in na ngaihsun un.
59001003	Bang hang hiam cih leh upna hong kizia-et ciangin sikdona khangsak zaw hi, cih na thei uh hi.
59001004	Bangmah kisam loin picingin na kicin nadingun sikdona in no tungah na a sep khit pelmawh kul hi, cih na thei uh hi.
59001005	Note lakah pilna kisam khatpeuh a om leh, kuamah tai lo-a cingh taka a pia pa Pasian kiangah ngen leh amah kipia ding hi.
59001006	Ahi hangin a nget ciangin lunghei nei loin a up pelmawh kisam hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a lunghei neite, huih muta kilok tuipi hual tawh kibang hi.
59001007	Tua bang mi in Topa tung pan na khatpeuh ngah dingin kingaihsun kei hen.
59001008	Amah lungka mi hi-a, a hihna khempeuh ah kipna mel a nei lo mi ahi hi.
59001009	A nuntakna a niam sanggamte in a dinmun sang uh kisaktheihpih uh hen.
59001010	Ahi hangin a hau mi khatin, a dinmun niamna kisaktheihpih hen, bang hang hiam cih leh amah gamlak pakte bangin a mangthang ding hi.
59001011	Ahang in, ni suakin nakpi-in sa-a singno a kungkeu hi; a pakte pulh-a; a mel hoihna teng kisusia hi. Tua mah bangin a haute a sumbawl laitak nangawnun a vuaimang ding uh hi.
59001012	Zia-etna thuaka, a sikdo mi thupha ngah ahi hi. Bang hang hiam ci leh zia-etna a thuak zawh khit ciangin Pasian in amah a itte a kamciamsa nuntakna lukhu a ngah ding hi.
59001013	Amah a kizia-et ciangin kuamah in, “Pasian in kei hong zia-et hi,” ci kei hen. Gitlohna-in Pasian kizia-et thei lo-a, amah in zong gitlohna tawh kuamah a zia-et kei hi;
59001014	ahi hangin mi khatpeuh ama gitloh lunggulhna in kai-a a zol ciangin zia-etna a thuak ahi hi.
59001015	Tua lunggulhna a gaii khit ciangin mawhna a suakkhia hi; mawhna a picin khit ciangin sihna a suak hi.
59001016	Kong it sanggamte aw, mi khemsa-in om kei un.
59001017	A hoih le a bukim letsong peuhmah tunglam pan hi-a, vantung khuavakte’ Pa pana hong kipia ahi hi. Amah, niliimte banga a kilaihlaih hi lo hi.
59001018	Ama piansak khempeuh lakah a gahmasate i suah theih nadingin thutak thu tawh a suak dingin eite hong teel hi.
59001019	Kong it sanggamte aw, hih thu ciamteh un: A kuamah peuh thuzak ding manlang hen. Kampau ding le heh ding manlang kei hen.
59001020	Ahang in, mihing hehna in Pasian deih, a thumaan nuntakna a tun kei hi.
59001021	Tua ahi manin a kithangzat a kihhuai gamtatna khempeuh na tang un; note hong honkhia thei, note sunga kisuan thu lungnemin na sang un.
59001022	No le no kikhemin thu ngai lelte hi kei un. Thu banga a gamtate na hi un.
59001023	Mi khatpeuh in thu za napi in thu bangin a gamtat kei leh, a maitang limlangin en a,
59001024	a ki-et khit ciangin paikhia a, amah bang tawh kibang hiam cih a mang ngilhpahte tawh kibang ahi hi.
59001025	Ahi hangin suahtakna a pia thei a hoihkim thukham limtakin en-a, thu bangin gamta-a a zaksate mangngilh loin a sempah mi, ama sepna ah thupha kipia ding hi.
59001026	Mi khatpeuh, amah le amah biakna uukmi in kingaihsun napi, a leii a kep zawh kei leh amah le amah a kikhem suaka, ama biakna kimanna a om kei hi.
59001027	Eite Pa Pasian in khialhna nei lo le a sianga a san biakna in: tagahte le meigong numeite a lungdon ciangin don-a leitung nitsakna pana kikepna ahi hi.
59002001	Ka sanggamte aw, a minthang i Topa Jesu Khrist sunga thu-umte na hi uh bangin angvan tuam nei kei un.
59002002	Gentehna in note kikhopna sungah kham zungbuh bunin puan hoih silh khat hong lut a, mizawng puansia nemnam silh khat zong hong lut hi.
59002003	Note in puan hoih silh pa tuam bawlin, “Hih lai-ah tutphah nuam om hi,” na ci uh a, ahi hangin mizawng pa tungah, “Hua lai-ah na ding in,” ahikeh, “Ka khephung sual tungah na tu in,” ci-a thudon tuam na neih uh leh
59002004	mi deidan tuamin no le no sungah ngaihsutna hoih lo tawh thu a khen suak lo ding na hi uh hiam?
59002005	Kong it ka sanggamte aw, ngai un: Pasian in upna ah ahau ding le amah a itte a kamciam, ama gam a luah dingin leitung mite muhna-a a zawngte teel hi lo ahi hiam?
59002006	Ahi hangin note in a zawngte na zahlaksak uh hi. Note hong netum mihaute hi lo uh ahi hiam? Thukhenna mun hong tun amaute hi lo uh ahi hiam?
59002007	Note hong nei, ama min thupi a gensia amaute hi lo uh ahi hiam?
59002008	Laisiangtho sunga om: “Nang le nang na ki-it bangin na vengte it in,” a cih kumpi thukham na letkip takpi uh leh amaana gamta na hi uh hi.
59002009	Ahi hangin angvantuam na neih uh leh a mawh na hi uh a, thukham palsatte mah bangin thukham in mawh hong tangsak hi.
59002010	Ahang in, thukham a buppi-in zui napi, thu khat kia-a, a muktute a vekin a palsat khin a suak hi.
59002011	Ahang in, “Angkawm kei in,” hong ci pa in, “Tual that kei in,” zong hong ci lai hi. Ang na kawm loh hangin, tual na thah leh, thukham a palsat mah na hi hi.
59002012	Suahtakna a pia thukham in thu a khen ding mite bangin thugenin gamta un.
59002013	Bang hang hiam cih leh lainatna a nei lo mi peuhmah tungah lainatna om loin thu a kikhen ding hi. Thukhenna tungah lainatna a gualzo hi.
59002014	Ka sanggamte aw, mi khat in upna ka nei hi, a cih hangin gamtatkhiatna a neih kei leh bang phatuam ahi hiam? Tua bang upna in amah honkhia thei ahi hiam?
59002015	Gentehna in sanggampa khat ahikeh sanggamnu khat in puansilh le a nisim an nei loin om hi.
59002016	Note khat in ama kiangah, “Nuamtakin om in, khualum inla, an kham in,” ci-in ahi hangin a kisapnate bangmah na hihsak kei leh bang phatuam ahi hiam?
59002017	Tua mah tawh kibangin gamtatkhiatna in a zuih kei leh upna kia bek a si ahi hi.
59002018	Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in, “Nang upna na nei hi; ken gamtatna ka nei hi,” ci ding hi. Gamtatnate loin na upna hong lak in. Ken ka sepna-in ka upna kong lak ding hi.
59002019	Pasian khat om hi, cih na um hi. Pha hi! Dawite nangawn in tua mah umin lau-in a ling uh hi.
59002020	Nang mihaipa aw, gamtatna loin upna a kimanna om lo hi cih a kitelna na thei nuam hiam?
59002021	I pu Abraham in a tapa Isaac biakna-tau tungah a piak ciangin ama nasepsa thumaanin kisimsak hi lo ahi hiam?
59002022	Ama upna le a gamtatnate in semkhawm a, ama sepna in a upna bucingsak hi cih na thei hi.
59002023	Tua hi a, Laisiangtho in, “Abraham in Pasian um a, tua ama upna ama thumaanna-in kisimsak hi,” a cih tangtunga, amah Pasian lawmpa kici hi.
59002024	Mi khat a upna guak hi loin ama sepna in dik tangsak ahilam na thei hi.
59002025	Tua mah tawh kibangin numei kizuak Rahab nangawn in thukansimte zin tungsak a, lampi tuam ah a khakkhiat ciangin ama gamtatnasa hangin thu maan suak hi lo ahi hiam?
59002026	Kha a om lo pumpi a si ahi bangin gamtatna om lo upna a si ahi hi.
59003001	Ka sanggamte aw, sia a sem kote in a khauhzaw thukhenna thuak ding ka hi manun note a tampi sia suah na sawm kei un.
59003002	Eite i vekpi in lam tampi-ah i muktu hi. Mi khatpeuh in a kam pauna ah khialhna a neih kei leh amah mi picing khat hi-a, ama pumpi bup a kemcing thei mi zong ahi hi.
59003003	Sakolte in thu a man nadingin a kam sungah kamkaih i bulh khit ciangin tua ganhing a buppi-in i hei thei hi.
59003004	Ahi kei leh tembawpi gentehna in nei ni. Tuate lian mahmah a huih khauh mah mah in a mut hangin a hawlpa in a pai nopna peuhpeuh ah a heina neuno-in a hei hi.
59003005	Tua mah tawh kibangin leii pen pumpi na a neuno khat ahi hangin nakpitakin a kisial hi. Mei-ekno khat in gamsung lianpipi a katsak na ngaihsun in.
59003006	Leii zong mei khat mah hi-a, pumpi nate lakah gitlohna lompi ahi hi. A mihinna pumpi siasaka, a nuntak sung bup kangsakin, amah le amah zong meilipi in a kihal kuang ahi hi.
59003007	Mihing in ganhing nam khempeuh, vasate, a bokvak ganhingte zualsak zo-a, a khawi uh hi.
59003008	Ahi hangin kuamah in leii a zualsak zo kei hi. Leii pen a om mawkmawk thei lo, a gilo, sihtheihna gu tawh a dim khat ahi hi.
59003009	Tua leii-in i Topa le i Pa i phat a, tua mah-in Pasian a suna kibawl mihingte i hamsiat hi.
59003010	Tua kam khat mah panin phatna le hamsiatna pusuakkhia khawm hi. Ka sanggamte aw, hih bang ding hi lo hi.
59003011	Tuinak khat panin tuisiang le citui luangkhia khawm thei ahi hiam?
59003012	Ka sanggamte aw, theikung in olive gah, gah thei ahi hiam, ahikeh lenggui in theigah, gah thei ahi hiam? Citui nak ah tuisiang a luangkhia thei tuan kei hi.
59003013	Note lakah kua pil a, kua in theitel ahi hiam? Ama nuntak hoihna le a pilna pana hong piangkhia kiniamkhiatna sungah a gamtatna-in lak ta hen.
59003014	Ahi hangin note lungtang sungah enna khaa le huaiham tupna na selsiah uh leh tua hangin kisialh ding hi lo a, thutak a nial na hizaw uh hi.
59003015	Tua bang “pilna” vantung pana hong paisuk hi loin leitung pilna, khamilohna le gilopa aa hizaw hi.
59003016	Ahang in, enna le huaiham tupna a omna peuhah kilemlohna le gitloh gamtatna vive a om hi.
59003017	Ahi hangin vantung pana pilna ahileh a masa penin siangtho a, lemna deih in, midangte khual a, kiniamkhiat in, lainatna le gah hoih tawh dima, khentuam nei loin citak hi.
59003018	Lemna a vawh lemgente in thumaanna a at uh hi.
59004001	Note lakah kitotna le kidona bang in piangsak ahi hiam? Nomau sunga kido den lunggulhna pana piang hi lo ahi hiam?
59004002	Na khatpeuh na deih uh a, ahi hangin na ngah kei uh hi. Tual na that uh a, na deihgawh uh a, ahi hangin na deih uh na ngah tuan kei uh hi. Na kitawng uh a, na kilai uh hi. Pasian tungah ngen lo na hi manun na deih uh na ngah tuan kei uh hi.
59004003	Na nget uh ciangin na ngah kei uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh na ngahte uh nomau nopsak nadinga na zat theih nading uh tupna man lo tawh na ngen uh hi.
59004004	No angkawm hat mite aw, leitung tawh kilawmtakna in Pasian lama muhdahna ahilam thei lo na hi uh hiam? A lawm dinga leitung a teelte peuhmah Pasian gal a suak hi.
59004005	Ahi kei leh Laisiangtho in, eite sungah a nuntaksak kha in eng hi, a cih a thu om lopi-a a cih in ngaihsun na hi uh hiam?
59004006	Ahi hangin amah in eite hehpihna a tamzaw hong pia hi. Tua hangin Laisiangtho in: “Pasian in a kisatheite do a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,” ci hi.
59004007	Tua ahi ciangin Pasian tungah no le no kipia un. Dawimangpa do un, amah taimang ding hi.
59004008	Pasian naih un; amah in zong hong naih ding hi. No mawhneite aw, na khut uh sil un; no lungkate aw, na lungtang uh hahsiang un.
59004009	Lunggimin, thumin, kapkap un. Na nuihna uh thumna suaksak unla, na nuamna uh maigumna suaksak un.
59004010	Topa mai-ah no le no kiniamkhiat un; amah in hong lamto ding hi.
59004011	Sanggamte aw, khat le khat ki gensia kei un. Ama sanggampa a langgena, a tunga thu a khen peuhmah, thukham langgen-a, thukham tunga thukhen ahi hi. Thukham thu na khen ciangin thukham thu a mang lo na hi-a, thukham tunga thukhena a tutu na hi hi.
59004012	Thukham a pia pa le Thukhen pa khat bek om-a, a honkhia thei le a susia thei pa ahi hi. Ahi hangin na vengte thu a khen vial pa nang kua na hi hiam?
59004013	"Tuni hiam zingciang hiam in hih khuapi, tua khuapi-ah pai-in tua lai-ah kum khat taamin sum bawlin sum va zong ning,” a ci note aw, tu-in ngai un.
59004014	Zingciangin bang piang ding cih nangawn na thei kei uh hi. Na nuntakna uh bang ahi hiam? Note, tomcik sung a kilat khit ciangin a mangthang pah tuikhu na hi uh hi.
59004015	Tua sangsik in, “Pasian deihna ahileh i ci dam dinga, hihte, huate i sem ding hi,” na cih zawk ding uh ahi hi.
59004016	Note tua bangin kihisakin kisialhna kam na pau uh hi. Tua bang kisialhnate khempeuh gitlohna ahi hi.
59004017	Tua ahi ciangin ama sep dinga kilawm a hoih thei napi, a sem lo mi peuhmah a mawh ahi hi. Ph 39:5; Lk 12:47
59005001	No a hau mite aw, tu-in ngai un, no tungah gentheihna hong tung ding ahi manin kap unla kapkap un.
59005002	Na hauhna uh muat khina, na puante uh nget in gai khin hi.
59005003	Na ngun na khamte uh kekseu hi. Tuate kekseuna in note langah teci pang dinga, mei bangin na sa uh a ne ding hi. A beisa hun sung teng hauhna na khol zo ta uh hi.
59005004	En sin! A thaman na piak loh, na lo uh hong khawhsakte no langah kiko uh hi. An late kikona, a Thahatpen Topa bilah a tung zo hi.
59005005	Note, leitung ah noptatna zulhzauna-in na nungta uh hi. Hong kigawh ni-a dingin na kithausak uh hi.
59005006	No hong langbawl lo mawhpeng mite na mawhpaih uh a, na that zo uh hi.
59005007	Tua ciangin sanggamte aw, Topa hong pai mateng na thuak keeikai un. Lokhopa in sikhiau guah le tuk guahte ngak a, leitung in a manpha gah a gah ding lungduaitaka a ngak thei ta un.
59005008	Note zong lungduai in, kiptakin ding un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa hong pai ding nai ta hi.
59005009	Sanggamte aw, khat le khat na kiphunsan kei un, na kiphunsan uh leh thukhenna na thuak ding uh hi. Thukhenpa kongkhakah ding hi!
59005010	Sanggamte aw, gimna na thuak uh ciangin Topa mina thugen kamsangte lungduaina ettehin na nei un.
59005011	Na theihsa bangun a sikdote thupha ngahin ka ngaihsun uh hi. Job sikdona na za zo uh a, a tawpna-ah Topa in a piakte na mu zo uh hi. Khuatuahna le lainatna tawh Topa a dim hi.
59005012	Ka sanggamte aw, hih teng khempeuh banah vantung tawh ahi zongin, leitung tawh ahi zongin, na khat peuh peuh tawh ahi zongin na tomlo kei un. Hi na cih pen “Hi,” hi henla, hilo na cih pen “Hilo,” hi hen; tua hi kei leh nang hong kimawhpaih ding hi.
59005013	Note khatpeuh a lungmang a om hiam? Amah in thu ngen ta hen. A lungdam khatpeuh a om hiam? Phatna-late sa ta hen.
59005014	Note a cina khatpeuh na om uh hiam? Pawlpi upate samin amaute in thu ngetsak uh henla, ama tungah Topa minin sathau zut uh hen.
59005015	Upna tawh thungetna in cina mi damsak dinga, Topa in amah a phongto ding hi. Amah in mawhna a neih leh ama mawhna kimaisak ding hi.
59005016	Tua ahi manin na ci uh a dam theih nadingin na mawhnate uh kipulak tuahin thu na kingetsak ciat un. A thumaan mi thungetna vanglian in deihna a ngah hi.
59005017	Elijah zong eite mah bangin mihing khat mah hi lel hi. Amah in guah a zuk loh nadingin citakin a ngen hi. Tua ciangin kum thum le alang sung tua leitang tungah guah a zu kei hi.
59005018	Thu ngen kik a, vantungte in guah zusakin leitung in a gahte gahsak hi.
59005019	Ka sanggamte aw, note khatpeuh thutak panin piala, mi khatpeuh in a kiheikiksak leh,
59005020	hih thu phawk un: Mawhnei khat ama lampialna pan a kiheisak peuhpeuh in, amah sihna panin a honkhia hi-a, mawhna tampite a khuhsak ahi hi.
60001001	Jesu Khrist Sawltakpi Peter in, Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia le Bithynia gamte khempeuh a ki thenthanga hih leitunga mikhual-a om Pasian teelte,
60001002	Jesu Khrist thumang ding le a sisan thehna ngah dingin Pa Pasian theihkholhna tawh kizui-a Kha in a siansak nasepna hanga a kiteelsa mite tungah: Hehpihna le lemna note aa hi ta hen.
60001003	Eite Topa Jesu Khrist Pasian le Pa kiphat ta hen! Amah in hong lainatna lianpi-in misi pana Jesu thawhkikna tungtawnin ahing lametna,
60001004	note adinga vantunga kikoihkhol, a sia ngei lo, a nin baang lo, a tul thei lo gouluahna sungah eite suahthakna hong pia zo a,
60001005	hun beina-a hong kilang ding a baihsa-a om tua hotkhiatna hong tun mateng Pasian vangliatna tawh upna tungtawnin note hong kiliah ahi hi.
60001006	Tu laitak hun tomcik sung zia-etna namkim thuakin na lungkham uh zongin hih thu ah nakpitakin na lungnuam uh hi.
60001007	Mei-a a kihalsiang khit ciang nangawna a kisia thei kham sangin note upna a manphazaw ahina, a maanna a kiciat theih nadingin hihte hong piang hi; tuate in Jesu Khrist hong kilaak ciangin phatna minthanna le pahtawina a suah theih nading ahi hi.
60001008	Amah mu ngei lo napi na it uh hi; tu-in amah mu lo napi na um uh a, a kigenkhia thei lo a minthang lungnopna tawh na kidim uh hi.
60001009	Ahang in, na upna un a tup note kihotkhiatna a ngah na hi uh hi.
60001010	Hih hotkhiatna tawh kisai-in note tunga hong tung ding hehpihna thu a gen kamsangte in, ngenteltakin a theih tawpun zongin
60001011	amaute sunga a om Khrist Kha in Khrist thuaknate le tua nunga a zui ding minthannate tawh kisai a genkholh lai-in, a hun le a pianzia ding bangci banga gen hiam, cih muhkhiat ding a hanciam uh hi.
60001012	Vantung pana kisawl Khasiangtho tawh note tunga lungdamna-thu hong hilhte in, tu-a no tunga hong kigensate hong gen lai-un, amaute na a sem hi loin no na a sem uh ahilam amaute tungah a kilaak hi. Vansawltakte nangawn in tua nate a encian nuam uh hi.
60001013	Tua ahi manin a gamtang dingin na lungsim uh kisakhol un; na pumpi uh ki-uk zo un; Jesu a kilat cianga note hong kipia ding hehpihna tungah na lametna khempeuh uh nga un.
60001014	A thumang tate bangin bangmah thei lo-a na nuntak lai-ua na neih uh lunggulhna gilote deihna zui-in gamta kei un.
60001015	Note hong sampa a siantho mah bangin na hihna khempeuh uhah na siangtho un;
60001016	ahang in, “Kei siangtho ka hi manin siangtho un,” ci-in kigelh zo hi.
60001017	Mikim nasepna tungah guptuam nei lo-a thukhenpa, Pa khat min a lo khawm na hi nungsangun kihtakna siangtho tawh hih lai-ah mikhualte bangin nungta un.
60001018	Ahang in, na pate uh pana na luahsuk uh a mawkna nuntakna pana a kisia thei na: ngun ahikeh kham tawh hong kitan hi loin,
60001019	kawkbaanna le melhemna om lo tuuno – Khrist sisan manpha tawh note hong kitan ahilam na thei uh hi.
60001020	Leitung kipiansak ma-in amah kiteel zo a, ahi hangin note khualna-in hih hun nunungte a hong kilaaksak pan ahi hi.
60001021	Ama tungtawnin misi panin amah thosaka, a minthangsak pa Pasian na um uh a, tua na up uh le na lamet uh Pasian ahi hi.
60001022	Tu-in na sanggamte uh itna takpi na neih nading uh le khat le khat na lungsim tawng uh tawh na ki-it tek nadingun thutak thu mangin no le no na kisiansuah khin zo uh hi.
60001023	Ahang in, a sia thei khaici pan hi lo, a sia thei lo khaici – a nungta a om tawntung Pasian thu tungtawnin note a suak kik na hi uh hi.
60001024	Ahang in, “Mite khempeuh lopa bang hi-a, amaute minthanna khempeuh gamlaka pakte bang ahi hi; lopa vulin, pakte pulh a,
60001025	ahi hangin Topa kammal kip tawntung hi,” Note tunga hong kihilh thu, hih ahi hi.
60002001	Tua ahi manin etsatna khempeuh, khemna khempeuh, kineih-siamna, enna le mindaisakna namkimte na paikhia un.
60002002	Note hotkhiatna ah na khantoh theih nadingun naungek suak tungte bangin khalam nawizu siangtho na lunggulh un;
60002003	tu-in Pasian hoihna na ciam khin zo uh hi.
60002004	Mite in a nial, ahi hanga Pasian in a teelsa, ama adingin a manpha a nungta Suang kiangah nong pai bangun,
60002005	note zong Pasian san theih dingin Jesu Khrist tungtawna khalam biakpiakna a bawl siampi siangtho dingin khalam inn-a kilam a nungta suangte bang na hi uh hi.
60002006	Ahang in, Laisiangtho in: “En in, a kiteeltuam a manpha innkiubul suang khat Zion ah ka koih zo hi; amah a muang mi, a zahlak ngei kei ding hi,” ci hi.
60002007	Tu-in a um note adingin hih suang a manpha hi, ahi hangin a um lote adingin, “Inn lamte nilkhiat tua suang inntungkhum suang a suak zo hi,” ci a,
60002008	tua ciangin, “Mite a kimuktusak ding suang le, amaute puk nading suangpi,” ci hi. Amaute in thupuak mang lo uh ahi manin a kimuktu uh hi – tua zong amaute a tuaci ding mah a laitansa ahi hi.
60002009	Ahi hangin note na hi uh leh khuamial sung pan hong samkhia-a, ama khuavak lamdang sunga hong tunpa phatna na tangko theih nadingun hong teeltuam mi pawl, kumpi nam, siampi, minam siangtho, Pasian mite na hi uh hi.
60002010	Khatvei lai-in minam na hi lo uh hangin tu-in Pasian mite na hi uh hi; khatvei lai-in lainatna na ngah loh uh hangin, tu-in lainatna na ngah uh hi.
60002011	Kong it lawmte aw, na kha uh hong do den, mawhdim lunggulhnate pana kidek dingin leitung ah gamdang mite le mikhualte bangin kong kun hi.
60002012	Lawkite lakah tua bang nuntakna hoih na nungta un. Amaute in a khiala hong ngawh uh hangin, na gamtatna hoihte uh mu thei ding uh a, Pasian in eite hong veh ni ciangin amah a minthangsak ding uh hi.
60002013	Mite lakah a kiguang thuneihna khempeuh: thuneipipen kumpipa ahi zongin,
60002014	a khialte gawtna a pia ding le a maana gamtate a phat dinga a sawl ukpite thu khempeuh Topa hangin na mang un.
60002015	Ahang in, a hoih na sep uh hanga mihaite haipaunate na daihsak ding uh Pasian deihna ahi hi.
60002016	A suakta mi bangin na nungta un; ahi hangin na suahtakna uh gitlohna khuhna-in na zang kei unla, Pasian nasemte bangin na nungta un.
60002017	Mi khempeuh a kilawmin na zahtak un. Thu-um te unau khat suahna na it unla, Pasian kihta in kumpipa na pahtawi un.
60002018	Silate aw, no hong khuala no tunga hong migite bek hi lo, no tunga hong gamhtat na pute uh tungah zong zahtakna kim tawh na kiniamkhiat un.
60002019	Ahang in, mi khat in Pasian a phawk manin a man lopi in natna a thuaka a thuak zawh leh a phattak ahi hi.
60002020	Ahi hangin a man lo nasepna hangin satna na thuak uh a, na thuak zawh uh hangin a hoih bang lawhtak na hi uh hiam? Ahi hangin na hoih na sepna uh hangin na thuak uh a, na thuak zawh uh leh Pasian mai-ah a phattak na hi uh hi.
60002021	Hih ding mah a note hong kisam ahi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Khrist in note adingin thuak khin zo a, ama khekhap na zuih dingun etteh dingin hong nusiat hi.
60002022	"Amah in mawhna bawl lo a, ama kam sungah zong khemna a kimu kei hi,”
60002023	Amaute in amah a zahko uh ciangin thukkik lo a, a thuak laitakin a tawng thuk kei hi. Tua sangsikin tangtaka thukhenpa tungah amah le amah a ki-ap zaw hi.
60002024	Mawhnate i sihsan theih nading le thumaanna i nuntakpih theih nadingin ama pumpi mahmah in i mawhnate sing tungah pua zo hi. Ama liammate hangin note hong kidamsak zo hi.
60002025	Ahang in, note a pialmang tuu tawh na kibang uh a, ahi hangin tu-in na khate uh a Cingpa le a Kempa kiangah na ciah kik zo uh hi.
60003001	Tua mah bangin zite aw, na pasalte uh tungah kiniamkhiat un. Tua hileh amaute khatpeuh thu um lo a om leh, pau kul loin a zite uh gamtatzia,
60003002	a nuntakna siangtho le a zahtakbaanna uh a muh uh ciangin kizo thei ding hi.
60003003	Na mel kilawmna uh pualam kizepna: samphekte le ngun le kham le puan hoihte tawh kizepna pan hi kei hen.
60003004	Tua sangsikin, Pasian muhna ah nakpitaka a manphazaw, a tul thei lo hoihna, sunglam hinna, lungnemna le cinghkamna tawh na kizem zaw un.
60003005	Ahang in, tang lai-a Pasian sunga lametna a nei numei siangthote hih bangin amau le amau a kilawmin om uh hi.
60003006	Sara in Abraham thu mangin “topa” a na cih bangin amaute a pasalte uh tungah kiniamkhiat uh hi. Note zong lau loin amaana na gamtat uh leh ama tanute na hi uh hi.
60003007	Tua mah bangin pasalte aw na thungetnate uh bangmah in hong dal loh nadingin na zite uh tawh na nuntak khawmna uhah no sanga a thahat lo zaw pankhawmpih ahilam phawk kawmin zahtak unla, hehpihna letsong ahi, nuntakna a luahpihte bangin amaute na khual un.
60003008	A tawpna-ah note khempeuh, khat le khat kithuhual un; kithuakpih un, sanggam bangin ki-it unla, kikhuatuah in, kiniamkhiat tuah ciat un.
60003009	Gitlohna, gitlohna in na thuk kei un; hong engkote engko thuk loin thupha na pia zaw un. Bang hang hiam cih leh thupha khat na luah theih nadingun hih thu dinga note hong kisam ahi hi.
60003010	Ahang in, “Nuntakna it a, ni hoihte a mu nuam peuhmah in gitlohna pan a leii le zuauphuahna pan a mukte kem pelmawh ding hi.
60003011	Gitlohna pan kihei-in a hoih gamta pelmawh ding hi; lemna zongin delh pelmawh ding hi.
60003012	Ahang in, Topa mit in mithumaante mitsuan-a, a bil in amaute thungetna ngai hi; ahi hangin gitlohna a hihte Topa in a lang-et hi.”
60003013	A hoih sep ding lawp peuh lecin kua in nang hong nasak ding ahi hiam?
60003014	Ahi hangin thumaan khatpeuh hanga na thuak leh zong thupha ngah na hi hi. “Amau kihtakte na kihta kei un, linthawn zawhin na om kei un,”
60003015	Ahi hangin note lungsungah Khrist Topa-in tuam koih un. Tua na neih uh lametna ahang hong dong peuhpeuh tungah migitna le zahtakna tawh na hilh theih dingin kigingsa in om gige un.
60003016	Khrist sunga om na gamtatna hoih uh langpang a, a simmawhte in a gensiatna uh a maizumpih theih nadingun na lungsim kitheihna uh siangthotakin kem un.
60003017	Pasian deihna ahi nak leh a sia bawla thuakna sangin hoihzaw hi.
60003018	Ahang in, Pasian kiangah note hong tut theih nadingin Khrist – tua mi thumaan, mi thumaan lote ading khatvei-a cinkim dingin a si zo hi. A pumpi-in sihna kithuaksak a, ahi hangin Kha-in kinung tasak hi.
60003019	Tua Kha mah tungtawnin thong-a khate kiangah pai-in thu va hilh hi.
60003020	Tua khate pen nidang lai pek, Noah hunlai-a Pasian in thuak keeikai-in a ngak, Noah in gunkuangpi a bawl lai-a thumang lote ahi uh hi. Tua gunkuangpi sungah mi tawmcik bek, a vekun giat, tui tungtawnin kihonkhia hi.
60003021	Hih tui in tu huna note zong hong honkhia baptise na a lak hi; pumpi tung ninte sawpkhiatna hi loin Pasian lamah lungsim kitheihna hoih-a kiciamna ahi hi. Tua in Jesu thawhkikna hangin note hong honkhia hi.
60003022	Amah vantungah kahto khina tu-in Pasian taklamah om-a, vansawltakte, thuneihna le vangliatnate ama khutnuai-ah a om hi.
60004001	Tua ahi ciangin Khrist in ama pumpi-in a thuak khit zawh nungsang no le no zong tua bang lungsim tawh na kigalging un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pumpi-a a thuakpa mawhna tawh kikhen khia zo hi.
60004002	Tua hangin ama leitung nuntakna a om laiteng mihing lunggulhna gilote ah nungta nawn loin Pasian deihna ah a nungta zaw hi.
60004003	Ahi hangin, lawkite in hih dinga a teel uh hukna lanna ah note nungta-in, kilunggulhna, zukhamna, zu-uangdawnna, zu-nopdawnna le a kihhuai milim biaknate hihin hun beisa, a hunkhop na zang khin uh hi.
60004004	Amaute tawh kibanga uangtat-luatna sunga na va kihel nawn loh uh ciangin lamdang sa-in hong siat gen uh hi.
60004005	Ahi hangin a si mite le a hing mite thukhen dinga kigingsa pa mai-ah amaute thu amau mah in a gen ding uh hi.
60004006	Ahang in, tu huna a sisate tung nangawnah lungdamna-thu a kigenna hih thu hang ahi hi. Tua in amaute pumpi-a om mihing hihna tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen theih nading le kha tawh kisai-a Pasian deih banga a nuntak theih nading uh ahi hi.
60004007	Na khempeuh a beina nai ta hi. Tua ahi manin thu na nget theih nadingun lungsim siangtho le no le no ki-uk zoin om un.
60004008	Tuate khempeuh banah, itna thukpi-in khat le khat na ki-it un, bang hang hiam cih leh itna in mawhna tampitak a khuh hi.
60004009	Phun loin khat le khat zin na kido un.
60004010	Mikim in midangte na a sep nadinga a ngah letsong peuhmah, Pasian hehpihna a nam tuamtuam ah, muanhuaitakin zang ding hi.
60004011	Mi khatpeuh in thu a gen leh Pasian kammalte mahmah a gen bangin gen ta hen. Mi khatpeuh in mi na a sep leh, na khempeuh ah Jesu Khrist tungtawna Pasian a kiphat theih nadingin Pasian piak thahatna tawh sem ta hen. Ama tungah minthanna le vangliatna a tawntungin om den ta hen. Amen.
60004012	Kong it lawmte aw, na thuak uh gentheihbawlnate no tungah a lamdang pi-a tung bangin lamdang sa kei un.
60004013	Ahi hangin ama minthanna hong kilaak ciangin na lungnopna uh a dimlet theih nadingin Khrist thuaknate a thuakpih na hina uh hangin na lungdam un.
60004014	Pasian le a minthanna Kha note tungah om ahi manin, Jesu min hangin note hong ki-engko leh thupha ngah na hi uh hi.
60004015	Na thuak uh leh zong tualthat hiam, guta hiam, mawhna lian khatpeuh ahikeh mi thusia va kum kha-a thuak bang nangawn hi kei hen.
60004016	Ahi ta zongin Khristian hina hanga na thuak uh leh maizum loin, tua min na puakna uh hangin Pasian na phat zaw un.
60004017	Ahang in, Pasian innkuan sungah thukhenna a kipat hun ahi hi. Eite tungah hong kipan ahileh Pasian lungdamna-thu a mang lote bang suak tazen ding uh ahi hiam?
60004018	Tua hi a, “Midikte adingin kihotkhiat nading haksa ahileh, a pasian-milo le mawhnei mi bang suak tazen ding hiam?”
60004019	Tua ahi tak ciangin, Pasian deihna zui-a a thuakte, a muanhuai amaute a bawlpa tungah amau le amau kipia-in, a hoih a bawl uh zom suak uh hen.
60005001	No laka upate tungah, na upatpih uh Khrist thuakna a theihpih khat le hong kilang ding minthanna zong a tang ding pa khat bangin kong thum nopinah:
60005002	Saptuam kemte nasep bangin note kep dinga hong kipia Pasian tuuhonte, a kemte na hi un – na hih pelmawh ding uh cihna hi lo Pasian in note hong deih bangin utna tawh, sum deihluatna hang hi lo sep ding lawpna hangin na cing un;
60005003	note hong kikemsakte tungah kiliansak kei un; tuuhonte etteh na hi uh hi.
60005004	Tua hileh Tuucing Lianpenpa hong kilat ciangin a tul ngei lo minthanna lukhu na ngah ding uh hi.
60005005	Tua mah bangin khangnote aw, na uzawte uh tungah kiniamkhiat un. Note khempeuh, nomau le nomau in kiniam khiatna na kisilh thuk un, bang hang hiam cih leh, “Pasian in a kisatheite do a, a kiniamkhiatte a hehpih hi,”
60005006	A hun a tun ciangin amah in note hong tawisang theih nadingin a thahat Pasian khutnuai-ah no le no na kiniamkhiat un.
60005007	Amah in note hong lunghimawh ahi manin na lunghimawhnate khempeuh uh ama tungah suan un.
60005008	No le no ki-uk zo unla pilvang un. Na gal uh – dawimangpa, a nawmvalh ding zong humpinelkai bangin humhamin thamvak kawikawi hi.
60005009	Leitung bupa na sanggamte un zong no thuak banga a thuak lam uh thei na hi manun, amah do unla upna-ah kip un.
60005010	Khrist sunga a tawntung minthanna ngah dinga hong sampa, hehpihna khempeuh Pasian in, tomcik sung na thuak khit uh ciangin amahmah in na ngei uh hong bangsak dinga, hong hatsak in, hong kipsak hong khosak ding hi.
60005011	Ama tungah a tawntungin vangliatna om den ta hen. Amen.
60005012	Sanggam muanhuai banga ka neih Silas huhna tawh lai tawmno kong gelh a, note hong hanthawnin, hih in Pasian hehpihna taktak ahina teci ka pang hi. Hih thu ah kip un.
60005013	Note tawh kiteel khawm Babylon a om nu in, note hong hopih hi; ka tapa Mark in zong hong hopih hi.
60005014	Khat le khat itna tawh kinamin na kihopih un. Khrist sunga om note khempeuh tungah lemna om ta hen.
61001001	Jesu Khrist nasem le sawltakpi Simon Peter in, Eite Pasian le i Honpa Jesu Khrist thumaanna tungtawnin kote aa banga a manpha upna a ngahte tungah:
61001002	Pasian le i Topa Jesu theihna tungtawnin hehpihna le lemna adimin note aa hi ta hen.
61001003	Ama minthanna le a hoihna tawh hong sampa, amah i theihna tungtawnin nuntak nading le i pasianmi theih nadinga kisam khempeuh ama Pasian vangliatna in hong pia zo hi.
61001004	Hihte tungtawnin pasian pianngei ah tanh na neih theih nading uh leh lunggulhna gilo in a piansak leitung siatna pan note na suahtak theih nadingun amah in tuate tungtawnin alian pha mahmah le a manpha a kamciamte eite hong pia zo hi.
61001005	Hih thu hang mahmah in, na theih tawpun na upna uh tungah hoihna, hoihna tungah theihna;
