61001006	theihna tungah pumpi ki-ukzawhna; pumpi ki-ukzawhna tungah sikdona; sikdona tungah pasian-mina
61001007	le pasian-mina tungah sanggam kikhualna le sanggam kikhualna tungah itna na behlap un.
61001008	Ahang in, hih hoihnate ah na khan semsem uh leh i Topa Jesu Khrist na theihna uhah muibut lohna le gahsuah lohna panin hong hu ding hi.
61001009	Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in tuate a neih kei leh muhna tom le mittaw hi-a, ama mawh nasate a kisiansak khit lam a mangngilh zo ahi hi.
61001010	Tua ahi manin sanggamte aw, note hong kisapna le hong kiteelna a ki ciansak dingin na lawp semsem un. Ahang in, hih nate na hih uh leh na puk ngei kei ding uh a,
61001011	eite Topa le Honpa Jesu Khrist tawntung kumpi-gamah note thupitakin hong kimuak ding hi.
61001012	Tua ahi ciangin tu laitaka na theih uh thutak ah, a kipsa a khosa le tuate a theisa na hi uh zongin hih nate kong phawksak kik tawntung ding hi.
61001013	Hih pumpi puanbuk sunga ka ten laiteng na theihtheihna uh kong thaksuaksak ding amaan hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
61001014	Bang hang hiam cih leh i Topa Jesu Khrist in teltaka kei hong theihsak bangin hih puanbuk ka koihkhiat pah ding ka thei hi.
61001015	Kong paisan khit ciangin hih nate phawk den thei na nuteh cih thei-in ka hih theih tawpin ka hih ding hi.
61001016	Note tungah i Topa Jesu Khrist vangliatna le hong pai kik nading thu kong hilh lai-un, piltaka kiphuak tawm tangthute peuh zui hi loin ama thupina mita a mute ka hi zaw uh hi.
61001017	Ahang in, a Thupi Minthanna pana aw in ama kiangah, “Hih in ka lung hong kimsak mahmah ka it ka Tapa ahi hi,” ci-a a gen lai-in, Pa Pasian tung pana pahtawina le minthanna a ngah hi.
61001018	Tua mual siangtho tunga amah tawh ka om laitakun kote mahmah in vantung pana hong ging hih aw ka za uh hi.
61001019	Khuamialna mun khatah khuavak a tan bangin note lungsungah phalvak tung zingsol a suah mateng in, eite in a kicianzaw kamsangte thugen i nei hi; note in, tuate na thusim uh leh na hoih sem na hi ding uh hi.
61001020	Tuate khempeuh banah, Laisiangtho sunga genkholhna peuhmah kamsangpa in a khiatna a gentawm mawk ahi loh lam na theitel pelmawh un.
61001021	Ahang in, genkholhna peuhmah mihing deihna pan hi ngei lo-a, Khasiangtho hihsakna bangbangin mite in Pasian tung pana a gen uh hizaw hi.
61002001	Ahi hangin mihingte lakah kamsang zuaute a na om bang tektek in note lakah zong sia zuau a om ding hi. Amaute in siatna a piangsak thei thu-upna maan lote a simthamin hong lutpihin amaute a lei – thuneipipa Topa nangawn nial ding uh a, amau le amau siatna a kitun pah ding uh hi.
61002002	Mi tampi in a zumhuai amau makaihna lam zui ding uh a, thutak lampi minsiasak ding uh hi.
61002003	Hih siate in huaihamin ama phuahtawm tangthute tawh note sumzonna in hong nei ding uh hi. Amaute a kimawhpaihna sawtvei zo a, amau kisiatna a ihsip kei hi.
61002004	Ahang in, vantung mite a mawh uh ciangin Pasian in zah lo a, hell ah khia in thukhenna thuak dingin kawhawm mialpi sungah koih ahileh;
61002005	amah in tanglai leitung zah tuan loin a pasian-milote tungah tuicin tungsak a, ahi hangin thumaan a hilh Noah le adang sagihte hu ahileh;
61002006	Sodom le Gomorah khuapite mawhpaih in vut a suah dong haltum a, a pasian-milote tungah a piang dingte lahna suaksak ahileh;
61002007	thukham nei lo-a, a nin mahmah mite nuntakna in a lungdonsak a thumaan Lot a suaktasak ding le;
61002008	(ahang in, tua a thumaan mipa amaute lakah nisimin om a, thukham nei lote gamtatna a muh le a zakte in a thumaan ama lungsim a gimsak mahmah hi) –
61002009	hih bang teng hi ahileh Topa in a pasian-mite, zia-etna pan a suahtaksak nading ahi zongin a thumaan lote thukhen ni adingin a gawt kawmkawma, a koih nading zia a thei hi.
61002010	A diakdiakin a mawhdim pianngei lunggulhna in a siatsakna a zuite le thuneihna a sim mawhte tungah amaan phadiak hi. Hih mite mawk hansanin ki-uangsak uh a, van mite nangawn gensia ngam uh hi.
61002011	Tua hi napi vansawltakte nangawn in, hatzaw in vanglianzaw ta le uh, tua bang mite langpangin Topa mai-ah kosiatna mawhsaknate a tun kei uh hi.
61002012	Ahi hangin hih mite in a theihtel loh uh thute tawh a daisak uh hi. Amaute, man-a siatsak ding bek-a, suak a ngongtat gamsate bangin ganhing lungsim neite hi uh a, gamsate mah bang in amaute zong a mangthang ding uh hi.
61002013	Amaute hihsa siatna hangin tua siatna mahin amaute kithukkik ding hi. Amaute ngaihsut nopsakna ahileh suntangpipi-a uangtat ahi hi. Note tawh an na nek khawm laitakun nop a sak luatna uh hangin melhemna le nitna a suak uh hi.
61002014	Angkawm nopna mit bekbek tawh kidim uh a, mawhna a bawl den uh hi; a kip lo mite mawhna bawl dingin a zol uh hi; huaihamna lamah siam mahmah uh a, hamsiatna suante hi tazen uh hi!
61002015	Amaute in atang lampi nusia in pial uh a, gitlohna thaman a deih Beor tapa Balaam lampi a zui uh hi.
61002016	Ahi hangin pau a nei lo laa khat mihing aw in pau-a, ama gamtat khialhna tai-in tua kamsangpa haina a khokhaam hi.
61002017	Hih mite, a kangsa tuinak le huihpi mutleng meiilum bang ahi uh hi. Amaute ading amial pha pen khuamial a kikoih khol zo hi.
61002018	Ahang in, amaute in kisaktheihna mawkna kamte zangin, khialhna tawh a nungta mite lak pana a suakta lai liailiaite, pianpih mawhdim kilunggulhna-in a zol uh hi.
61002019	Amaute mahmah zong siatna sila-in om lai napi, amaute suahtakna a kamciam tazen uh hi – mi khatpeuh amah a kizosak zo na khatpeuh sila ahi hi.
61002020	Eite Topa le Honpa Jesu Khrist a theihna uh hangin leitung siatna pan suakta khin napi, tua lai mah ah awk kikin a pianzia nunung, a masa sangin a sia zawtham hi.
61002021	Thumaan lampi thei khin a, amau tunga kipiasawn thupiak siangtho a nungngatsan kik uh sangin a theikha vet lo uh hileh amau adingin hoihzaw ding hi.
61002022	Amau tungah, “Ui in a luak ne kik,” cih le, “A kisil khinsa vokpi buan lakah bual kik,” cih paunak a man hi.
61003001	Kong it lawmte aw, tu-in hih kong laikhak a nihveina ahi hi. A nih in ngaihsutna siangthotak tawh hong lawpsak kik dingin kong phawksakna ahi hi.
61003002	A beisa huna kamsang siangthote thugente le na sawltakpite uh tungtawna, i Honpa le Topa in a thupiakte na phawk kik ding uh ka deih hi.
61003003	A masa penin ni nunungte ah mi zahpihhatte hong pai dinga, mite zahpih in amau gilo lunggulhnate zui ding uh hi, cih na theitel pelmawh un.
61003004	Amaute in, “Hong pai kik nading ama hong kamciam koi-ah om hiam? I pate sih a kipan na khempeuh lah a kipiansak tunga bangbangin hi toto lai hi,” ci ding uh hi.
61003005	Ahi hangin tanglai pekin Pasian thuin vantungte om a, tui panin tui tawh leitung kibawl ahilam thei napi, a kitheihmawhbawl uh hi.
61003006	Tua tuite mah tawh tua hun lai-a leitung, tuicin tungsakin kisusia hi.
61003007	Tua thu mahin thukhen ni le a pasian-milote kisiat ni cianga mei-a hal dingin tu-a vantungte le leitung a kisit lai ahi hi.
61003008	Ahi hangin kong it lawmte aw, hih thu khat na mangngilh kei un. Topa aa in ni khat pen kum tulkhat bang a, kum tulkhat pen ni khat bang hi.
61003009	Mi pawlkhatte in a ziakaina a theih uh bangin a thuciamna ah Topa a ziakai kei hi. Amah in kuama kisiat ding deih lo a, mi khempeuh a kisik ding uh a deih manin note hong thuak keeikai hi.
61003010	Ahi hangin Topa ni, guta bangin hong tung ding hi. Aw ngaihpi tawh vantungte mangin, a bulpite mei-in kisiasak dinga, leitung le a sunga om na khempeuh kitol mangsak ding hi.
61003011	Hih bang zia in na khempeuh kisusia ding ahi khit nung sang, bangci mi na hi ding uh kilawm ahi hiam?
61003012	Pasian ni hong tunpah ding na ngaklah kawmun a siangtho le a pasianmi-a na nuntak ding uh kilawm hi. Tua ni in vantungte mei-a halsiatna tun dinga, a satna sungah a bulpite a tuisuak ding hi.
61003013	Ahi hangin a thuciam bangin thumaanna inn omna van thak le lei thak ngakin i om hi.
61003014	Tua ahi tak ciangin kong it lawmte aw, hih a ngak na hi nungsangun a nin baang lo, kawkbanna om lo le amah tawh kilema hong muh theih nadingin na hih theih tawpun hahkatin hih un.
61003015	I sang gam it Paul in zong Pasian in amah a piak pilna tawh note kianga hong gelhsa bang tektek in, i Topa lungduaina – hotkhiatna ahilam note lungsim sungah phawk gige un.
61003016	A laikhak khempeuh ah a kibangmah gelhin hih thute mah a gen hi. A laikhakte sungah a theihhak pawlkhat om-a, a thei lote le a kip lo mite in amau mah siat nadingin Laisiangtho dangte a hih bangun tuate a lehkaih uh hi.
61003017	Tua ahi manin kong it lawmte aw, hih thu na theih khit nungsangun thukham a zui lo mite khialhna in hong manthanpih a, note bitna mun pan na puk khak loh nadingun kikem un.
61003018	Ahi hangin i Topa le Honpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna le theihna-ah na khangto un. Ama tungah tu le a tawntungin minthanna om ta hen! Amen.
62001001	A tunga omsa, kote in ka zaksa uh, ka mit uh tawh ka muhsa uh, en-a ka khut uh tawh ka lawnsa uh, hih nuntakna Thu tawh kisai kong tangko uh hi.
62001002	Tua nuntakna hong kilang zo a, kote in mu khinin teci ka pang uh a, Pa tawh a om khawm ko kianga hong kilak tua nuntak tawntungna no tungah kong tangko uh hi.
62001003	Note zong kote tawh na kipawl theih nadingun, ka muhsa uh le ka zaksate uh no tungah kong tangko uh hi. Kote kipawlna ahileh Pa le ama Tapa Jesu Khrist tawh kipawlna ahi hi.
62001004	Ka lungnopna uh a kicin nadingin hih lai kong gelh uh hi.
62001005	Ama tung panin za-a, no tungah kote hong pulak thupuak in: Pasian, khuavak hi-a; ama sungah khuamial a om peuhmah kei hi.
62001006	Eite amah tawh i kipawl hi, ci napi in khuamial sungah i kalsuan lai leh zuauphuak i suaka, thutaka nungta lo i hi hi.
62001007	Ahi hangin khuavak sungah i kalsuan leh amah khuavak ahi mah bangin eite khat le khat i kipawla, ama Tapa Jesu sisan in i mawhna khempeuh panin hong siansuah hi.
62001008	Mawhna ka nei kei hi, i kicih leh ei le ei kikhem i hi a, eite sungah thutak a om kei hi.
62001009	Eite in i mawhnate i pulak leh i mawhnate hong maisakin i thumaanlohna khempeuh hong siangsak dingin amah muanhuai-in a thutang hi.
62001010	Eite in mawhna ka bawl kei hi, i cihleh amah zuauphuak i suaksak a, i nuntakna sungah ama thu a om kei hi.
62002001	Kong it ka tate aw, na mawh loh nadingun hih thu kong gelh hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in mawhna a bawl khak leh eite hong guma Pa kiangah hong gensak ding mi khat – Thumaan Pa Jesu Khrist i nei hi.
62002002	Amah, eite mawhnate thoihdamna dingin biakpiakna hi-a, eite ading bek hi lo leitung buppi mawhnate thoihdam nadinga biakpiakna zong ahi hi.
62002003	Ama thupiakte i zuih leh amah i thei zo cih i thei hi.
62002004	"Amah ka thei hi,” a ci mi in ama thupiakte a zuih kei leh zuauphuak hi-a, ama sungah thutak a om kei hi.
62002005	Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in ama thu a mang leh Pasian itna ama sungah a kicing takpi hi. Hih in ama sunga i om lam a kitheihna ahi hi:
62002006	‘Ama sungah ka nungta hi,’ a ci peuhmah, Jesu gamtat bangin a gamta pelmawh ding hi.
62002007	Kong it lawmte aw, note kiangah thupiak thak kong gelh kei-a, a cil pana na neihsa uh a lui pen mah ahi hi. Hih thupiak lui, na zaksa uh thupuak mah ahi hi.
62002008	Tua hi napi thupiak thak khat hong gelh ka hi hi; khuamial bei zo a, thumaan khuavak tang khin zo ahi manin amah le note sungah a thutak kimu zo hi.
62002009	Mi khatpeuh in khuavak sungah ka om hi, ci napi in a sanggampa a muhdah leh khuamial sunga om lai ahi hi.
62002010	Ama sanggampa a it mi peuhmah khuavak sunga a nungta hi a, ama sungah a muktusak ding bangmah a om kei hi.
62002011	Ahi hangin a sanggampa a mudah peuhmah khuamial sunga om hi-a khuamial sunga vak kawikawi ahi hi. Khuamial in a mit tawsak ahi manin a pai nading mel a thei kei hi.
62002012	Kong it tate aw, ama min hangin na mawhnate uh kimaisak khin zo ahi manin note lai kong khak hi.
62002013	Pate aw, a tunga kipan a omsa pa, thei zo na hi manun note lai kong khak hi. Khangnote aw, a gilopa zo khin zo na hi manun note lai kong khak hi. Kong it tate aw, Pa thei khin na hi manun note lai kong khak hi.
62002014	Pate aw, a tunga kipan a omdensa pa thei zo na hi manun, note lai kong khak hi. Khangnote aw, note thakhauhin note sungah Pasian thu teng a, a gilopa zo khin na hi manin note lai kong khak hi.
62002015	Leitung ahikeh a sunga om nate khatpeuh it kei un. Mi khatpeuh in leitung a it leh ama sungah Pa itna a om kei hi.
62002016	Ahang in, leitunga om na khempeuh: mawhdim mi lunggulh-luatnate, mittang etlahnate, neihsa le sepsa kisialhpihnate, Pa tung pana hong pai hi loin leitung pan ahi hi.
62002017	Leitung le ama deihna mangthang lel a, ahi hangin Pasian deihna bangin a gamta mi a nungta tawntung hi.
62002018	Kong it tate aw, hih hun, hun nunung ahi hi. Hong pai ding ci-a na zaksa uh antichrist bangin tu nangawnin antichrist tampi hong pai zo uh hi. Hih bangin hun nunung ahilam i thei hi.
62002019	Amaute, eite lak pana paikhia ahi uh hi. Ahi hangin eite aa taktak ahi kei uh hi. Ahang in, eite aa taktak hi uh hileh eite lak mah ah omden ding uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute paikhiatna in, amaute khat beek eite aa ahi lohna uh hong lak hi.
62002020	Ahi hangin note, Siangtho Pa sathau nilhsa na hi uh a, na vekun thutak na thei uh hi.
62002021	Thutak na theih loh manun note lai hong khak ka hi kei a, thutak na theih hang uh le tua thutak pana zuauthu a pian loh hanga hong khak ka hizaw hi.
62002022	A zuaupa kua ahi hiam? Jesu in Khrist ahi hi, cih thu a nial mi a zuaupa ahi hi. Tua bang mi antichrist hi-a, amah in Pa le Tapa a nial hi.
62002023	Tapa a nial peuhmah in Pa a nei kei hi. Tapa a sang peuhmah in Pa zong a nei hi.
62002024	A tunga na zaksa mah uh note sungah omden hiam, cih na ki-entel un. A om leh Tapa sung le Pa sungah note zong na omden ding uh hi.
62002025	Amah in eite hong kamciam, hih nuntak tawntungna mah ahi hi.
62002026	Note lam pialsak hong sawmte tawh kisai-in hih thute kong gelh hi.
62002027	Note na hi uh leh ama sathau nilhna na ngah uh, no sungah omden a, note hong hilh ding kuamah na kisam kei uh hi. Ahi hangin ama hong sathau nilhna in na khempeuh thu hong hilh bangin tua sathau nilhna a lim bek hi lo hi, a taktak ahi hi, note hong hilhsa bang tektekin ama sungah na omden un.
62002028	Tu-in kong it tate aw, amah hong pai-a hong kilat ciangin ama mai-ah maizumna om lo-a, kimuangtaka i om theih nadingin ama sungah omden un.
62002029	Amah a thumaan hi, cih na theih uh leh thumaan a hih peuhmah ama sunga suak ahi hi, cih na thei uh hi.
62003001	Eite, Pasian tate cih-a i om nadingin Pa in eite tunga hong sunleet itna lian mahmah si! Ei lah tua mah i hi hi! Leitung in eite hong theih lohna amah a theih loh hang ahi hi.
62003002	Kong it lawmte aw, tu-in eite, Pasian tate i hi a, mailamah bang i hi lai ding hiam, hong kitheisak nai lo hi. Ahi hangin amah hong kilat ciangin amah ahi banga mu ding i hi manin amah i bang ding hi cih i thei hi.
62003003	Ama sunga hih lametna a nei peuhmah, amah a siantho bang tektekin amah le amah a kisiangthosak hi.
62003004	A mawh peuhmah thukham palsat ahi hi; a taktakin mawhna pen thukham palsatna ahi hi.
62003005	Ahi hangin i mawhnate a lakmang theih nadingin amah hong kilang ahilam na thei uh hi. Ama sungah ahileh mawhna a om kei hi.
62003006	Ama sunga nungta mi khatpeuh, mawhna a zongsang kei hi. Mawhna a zongsang mi peuhmah amah a mu nai lo, a thei nai lo ahi hi.
62003007	Kong it tate aw, mi khatpeuh na kipimangsak kei un. Amah a thumaan bang tektekin amaana gamta mi peuh mah a thumaan ahi hi.
62003008	A kipatcil-a kipan dawimangpa a mawhden ahi manin mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah dawimangpa pana piang ahi hi. Pasian Tapa hong kilatna ahang pen dawimangpa nasepna a susia ding ahi hi.
62003009	Pasian pana piang peuhmah, Pasian cii ama sungah omden ahi manin mawhna a zongsang kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah Pasian pana piang ahi manin mawhna a zong sang kei hi.
62003010	Hih in Pasian tate le dawimangpa tate i theihkak theih nading ahi hi. Mi khatpeuh amaana a gamtat kei a, ama sanggampa a it kei leh Pasian ta ahi kei hi.
62003011	A cil-a kipan na zak uh thupuak in: Eite khat le khat i ki-it ding ahi hi.
62003012	Gilopa aa ahi, a sanggampa a that pa Cain na bang kei un. Tua ahileh bang hangin amah that ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh ama gamtatnate gilo-a, a sanggampa gamtatnate amaan hang ahi hi.
62003013	Ka sanggamte aw, leitung mite in note hong muhdah leh lamdang sa kei un.
62003014	Eite in i sanggamte i it manin sihna pan paikhia-in nuntakna sungah i lut zo cih i thei hi. A it lo mi peuhmah sihna sungah a om lai hi.
62003015	A sanggam a it lo mi peuhmah tualthat hi-a, tualthat kuamah in ama sungah nuntak tawntungna a neih loh lam na thei uh hi.
62003016	Itna bang ahi hiam cih i theihna hih ahi hi: Jesu Khrist in eite adingin a nuntakna hong khaam hi. Tua bangin eite in i sanggamte adingin i nuntakna i khaam ding kul hi.
62003017	Mi khatpeuh in neih le lam nei-in a sanggampa kisap lam thei napi amah a hehpih kei leh bangci bangin ama sungah Pasian itna om thei ding ahi hiam?
62003018	Kong it tate aw, a thu le kamsiam bek tawh ki-it loin gamtatna le thutakin ki-it ni.
62003019	Tua in, thutak aa i hina i theihna le eite i lungtang in hong mawhpaih peuhpeuh ciangin ama mai-ah i lungsim tawlngakna i theihna ahi hi.
62003020	Ahang in, i lungtang sangin Pasian lianzaw a, na khempeuh a thei hi.
62003021	Kong it lawmte aw, i lungtang in eite hong mawhpaih kei leh Pasian mai-ah kimuanna nei-in,
62003022	ama thupiakte manga, amah lungkimsak i hi manin ama tungah i nget khatpeuh i ngah thei hi.
62003023	Ama thupiak hih ahi hi: Ama Tapa Jesu Khrist min up ding le amah in eite hong thupiak bangin khat le khat i ki-it ding ahi hi.
62003024	Ama thupiakte a mangte ama sungah nungta a, amaute sungah amah a nungta hi. Hih in amah eite sungah a nuntak lam i theihna ahi hi: Eite in ama hong piak Kha-in tua i thei hi.
62004001	Kong it lawmte aw, kha khatpeuh um kei un; ahi hangin leitung ah kamsang zuau tampi paikhia khin ahi manin amaute kha Pasian pan hi hiam, hi lo hiam cih sittel un.
62004002	Pasian Kha na khentel theih nading uh hih bang ahi hi: Jesu Khrist mihingin hong pai hi, ci-a a sang kha peuhmah Pasian pan hi-a,
62004003	ahi hangin tua banga Jesu a sang lo kha peuhmah Pasian pan hi lo hi. Hih in antichrist kha hi-a, hong pai ding ci-a na zaksa uh, tu nangawnin leitunga a om khin zo ahi hi.
62004004	No, kong it ka tate Pasian pan na hi uh a, leitunga om pa sangin no sunga om pa lianzaw ahi manin amaute na zawhsa uh ahi hi.
62004005	Amaute leitung pan hi uh a, tua ahi manin leitung ngaihsutna tawh thu genin leitung in amau thu a ngai hi.
62004006	Eite Pasian pan i hi-a, Pasian a thei peuhmah in i thu a ngai uh hi. Ahi hangin Pasian pan ahi lo peuhmah in i thu a ngai kei uh hi. Thutak Kha le zuauna kha i khentel theihna hih bang ahi hi.
62004007	Kong it lawmte aw, Pasian pana itna hong pai ahi manin eite khat le khat ki-it ni. A it thei mi peuhpeuh, Pasian pana suak hi-a Pasian a thei hi.
62004008	A it thei lo mi peuhmah in Pasian a thei kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in itna ahi hi.
62004009	Pasian in ama itna eite lakah hong lahna hih bang ahi hi: Ama tungtawna eite i nuntak theih nadingin amah in a Tapa neihsun leitungah hong sawl hi.
62004010	Itna hih ahi hi: Eite in Pasian i it cihna hi lo, amah in eite hong it-a, i mawhnate thoihdamna dingin biakna-in a Tapa hong sawlna ahi hi.
62004011	Kong it lawmte aw, Pasian in eite hi zaha hong it khit nungsangin eite zong khat le khat i ki-it ding kisam hi.
62004012	Mi khat beek in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi; ahi hangin eite khat le khat i ki-it leh, Pasian eite sungah hong tengin i sungah a itna kicingsak hi.
62004013	Amah in eite ama Kha hong pia khin ahi manin eite ama sungah i nungta a, amah eite sungah a nungta cih i thei hi.
62004014	Tua hi-a Pa in leitung Honpa dingin ama Tapa hong sawl zo hi, cih eite in i mu khin a, teci i pang hi.
62004015	Mi khatpeuh in, Jesu, Pasian Tapa hi, ci-a a san leh ama sungah Pasian tenga, Pasian sungah amah a teng hi.
62004016	Tuaci bangin Pasian in eite hong it lam i thei a, tua itna tungah i kinga hi. Pasian in itna ahi hi. Itna sungah a nungta mi peuhmah Pasian sunga nungta hi-a, ama sungah zong Pasian a nungta hi.
62004017	Thukhen ni cianga muang taka i om nadingin hih bangin eite lakah itna hong kicingsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih leitung ah amah tawh i kibang hi.
62004018	Itna sungah launa a om kei hi. Ahi hangin a kicing itna in launa a hawlkhia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh launa pen gawt ding kihtakna ahi hi. A lau mite, itna sungah kicinsak nai loh ahi hi.
62004019	Amah in eite hong it masa ahi manin eite in i it hi.
62004020	Mi khatpeuh in, “Pasian ka it hi,” ci napi a sanggampa a muhdah lai leh zuauphuak pa ahi hi. Ahang in, a muh gige a sanggampa a it lo mi in, a muh nai loh Pasian a it thei kei hi.
62004021	Amah in eite hih thupiak hong pia zo hi. Pasian a it peuhmah in pel loin a sanggampa zong it hen.
62005001	Jesu in Khrist ahi hi, ci-a a umte peuhmah Pasian pana suak hi-a a pa a it peuhmah in a ta zong a it hi.
62005002	Pasian tate i it lam i theihna in: Pasian itna le ama thupiakte sepkhiatna ahi hi.
62005003	Pasian i itna in: ama thupiakte manna ahi hi. Ama thupiakte lah a haksa lua kei hi;
62005004	ahang in, Pasian pana piang peuhmah in leitung a zawhsa ahi hi. Leitung a zo gualzawhna zong tua eite upna mah ahi hi.
62005005	Kuate in leitung zo uh ahi hiam? Jesu, Pasian Tapa hi, ci-a umte bek ahi hi.
62005006	Tui le sisana hong pai pa, Jesu Khrist ahi hi. Amah tui bekin hong pai lo a, tui le sisanin hong pai hi. Tua thu teci pangpa Kha ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua Kha, thutak ahi hi.
62005007	Ahang in, tua thu teci a pang thum om a:
62005008	Kha, tui le sisan ahi hi; tua thumte a kithutuak uh hi.
62005009	Eite in mihing teci panna i sang hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in ama Tapa thu teci a panna ahi manin Pasian teci panna a lianzaw hi.
62005010	Pasian Tapa a um mi peuhmah in a lungtang sungah hih teci panna a nei hi. Pasian a um lo mi peuhmah in Pasian in a Tapa thu teci a panna um lo ahi manin amah zuauphuak a suaksak hi.
62005011	Tua hi-a hih in teci panna ahi hi: Pasian in eite nuntak tawntungna hong pia a, tua nuntakna Tapa sungah a om hi.
62005012	Tapa a nei mi in nuntakna a nei hi; Pasian Tapa a nei lo mi in nuntakna a nei kei hi.
62005013	Pasian Tapa min a um note in nuntak tawntungna na neih lam uh na theih nadingun no tungah hihte kong gelh hi.
62005014	Pasian i zuat cianga i kimuanna in: ama deihna tawh kituak a na khatpeuh i nget leh amah in hong za hi.
62005015	Amah in i ngetna hong za hi, ci-a i theih leh ama kianga i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi, cih i theihna ahi hi.
62005016	Mi khatpeuh in, a sanggampa in sihna a tun lo mawhna khatpeuh a bawl a muh leh thu ngen ta hen; Pasian in amah nuntakna pia ding hi. Sihna a tun lo mawhna a hihte gen ka hi hi. Sihna a tun mawhna khat a om hi. Tua thu-a thu ngetsak ding ka ci kei hi.
62005017	Gamtat khialhna khempeuh mawhna hi-a ahi hangin sihna a tun lo mawhna a om hi.
62005018	Pasian pana suak mi khatpeuh mawhna ah a zongsang kei cih i thei a, Pasian pana suakpa amah bittakin kikemcing a, gilopa in amah a lawng thei kei hi.
62005019	Eite Pasian tate i hilam le leitung buppi gilopa ukna nuai-a om ahilam i thei hi.
62005020	Amah a thumaanpa a hina i theih nadingin Pasian Tapa hong pai zo cihleh theihtelna hong pia hi cih zong i thei hi. Eite tua ama Tapa Jesu Khrist thu maanna sungah i om hi. Amah a thumaan Pasian le nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
62005021	Kong it tate aw, milimte panin no le no na kikem un.
63001001	Upapa in, Thutak sunga ka it, kei bek hi lo thutak a theite khempeuh in zong a it uh –
63001002	kote sunga om, kote tawh a omkhawm tawntung ding tua thutak hanga teelsa upanu le a tate tungah:
63001003	Pa Pasian le Pa’ Tapa Jesu Khrist tung panin hehpihna, lainatna le lemna in thutakna le itna tawh eite hong ompih ding hi.
63001004	Pa in eite hong thupiak bang tektek in, na tate uh pawlkhat thutakin a kalsuan uh ka muh in nakpi-in hong nuamsak hi.
63001005	Kong it upanu aw, tu-in thupiak a thak kong gelh kei-a, a kipatcil-a i neihsa pen mah ahi hi. Eite khat le khat i ki-it thuk ding kong thum hi.
63001006	Ama thupiak manga kalsuanna in: itna ahi hi. A cil-a kipan na zaksa bangun ama thupiak in: itna sungah na gamta un, ci hi.
63001007	Jesu Khrist ci-le-sa in hong pai hi, ci-a a sang lo, mikhem tampi leitung ah paikhia khin zo uh hi. Tua bang mi peuhmah mikhem le antichrist ahi hi.
63001008	Ngah sawma na sep uh pahtakman, mansuah loin a kima na ngah nadingun kigalging un.
63001009	Mi khatpeuh a khengvalin pai a, Khrist thuhilhna-a a om den lo pa in Pasian a nei kei hi; tua hilhna-a a om den peuhmah in Pa le Tapa a nei khawm hi.
63001010	Mi khatpeuh no kiangah hong pai a, hih thuhilhna mah a hilh kei leh na muak kei unla, na inn uah zong na tungsak kei un.
63001011	Amah a muak peuhmah ama gilo nasepna ah a kihel ahi hi.
63001012	Note tungah kong gelh nop a tam mahmah hangin laidal le laitui ka zang nuam kei hi. Tua sangsik in, i lungnopna a kim theih nadingin hong hawh a, maitang kituah in, thu i kikup ding ka lamen hi.
63001013	A kiteel na sanggamnu uh tate in hong hopih nate uh hong khak uh hi.
64001001	Upapa in, Thutak sunga ka it ka lawm ngaih Gaius tungah:
64001002	Kong it lawm aw, na kha a cidam bangin na pumpi zong cidama, na khempeuh ah na lawhcin nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
64001003	Sanggamte pawlkhat hong pai-in, thutaka na muanhuaina thu le tua thutaka na kalsuan, na zopsuakna thu hong ko uh a, ka lungdam mahmah hi.
64001004	Thutaka ka tate a kalsuan ka zaka ka lungdamna sangin lungdamna lianzaw ka nei kei hi.
64001005	Kong it lawm aw, sanggamte na theih ngei loh mi hi napi, amaute tunga na gamtatna ah na muanhuai hi.
64001006	Amaute in na itna thu pawlpi tungah ko uh hi. Pasian tunga gamtat dinga kilawm zahin a lampi-uah amaute na kha lecin na hoih sem na hi ding hi.
64001007	Amaute in lawkite tung panin huhna ngah lo uh a, tua Min hang bekin a kuankhia uh ahi hi.
64001008	Tua ahi manin thutak na i sepkhawm theih nadingin tua mite tungah zindo i siamna i lah ding kisam hi.
64001009	Pawlpi tungah lai ka khaka, ahi hangin tungnuntuhpa Diotrephes in kote hong thudon nuam lo hi.
64001010	Tua ahi ciangin kong pai leh ama gamtatna le kote hong gensiatnate kong pholak ding hi. Amah tuate tawh lungkim zo nai loin sanggamte a na muak nuam kei hi. Tua banga a hih nuamte khamin pawlpi panin a hawlkhia hi.
64001011	Kong it lawm aw, a hoih lo lam na etteh kei inla, a hoih lam na etteh zaw in. A hoiha gamta mi peuhmah Pasian pan ahi hi. A sia-a gamta mi peuhmah in Pasian a mu nai kei hi.
64001012	Mi khempeuh in Demetrius phat uh a, thutak nangawn in amah a phat hi. Kote in zong amah ka phat uh a, kote teci panna a man ahilam na thei hi.
64001013	Nang tungah kong gelhnop tam mahmah a, ahi hangin laidal le laitui-in ka gelh nuam kei hi.
64001014	Nang tawh kimuh baih ding ka lamen hi, tua ciangin maitang kituah in i kiho ding hi. Nang tungah lemna om ta hen. Hih lai-a i lawmte in hong hopihna uh hong khak uh hi. Tua lai-a i lawmte a milipin na hopihsak in.
65001001	Jesu Khrist nasem James sanggampa Jude in, Pa Pasian in it a, Jesu Khrist in a kep a kisamsate tungah:
65001002	Lainatna, lemna le itna a dimin note aa hi ta hen.
65001003	Kong it lawmte aw, note tawh i tanh khawm hotkhiatna thu no tungah kong gelh ding lawp mahmah napi misiangte tungah khatvei-a cinkim dinga hong kikemsak tua upna na hut theih nading uh kutna lai-a gelh ding kul ka sa hi.
65001004	Ahang in, sawtpi-a amaute a kimawh paihna thu a kigelh khin zo mi bangzah hiam khat note lakah hong lutsim zo uh hi. Amaute pasian-neilo mite hi uh a, eite Pasian hehpihna, a kihhuai paktat theihna suaksakin eite in Thuneipipa le Topa a, amah bek i neih Jesu Khrist a nial uh hi.
65001005	Hihte khempeuh na theihsa uh ahi ta zongin “Topa in Egypt panin ama mite gumkhia a, ahi hangin a nunung lam ciangin a um lote a suksiatna thu kong phawkkiksak nuam hi.
65001006	Tua ciangin, a thuneihna dinmun uh kemcing lo a, a inn uh a taisan vansawltakte khuamial sungah khumcipin ni thupi Ni-a thukhen dingin tawntung sikkhainiang tawh a khih hi.
65001007	Tua bang zia in Sodom le Gomorrah le a kima khuapite in numei-pasal paktatna le lehtatna ah amau le amau kipia uh hi. Amaute, tawntung meikuang sunga gawtna thuak dingte etsakna a suak uh hi.
65001008	Tua tawh kibang tektek in, hih bang hih dinga a ngaihsunte in amau pumpi ninsak uh a, thuneihna nialin van mite a gensia uh hi.
65001009	Ahi hangin vansawltak a lianpen Michael nangawn, dawimangpa tawh Moses luang a kituh lai-un kosia in mawhsak ngam loin, “Topa in nang hong tai hen,” ci bek hi.
65001010	Tua hi napi hih mite in a theihtel loh peuhpeuh uh gensia-in, a theihtelsate uah lah, a ngaihsun thei lo gamsate bangin hih uh a, hih nate mahmah in amaute a susia hi.
65001011	Amaute in gimna nak thuak na un cia! Cain lampi zui uh a, Balaam khialhna sungah a met delh in, Korah lehdona ah a kisia zo uh hi.
65001012	Hih mite in na itna pawite uh melhemsak in, zumna nei loin no tawh an ne uh a – amau kia bek a kivakkhop tuucingte ahi uh hi. Amaute huih in a mutleng kawikawi guah a paii lo meii; gah a gah lo, a kibulkalh – nihvei a si sikhiau singkung ahi uh hi;
65001013	a zumhuaina uh a phuankhiasak zuahzuah tuipihual huai siate, a leng kawikawi aksite, amau adingin a mial pen khuamial, a tawntung a kisitsakte ahi uh hi.
65001014	Hih mite thu, Adam pana a sagihna pa Enoch in a na genkholhna-ah: “En un Topa, a misiangthote tul mun tul tampi tawh hong pai in,
65001015	mi khempeuh tungah thu khen dinga, amaute in a pasian-milohna uh a, a hihsa uh pasian-milohna khempeuh le a pasian-milo mawhneite in amah langpanga a gensa uh kam khaate-in a mawhsak ding hi,” ci hi.
65001016	Hih mite, phunhatte le mi ngawhhatte ahi uh hi; amaute, amau gitloh lunggulhna bangin gamta uh a, amau le amau kisialin, amau hamphat nadingin mi dangte a maitang phat uh hi.
65001017	Ahi hangin kong it lawmte aw, i Topa Jesu Khrist sawltakpite in a gen kholhsa phawk gige un.
65001018	Amaute in note tungah, “Hun nunung ciangin amau pasian-milo deihna a zui zahkohatte hong om ding uh hi,” ci uh hi.
65001019	Tua mite in Kha nei lo uh a, pumpi deihna bek zui-in note hong khenkhamte ahi uh hi.
65001020	Ahi hangin no kong it lawmte aw, a siangtho pen note upna ah no le no kilam unla Khasiangtho-in thu na ngen un.
65001021	Nuntak tawntungna ah note hong tun dingin i Topa Jesu Khrist lainatna na ngak kawmun Pasian itna sungah no le no na kikem un.
65001022	A lunghei neite na lainat un
65001023	mei sung pan midangte bawhkhia unla, honkhia un; adangte tungah a sa thanghuai banna puansilh nangawn kihin lau kawmin lainat siamna na nei un.
65001024	A puk lo dinga note hong kem thei, khialhna om lo-a, lungnopna lianpi tawh a minthanna ama om na-a note hong puak theipa –
65001025	eite Honpa Pasian khat bek tungah i Topa Jesu Khrist tungtawnin minthanna, thupina, vangliatna le thuneihna, khang hun khempeuh ma, tu laitak le a tawntung in om ta hen! Amen.
66001001	Pasian in a sawt lo-a tung pah dingte a nasemte tungah lak dingin amah a piak Jesu Khrist kilaakna ahi hi. Amah in ama vansawltakte sawlin ama nasem John tungah theisak a,
66001002	John in Pasian thu le Jesu Khrist thu teci panna a muh khempeuh teci a pang hi.
66001003	Hih genkholhna thute a sim mi thupha ngah hi-a, a sunga kigelhte za-a, a lungtanga a kemte thupha ngah ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a hun hong nai ta hi.
66001004	John in, Asia gama pawlpi sagihte tungah: Tu laitaka om, a omsa le hong pai ding pa le ama kumpi tokhom mai-a kha sagihte pan,
66001005	le a muanhuai teci pa, misi pana a suak masa pen, le leitung kumpite a ukpa, Jesu Khrist tung panin hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen. Eite hong it a, ama sisan hanga i mawhnate pan hong suaktasak,
66001006	ama Pasian le Pa nasem dinga kumpi-gam le siampi hong hisak ama tungah minthanna le vangliatna a tawntungin om den ta hen! Amen.
66001007	En un, meiipi tawh amah hong pai hi, mit khempeuh in amah mu dinga amah a sunlette nangawn in a mu ding uh hi; leitung a mite khempeuh ama hangin thum ding uh hi. Tua bang hi takpi ding hi! Amen.
66001008	Topa Pasian in, “Keimah, Alpha le Omega, tu laitak a om, a omsa le hong pai ding pa, Thahatpen ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
66001009	Jesu sunga eite tanh thuakna, kumpi-gam le sikdotaka na thuakpih pa uh, na sanggampa uh le na pawlpa uh keimah John, Pasian thu hang le Jesu thu teci panna hangin Patmos tuikulh ah ka om hi.
66001010	Topa’ Ni-in Kha sungah ka om hi, ka nunglam ah pengkul bangin aw ngaih mahmah khat ka za a:
66001011	"Na muh teng laizial tung khatah gelh inla pawlpi sagih: Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia le Laodicea-te tungah khak in,” hong ci hi.
66001012	Tua kei hong hopih aw en dingin ka kihei hi. Ka kihei khit ciangin kham meivak tunna sagihte ka mu-a,
66001013	tua meivak tunnate lakah “mihing tapa tawh kibang khat” a khepek ciang a bansuk puantualpi khat silhin a awm ah kham awmgak a gak mi khat ka mu hi.
66001014	A lu le a samte samul bangin ngo in, vuk bangin pak a, a mitte meikuanglai bang hi.
66001015	A khepekte pummei sunga sumsan hal-am tawh kibang a, a aw tuizeupi ging tawh kibang hi.
66001016	A taklam khutah aksi sagihte tawi-a, a kam panin a langniha hiam tuak namsau khat hong dawkkhia hi. A maitang, ni a tan pen laitak tawh kibang hi.
66001017	Amah ka muh ciangin a khephung ah a si bangin ka puk hi. Tua ciangin aman a taklam khut ka tungah nga a: “Lau kei in, keimah, a Masa pen le a Nunung pen ka hi hi.
66001018	Keimah a Nungta Pa ka hi hi. Ka si zo a, en in a tawntungin ka nungta den hi! Keimah in sihna leh Gawtmun tawhtangte zong ka tawi hi.
66001019	"Tua ahi manin na muhsate, tu laitak a om le tu nung cianga hong om dingte gelh in.
66001020	Ka taklam a na muh aksi sagihte le kham meivak sagihte’ thuthuk hih ahi hi: Aksi sagihte pen pawlpi sagihte’ a kem vansawltakte hi-a, meivak tunna sagihte pen pawlpi sagihte ahi hi.
66002001	"Ephesus a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte in a khut taklam-a aksi sagihte tawi-a, kham meivak tunna sagih laka a vakpa kammal ahi hi:
66002002	Na nasepte na hahkatna le na sikdonate ka thei hi. A tatkhel mite na thuak thei kei-a a hi lopi sawltakpi banga kibawlte na sittel a, amaute a zuau ahilam na mu cih ka thei hi.
66002003	Na sikdo a, ka min hangin haksatna na thuaka na cimtak kei hi.
66002004	Tua hi napi kong mawhsakna om veve hi: Na itna masa pen na nusia hi.
66002005	Na kiatna a sannazia phawk in! Kisik inla na hih masak nate hih kik in. Na kisik kei leh na kiangah kong pai dinga, na meivak tunna a omna pan ka khinkhia ding hi.
66002006	Ahi hangin na pahtakhuaina khat a om hi: Kei zong ka muhdah Nicolas pawlte gamtatna, na mudah hi.
66002007	Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen. A gualzo pa tungah Pasian paradise-a om nuntakna singkung pan a nek theih nading thu ka pia ding hi.
66002008	"Smyrna a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, a Masa pen le a Nunung pen, si-a a nungta kik pa kammalte ahi hi.
66002009	Na zawnna le na thuaksiat nate ka thei hi; tua hi napi na hau hi! Hi lo napi Jew mi a kici mi gensiate ahi hanga lah Satan synagogue a hite ka thei hi.
66002010	Na thuak dingte kihta kei in. Nang hong zia-et dingin dawimangpa in kimkhat thong sungah hong khum dinga, ni sawm sung bawlsiatna na thuak ding uh kong hilh hi. Sih dongin muanhuai un, tua hileh nuntakna lukhu kong pia ding hi.
66002011	Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen. A gualzo mi, a nihna sihna in a nasak kei ding hi.
66002012	"Pergamum a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte in a langnih-a, hiam tuak namsau nei pa kammalte ahi hi:
66002013	Satan in a tokhom a koihna mun – na tenna mun ka thei hi. Tua hi napi ka min tungah na muanhuai lai hi. Satan tenna mun na khuapi sunga ka teci muanhuai a kithatpa Antipas nite nangawnin kei nong upna na tawpsan kei hi.
66002014	Ahi hangin kong mawhsakna tawm no a om hi: Milim thoihna ante nek ding ahi zongin numei-pasal paktat ding ahi zongin, a hih dinga Israel-te khem dingin Balak in a hilh Balaam thuhilhna a zui mi pawlkhat na nei hi.
66002015	Tua mah tawh kibangin Nicolas pawlte thuhilhna a zuite zong na nei hi.
66002016	Tua ahi manin kisik in! Ahi kei leh nang kiangah kong paipah dinga, ka kama namsau tawh amaute ka do ding hi.
66002017	Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen. A gualzopa tungah a kisel manna pawlkhat ka pia ding hi. Amah a tunga minthak om suangkang khat zong ka pia ding a, tua min a ngah pa bekin a thei ding hi.
66002018	"Thyatira a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, a mitte meikuanglai a bang, a khepekte sumngo nawtngilsa a bang, Pasian Tapa kammalte ahi hi:
66002019	Na nasepte, na itna le na upna, na nasepnate le na sikdonate ka thei-a na sep masa sangin tam na semzaw hi.
66002020	Ahi zongin nang tungah hih mawh sakna kong nei hi: Amah le amah kamsang a kici numei Jezebel na thuak zo uh hi. Ama hilhna in ka nasemte, numei-pasal paktatna le milim thoihna anneknate ah a makaih khial hi.
66002021	Tuanu a paktatna pan a kisik nading hun ka piak hangin a ut kei hi.
66002022	Tua ahi ciangin amaute tuanu gamtatnate pan a kisik kei uh leh gimthuakna lupna tungah amah lawnin ama angkawmpihte nakpitakin ka thuaksak ding hi.
66002023	A tate ka satlum ding hi. Tua ciangin pawlpi khempeuh in lungtang le lungsim zong a phelekpa ka hilam hong thei ding uh a, note khempeuh na gamtatna bangun kong thuk ding hi.
66002024	Tu-in Thyatira a tuanu hilhna a zui lote le thuthuk kici Satan thusimte a sin lote tungah: (vangik dang peuhmah kong suan kei ding hi.)
66002025	Kong pai matengin na neihsa uh lenkip den un kong ci hi.
66002026	A tawp donga ka deihna ahi gualzo pa tungah minamte tunga thuneihna ka pia dinga,–
66002027	“‘Amah in amaute tungah sikciang tawh uk dinga; leibeel bangin amaute a satzan ding hi’ – tua in ka Pa tung pana thuneihna ka ngah bang tektek ahi hi.
66002028	Tua zingsol zong amah ka pia ding hi.
66002029	Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
66003001	"Sardis a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, Pasian kha sagihte le aksi sagihte a tawipa kammalte ahi hi: Na nasepte ka thei-a, a nungta-a na than hangin a sisa na hi hi.
66003002	Ka Pasian mitmuh ah na nasepte a mansiangin mu nai lo ka hi manin, khanglo in! A om lai a si dekdekte thahatsak in.
66003003	Tua ahi manin na ngahsa le na zaksate ciamteh in; a thu mang inla kisik in. Ahi hangin na khanlawh kei leh guta bangin kong pai dinga, nang kianga kong pai ding a hun na thei kei ding hi.
66003004	A puansilh uh a buahsak lo, Sardis ah mi tawm no na nei lai hi. Amaute santham ahi manin puanpak silhin kei tawh a tonkhawm ding uh hi.
66003005	A gualzopa in amaute tawh kibangin puanpak a silh ding hi. Nuntakna laibu panin a min ka phiat ngei kei dinga, ka Pa le ama vansawltakte mai-ah a min ka pulak zaw ding hi.
66003006	Pawlpite tungah Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
66003007	"Philadelphia a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, a siangtho le a thumaan-pa, David tawhtang tawipa kammalte ahi hi. Ama honsa kuamah in khak thei lo a, ama khaksa kuamah in a hong thei kei hi.
66003008	Na nasepte ka thei hi. En in, na mai ah kuama khak theih loh kong honsa khat ka koih hi. Thahatna tawmkha bek na neih lam ka thei hi. Tua hi napi ka thu na kembita ka min na nial kei hi.
66003009	Satan synagogue ahite, Jew mi hi lo napi Jew mi a kici, ahi hanga zuauphuakte, hong paisakin na khephungah ka puksak dinga nang kong it lam ka theisak ding hi.
66003010	Lungduaitaka thuak dingin kong thupiak na man nungsangin, leitang tunga tengte zia-et nadingin leitung bupa hong tung ding bawlsiatna hun panin, ken zong nang kong peng khiasak ding hi.
66003011	Kong paipah ding hi. Na kumpi lukhu kuamah in hong suh loh nadingin na neihsa lenkip den in.
66003012	A gualzopa, ka Pasian biakinnpi sungah khuampi ka suaksak ding hi. Amah in tua a nusia ngei nawn kei ding hi. Ama tungah ka Pasian min le ka Pasian pana vantung a hong kumsuk ka Pasian khuapi, tua Jerusalem thak min ka gelh ding hi. Ama tungah ka min thak zong ka gelh ding hi.
66003013	Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
66003014	"Laodicea a pawlpi vansawltak tungah gelh in: Hihte, Pasian piansakte a ukpa, a muanhuai le a thutak Amen kam malte ahi hi.
66003015	Na nasepte ka thei hi, vot lah vot loin sa lah na sa kei hi. Khat zawsang na hi ding kong deih hi!
66003016	Tua ahi ciangin vot lah vot lo, sa lah sa loin lum milmial na hi manin ka kam panin kong siakhia dektak hi.
66003017	‘Ka hau a, neih le lam ka cin hi, khat beek ka sam kei hi,’ na ci hi. Ahi hangin a genthei, a hehpihhuai, azawng, a mittaw le guaktang na hilam a phawk lo na hi hi.
66003018	Na hauh theih nadingin kei kiang panin mei-a halsiangsa kham; guaktang zumhuaina na sel nadingin na silh ding puanpak; khua na muh theih nadingin na nuh ding mitza, na lei ding kong thuhilh hi.
66003019	Ka it mite tai-in ka sek hi. Tua ahi ciangin citak inla kisik in.
66003020	Hih lai-ah ka om hi! Kongkhak ah dingin ka kiu hi. Mi khatpeuh in ka aw za a, kongkhak hong hon leh ka lut dinga, amah tawh an nekhawm in, amah in kei tawh a nekhawm ding hi.
66003021	Kei gualzo-in ka Pa tawh ama kumpi tokhom tungah ka tut bang tektek in, a gualzopa, kei tawh ka kumpi tokhom tungah a tut theih na ding thu ka pia ding hi.
66003022	Pawlpite tunga Kha thugen bil nei peuh in za ta hen,” a ci hi.
66004001	Hih teng khit ciangin ka et leh vantung ah kong kihongsa khat ka mai-ah ka mu hi. Ka aw zak masak pen in pengkul bangin kei tungah, “Hih lai-ah hong paito in, hih khit cianga a tung pelmawh ding kong lak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
66004002	Thakhatin Kha-in ka om pah a, ka mai-ah a tunga kua hiam khat a tu kumpi tokhom khat vantung a om ka mu hi.
66004003	Tua lai-a tupa in jaspar le carnelian mel a sun hi. Emeral mel tawh a kibang sakhituihup khat in kumpi tokhom a kualkhum hi.
66004004	Tua kumpi tokhom, a dang kumpi tokhom sawmnih le li in umcih a, tuate tungah upate sawmnih le li a tu uh hi. Amaute a pakin kizem uh a, amau lutung ah kham kumpi lukhu a khu ciat uh hi.
66004005	Tua kumpi tokhom panin khua phia zalzal a, kek kia daldal in van a ging damdam hi. Tua kumpi tokhom mai-ah meivak sagih a kuang hi. Hihte Pasian kha sagihte ahi hi.
66004006	Kumpi tokhom mai-ah crystal banga siang, limlang tuipi tawh a kibang khat zong a om hi. A laizang takah kumpi tokhom kimkotin a nung le a mai-ah mitin a tuam, a nungta ganhing lite a om uh hi.
66004007	A nungta ganhing masa pen humpinelkai tawh kibanga, a nihna bawngtal tawh kibangin, a thumna in mi bangin maitang nei-a, a lina, muvanlai lenglai a bang hi.
66004008	Tua a nungta ganhing lite in kha guk nei ciat uh a, a pumtangun a kha nuai nangawn mit-in a tuam hi. Amaute in sun le zan khawl loin: “A omdensa, tu laitaka om le hong pai ding, Thahatpen Topa Pasian, Siangtho, Siangtho, Siangtho hi,” a ci uh hi.
66004009	Tua a nungta ganhingte in tua kumpi tokhom-a tu, a tawntung a nungta den pa tungah minthanna, pahtawina le lungdam thu a puak peuhpeuh uh ciangin
66004010	tua upa sawmnih le lite, kumpi tokhom tunga tupa mai-ah bok uh a, a tawntunga nungta den pa a bia uh hi. Tua kumpi tokhom mai-ah a kumpi lukhute uh nga uh a:
66004011	"Kote Topa le Pasian aw, nangin na khempeuh na piangsak-a nangma deih bangin amaute kipiangsakin nungta uh ahi manin, minthanna, pahtawina le vangliatnate a ngah dingin na kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
66005001	Tua ciangin kumpi tokhom tunga tupa taklam ah a langniha kigelh ciamtehna sagiha kiciamteh laizial khat ka mu hi.
66005002	Tuateh a thahat vansawltak khat in, “Ciamtehna phela, laizial zal dingin kua cing ahi hiam?” ci-a ngaihtaka kitangko ka mu hi.
66005003	Ahi hangin vantung ahi zongin, leitung ahi zongin, leinuai ahi zongin, laizial a zal gen loh a sung nangawn a en thei kuamah a om kei hi.
66005004	Laizial a zal ding ahikeh a sung en dinga a cing nangawn kuamah a kimuh loh manin kah cihtakin ka kap hi.
66005005	Tua ciangin tua upate khat in kei kiangah, “Kap kei in! En in, Judah beh a Humpinelkai, David Zungpi gualzo ta hi. Amah in tua laizial le a ciamtehna sagihte a hong thei hi,” hong ci hi.
66005006	Tua ciangin a kigosa hileh kilawm Tuuno khat, tua kumpi tokhom laizangah dinga, a nungta ganhing lite le upate in a kualkhum uh ka mu hi. Amah in ki sagih le mit sagih nei a, tuate, leitung khempeuh a kisawlkhia Pasian kha sagihte ahi hi.
66005007	Amah pai-in kumpi tokhom tunga tupa taklama laizial a la hi.
66005008	A lak khit ciangin tua a nungta ganhing lite le upa sawmnih le lite, Tuuno mai-ah a boksuk uh hi. Amaute in harp khat ciat nei uh a, misiangte thungetna ahi, gimnamtui tawh a dim kham kuangkumte a tawi uh hi.
66005009	Amaute in lathak khat, “Nang hong kigo zo a, na sisan tawh Pasian ading mi, beh kim, pau kim, mi kim, nam kim pan lei khin zo na hi manin tua laizial la a, a ciamtehna phel dingin na kilawm hi.
66005010	Nangmah in amaute kumpi-gam khat le kote Pasian nasem ding siampi-in na bawl khin zo a, amaute in leitung a uk ding uh hi,” ci-in a sa uh hi.
66005011	Tua ciangin ka en a, vansawltak tampi, tul mun tul tampi le tulsawm mun tulsawm tampite aw ka za hi. Amaute in tua kumpi tokhom le a nungta ganhingte le upate a umcih uh hi.
66005012	Amaute in, “A kigosa Tuuno, vangliatna, hauhna, pilna, hatna, pahtawina, minthanna le phatna ngah dingin kilawm hi,” ci-in ngaihtakin a sa uh hi.
66005013	Tua ciangin vantung, leitung, leinuai, tuipi tung le tuate sunga om a kipiang sakte khempeuh in: “Kumpi tokhom tunga tupa le Tuuno tungah phatna, pahtawina, minthanna le vangliatna a tawntungin om den ta hen!” ci-in la a sak uh ka za hi.
66005014	A nungta ganhing lite in, “Amen,” ci uh a upate in bokin a bia uh hi.
66006001	Tuuno in ciamtehna sagihte a masa pen a hon laitak ka en hi. Tua ciangin a nungta ganhing lite khat in kek kia ging bangin, “Hong pai in!” a cih ka za hi.
66006002	Ka en-a, ka mai-ah sakol kang khat a na om hi! A tunga tuangpa in thal khat tawi a, amah kumpi lukhu khat kipia in, gual zawh a sawm gualzopa bangin a kuan khia hi.
66006003	Tuuno in ciamtehna nihna a hon ciangin a nungta ganhing nihna in, “Hong pai in!” a cih uh ka za hi.
66006004	Tua ciangin meikuang banga san sakol khat hong pusuakkhia hi. A tunga tuangpa, leitung pan lemna lakkhiat theihna le mite khat le khat kithahsak theihna vang kipia hi. Amah namsau lianpi khat kipia hi.
66006005	Tuuno in ciamtehna a thumna a hon ciangin, a nungta ganhing a thumna in, “Hong pai in!” a cih ka za hi. Ka en a, ka mai-ah sakol vom khat a na om hi! A tunga tuangpa in, tawi tehna kop khat a khutah a tawi hi.
66006006	Tua ciangin a nungta ganhing lite lakah aw khat tawh a kibang khat in, “Ni khat thaman dingin mangbuh quart khat le ni khat thaman dingin mangbuh-ham quart thum hi; ahi zongin lenggahzu le sathau siasak kei in!” a cih ka za hi.
66006007	Tuuno in ciamtehna lina a hon ciangin a nungta ganhing a lina in, “Hong pai in!” a cih aw ka za hi.
66006008	Ka en a, ka mai-ah sakol daang khat a na om hi! A tunga tuangpa min Sihna kici hi-a, Gawtmun in a nung mahmah ah a zui hi. Amaute in leitung seh li suah seh khat, namsau, kialpi, pulpi le leitung gamsate-a a thah theih nadingin vang liatna kipia hi.
66006009	Amah in ciamtehna ngana a hon ciangin, Pasian thu hang le citaka teci a pannasate uh hanga kithatte khate biakna-tau nuai-ah ka mu hi.
66006010	Amaute in, “A siangtho le a thumaan Thuneipipen Topa aw, leitunga tengte thu na khen ding le kote sisan phu na lak ma bang tan sawt lai ding hiam?” ci-in nakpi in a kiko uh hi.
66006011	Tua ciangin amaute puantual pak khat ciat kipia-a, amaute in a naseppih a sanggamte uh a kithat lai dingte a kim masiah a na ngak lai zek dingun kigen hi.
66006012	Amah in ciamtehna a gukna a hon laitak ka en hi. Tua laitak, nakpitakin zin a ling hi. Ni, kelmul kigan ippi vom bangin vom a, khapi a bupin sisan bangin san hi.
66006013	Thei a gah nunungte huihkhauh in a mutpulh bangin vana aksite lei-ah a kia hi.
66006014	Laizial zial bangin vanpi kizial a, mualpi le tuikulh khempeuh a omna mun pan kikhinkhia uh hi.
66006015	Tua ciangin leitunga kumpite, kumpi tapate, galkap mangte, mihaute, thahatte, sila le sila lote khempeuh leihawm sung le mualtung suangpi lakah a bu uh hi.
66006016	Amaute in mualpi le suangpite kiangah, “Hong vuknelh unla, kumpi tokhom tunga tupa maitang pan le Tuuno thangpaihna panin hong sel un!
66006017	Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute thangpaihna ni thupi hong tung hi, kua in thuak zo ding hiam?” ci-in a sam uh hi.
66007001	Hih teng khit ciangin lei kiu li-a ding vansawltak li ka mu a, amaute in leitung ahi zongin, tuipi tung ahi zongin, singkung khatpeuh tung ahi zongin a nung lo dingin leitung huih lite a lencip uh hi.
66007002	Tua ciangin a nungta Pasian ciamtehna a nei vansawltak adang khat nisuahna lam pan a paito ka mu hi. Amah in leitung le tuipi a suksiat theih nading vangliatna a kipiasa vansawltak lite tungah:
66007003	"Kote Pasian’ na a semte taltang tungah ciamtehna ka koih khit matengun, leitung ahi zongin, tuipi ahi zongin, singkungte ahi zongin susia kei un,” ci-in nakpi-in a kikokhia hi.
66007004	Tua ciangin a ciamtehsate a phazah ka za a Israel behte khempeuh panin 144,000 ahi hi.
66007005	Judah beh panin 12,000, Reuben beh panin 12,000, Gad beh panin 12,000,
66007006	Asher beh panin 12,000, Naphtali beh panin 12,000, Manasseh beh panin 12,000,
66007007	Simeon beh panin 12,000, Levi beh panin 12,000, Issachar beh panin 12,000,
66007008	Zebulun beh panin 12,000, Joseph beh panin 12,000, Benjamin beh panin 12,000, ciamtehsa ahi hi.
66007009	Hih teng khit ciangin ka en a, ka mai-ah kuama sim theih loh minam khempeuh pan, beh khempeuh pan, micih pan le pau khempeuh panin mihon tampitak, kumpi tokhom le Tuuno mai-ah a om uh hi. Amaute in puantual pak silh uh a, a khutuah nisuh hiangte a tawi uh hi.
66007010	Amaute nakpi in awng uh a, “Hotkhiatna, kumpi tokhom tunga tupa I Pasian le Tuuno pan ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
66007011	Vansawltak khempeuh, kumpi tokhom le upate, a nungta ganhing lite kimkotah ding uh hi. Kumpi tokhom mai-ah kunsuk uh a, Pasian bia-in:
66007012	"Amen! I Pasian tungah phatna, minthanna, pilna, lungdamna, pahtawina, vangliatna le hatna a tawntungin om den ta hen. Amen!” a ci uh hi.
66007013	Tua ciangin upate khat in kei kiangah, “Hih puantual pak silhte kua hi-a, koi pana hong pai uh ahi hiam!” ci-in hong dong hi.
66007014	"Pu aw, nang na thei hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hihte gimna lianpi pana hong pusuakkhiate ahi uh hi. Amaute in a puantualte uh Tuuno sisan ah sawpin a paksakte ahi uh hi.
66007015	Tua ahi manin, “Amaute Pasian kumpi tokhom mai-ah omin sun le zanin ama biakinnpi sungah ama na a sem uh hi; tua hi-a, kumpi tokhom tunga tupa in, amau tungah a puanbuk a zak ding hi.
66007016	Amaute gilkial kik ngei nawn lo ding uh a, a dangtak kik ngei nawn kei ding uh hi. Amaute nisa in sal kha nawn lo dinga, nisapi in zong a kangkha kei ding hi.
66007017	Ahang in, kumpi tokhom laizanga Tuuno, amaute cingpa hi ding hi; amah in amaute a nungta tuinakte ah paipih ding hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in amaute mit pan, khitui khempeuh a nulkeu ding hi,”hong ci hi.
66008001	Amah in ciamtehna sagihna a hon laitakin nai lang sung ding khawng vantung a sip dide hi.
66008002	Tua ciangin Pasian mai-a ding van sawltak sagihte ka mu-a, amaute pengkul sagih kipia hi.
66008003	Gimnamtui halna kham kuang tawi vansawltak dang khat hong pai-in biakna-tau ah a ding hi. Misiangte khempeuh thungetna tawh kumpi tokhom mai-a kham biakna-tau tunga piak dingin gimnamtui tampitak kipia hi.
66008004	Vansawltak khut panin misiangte thungetna tawh gimnamtui khu Pasian mai-ah a tungto hi.
66008005	Tua ciangin vansawltak in gimnamtui kuang la a, biakna-tau pana mei-am tawh a dip khit ciangin leitung a denna suk leh khua phia zalzalin, kek kia-a van ging damdam in zin a ling hi.
66008006	Tua ciangin pengkul sagih tawi vansawltak sagihte pengkul mut dingin a kithawi uh hi.
66008007	Vansawltak a khatna in a pengkul mut a, sisan tawh kihel gial le mei hong omin leitung ah kibuasuk hi. Leitung seh thum suah seh khat kangtum a, sing kungte seh thum suah seh khat kang tumin lopa hing khempeuh a kangtum hi.
66008008	Vansawltak a nihna in a pengkul mut a, a nak liat mahmah a pumkuan zuaizuai mualpi bang khat tuipi sungah kilawnsuk hi. Tuipi seh thum suah seh khat sisan suak-a,
66008009	tuipi sunga a nungta ganhingte seh thum suah seh khat si-in, tembawpite seh thum suah seh khat a kisia hi.
66008010	Vansawltak a thumna in a pengkul mut a, meilah kuanglai tawh kibang aski lianpi khat van panin kiasuk-a, gunte, tuinakte, seh thum suah seh khat tungah a tu hi.
66008011	Tua aksi min Gamsaia ahi hi. Tuite seh thum suah seh khat tuikha suak-a, tua tuikhaa hangin mi tampi a si uh hi.
66008012	Vansawltak a lina in a pengkul mut a, ni seh thum suah seh khat, kha seh thum suah seh khat le aksi seh thum suah seh khat tuate seh thum suah seh khat a mial tek nadingin a satkhia hi. Sun seh thum suah seh khat le zan seh thum suah seh khat khua a vak kei hi.
66008013	Ka et laitakin vankimlai-a leng muvanlai khat in: “Adang vansawltak thumte mut ding pelkul gingte hangin: leitung a tengte tungah Gimna! Gimna! Gimna!” ci-a nakpi-a a ham ka za hi.
66009001	Vansawltak a ngana in a pengkul mut-a, van pan leitung ah a kia aksi khat ka mu hi. Tua aksi Kawhawmpi vang honna tawhtang kipia hi.
66009002	Amah in Kawhawmpi a hon ciangin tua sung panin pummei phualpi khu bangin meikhu a suakkhia hi. Tua Kawhawmpi pana meikhu in ni le van a mialsak hi.
66009003	Tua ciangin meikhu lak panin kauphete leitung ah tuaksuk uh a, leitunga aikam vangliatna bang vangliatna amaute kipia hi.
66009004	Tuate tungah, leitunga lopate, ankung khatpeuh ahikeh singkung susia loin, a taltang tunga Pasian ciamtehna a nei lote bek a suksiat dingun kihilh hi.
66009005	Amaute in a thah nading uh vangliatna kipia lo-a, ahi hangin kha nga sung gawt thei bek ding uh hi. Tua a thuak uh gimna in, aikam in mi a deh cianga a nat bang ahi hi.
66009006	Tua hun laitakin mite in sihna zong ding uh a, ahi hangin a mu kei ding uh hi; amaute a si nuam ding uh a, ahi hangin sihna in amaute a pel ding hi.
66009007	Tua kauphete, galsim dinga kithawi sa sakolte tawh kibang hi. Amaute lutungah kham kumpi lukhu tawh kibang khu uh a, a maitang un mihing maitang a sun hi.
66009008	A sam uh numeite sam banga, a hate uh humpinelkai ha a bang hi.
66009009	Sik awmdal bang awmdal nei uh a, a kha ging uh, galsimna-a sakolleng tampi tai henhan ging a bang hi.
66009010	Mei nei uh a, aikam bangin a deh uh hi. A mei-uah mite kha nga sung a thuaksiatsak theih nading uh vangliatna a nei uh hi.
66009011	Amaute in Kawhawmpi vansawltak, kumpi-in a nei uh hi. Ama min Hebrew pau in Abaddon hi a, Greek pau in Apollyon ahi hi.
66009012	A masa pen gimna bei zo a, gimna adang nih tung lai ding hi.
66009013	Vansawltak a gukna in a pengkul mut a, Pasian mai-a kham biakna-tau kite panin awging khat ka za hi.
66009014	Tua in pengkul tawi vansawltak a gukna kiang ah, “Euphrates gunpi-a kihen vansawltak lite khahkhia un,” a ci hi.
66009015	Hih nai, hih ni, hih kha, hih kum lian adingin a kigingsa-a kikoih tua vansawltak lite, leitung mi seh thum suah seh khat a that dingin kikhahkhia hi.
66009016	Sakol tungtuang galkapte awn zanih a pha hi. Amaute a phazah ka za hi.
66009017	Ka mangmuhna-a ka muh sakolte le a tuangte hih bang ahi hi: A awmdalte uh meikung bangin a san, a ciipdum le kaat banga eng tawh ahi hi. Sakolte lutangte humpinelkai lutang tawh kibang a, a kam panun mei, meikhu le kaat a suakkhia hi.
66009018	Amaute kam pana suak khia mei, meikhu le kaat gimna nam thumte in, mihingte seh thum suah seh khat a thatlum hi.
66009019	Tua sakolte a kam sung uh le a mei uhah vangliatna a om hi; a meite uh gul bang, lutang nei-in tua tawh mi a liamsuah uh hi.
66009020	Hih pulpite in a thah baang a om lai leitung mite, a khut uh tawh a sep uh nate panin a kisik nai kei uh hi; amaute in dawite, kham, ngun, sumngo, sing le suang milimte – khua mu thei lo, khua za thei lo, lam pai thei lo milimte a biak uh a tawp tuan kei uh hi.
66009021	Amaute in tualthahnate, aisannate, numei-pasal paktatnate le a guktaknate uh zong a kisik tuan beek kei uh hi.
66010001	Tua ciangin a thahat vansawltak dang khat vantung pan a kumsuk ka mu hi. Meiipi, puantualin silh-a, a lutung san ah sakhituihup khat a om hi; a maitang ni tawh kibanga, a khete meikuang khuampi a bang hi.
66010002	Amah in a khut sunga kizalsa laizial neu khat a tawi hi. A taklam khe-in tuipi tung sik-a, a veilam khe-in leitung a sik hi.
66010003	Humpi nelkai hawk bangin ngaihtakin a kiko hi. Amah a kiko ciangin kek kia ging sagihte in thu a gen uh hi.
66010004	Kek kia ging sagihte in thu a gen uh ciangin a gelh dingin ka kithawi hi; ahi hangin vantung panin aw khat in, “Kek kia ging sagihte thugen gelh kei inla imcip in,” hong cih ka za hi.
66010005	Tua ciangin ka muhsa tuipi tung le leitunga ding vansawltak in a taklam khut vantung lamah a lamto hi.
66010006	Amah a tawntung a nungta den pa, vantungte le a sunga omte khempeuh lei le a tunga omte khempeuh le tuipi le a sunga omte khempeuh a piangsakpa lo-in kiciam a, “A ziakai nawn kei ding hi!
66010007	Ahi hangin vansawltak a sagihna in a pengkul a mut kuan laitakin, ama nasemte ahi kamsangte tunga a zaksak bang tektek in, Pasian thuthukte a tungkim ta ding hi,” a ci hi.
66010008	Tua ciangin vantung pan a ka zak tua aw in khat vei hong genbeh lai a: “Pai inla, tuipi tung le leitung ading vansawltak khut sunga zalsa a om laizial la in,” hong ci hi.
66010009	Tua ciangin vansawltak kiangah pai-in tua laizial neu hong piak dingin ka ngen hi. Amah in, “La inla ne in. Na gilpi thuksak dinga, ahi hangin na kam ah khuaizu bangin a khum ding hi,” hong ci hi.
66010010	Vansawltak khut panin tua laizial neu la in ka ne hi. Ka kam sungah khuaizu khum bangin khuma, ahi hangin ka nek khit ciangin ka gilpi a thuksak hi.
66010011	Tua ciangin kei tungah, “Nang in mi tampite, minamte, pau tuamtuamte le kumpite tawh kisai, genkholhnate na gen kik pelmawh ding hi,” hong kici hi.
66011001	Tehna ciang tawh kibang pumpeng khat kei hong kipia a, “Pai inla Pasian biakinnpi le biakna-tau tehin, tua lai-a om a biate sim in.
66011002	Ahi hangin a tual puanung pen Gentile-te tunga kipiasa ahi manin teh lohin nusia in. Amaute in tua khuapi siangtho kha 42 sung a tuancil ding uh hi.
66011003	Ka teci nihte vangliatna ka pia dinga, amaute in ippi puan silhin, ni 1,260 sung gen kholhna a gen ding uh hi,” ci-in hong kigen hi.
66011004	Hihte, leitung Topa mai-a a ding olive kung nihte le meivak tunna nihte ahi hi.
66011005	Mi khatpeuh in tuate natsak a sawm leh amaute kam panun meikuang pusuakkhia-in a galte uh valhtum hi. Hih in amaute a nasak nuam peuhpeuh sih pelmawh nading zia ahi hi.
66011006	Hih mite in amaute thugenkholh hun sung teng guah a zuk loh nadingin van khakcip theih nading vangliatna a nei uh hi. Tua banah amaute in tui sisan suaksak theihna le amaute deih hunhun-a pulpi tawh leitung a thuaksak theih nading uh vangliatna a nei uh hi.
66011007	Amaute in a teci panna uh a man khit uh ciangin Kawhawmpi pana hong paito gamsa in amaute do ding a, zo-in a that ding hi.
66011008	Amaute luang, a Topa uh zong a kilhlupna mun Sodom le Egypt ci-a tehpih a kinei khuapi lian sung, lam lian lai-ah a lum ding hi.
66011009	Ni thum le alang sung mite, beh, pau le minam khempeuh pana mite in tua misi luangte vuisak loin a enen ding uh hi.
66011010	Hih kamsang nihte in leitunga teng mite thuaksiasak ngei zo uh ahi manin leitung a teng mite kigual zosakin ai ding uh a, khat le khat letsong a kipia ding uh hi.
66011011	Ahi hangin ni thum le ni lang sungin amaute sungah Pasian tung pana nuntakna huu lutin, a khe un ding ding uh a, amaute lau mahmah ding uh hi.
66011012	Tua ciangin amaute in vantung panin, “Hih lai ah hong paito un,” a ci aw khat a za uh hi. A galte un amaute a et zuizui lai mah un meii kawm lakah a paito uh hi.
66011013	Tua laitak tektekin zin nakpi-in linga, khuapi seh sawm suah seh khat a kicim hi. Tua zinling ah mi tul sagih si-a, a nungta lai mite lau lua mahmah in van a Pasian a minthangsak uh hi.
66011014	Gimna a nihna bei khin zo-a, gimna thumna a tung pah ding hi.
66011015	Vansawltak a sagihna in a pengkul muta, vantung ah aw ngaih mahmah in: “Leitung gam teng i Topa gam le ama Khrist gam suak zo a, amah in a tawntung in uk den ding hi,”a ci hi.
66011016	Tua ciangin Pasian mai-a amau kumpi tokhoma tu upa sawmnih le lite in bokin bia uh a:
66011017	"A om densa, tu laitaka om, Thahatpen Topa Pasian aw, a lian mahmah na vangliatna na la zo a, gam uk dingin kipan khin na himanin nang tungah lungdamna kong puak uh hi.
66011018	Minamte heh uh a; Misite tunga thukhen ding hun le na nasem kamsangte, na min a zahtak na misiangte aneu alian - in pahtakman piak ding hun le leitung a susiate suksiat ding hun, hong tung zo hi,”a ci uh hi.
66011019	Tua ciangin vantunga Pasian biakinnpi kihong a, ama biakinnpi sungah ama thukhun singkuangpi kimu hi. Tua mun ah kek kia in khua phia zalzala, van ging damdam in zin linga, gialpi a kia hi.
66012001	Vantungah a lian a lamdang limte kilang a: numei khat in ni silhin a khepek nuai-ah khapi sik-a, aksi sawm le nih lukhu in a nei hi.
66012002	Amah a gai hi-a, nau suak dektak bangin nasa-in a kiko hi.
66012003	Tua ciangin vantung ah lim lamdang khat kilang a: agol pha mahmah gulpi-sikhiam san khat in, lutang sagih nei-a, ki sawm nei-in, a lutungah kumpi lukhu sagih a khu hi.
66012004	A mei in aksite seh thum suah seh khat van pan vatkhia a, tuate lei ah a kia hi. A suak dektak numei mai-ah a suah pheta, a ta a nawmvalh theih pah nadingin gulpi-sikhiam a ding hi.
66012005	Numei in minam khempeuh sikciang tawh a uk ding tapa pasalno khat a nei hi. A ta kibawhpah in Pasian kianga kumpi tokhom ah kikoihto pah hi.
66012006	A numei pen Pasian in ama adinga a bawlsaksa gamlak ah ni 1,260 kikem dingin a tai hi.
66012007	Tua ciangin vantung ah gal kidona a om hi. Michael le a vansawltakte in tua gulpi-sikhiam do uh a, gulpi-sikhiam le a vansawltakte in a do thuk uh hi.
66012008	Ahi hangin a do zo dingin thakhauh lo ahi manin vantunga a mun uh a tan uh hi.
66012009	Gulpi-sikhiam kilawmsuk a – tua dawimangpa ahikeh Satan kici leitung buppi lampialsakpa tua tanglai gulpi ahi hi. Amah ama vansawltakte tawh lei-ah kilawnkhia suk hi.
66012010	Tua ciangin vantung ah aw ngaih taka kiko khat ka za a: “Tu-in eite Pasian hotkhiatna, a vangliatna, a gam le ama Khrist thuneihna hong tung zo hi. Ahang in, eite Pasian mai-ah sun le zanin i sanggamte ngawhin a mawhsakpa kilawnkhia zo hi.
66012011	Amaute in, Tuuno sisan hang le amaute teci panna thu hangin amah a zo uh hi; amaute in sihna thuak ngam zahin a nuntakna uh a it kei uh hi.
66012012	Tua ahi manin no vantungte le tuate sunga tengte khempeuh aw, nuam un! Ahi hangin leitung le tuipi aw, nang tungah dawimangpa hong tuaksuk zo ahi manin gimna nak thuak na nicia! Amah in ama hun a tom lam thei ahi manin, lungsona tawh kidim hi,”a ci hi.
66012013	Gulpi-sikhiam in amah leitung ah kilawnkhia ahilam a theih ciangin, tua tapa nei numei a delh hi.
66012014	Tua numei gulpi phak zawh lohna gam ah, hun khat, hunte le hun khat lang a kikep nadinga kibawlsa mun ah a len theih nadingin a lian mahmah muvanlai kha nihte kipia hi.
66012015	Tua ciangin gulpi in, tua numei pha-a tuizeupi taisak dingin a kam panin gun bangin tui a phitkhia hi.
66012016	Ahi hangin leitung in tua numei huh a, gulpi-sikhiam in a kam pana a phitkhiat gun, a kamka in a na valhtum hi.
66012017	Tua ciangin tua numei tungah gulpi-sikhiam thangpai a, Pasian thupiak mangin, Jesu teci panna a len a om lai tua numei tate sim dingin a kuankhia hi.
66013001	Tua ciangin gulpi-sikhiam tuipi gei sehtak tungah a ding hi. Tua ciangin tuipi pana pusuakkhia gamsa khat ka mu hi. Amah in ki sawm, lutang sagih, a ki tungah kumpi lukhu sawm, a lutunga Pasian gendaina min a tuang ciat a nei hi.
66013002	Ka muh gamsa pen kamkei tawh kisun-a, ahi hangin a khepekte vompi aa tawh kibangin, a kam, humpinelkai kam a bang hi. Gulpi-sikhiam in ama vang liatna, a kumpi tokhom le a lian a thuneihna tua gamsa a pia hi.
66013003	Tua gamsate lutangte khat ah sihna khop zah liamma nei a, ahi hangin tua liamma a dam ta hi. Leitung bup in lamdang sa in tua gamsa a zui uh hi.
66013004	Gulpi-sikhiam in tua gamsa tungah thu-neihna pia ahi manin mite in gulpi-sikhiam a bia uh hi. Amaute in tua gamsa zong bia uh a, “Tua gamsa bang kua om hiam? Amah kua in langdo thei ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
66013005	Tua gamsa tungah a kiphatsakna kam pau nading le gendai nading kam khat kipia-a, a thuneihna a zat hun ding kha sawmli le nih sung kipia hi.
66013006	Amah in Pasian gendai ding, a min, a tenna mun le vantung a tengte gendaina-in a kam a ka hi.
66013007	Amah in, misiangte doin a zawh nading vangliatna kipia hi. Ama tungah beh peuhmah, mite, paute le minamte tunga thuneihna kipia lai hi.
66013008	Leitung kipiansaka kipan a kigosa Tuuno nuntakna laibu sunga a min a kigelh lote khempeuh – leitunga a tengte khempeuh in tua gamsa bia ding uh hi.
66013009	Bil nei peuh in za ta hen.
66013010	Mi khatpeuh saltaang ding ahileh sal taang ding hi. Mi khatpeuh namsau a thah ding ahileh namsau in kithat ding hi. Hih in misiangte lungduai-a thuakna le muanhuaina a kal hi.
66013011	Tua ciangin lei pana pusuakkhia gamsa adang khat ka mu hi. Tua in tuuno bangin ki nih nei-a, ahi hangin gulpi-sikhiam bangin a pau hi.
66013012	Amah in a masa gamsa tangin ama thuneihna khempeuh zanga, leitung le a sunga tengte, tua sihna khopa liamma a nei a damsa gamsa masa pen a biasak hi.
66013013	Amah in alian a lamdang limte bawla, mi khempeuh muhin vantung pan lei-ah mei nangawn a kiasak hi.
66013014	Tua limte hangin a masa gamsa tangin vangliatna kipia-a, leitunga tengte a khem hi. Amah in amaute tungah namsau ma tawh liam napi-a, a nungta lai gamsa pahtawina milim khat a bawl ding uh thu a pia hi.
66013015	Tua a masa gamsa lim tungah huu kipia a, pau thei-in tua milim a bia nuam lote a thah theih nadingin ama tungah vang liatna kipia hi.
66013016	Amah in mi khempeuh, aneu alian, azawng ahau, sila le sila lote in a taklam khut ahikeh a taltang ah thatang hatthu-in ciamtehna a neisak hi.
66013017	Tua ciamtehna, gamsa min ahikeh a min nambat ahi ciamtehna a nei lote in lei thei loin, zuak thei lo ding uh hi.
66013018	Hih in pilna a kal hi. Tua in mihing nambat ahi manin, theihna a nei peuh in tua gamsa nambat tuat ta hen. Ama nambat 666 ahi hi.
66014001	Tua ciangin ka et leh ka mai ah a taltang tung-ua ama min le a Pa min a kigelhsa 144,000-te tawh Zion Vum tunga ding Tuuno a na om hi.
66014002	Tua ciangin vantung pan a ngaih mahmah kekbaak kia ging le tuizeu hawk tawh a kibang aw khat ka za hi. Ka zak aw pen harp tumte tumging tawh kibang hi.
66014003	Amaute in kumpi tokhom mai le a nungta ganhing lite le upate mai-ah lathak khat a sa uh hi. Lei pana kitankhiasa tua 144,000-te longal kuamah in tua la a sin thei kei hi.
66014004	Hihte in amau le amau a sianga a kikep manun, amau le amau numei tawh a kibuahsak lote ahi uh hi. Amaute in Tuuno paina peuhpeuh ah a zui uh hi. Amaute, mite lak pana kileisa hi uh a, Pasian le Tuuno tungah gahmasa banga piakte ahi uh hi.
66014005	Amaute kam panin zuauthu kimu loin kawk baang lo uh hi.
66014006	Tua khit ciangin vansawltak dang khat van kimlai-a leng ka mu-a amah in, minam khempeuh, beh khempeuh, pau khempeuh le mi khempeuh tunga tangko ding, tawntung lungdamna-thu a nei hi.
66014007	Amah in, “Ama thukhen ding hun hong tung zo ahi manin Pasian kihta unla, amah minthanna pia ta un. Vantungte, leitung, tuipi le tuinakte a bawlpa amah bia un,” ci-in aw ngaihtakin a gen hi.
66014008	Vansawltak a nihna in a nung zui-a, “A angkawmnate, a haisakna leng gahzu minamte khempeuh a dawnsaknu puk ta! A Lian Babylon puk ta!” a ci hi.
66014009	Vansawltak a thumna in amaute nung zui-a, aw ngaihtakin, “Mi khatpeuh in gamsa le ama lim bia a, ama ciam tehna a taltang tung ahikeh a khut tungah a ngah leh
66014010	amah in zong Pasian thangpaihna hai sunga kisungsa a lungsona a khauh mahmah lenggahzu a dawn ding hi. Amah a siangtho van sawltakte le Tuuno mai-ah kaat kuang tawh kigawt ding hi.
66014011	Amaute kigawtna meikhu a tawntungin khu den hi. Tua lai-ah gamsa le a lim a biate, ahikeh ama min ciamtehna a ngah peuhmah asun azan tawlngak hun a om kei hi,” a ci hi.
66014012	Hih in Pasian thupiakte a mangte le Jesu tunga a muanhuai lai misiangte lungduai-a thuakna a kal hi.
66014013	Tua ciangin vantung panin aw, khat in, “Gelh in: Tu-a kipan Topa sunga site thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi. Kha in, “Hihi, a sepnate un, amaute zui ding ahi manin, amau nasep gimna pan a tawlnga ta ding uh hi,” a cih ka za hi.
66014014	Ka et leh ka mai-ah meiipi kang khat na kaii-a, meiipi tunga tupa “mihing tapa banga” a lutung ah kham lukhu khat khu-in a khut ah phiaukawi hiam khat a tawi hi.
66014015	Tua ciangin biakinnpi sung pan vansawltak dang khat hong paikhia in, meiipi tunga tupa nakpi in sama, “Leitunga ante min khin ta ahi manin, an lak hun tung zo hi, na phiaukawi la inla at in,” a ci hi.
66014016	Tua ciangin tua meiipi tunga tupa in, a phiaukawi leitung ah van kawikawi a, leitung an laksa a suak hi.
66014017	Vantung a biakinnpi sung pan vansawltak adang khat hong paikhia a, amah in zong phiaukawi hiam khat mah a tawi hi.
66014018	Mei a uk vansawltak dang khat biakna-tau panin hong paikhia lai-a, phiaukawi hiam tawipa nakpi in sama, “Lenggahte min khin ahi manin na phiaukawi hiam la inla, leitung lenggah gui panin lenggah bawkte khawm in,” a ci hi.
66014019	Tua vansawltak in leitung ah phiaukawi van kawikawi-a, lenggahte khawmin Pasian thangpaihna lenggah suknapi sungah a lawn hi.
66014020	Amaute khuapi pua-a lenggah-sukna sungah kicil-a, tua lenggah-sukna pan sisan luangin stadia 1,600 gamla dong sakol kamkaih ciang banin a luangkhia hi.
66015001	Vantung ah alian a piandang lim khat ka mu a: vansawltak sagih in a nunung gimna sagihte a tawi uh hi – a nunung ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian thangpaihna a kimna hi ta hi.
66015002	Limlang tuipi le mei kigawm tawh kibang khat le gamsa le ama min le ama min nambat tunga gualzote, tuipi kianga ding ka mu hi. Amaute in Pasian piak harpte tawi uh a,
66015003	Tuuno la le Pasian nasem Moses la sa in: “Thahatpen Topa Pasian, nangma nasepte lian in, piandang hi. Khanghunte kumpipa aw, na lampite thumaanin thutang hi.
66015004	Topa aw, kua’n nang hong kihta loin, na min thangsak lo ding hiam? Ahang in, nangmah bek na siangtho hi. Amaan nangma sepnate, kilaak khin zo ahi manin, minam khempeuh hong pai-in, na mai-ah hong bia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
66015005	Hih teng khit ciangin ka et leh, vantungah teci panna biakbuk ahi, biakinnpi honsa in a om hi.
66015006	Vansawltak sagihte biakinnpi pua-ah gimna sagih tawh hong paikhia uh hi. Amaute in puansiang le a tang saihadial puan silh uh a, a awm uhah kham dialpek a baat uh hi.
66015007	Tua ciangin a nungta ganhing lite khat in, vansawltak sagihte tungah a tawntunga nungta den pa, Pasian thangpaihna tawh a dim kham kuangkum sagih a pia hi.
66015008	Tua ciangin Pasian minthanna le ama vangliatna pana meikhu, biakinnpi sung tengah dim a, gimna sagihte a kim khit matengin vansawltak sagihte tua biakinnpi ah khatbeek a lut thei kei uh hi.
66016001	Tua ciangin biakinnpi pan vansawltak sagihte tungah, “Pai unla Pasian thangpaihna kuangkum sagihte leitung ah sung ta un,” a ci aw ngaih khat ka za hi.
66016002	A masa pen vansawltak pai-in leitang tungah a kuangkum sunga, gamsa ciamtehna a nei le ama lim a bia mite tungah a cikziathuai a na mahmah meimate a tung hi.
66016003	Vansawltak a nihna in tuipi tungah a kuangkum sunga, misite’ sisan tawh kibangin, tuipi sunga nuntakna a nei na khempeuh a si hi.
66016004	Vansawltak a thumna in, gunte le tuinakte tungah a kuangkum sunga, tuate sisan a suak hi.
66016005	Tua ciangin tuite a uk vansawltak in: “Nang, tu laitaka om, a om densa, a Siangtho Pa aw, hih banga thu khen na hi manin na thukhennate ah na thutang hi;
66016006	Ahang in, amaute in na misiangte le na kamsangte sisan luangsak zo uh a, amaute thuak dinga kilawm bangin amau dawn ding sisan na pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
66016007	Tuateh biakna-tau in na dawnga: “Hihi, a Thahatpen Topa Pasian aw, na thukhennate thumaanin thutang hi,” a cih ka za hi.
66016008	Vansawltak a lina in ni tungah a kuangkum sunga, mite mei tawh haldulh nading, ni tungah vangliatna kipia hi.
66016009	Amaute a sa mahmahin kihal-a, amaute in hih gimnate a uk Pasian min samsia uh a, ahi hangin kisik nuam loin amah a minthansak ding a nial uh hi.
66016010	Vansawltak a ngana in gamsa kumpi tokhom tungah a kuangkum sunga, ama gam teng khuamial in a tuamcip hi. Mite in na sa lua-in a leii uh cip tentan uh a,
66016011	a meimate uh na a sak manun vantunga Pasian a hamsiat uh hi; ahi hangin a hihnasate uh hangin a kisik nuam kei uh hi.
66016012	Vansawltak a gukna in, Euphrates gun lianpi tungah a kuangkum sung a, Nisuahna pana kumpite lampi sial dingin tua tui a kang hi.
66016013	Tua ciangin ukeng tawh a kibang kha gilo thum ka mu hi. Amaute, gulpi-sikhiam kam pan, gamsa kam pan le kamsang-zuau kam sung pana pusuakkhiate ahi uh hi.
66016014	Amaute, a lamdang limte a lak thei dawite kha hi uh a, leitung bupa kumpite kiangah pai-in, Thahatpen Pasian ni lian ni-a galdo dingin amaute a kaikhawm dinga kuan khia uh ahi hi.
66016015	"Ngai in, guta bangin kong pai hi! Amah guaktang le zumhuaitakin pholaka a om loh theih nadingin hak gige sa-in puansilh-a om pa thupha ngah ahi hi.”
66016016	Tua ciangin amaute in Hebrew pau a Armageddon a cihna munah kumpite a khawm uh hi.
66016017	Vansawltak a sagihna in huih lakah a kuangkum sunga, kumpi tokhom panin, aw ngaih mahmah khat in biakinnpi pualam ah, “Kizo ta hi!” a ci hi.
66016018	Tua ciangin tua munah kek kia in, khua phia zalzal a, van ging damdam in nakpi-in zin a ling hi. Tua zinling nasia lua mahmah a, leitung a mi a om nungsang tua banga zinling a om ngei nai kei hi.
66016019	Tua khuapi lian phel thumin kiphelkhap a, minamte khuapite a kicim hi. Pasian in a Lian Babylon phawk gige a, ama lungsona lenggahzu tawh a dim ama thangpaihna hai a pia hi.
66016020	Tuikulh peuhmah mangthang a mualpite a kimu zo nawn kei hi.
66016021	Van panin mite tungah a lian mahmah gialtangte, tang khat pound za khat bang a gik a kia hi. Tua ciangin tua gimna lauhuai lua mahmah ahi manin gial gimna hangin amaute in Pasian a samsia uh hi.
66017001	Kuangkum sagih a tawi vansawltak sagihte laka khat hong pai-in ka kiangah, “Hong pai in, tui tampi tunga tu a lian numei kizuaknu gawtna kong lak ding hi.
66017002	Leitung kumpite in amah tawh angkawm uh a, leitunga tengte in ama angkawmna zu a kham uh hi,” hong ci hi.
66017003	Tua khit ciangin vansawltak in Kha-in kei gamlakah hong puamang hi. Tua lai-ah lu sagih le ki sawm nei a, gendaina minte in a pumtuam a dupsan gamsa tungah numei khat a tu ka mu hi.
66017004	Tua numei in adupsan le a-ausan puante silh-a kham, suang manpha, le kep manphate tawh kizemin a tee siasua hi. Tuanu in a kihhuai nate le a angkawmna nin tawh a kidim kham hai khat a khut sungah a tawi hi.
66017005	A taltang ah: THUTHUK ALIAN BABYLON NUMEI KIZUAKTE LE LEITUNG KIHHUAINATE' NU ci-in a min kigelh hi.
66017006	Tua numei in, misiangte le Jesu thu teci a pang mite sisan khamgawp-a om ka mu hi. Tuanu ka muh ciangin lamdang ka sa lua mahmah hi.
66017007	Tua ciangin tua vansawltak in ka kiangah, “Bang dinga lamdang sa lua na hiam? Tua numei le lu sagih le ki sawm a nei ama tuanna gamsa, a thuthuk kong hilhcian ding hi.
66017008	Khat vei lai-a na muhsa tua gamsa, tu-in a om nawn kei hi. Kawhawmpi sung pan hong pusuakkhia-in ama kisiatna ah a pai ding hi. Lei kipiansak cila kipan, nuntakna laibu sunga a min kigelh nai lo leitunga teng mi khempeuh in, tua gamsa a muh uh ciangin, khat vei a om khin, tu-in om nawn lo napi hong pai ding ahi manin lamdang a sa mahmah ding uh hi.
66017009	"Hih thu in lungsim pilna a kal hi. Lutang sagihte in numeinu tutna mual sagihte ahi hi. Amaute kumpi sagihte zong ahi uh hi.
66017010	Nga puk zo a, khat a om laitak hi-in, adang khat a om nai kei hi; ahi hangin hong pai ciangin tawm vei sung bek a om ding hi.
66017011	Khat vei a omsa tu-a om lo gamsa pen, kumpi a giatna ahi hi. Amah tua sagihte aa ahi manin a kisia ding hi.
66017012	"Na muh ki sawmte, kumpi gam a ngah nai lo kumpi sawmte hi-a, ahi hangin amaute tua gamsa tawh nai khat sung kumpi banga thuneihna a ngah dingte ahi uh hi.
66017013	Amaute in ngimnasa khat nei uh a, a vangliatna uh le a thuneihnate uh gamsa tungah a pia ding uh hi.
66017014	Amaute in Tuuno va do ding uh hi, ahi hangin kumpite’ Kumpipa le tote’ Topa tua Tuuno in amaute zo dinga, a sapsa a teelsa le a muanhuai ama nungzuite tawh a omkhawm ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
66017015	Tua ciangin vansawltak in, “Tua na muh numei kizuaknu tutna tui pen, mite, mihonpite, minamte le kampaute ahi hi.
66017016	Tua na muh gamsa le ki sawmte in tua numei kizuaknu a mudah ding uh hi. Amaute in tuanu a siatsak khit uh ciangin, a guaktangin nusia ding uh a, a sa ne in mei-in a hal ding uh hi.
66017017	Ahang in, Pasian kammalte a tangtun masiah amaute vangliatna tua gamsa tungah a uk dingin a piak ding uh thukimna tawh Pasian in ama ngimna a zawhsiang nading amau lungtang sungah koih khin zo hi.
66017018	Tua na muh numei in leitunga kumpite a uk khuapi lian ahi hi,” ci-in hong gen hi.
66018001	Hih teng khit ciangin vansawltak adang khat, vantung pan hong paisuk ka mu hi. Amah in thuneihna lianpi nei-a, a thupina in leitung a tangsak hi.
66018002	Amah in nakpi takin: “Puk ta! A Lian Babylon puk ta! Tuanu dawite kua suaka, kha gilote le a nin, a huathuai vasate zualna mun, suak zo hi.
66018003	Ahang in, minamte khempeuh in a angkawmnate-a mi a haisak zu dawnin kham ta uh hi. Leitung kumpite in amah tawh angkawm uh a, leitung sumbawlte in ama noptatluatna a hauhlawh uh hi,”a ci hi.
66018004	Tua ciangin vantung panin aw dang khat in: “Ka mite aw, ama mawhnate ah na kihel khak loh nadingun, ama gimnate na thuak khak loh nadingun tuanu sung pan hong paikhia un;
66018005	ahang in, a mawhnate, van banin kicianga, Pasian in a gamtat khialhnate ciamteh zo hi,
66018006	Ama piaksa bangin amah pia kik un; ama hihsa zah nih amah pia kik un. Ama hai pan mah in a zah nih leihbeh un.
66018007	Noptatna le minthanna amah le amah a kipiak zahzah, gawtna le dahna amah pia un. A lungtang ah amah kisathei a, ‘Kumpinu-in ka tu hi; meigong ka hi kei a, ka thum ngei kei ding hi,’ ci hi.
66018008	Tua ahi manin ni khat sungin ama gimnate ahi: sihna, thumna le kialpi-te in tuanu a khuplet ding hi. Ama tunga thukhen Topa Pasian thahat ahi manin tuanu, mei-ah kikhultum ding hi.
66018009	"Amah tawh angkawm-a, ama nop tatna a zangkhawm leitung kumpite in tuanu kihalna meikhu a muh uh ciangin amah kah in a thum ding uh hi.
66018010	Ama thuaksiatna kihta in a gamlapi ah ding ding uh a: “‘Gimna! Gimna! O khuapi lian, O vangliatna khuapi Babylon! Nai khat sungin na siatna hong tung veh!’ci-in kap ding uh hi.
66018011	"Leitung sumbawlte kapin a thum ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau sumbuk van:
66018012	kham, ngun, suang manpha le kep manphate; saihadial hoih, a-ausan, nai le a dupsan puante, sing namtui namkim le saiha tawh kibawl na namkim, sing manpha, sumngo, sik le suangngo;
66018013	sumbuk van, singzungthak, masala, gim namtui paknamtui kha le sathau namtui, lenggahzu le olive thau, annel limci le mangbuh; ganhon le tuuhon; sakolte le lengte le mihingte pumpite le khate, kuamah in a lei nawn kei hi.
66018014	"Amaute in, ‘Na lunggulh mahmah gah in nang hong nusia ta hi. Na hauhna le na thupina khempeuh in mual khum-a, a kimu kik nawn kei ding hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
66018015	Tuanu tungah hih nate zuaka, a hauhna uh a ngah sumbawlte, ama thuaksiatna kihta in a gamla pekah a ding ding uh hi. Amaute thumin kap ding uh a:
66018016	"‘Gimna! Gimna, O khuapi lian, saihadial hoih, a-ausan le adupsan tawh kizem a, kham, suang manpha le kep manpha tawh a tee siasua!
66018017	Nai khat sungin tua bang hauhna lianpi kisia tazen maw!’ ci-in a kapkhia ding uh hi. “Tembaw ukte khempeuh, tembaw-a khualzinte khempeuh, tembaw nasemte le tuipi pana kivak nading a zongte khempeuh a gamlapi pekah a ding ding uh hi.
66018018	Tuanu a katna meikhu a muh uh ciangin amaute in, ‘Hih khuapi lian bang, khuapi om ngei hiam?’ cikhia ding uh hi.
66018019	Amaute in a lutung uhah leivui lawn ding uh a, thumin kapin: “‘Gimna! Gimna, O khuapi lian, tuipi tunga tembaw nei khempeuh in a hauh lawh! Tuanu hauhna nai khat sungin kisia zo tah!
