66018020	Vantung aw, ama hangin nuam in! Misiangte, sawltakpite le kamsangte aw, nuam un! Amah in note hong bawlsiatna hangin Pasian in ama tungah thu khen zo hi,’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
66018021	Tua ciangin a thahat vansawltak khat in an gawina suang lian cia a pha suangmai khat tawma tuipi sungah lawn in: “Babylon khuapi lian hih bangin ngong bawlin kisusia dinga, a kimu kik nawn kei ding hi.
66018022	Harp tumte le lasiamte, tamngai mutte le pengkul mutte awging nang sungah kiza kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Nang sungah khutsiam kuamah kimu kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Nang sungah angawina suang ging a kiza kik ngei nawn kei ding hi.
66018023	Nang sungah meivak khat zong kivak kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Nang sungah mopipa le mo aw kiza kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Na sumbawlte, leitung miliante vive ahi hi. Nang bumna in leitung minam khempeuh lam pialsak khin hi
66018024	Ama sungah kamsangte, misiangte le leitang tunga kithatsate khempeuh sisan kimu zo hi,” a ci hi.
66019001	Hih teng khit ciangin vantungah mihon tampi awng tawh kibang aw khat in: “Hallelujah! Hotkhiatna, minthanna le vangliatna eite Pasian aa ahi hi,
66019002	ahang in, a thukhenna thumaanin thutang hi. Amah in angkawmna tawh leitung a siasak numei kizuaknu, mawhpaih zo hi. Ama nasemte sisan phu tuanu tungah la zo hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
66019003	Tua khit teh: “Hallelujah! Tuanu kangkhu a tawntungin a khuto den hi,” ci-in a awng kik leuleu uh hi.
66019004	Tua upa sawmnih le lite le a nungta ganhing lite in bokin tokhom tunga tu Pasian a bia uh hi. Amaute in: “Amen, Hallelujah!” ci-in a awng uh hi.
66019005	Tua ciangin kumpi tokhom pan: “No ama nasem khempeuh, no amah a kihtate aw, aneu alian in, i Pasian phat un!” ci-in aw khat hong ging hi.
66019006	Tua khit ciangin mihonpite in, tuizeu ging le angaih mahmah kek kia ging tawh kibangin: “Hallelujah! A Thahatpen i Topa Pasian in uk ta hi.
66019007	Eite nuamin, lungdamin, ama min thangsak ni! Ahang in, Tuuno mopi hun tung zo a, a lawmnu kigingsa-in om zo hi.
66019008	Ama silh dingin saihadial puan hoih asiang apak mahmah kipia hi,”ci-in a awng uh hi. (Saihadial puan hoih pen a thumaan misiangte gamtatna tang ahi hi.)
66019009	Tua ciangin vansawltak in kei kiang ah, “Gelh in: ‘Tuuno mopawi sim dinga kisamte thupha ngah ahi hi!’ hong ci a, “Hihte amaan Pasian kammalte ahi hi,” hong cih beh lai hi.
66019010	Hih thu ah amah bia dingin a khe phungah ka bok hi. Ahi hangin amah in, “Hih kei in! Kei zong Jesu ading teci a pang, nang le na sanggamte tawh nasem khawm khat mah ka hi hi. Pasian bia in! Ahang in, Jesu teci panna in kamsanna kha ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
66019011	Van kihonga om ka mu-a, ka mai-ah sakol kang khat a na om hi. A tunga tuangpa, Muanhuai le Thumaan kici hi. Amah in thutangin thukhena gal a do hi.
66019012	Ama mitte meikuanglai tawh kibanga, a lutung ah kumpi lukhu tampi a khu hi. Tuate tungah kuama theihpih theih loh amah bek in a theih min kigelh hi.
66019013	Sisan sunga kidiahsa puantual khatin kizem a, ama min, Pasian Thu ahi hi.
66019014	Vantung galkapte sakol kang tungah tuangin, asiang apak mahmah saihadial puan hoih silh uh a, amah a zui kawikawi uh hi.
66019015	A kam panin minamte sattuk nading namsau hiam khat hong dawkkhia hi. “Amah in amaute sikciang tawh a uk ding hi.” Amah in a Thahatpa Pasian thangpai-a, a lungsona lenggah sukna a tuancil hi.
66019016	Ama puantual tung le a phei tungah: KUMPITE’ KUMPIPA, TOTE’ TOPA ci-in hih min kigelh hi.
66019017	Tua ciangin ni sunga ding van sawltak khat ka mu hi. Vankimlai-a leng vasa khempeuh kiangah amah ngaihtakin kiko a “Hong pai un, Pasian nitak-an thupi ne dingin hong kikhawm un.
66019018	Note in kumpite, galkap mangpite, mi thahatte, sakol le a tunga tuangte, le sila le sila lote, aneu alian, mi khempeuh sa na ne thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
66019019	Tua ciangin tua sakol tunga tuang pa le a galkapte do dingin tua gamsa le leitung kumpite le a galkap honte uh hong kikaikhawm ka mu hi.
66019020	Ahi hangin tua gamsa kiman ta a, amah tawh ama tunga lim lamdang a bawl zuau kam sangpa kiman hi. Amah in hih limte tawh gamsa ciamtehna ngahsate le a lim a biate a khem hi. Amaute lakah tua nihte a hingtangin a kihtakhuai kaat kuanglai lipi sungah kipai hi.
66019021	A om lai teng, sakol tunga tuang pa kam pana pusuakkhia namsau tawh kithat a, vasa khempeuh in amaute sa a ne phiauphiau uh hi.
66020001	Tua ciangin vansawltak khat vantung pana hong paikhiasuk ka mu a, amah in Kawhawmpi honna tawhtang nei-in, a khut ah sikkhainiang lianpi khat a tawi hi.
66020002	Amah in tua tanglai gulpi, Satan ahikeh dawimangpa, gulpi-sikhiam mana, kum tulkhat sung a khih hi.
66020003	Amah in Kawhawmpi sungah lawn a, minamte a khem nawn loh nadingin kum tulkhat a bei mateng, tawh kalh khuma, a tungah seal in a ciamteh hi. Tua hun khit ciangin amah tomkha sung a kikhahkhia pelmawh ding hi.
66020004	Thukhen za a kipiasate tutna, kumpi tokhomte ka mu hi. Tua ciangin Jesu adinga teci pangte le Pasian thu teci a panna uh hanga a ngawng uh a kitante kha ka mu hi. Amaute in gamsa ahikeh a lim bia loin ama ciamtehna a tal tung ahikeh a khut tunguah a ngah kei uh hi. Amaute nungta uh a, Khrist tawh kum tulkhat sung a uk uh hi.
66020005	(Kum tulkhat a bei mateng a om lai mi sisate a nungta nai kei hi.) Hih in a masa thawhkikna ahi hi.
66020006	A masa thawhkikna sunga kihelte a siangtho le thupha ngahte ahi uh hi. Amaute tungah sihna nihna in vangliatna a nei nawn kei hi. Ahi hangin amaute, Pasian le Khrist siampite hi ding uh a, kum tulkhat sung amah tawh a uk khawm ding uh hi.
66020007	Kum tulkhat a bei khit ciangin, Satan a thongkiatna pan kikhahkhia-in,
66020008	leitung kiuli-a minamte khem dingin kuankhia dinga Gog le Magog kidona adingin amaute a kaikhawm ding hi. Amaute tuipi gei-a sehnel zah pha uh hi.
66020009	Amaute leitung maitang dimin pai uh a, Pasian mite giahphual, a it a khuapi a umcih uh hi. Ahi hangin van panin meikuang hong tuaksuk a, amaute kangtummang hi.
66020010	Amaute a khem tua dawimangpa gamsa le kamsang zuaute a kipaihna kaat kuang lipi sungah a kilawn hi. Amaute sun le zanin a tawntung gawtna kithuaksak den ding hi.
66020011	Tua ciangin alian akang kumpi tokhom le a tunga tupa ka mu hi. Ama mai-ah van le lei om nading mun om lo ahi manin a taimang hi.
66020012	Tua ciangin misite, aneu alianin kumpi tokhom mai-a ding le laibute kilem ka mu hi. Nuntakna laibu ahi laibu dang khat a kilem hi. Misite tungah a hihsate uh laibute sunga kigelhsa tawh kizui-in thu kikhen hi.
66020013	Tuipi in a sunga om misite puakkhia a, sihna le Gawtmun in amau sunga om misite puakkhia-in, mi khempeuh amau nasepna tawh kizui-in thu kikhen ciat hi.
66020014	Tua ciangin meili sungah sihna le Gawtmun kipai hi. Tua meili sihna nihna ahi hi.
66020015	Nuntakna laibu sunga a min kigelh lo peuhmah meili sungah kipai hi.
66021001	Tua ciangin a masa van le a masa lei mangthang a, tuipi lah om nawn lo ahi manin van thak le lei thak ka mu hi.
66021002	Pasian kiang vantung panin Jerusalem thak, Khuapi Siangtho, a pasal kianga mothak ding, kilawm taka kizem mo bangin hong paisuk ka mu hi.
66021003	Kumpi tokhom panin aw ngaih mahmah khat ka za a, “Tu-in Pasian tenna mite tawh om khawm ta dinga, amah amaute tawh a teng khawm ding hi. Amaute ama mi hi ding uh a, Pasian mahmah amau tawh om khawmin, amaute Pasian hi ding hi.
66021004	Amah in amaute mit-a khitui khempeuh a nulsak ding hi. Alui nate paizia mangthang zo ahi manin tua lai-ah natna, sihna, thumna, kahnate a om nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
66021005	Kumpi tokhom tunga tupa in, “Na khempeuh athakin ka bawl hi!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hih thute muan takin thumaan ahi manin gelh in,” hong ci hi.
66021006	Amah in kei kiangah, “Kizo ta hi! Keimah Alpha le Omega, a Patna le a Tawpna ka hi hi. A dangtak mi tungah man nei loin nuntakna tuinak panin tui ka pia ding hi.
66021007	A gualzo mi in hihte khempeuh luahin, ama Pasian ka hi dinga, amah ka tapa ahi ding hi.
66021008	Ahi hangin a meidawite, a umlote, a tatsiate, tualthatte, numei le pasal paktatte, mi bumte, milim biate le zuauphuakte khempeuh – amaute mun ding, kaat kuang meilipi sung hi ding hi. Hih pen sihna nihna ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
66021009	A nunung gimna sagihte tawh ki dim kuangkum sagihte a tawi vansawltak sagihte lakah khat ka kiangah hong pai-a, “Hong pai in, Tuuno zi ahi, mo, kong lak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
66021010	Amah in Kha-in hong puamangin alian asang mualtungah hong tuna, Pasian kiang vantung pan hong paisuk, Khuapi Siangtho, Jerusalem hong lak hi.
66021011	Pasian minthanna in tua khuapi tana, a tanphatna, a manpha mahmah suang le jaspar tawh kibangin crystal bangin a siang hi.
66021012	Kulh lianpi sangpitak nei a, kongpi sawm le nih nei in, a kongpite ah vansawltak sawm le nih mah a om hi. A kongpite tungah, Israel beh sawm le nihte min kigelh hi.
66021013	Nisuahna lamah kongpi thum, leilu lamah thum, leitaw lamah thum le nitumna lamah thum a om hi.
66021014	Khuapi kulh in bulkip sawm le nih nei-a, tuate tungah Tuuno sawltakpi sawm le nihte’ min a tuang hi.
66021015	Kei hong hopih vansawltak in tua khuapi, a kongpite le a kulhte teh nading kham kibawl tehna ciang khat a tawi hi.
66021016	Tua khuapi pen kiu li nei, adung avai kikima kilam ahi hi. Amah in tua ciang tawh khuapi teh a, adung, avai le a sanna stadia 12,000 a pha kim hi.
66021017	Amah in a kulh teh a, tua vansawltak in, mihing tehna banga a teh hi-a, tong 144 a sah hi.
66021018	A kulh jaspar kiciang hi-a, a khuapi limlang siang tawh kibang kham citak ahi hi.
66021019	Khuapi kulh bulkipte, suang man pha namkim tawh kizem hi. A khatna bulkip jaspar hi-a a nihna saphire, a thumna chalcedony, a lina emerald,
66021020	a ngana sardonyx, a gukna carnelian, a sagihna chrysolite, a giatna beryal, a kuana topaz, a sawmna chrysophrace, a sawm le khatna Jacinth, le a sawm le nihna amethyst ahi hi.
66021021	Kongpi sawm le nihte kep manpha sawm le nih hi-a, kongpi khat kep manpha khata kibawl ahi hi. Tua khuapi kongzingpite kham citak hi-a, limlang paisuak a bang hi.
66021022	Khuapi sungah biakinnpi ka mu kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Thahat pen Topa Pasian le Tuuno, a khuapi biakinnpi ahi hi.
66021023	Pasian minthanna in tua khuapi taana, a meivak Tuuno ahi manin ni ahi a, khapi ahi zongin a taan ding kisam lo hi.
66021024	Minamte, tua khuavak ah lam pai ding uh a, leitung kumpite in a thupinate uh a sungah a puak ding uh hi.
66021025	Tua lai-ah zan hun om ngei nawn lo ding ahi manin a kongpite kikhak ni a om ngei kei ding hi.
66021026	Minamte minthanna le pahtawinate a sungah kipuak ding hi.
66021027	Tua sungah a siang lo bangmah lut thei lo dinga, a zumhuai, zuauphuakte khatpeuh zong a lut ngei kei ding hi; ahi hangin Tuuno nuntakna laibu sunga min kigelhsate bek a lut thei ding hi.
66022001	Tua ciangin vansawltak in nuntakna guntui hong laka, crystal bangin cim sitset a, Pasian le Tuuno tokhom pan luangkhia-in,
66022002	khuapi kongzing lian laizangah a luangsuk hi. Tua gunpang tuakah nuntakna singkung po-in, kha simin gah a, kum khatin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. Tua singkung a tehte minamte damsak nading ahi hi.
66022003	Kihamsiatna a om nawn kei ding hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian le Tuuno tokhom om dinga, a nasemte in ama na a sem ding uh hi.
66022004	Amaute in ama maitang mu ding uh a, amaute taltangah ama min a tuang ding hi.
66022005	Tua mun ah zan a om nawn kei ding hi. Topa Pasian vang in amaute taan ding ahi manin meivak tang le ni tang a kisam nawn kei ding hi. Amaute in a tawntung in uk den ding uh hi.
66022006	Tua vansawltak in, “Hih thute muan takin thutak ahi hi. Topa kamsangte khate’ Pasian in a pel lo-a, hong tungpah ding nate a nasemte a lak dingin ama vansawltak hong sawl ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
66022007	"Ngai in, kong paipah ding hi! Hih laibu sunga genkholhna thute a kem cingte thupha ngah ahi hi.”
66022008	Keimah John in hih nate mu-a, a za pa ka hi hi. Hihte mu-a ka zak khit ciangin hih thute hong lak vansawltak khe phungah a bia dingin ka boksuk hi.
66022009	Ahi hangin amah in kei kiangah, “Hih kei in! Kei zong nang le na sanggam kamsangte le hih laibu sunga thute a kemcingte khempeuh tawh nasem khawm khat mah ka hi hi. Pasian bia in!” hong ci hi.
66022010	Tua ciangin ka kiangah “Ahun nai ta ahi manin hih laibu-a genkholhna thute bilhcip kei in,
66022011	mawh bawlte in bawl lailai henla, a tatsiate tatsia lailai uh hen la, amaana gamtate gamta lailai hen; a siangthote siangtho lailai ta hen,” ci-in hong gen hi.
66022012	"Ngai in, kong pai pah ding hi! Ka pahtakman ka kiangah om hi; mi khempeuh tungah ama hihsa tawh kizui-in ka pia ding hi.
66022013	Keimah, Alpha le Omega, a Masapen le a Nunungpen, a Patna le a Tawpna ka hi hi.
66022014	"Nuntakna singkung neih theih nading le kongpite tawna khuapi sunga lut nading thu neih theih nadinga a puantual uh a sawpsiangte thupha ngah ahi uh hi.
66022015	A pualam ah ahileh, uite, dawi-ai tawite, numei le pasal paktatte, tualthatte, milim biate, le zuauphuah nuamsa-a, zuauthu gente peuhmah a om ding uh hi.
66022016	"Keimah Jesu in, pawlpite ading in hih teci panna nang tunga gen dingin ka vansawltak kong sawl zo hi. Kei in David Zungpi le ama Suan le a tangpha Zingsol ka hi hi.”
66022017	Tua Kha le tua mo in, “Hong pai in!” ci uh hi. A za peuh in, “Hong pai in!” ci ta hen. A dangtak peuhmah hong pai ta hen. A ut peuhmah in letsonga kipia nuntakna tui sang ta hen.
66022018	Hih laibu sunga genkholhna thute a za peuhmah ka vauhilh hi: Mi khatpeuh in tuate banah bang khatpeuh a behlap leh Pasian in ama tungah hih laibu sunga kigentel gimnate a behlap ding hi.
66022019	Mi khatpeuh in hih genkholhna laibu sung pana thute a paihkhiat leh Pasian in ama tung panin hih laibu sunga kigentel nuntakna singkung pan le khuapi siangtho pana a tanh ding a lakkhiatsak ding hi.
66022020	Hih nate teci a pangpa in, “Hihi, kong paipah ding hi,” a ci hi. Amen. Topa Jesu aw, hong pai ta in.
66022021	Topa Jesu hehpihna Pasian mite tawh omkhawm ta hen. Amen.
